name: Not found
description: After the Demon King was slain, the Hidden Dungeon suddenly appeared in a frontier town, said to be overrun by unimaginable monsters and to hold unbelievable treasures!! The newlywed Yui, about to attempt the dungeon, carries a certain secret…!? The Level 99 martial artist who saved the world changes jobs to a Level 1 housewife, only to be dragged into tackling a brutal dungeon!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
When she first meets Cen Ji, Jiang Ran hits him, believing him to be the fanatic who has been harassing her for six months.
It is only three days later, during a dinner, that Jiang Ran discovers that the man she mistook for a fan and hit was actually the president of the Sense Group, whom she was supposed to approach for sponsorship.
Cen Ji, meanwhile, is pressured by his mother to find a wife.
The solution: a contract with Jiang Ran to be his fake fiancée.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden - Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki
description: 25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". What is her daily life like...?!
tags: Comedy, Survival, Slice of Life, Music

name: Kuzu Rouninsei, Jinsei ga Tsurai no de Yoru no Onee-san wo Yondemita
description: Makino failed her college entrance exam. Her only comfort is in her 2D game characters... until she found an ad for a call-girl who looked exactly like her favorite in-game waifu! The yuri love comedy between a gullible young woman and a street-wise call-girl begins now!
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. Yet, after dying,  Marie finds herself back a year in the past, discovering that no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!
tags: Time Travel, Loli, Comedy, Incest, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Tezmo Syndrome
description:
A story about Funa Minami, an eccentric girl who loves model railroading, and Mari, an ordinary girl, who together explore the world of modelling through nostalgic products from the early days of the hobby.
(Adapted description from Volume 1)
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Tales of Demons and Gods
description:
Nie Li became the strongest Demon Spiritualist and stood at the pinnacle of the martial world. However, he lost his life during the battle with the Sage-Emperor and six deity-ranked beasts.  
  
His soul was then brought back to when he was still 13 years old. At this point in his life, Nie Li was considered to be the most pathetic of his peers. However, with the vast knowledge he accumulated from his previous life (his future), he began becoming stronger faster than anyone could expect. He also decided to help those who died nobly in his previous life become stronger as well.  
  
Aiming to avert the future destruction of his home by demon beasts, and to avoid his previous fate of ending up destroyed, Nie Li fights to protect his lover, friends, family and fellow citizens who died in the beast assault or its aftermath. He also aims to destroy the so-called "sacred family," who will abandon their duty and betray the city.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Powpow Odyssey
description:
A parody of modern shounen

A young rabbit man and his two dipshit friends try to solve the murder of one of their fathers.

Soundtrack to listen to while reading: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL352CWaMNzHM9hdwHsXKaAQZRtqRkkSTH
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published

name: Youheidan no Ryouriban
description: The story begins when Azuma Shuri, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gungrave, the leader of a mercenary group. Shuri joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Shuri connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Shuri is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Shuri does not yet know that he will become a hero.
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Deathco
description:
A story about "Deathco", a young girl who's good at killing, and not much else. She works for a secretive, international league of assassins known only as "The Guild", who infamously dress in costumes when they hunt their targets.  
  
Amazon:  
  
The curtains open for this Comic Noir brought to you by a demon child from the manga world.  
  
The ultra pop dark heroine descends upon this boring bullshit world causing havoc wherever she roams and her name is…  
This manga demon child blasts through the conventions of genres and world boundaries as Kaneko Atsushi lets loose a comic that captures the "now" and starts a new Comic Noir series.
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Tragedy

name: Taika no Risei
description: As birth rates decline, in an effort to increase the total population of Japan, the country has implemented... a pet-humanism policy...? As more and more owners "humanize" their pets--having them become members of society--Japan begins to experience a hike in economic growth, as well as in increase in crimes committed by these "dogmen" and "catmen"... In the midst of such social unrest, what could possibly be of bigger concern to one cynical high school girl named Ao...?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Animals, Crime, Philosophical, Gore, Drama

name: Fights Breaking Through The Heavens
description: In a land where there is no magic, a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey, a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Wortenia Senki
description: High-schooler Ryoma Mikoshiba finds himself summoned to another world by the warmongering O'ltormea Empire. But Ryoma is no ordinary school boy – he has both talent and training in martial arts. Using his skills in martial arts to escape captivity and swearing revenge on the country that summoned him, Ryoma finds himself in a world where he can become stronger by absorbing the life force of whomever he slays – a world that fits his talents to a bloody T. Pursued by the O'ltormean court for killing an important official, Ryoma attempts to flee the border while keeping his identity hidden. But as he does, he encounters two twin sisters - Sara and Laura - an encounter that will change his fate.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Creepy Cat
description:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Tanya Degurechaff is a reincarnated Japanese salesman-turned-sociopathic child soldier, forced by the almighty Being X to fight an endless war.   
But soldiers need to eat, too. So join Tanya as she samples fine wartime meals.
tags: Historical, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Mujina into the Deep
description: In the near future, human rights aren’t guaranteed, but they are for sale. Without your rights, you’re nothing—a mujina. There are no laws to protect the rightless. But if the laws don’t apply to you, you can do anything you want. You just need the skills to back it up. And if you’re really good, you can become an elite assassin! (VIZ)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents

name: Villain to Kill
description:
There are two kinds of people with special abilities: villains, who are driven by their evil desires, and psykers, who pursue justice and work against villains.

Cassian Lee is a very powerful psyker with a good heart. But one day, when he visits his friend in Greece, things take a wrong turn. Following an unexpected chain of events, Cassian ends up in the body of a Korean high school boy... who has just become a villain! 

Will his sense of justice win in the end or will he end up becoming a cold-blooded villain?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
When Hinata, a female university student, starts living on her own after entering college, she finds herself in a city that’s perfectly livable but dull and boring. Thinking she’ll just spend the next four years of university here, she shrugs it off… until one day, she encounters Kage, a young man taking photos of seemingly ordinary spots around town.

Intrigued by Kage’s actions, Hinata decides to go on a city-walking adventure with him! As they stroll together, the ordinary city she once found boring begins to reveal unexpected charm… and wonders! If you walk through a seemingly mundane town with the right person, the world bursts with fascinating colors!

A city-walking romantic comedy featuring a socially savvy female university student and a young man aspiring to be a professional manga assistant!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: GraPara!
description:
Shinobu Sumida, a down-on-his-luck gravure otaku, unexpectedly starts living together with rookie gravure idol Sakura Katsuragi! But his heart-racing dream days are short-lived as lecherous photographers, crooked managers, and sexually harassing producers start closing in on his “beloved Sakura-chan” one after another!! Can Shinobu protect Sakura-chan's virtue!? 

From the creator of the hit series “Karamizakari” (over 4.5 million copies sold), Airi Katsura presents this NTR romantic comedy featuring popular gravure idols♡
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Partners in Crime, Partners in Love
description: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhang, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Girls' Love, Drama, Police, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
I woke up to find myself as Duke Kalis Fall — with a wife and a daughter!
Kalis seems to have been a man indifferent to his own family, and tension rules within the Fall household. Upon arriving in this world, the first thing I remembered was a certain otome game… but my daughter, Laurier, is the villain in that game!
I’ll make sure my beloved wife and daughter are truly happy, and I won’t allow her to become a villain!
Thus begins the story of a father determined to prevent a tragic ending!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A boy who naturally crossdresses.  
___
Alternative Raw:
* [Animate-Onlineshop](https://www.animate-onlineshop.jp/pn/pd/2373438/
)
* [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2185227
)
tags: Crossdressing, School Life, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Muboubi Kawaii Pajama Sugata no Bishoujo to Heya de Futarikiri
description:
During summer break, Manamichi, who had been spending his days buried in studies, was tasked with tutoring his classmate, Makura Koiro. When he visited her apartment, where she lived alone, she greeted him in her pajamas and surprised him with an unexpected proposal.

"Hey... let's just indulge together, okay?"

Spending time with Koiro, who remained in her cute pajamas and was full of vulnerabilities, they played games, ate meals, and before he knew it, they were sleeping side by side...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Junpei, a loner high school boy, became a gyaru after saving the God of Gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Junpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Toru ni Taranai
description: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: ENT. - Ore no Kagi ga Hazusareta K Noukai
description:
In the world, people can be classified into three types: strong carnivores; middle carnivores and herbivores.  
Somi Han is referred to as "Invisible girl". She befriends a fellow herbivore, Yujin Ko. However Somi Han feels that Yujin Ko is more like a tiger pretending to be a rabbit. Meanwhile, the entertainment industry is in an uproar with the appearance of a fanfiction writer called Foxstar. With incredibly detailed and accurate information about the personal lives of many of Korea's hottest stars, celebrities are more than nervous.  
What happens when Somi and Yujin discover each other's secret identities?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Twilight Axis
description: Universal Century 0096. Several months have passed since the incident surrounding Laplace's box also known as the Universal Century Charter. The Earth Federation Forces dispatches a group of investigators to the severed Axis which is drifting outside the Earth Sphere. Two civilians participate as members of the research group: Arlette Almage and Danton Hyleg. Both have pasts with government service to the Principality of Zeon and Neo Zeon as an engineer and test pilot. Having infiltrated Axis, the investigators come under attack inside a base where no one should be. Arlette and Dalton are confronted with an incident they never imagined.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: After the sudden death of her father, 24-year-old Reina Izutsu finds herself at the helm of the family business, Izutsu Printing. Thrust into the role of company president, the pressure quickly hardens her demeanor—leaving her employees walking on eggshells, especially Kenichi Ishizumi, the stoic 37-year-old senior supervisor. One night, overwhelmed and tipsy in a quiet park, Reina blurts out, "That's it! I quit being everyone's boss!"—completely unaware that the man beside her is her employee. Under the soft glow of the stars, he listens silently... and makes a quiet vow to stand by her side.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: The Yandere Sister Just Wants Me to Bully Her
description:
The protagonist, who is a novelist, deeply detests women who appear innocent and pure but are manipulative, so she intentionally creates such a main character in her book and arranges for her to be mistreated repeatedly! However, she never imagined that one day she would end up transported into the book, and now she is determined to take personal revenge! But due to her tendency to fall in love with beauty, she cannot bring herself to harm the beautiful, innocent protagonist and, step by step, ends up becoming her guardian... While she is anxious about her misguided feelings, the ever-fragile protagonist pushes the male protagonist three meters away and confesses his love for Gu Xing in a stubborn way! What! So, after all, I'm the one being protected!

Source : MU
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: No Home
description:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.
tags: Award Winning, Ghosts, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Yachiru is a hasshakusama youkai living in the human world. Because the prevailing public image of hasshakusama is that they're lewd, her powers have weakened and her height has shrunk from its original 8 shaku (240 cm) to about 190 cm. She strives to correct that impression, but each day is another failure. However, while at the cinema to study horror films, she meets Seiichirou, a young man who is a huge fan of hasshakusama. That's when Yachiru realizes that whenever Seiichirou praises her, her height returns to its original size...!!!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raws:**
  - [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02927/episode/420064)
  - [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/73100)
  - [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%82%84%E3%81%A1%E3%82%8B%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E3%81%BB%E3%82%81%E3%82%8B%E3%81%A8%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B3%E3%82%8B)
- [Official X](https://x.com/yachirusanha)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: My Bias Gets on the Last Train
description:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate, the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

---
Every night, Yeo-un takes the last train home—same route, same time, same routine. But one thing keeps catching his eye: a girl with a guitar and a presence that lingers in his mind. When a shared love for the indie band Long Afternoon sparks a conversation, their late-night encounters begin to turn into something more. But Hae-in isn’t just another fan—she’s the voice behind the band, a secret she can’t afford to reveal. As music draws them closer, the truth may threaten to pull them apart. When the final note plays, will their story end in harmony… or heartbreak?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Music, Full Color

name: Not found
description: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days
description:
In Kingdom Hearts, Sora turned the Keyblade on himself in order to release Kairi's heart, but his heart was also released in the process. This brought about the creation of Roxas, Sora's Nobody. 

Unlike most Nobodies, however, Roxas has no memories of his past. He joins Oragnization XIII and slowly begins to discover the truth behind his existence and the Organization itself. He meets and befriends the fourteenth member of the Organization, who also has no recollection of her past. 

What will Roxas see during his time in the Organization? What is the connection between him, Sora, and the fourteenth member? And what becomes of them? Dive into the heart of Kingdom Hearts storyline's biggest secret.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Ultimate Exorcist Kiyoshi
description:
The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/ultimate-exorcist-kiyoshi)
tags: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Fuufu no Hiketsu wa Banshaku Desu
description: After six years of marriage, this hardworking couple barely sees each other due to mismatched work schedules. Despite their busy lives, they've found the ultimate secret to keeping their love alive, late-night drinks together! From sharing a quiet toast to getting a little too tipsy, their drunken heart-to-hearts keep their bond strong and their passion burning. Can a little alcohol be the cure for a fading spark?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Experimental Doll Dummy Oscar
description: Shunsuke Tokyo, a talented Japanese engineer with a strong passion for doll-making, has been invited to join the West German automobile manufacturer Volkswagen as an experimental doll maker. Despite the initial differences between the company's doll requests and Shunsuke's creative vision, he successfully bridged this gap by producing incredibly intricate experimental dolls!
tags: Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Kotesashi Kouyou is an outstanding masseur, and aspiring sports doctor. Aiming to obtain a scholarship for medical school, he begins attending Seiwa High School, a sports powerhouse, this spring. As his family is poor he has to work as the hostels' manager, where he is also allowed to stay, to pay for his school expenses. Here he meets high school girl athletes, each with their own individual quirks. As the hostels' new manager, Kotesashi must now take care of their physical and mental needs!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, Medical, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the female apothecary from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young apothecary will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court...!?
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yomei Ichinen to Senkokusareta Boku ga, Yomei Hantoshi no Kimi to Deatta Hanashi
description:
"It was the happiest day in the world."
Our sad and fleeting "love with a deadline" has begun.

In the winter of his freshman year of high school, Akito Hayasaka is diagnosed with a heart disease and told that he has little time left to live. In the midst of despair, Akito meets Sakurai Haruna, who is hospitalized at the hospital. Haruna, too, is seriously ill and has only a few days left to live. Akito begins to talk with her, hiding his illness, and becomes interested in Haruna, who says she is not afraid of dying. Can I still be in love with her? The days that pass by as he asks himself these questions begin to change?
tags: Romance, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Guilty Circle
description: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
tags: Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Stupid Snow
description: One shot from the November 1968 issue of Garo [ガロ]
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror, Mystery

name: Tengoku Daimakyou
description: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Little Junior Sister Doesn't Want to Ascend
description:
Sealed inside a secret realm for three hundred years, the notorious archvillain has finally been released by a massive fool. Jin Xun bursts into a wild laughter. He prepares to make his triumphant return and settle an old grudge— huh? What happened to his maxed-out cultivation level? What happened to all of his divine-grade artifacts? Why is no one obeying his commands anymore?! 

As long as Su Yuan stays by Jin Xu's side, her constantly depleting cultivation returns to normal. In order to survive, Su Yuan decides to tightly cling onto Jin Xun by offering him every treasure in the world— as long as he stays by her side, of course. However, just being near her makes Jin Xun lose all of his powers and causes him to become as weak as an ordinary person. In order to seek his revenge, he has to leave her... Until Su Yuan tightly binds him with her Immortal-binding rope.

Su Yuan: Quit struggling. In this lifetime, you and I are never going to be apart!
Jin Xun: I'll never give up my quest for revenge just for the sake of love!   
(A few days later…)  
Jin Xun: Fine, I accept you.
Su Yuan: ？？？？？？
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Eleceed
description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
tags: Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Noa-senpai wa Tomodachi.
description:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.
___
**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: GudaGuda Ace
description: It's not Koha Ace! It's not the European Death Front 1945 either! Here comes a new serialization!
tags: Historical, Comedy, Samurai

name: I Became the Patron of Villains
description:
I, a corporate slave, transmigrated into a game as a noble. 

But I'm just an extra that will die at the hands of the villains in the future? 

Not a chance! I'll somehow reform them and live a lavish life! 

For this I started sponsoring the future villains to prevent them from turning evil and helped them overcome their difficult circumstances. As a result, they all grew up to be upstanding and ordinary, enough to make me feel proud. 

And so, I became the ultimate mastermind of the kingdom... Huh?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Swaying in the Rain, Looking for the Sunshine
description:
I believed it was destiny that brought us together. It's my irreplaceable home, warm like spring sunshine. Therefore…
Here is the newly depicted story of the lost girls from the TV anime *BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!*. (Comic Growl)
tags: Drama, Adaptation, Music

name: Baka Ni Kokuhaku
description: Ayumu Otsuki is a space lover with an ambitious dream—to meet an alien. Despite lacking friends or romantic experience, she started the Astronomy Association by herself, which is the only place where she feels she belongs. One day after school, she dropped an association poster, but an upperclassman picked it up for her. The upperclassman introduced herself as Hayami, and Ayumu completely fell in love at first sight when Hayami recognized her passion! Ayumu's mind is now filled with love, and she goes all out to share her feelings. However, Senpai seems to already adore something else. She fell for a fitness junkie?! A peculiar girl's straightforward romcom!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Nina the Starry Bride
description: Nina had a rough start to life, stealing to survive—and eventually being sold into slavery by her own brother. But to her surprise, her captor, Prince Azure, ordained that she would live the life of a princess... specifically, that of the recently deceased princess-priestess, Alisha. But despite her changing fortune, Nina won't give up her old life without a fight... and Azure might just be the one to finally match her wits. But how much can she trust Azure? And can she stop the feelings budding in her heart, knowing she must eventually marry another...?
tags: Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"... and it's not him who has to pay it.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Vagabond
description:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Shin Kankaku Iyashikei Mahou Shoujo Behoimi-chan
description: A spin-off PaniPoni featuring the healing-type magical girl Behoimi.
tags: Comedy, Supernatural

name: Kippo
description: An irreplaceable "spot…" and the greatest friends in the world! Just when it seems like peaceful everyday life will continue forever, disaster strikes, and that's when these men move to protect what matters most to them! A compilation of stories about the legendary boys of Hiroshima!
tags: Action, Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon
description:
I wish for an ephemeral “happiness”…

Despite being born into a family with unusual powers in its bloodline, Saimori Miyo had not inherited any special abilities. Moreover, she was treated like a lowly servant by her half-sister, who in an ironic twist of fate had awakened an ability of her own. Unloved by her parents and shunned by all, Miyo was a forgotten daughter. Even her childhood friend, her one and only ally, chose to marry her half-sister in order to take over the estate. Seen as nothing more than a hindrance, Miyo is married off to the Kudou family. To a man rumored to be cold and ruthless…

Adapted from a light novel! Japanese-style fantasy x Marriage. A story of love blossoming from marriage.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/161)
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A humble rookie seeks the path to immortality — only to accidentally join a sect full of pretentious con artists. His seven senior brothers brim with confidence, taking turns spouting out fabricated divine techniques. But no one expected this newcomer to be a genius. He actually comprehends everything — even their nonsense! In the end, the master falls into despair. Just who is this junior disciple?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I Am a Hero
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: My Favorite Savior Girl
description: [Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Music, Full Color

name: The Duke of Death and His Maid
description:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: SAVING YOU
description:
A mysterious new student is sent over to a private academy for one important reason; to keep tabs on a certain group of girls. Loyal to the one who sent her, she is reluctant to get close to them. But to these girls, they see a potential new friend.

Deprived of a normal life, she slowly starts to live the life she secretly longed for: attending school, building friendships, and love... But will this bliss last forever?
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
At my high school, Haimiya-senpai is feared by all and considered too scary. This is apparently due to her intimidating appearance and blunt way of speaking... and those sparkling piercings! The long, gray wolf-cut hair! Even her Kansai accent is intimidating!!!
But for some reason, this scary senpai treats me kindly...?
As "scary" turns into "cute," this scary (heart-pounding) senpai rom-com begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Quánzhí Fǎshī
description:
Our hero, Mo Fan, inherits a magical necklace—the next day, he wakes up to find that the world has changed. His high school now teaches magic, and students are encouraged to try and become accomplished magicians. A world that ran on science now runs on magic. However, some things are still the same. He still has a teacher who sees him as a hopeless student, classmates who look the same, a father who struggles to make ends meet, and a not-by-blood little sister who can't walk on her own.
However, Mo Fan discovers that the vast majority of magicians can only harness one element of magic. As luck would have it, however, he is an exception—a versatile mage!

(Source: WebNovel)


---
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ori no Naka
description: Gomi Jirou, a 29-year-old virgin, has spent the past 9 years nerding out with his work colleagues about anime during lunch and drawing erotic doujinshi at night so he can masturbate. However, one day, this comfort zone of his is thrown into disarray by the introduction of a new colleague, Yumezora Kuroko, a bespectacled beauty with long, dark hair and a massive chest. It only takes a moment to fall in love, just like how it takes a moment to lose your footing.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: Not found
description:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Doom Breaker
description:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---

name: Not found
description:
Mai Amai, a girl who loves sweets, got dumped by her girlfriend, and she's still grappling with the heartbreak. One day, the café she works at gets a new employee: The gorgeous Lily Kurosaki. Mai falls head over heels for her before realizing Lily is actually a succubus!

"I want to eat you and your parfaits right up! <3"
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Cooking

name: Hell Task -Bousuke's Errand-
description: A dark era after the Spirit Star's fall where demons run rampant. People live under the threat of demon messengers, the Apostles. An Apostle appears in a certain town, and people are forced to evacuate. Then a mysterious boy, Bousuke, appears… The curtain opens grandly on this dark fantasy epic!
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. 

After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. 

He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. ……What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?

name: Not found
description:
What if there exists another world beyond lucid dreaming? That is where those who have been stolen of their dreams gather. Do Shi-Eon, who escapes reality by lucid dreaming, loses his dream and falls into the space of 'Shared Dream.' Now he must fight to reclaim his dream.

name: Not found
description:
On her 40th birthday, Yumeko's grandmother died. She was left all alone. She had no family, no boyfriend, and was working as a temporary worker. That's how Yumeko celebrated her birthday. Just as she was wondering what to do next, her in-game lover, Sierra, asked her to move in with her. Though hesitant, Yumeko agreed, and when she headed to Sierra's house, she found the hugely popular actress Shiori Hoshikawa there!

Surprised by this sudden turn of events, Shiori tearfully confessed to Yumeko, "I want to be with you."

(Source: Comic Walker, translated)
tags: Romance, Video Games, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami o Kuroku Sometekita
description:
"I dyed my hair black for you... so notice me."

Shimizu-san, the delinquent highschool girl who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo...
___
- [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Random Chat
description:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---

tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Toshiue Elite Onna Kishi ga Boku no Mae de dake Kawaii
description:
Haru is a 16-year-old recruit of the "Black Hawk" 4th Cavalry Unit of the Knights' Regiment under the command of Captain Karen, a profoundly beautiful and fierce 29-year-old swordswoman, who, unbeknownst to all the unit except Haru, is a pure maiden with exactly zilch experience with men. Being privy to this delightful side of her, Haru secretly henpecks her and teases her lovingly, which turns her into a flustered and heavily-armed tomato. Watch as he slowly inches his way into her heart as he dodges her longsword!  

- Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/228090)

(Series has been on Hiatus since June 2024)
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: The popular AV actress Miyama Yuri has suddenly announced her retirement. At the same time, Shikishima, a convenience store manager and her biggest fan, finds himself at a loss—unsure of how to move forward without her in the industry. Amidst this, a girl named Tamagawa-san shows up, applying for a job at Shikishima's store. Coincidentally, she bears a striking resemblance to Miyama Yuri. This uncanny similarity leaves Shikishima torn. Should he ask Tamagawa-san if she's ever appeared in AVs? But in today's politically sensitive climate, such a question feels risky... Who is Tamagawa-san really?
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: The Great Wizard Transcendent
description:
Mikhail Walpurgis, the world’s only 9th-circle Archmage, fell in battle due to a damned hero, and managed to cast one final advanced magic spell, <TIME REVERSAL>. As time rewound, he regressed to 20 years ago.

“Fine. I’ll just become the hero instead.”

---

name: Shark
description:
Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. 

The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Boxer
description:
An unimaginable talent without rivalry. Will it prove itself to be a blessing or a curse?

name: Not found
description:
New adaptation of the novel.  
  
The story is staged in the distant future within our own Milky Way Galaxy, approximately in the late 36th century. A portion of the galaxy is filled with terraformed worlds inhabited by interstellar traveling human beings. For 150 years two mighty space powers have intermittently warred with each other: the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance. Within the Galactic Empire, based on mid 19th century Prussia, an ambitious military genius, Reinhard von Müsel, later conferred Reinhard von Lohengramm, is rising to power. He is driven by the desire to free his sister Annerose, who was taken by the Kaiser as a concubine. Later, he wants not only to end the corrupt Goldenbaum dynasty but also to defeat the Free Planets Alliance and to unify the whole galaxy under his rule.  
  
In the Free Planets Alliance Star Fleet is another genius, Yang Wen Li. He originally aspired to become a historian through a military academy, and joined the tactical division only out of need for tuition money. He was rapidly promoted to an admiral because he demonstrated excellence in military strategy in a number of decisive battles and conflicts. He becomes the archrival of Reinhard, though they highly respect one another. Unlike Reinhard he is better known for his underdog victories and accomplishments in overcoming seemingly impossible odds and mitigating casualties and damages due to military operations.  
As a historian, Yang often predicts the motives behind his enemies and narrates the rich history of his world and comments on it. One of his famous quotes is: "There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."  
  


---
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Ookii Muki Muki Chiisai Muchi Muchi
description: Every day, the muscular young man Kataoka dedicates himself to building his muscles. At his regular gym, there's one staff member he can't take his eyes off. Her name? Shiina. But what caught his attention wasn't her curves... it was her plump, round belly!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Murabito desu ga Nani ka?
description:
Born in the remote countryside, Ryuuto's childhood friends were a cheat of a female hero and a wise man. One day at the age of 16, he was killed by a wise man, who was his childhood friend. Soon, Ryuto was reincarnated as a villager. Get the "effort cheat" and the "knowledge cheat"! Although the status is the weakest, he is capable of even saving a hero!
___
**Chapter Designer:** [Siraso Famy](https://mangadex.org/author/0797af36-9014-4dd6-a70f-c9a8e555bade)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3830dd/)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: I'm the Max-Level Newbie
description:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Amamiya Nagisa was very much in love with the evil duke noin, a character from her favourite light novel. On the verge of her death, what awaited her on the other side wasn't oblivion, but being reincarnated into noin's younger sister Frau!

They might not be related by blood, but in the world of the novel, love between siblings is horribly taboo. Unable to bear the thought of anyone else having her beloved noin, she will become the villainess Frau, tear down all his romance flags, and give them to him herself!
tags: Reincarnation, Psychological, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Boku Girl
description:
Mizuki gets confessed to by a boy in front of a special mirror. Legend has it, that if you confess to someone you like in front of that mirror your wish comes true.  
  
There is a slight problem in this equation: Mizuki is just a very feminine looking boy.  
  
Also, it seems that he caught the attention of the Norse Trickster God, Loki, while glancing into the mirror. Loki decides out of boredom to mess with Mizuki and turns him into a real girl.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Vermillion
description: By using the Dark Gate, humans can entrust their hopes and needs to the darkness. The darkness they call upon is a great and evil power, known as "Demon." With the help of his partner Miroku, the Demon Slayer Kisaki Senju will slaughter every last "Demon" that is called into existence.
tags: Action, Supernatural

name: Akumade Kujaku no Hanashi desu.
description: Kuji Yakurou is a teacher who was cheated on and dumped by his girlfriend because of his "lack of masculinity". Shouldn't the world be gender-free? He is in anguish, and then Akano, a model, influencer, high achiever, and head of the biology department, appears before him and asks him to be the advisor of the biology department. She then begins to explain why "masculinity" is necessary to be popular after all, using the flamboyant feathers of a peacock as an example of "biology"...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Anna Komnene
description: "I will become emperor and bring peace to the world!" A vivid depiction of the life of the Byzantine princess Anna Comnena, the only known female historian of the Western Middle Ages!
tags: Historical, Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma, Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Perfect Hybrid
description: Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension, and it has been a few years since peace was restored, thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu, our protagonist, was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent, however, is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Iincho to Furyou-kun
description: Contrary to her appearance, Hatsuse Sakura is an idiot. Because of her, "honor student looks," she is appointed as the class president. To meet up to everyone's expectations, Sakura tries her hardest, however, for some reason since then Shinokura, who is rumored to be a delinquent, has been starting to approach her? The romance of two awkward people.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
tags: Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: I Became The Villain The Hero Is Obsessed With
description:
Da-in, ended up possessing the villain of a story.

To make Stardust — the story's protagonist and his favorite character in a dystopian manga — happy, he resolves to become the villain Egoistic for her growth.

Da-in deliberately causes terror to enhance Stardust's abilities and preemptively prevents all the tragic events from the original story, but in the process, he gains public support while also drawing Stardust's suspicion.

Stardust, who initially opposed him, gradually opens her heart, and soon even begins to show signs of obsession towards him...?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Servant Is the Demon King?!
description:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Kaine is an egotistical and iron-willed knight who has a hard time getting along with Leo, a talented sorcerer.  Leo's aloof nature annoys Kaine to the point he throws Leo out of the adventuring party only for the party to continuously lose its battles. Disgraced, Kaine asks for Leo to return but Leo has one condition: Kaine must get on his knees and apologize. Kaine, distressed and humiliated breaks down and seeing Kaine at his weakest awakens something inside Leo...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Not found
description: Maruo failed in his debut in high school and has become a bit of an outcast. He earns some extra money by taking spy photos of girls at school and selling them to boys. Recently, Maruo is concerned about Tabe, a girl who is always covered in scars and being bullied. He wants to help her, but he is afraid of being bullied. In addition, Tabe is also a target of his voyeurism, and Maruo feels self-loathing. Maruo's days are filled with worries, but a fact comes to light that brings him to the brink of despair.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Tonari no Osoegawa
description: In the Magic Realm, mages train hard to master their arts. However, one mage named Toya Osoegawa only cares about using magic to live a comfortable life! But now, thanks to the orders from the Divine Magus, the least motivated man in the Magic Realm has been sent to the Human Realm! Can he use his bizarre magic to protect humans and send evil wizards back to their world?!
tags: Comedy, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: One day, while Saeki Maho visits her favorite hangout spot, her local home center, a sudden Earthquake knocks her unconscious. When she awakens, she discovers she and the entire home center have been transported to another world at the bottom of Melquodia Dungeon, home to the fiercest monsters imaginable. Joined by a misfortunate adventurer named Fiona, Maho needs to find a way out of this dungeon, but luckily, she has everything she could need in one convenient place...
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: NTREVENGE
description: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the "Yokai" classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi's childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully's loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by "cuckolding" them.
tags: Sexual Violence, Magic, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Log into the Future
description: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: One day, the protagonist was reincarnated as Lest Albion, a villainous aristocrat from the popular romance action RPG "Symphonia of Swords and Magic"! Although he is destined to be defeated midway through the game, he develops the hidden power of the skill "Tame" and grows at an astonishing speed. Eventually, he gains powers that surpass even the final boss, and as he rewrites his fate, the main heroines start to gather around him for some reason!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Moyuru Haru ni Deiau Bokura
description: Takanashi Haru, a plain and unassuming boy with black hair and glasses, secretly has a crush on the popular teacher Nanjou. His crush is accidentally discovered by his classmate, Sanada Kazuki, a flashy and popular guy who is the complete opposite of Takanashi. Sanada takes an interest in Takanashi's unrequited love for Nanjou and tries to help Takanashi attract the teacher's attention.  But as Takanashi starts spending more time with Sanada, he begins to experience Sanada's kindness... Maybe Sanada isn't just the flashy guy he appears to be...? What will become of this usual pairing...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Ouritsu Majutsu Gakuin no Kichiku Koushi
description:
Setsuna is a perverted instructor who is unable to invoke magic. As a part-time Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic, he continually tells his students to self-study. The new students who entered the academy with high expectations are disappointed in Setsuna, and judging him to be incompetent, they challenge him to a Geas duel.

"Will you resign if I win?"
"'I?' Surely you mean 'we'... All of you have been pretty annoying, so I want you all to take me on. But in return, you know what will happen if you lose, right?"

Setsuna plays with the special students, who are the best in a hundred years, with perverse and astonishing magic that is unthinkable in common sense! But behind the demon-like behavior, could there be a true purpose...?
___
**Character Designer:** [zunta](https://mangadex.org/author/844f9d85-2b7f-46fe-a69d-5c3e84cc2142/zunta)
tags: Action, Demons, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Me and My Beast Boss
description: In a world where beastmen stand on top of humans, OL Saki continues to struggle to lose. Saki endured the days of power harassment from her boss, but one day she was suddenly called by the company president, Atlas. I'll do my best!
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://x.com/emaqi_official/status/1839043875111055474)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one.

"I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. 
Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.
tags: Genderswap, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Daily Chaldea
description:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.
tags: Self-Published, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn't do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother's life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
[From the Same Studio as the Manhua "Shut Up, Evil Dragon!"]

Transmigrating into the body of a yellow-haired villain in the early stages of a Yuri novel, Moon only wants to survive. But… why does the story seem to be going off track?

The princess has already been drugged, and even her pants have been removed—so why hasn't the protagonist appeared yet? Why does the protagonist’s childhood friend, a noble and pure saint, keep giving me flirtatious looks? Even my obedient and loyal personal maid has started gazing at me with increasingly dangerous eyes!

Where is the protagonist?! Please, someone save me!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Not found
description: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life.
tags: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Magmell Shinkai Suizokukan
description:
A tale about a modern deep-sea aquarium employee in Tokyo!  
  
What's living in the overwhelming darkness deep within the sea? Take a glimpse into this strange world about a boy working at a deep sea aquarium.
tags: Animals, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Babel II: The Returner
description:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Animals, Mecha, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Military, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural

name: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: My Wife is a Half-Dragon
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chiikawa: Nanka Chiisakute Kawaii Yatsu (Webcomic Pages)
description: Follow the adventures of Chiikawa the innocent cute creature, Hachiware the kind cat, and Usagi the chaotic rabbit as they work their hardest to survive in a world filled with dangerous monsters, mysterious armored taskmasters, and fantastical phenomena at every turn!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A manga about celebrating all the different holidays a year has.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Lu Bu's Life Simulator
description: “Take the prettiest women, ride the fastest war horse, wield the strongest weapon, one rider blocking the GuanDong 18 roads*. One man standing against ten thousand, they bow to this hero of turbulent times. People say if Lu Bu doesn’t die, there will be no opportunity to cause chaos. I laugh at all the hypocrites in the world; there are no other heroes besides Feng Xian. Entering the life story of more than a thousand reincarnations, experiencing the many vicissitudes of life, tempered into steel. Can the current Lu Bu Feng Xian withstand the inevitable end at Bai Men Lou?”
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military

name: Esper Mami
description: One day, Mami realizes that she has psychic powers, with which Mami slowly has to learn to live with. This middle school girl with psychic powers flies through the sky unnoticed, helping people and solving crimes! A sci-fi juvenile manga filled with a delightful sense of justice and the excitement of adolescence.
tags: Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Live
description:
"Only I can see the future in this deadly game."

Yoon-Jae leads an empty life after his wife and daughter are brutally murdered. One day, his journal reveals one mysterious sentence: "You can see them again."

Yoon-Jae is pulled into a parallel universe where everyone is a player in a lethal game, and the final survivor will be granted any wish. 

Desperate to be reunited with his family, will Yoon-Jae succeed in fighting his way in this hellish world to be the last one standing? 

---
**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%94-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%EB%B8%8C/2528)
