tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Himegasaki Sakurako Is a Hot Mess
description: Losing heroine: a heroine who has the misfortune of not being the true heroine. Synonyms: decoy, sacrificial animal, erotic character. This story is about a high-spec, always-confident losing heroine, Himegasaki Sakurako, who is pitiably cute; a romantic comedy.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Uma Musume - Pretty Derby: Star Blossom
description:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.
___
- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
tags: Action, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai
description:
Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies, but for some strange reason, he's not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
___
**Character Designer:** [Saburou](https://mangadex.org/author/9db8b2d0-08d1-46a7-be91-a0277faf1b70)
tags: Action, Psychological, Zombies, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Munou to Iware Tsuzuketa Madoushi, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou Nanoni Yuuhei Sareteita node Jikaku Nashi
description: Born with the gift of Hearing—deemed "useless" by those around him—Ars was imprisoned in a tower by his disappointed parents. But one day, he discovers that his enhanced hearing allows him to replicate any magic spell he hears, even legendary incantations wielded by the gods themselves. In time, Ars rises to become the world’s most powerful mage. Stepping into the outside world, he begins his journey... utterly unaware of the overwhelming power he wields!
tags: Action, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mikogami Karen no Kakushigoto
description:
Karen Mikogami, eldest son of the president of a large company called the Mikogami Group, lives a lazy life while bossing around his servant Nanami Miyamori.

For some reason, he has to deal with his father, who loves cross-dressing and forces him to "dress up" almost every day. But one day, he is told a major secret that has been passed down in the Mikogami family...!?

The fate of the company is entrusted to his "cross-dressing"!?

The hectic training of a cross-dressing man to become a great president begins!!
tags: Comedy, Crossdressing

name: Not found
description: Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a small kingdom. However, a wicked witch suddenly appeared and the kingdom that was once beautiful grew ever poorer. After 300 years of living in terror of the witch, the king decided to capture the witch. This task was given to one peasant boy, Len...
tags: Oneshot, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: I Am the Fated Villain
description:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

---

tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Wazato Miseteru Kamoi-san?
description: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a middle school girl (JC) in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden - Toaru Kagaku no Railgun
description:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Osananajimi to Kanojo to
description: Rui, an unremarkable high school student, somehow ends up with Miya, a stunning beauty admired by the entire school, as his girlfriend. However, just then, his childhood friend Ayana, with whom he had grown distant, reappears and starts to shake things up for him.
tags: Thriller, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life

name: Hitori Camp shitara Isekai ni Teni shita Hanashi
description: Kaede, an office worker, is on a solo camping trip in the mountains to heal from a broken heart, when she finds herself in another world. At first, she is intimidated by the strange demons she has never seen before, but she gradually grows stronger and tougher. Fenrir and fairies also become her friends.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: You Shou Yan
description:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: RoOT / Route of OddTaxi
description:
*ODDTAXI* is back in action! 

The story of Hiroshi Odogawa, a poor cab driver, is interwoven with various characters and takes on a completely new form with new protagonists!
tags: Thriller, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
tags: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Medalist
description:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!
___
**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
tags: Award Winning, Sports, Drama

name: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary
description: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation

name: Open Car Girls
description: Otomegi Otome, who has become a female college student, had a rough dream of "taking a new step." At that moment, there was a pretty amazing car that looked dashing across in front of her... That car is a fiery red roadster! The driver is a girl who loves cars, Subeyama Yae! After Yae's passionate appeal, he started purchasing a pure white Copen!? Along with the open car, Hana's life as a female college student begins!!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Faceapp TS manga
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Web Comic

name: Bombergirl
description: The official manga for the Bombergirl arcade game. All pages are posted on the official Bombergirl Twitter account.
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Comedy, School Life, Vampires, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Web Comic, Aliens, Full Color

name: Akuma de Fukei!
description: In her desire to find the perfect evil man to be her slave, the devil Eclair travelled all the way from the netherworld to a local country town's police station. And she set her sights on the evil looking cop, Kuwahara Daichi. Eclair wants to do everything to tame Daichi, and Daichi wants to drive her back to hell. What a romantic battle... or that's what it looks like. Actually Eclair is completely useless and Daichi can't let her be alone.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural

name: Doushi Shoujo yo, Teki wo Ute
description:
In 1942, as the German-Soviet War intensified, the daily life of Serafima, a girl living in a village near Moscow, suddenly collapsed.

German troops launched a surprise attack, brutally slaughtering the villagers and her mother. Just moments before she herself was shot, Serafima was saved by Irina, a female soldier of the Red Army.

To defeat the enemy who took her mother and others, Serafima trains relentlessly with her comrades to become elite snipers—a relentless struggle driven by the burning desire to avenge their fallen.
tags: Historical, Action, Military, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Olivia is just a baby when the mysterious Z finds her at a temple in the depths of the Forest of No Return. From that day on, the temple becomes her home and Z her family. Z, a god of death, educates her in the ways of the world, in combat, and in the long-forgotten arts of magic—right up until the day Z disappears. 

Olivia leaves the forest for the first time in search of Z with its ebony blade in hand. Out in the wider world, all is not well. A bitter war rages between the Asvelt Empire and the Kingdom of Fernest, and Fernest is losing badly. When Olivia shows up on Fernest's doorstep with a sack of imperial heads looking to volunteer, the royal army happily welcomes her into its ranks. Thanks to Z's training, she quickly proves herself as a ferocious warrior. In fact, she might be just what Fernest needs to turn the tide of the war... but will they accept her lack of people skills and disregard for discipline? And will she ever see Z again?
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/death-s-daughter-and-the-ebony-blade)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Countach
description:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Shun Sorayama receives a letter… 
from himself ?! It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With a lot of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life

name: Longtime Red Mall
description: Reformed gangster, Nam Geonho decides to open an adult sex toy shop with Yeonwoo, his most beloved hoobae, after getting out of prison. Geonho had hoped that opening the shop in the countryside would allow him peace and quiet but interest in the shop soars and customers surge. To provide good recommendations to the increasing number of customers, Geonho decides to try the toys on himself but as he struggles with them, Yeonwoo walks in. When Yeonwoo decides to help Geonho, a sudden strange atmosphere descends and…..
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Mafia, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
You've got to be kitten me!

A proud knight, slain in battle, finds himself alive once more-reincarnated in the body of a fearsome behemoth. As if he wasn't confused enough by this turn of events, apparently behemoth cubs look exactly like adorable kittens?! Even if the rest of the world sees him as soft and cuddly, he has the honor of a noble warrior and the strength of an unstoppable S-ranked monster, both of which will be put to the test as he fights to protect the beautiful elf who has taken him as her pet!

(Source: Yen Press)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
It's 2020 and Tokyo is on fire! A large, mysterious creature rampages through the city destroying everything in its path. Cut to 1959, we meet Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya. As one of 11 siblings, Asa is constantly forgotten. Most people can't even remember her name. So, when she is kidnapped for ransom (by a burglar who mistakes her for a doctor's kid), no one bats an eye—not even when a typhoon hits! Now Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive the brutal storm. But there's more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.

---
**Awards Won:**

- Winner of the [Lucca Comics Awards](https://luccacomicsawards.com/albo-doro-2/) for Best Manga Series in 2021.

---
See [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/manga/116000/Asadora) for Manga Details.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asadora!)
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Historical, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Valhalla Otintin-kan
description: Shota Iijima picked up a mysterious erotic book during his childhood. Since then he has developed a severe fantasy onee-san fetish. From the age of 12 to 15, he masturbated 999 times. For his 1000th round of masturbation, he had been transferred to a different world and was sold as a slave.
tags: Loli, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu
description:
From the mangaka of Hshs Sasero!!, the comedic story about a high school teacher, who happens to be a lolicon, and the girl she babysits with her roommate!  
  
Other Official Retailers:  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/search/search.php?mode=search&search_disp=&category_id=0&text_type=&text_type=all&name=%E3%81%8A%E5%A7%89%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E3%81%AB%E8%88%88%E5%91%B3%E3%81%8C%E3%81%82%E3%82%8A%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99)

tags: Loli, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Kaketa Tsuki no Mercedes ~Kyuuketsuki no Kizoku ni Tensei Shitakedo Sute Rare Sounanode Dungeon o Seiha Suru~
description:
Reborn as a vampire, Mercedes Grunewald has won the lottery of life. She's strong, quick, beautiful, and even a noble. Technically a noble, that is. Her mother is merely a concubine, and her father shows no interest in the family he’s shunned to the countryside. Knowing the comforts of her life will be lost once he chooses an heir, she resolves to take matters into her own hands. At just ten years old, she begins a life of dungeon crawling. But what will she find for herself out there in the dungeons? In her past life, she died unfulfilled, but this time, she's set on achieving a different fate. Whether it be fame, fortune, or simply a reason to live, this time, her moon will be full.

(Source: J-Novel Club)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tower Dungeon
description:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower", a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons. A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/14079602755364316216)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10604/episode/353121) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Mexico, and Brazil only.
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy

name: Choujin X
description:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/choujin-x)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!
description: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Nokoru Mitsuhashi, a Systems Engineer working for a black company, has improved his quality of life by introducing telework. As he arranges the interior design of his room and becomes more involved with his balcony, he meets his neighbor, Natsu Izumi, a graduate student. This is the story of how one man met his future wife through teleworking, and how they got married after many ups and downs.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Kaijin Fugeki
description: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Persona 4
description:
Persona 4 takes place in the same universe as Persona 3 in a rural town named Inaba. There have been mysterious murders occurring whenever there was fog after heavy rain. There were also rumors about a channel on television airing only at midnight called Mayonaka TV, during which it is said that one can see his/her "other half" when staring at the TV screen. After hearing about a recent unsolved murder which occurred during the fog, the characters—the main character, Chie, and Yōsuke—discuss how each of them had attempted to watch the mysterious TV channel and witnessed the murder victim.  
  
The protagonist later realizes that during midnight when the channel is on, his body can phase into his television set as a gateway to enter another world infested with shadows. After discovering this, they all decide to explore. When first completely entering the world, dazed and confused, the main character meets Teddie. Mayonaka TV and the town murders seem to have a connection. The murder victims may be merely victims of Mayonaka TV. Everyone decides that they will together try to solve the mysterious murders by exploring the hidden world of Mayonaka TV. After the closing events of Persona 3 on January 31, 2010, Persona 4 starts April 11, 2011, Putting the start of Persona 4 fourteen months after the end of Persona 3, this is also evident by the appearance of an older Chihiro, who is now a 3rd year student.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Isekai Samurai
description:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
___
**Award:** Won the Traditional Chinese Global Special Award in the Web category of the 2024 Next Manga Awards.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Samurai, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy

name: Kirio Fan Club
description: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Academy’s Sashimi Sword Master
description:
Chef Kim, Korea's legendary sashimi master, is transported into the world of Blessing M, a mobile game he once played. But instead of being a hero, he finds himself as Geomma Kang, a mere background extra. 

Forced into a new life, Geomma discovers a new power: the Blessing of the Blade God. Now, to survive in this game-like world, he must slice through challenges and enemies alike. 

Will his unmatched skills in the kitchen be enough to carve out a new destiny?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai
description: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Ai Xu, a designer of trendy toys, suffers from extreme social anxiety and despises socializing and teamwork. Once she became an adult, she did her best to find a job where 90% of the time, she only has to be accountable to herself. However, there is one drawback to being a designer for original IP: She still has to attend and speak at a weekly team meeting. Thankfully, she could simply play a presentation without saying much. Today, however, she was paired with the beautiful and dazzling extrovert Zhiyi from marketing to work as partners on a project.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Senyuu.
description:
Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Kikkai-kun
description: Maka Kikkai is an elementary school student who calls himself a handsome boy on the cutting edge of scientific civilization. He tries to live a comfortable and convenient life with the help of his tutor Mashin Hakase's and his father's inventions, but he always fails and causes a big ruckus.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Samurai, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Okami To Randoseru ～ Kyu Saishuka To Tensei Musume No Danjon Gohan ～
description:
Alba Thomas, an S-rank gatherer who travels across the land in search of precious items such as dragon horns and golem cores, one day discovers a school-bag-wearing girl inside a treasure chest.
The girl, who calls herself Nono, is still young and doesn’t know where she came from.
And to complicate matters, under the kingdom’s rules Alba and Nono are no longer able to leave the dungeon.
Unable to simply leave her in such a dangerous place, Alba decides to take Nono under his protection.
However, meals prove to be a struggle: while Alba can easily procure ingredients, he is utterly inexperienced when it comes to cooking.
Stepping in to help is Nono, who displays genuine talent in the kitchen.
Thus begins a journey between Alba, one of the seven S-rank gatherers in the kingdom. And Nono, the mysterious girl full of unknowns.
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Mankitsu Shitai Jouren-san
description: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
High schooler Odagiri Momo leaves her home island to attend high school on the mainland. Having grown up on a boring island, Momo dreams of becoming a detective and is always on the lookout for cases. After moving into her first apartment, she meets the mysterious beauty Akaishi Kotone and falls for her at first sight. Declaring she'll make the reluctant Kotone her “assistant” against her will, the two form a buddy team to solve small everyday mysteries together.

(Source: Comic Cune, translated)
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Mystery

name: The Cave Man
description:
Hajime, a young man who has returned to his hometown from Tokyo, heads out to explore a cave with his childhood friend Umi and five others on a local mountain, Mt. Shirao, which is famous for its legends. However, it turns out to be a different world where something spectacular and unprecedented awaits them…!?

Is it a monster or a god protecting this area? The despair the group witnesses as they advance through the lightless hole is…!

A new release from the animal horror master Okada Takuya, a shocking caveman panic grandly appears!
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
"Be my ideal girl..."

It's been two months since childhood friends, Yuuka and Kouta, started dating. However, due to their inexperience, their "first time" together doesn't go as planned. Enter Kouta's younger sister, determined to ensure the couple's happiness... No matter the cost... A boy, a girl, and his younger sister...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Xanadu, the land where the characters of Nihon Falcom, a game maker known for its blockbuster RPG works such as the "Ys" and "Trails" series, were summoned.  
The heroes and warriors were enjoying their school life, but it's time for all of them to return to their original world!  
But here again they are back! What is the reason???
tags: Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
I, Maki Maehara, someone who couldn't make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl. Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her "The class's second cutest girl" behind her back. On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, "the cutest girl in class's" invitation just to hang out in my house with me. Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
___
**Links:**- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Gokumon Nadeshiko Koko ni Ari
description:
The Gokumon House, a bloodline originating from hell. Within the mystery-filled ancient city of Kyoto stands their citadel; they are feared not only by the seedy underworld of sorcery, but by monsters too. Gokumon Nadeshiko, a descendant of this cursed family, is fated to devour monsters. A most beautiful girl, born from the flames of cremation; her very being brings about bad omens.

However... "Nadeshiko. I see. You are as lovely as your name." Ichijiku Amana, a most peculiar, mysterious, yet gorgeous woman. Their encounter changed Nadeshiko as Amana faced her with a fearless smile. A creature lurks in the painted ceiling. Boxes packed with human sacrifice. A twisted curse upon a school. A beast who deceives humans. Haunted by a formless ghost. As the two are faced with one mystery after another, they are ultimately confronted by what they tried to leave behind.

"If it weren't for you, I would've remained an Oni."

An Oni with the heart of a human, and a human burdened with a corrupt soul. The bond they form will cut the seal on this blood-soaked tale.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Nyoro Nyoro
description:
A slightly bizarre, and crazy fantasy world!?

Nyororin, a girl with a snake-like body, lives with her otherworldly father, snake mother, and snake-like younger brother.

Her daily life with her slightly strange friends is eccentric and unpredictable!?

A slightly dark, and slightly gentle, new sensational manga!
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mercenary Enrollment
description:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Military, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Amu, a robot built to assist humans in their day-to-day lives, faces the cold and irrational reality of human nature when it begins to develop emotions that shouldn't exist in its programming.

A cruel and sad dark fantasy.
tags: Sci-Fi, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama

name: Kinnikuman II-Sei: Ultimate Chojin Tag Arc
description: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Aliens

name: Shy
description:
In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters.
___
[Official X](https://x.com/SHY_off)

From Yen Press:
Earth was on the brink of a third World War when super-powered individuals came forth from each country around the globe, ending the conflict and ushering in a new era of relative peace. Among those heroes, Japan is represented by a timid young girl known as “Shy.” She may spend more time worrying about her own shortcomings than she does battling villains, but she'll show the world that despite it all she still has the heart of a hero.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Superhero, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Hoshino Hibana wa Mitsugareru
description: Hoshino Hika (25 years old). Unemployed, but moderately enjoying life. What makes this possible is her overwhelming "ability to be pampered." She possesses a mysterious charm that captivates certain people, allowing her to sustain her lifestyle with the support of those around her. What is her everyday life like, living outside the framework of "market logic"—the exchange of money for goods?
tags: Comedy

name: Majo wa Mangetsu ni Saku
description: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Kamakura Bakeneko Club
description: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.
tags: Animals, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ordeal
description: Che is just a human in a world full of superpowered "Kimyos", but he's determined to become the greatest fighter to ever live. When his beloved mentor is murdered, Che swears vengeance and embarks on a mission to unmask the killer. But soon Che learns that the world of Kimyos is much larger than he ever imagined, and that he himself might be one -- the most powerful Kimyo on Earth, with the power of the sun itself. Will Che be able to harness his new strength, or will he burn up in the heat of this ordeal?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99 ~Watashi wa UraBoss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen~
description:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training... by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"...?
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46067)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Momose Yuuichi and Fujino Sumi are childhood friends who have been together since they were little. Now, they're high school classmates, but since they've reached puberty, they don't feel as close as they used to.  They know each other well, but there's a sense of formality there.  This is the delicate relationship between them, until one day, Sumi suddenly comes to Yuuichi's house...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.
description: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Akuyaku Reijoutachi wa Yuruganai
description:
It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. The school is in turmoil.

The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed "the villainesses," in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts.
___
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3353hv/)
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Rice Shoulder
description: The story revolves around a 202-pound, 18-year old girl named Okome Akino (whose name is a pun of "autumn rice"). After Okome enters a sumo match and wins against a male amateur fighter by a landslide, a trainer named Akane scouts her, and she enters the world of women's boxing.
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kousha no Ura ni wa Tenshi ga Umerarete Iru
description: Rika is a new shy student at her new school. She’s always had troubles making friends because of her personality. Her past best-friend, Mirai, encourages her to change before she moves to the new school. Will Rika be able to gather some courage to change herself and make new friends?
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles.
His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father.
But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!
tags: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Oishinbo
description:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy

name: 2200 Nen Neko no Kuni Nippon
description:
In 2200, with humanity's declining birthrate, Japan became a cat country.

High school girl Mugishima-san lives with her cat Sora. The town they live in is especially full of cats, who have all learned to speak Japanese and have Opinions. A slow, happy, kitty slice of life comedy.
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Jun's Guts: A Collection of Gory and Bizarre Works
description:
A collection of Hayami's non-pornographic stories originally published in Horror M magazine.

1 •  Human-faced Tumor Hunting | ***人面疽狩り*** from Horror M, June 2005
2 • Don't Make me Look in the Mirror | ***私に鏡を見せないで*** from Horror M, May 2005
3 • Assassin Girl Fuka | ***暗殺少女風香*** from Horror M, November 2005
4 • Santa of Darkness | ***暗闇のサンタ*** from Horror M, December 2005
5 • The Crossing at Night | ***夜の踏切*** from Horror M, September 2005
6 • Old Woman's Prophecy | ***老婆の予言*** from Horror M, October 2005
7 • Kumi is Crying | ***久美が泣いている*** from Horror M, April 2005
8 • Something in There | ***何かがおるんじゃ*** from Horror M, July 2005
9 • Family | ***ファミリー*** from Horror M, January 2006
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Anthology, Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo
description:
In the year 300X, a cruel dictator has mandated the hunting of all hair in the Chrome Dome Empire. But a single man rises to the occasion and takes a stand against this violation of human hair rights. Bo-bobo, master of the Fist of the Nose Hair, uses the prehensile hairs of his schnoz to most lethal ends. Follow the nonsensical adventures of Bo-bobo and his sentient sidekick snacks as they lead their hilarious rebellion against the Empire.

A parody of the very popular Fist of the North Star (Hokuto no Ken), as well as other Jump manga.

[Official English*](https://www.viz.com/bobobo-bo-bo-bobo)
  ***Only 5 Volumes of the manga were translated. Instead of starting at the beginning, Viz instead released the content that coincided with the later parts of the Anime adaptation.**
        
   **A special single tankoban containing chapters from the Hallelujah Land Arc (Holy Guacamole Land for the dub) was also released, but has since not been reprinted nor is it featured anywhere on the Viz page.**
    
**What were volumes 11-15 of the manga were counted as 1-5 when Viz released them in English. As of October 5, 2010, Viz has not released any additional content, nor have they made any comments regarding Bo-Bo-Bo since then.**
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
My beautiful, big-breasted childhood friend, Mikoto, is completely in love with me.
It sounds like a dream scenario that anyone would envy — but there’s just one big problem...
She’s turned into a clingy, mentally unstable mess with love that's way too heavy!!

This is a dark everyday comedy about being at the mercy of Mikoto’s unstable behavior and unintentional sexiness.

The long-awaited book release of the hit everyday romcom — the story of a mentally unstable beauty that took X (formerly Twitter) by storm — featuring all-new, never-before-published chapters!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Nukozuke!
description:
A heartwarming story about the daily lives of a freeter named Yuuya and his two little pets.  
  
Note: Chapters follow the Tankouban (book) order and numbering. The chapter number in (Ex Ch. No.) specifies the original chapter number (when first released on HanaLala Online & MangaPark) before the chapters were compiled into the book.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AC%E3%81%93%E3%81%A5%E3%81%91!)
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Tensei Shite Inaka de Slow Life wo Okuritai
description:
The protagonist, Inaka Yuuji, was ran over by a truck because his awareness was dulled from overworking.
"Ahー, with this I don't have to work so much anymore. I want to spend my next life leisurely..." was the wish Yuuji blurted out. He met God and it was decided he will be reincarnated in the countryside of the other world. He became Alfred Slowlet, second son of a countryside noble.
Will he be able to enjoy and leisurely spend his slow life in the countryside?
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Common-Sense Monster
description: Itou-san, who's poor at interpersonal relations, was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san, who gets along well with everyone. But one day, she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human! Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that's extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!! And so Itou-san learns the "normality" of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits, Takahashi-san has her own motives...
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Bleach (Official Colored)
description:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.

---
Links:
* alternative [official raw](https://www.shueisha.co.jp/books/search/search.html?seriesid=48374)
tags: Award Winning, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Love Beyond Chains Of Reincarnation
description: Fate has bound two individual together only to tear them apart. In her second life, Princess Sereneya is bound to marry the cursed prince feared by all. Scarred and forsaken, Zereth hides behind his scars— until she dares to see the man beneath. But once, in another life, it was she who cursed him. Now, chained by 6 times reincarnation, they will defy destiny itself— willing to fight through every lifetime just to be together.
tags: Action, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Dead Account
description: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...
tags: Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Mini 4WD Fighter V
description: Mini 4WD Fighter, the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.
tags: Comedy, Sports

name: Hotaru no Yomeiri
description:
A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?!

---
On the surface, Satoko has it all she’s beautiful, the daughter of a nobleman, and at a prime age for marriage. Unfortunately, she is also quite ill and only has a short time left to live. Before she can secure a marriage that will redeem her worth in her family’s eyes, she finds herself the target of the mysterious assassin Shinpei, and her plans are put in jeopardy. In order to save herself, she makes a desperate proposal of marriage! When it comes to love, however, Shinpei takes “until death do we part” seriously.

---
Alt. Official English: [Viz](https://www.viz.com/firefly-wedding)
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Cyber Blue - Lost Number Children
description:
In the 25th Century, Tinos is ruled by a Planetary Government bent on eradicating The Lost, dissidents who refuse to submit to its autocratic rule and are hunted down by its military for extermination. Through total control of Biomatrix production and issuing them to only those who submit to its authority, the Planetary Government enforces its will in an effort to finish off the Lost and their descendants, the Lost Children once and for all.  
  
Set in the dystopia of Junk City, Blue encounters Fats, a powerful robotic Artificial Intelligence, and the story of their meeting will change both man and machine, the fate of the Lost Children, and the course of human evolution forever.   
  
A remake and reimagining of the original series by Hara Tetsuo (Hokuto no Ken, Hana no Keiji) which ran from 1988-1989, with new art by Yoshihara Motoki. Cyber Blue - Ushinawareta Kodomotachi (Lost Number Children/The Lost Children) follows the story of Blue, a descendant of colonists from Terra who settled the distant world of Tinos in the 22nd Century. The brutal environment of Tinos forces humanity to rely on an artificial life support system implanted in the chest called the Biomatrix, in order to survive.  
  
Related series:  
* [Cyber Blue (Parent story)](https://mangadex.com/manga/5937)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure

name: Not found
description: Her mom is dead, but she became a ghost and keeps making breakfast. A high school girl, Maria, who leads such an occult life, meets...?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
"Aim for it! The first Japanese female astronaut commander!"

The middle school girl Asahida Alice is good-looking and popular, but her language is poor-quality and she can't keep up with her daily classes. She meets a solitary genius, Inuboshi...?

"I will make you smart."
___
**Award:** Winner of Manga Taishou 2025.
tags: Award Winning, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Sachiiro no One Room
description:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
tags: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Komori-san wa Kotowarenai!
description: Komori Shuri is a junior high school girl who is too nice to decline requests. Constantly doing favors for other people has given her incredible powers?! But even so, she is also an adolescent junior high school girl.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Rain, an enhancement grantor who strengthens equipment and supports his fellow guild members, is expelled from the guild for the selfish reason that he has already strengthened all their equipment. Rain, who had been able to retrieve the enhancement magic just in case, retrieves all the magical power he had used on the guild's enhanced equipment. With an enormous amount of enhancement magic power in hand, Rain decides to enhance the copper sword and cloth clothes he has on hand for the time being...?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Portrait of Yoiko
description: Hana is a college student with nothing to do and no dreams. One day, she meets Yoiko, a self-proclaimed "grudge spirit," and is told that she is cursed by Yoiko. In order to break the curse, Hana helps Yoiko to become a Buddha! In order to clear her unfulfilled spirit, Hana uses only a sooty, blackened painting as a clue to get closer to the true identity of this beautiful ghost. Hana is gradually captivated by Yoiko's natural charm!
tags: Historical, Ghosts, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: This is the story of a busty girlfriend who wears tights and is impatient to get cozy with her senior boyfriend whenever she wants.
tags: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
As the monster's teeth drew near, it was then that I remembered. "I've witnessed this scene before." This was the world of an RPG I played in my previous life. And I, as the main character's childhood friend, was the losing love interest who would be turned down by him in the future. The childhood friend whose role ended one hour into the opening after confessing to the main character as he was about to set off into his journey. The one many players sympathized with as the main character would meet another girl who would cling onto him during his journey. If I remain in this village, in the future I'll be the losing love interest?! To prevent that from happening, I'll leave the village and make use of my newly blossomed ability in compounds with becoming an alchemist at the royal capital as my aim. I don't give a damn about some job that requires me to be the main character's childhood friend. I'll be seizing happiness with my own hands!

---
**Original Web Serialization:** [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00201503010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46466)

[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0552ep/)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: 22 year old Chia regularly stops by the apartment of her neighbor Kento every day. Kento is a third-year junior high school student who is often busy studying for exams. Chia's feminine charms keep tension with him whenever they are together.
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Majo-senpai Nippou
description:
The office stories of a kind hearted, weak-willed, witch senpai and her relatable, straightforward, but kind kouhai that started over a cup of magically warmed coffee.

---
Misono is an office drone with his own ups and downs at work, but thankfully, he has an ally: his senpai Shizuka, who happens to be a witch. Shizuka is always ready to lend a hand to those in need, but Misono thinks she should take better care of herself, since zipping around on a broomstick to run errands can be quite stressful. Is Misono’s over-solicitous concern for Shizuka driven by mere respect for this flustered witch, or could it be more? Let this magical romantic comedy cast its spell on you!
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Return of the 8th Class Mage
description:
As a powerful 8th class mage, Ian Paige took countless innocent lives under the orders of Emperor Ragnar, a close friend and ruler of the Greenriver Empire. Yet despite their closeness, Ragnar views Ian as a threat and subsequently poisons him. 

Using time magic, Ian saves himself and returns 30 years to the past. Now a young boy, Ian joins an elite order of mages to hone his abilities once again.

 This time, he’ll get revenge on the emperor who betrayed him and reclaim glory as an 8th class mage!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/8%ED%81%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A7%88%EB%B2%95%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%98-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2514), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57140255)

tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dragon Ball AF (Toyotarou)
description:
It's the continuation of the Dragon Ball GT saga. It's not made by Akira Toriyama, but by toyble (now known as Toyotaro). So this series is not to be confused with the Akira Toriyama Dragon Ball April's Fools which was a hoax.  
  
**NOTE:** The final volume of toyble's AF (Volume 5) has recently been completed by Rogeru who used drafts drawn by toyble.
After this, the story is still incomplete since the fictional author (toyble) is on hiathus while the real author (Toyotaro) is hired by Shueisha.
Volume 4.5 has got in the final part the real ending of the DBAF story skipping the events of the Xicor saga.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Kuramochi Sakurako has become totally sophisticated since her high school debut. However, deep down inside, she still bears the scars of being dumped by a girl she used to like. One day after school, while walking downtown, Sakurako bumps into a random high school girl who turns out to be the very same girl who dumped her in the past! What's more, for some reason, that girl doesn't recognize her and falls in love with her at first sight and asked if they could meet again. Sakurako is furious at that girl for trying to pick her up based only on her appearance and comes up with a plan to get revenge...!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Inishie Otaku no Koiwazurai
description: Otaku culture has finally become mainstream, and Megumi can’t quite get used to it. Divorced, with a teen daughter, Megumi thinks fondly back to her days as an anime and manga otaku—in 1995. That year, she transferred to a new school and decided to start fresh by hiding her otaku interests. She found herself taken under the wing of a basketball ace named Masamune, who’s got a kind heart and looks just like one of her favorite characters. Though Megumi catches a whiff of destiny in the air, she’s crushed to learn that Masamune detests otaku… [Kodansha]
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Ikutsu Mo No Kisetsu O, Kun To
description: Not found
tags: Romance, School Life, Full Color

name: Vampire
description:
I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.

Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27
tags: Romance, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru

name: Nyako to Hakase
description: Twitter short series by @SORAji34
tags: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
description:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer! Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges. What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

---
