tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Lilisa Suzunomiya, who is forced to live a cramped life at a girl's school where genuine ladies gather, 
is drawn to the sounds coming from the old school building...
The gorgeous and ladylike girls will shout with beautiful sparks!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Rumors Say That She's Gorgeous and Kind
description: 【two-faced!villainess x yandere!villain】 If the villain gets killed by the bandit, then the happy ending will be achieved! Xiao Mian Niang has had to pretend to be an innocent flower all her life, but she finally reveals her true dark nature and personally shoves the villain off a cliff. But... did she get the script wrong!? It's saying there's only one way to achieve the happy ending—to fall madly in love with the villain. "Sister-in-law, I've adored you since childhood. Yet you deceived and betrayed me." The villain gave her an icy smile, "Now that I despise you to my core, you seriously expect me to fall in love with you again?"
tags: Official Colored, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Goddess of Abundance and the Genius Rogue Apostle
description:
I beat the 0.0000001% odds and became an Apostle of the God of Abundance.

Sounds like a farming god, right? …So why is my starter skill Decapitation?

Chop off a head — boom, farming done.
Process crops — boom, processed.

It’s great… but how do I even explain this?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Am Sukeban
description:
His family name is Suke and his given name is Banji, but he's known as Sukeban. Any town the Suke house settles in just can't contain the violent nature of this family, forcing them to move time and time again. Because of his name, Banji ends up transferring to Amazon School as a female student! However, this situation coupled with Sukeban's rebellious nature undoubtedly will result in mayhem littered with maddening jokes and lewdity.

The manga has been adapted into two live-action films and an OVA.
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Incest, Crime, Sports, Martial Arts, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Shota, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!
description: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hana to Gin
description: Four years ago, Souda Gin and Hanai Kosuke worked a case together as two anti-organized crime police officers. Now they’ve both quit the force, Gin to become a private detective and Hanai to become a yakuza! A heartwarming romantic comedy unfolds in a retro cityscape!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Scavengers Another Sky
description: In the shadowy research facility known as 'Bus Stop,' a group of armed girls called 'Scavengers' operate. They are dispatched to mysterious realms referred to by the initials 'BP' (Black Parade), where treasures are said to sleep. But what lurks there are otherworldly ghosts...!? Explore! Defeat!! Collect!!! In a bid to gather one million dollars and earn their freedom, these girls embark on a life-threatening journey to scavenge!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Military

name: Zero To Hyaku
description: Rei Shizuka, a first-year high school student, isn’t gifted with height or strength, but he possesses a two-handed shooting style more precise than anyone else’s. However, in boys’ basketball, where such a weapon is hard to shine, he faces constant rejection. Will his unique skill ever reach anyone—or anything? Just as he begins to lose confidence, his fate changes with the arrival of Mio Misaka, a transfer student from America with a street-style background! Stay true to your own style! With Rei’s two-handed shot and Mio’s street moves, an unstoppable miracle is about to unfold. A super COOL youth basketball story begins!!
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: yrhm: Yurihime 20th Anthology
description:
An anthology of all-new manga by nine of the finest authors who've graced *Yurihime*. The yuri manga you should read right now is here.

**Cover:** hechima
**Illustration:** Aono Nachi
**Comics:**
1. Saburouta
2. Miman
3. Aono Shimo
4. Yuama
5. Kashikaze
6. Kodama Naoko
7. Manio (Hanasaki Manio)
8. Iwami Kiyoko
9. Takeshima Eku
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Video Games, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: She Seems To Be Teasing Me
description:
Yu Chaoyan, who became wildly popular with her performance in Black and Red, is as well known for her various rumors as she is for her fame. However, in reality, she is just a girl with a poisonous mouth. Recently, Yu Chaoyan was angered by a male actor's linked publicity stunts, and in a fit of rage, she powerfully challenged him on live cameras:

"If this world only had this man, I would rather date a woman"

This bold statement immediately exploded into the hot polls and caused a huge uproar. As a result of this, Yu Chaoyan was attacked in the parking lot by the male actor's fanatical fans who were lying in wait. At the moment of danger, Yu Chaoyan was heroically saved by Yin Zhou, who entered by mistake after taking the wrong path…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Tsukkomi-machi no Machino-san
description:
She throws out the jokes, and I can’t help but be the straight man. An after-school rom-com filled with emotion and laughs!

“Machino-san from the swim team always drops by the Domino Club's room, where I’m the only member, before her practice starts. She constantly fires off jokes in a sketch-style conversation, and I can’t help but fire back. Back-and-forth banter, teasing words. Conversations full of nonsense... and maybe something more. Every day passed in a flash, yet those summer days felt like they could last forever in that clubroom. But when this summer ends, the dominoes between us will all begin to fall, at once.”

“Why did you suddenly start narrating a light-novel-style summary, Machino-san?”
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
The servant of the Tendou family, Eito, serves the perfect young lady, Hoshine. 

One day, Eito informs Hoshine that someone from another class confessed their feelings for him. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: 

"I’ve loved Eito for a much longer time!"

 As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side… While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. 

It’s an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servant’s love!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: At the end of summer, Eiji Aono witnesses his childhood friend and girlfriend, Miyuki Amada, cheating on him with Kondo, the ace of the soccer team. Betrayed by her and emotionally shattered, Eiji becomes the target of baseless slander and harassment. Cornered and with nowhere to turn, he escapes to the school rooftop—where he meets a mysterious girl...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Shino Hattori, a sheltered young lady from Iga City, never fits in at school. She thinks making friends is just a waste of time, so she spends each day alone—until she finds a strange coded note in her desk:
“Meet me behind the gym after class.”
Curious despite herself, Shino goes…and meets Kanna Ueno, a girl who wants to become a ninja.
Kanna insists they do “ninja training” together—basically ninja pretend play—but Shino immediately refuses.
But Kanna won’t take no for an answer. Armed with her “ninjutsu” (or something like it), she drags Shino into a whirlwind of trouble…!?

---
[Alternate Raw (ComicWalker)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_007122_S/)
tags: Ninja, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Rintarou, the boy I've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim, popular. He turned down a girl again... What a waste!

"No, because I love you."

...Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn...!!! I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Empyreal Cabinet
description:
Since ancient times, the arcane arts have been used as tools of political strife and weapons of war. Practitioners of these arts, known as spellcasters, sought to ensure the survival of their kind by demonstrating the utility of their powers to the government. However, as the ages passed and the number of spellcasters grew, momentum built within the arcane community to reassess their societal standing. It was in this climate that a nation of spellcasters—commonly known as the Eastern Enchantment—was born. And the governing body of this land came to be called... the Empyreal Cabinet.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tembodaikaku)
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, Supernatural

name: Sanda
description:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)
description: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Reincarnation, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
The story of a gyaru with ravenous cravings and the loner who sits next to her.

----

These are the promotional PIXIV originals for the serialized manga of the same name.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Koko Jidai ni Gomandatta Jou sama to no Dousei Seikatsu wa Igaito Igokochi ga Warukunai
description:
"Hey, wanna do it?"

One late night, Yamamoto, a college student working part-time at a convenience store, reunites with Hayashi Megumi, his high school classmate and the most beautiful girl in their class. Known as the "Queen" for her strong-willed and arrogant personality, Yamamoto had always found her difficult to get along with. However, during a routine conversation, he notices painful bruises on her wrist. After learning that her boyfriend had been abusing her, Yamamoto decides to let Hayashi stay at his place...!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Mystery, Adaptation

name: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.
description:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan/Philippines/Thailand/Vietnam/Hong Kong/Taiwan/India/Mexico, and Brazil only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She's imposing. But she's also Komi Amane's girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Darashinai desu, Hotta-sensei!
description: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Megami no Café Terrace
description:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery

name: Outo Reiyaku Monogatari
description: The elixir, a magical drug that instantly heals any wound. What if this elixir of legends and fairy tales were real? Dasha, a female knight who has retired for some reason, and Moimir, a charming pharmacist. After a chance encounter, the two hit it off for the elixir and plunge into the stormy seas of adventure. A retired knight and an active pharmacist are on a quest for the wonder drug!
tags: Action, Adventure

name: Onnamaou-sama wa Yuusha-kun o Taosenai.
description:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
**Producer & Supervisor:** [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline)
tags: Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
In this town's lake, a man-eating mermaid is said to have been sunk to the bottom.

Today, the mermaid still wanders the town in search of a companion, stirring up the restless hearts of the people.

A modern day tale of foolish girls who can't survive in clear water.
tags: Psychological, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls

name: Chijou 100-kai
description:
21st Century, Tokyo.
People called “challengers” are gambling their life trying to escape from the state-owned 100 Story Tower to win 10 billion yen.
But what will happen when Tatsuki Kuroumi awakes at this tower without remembering anything about his prior life, including entering the tower as challenger?
tags: Action, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)
___
* [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Not found
description: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Ouran High School Host Club
description: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]
tags: Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Garen, who became stranded in a dungeon, met Nemu the Corpse Bearer. A Corpse Bearer was someone who went to retrieve the bodies of people who'd died in dangerous places like dungeon depths, beast lairs, or the ocean floor. Answering the pleas of the bereaved who said, "I want them back even if it's just their body," Nemu continued to travel to dangerous places, carrying corpses back home. 

A tale of a dungeon 'body recovery specialist' who walked bearing the regrets of the dead.
tags: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Dragon Ball - Zeroverse (Doujinshi)
description:
A few years have passed since Goku first met Uub, he's become satisfied that Uub is becoming stronger while he trains him so decides to take him to the next Tenkaichi Budokai tournament in order to test him.  
  
In the background, a mysterious adversary from a different universe, Universe 0 (This was long before Dragon Ball Super) wants to return to our universe. In order to achieve that task, he requires the power of the Dragon Balls, and has revived Babidi in order to accomplish that goal.  
  
Babidi soon awakens the remnants of Majin Buu sleeping deep within Uub and turns him into his puppet. Now it's up to Goku and Co. to stop this new adversary from crossing over into their universe at all costs!
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Yumenashi-sensei no Shinroshidou
description: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him “Yumenashi-sensei” (“Dreamless-sensei”).
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Alice's Paradise
description: No one really knows who you are. '' The place where Alice, who had forgotten everything except the name, woke up was a closed school. The key to knowing the past that we have found among girls who are not searching for the reason why they are here and the rules that should not be associated with the outside world, and special abilities that are unique to themselves. Should I choose ignorance or the truth behind the thorns? A story of a girl who is going for a bright place.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Doku Doku Mori Mori
description: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.
tags: Thriller, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Guardian of the Spirit
description:
Once every 100 years, a Water Fairy implants an egg into a person who then becomes the Guardian of Fairies. This time, the responsibility falls on Chagum, the second prince of the New Yogo Kingdom.  
  
Chagum's life isn't easy. The king finds Chagum an inconvenience and attempts to have him killed. As a result, the queen asks a female guard, Balsa, to protect Chagum. In addition to this, beings from another world, known as Nayugu, constantly attack him in order to eat the egg carried in Chagumu's body.
___
Setting Cooperation: [Production I.G](https://mangadex.org/author/75e5ea16-a59e-4305-bb9b-8faeaec71eb7)
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine". One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide! The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!? The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!! Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Himeno-kun wa Tokimekitai
description:
Himeno Yui, the oddball of the class, finds his “shounen manga artist who's on the edge of the cliff” side exposed by the class prince, Ouji Hinata! Meanwhile, Ouji harbors a secret of his own: he is a devoted “shoujo manga lover.” Tensions rise as Himeno teases him about romantic relationships. However, when the editor who works with Hinata suggests that he try writing shoujo manga, he decides to take the plunge and shouts to Ouji, “Teach me shoujo manga!”
From that day on, the two opposites embark on a secret journey of “heart flutter lessons,” exploring their different worlds and the budding connection between them!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Blue Ursus
description: Gokumon Girls' High School. A place where the delinquents of delinquents gather! One day, a girl over 180 centimeters tall enrolls there! Her name is Seina Amaki. At this notorious school packed with the toughest brawlers from every grade, Seina tears through her rivals one after another with her finely-honed pro-wrestling moves!
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents

name: Usagi Wa Kaku Katariki
description: The city of Shibugaya was once known for its youth and bustle, however now, all that remains are ruins since man-eating rabbits have made a nest of its subway... One wolf-eared girl dares to challenge the underground with by her side a girl with rabbit ears...
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official Raws: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71616), [X (Formerly known as Twitter.)](https://x.com/sa_ra_na_mi/status/1739058372568338764)
- Buy the collected volumes from [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/products/detail.php?product_id=2708014) or TORANOANA: [1](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/), [2](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031208076/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The school's most delinquent, Akechi Ryunosuke, and the school's idol, Oda Maria. The two, who live in different worlds, start dating after Akechi confesses his feelings. However, at the moment of their first kiss, the memory of the burning the Honnoji temple comes back to their minds! A turbulent high school life begins, where grudges from past lives and love from this life are mixed together!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: ONE PIECE
description:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Ame to Muchi
description:
Meari is a pretty, young girl who makes a living through papakatsu. What seemed like an ordinary date takes a surprising turn when, instead of the usual "papa". a woman shows up.
Unlike the men with hidden motives, this woman simply enjoys spending time with Meari, showering her with gifts of money and luxury cosmetics.
Delighted by such generosity, Meari lowers her guard… until the two of them find themselves alone in a love hotel.
A tale of forbidden eroticism between two women!
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love

name: Girls × Vampire
description: **Alt Official Raw:** [note](https://note.com/girls_vampire)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.
After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.
On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together. Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Nichijou wo!
description: Spinoff of the KonoSuba series, featuring the daily life of Kazuma and Co.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Hima-Ten!
description: High school home economics expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem

name: Kamigami no Kago de Seisan Kakumei ~Isekai no Katasumi de Mattari Slow Life Shi Tetara, Naze ka Tasaina Jinzai ga Atsumatte Saikyou Kokka ga Dekitemashita~
description: During his reincarnation, Japanese corporate slave Tadashi impresses the gods by choosing the blessing of agriculture, something no one else has chosen before, and receives unprecedented, generous blessings. He is then meant to live the slow life of his dreams in another world, but instead he lands on a huge, desolate, miasma-filled peninsula known as "Limbo"! Tadashi struggles, but thanks to his natural earnest personality and the blessings of the gods, he steadily expands the scale of his farming operations. A persecuted former elf queen, a beastwoman hero, and a master dwarf craftsman all gather in search of the goods Tadashi makes...
tags: Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Nukitashi R - Nukige Mitai na Shima ni Sunderu Watashi wa Dou Surya Ii desu ka? R
description:
"I'm going to destroy the Perverted Sex Law!"

The story takes place on Seiran Island, a tropical island where the "Perverted Sex Law" has been enacted to combat population decline. Non-sexual behavior is punishable!? On this island where lewdness is mandatory for everyone, proud virgin Junnosuke Tachibana and the anti-copulation front NLNS rise up to destroy the Perverted Sex Law!
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, School Life, Adaptation

name: Ougon no Keikenchi
description:
"Boot Hour, Shoot Curse" is a VRMMORPG that has no concept of levels or professions. Instead, players must farm experience points to gain new skills and increase their status.
Rare, a girl who participated in the closed beta test, has acquired the hidden skill "Subordinate", which allows her to turn NPCs into her subordinates. The skill also transfers the experience points gained by the subordinates to Rare. She used the skill to gradually add new NPCs she encountered to her party. As a result of the unprecedented amount of experience gained from her minions, she was able to evolve into a Demon Lord.
___
[Light Novel (EN)](https://j-novel.club/series/exp-is-golden)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei
description: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Cheating Men Must Die
description:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Elqueeness
description:
Kang Ji-hoon, an ordinary high school student who died in a painful accident, finds out in the underworld that he is actually a ‘Water Spirit King mistakenly born as a human’. “Making water spirits? How do you do that?” The adventures of Elqueeness, the Water Spirit King who was mistakenly born as a human!  
  
Raw [23-2-2021] : Chapter 177
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)
description: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Tanaka-san keeps breaking school equipment. What's her senpai, the student council president, to do in response...?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru

name: You Can't Have My Blood
description: A sweet contract romance between a vampire and a human! Siyun accidentally meets Jinwoo, a famous vampire director of a well-known foundation, at a café. He offers him a matching partner proposal where he would provide him with his blood. "I’m already anemic and short on blood—why me of all people?!" As their affection deepens, what will become of them?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Joshi Koukousei no Nichijou
description: Rather than love stories, we get excited over ghost tales; rather than Instagram-worthy meals, we devour piled-high dishes; even if online comments are harsh, we still crave that buzz...In the Reiwa era, high school girls—embrace diversity.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kurotsuki no Yaergnacht
description:
While on his way home from an interview, unemployed, unmotivated, jaded 18-year-old Inumata Shinogi encounters the beautiful lady and evil spirit Yaergnacht Finsternis. She demands him to either marry her or die on the spot. He must command the battle against enemies of humanity, the apostles of God (Highlanders), and save the world with his wife!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912965944469925)
tags: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Noipa-chan wa Abunai!
description: At school, no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact, they don't even seem to notice her existence, except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.
tags: Demons, Romance

name: Real no Heroine wa Irimasen!
description: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?
description:
Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition...
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw: [Grand Jump](http://grandjump.shueisha.co.jp/manga/issyoni.html)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Unrivaled Spear Demon
description:
Shuji, a soldier who danced with death many times while on the battlefield, was possessed by the grudges and resentment of those he had killed. He too was eventually killed, but somehow he awoke in a younger version of himself.

He returned to a time when he was still an errand boy, inexperienced with war, but retained his memories. Remembering Kyo Aiyo, his comrade and savior, Shuji travelled to the ‘Tiger Pit’ Sect. However, instead of the strong and reliable woman, he was met with a cheerful and petite girl. He recalled the tragic past that had caused her to devote herself to the army, where in his previous life her family had fallen apart due to false rumors.

‘This time, I will protect you.’

He vowed to repay the kindness he received in his previous life by changing her fate. With a spear in his right hand, Shuji steps into the battlefield once again, becoming the Unrivaled Spear Demon.
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chaika: The Coffin Princess
description:
Toru Acura, an incredibly lazy man with some hidden talents, has been forced by his sister Akari to actually go outside and search for work. However, he is in for a big surprise when he meets Chaika Trabant in the forest, and they are suddenly attacked by a monster! How will they survive? Who is this mysterious girl, and why is she being targeted?  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Sakaki Ichirou with illustrations by Namaniku ATK.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ochaocha ~Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto~
description:
**Links:**

name: The Idol and Her Egg Problem
description:
A rising winged idol hides a secret: every month, like clockwork, Amirare lays a single, shimmering egg. 

One day, just as Amirare tries to sneak away backstage in pain, she got caught in the act.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Fushigi no Mayuri-san
description:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Tonikaku Kawaii
description:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.
___
Alternative version: [Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu [R18]](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Shikisaki Shimai wa Abakaretai
description: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The ecchi comedy manga centers on Kenta, who is instilled with sensual memories during the summer of his fifth year in elementary. Now a high school student, he ends up living with the person he has been fantasizing.

(Source: ANN)
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, School Life

name: Naze Nigerun Dai? Boku no Shoukanjuu wa Kawaii yo
description: Happy, whom Heresy summoned when he was little, is actually a sweet, kind-hearted girl. ──Even if her looks are a tiny bit grotesque! At the Summoner Academy, Heresy is treated like a total anomaly. Even though he's just trying to act "normal," he keeps unknowingly getting dragged into some absolutely insane situations...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A comedy about two ordinary high school boys.
___
