name: Not found
description:
The beloved third son of a ducal house aims to escape his villainous fate!?
Back when I (age 6) was still a spoiled brat laughing arrogantly, I regained memories of my past life. This is an RPG world?! And worse, I’m destined to be crushed by the hero, labeled the weakest of the three brothers… aka the villain. Talk about bad luck. This sucks.  

After panicking, moping, and overthinking, I made a decision: First, quit being a villain! I’ll become a good boy, get along with my beloved older brothers and the servants, and dodge every death flag!!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Dragon Ball Super (Official Colored)
description: Having defeated Boo, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Mayonaka Heart Tune
description:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Loser Takes It All
description: He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I'm here, I'll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash body of mine to trample upon you mere ants!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: To Love Ru Darkness (Official Colored)
description: Momo is the younger sister of Lala, the alien princess who has long since been engaged to the human Rito. Although Rito’s heart continues to waver between Lala and his first crush, Haruna, Momo finds herself unable to deny the feelings she has for the hapless human male. Instead of giving up, Momo attempts to surround Rito with a harem of beautiful women, all working towards urging him to marry Lala, become crowned as King, and as a result, be allowed to marry his entire harem—Momo included!
tags: Official Colored, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
The arrogant noble Rufus is furious. Why? Because in a world where a popular RPG has come to life, he keeps dying miserably over and over again as a pathetic villainous noble. Such a disgraceful end is unworthy of a proud aristocrat. He may only be twelve years old, but age doesn't matter. He is determined to do whatever it takes to avoid his tragic fate.

He takes down the corrupt official who started it all, eases the heavy taxes on his people, and continues to slay the monsters that ravage his domain. As he does, a hidden power that never appeared in the game begins to awaken. For some reason, the commoners begin to praise him, but he declares, "Don't misunderstand me, commoners. I’m doing this for myself."

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330651994399896), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5938ia/)
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Zenbu Osake no Sei ni Shite
description: I, who reunited with my former classmate Hajime Aosaki at a pub, became drinking buddies with her. As I was looking after her, who's a bad drunk, an unexpected situation unfolded today...?!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Nante Nasakenai Bokura da
description: A new idol on the rise, Souda Natsumi and her friend from highschool Iiyama Yukiya meet again at a music store. What lies at the end of this unwanted encounter?!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Music

name: Not found
description:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan
description: Rikuo Nura is descended from Nurarihyon, Grand Master of the spirit world, but appears to be just a normal kid. He usually just wants to live peacefully as a human, but when his friends and allies are in trouble, his spirit blood boils, and he transforms into Nurarihyon to wipe out evil! A new concept story combining spirits and chivalry! A piquant, gallant ghost action story!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Monochrome Days
description: A reliable office worker, Hanaichi Fudo, undoubtedly had a gift for the arts but gave up on his dreams of becoming an artist to lead a normal life. One day, his senior at work, Saori Wakaba, asked Hanaichi for help in writing her manga. Will he take up the pen again?!
tags: Office Workers, Drama

name: Girl Meets Rock!
description:
With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...?
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://x.com/gomanga/status/1959021776748298447)
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: G.G.G.
description:
Dentor works at a nursing home where a man of legend is rumored to be. But it turns out he's actually a promising young talent making waves in the mafia. Dentor's assignment is to infiltrate the nursing home where the legendary assassin Omega is in hiding, and snatch the 100 million dollar bounty...!

(MANGA Plus)
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime

name: Hero Organization
description: In a near-future where humanity stands on the edge of extinction, we turn our gaze to the stars. But in the depths of space, a new menace looms—the 'Star Beasts.' To combat these creatures, warriors donning mechanical armor emerge as humanity's last hope.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha

name: Itoshii Namida
description:
My heart is pounding for the first time… Please give me more♥

Published in [Dessert's December 2021 Issue](https://go-dessert.jp/dessert/2022/1.html)'s supplementary book Pink.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, School Life

name: Not found
description: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kochira, Shuumatsu Teitai Iinkai.
description: Kotoyorozu Kotoha, a boy with an underground past as a former mafia underling, had given up on youth. However, his life changes completely after meeting certain girls. With massive guns, they fight against mysterious beings threatening to destroy humanity! This is their school life — full of chaos, action, and unexpected twists. Behind the facade of the world lies a wild and outrageous youth like no other!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Pyu to Fuku! Jaguar
description: Piyohiko has a dream: He wants to be a succesfull guitar-player. Then this guy Jaguar shows up, and coaxes him into playing the 'recorder'. Thus ending Piyohiko's noble dream.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 5: Golden Wind (Official Colored)
description: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
tags: Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Masaka Jibun ga Joshi ni Naru Nante
description: This is the story of a boy who suddenly turns into a girl one day, and his TSF-loving friend.
tags: Genderswap, Romance

name: Shinohayu - The Dawn of Age
description: A prequel to the Saki series, focusing on Shino Shiratsuki, a young girl with an affinity for the 1-sou who is seeking out her missing mother. Future professional mahjong players like Hayari Mizuhara, Harue Akado and others are also featured.
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Akugyaku Hadou no Brave Soul
description:
"I will never cuckold you!"

A young man reincarnated as a villain character in a game tries to live an honest life to avoid a bad ending, but for some reason he ends up becoming friends with the heroines...!?

"Dungeon Brave Soul", it is a game that drew in many men, and at the same time, it is a game that broke the brains of many men with its sequel's NTR, depression, and bad ending. All because of the overwhelmingly hated antagonist of "Dunbure 2"... The young man who was reincarnated as Zenon Baskerville, however, in order to avoid the bad ending according to the scenario of "Dunbure 2", He tries to live honestly...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mimi
description:
Her name is Mimi, she's a completely normal and well adjusted human being.
**This is her story.**
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Slice of Life

name: Gyakusatsu Happy End
description: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mousou Shoujo
description: At first sight Jun seems like a hot vamp, however her sexy look is a complete lie. In reality she is a very shy wallflower. But what's even worse: She is still a virgin! In desperation, she seeks refuge in her erotic daydreams which always turn into some odd situations. And if that wasn't enough, she also finds out that the man of her dreams lives nearby.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Miss Kitty and Her Bodyguards
description: Follow Anna's daily life with her bodyguards!
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Minami no Teiou
description: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Video Games

name: Shiunji-ke no Kodomotachi
description: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won't stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata's world off its axis...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Lozan
description: Alexaro Taiy is an 18-year-old boy that wants to build his team to complete his missions and to become the most powerful soldier of his generation.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Military, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru
description:
I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai, who was supposed to hate me, ended up saying "I like you" to me...

The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President, "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina, and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President, Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other, save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day, at his secret part-time job, he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Subaru to Subaru
description: One year after Takumi Fujiwara’s student Kanata Rivington tore it up on Japan’s mega-popular MFG street racing circuit, two new drivers are itching to try their luck at the event. Their names: Subaru Sato, from Gunma Prefecture, and Subaru Kudo, from Kanagawa. The worlds of Initial D and MF Ghost meld into one as these two Subarus join together to weave the ultimate street racing legend!
tags: Sports, Drama

name: Monster Onna Kanbu wa Osanaki Yuusha wo Dekiaisuru
description: When a young hero appears, Arachne is ordered to hunt him down, and is moved by the hero's attitude and falls in love with him. On the contrary, she wants to use the power of the young hero to become the strongest demon...
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota

name: Hokenshitsu no Kagishimete
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Not found
description:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?

(Source: Comic Fuz, edited)
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another.
tags: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama

name: Saijaku Kizoku ni Tensei Shita no de Akuyakutachi wo Atsumete Mita
description: "The Weakest Noble, Adele: Turning Villains into Allies for Territory Management!" Adele, a noble with the weakest standing, faces an unavoidable downfall if he doesn’t act fast. Determined to escape ruin, he decides to do the unthinkable: recruit the most powerful villains as his allies! Together with his unlikely companions, Adele embarks on a journey to transform his neglected territory into a prosperous domain. Can this underdog noble rise above his circumstances and rewrite his destiny with the help of his fearsome new friends?
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: After two years of being dormant inside Tsutomu Senkawa, an accidental encounter with their old nemesis violently wakes Birdy up. With Birdy kicking evil's ass once again, the dark secrets of the experiments conducted by the "Agni" corporation are slowly revealed. They seem to be dabbling with human body enhancement, creating what they call "beast men," to combat the alien invasions related to Birdy.
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Aliens

name: Shogun
description: Ogata Shinsaku is a Homeless 17 years old boy, one day an old man appeared in front of him and grant him 100 million yen. Using the money Shinsaku started a company to go against his father's Empire, Tatsumi Takaaki, who didn't accept him as his son.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Drama

name: Hellsing
description:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Horror, Vampires, Police, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Say It With Your Body
description:
One girl. Three women. 

Rule number one: never fall in love. 

When she starts juggling three dangerously powerful women — the game stops being fun. They should’ve walked away. They didn’t. Now they’re hooked — on her lies, her kisses, her chaos. And she’s... addicted to being wanted. 

But someone’s catching feelings. When power, lust, and obsession collide — someone’s going to burn... and she holds the matches and her love is gasoline.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Ruler of the Land
description:
Bi-Kwang is a handsome young warrior who becomes a drooling mess whenever he sees a pretty girl. Out on the road he meets an extraordinary swordfighter with no name who is searching for a legendary master warrior. Bi-Kwang promises to aid the swordfighter if he lets Bi-Kwang meet his beautiful sister. Of course, it turns out the swordfighter is the sister, Hwa-Rin Dahm, and she must switch identities to keep the plot moving along. Bi-Kwang is immediately smitten, and thus we have a triangle involving only two people.

The story takes place in a setting in each side is trying to unify the Murim as a whole, and while this is taking place, Bi-Kwang who is extremely good at learning martial arts but doesn't want to learn it, gets into a deal where he takes the girl to see her grand father since he was the last person to see him before he disappeared and on the way he encounters many enemies and some friends (who show up from time to time) and he matures since he realizes why martial arts is so important and that he has been using it wrongly. (Source: MAL)

---
**Links:**
- **Original manhwa:** [Korean](http://smart.dwci.co.kr/event/yulgang/yulgang_event.asp)

**Notes:**
- Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing. The numbering changed a few times, hence why it displays as missing. 
- This manhwa was also made into a MMORPG.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Secret to Winning Over Unrequited Love
description:
High school graduation.

The rival I’d been tangled up with all throughout my school years came up to me and confessed that he liked me. It wasn’t the outcome I’d imagined, but in the end, I thought I’d finally won.

At least, until I ran into him again years later—this time with a young son in tow.

Filthy slut…

If your heart was that easy to sway, why’d you even confess to me in the first place?

Well, whatever.

Someone like you? Fucking you again would be nothing at all.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out... it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Lord of all beings
description: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
«Momentum» is a series of beautifully drawn vignettes that glimpse into the life-altering moments of several couples as they fall in and out of love.
This BL features a series of characters learning how to love, understand, and forgive one another — and in some cases, the world — at different moments in their lives.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Petals of Reincarnation
description: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha Movie 1st the Comics
description: Manga adaptation of Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha MOVIE 1st.
tags: Action, Drama, Fantasy

name: Hankou Dekinai! Ibara-chan
description: Hiiragi Ibara, who has now entered her second year of middle school has started her rebellious phase, becoming a problem child who troubles her brother… or so it appears. In truth, all she wants is her brother's attention.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Meikyuu no Saishinbu wo Mezasou
description:
Kanami, a young man that strayed into another world and suddenly awoke in a dark corridor is nearly killed by a demon and humans. Then preferring to use the status and skill systems Kanami aims for the deepest part of the Labyrinth. The skill [? ? ?] consumes his emotions, and he befriends some unusual people, but while his spirit wanes in the other world's Labyrinth he refuses to give up on returning to his original world.  
  
"I'll absolutely save you. Hence I will–!!" Aikawa Kanami awakes in a corridor he has no recollection of, the wound he received from a goblin is cured by a pretty girl called Lastiara, and he learns that he's in a different world that's exceedingly similar to a game. Kanami makes into his weapon the hearty welcomed status and skills, and with a pretty girl Dia plunges forward towards the deepest part of the labyrinth that's rumoured to "grant any wish"–.
tags: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Kowloon Generic Romance
description:
The greatest labyrinth of the 20th century, a drama for working men and women in a town called Kowloon Walled City. A daily adult romance in a gentle dystopia.

(…can a dystopia be gentle?)
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Tateo is a run-of-the-mill pharmacist from Odawara. His new wife gives him great news, she's pregnant! Instead of being happy though, his heart drops. Because he's been hiding a secret; he's never been able to get an erection. Filled with anxiety and despair, he takes an ED pill that someone he met gave to him. And it's a miracle, he got his first ever erection! He tells that person that he plans on recreating the mysterious drug, and it forever changes the course of his life!
tags: Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Drama

name: The Genius Blacksmith's Game
description:
The last blacksmith and master artisan left in the world. His hands are crippled in a forge fire, rendering him unable to craft any longer. But then, a virtual reality game, Ares, comes knocking on Hyun-soo’s door.

[Unrepairable Artifact.] [Cannot be crafted due to level restrictions.] “Huh? I consider myself a manual blacksmith, though.”

For him, no system restrictions apply. The tumultuous game of the genius blacksmith begins.
tags: Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tingwen Taihou He Taihou Shi Zhen De?!
description: Jiang Shu is a graduate student in the history department who accidentally traveled to the Great Qi. Because of her major in history, she knows a lot about the direction of history, and she knows that Qi Changning is a famous demon queen from history. Since her villainy has already been determined by history, Jiang Shu intends to embrace her opponent and be a peaceful licking dog so she can live a good life, but as they come into increasingly close contact she discovers the truth hidden in the history books. It seems that this demon queen is not the way that she thought she'd be.....
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Digimon Liberator
description:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic…!?
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Digimon Next
description: Tsurugi Tatsuno is a boy who competes in Virtual Digimon Battle tournaments. When a Kuwagamon appeared in the Real World, his Greymon came to life and protected him. Tsurugi is summoned to the Digital World by Piximon to save the Digital World from the evil Barbamon. Since his Digimon has a hexagon shape on him, it's an Illegal Digimon, meaning that Digimon bearing such symbols can help save the Digital World. Tsurugi's Greymon later De-Digivolves to Agumon and they meet other characters destined to save the Digital World from the forces of Barbamon. Now they must stop Barbamon and his minions before they get all the DigiMemories and take over both worlds.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: MAD
description: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they're targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Aliens

name: Mahou Shoujo Dandelion
description: A story of light and shadow where the Magical Girl, Tanpopo Ohanami, teams up with Shade, the shadow phantom who should be her enemy, to fight for the ones they love.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Drama

name: Not found
description: When she was a student, she was a beautiful but cool loner. But 10 years later, we are married...... and she spends her days being all lovey-dovey with me! This is a collection of two-panel stories about the moe gap between the time skip, and the way she is becoming more and more doting on me!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
***I want a do over for the me who had no courage to speak of, and be born again as a new me.***

Koharu Kanba, who spent her gloomy high school days as a "social outcast", will now restart her life!!

(Source: CyComi)
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Majo no Hanaya-san
description: Allie Abel, a girl who came from the countryside wishing to become a witch who can make people happy with magic, meets Yoshino-York, an unusual witch who sells ordinary flowers and believes that "people can be happy without relying on magic". Allie, who has been assigned to work at Yoshino's florist as an apprentice witch, is now making "happiness" that was supposed to come true through magic come true with her own hands...?
tags: Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Spice & Flavour: Balance
description: It must be a sign when you keep running into the same cute stranger over and over again. Even more so when you both share a love for instant noodles. Who says a nearby convenience store isn’t a place to fall in love?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Mysterious Disappearances
description: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world.
tags: Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: December
description: One frigid December dawn, Song Yeon-woo meets an injured runaway alpha; inexplicably drawn toward his woodsy scent, he is compelled to help the young man. Despite his aversion to alphas due to trauma in his past, Yeon-woo somehow feels safe and welcomed in his presence. The two part in the moonlight, never to see one another again…but fate has other plans. Two years later, Yeon-woo has finally returned to the city to begin anew - still wary of alphas around him, he has built barriers in nearly every aspect of his life to keep himself safe. But when that a familiar scent begins to pierce through his boundaries, Yeon-woo is unable to stop himself from following them in pursuit of something thrilling…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Phoenix of the Nine Heavens (Remake)
description: Feng Ming is on his way to school when he saves a child about to die, losing his own life in the process. He is given the chance to cross time and space to have a new life and awakens in the body of the crown prince of Xi Lei. This crown prince, however, does not have the high status that Feng Ming expects. Instead, the prince regent Rong Tian holds the highest power in Xi Lei. Rong Tian notices the crown prince’s sudden change in demeanor along with Feng Ming’s habit of suddenly blurting out modern words and phrases, and becomes interested in him...
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild wo Yameraremasen~
description: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...!! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now?
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Kiska, a boy who was mistreated by the villagers, was able to get by thanks to his childhood friend, Namia, who was the only one who stood by him. One day, Namia is found murdered in the village. Kiska is framed for the murder by the other villagers, and banished to an inescapable S-class dungeon...?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
It's been 25 years since Earth was invaded by beings from another realm. Now, everyone's life is shaped by a single measure of strength—the World Ranking. From the countryside of Gunma comes Kinoko Kino, a high school girl with zero communication skills, trembling her way through city life with just one dream: make a friend... but little does she know... She's actually the World Ranking's #1: UNKNOWN!

(Source: tonarinoyj, edited)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens

name: Yane Urabeya no Koushaku Fujin
description: The new life of Duchess Opal all started from a dusty attic. The house she resided in after a political marriage with the young Duke, Hubert, was full of hostility. There was also a woman named "Angel," who is treasured by the mansion's owner... Opal gained a bad reputation because of a disgraceful rumor and as a result, she was treated like a hindrance. However, the Duchess doesn't like losing, so it won't end like this! The woman is unrelated to the management of the territory. I will outwit those who let their guard down…!
tags: Romance, Drama, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
In the race to determine the Zodiac gods, Nina the cat ranked 13th and failed to be chosen.
Because of Nina, the Zodiac race begins again for the first time in thousands of years, and the Twelve Gods descend into the world.

A seductive and lovely, full-fledged superpower fantasy girl action story!!
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Unimplemented Overlords have Joined the Party!
description:
Young gamer Shuutarou is among the lucky few chosen to playtest Eternity, the latest VRMMORPG, and he wastes no time in activating his unique Create Dungeon skill... at the exact moment the game glitches! Now he and his fellow playtesters are trapped, and their lives are at stake. Shuutarou happens to end up in the one area that has yet to be patched into the game: the final-boss lair where the six Evil Overlords lurk. They promptly declare him their master— and with Eternity's strongest baddies on his team, Shuutarou is up for any adventures this new life throws at him!

(Yen Press)
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/series/the-unimplemented-overlords-have-joined-the-party)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Repurika - Moto Tsuma no Fukushuu
description:
Sumire was once bullied and cursed as "ugly". Without worrying about her appearance, she marries an ideal man who loves her. But one day, he cheats on another woman with a beautiful appearance and declares a divorce on her...

What's more, the woman was her main culprit, who once bullied Sumire. Now with a new identity, Violet vows her revenge on the woman who robbed her of her man and her husband who abandoned herself. Her fierce revenge begins on the woman who changed her face, changed her name, and was tied up with her ties.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Demon King's Beloved: Doting on the Abused Healing Maiden
description:
Mei, the daughter of a family that exterminates vicious monsters, was raised in a cold environment, lacking the power to exorcise demons. Meanwhile, her arrogant younger brother violates a taboo and awakens Ryouga, the king of another world! Mei is left behind... Mei is in danger, but Ryouga is actually a gentle, intelligent, and handsome young man. He teaches her the value of the rare "healing power" she possesses, and invites her to "become my princess."

(Source: Comic Walker, translated)
tags: Demons, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Saijaku Muhai no Bahamut
description:
Lux, a former prince of an empire named Arcadia that was overthrown via a rebellion five years earlier, accidentally trespasses in a female dormitory's bathing area, sees the kingdom's new princess Lisesharte naked, incurring her wrath. Lisesharte then challenges Lux to a Drag-Ride duel. Drag-Rides are ancient armored mechanical weapons that have been excavated from ruins all around the world. Lux used to be called the strongest Drag-Knight, but now he's known as the "undefeated weakest" Drag-Knight because he will absolutely not attack in battle. After his duel with Lisesharte, Lux ends up attending the female-only academy that trains royals to be Drag-Knights.
___
**Compositor:** [Watanabe Itsuki](https://mangadex.org/author/eb66b421-fb65-4aca-95d0-e6d29fc3ba78)
**Character Designer:** [Kasuga Ayumu](https://mangadex.org/author/82c4316a-f764-4e20-a563-7e6dcfee6ac9)
tags: Action, Romance, Mecha, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans. Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land. Will humans be found? A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [KADOCOMI](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Sensitive Boy
description:
Stories of bittersweet youth, about troubled boys facing coming-of-age questions about love, sexuality, and other psychological issues.

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Comedy

name: Ginrin Voice
description: Not found
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Dien Bien Phu
description: Vietnam War, 1965. Hikaru Minami, a soldier in the U.S. Army, meets and falls in love with the "princess," the strongest and most beautiful guerrilla soldier in the Vietcong!
tags: Historical, Action, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Takahashi met Nanase, a beautiful and seemingly innocent woman, on a dating app. They were steadily growing closer in their relationship until one day, when he goes to Nanase's house, he finds a shocking sight...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama

name: Ryuu to Yuusha to Haitatsunin Shikaban
description:
Bonus chapters that never made it into volumes, infodumps, behind-the-scene stories, new bonus chapters, and much more from "The Dragon, the Hero, and the Courier", a rather strange medieval fantasy manga.
This book was self-published by the author with permission from Shueisha.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Military, Doujinshi

name: Shibuya Near Family
description: A small series that frankly depicts the circumstances of a third-grade girl living in Shibuya and her family.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: 100M.
description: He was born fast. He had nothing else, only the ability to run fast. It gave him “a place at school” and “a bridge between friends”. That was all the boy had. Then he met another boy who ran to forget the hardships in life. He was not fast by any means, but he had passion. The passion was infectious, and he gradually came to feel the same excitement. But that was the beginning of the “abnormality”.
tags: Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Mousugu Kuwareru Kamo Shiren
description:
Ever since university student, Reo, accidentally bumped into Takuma, a plain-looking boy whom he met for the first time, he's been getting stalked.
Reo is scared that Takuma is out for revenge, "Will he try to get back at me for bumping into him?!". As Reo desperately begs for his life, Takuma suddenly confesses, "I love you"?!
Apparently, Takuma fell in love at first sight with Reo on the day they bumped into each other! Takuma suggests to a confused Reo, "I want you try to going out with me for a period of time".
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description: Keitarou, dreaming of a soulmate, meets a beautiful brown girl(?) Sun. Apparently, he'd promised to marry Sun when they were young — and it turns out he's a prince of the kingdom of Caglionia! Will they find their soulmate in each other!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing

name: Not found
description:
Fujiwara Kagetora is a high school student who is undefeated in fights and prides himself on being the toughest guy in school.
However, one day, he is involved in an unfortunate traffic accident.

When Kagetora wakes up after the accident, he has been transformed into a girl!
Then, to top it off, an unexpected visitor arrives!?!?
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Aliens

name: Not found
description: The Magician named Yard was suddenly summoned in different world as a Hero. The sorcery in this world is behind compared to Yard who came from another world. The other summoned heroes are also unreliable. Furthermore, it is not possible to return to the former world... In such a hopeless situation, Yard chuckles to himself. Get ready, humans of this world. This world where witchcraft is behind. I have enormous toy in this box. Allow me to play with it. The Villainous magician named Yard tramples down the other world with overwhelming Dark Magic!
tags: Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dig It
description:
As the son of retired Japanese national team ace Shishiya Kei, Shishiya Gaku was the ace of his middle school club team, but he wondered if he was suited to be an attacker.
One day, Kei came to watch Gaku practice and met Noboru, who had exceptional talent as an attacker, and declared that he would make him the best volleyball player in Japan. The father-son relationship ended. Gaku vowed to prove his own limits as an attacker and beat his father and Noboru with the volleyball style he had pioneered.
tags: Sports

name: Haikei, Arishi Hi ni Saku Hanatachi e
description: Kasumi, a serious girl who has just started at an all-girls school, discovers a letter tucked into an old book she found in the library. The letter's writer yearns to have a special relationship with another girl, like how it was described in the book… A romance about the the old-school "S" kind of girls-love.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Tensei Shite High Elf ni Narimashitaga, Slow Life wa 120-nen de Akimashita - Highelf with a Long Life
description:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Aesir's had enough of it! That's right. Aesir isn't quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world... meaning he's got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He's also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Aesir leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that's more his pace.
___
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Kakegurui - Compulsive Gambler
description:
Hyakkaou Private Academy. An institution for the privileged with a very peculiar curriculum. You see, when you're the sons and daughters of the wealthiest of the wealthy, it's not athletic prowess or book smarts that keep you ahead. It's reading your opponent, the art of the deal. What better way to hone those skills than with a rigorous curriculum of gambling? At Hyakkaou Private Academy, the winners live like kings, and the losers are put through the wringer. But when Yumeko Jabami enrolls, she's gonna teach these kids what a high roller really looks like!
___
Placed 3rd in the 2nd Next Manga Awards (2016).
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/kakegurui-compulsive-gambler)

**Original Concept:** [Dominium ~The Gambling Legend Of Extremely Colorful Girls~](http://ushimilk.web.fc2.com/index.html)
tags: Thriller, Traditional Games, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Mystery

name: Superstar wo Utatte.
description:
"I jus' don't think I'm cut out for rap. There's nothin' I want ta sing about... or anythin' I want ta say."

Oji Yukito is a 17-year-old drug dealer living in the streets of Osaka, suppressing his emotions each and every day. He lost his drug-addicted mother and his beloved sister when he was a child, leaving him an orphan. Despite his loneliness, he has a best friend who believes in him. In the midst of continuing to sell drugs, enduring beatings from his boss, and bleeding... Just what is it that lies in his heart?
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Superstar wo Utatte.
description:
"I jus' don't think I'm cut out for rap. There's nothin' I want ta sing about... or anythin' I want ta say."

Oji Yukito is a 17-year-old drug dealer living in the streets of Osaka, suppressing his emotions each and every day. He lost his drug-addicted mother and his beloved sister when he was a child, leaving him an orphan. Despite his loneliness, he has a best friend who believes in him. In the midst of continuing to sell drugs, enduring beatings from his boss, and bleeding... Just what is it that lies in his heart?
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Saitei Megami
description:
Collection of short stories by author Imura Ei.

**Contents**:
1. **Worst Goddess in the World** (Saitei Megami)  
2. **Reversal**
A high school girl tries out being a prostitute. She ends up being surprised as her first client turns out to be a girl.  
3. **Water Depth** (Suishin)
4. **Tropical Ririon** (Nettai Ririon)
A tale of two girls torn between following the laws of their tribe or their hearts…  
5. **How to Welcome Someone Home** (Okaerinasai no Tsukuri kata)
6. **Platinum Sunday**
7. **Reversible**
tags: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Kyatapi Land
description: Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma

name: A Hidden Side to my Crush
description: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Umamusume Pretty Derby - Zero Catches -1 (Doujinshi)
description:
El Condor Pasa, Special Week, Grass Wonder finished their career with impressive results before entering Dream Trophy

King Halo, hasn’t won a G1

Seiun Sky, suffer an injury

Darkness is approaching both,

They are facing pressure, expectation and most dangerous, self-doubt…

Trainers won’t abandon them of course, but is that enough to help them achieve their dream?

What will be their ending? Triumphant victory or a pathetic failure?

Only our Uma can decide for themselves
A sidequel of the same series, check out the other part [here](https://mangadex.org/title/99a953cf-9c1c-4c2a-91f8-2a76d5c39757/umamusume-pretty-derby-zero-catches): 

Buy on [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/work/=/product_id/RJ364086.html)  [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/work/=/product_id/RJ01001363.html)

name: I am Invincible with My Luck Stat at 999 and Infallible Insta-Death Magic: I was Banished with a Magic Power of 1, but I Rise to the Top with My Probability Cheat
description: Born into a prestigious family of magicians, Sachi faced despair when her magical power was assessed at a mere 1. In contrast, her luck stat was an astonishing 999, but to magicians, it was deemed worthless—?
tags: Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Wéixiǎn Xīntiào
description: "If you don't want your fake identity exposed to the world, then complete my seven little demands, Qi ChaoYue." [Dominant Sadistic Queen True Heiress X Submissive Masochistic Tsundere Fake Heiress] Despite how much she hates these outrageous demands, her body seems to be falling deeper into this world...
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: After entering high school, Rikuto, the future head of the Ayamejou-Kouji family, begins living alone in a penthouse apartment at the top of a luxury tower. However, his new life takes an unexpected turn when Kanna, a maid with a knack for eccentric behavior and conversations, arrives. With every action and word of Kanna's being packed with weirdness, Rikuto can't stop reacting and retorting. He's torn, does he want her to act normal, or stay just the way she is?
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: When the Villainess Meets the Yandere
description:
Yandere Commoner × Villainess Noble Lady. 

The arrogant noble, Miss Hesha, is jealous of the commoner girl Jolene and does whatever she can to sabotage her. However, during one of her many schemes, her first kiss is stolen by Jolene. What started as a prank to get back at her, later sees Hesha desperately finding any excuse to get Jolene’s attention. 

When the villainess meets the yandere, it’s a constant cycle of torment and trouble, but the more she gets hurt, the more tsundere she becomes.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color

name: Oblivion Battery
description:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!
tags: Sports, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Listening to the Stars
description: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Artificial Temperature 36.7°C
description: Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed, Gill, a sex android, was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill, although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ko, Konna Ikemen ga Watashi no Osananajimi de Kon'yakusha Desutte? Sasuga Akuyaku Reijou, Sore Kurai no Utsuwa Janakereba Konna Taiyaku Tsutomaranai Wa
description:
Before she knew it, Rin suddenly finds herself reborn as Richelie, the daughter of a duke from a country called Eirland. Her fiancé is the crown prince, Zenon... Could this really be the world of the otome game her little sisters are crazy about? And what's more, she's the villainess who tricks all the targets into having sex?!

…For someone with a zero love quotient, naturally this is far too difficult! Rin wants to quietly aim for the bad ending and go to a convent, but she finds herself getting sucked deeper and deeper into Zenon's swamp of suspicion…

A turbulent love fantasy about the heroine, reincarnated as a villainess, who is the polar opposite of her character × her sadistic childhood friend, the crown prince.
___
**Character Designer:** [Surada Mami](https://mangadex.org/author/a0b57f33-75f8-40c4-aa94-a861765447ca)
tags: Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Wolf Constellation
description: This manga is partly inspired by the real-life Japanese horse bandit, Hakuro Kohinata, and depicts the tumultuous life of Kensaku Ohinata, who moved to China at a young age, was kidnapped by a group of horse bandits, but rose to prominence among their ranks and eventually grew up to unite a number of them under the name of Xiao Dongyang. Kensaku's adventurous spirit and ambition, as well as his positive, brave personality, can sometimes lead to light-hearted mischief, but as he matures into a young man, he grows to experience bouts of delusion. Regarded as one of Mitsuteru Yokoyama's most realistic and human works, this manga draws inspiration from another real-life Japanese horse bandit: Date Junnosuke, thus vividly depicting the reality of Chinese horse bandits.
tags: Historical, Romance, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Military, Drama, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Satomi Yuuki, a first-year high school student, has a secret worry.
It’s that… his friend’s older sister—whom he often visits—is terrifying!
With her flashy hair, multiple piercings, and that intimidating glare every time their eyes meet,
Yuuki spends his days quietly scared… but it turns out, she has an unexpected hidden side…?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Bokura no Libido
description:
Yanagida Ryuunosuke suffers from a complex... He just can't look girls in the eye! It makes him extremely nervous and his face turns bright red every time. One night, by sheer chance, he sees his neighbor through the window... And she's masturbating!?

That neighbor is Sasaki Ami, his classmate and one of the most popular girls at school... with a peculiar condition she can't tell anyone about. As the two come to share each other's secrets, they form a strange but special bond... This condition is going to make their school lives truly unique!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Adventurer Harten rescues the little Elven girl Auyn after her mother was killed in a goblin raid.
tags: Monsters, Action, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: And Then There Were None
description: Not found
tags: Historical, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Karasu wa Aruji wo Erabanai
description:
Yamauchi - a fantastic world where the Yatagarasu, a race of three-legged crows with the ability to transform into humans, live. Yukiya, a young Yatagarasu, is appointed as the personal attendant of the eccentric Crown Prince Wakamiya. Soon, he is entangled in a web of conspiracies attempting to overthrow the heir to the Imperial throne. 

An adaptation of the second book of the award-winning <Yatagarasu> novel series by Chisato Abe. The first book has been licensed in English as [A Raven for All Seasons](https://mangadex.org/title/c22db5fc-726a-41ad-8402-5537e7de2277/karasu-ni-hitoe-wa-niawanai) by [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10162/episode/336576).
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Ryuu: Ron
description:
Kyouto, April 1928. Oshikouji Ryu is 17 years old, and is called 'Genius swordman, Dragon of Kyouto'. He will inherit the property of the noble Oshikouji family, but prefers practising Kendou. He enters a school for training Kendou swordman, but the seniors of school are very harsh and intolerable. But Ryu doesn't surrender and overcomes the problems, later on he impresses his seniors and they begin to like him.

This manga tells a great story against the richly textured background of historical Japan and China, it has a refined and excellent artwork. Murakami's views on Chinese and Korean people is very warm, and not those of the previous invader and governor such as the extreme right party in Japan. Another interesting part of the manga is its rich depiction of Japanese colorful life. A typical example of the realistic style and a manga of high reputation in Korea and Japan.
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Kachua, a mother of two, works part-time as a porter carrying supplies for adventurers while raising her children. She struggles daily to balance parenting and work, but one day she receives a skill from the goddess—and begins her life as a true adventurer! And her weapons? A ladle and a pot lid!? The newbie mom adventurer begins her laid-back, unstoppable journey! A relaxed and fun adventure tale begins!!
tags: Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kimi no Kokoro wo Kanjitai
description: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity II: Subterranean World of Folklore, Agartha - Women of Agartha
description:
Fate/Grand Order official comicalize start!

In 2000 AD, the bottom of the mountain range in Central Asia... In a place where no obvious wars or incidents have been confirmed, "Organization for the Preservation of Human Order, Chaldea" finds the existence of a Singularity. Ritsuka Fujimaru and his team started the Rayshift immediately...
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Called “the greatest sushi in the world” and respected by chefs across the globe, Sukiyabashi Jiro’s master craftsman, Ono Jirō, continues to make sushi even at 93 years old (as of October 2018).
What kind of childhood did he have?
What kinds of hardships and training did he endure?
What has supported him throughout his life?
Where did his unwavering dedication come from?

Manga artist Akira Sugita, who spent over two years following Jirō closely, including traveling to his birthplace and training sites, depicts the life of this remarkable man.

This first, fully dedicated comic, collecting the four chapters that originally ran in Big Comic Original “Sushi Special Issue” in the summer of 2016, plus the additional story “JIRO ~ Silver of Integrity” is sure to fascinate chefs and readers around the world.

name: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken
description: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world... and Akari turns into a slime.
tags: Reincarnation, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Akira is boyish in both looks and personality—and Daichi, her childhood friend turned boyfriend by their first year of high school, thinks she's too cute. Girly outfits aren't her thing... so why does he suddenly find her in a cat-eared maid costume at the school festival?! Awkward but sweet moments abound in this wholesome friends-to-lovers romcom.

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
___
**Note:** Originally published as 他校のボーイッシュ彼女 (Takou no Boyish Kanojo) as a web manga released on the author's Twitter account since September 4, 2024 and published as ボーイッシュ彼女が可愛すぎる (Boyish Kanojo ga Kawaisugiru) in print by Square Enix since March 22, 2025.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Pink Candy Kiss
description: Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years, whom she had been thinking of marrying, suddenly dumps her. He states, "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way, but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day, a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while, she realizes that she is Ema, a classmate of hers, who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Shingeki no Eroko-san: Hen na Oneesan wa Danshi Kousei to Nakayoku Naritai
description:
Shindou Eruko, a glasses, big breasted beauty, found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together, but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy, while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality, but after several near-misses, it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does, indeed, have feelings toward her.
  
This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~
description: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: On the day of the entrance ceremony, Yuuhi Takamiya caught a mysteriously high fever and was bedridden for a week. To camouflage the fact that he was a loner, he creates a bookworm persona that becomes firmly established both for himself and others. Hearing his despair over wanting friends, a clumsy alien called Nano arrives from space to push some dubious goods on him... With Nano's outrageous products, Yuuhi's school life spirals into even greater chaos!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Mad Miniscape
description:
Asahi and her childhood friend Minoru are living together for some reason.

He persistently demands Asahi's life at every turn, but the real Minoru seems to have died four years ago.
Then, what is the "real" person who is with Asahi?

The spirited a mad thriller horror with a new sensation.
tags: Thriller, Ghosts, Romance, Incest, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Hikaru ga Shinda Natsu
description:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-summer-hikaru-died)
tags: Award Winning, Boys' Love, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Senpai, Chotto ii Desu ka?
description: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Uzumaki
description: [FanMade] A re imagined look into the world of Naruto, Following life after the war, children inherit the past's legacy, hopes, and it's consequences. A new Era begins, a strong resolve is needed, will she have what it takes to brandish the name UZUMAKI.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, Web Comic

name: Shikyuuji - Koukou Kyuuji ni Asu wa nai
description:
A legendary face-off between two high school baseball players in the national finals, one a naturally gifted talent, the other a hard-working monster. A fierce rivalry with their lives on the line.

(Manga Mogura)
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Sports, Gore, Drama

name: The Housekeeper of the Dungeon
description: Tired, overworked Huina thinks dungeons and Hunters have nothing to do with her until she's suddenly gifted with a Hunter's abilities. Now she has to navigate her game-like reality with the skills and stats of... a Homemaker?! With this class, Huina becomes the ultimate cook, custodian, and caretaker, which lands her a seemingly harmless job in a Hunter guild. But will this organization help Huina bring the Hunters a revolution of rest or force her into dangers she'd never dreamed of?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Official "Test" Manga
description:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Holy Empire of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.
