name: Chihaya Re:Start!
description: Chihaya Sakurazaka is a girl whose only redeeming quality is her speed. After meeting her eternal rival Mio Koshimizu in middle school, Chihaya jumps into the world of track and field. Mio and Chihaya go to different high schools, but they promise to compete against each other at the Inter-High School Championships.
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: An Area Known for Real Demon Sightings During Setsubun
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Demons, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Manaka Kawashima, a high school girl, is in love with her childhood friend and classmate, Ei Eguchi. She continues to think of him with single-minded devotion… until another heroine, Ayame Takabi, suddenly transfers into their class.

Unlike Kawashima, however, Takabi is a natural-born winning heroine: on the very morning of her transfer, she bumps into Ei-kun on the way to school, gets a lucky perv moment, and basically hits every classic rom-com flag right out of the gate.

Kawashima falls into despair... but then the story’s background character MC, Kimura, decides he’s going to fight to guide her from being a losing heroine to a winning heroine…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house. From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Dragon Master of Corseltel ~The Tale of the Baby Dragon~
description:
The adventures of Marciel and his dragons continues. In Koryuu Monogatari, the baby dragons have grown up a little.

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BB%E3%83%AB%E3%83%86%E3%83%AB%E3%81%AE%E7%AB%9C%E8%A1%93%E5%A3%AB)
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: NEW GAME!
description: Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger, Suzukaze Aoba, a high school graduate, begins working as a character designer for the game's developer, Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development, she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department, as well as those from across the company.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.
tags: Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Miss Vampire’s Bullying Game
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life

name: Super Ball Girls
description: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Berserk
description:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice. Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.
___
Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Disney Twisted Wonderland: The Comic—Episode of Octavinelle
description:
From MangaUpdates:

Stranded in the world of Twisted Wonderland, Yu must brave a magical school filled with ghosts, monsters, and uncooperative students!

Yu is on his way to deliver food from his family’s restaurant when he’s whisked away to the world of Twisted Wonderland. Now enrolled in the magical school known as Night Raven College, Yu encounters a strange scenario—his fellow students are scoring too well on their exams! But there couldn’t be anything sinister behind great test scores, could there?
tags: Magic, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Narumi Rokurou is still adrift in life in his forties, unmarried, and working as an editor at a publishing company while writing hardly lucrative literary fiction. His days enjoying life at his own pace are brought to an end one summer night, when a strange twist of fate brings Rokurou together with a mysterious beauty, beginning the story of their crazed love.

As once was spoken by Zarathustra: “Everything in a woman is a riddle.”.
tags: Romance, Drama

name: The Blood of a Lover
description: When a bloodthirsty woman appears in the woods where Ivan and his witch sister Celine live, they plot to lure the vampire with Ivan's cursed blood to get rid of her before she causes them trouble. Will the plan succeed without the bait falling in love?
tags: Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!
description: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
tags: Thriller, Traditional Games, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
description: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Satō. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.
tags: Sports, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
tags: Action, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?
description: A story about 28-year-old salaryman Haru Ikeda and his new girlfriend Taya.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Samurai Troopers
description: Talpa(Arago), the demon lord of the Netherworld, is bent on conquering the mortal world. Standing against Talpa and his four Dark Warlords(Mashou) are the five Ronin Warriors, each in possession of mystical armor and weapons. They are assisted by Mia Koji(Nasty Yagyu), a young student-teacher, and a mysterious warrior-monk known only as The Ancient (Kaosu).
tags: Action, Comedy, Samurai, Adventure, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Friendship. Effort. Victory!

The story centers around the life of a young boxer named Ryuji Takane and his sister Kiku, who is his coach. Ryuji and his sister both inherited their father's talent for boxing with Ryuji inheriting his strength and techniques while Kiku picked up his talent for analysis and strategy. In the past, their father was a famous boxer. Ryuji and Kiku went away from home to train and become famous in order to help their lonely mother. On the way to stardom, they have to defeat the strongest challengers all over the world.

The work that solidified the themes of Weekly Shonen Jump. Those themes being Friendship, Effort, and Victory!
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Ami, an office worker and alien, is demoted to Earth due to certain circumstances. Furthermore, she has an accident while heading to Earth!!?
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Not found
description:
Masamichi Akita, a high school student whose motto is to live wisely, who meets Setsuna Rikudou, a high school girl with a violent supremacist attitude. Akita is saved by Rikudou when he is tangled up with a delinquent, and is attracted by her overwhelming strength, asks her to teach him how to fight. However, Akita is devastated by Rikudou, who asserts that "violence is the only rule in this world". Akita's encounter with Rikudou leads him into the world of "violence".
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550912965355027502)
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Amidst the turbulent times of 1920s Shanghai, Shion, a student engrossed in reading the newspaper, is approached by a woman. Her name is Shiulang, the wife of a military commander; she asks the well-educated Shion to write a letter on her behalf.
Through exchanged words, the two are drawn to each other despite occasional clashes. Yet, a reality that promises no future together and inevitable changes of the times painfully tears their feelings apart.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Girls' Love, Drama, Tragedy

name: Mieruko-chan
description:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and... ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](http://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Chainsaw Man
description:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Primal Hunter
description: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Villainess Turns the Hourglass
description:
With the marriage of her prostitute mother to the Count, Aria’s status in society skyrocketed immediately. After leading a life of luxury, Aria unfairly meets death because of her sister Mielle’s schemes. And right before she dies, she sees an hourglass fall as if it were a fantasy. And just like that, she was miraculously brought back to the past.

“I want to become a very elegant person, just like my sister, Mielle.”

In order to face the villainess, she must become an even more wicked villainess. This was the new path Aria chose to take revenge on Mielle who murdered both her and her mother.

---
After her lowly mother married a count, Aria enjoyed a life full of luxury while harassing her gentle stepsister Mielle. Several years later, Aria is about to be executed when Mielle reveals that she wickedly tricked Aria into building the bad reputation that ultimately brought her to the scaffold. Just as Aria desperately wishes she could change her fate, she sees a curious hourglass that takes her back into the past. 

Now, Aria can destroy Mielle by using her own tactics against her like a true villainess. The power of the hourglass is on her side... 

Can Aria take everything from Mielle, or will her actions change the past in ways she couldn't have imagined? Based on the hit novel.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Comic description: [Innocent spy girl x beautiful devil gangster] The devil leader who lives on human desires accidentally tied his fate with the spy girl "Pearl", and the cold devil had his only weakness. In this sweet and dangerous love chase, the two opened up the most painful forbidden areas in each other's hearts and learned about each other's unknown past. At this time, a deeper conspiracy and danger are approaching them...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Saryu, known as the Winter Bear of Tidros for his formidable presence that scatters enemies, suddenly finds himself in an engagement with Lady Shitoen, a noblewoman from a neighboring kingdom whose previous engagement was called off! Starting with a forehead kiss, he's nervous around a woman he's not used to. Her smile makes his heart race, and a glimpse of her chest leaves him flustered. As improper fantasies run wild in his mind, Saryu's rationality is on the verge of collapse?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Gift±
description: With the increasing demand for high quality organ transplants in Japan, many clandestine organizations carried out kidnapping and murder operations to obtain organs for sale; surgeons also began to practice. It even began to intervene in countries like China. Our protagonist, Tamaki Suzuhara, a beautiful but mysterious high school girl, tries to find someone very important to her who is currently missing. she joins an illegal network of organ trafficking, which kidnapped those who were judged "human slags" for the extraction of their organs. Together with her partner Takashi. Let's see where to lead this bloody journey and the moral dilemma of Tamaki Suzuhara. Can you find what you want? o Searching for the adolescent prostitution network?
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mutou Black
description:
Wandering traveler Kurotsuki Yukiji goes from town to town enjoying the women, food, and culture each has to offer. He is the master of the Kurotsuki style martial art where instead of using brute force, it uses the aiki form where you use the opponent’s strength and manipulate their force against them. It focuses on settling the conflict without hurting both sides and harnessing the “bladeless soul.” Yukiji is traveling to perfect this style and trouble usually finds him although going by his outward appearance, he looks like a peace-seeking man.   
  
The oneshot was released in issue 20/2012 of Weekly Shounen Jump.  
The serialization for this series begins from issue 24/2013 of Weekly Shounen Jump.
tags: Historical, Action, Martial Arts

name: The Ravages of Time
description:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
___
**Official English:** [emaqi](https://emaqi.com/manga/dealing-with-mikadono-sisters-is-a-breeze) - United States & Canada only.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: You Woke up as a Girl This Morning!?
description:
[Reads Left-to-Right]

It's a very common occurrence.
tags: Genderswap, Official Colored, Comedy, Self-Published, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Hitokuchi Choudai
description:
Sasame Yui, a descendant of vampires, feels out of place in her high school class. Unable to fit in with her human classmates, she’s often late to school — something that the class representative, Sekiya, relentlessly criticizes her for.
One day, angered by Sekiya’s nagging, a dark impulse flickers through Yui’s mind—

*"Maybe I should just… suck him dry."*

But that thought marks the beginning of something far more dangerous—an ecstasy said to surpass sexual pleasure a hundredfold.

Thus begins the tragic tale of those consumed and undone by their own desires.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Vampires

name: Usogui
description:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Jiang Cheng woke up and was reborn! He was also bound to the Godly Rich System. Every second the world runs, he can get money! As the system continues to upgrade, Jiang Cheng's wealth has skyrocketed. All the cool school beauties and queen bosses are around him. Jiang Cheng laughed up to the sky. In his previous life, he was trapped by the things that he couldn't get when he was young for so long. Now that he is reborn, who cares about those broken rules! Let's drink and enjoy it first.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Loli, Comedy, Magical Girls, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Isekai Mou Kaeritai
description:
Ordinary salaryman X isekai = a dispirited life in another world!?
He worked normally, ate normally, and slept normally. Salaryman Shimoyamaguchi Ichirou was satisfied with his simple but happy everyday life.
One day, he was summoned to another world to fight as a hero, but was as well received as a 1-star character pulled in a gacha game...
"Ugh, I just want to go home..."
Which way will tomorrow lead Shimoyamaguchi!?
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Visual Breakers
description:
We ended up at a concept bar on a whim for the afterparty, and it turned out to be full of seriously tall women.

It’s a manga where the customers have a casual conversation with the big ladies they meet at the bar.
The conversations mostly revolve around appearances and the relationship dynamics between people.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Oozumou Reijou ~Seijo ni Hirateuchi wo Kuratta Shunkan Sumou Budatta Zense wo Omoidashita Akuyaku Reijou no Watashi wa sute Neko Ouji ni Chanko wo Furumaitai Haadosukoidosukoi~
description:
(from: Mangaupdates)

The past life of the otome game's villainess was a sumo wrestler!?

Florche, whose engagement with the prince was annulled after she was falsely accused of a crime, recovers the memories of her previous life as a member of a women's sumo club after being slapped by the local saintess.

She also realizes that this world is exactly the same as the setting of the otome game she played in her past life.

As a lone sumo wrestler, she cannot forgive such injustice! What she may lack physical strength, she makes up with her sumo spirit!

With her slaps and sumo stances, she knocks down the handsome capture targets from the beloved otome game!

She will protect her favorite second prince and save the kingdom!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Meikyuu Teikoku no Tsukurikata - Renseijutsushi wa Mazu Risou no Mura wo Kaitaku Shimasu
description:
Nino, an Alchemist, suddenly regains memories of his past life and realizes that the world he lives in is actually the setting of a game he had mastered in his previous life. Even worse, the world is already on track towards a bad ending. 

Determined to avoid the worst outcome, Nino takes action, but he is soon falsely accused and exiled to a remote frontier. However, this village holds a secret that only he knows—there's a hidden dungeon here! 

Now, with the perks of being a reincarnator and his vast knowledge of the game's mechanics, Nino begins his ideal frontier life!
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
One day, Kurisu, a girl who was born and raised in a remote area, learns that she has the [House Building] skill. When her memories of being Kurisu Niina, a Japanese woman, come back to her, she decides to leave the remote area and become an adventurer.

After a grueling journey, she arrives in the labyrinthine city of Garel, and tries to build her own house and enjoy living alone, but the officials tell her that people from other countries can't even live there permanently. Thinking, "If so, let's make a house where you can travel!", she remodels a used carriage and begins to make an ideal home.

Now begins the story of a girl who lives single-mindedly in a different world where her life depends on her skills!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/49971)
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Karada wa Jidou, Nakami wa Ossan no Nariagari Bokenki - Satera mo Tsuiteikimasu!
description:
When Satella was young, her parents were killed by monsters. One day while hoping that her peaceful daily life would continue, she met Gray Millard, the third son of a noble family. She was touched by Gray's determination to carve out a future for himself using advanced magic and special skills, despite the harsh punishment his stepmother meted out to him. 

She decides to go on an adventure with Gray, who had his sights set on the world.
tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Warrior Returns
description:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl... but... is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Despair Memory Gundam Sequel
description: It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam, which had protected the Earth during the Great War, was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world, there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".
tags: Sci-Fi, Mecha, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Supernatural

name: Tsuki wa Hitsuji wo Kazoenai
description:
Living in an unfortunate reality, schoolgirl Tachibana Himeka spends her days in despair...
Until one day, out of the blue, she is summoned to another world!
As she finally finds hope in being able to start anew, the reason she's given for being summoned is... to be the body pillow of the much too stunning imperial princess pretending to be a prince!?

A story about seeking love and a good night's sleep (?) from the author of "The Anemone Feels the Heat", Sakuragi Ren!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy

name: D.Gray-man
description:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."

After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Behemoth no Hanamuko
description:
More than ten years ago, the "aberrant beings" suddenly appeared all over the world. With forms similar to creatures from various legends and mythologies, these "aberrant beings" led countries to gather their best specialists to confront them... People called them "exorcists."

A young man named Tojuro, who works as an exorcist due to his family's circumstances, dreams of living an ordinary life. However, during one of his missions, he encounters Behemoth, a legendary sacred beast mentioned in ancient legends. But, despite being an "aberrant being," Behemoth does not have the appearance of a monstrous beast; instead, she takes the form of a beautiful woman.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Con Cafe Jou wa Koi wo Kiru
description: Our protagonist, Aisaka Tsumugu, is an aspiring fashion designer leading a quiet student life, when one day in Kabukichou, she runs into a con cafe waitress, changing her life. She now spends her days in an entirely different exciting new place.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Crime, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Outen no Mon
description:
Heian period Japan. The Fujiwara family is plotting to seize power at the court, when two maids suddenly go missing from the capital. The emperor fears that it is the work of a demon, and orders Ariwara no Narihira to work with a young man. The boy's name is Sugawara no Michizane.   
Sugawara no Michizane, a shut-in student, and Ariwara no Narihira, a Kyoto playboy, are twenty years apart in age. They are different in status and birth, yet work together to solve the mysteries of Kyoto!
tags: Historical, Mystery

name: Dragon Tofu
description: Toshiki and Kazu Fujiwara are brothers who live an ordinary life in an ordinary world working as insurance salesmen. While Toshiki is content with this salaryman life, Kazu strives to be part of a Guild: a registered group of individuals who hunt artifacts and capture criminals. After finishing up a quest, they begin to unravel the truth: that everything is not as normal as it once seemed.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Isourou Tenshi ~Hajimete no Chikyuu Seikatsu~
description: Mitsuhiro, who works for a loan shark, hits a girl on his way home. With no sign of movement or pulse, it seems all is lost. But then she suddenly comes back to life and stays at Mitsuhiro's house! It seems the girl is not human, and it's her first time living on Earth. Mitsuhiro ends up teaching her about "human life"...
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)

tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shura no Hakoniwa
description: There exist in the world monsters called _Utsuro_, the favourite food of which is the bioenergy _nectar_, possessed by girls not yet of age. Despite belonging to an organisation called _The Garden_ that works to fight these monsters, Iruka Natsumi lives her life deathly afraid of being eaten by them. Yet then, a girl boasting overwhelming power appears before her! Will they reach the age of nineteen, or will they be eaten by the monsters first!?
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Tomoaki Kanba admired his boyish childhood friend, Ibuki Tachibana, and promised to become "more cool" than her. However, four years have passed, and Ibuki has grown up to be an even more handsome girl! Their relationship is as unchanged as a 12cm height difference that cannot be filled...?

The curtain rises on a pure love story about a cool girl who is sorely in love with a boy who wants to be cool!-

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Forward!
description: Not found
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi, F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru ~Kensei to Matei, 2 Tsu no Zense wo motta Otoko no Eiyuutan~
description:
Yuri, the hero who saved the world, was called the Demon Emperor in his first reincarnation and the Sword Saint in his second. However he was considered a monster, and shunned by the people.

Yuri finally grows tired of this and resolves to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates once again in the world of the future. Immediately after his reincarnation, monsters start attacking him. As he quickly responds, Yuri acquires skills from his previous lives one after another, and annihilates the enemies in no time. Yuri eventually makes it to the guild, and while he possesses the ultimate powers of the Demon Emperor and Sword Saint, he begins his life as an F-rank budding adventurer.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Monica Everett is revered as "The Silent Witch." She's the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she's just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the "Seven Sages," and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Hanayome CB 100 Kei
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/2039224/series/269918)
tags: Romance, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Jarkray, the King of the Demon Realm. For thousands of years, he waged war against humanity, slaying countless heroes who challenged him. But at last, five female heroes with power surpassing even the Demon King appeared, driving Jarkray to the brink of defeat. Accepting his end, Jarkray offered them words of respect—calling them “five strong and beautiful warrior maidens.” In that instant, however, their demeanor completely changed. The truth was, after centuries of war, most men had perished, and these young women had absolutely no resistance to the presence of a male. Their maidenly hearts awakened, the five heroines abducted Jarkray… And thus, at the edge of the world where no one could disturb them, the Demon King’s bizarre “newlywed life” began.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
A man working at a black company[1] indulges in his only joy after returning home: playing the musou game[2] "Brave of Kingdom." Suddenly, a strange screen appears, and he finds himself reincarnated in another world!? 
In front of him is Selina, a female lieutenant in military uniform whom he has seen countless times in the game. And upon looking in a mirror what he see is a... muscular, bearded old man? Of all people, he has become the villainous General Zeorg, who is destined to be defeated by the hero! If he continues on like this, this fate awaits him.
 However, having survived the "modern hell" of being a corporate slave, he is unfazed by any tough situation! Armed with his gaming knowledge and corporate slave skills, he becomes the invincible General Zeorg and breaks the path to ruin!!

1: A Japanese originated term denoting a corporation infamous for exploiting its work force.
2: A sub-genre of hack and slash games where overpowered player characters slaughters hordes of weak NPC units and duels stronger named characters on a series of mostly open ended maps. (For e.g. the Dynasty Warriors series)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Bokura ni wa Bokura no Kotoba ga aru
description:
Aizawa Mashiro, the 'deaf' pitcher, and Nonaka Hiroaki, the 'hearing' catcher. 

A coming-of-age story about a high school battery that bridges the world of silence and the world of sound! 

At the entrance ceremony, Mashiro takes the stage as the school's first-ever 'integration student', introducing himself in sign language. Hiroaki shrugs it off, thinking it has nothing to do with him. Baseball's all he cares about, and he just stuff the sign language chart they handed out into his pocket. 

But after school, Mashiro showed up in front of Nonaka again at the baseball club hoping to join the team as a pitcher. Forced to form a battery with him, Nonaka thought, 'A guy like him's nothing but a dead weight.' 

However, when he caught the ball Mashiro threw straight at him, the words that came out of Nonaka's mouth was 'Nice ball...' 

That was the moment their story began.
tags: Sports, School Life

name: Not found
description: Kazuma Suzuki was just your average high schooler—until his childhood friend, Rua Takayashiki, a beautiful, sharp-tongued girl who also happened to be the granddaughter of the school chairman and the nation's top idol, cut all ties with him using a line straight out of a drama. Forced into submission for years as her so-called childhood friend, Kazuma decides it's finally time for his first-ever rebellion. He's done playing lapdog. This time, he's taking back his freedom—and aiming for a normal school life. Escaping a powerful beauty like her is easier said than done...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: A Blade at a Time
description:
In the flash of a moment!
If you teach martial arts to 100,000 warriors, only one or two of would become true swordsmen...
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Full Color

name: Gokigenyou, Ikkyoku Ikaga?
description: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?
tags: Traditional Games, Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Chinchin Devil o Oe!
description:
The adventurer An is hit by the Peepee Devil's beam and grows a thing. An's thing stands up out of anger at the Peepee Devil! The curtain opens on a violently crazy ☆ fantasy comedy!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70185)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
description: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Outo no Hazure no Renkinjutsushi ~Hazure Shokugyou Datta node, Nonbiri Omise Keiei Shimasu~
description: Daisy von Preslaria, born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians, was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job, Alchemist. Since this has happened, she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist! The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed, let alone failures, her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs, indulged herself in research, went harvesting, and opened a store.
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But... it was too late. The Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed Hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn't matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Captain Kid
description: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!
tags: Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone
description:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: What if you lost all your memories and were suddenly thrown into an unfamiliar world? And what if you couldn't understand a word the other person said……? In this new world, with this unknown girl. A survival communication story in a different world, starting from zero knowledge, begins!
tags: Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Slow Start
description: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.
tags: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is... he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
"This love shot up like a rocket."

Kinoshima Rocketry Club casually uploaded a test vlog of a test firing of their hybrid engine. The engine exploded — carrying away the dreams of reaching space with it — but that wasn't the only thing that exploded in that vlog. Madoi Ayame, from the engine section, who just so happened to appear in the vlog, also exploded in popularity when viewers from across the world found her cute. While she finds this bewildering, she actually has someone she wished found her cute...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Märchen Crown
description: Rapunzel is a young girl who lives atop a tall tower and knows nothing of the outside world. One day she meets a boy named Mikel, who climbs the tower, and their destiny to change the world begins to unfold!
tags: Romance, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Shunpei lives in a rural town of barely 3,000 people. Every day, he rides the same bus as his classmate An Takayagawa, the only one who went off to a private middle school. The two haven’t really talked since elementary school... until one day, something gives them a reason to.

A soft, sky-blue not-quite-love comedy, born on a bus for two.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Hayato is a young deity with a foul mouth who has always heard legends about Demons that were sealed away about 800 years ago. Follow the epic saga of several young deities, who end up having to fight demons, humans and overcome several challanges.  
  
  
A remake of a web manga of the same name with new art by Cool-Kyou Shinja.
tags: Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy

name: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu
description:
A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

---

Note: 
Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru

name: Saikyou Kizoku wa Shibou Flag wo Kutsugaesu
description:
High school student Namiki Hiroto found himself possessing, "Zeke Lagias" a character from "Wish Soul", a game that he had played many times. Zeke is the worst villain in the game, and no matter which route you take, he's a character whose death is certain... In order to survive, he tried fixing his personality, but he can only speak like a villain?!

"...If I really can't avoid making villain-like moves, then I just have to get stronger to survive!!"
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
I found myself possessed in a game I used to play occasionally.
And to top it off, I'm the female warrior of a barbarian tribe that only has bad endings.

...Alright, let's escape.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Ikemen Joshi to Josou Danshi
description: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: War of the Adults
description: What makes a 'proper adult'? Inspired by the words of his late father, Yutaro Urashima sought to become an upstanding member of society by developing and strictly adhering to his own "Articles of Adulthood." Little did he know, however, that those same articles would go on to dramatically change the world...
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Drama

name: Aliens, Baseball, and Civilization
description: Indifferent student Takatsugi-kun is living an uneventful life, until he meets Niina, a girl who's utterly obsessed with baseball. Though she seems to have nothing but baseball on her mind, Takatsugi finds himself drawn to her. Their relationship progresses smoothly... or does it?
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Isekai, Aliens

name: The Urban Legend Files
description: Mokume is a first-year college student and occult fanatic! She hunts down an older student, Kugutsu, who is rumored to attract urban legends of all kinds… What will happen when she joins the Occult Club?
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Ceres thought his life was over after being abruptly kicked out of the Hero’s party by the arrogant Hero Zect. Alone and dejected, he stumbles upon an unusual slave market, where he finds none other than the Hero’s own mother, Shizuko! Ceres has a thing for older women, and realizes that this is his chance to achieve a lifelong dream: Assembling a harem of MILFs!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu." Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru
description: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
tags: Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
For years, the commander of the knights, Warrena, has contributed to keeping the kingdom at peace. Despite surviving a year-long campaign, his fiancée, the third princess, became pregnant on top of having an affair. In order to cover up the family scandal, the royal family declared that Warrena had passed away during the campaign.

He gives up on his kingdom out of despair and decides to use his compensation money to live a slow and leisurely life in the countryside. One by one, he encounters a saint and a fox girl, and they eventually end up falling for him. However, he himself has a reason why he can’t fall in love with them…?!

A fantasy story about the rise of the strongest old man who was exiled from the kingdom!
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
My first “friends-with-benefits” was also the first person I ever fell in love with.

Kiyotaka Sano and Tamaki Aihara — two people with basically zero romantic experience — accidentally match on a dating app and end up becoming FWB.

They both fall for each other.

But they each convince themselves that if they don't keep acting like “calm, casual adults,” the other will throw them away.

So even as they keep sleeping together... they can't seem to let their hearts get any closer—
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - A Day of KazuMegu (Doujinshi)
description: A parody of ["This Croc Will Die In 100 Days"](https://mangadex.org/title/44625/this-croc-will-die-in-100-days)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Doujinshi, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
A charming love story about two young women who together discover that their dreams of a heart-pounding romance can indeed come true!

Yuu has always loved *shoujo* manga and fantasizes about the day that she too will get a love confession that will send her heart a-flutter. Yet when a male classmate confesses his feelings for her... she feels nothing. Disappointed and confused, Yuu enters high school still unsure how to respond. That’s when Yuu sees the beautiful student council president Nanami turn down a suitor with such maturity and finesse that Yuu is inspired to ask her for advice. But when the next person to confess to Yuu is the alluring Nanami herself, has Yuu's *shoujo* romance finally begun?

---
**Notes:**
* The author worked on one of the chapters in the anthology (Vol.2 Ch.13); check it out after finishing this manga for some extra content
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Koiiro no Kyoukai
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Fan Colored Version of Original.

Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Fan Colored, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

"On February 1st, 2000. The entire man research staff of Shicksals Babylon facility in Siberia disappeared overnight. While Theresa investigates this mystery under orders from Otto, Walter and Einstein make preparation for *her* appearence. The stage is set for the second Honkai Impact."

Arc is completed in CN and by official MiHoYo manga team - HOMU Comics.

name: Mother Parasite
description:
Miki Ryouta, a junior high school student, appears to be getting along well with his single mother, but behind the scenes she's terrified of her son's every move and for good reason—he's secretly keeping track of every mistake she makes. His classmate Kasai Kaoru is fed up with his overprotective parents instead and thinks it's his mother's fault that he is bullied. One day, Ryouta saves Kaoru from being bullied, and the two have their first conversation...
___
**Alt Official English:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0005)
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: Shibou Yuugi de Meshi wo Kuu.
description:
Player Name: Yuki
Age: 17
Profession: Death Games

A huge amount of money, with lives on the line.
Participants? Beautiful girls only.

A deadly showbiz where people die.
These death games are her calling and her reason to live.

For some reason she knows: This is where she belongs.
Elegant. Ruthless.

Cutting through the dazzling gauntlet of death.
Playfully. Desperately.

Aiming for the unprecedented "99 Consecutive Wins"!
tags: Action, Survival, Gore, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Honkai Impact 3rd
description:
The definitive source of lore, background, and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd, a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.

*History:*
- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

---

Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters, monstrous creatures, plagues, and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.

---

+++ Extraneous information
**Contributor note:** There currently is an ongoing cleanup with the goal of moving each book to it's own title. Help would be appreciated [[Link](https://forums.mangadex.org/threads/honkai-impact-3rd-data-fixing-cleanup.1071951)]

**Volume Guide (by chronological order):**
Volume | Status | Year/Era | Details
:- | :- | :- | :-
0.01 | Done | Ancient Era | !!Fu Hua's Empyrean tales!!
0.011 | New + Ongoing | Ancient Shenzhou | Blade of the Empyrean
0.1 | Done | 1476 AD. | Elan Palatinus. !!1470: After a disastrous Crusade, Schicksal attempted to seek power elsewhere while - Kallen Kaslana, the greatest Valkyrie of her time, began to question their actions.!!
0.2 | Done | 2000 CE. | Second Eruption. !!2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.!!
0.21 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Gemini - Origin
0.3 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Azure Waters. !!2012: Bronya Zaychik, the Silver Wolf of the Urals, finds herself adopted by Cocolia in her orphanage. Bronya would later befriend Seele, unaware of the tragedy that lays in wait for them.!!
1 | Done | 2014 CE. | Escape from Nagazora
2 | Done | 2014 CE. | St. Freya High
3 | Done | 2014 CE. | Sakura Samsara. !!Theresa's innate eight-fold cherry blossom stigma malfunctioned and caused her to fall into a coma. To wake their principal, Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile, Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.!!
4 | Done | 2014 CE. | Final Samsara. !!A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma, and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster, or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?!!
5 | Done | 2014 CE. | AE Invasion. !!Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?!!
6 | Done | 2014 CE. | Moon Shadow. !!Fu Hua and Kiana goes to Singapore to recover a rogue scientist and a stolen gem, unaware of the terrible things that might happen.!!
.22 | ? | 2016(?) | Gemina Invasions (Comedy)
7.1 | Done | 2015 CE. | London Holiday. !!Durandal gets a holiday as a reward for her hardwork, while a mysterious force known as the World Serpent tries hard to defend a hidden Divine Key.!!
8 | Done | 2015 CE. | Second Key. !!Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.!!
9 | Ongoing | 2005 / 2029 CE. | Alien Space. !!Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.!!

Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

description:
Falsely accused of poisoning a noble, Sherry heads into the forest to escape her pursuers. There, she meets a vampire who accidentally injures her in his hunger. Feeling guilty, he tells her that he'll do anything to get her forgiveness. Seeing this as a chance to rise out of misfortune, she tells him she wishes to be his bride. She uses various means to get him to fall in love with her, but who will actually be the one to fall first?!

description:
Millie is reincarnated as a baby with memories of her previous life.However, at the age of five months, she is abandoned in the cold...! She was picked up by Joe and Marissa who happened to be passing by, and her life was saved, but the life of the common people in another world that awaits her is quite severe.... She finds herself in a dirty room full of dust and stains, without the delicious food she had in her previous life! The couple's restaurant and inn, "Cat's Pavilion in the Shade of the Trees," is in financial trouble! In order to return the favor she was given, she changes the store with her cheat magic and knowledge from her previous life...the long-awaited comic book version of the popular web novel!

name: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e 2-nensei-hen 2nd Stage
description:
Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School—a dream-like school that boasts a 100% college and job placement rate, and provides 100,000 yen worth of points every month.

However, its true nature was a "meritocracy" where only a select few of the most academically successful students received favorable treatment.

Ayanokoji and the others, who belong to Class D, known as the "last refuge for failures," somehow managed to advance to the second year.
But their joy was short-lived, as they were at the mercy of the first-year students in a special exam held soon after the new school year began.

Furthermore, figures who are moving in the shadows to take down Ayanokoji have appeared, including those involved in "a top-secret exam communicated to only a few students" and "assassins from the White Room."

This work is a sequel to the comic series Classroom of the Elite: Year 2

It has been more than ten years since Holo and Lawrence, who became a happily married couple after completing their long journey to send the Wisewolf back home, opened the bathhouse Spice and Wolf in the hot spring resort of Nyohhira. 

This is a story of continued happiness spun in the bathhouse, which is said to bring happiness and laughter.

---

Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…

*Source: Kodansha Comics, Vol. 1*

Gaikaku, a genius mage with unparalleled magical prowess, lives in quiet seclusion under the employ of a gluttonous regional lord, Borick. While earning pocket change through secretive assignments, he devotes himself freely to magical research, surrounded by a diverse group of girls from various races. However, after taking down a certain elite elf, his incredible talents as a mage begin to draw attention across the land...?!

name: Show Me Your Bust
description:
University student Kang Ji-ho, accidentally saw Seon Woo-hui's breasts at a drinking party, and avoids her because she couldn't resist the desire to see them again. 

"Just give it to me straight. Why are you avoiding me?" 
“…If I tell you straight up, won’t you get angry?” 
"No. If you don't tell me, I'll kill you." 

I-I mean...

“When I look at you… I keep wanting to see your boobs…” 

At first, she thought it was a joke. But when she realized it wasn’t, Woo-hui decided to pull a mean prank. 

"Shall I show you my boobs?" 
“…Do you want to touch it?”

As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???

name: Watari Tori to Katatsumuri
description: Unpei Mochizuki is a second-year employee of a machine parts wholesaler. One day, he makes a mistake that causes trouble for his clients, and he is troubled by the thought of "going somewhere far away..." where no one knows him. She is a picture book author with a baby face, glasses, and an unknown age, who travels with her dog in her car. They spend their days traveling together, and they use the car as their "Sumika" (dwelling place). They sleep in the car and begin a new form of travel, free from the constraints of time.

description: A one-shot that appeared in September 1968 issue of Garo [ガロ]. This was reworked in 1973 in an issue of COM that can be found in My Devil Comes.

name: Golden Kamuy
description:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

name: Yowamushi Pedal
description:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn't have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.

Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.

Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?
___
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**
___
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

name: Waves Upon Waves
description:
there's an old legend in Sereong's family: their flute 'Manpa' will turn into a person if you care for it with enough love! But Sereong doesn't believe in this legend and plans to sell Manpa.... But it was then when Manpa turns into a human and tells Sereong he can grant her wish.

A romance between one who grants miracles and one who doesn't believe in miracles.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Tensei Mae no Tutorial de Isekai Saikyou ni Narimashita. - Junbishi Sugite Daini no Jinsei wa Easy Mode desu!
description:
One day, a 33-year-old man who spent all his time playing video games to escape reality from an unreasonable life of bullying and power harassment died. However, he was chosen as a candidate for reincarnation to another world, but the woman who guided him to his reincarnation told him that she would not give him any cheats. Instead of cheats, he was offered three months of training at an otherworldly reincarnation training facility. The training facility was supposed to make it relatively easy to acquire skills, but what would he accomplish in three short months? He was given an Appraisal and an Item Box as bonus skills, but he was thrown into the training facility before he could even begin to set up his prowess.

He spent three months in the training facility, desperately training to survive his new life. But after 3 months, after 1 year, after 10 years, he was not reincarnated. He was worried he might have gone to the infinite hell of the game world since he died from playing too much video games, but he still trained desperately. In fact, he never thought that the reincarnation process was not completed due to a mistake made by the female guide. After all, when 15 years of training had passed, the information about reincarnation came unexpectedly. The man who had already become a cheat bastard to the point of killing an ancient dragon was trying his best to enjoy the other world in a normal way.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
description:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

According to reviews, it stands out among other System/Transmigration novels and has even been compared to Lord of the Mysteries for its similarities. It’s also said to have strong worldbuilding and character development, assuming the adaptation does it justice.

The heroine, Wei Qingyu, changes her own feelings towards her enemy when faced with her abrupt change of character. She’s even gradually starting to like this “enemy”? The perfect heroine is always trying to possess the female villain, but when will she notice that the other’s heart has already been moved?

Nakayama, a high schooler with an extreme case of germophobia, just wants to enjoy his own peaceful time in a perfectly clean space, away from everyone else. But his quiet life is constantly thrown into chaos by Nishino, the cheerful, albeit messy girl who just so happens to sit next to him.
*"Don’t pollute my sanctuary!"*
*"Don’t mess with my alone time!"*
Despite his desperate pleas, the madness continues.
It’s a chaotic, heart-thumping romcom between a cleanliness-obsessed boy and a carefree high school girl!

He doesn't realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her. The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.

 The curse that he was given when he was young kills everyone he has given affection to and even threatens his own life. However, Cheongdo, who cannot give up his will to live, expects a final miracle from Yoo Chanran, who can solve any problem.
"How much is it? 
"Starts at 100,000 won per hour."
tags: Boys' Love, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Tobioriyou to Shiteiru Joshikousei wo Tasuketara Dou Naru no Ka?
description: Yusuke Yuki, who has spent his entire high school life studying and working part-time in order to keep his special student tuition exemption, finds himself desperately desiring a girlfriend. On his way home, he looks up and accidentally sees a girl attempting to jump off the roof of an abandoned building. A strange encounter leads to a new way of life and a love story with the mysterious girl named Kotori Hatsushiro.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Watashi no Tamashii wo Tabete Kudasai!
description:
Yuu, a plain and exhausted office worker stuck in a soul-crushing black company, dies and is reincarnated as a young girl with horns. To her surprise, she encounters Ajisai, a beautiful beast-woman, and ends up “sharing her soul” with her… through a deep, passionate kiss!

Even as her life force is being drained, Yuu feels a nervous thrill around the alluring Ajisai and a growing sense of fulfillment in being able to give herself to someone else. As for Ajisai, who initially saw Yuu as nothing more than a meal, she slowly begins to open her heart.
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Demons, Animals, Romance, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Love Live! flowers* - Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club -
description: Hinoshita Kaho, who enrolled in Hasunozora Girls Academy (commonly known as Hasunozora) with high hopes of "blooming" in her high school life, helps Murano Sayaka, who is enthusiastic about "changing herself" from high school, when she slips on the stairs at Kanazawa Station on her first day of school. By coincidence, the two are classmates at the same school! Kaho and Sayaka, who have become friends, witnessed performances by Otomune Kozue and Yugiri Tsuzuri respectively! While still excited, she is invited to join the Hasunozora Girls Academy School Idol Club --!?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music

name: Sensou wa Onna no Kao wo Shiteinai
description:
Based on *The Unwomanly Face of War* by [Svetlana Alexievich](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Svetlana_Alexievich), which can be bought [here](https://www.amazon.com/dp/0399588744).

In *The Unwomanly Face of War*, Alexievich chronicles the experiences of the Soviet women who fought on the front lines, on the home front, and in the occupied territories. These women—more than a million in total—were nurses and doctors, pilots, tank drivers, machine-gunners, and snipers. They battled alongside men, and yet, after the victory, their efforts and sacrifices were forgotten.
___
**Supervisor:** [Hayami Rasenjin](https://mangadex.org/author/2bd63053-4100-4118-b7bc-d8e3a1fe4f78)
tags: Historical, Psychological, Survival, Military, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Tashika ni Watashi wa, Oyomesan ga Hoshii to Iimashita
description:
An unasked for love story between a cross-dressing prince who came to get marry and a cross-dressing miko who was rejected by the hero!

I was summoned to another world, and after defeating the Demon King, I was exhausted. As soon as I returned to the royal palace, I was rejected by the heroes and treated as a nuisance, and so I spent my days training to become a knight with the extra strength I was given during the summoning ceremony.

One day, a fellow knight asked me, "Is there anything you want?"
So I answered, "I want a wife."

That was obviously a joke though!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Reborn to Choose a Playboy Father to become Emperor
description:
In a previous life, Song Shihuan returns after ten years of exile to be recognized as the heir to the crown prince's family. But despised by her entire family because she was prophesied to be a star of misfortune, she ends up dying at the hands of her own sister.
When she is reborn on the very day of her recognition, she decides to change everything and asks the emperor for a new father.
From among the choices offered, she chooses the eldest prince, known for being a hedonistic playboy.
Taking her destiny and that of her new father into her own hands, she gradually helps him climb the steps to become emperor!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Mokuyoubi no Furutto
description: Furutto is a cat that leads a double life. On one hand, he's the companion of a young woman in an apartment building named Kujirai, who feeds him (when she hasn't gambled away her meager manga-assistant's paycheck) and spends time with him in her apartment. On the other hand, he wants to keep his street cred as a stray cat and spends a good amount of time hanging out with the other strays, trying to steal food out of trash cans and rumbling with the cats from the next town over.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: An unfortunate heroine appeared before me. It seems that this world is an otome game, and I am just an unnamed mob priest who appears briefly in the early stages. I could fulfill my role as a mob and quickly exit the game, but… wait a minute, if things go on like this, the heroine is going to face terrible hardships. To save this cute and kind yet unfortunate heroine, I have no choice but to train her myself!
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: At Seiryo High School, where second-year student Minato Ichijo attends, there is a girl known as the “Cold Princess.” Her name is Rei Nanase. With her stunning beauty and exceptional talents, many admire her—yet she rejects all advances with an icy attitude. Minato, however, has little interest in romance due to personal reasons. Even though Rei sits next to him in class and works part-time at the same café, he pays her no special attention. One day, Minato stumbles upon Rei in a back alley, quarreling with a persistent man he recognizes as a customer who had been turned down by her at the café. Acting on impulse, he steps in to help. The very next day after work, Rei unexpectedly appears in the staff room—despite not being scheduled—and suddenly demands a kiss from Minato… Thus begins Minato’s bewildering days, swept up by a slightly offbeat kuudere young lady.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Parallel Paradise
description: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
"Juliana, your fiancé has been decided.”
At that moment, the frail daughter of an earl awakened to a shocking truth—within her resided the soul of the infamous "Cold-Hearted Emperor" Julius. A man whose ruthless conquests left behind mountains of corpses and an empire under his iron rule. 

Now, reborn as a delicate young noble girl, Julius finds himself in a seemingly peaceful era. But beneath the surface lurk corruption, poverty, and disease, all exploited by scheming villains. With the wisdom and might of a former emperor, Juliana will not stand idly by. The young lady who once ruled as a tyrant is ready to cleanse the empire once more—this time, with her tiny hands. 

A dark yet thrilling tale of power, justice, and a battle against the hidden evils of the empire begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ore to Seijo ga Dekiteru Koto ga Baretara Kono Party wa Houkai suru
description:
Rin, the gloomy-type mage, somehow ends up in a secret relationship with the party’s sweetheart, Sophia.

But for certain reasons, no one must ever find out.

Caught between “We can’t get caught!” and “But I still wanna do it!” Rin’s heart is ready to explode!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: The surefire way to win a rom-com is always the same! It’s being able to say "I love you!"
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: Arisa Kumagai, age 27. Works earnestly at her new job as an interior design salesperson. Lives in an apartment overflowing with self-improvement books. Meets unpleasant rumors from her coworkers and superiors with a smile. Arisa tries, and she tries, and she tries. But what comes after that…?
tags: Oneshot

name: Not found
description: The hearts of the hero's party have grown weary. A world where humans and demons are at war. The heroes have been facing deadly battles while they're being hailed as valiant heroes by the townspeople. The Sage, Sofia, places her hope on Hoshino, a psychological counselor that transported from modern Japan, and believes that she can bring salvation to them.
