Her psychotherapy slowly but surely changes the hearts of the heroes, and soon it brings tremendous change to their world...
tags: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Kiite kuremasu yo ne? Senpai
description:
One day, the most beautiful girl in school suddenly shows up at Kento Ikuno's door. She shows him a "ticket" written in awkward handwriting. This is the start of a romantic comedy about a "ticket to do anything I say" that came from his childhood.

[Alternative Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60455)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Witch of Ice and Snow Has No Time For ××
description:
To become a witch, you must be willing to pay the price...
Iveta became a witch, but it cost parts of her body turning to ice. If she gets too close to heat, she might just melt away! She doesn't think there's anything wrong with her, but when she comes into contact with her courier, Sosuke, her body starts to throb!? Could this feeling be fatal?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Koiseyo Meoto.
description: We married for convenience. But we're already Mom and Dad. We have secrets. We play around elsewhere. We're practically invisible to each other now. But my husband... my wife... I love them so much...!!!!! All those marital problems flooding society? Bring it on!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Closed Fourth Floor
description: Lin Nan is a newly hired Chinese teacher at Jie Lao High School. Timid by nature, she came alone to Jie Lao City to prove to her family that she could live well even without their care. But not long after arriving, she became entangled in a murder case! What will Lin Nan do?
tags: Long Strip, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Full Color

name: I'm a Mom
description: A world full of zombies, where my daughter lives. "Don't worry, dear.. Mommy will protect you, even if l become a monster...!"
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Live Dungeon!
description: An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The World Is Mine
description: Meet Mon, a violent killer faithful only to his own eruptive desires, and his timid companion Toshi, a demolition-devil with a fanatical thirst for destruction. Their killing-spree across Japan is destined to intersect the path of the enormous "Higumadon," a mysterious beast on a Godzilla-like rampage from Hokkaido to Tokyo.
tags: Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: VS EVIL
description: Meet Asahi, a female college student possessed by a vengeful spirit without any of his memories among the living! This is the struggle of the two of them searching for his missing memories, a new-age über-stylish ghost battle manga!
tags: Action, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi, Bannou e to Itaru~
description: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Majo to Youhei
description:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
In a matriarchal world where women dominate and men are treated as lesser beings, Kureto was cast aside at birth for the sin of being born male. He scraped by as an orphan, unwanted and powerless—until the day his unique skill awakened. A "supreme virility" skill that strengthens him with every act shared with a woman.

Under the guise of "training" with his dorm caretaker, Kureto masters his newfound power, achieving strength no man should possess. When he's accepted into the elite Knight Academy—a school meant for noble-born women—he sees a chance to change his fate. To become an honorable knight, to reclaim his dignity, Kureto will fight—both in the arena and between the sheets—against the very women who once looked down on him.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Ore no Level Up ga Okashii! ~Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei~
description:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do, the stronger I get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Kujibiki Tokushou: Musou Harem-ken
description: I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A humble man in his thirties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists! He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll. As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily. And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest! What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Reincarnated in another world, Sao acquires the class of Rod Master! However, he uses that special ability not to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all his might!
___
**Character Designer:** [Kubocha](https://mangadex.org/author/cc505e53-8402-47d3-9c69-551552ae73aa)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Manga serialization of the doujinshi work with the same name.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ~Koushaku-ka wo Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru wo Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru~
description:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one's life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance...
___
**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bocchi Jieikan no Isekai Funsenki
description: Jinguji Jo, an officer candidate of the Self-Defense Force, who had just graduated from the University of Defense, was reincarnated into a different world due to a traffic accident. The inventory had the standard equipment of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force! Jinguji Jo's self-defense officer battle action makes him unrivaled in the fantasy world with equipment stronger than magic!!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Sakigake no Hana Miko
description: There is a group of beautiful girls who fight against the "gods of calamity" who bring misfortune to people. They are called "flower shrine maidens" and live together in the "Night District Castle". Arata, a mere part-time high school teacher, decides to become the chief of the flower shrine maidens after the death of his father. However, organizing a group of flower shrine maidens full of unique and problematic characters is more difficult than he imagined...
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: High school teacher Shibasaki was well-liked by everyone around her because of her kind personality and the genuine care she showed towards her students. One day, she witnesses a scene where a girl named Masono, who was not attending school, is being bullied—and decides that she needs to help her. Shibasaki goes to Masono's house to try to talk to her, but the words she hears back are completely unexpected...!?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life

name: Qiang Jin Jiu (2024)
description:
During the Xiande period of the Dazhou dynasty, the Prince of Jianxing, Shen Wei, suffered defeat at the Chashi river in the northeast, leading to the Six Prefectures of Zhongbo almost falling to external foes. Shen Zechuan, meanwhile, was arrested and taken to the capital, to be the target of everyone's hatred as the surviving villain. When the young son of the Prince of Libei, Xiao Chiye, heard the news, he came and delivered a ruthless blow that nearly cost Shen Zechuan his life. Unexpectedly, the latter, who had seemed weak, was actually quite fierce, turning around and biting him, causing the former to bleed profusely. Henceforth, an enmity developed between the two, with the strife continuing both within and outside the court. Amidst this open and secret conflict, the true reason for Shen Wei's defeat was surprisingly discovered.

---
**Note:**
- After a huge backlash about the character design, the series has been undergoing a revision with a new art style, This title contains the revised version.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Boy of Death
description:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun
description: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament... His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He'll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he's human... Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy

name: Reincarnation Coliseum: The Weakest Skill Conquers the Strongest Women and Creates a Harem
description: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Uruwashi Maria, a student at the Hananomiya private academy is a strong-willed and selfish "villainess." Her life is on easy mode and she has no enemies, but one day the memories of her past life come to her. Suddenly she remembers that in her previous life she was a normal high school girl. And she’s seen this life of hers play out before in a manga she read in her previous life! According to memories of her past life, Maria is killed by somebody in the manga. "And I don't know who did it because I died before I could read the ending!"  
  
Can Maria avoid her death and find happiness?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Rakujitsu no Pathos
description:
What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush?

Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: Mizudako-chan kara wa Nigerarenai!
description: Akigai Kanisuke is an ordinary high school boy. His daily life changes when Mizuda Yuuko (a.k.a. Mizudako-chan), a demi-human girl, transfers to his school.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Garuru Girl
description: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu
description: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap, he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake, Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Starting Gate! Uma Musume Pretty Derby
description: A manga part of the Uma Musume Project by Cygames, a game and an anime. It follows Special Week, an aspiring horsegirl athlete-idol, as she transfers in to the Traincent Academy to follow her dreams.
tags: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Confession
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Full Color

name: Umamusume - Pretty Derby PisuPisu☆SupiSupi - Golshi-chan
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
"Will you be my childhood friend?"

Kaede always wished for a childhood friend like in the manga she reads. When she moved next door to her classmate, Kouhei, he said he’d do anything to help her out. So, she asked him to be her childhood friend! The two of them have fun adventures recreating all of the things that childhood friends should do!
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Koiseyo Kimono Otome
description: Momo Nonomura lives with her family in Osaka. Enjoying a day off from work is going out with a kimono inherited from the grandmother who passed away. On a holiday in in March, I fell in love with a man at a long-established coffee shop in Kyoto who was sitting alone.
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Mexico, and Brazil only.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Male Lead Is Obsessed With My Health
description:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Fire Punch
description:
In the not-too-distant past, the Ice Witch blanketed the world in snow, starvation and madness, leading the inhabitants to seek their salvation in fire. With that, an unusual destiny unfolds for two young orphans, Agni and Luna, blessed with the ability to regenerate. But will this ability prove to be more of a curse than a blessing?

Nominee for the 2017 Manga Taisho Award.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Anata ga Watashi wo Terasu kara.
description:
Kanomata Akie's dream is to fall in love, so she enrolls at Sakuraba Academy, a high school famous for its couples' festival, to make her dream a reality. Then, on her very first day, under the falling cherry blossoms, her springtime begins.

A comedy about two girls who try to win the couples' festival and become their school's top couple!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: NakiNagi
description: A quiet witch meets a girl in love. Nakika was once a feared with of the deep sea, but has started a life on the surface to learn about "human emotions." Nagisa is a naive romantic and Nakika's best friend—and although she might not always understand Nagisa's infatuation, her compassion for Nagisa is deeper than the Pacific Ocean! As she uses her magical powers to support Nagisa's quest for love, she gradually learns about "human emotions."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Netoge no Yome ga Ninki Idol datta ~Cool kei no Kanojo wa Genjitsu demo Yome no Tsumori de Iru~
description: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Minamino Chinatsu is a beautiful girl who's incredibly popular and easygoing. Ever since I met her in the fall of my first year of high school, my life has been anything but ordinary. It all changed when another guy with the same name as me showed up at school – a handsome one, no less – and suddenly my classmates started calling me 'Number Two.'

"You're not 'Number Two' to me," she said. "Besides, it's me who wants to kiss you first."

My relationship with Chinatsu goes beyond just school. We play street basketball after class, cook meals together, share secrets, and even grow physically closer. I thought I was fine being alone, but she accepts me for who I am. And because of that, I want to give her the same in return.

This is a coming-of-age love story about realizing how precious even the simplest desires can be.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~
description:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?
tags: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Fate/Grand Order -turas réalta-
description:
"The human race will become extinct in 2017." The Chaldea organization, an organization charged with preserving the future of humanity, observes a singularity. To solve it, Rika Fujimaru and Mash Kyrielight will be transported to the city of Fuyuki in 2004.
___
**Note**: This manga adapts the first, third, fifth, seventh and final singularity from Part 1 of Fate/Grand Order.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Flawed Almighty
description: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Boku Ni Wa Onee-Chan Ga Sannin Imasu (Jisshitsu)
description: Not found
tags: Incest, Shota, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: WITCHRIV
description: A girl named Nona lives in plain sight among humans, hiding her true identity as a mage as she spends her days in peace with her best friend Lovi. But one day, Nona uses magic to fix Lovi's glasses and subsequently catches the attention of the Bureau of Magic Surveillance. A simple good deed becomes the trigger that sets Nona's destiny in motion...
tags: Action, Survival, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Qi, swords, martial artists… and robots and spaceships?! The year is 3077, thousands of years after the heyday of the martial arts realm. Humanity inhabits the stars, governed by interstellar martial arts organizations who kept the old ways of the realm alive: might makes right! For bounty hunters like Seryeong, Robert, and Sunja, this means trouble is good for business, except when they bite off more than they can chew. After venturing to the irradiated wasteland of Earth for a top bounty, only to find a 2,000-year-old martial artist instead, they realize their fortunes are about to change…
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Ojousama no Shimobe
description: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Carneades
description: In this world there are 5 different races: Angels, Demons, Beastkin, Vampires, and Humans. Among them, Elle, an angel boasting immense power, belongs to the Angel Police. Having a strong sense of Justice in her heart, she is strict with both herself and others and diligently carries out her duties. One day, Elle, because she is a member of the Angel Police Elite Force, is ordered to capture the timid demon Eve. Elle ends up chasing Eve who is a bit of a problem child who manages to escape from prison every time she is caught! Moreover, both Eve's ability to swiftly escape and her strong summon beasts make it quite difficult for her to be captured! While she is chasing Eve, she gets caught up in an outrageous incident!!
tags: Action, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~
description:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Outsider Paradise
description:
From the author of Asobi Asobase comes a new comedy series, about… the Art Club from Asobi Asobase.

Oficial chapter 1 RAW: https://comic-action.com/episode/14079602755364921618

Due to health problems, the author said that the work would be on hiatus (from December 2024).
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Spacedrum
description:
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens

name: Kimi ga Shinu made Koi wo Shitai
description:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Kill monsters, save your neighbors, and expand your domain, all from the comfort of your couch. When his city becomes infested with monsters, Jaehyeon discovers an ability that makes him the absolute master of his apartment building. But his ability comes with a catch -- he cannot leave his apartment. Now, he must arm his neighbors and lead them beyond their building to survive the post-apocalyptic world they find themselves in.
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Gyakusatsu Happy End: Ao no Shou
description: Ao Minato, a young man who killed his father-in-law who repeatedly abused his family and entered a juvenile reformatory. However, the sister who should have protected committed suicide at the end of suffering, and her sister Akane is also missing. Ao, who arrived at a certain shrine, wished for the safety of his sister, which is the only hope left, and swears to God that he will do anything for that ... The blockbuster panic suspense "Massacre Happy Ending". The new chapter is finally opening---.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
This series is named after the James Bond film For Your Eyes Only. Aston Machan has a condition that only her trainer is able to see her, how do they break out of this predicament?

Buy on [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/home-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ01082064.html)
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Doujinshi, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Innocent
description:
In the 18th century, seeking "freedom and equality", the event that became the starting point of modern French society, the French Revolution, began. There was one more protagonist that lived within the darkness, Henry Charles Sanson. He was the fourth generation family head of the Sanson Family, and executioner of Paris.  
This is the historie of him nobly facing the harsh fate.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: Otr of the Flame
description:
The world is encased in winter due to the advances of the Ice Kingdom. Kind-hearted Otr, who dreams of being a warrior like his dad, has been entrusted with keeping the fires burning as a cook in the fortress. But when the fortress is attacked by the demonic army of the Ice Kingdom, the people and the flame are in danger of being snuffed out. Can Otr awaken a power that can turn the tide?

(MANGA Plus)
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Gorae Byul - The Gyeongseong Mermaid
description: "If the life that you had regained, was one that I had breathed back into you… Is it too much to hope for you to love me back with that life?" The year is 1926, in Japan-occupied Joseon. 17-year-old Soo-a is an illiterate handmaiden working for the household of a prominent Japanese collaborator. One day, she discovered an injured young man lying unconscious at the beach, an independence activist called Eui-hyeon. The sweet and innocent Soo-a nursed him back to health, and Eui-hyeon told her the tale of the "Little Mermaid", a princess of the sea who saved a prince from his death. Having fallen in love with Eui-hyeon, Soo-a was determined to meet him once again. But she knew not then, of the fate that awaited the "Little Mermaid" on her quest to reunite with her beloved.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Isekai Neko to Fukigen na Majo
description: In her youth, Jeanne was a powerful witch who vanquished the evil Demon King and saved the world—but over time, the people she rescued have forgotten her. Now she is a lonely old woman living in a secluded forest…until she accidentally summons a cat from Earth to her home! The former city kitty is now gigantic and must acclimate to this new world. Can a cat from another world soothe the loneliness of the forgotten witch?
tags: Animals, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Black Dragon
description:
A dragon once existed, in the distant past but is now known as a myth...
14 years ago, Inoue Hikari, the emperor of the Hikari clan and a member of the 10 Emperors, declared war on the other 9 clans holding the world in balance.
After the bloodshed, he emerged victorious, and since then has ruled over the world as the supreme emperor.
Himura Daichi is an orphan boy who is determined to put an end to the colonial rule of the Hikari clan, and get revenge for the pain and suffering caused by their emperor.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Military, Gore, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Once upon a time, there was a witch named Elaina, who set off on a journey across the world. Along the way, she would meet all kinds of people, from a country full of witches to a giant in love with his own muscles—but with each meeting, Elaina would become a small part of their story, and her own world would get a little bit bigger.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Akasha as **The Journey of Elaina** (2022)
tags: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Ankoku Delta
description: In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
A man suddenly found himself standing alone on a mountain filled with plants and creatures he'd never seen before. Transported to another world with nothing but the clothes on his back, he wasn’t granted any convenient otherworldly bonuses. His wish isn't to become a hero or to build a harem, but simply to “live safely”. This is the story of a man who survives in another world using only his “Comprehension” as his weapon!
___
**Character Designer:** [Hitaki Yuu](https://mangadex.org/author/a05343f6-4b94-4f34-bc99-f6321e00745c)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: An online comic by Ishida Sui of Tokyo Ghoul about a gorilla living his last day.
tags: Animals, 4-Koma, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Godzilla Galaxy Odyssey
description:
Japan's greatest disaster, the King of the Monsters Godzilla, attacks Young Champion! The battle between mankind, Godzilla, and a new space Kaiju begins! What will become of Earth?
___
**Godzilla Designer:** [Nishikawa Shinji](https://mangadex.org/author/c45309c6-604d-42c8-915a-f7246f2323ed)
**Space Monster Designer:** [Maruyama Hiroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/8ef8a70e-27e8-4462-9fe5-0739a06f5840)

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/g_comic_yc)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action

name: Gwijjal Romance
description: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!
tags: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Devilman Lady
description:
Fudou Jun is a highschool teacher and takes a trip with a group of students. While there, a group of martial artists staying nearby take a strange interest in the girls.  
These men are actually demons and after changing into their true form break into the cabin to rape the girls. One gets Jun and violates her.  
She feels her soul being torn apart and transforms into Devilman Lady. With newfound powers and strength she kills all the demons and protects the girls from any further harm.  
What are these demons and why did she turn into a hybrid of one? What does this mean for her and for the rest of humanity?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Girls' Love, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: My Avatars’ Path to Greatness
description:
Seonghyeon Han is a victim of a violent crime that left him with impaired legs and a fear of the outside world. Now, he faces an even greater challenge: while he gained the power to create clones, he has just 24 hours before being sent to another dimension.

As the countdown ticks down, Seonghyeon makes a desperate move -- he sends his clone through the interdimensional portal, and discovers his real body can remain safe at home.

Thus begins the epic tale of Seonghyeon's... clones.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: My Boyfriend Is a God
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Junpei Ichinose, a student at a magic school in Tokyo, is a dropout who has never discovered his magic aptitude. Suddenly, the beautiful witch Meryl appears before him and tells him, "I need your power, reincarnation of the Demon King." Junpei finds out that he has the power of the Demon King, and his secret is revealed to Sonia, a beautiful girl who is a descendant of a brave warrior. Junpei, who has no intention of becoming a Demon King, persuades Sonia to teach him how to use his power properly. However, the Demon King's power is the strongest and worst "erotic magic"!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai's time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi's orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school... Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It
description:
Moon king, Su Liang! The invincible youth who commands the Moon God Flash Butterfly—a divine entity capable of rewinding time and reversing the laws of yin and yang—to reign supreme over this world! To think I’d transmigrate here and get handed such an overpowered identity card… a heavenly golden finger from the start, right? WRONG! The beast inside me isn’t the legendary Moon God Flash Butterfly at all! It’s just the lowest-tier, weakest Flash Butterfly… a glorified glowstick with wings!

Now, staring down millions of fanatical devotees, a three-year deathmatch with the Cang Yue Emperor, and every major sect plotting my demise… This is… an unprecedented crisis for a weak beast tamer like me!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Takane-san and Arashi-chan - University Story
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: HUNTER x HUNTER (Official Colored)
description: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
tags: Thriller, Official Colored, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
“I can’t… I’m at my limit… I’m gonna die…”
Yamada Hana is drowning in a hellish working life, overloaded with nonstop tasks.
And the one who saved her from that nightmare was.

“I’m going to confine you”. A beautiful stranger who turns out to be a stalker!?

A luxurious mansion, extravagant meals, an open-air bath…
Her new life of confinement begins.
A heaven-like paradise where every desire is fulfilled!!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Not found
description:
To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely! Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ryota Killed His Brother
description: When their mother dies, junior high school student Ryota takes care of his toddler brother Chika and their home. Overwhelmed by all the work, he begins neglecting himself. Without any time to himself, Ryota comes to resent his little brother and soon the resentment turns into murderous thoughts. Little by little the pressures of childrearing make Ryota lose his mind. But is Ryota truly the issue? Or...
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Ghost Fixers
description: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in...
tags: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Survival, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Blood Wing Hunter
description: In the blink of an eye, his blissful days with his little sister are suddenly stolen from him forever by a certain "being". What lies in store for a man sworn to vengeance? Find out as you follow him on his enthralling mission for revenge, with the aid of his sword imbued with the flames of his intense anger and hatred.
tags: Monsters, Action, Gore, Supernatural

name: The Hunter's Gonna Lay Low
description:
Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump — eight years in the future.

Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. 

Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Survival, Superhero, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Acting Out
description: Entaro Mashiba, who earned a starting spot on his powerhouse high school baseball team and made it to Koshien, suddenly quits the team in the spring of his senior year. As those around him struggle to understand his abrupt departure, Konoka Tanabe from the drama club senses the drama in the emotions Entaro carries and decides to reach out to him.
tags: Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Do what we want, when we want, with the person we want. Such a relationship needs no label.

Murata and Tomoka, who are tired of their past relationships, become friends after sharing a game online and decide to go directly to a love hotel. After this evening, they meet regularly and have a good time together.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai
description: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Erika Won't Back Down
description: Faced with a life-threatening crisis, a game addict who lives in a poor household, Inarikawa Erika, decided to take the matter into her own hands. With a sweet proposal from her long-time gaming friend, promising a one-time huge-paying job, she takes the plunge into the underworld. Where she also finds love for the first time in the most unlikely place.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Self-Published, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: after the rain
description: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Blue Box
description:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn.
___
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Date or Kill ~Himitsu no Matching~
description:
Ayame, a top-notch assassin who has lived 25 years without any connection to romance, is convinced by a colleague to register on a dating app—while hiding her true identity!
She ends up matching with none other than her next target: Murai, the ruthless and cold-hearted young leader of a gang...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Mafia

name: Be-bop High School
description:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld. Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school. When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, School Life

name: Seishun Protagonist - Boku-tachi wa Ren'ai Kajou
description:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description: Meet Juntaro. A Japanese fishing addict who was born and raised in what is perceived to be one of the roughest parts of Japan. It is through his lens where you can experience various parts of the world, their culture, and of course their food. He particularly loves to visit countries and cities that are also believed to be highly dangerous due to his personal belief that they will absolutely have delicious food. Because this was intended for a Japanese audience, you will also get to witness various worldviews unique to Japan alongside it all. There's just one problem: He has extreme brainrot and views the world through a cute anime girl filter.
tags: Adventure, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Detective Conan: Magician of the Silver Sky
description: Not found

name: Tensei Nanmin Shoujo wa Shimin-ken wo 0 Kara Mezashite Hatarakimasu
description: Lill, who was reincarnated into a refugee settlement, is once again starving today. To make matters worse, she's being shunned because of her lazy parents and is on the verge of being exiled!? Determined to secure her place, she works hard every day to earn the trust of the residents, even if just a little. Her earnest efforts as a small girl gradually start to gain recognition from those around her. Her dream? To one day eat a warm, hearty meal until she's full! Then, she learns that even a refugee can live in town if they become a B-rank adventurer—so she sets her sights on escaping her refugee status!
tags: Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
I, Sora Satou, woke up to find myself transported to what they call a "reverse chastity world." Although I was confused at first, little by little I adapted to this new world’s values and eventually ended up working at a supermarket across from an all-girls high school. Just when I had finally gotten used to life as an employee under the kind and beautiful manager, a rumor started spreading: "That male employee... they say if you ask him, he’ll let you do it." And so, a group of beautiful girls who took that rumor literally began to gather around me...

What am I supposed to do now!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy

name: Youkai Gakkou no Seito Hajimemashita!
description:
As the cherry blossoms fall, a new school year kicks off at Hyakki Academy—a school attracting youkai from all over Japan! Unfortunately, the first years are far from model students, especially the troublemaking idiot duo, Mamekichi Maizuka (a mame-danuki) and Tamao Akisame (a nekomata). It’s time for the lovable but rambunctious animal youkai to steal the spotlight in this spinoff comedy, set a year before the events of "A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!"

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

Serialized on Pixiv Comic.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Kamigami no Kennou wo Ayatsurishi Mono ~Nouryoku Suuchi "0" de Sagesumareteiru Ore da ga, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Ikkaku~
description:
Over a hundred years have passed since the emergence of "Ability Users," those who possess supernatural powers and the monstrous aberrations that can only be defeated by said powers. 

Living in such a time, Yanagi Hayato's ability score is "0" marks him as a powerless individual, subjecting him to  a life of constant oppression and mistreatment.

In reality, Hayato's displayed score is nothing more than a bug caused by his ability, [Transcendent], the power to "sublimate himself into any existence." But the truth is, he's just been hiding the power to easily annihilate monsters―?!
tags: Action, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire
description: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan!
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?
description:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs. One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs. "Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!" With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
tags: Psychological, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: My Name Is Shingo
description:
Two elementary school pupils, a girl named Marine and a boy named Satoru, fall in love and are blessed with a rather unorthodox child which happens to be a robot. This robot is called Shingo and the story recounts how its mind develops and how it travels the world in pursuit of its ‘parents’ whom it has never had a chance to meet.

Note: Volume count based on the bunkoban.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance

name: STRAIGHT
description:
A baseball manga about Araragi and Amakusa, two genius rookies on the Osaka Tigers who are exact opposites.  
Taiyo Matsumoto's first serialized work.
tags: Thriller, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Anneliese, a young lady, has been praised for her genius since she was a child. But one day, just before her wedding to her fiancé, the crown prince, he cheats on her, breaks off the engagement, and then she is exiled. Outraged by this unreasonable treatment of their daughter, her parents decide to abandon their country and emigrate to a neighboring country.

Annelise is actually a reincarnated person, and she uses the knowledge from her previous life to come up with groundbreaking ideas. And as Anneliese's success spreads both domestically and internationally, her homeland, which allowed her to flee, realizes the magnitude of its mistake...

A new world for the talented reincarnated young lady's second life!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Arafoo Kenja no Isekai Seikatsu Nikki
description:
Satoshi Osako, a 40-year-old man, had become addicted to a virtual reality role-playing game and rose to become a top player. Tragically, a fatal accident during a login session abruptly ended his life. But this was not the real end for him, as he found himself reborn in a world brimming with swords, magic, and monsters! 

To his surprise, he retained the skills and abilities from his previous life's gaming experience. His life takes an unexpected turn when he is tasked with tutoring a young girl. 

Delve into the diary of a sage residing in this fantastical realm, where his guiding principle is "Peace and tranquility every day."
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand...
___
Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
tags: Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama

name: Not found
description:
"Only you are special."

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile. But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___
**Character Designer:** [Kaoming](https://mangadex.org/author/259d2f17-2e24-4346-aca8-1ecd2224c491)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Fukuzatsu na Kyoudai no 4koma
description:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
tags: Comedy, Incest, Video Games, Harem, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Minimum Wage Demon King ~My Job Is to Get in the Way of the Strongest Demon King’s Army in History~
description:
Aquas is a man who lives only for his hobbies and training. He was content with his modest life as the lowest-class, bronze-rank adventurer.

One day, however, the goddess of creation, Uiras, suddenly appeared in his home and offered him a job—to become the Demon King and stand in the way of the strongest demon king’s army in history.

His only compensation would be the minimum wage, but even so, Aquas accepted the job.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Fantasy

name: Game Chishiki de Saikyou ni Natta Mob Heishi wa, Shin no Jitsuryoku wo Kakushitai
description: One day, Sylva realized that he reincarnated into a mob soldier from the game that he was hooked on in his previous life. Even though he utilizes his game knowledge to do his utmost best to survive in this dangerous world, he opts to hide his true strength in order not to throw the scenario into disarray. However, an unexpected turn of events led him to easily defeat a powerful demon that even the hero is hard-pressed to defeat. And to make matters worse, he did that in front of his favorite heroine in the game... Upon this incident, word started getting out about his true strength...!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 6: Stone Ocean (Official Colored)
description: The highly acclaimed sixth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Italy to America, as Jolyne Cujoh—daughter of Jotaro Kujo—is sentenced to 15 years in prison for a murder she didn’t commit! In a bizarre turn of events, the prison is filled with Stand users. Some become her allies, but many are sent to kill Jolyne and her friends in a scheme to resurrect the scourge of the Joestar family—DIO! It’s a battle for survival in a prison where death lurks around every corner while Jolyne fights to save her father’s life in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 6—Stone Ocean!
tags: Award Winning, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Three Years Apart
description:
Mizuki and Kazuya, childhood friends, are 3 years apart.  
It's not really a so-called "Age Gap" but that makes some distance between them during their youth.  
From their childhood to the present, the story will be told about these two who are 3 years apart.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Artist’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=596062)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/shimazakikazumi)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Akairo Crossroads
description:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hogushite, Yui-san
description: Karin, a new employee who worked at an unethical recruiting magazine production company for half a year, was wrecked both physically and mentally. One day, Yui-san, her senior and a health nerd, gave her a massage to relax her body. In return, Yui asked Karin to hug her to warm her body up.
tags: Office Workers, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Imouto no Tomodachi ga Nani Kangaeteru no ka Wakaranai
description: My sister's friend Tsuyu-chan is a quiet girl who and I can't figure out what she is thinking. However, it doesn't seem that I'm much disliked… Acclaimed as "cute" on SNS! Daily popular short love comedy with a total of 1.1 million likes.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Perman
description:
From Birdman, a superman from space, he received a mysterious mask and cape. Wearing these, even a slightly clumsy elementary student can transform into Perman, a hero of justice! Rescue the weak, thwart the evil. Together with his three friends, Perman does his best every day to protect peace on Earth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **P-Man** / **Purman**
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Superhero, Adventure

name: Mitsuboshi Colors
description: Hark! The city is in peril! Who you gonna call? Colors! Sacchan, Yui and Kotoha are here to protect the city, solving mysteries and battling enemies with help from their friends. But their quest isn't an easy one as their arch-nemesis Saitou, the violent police officer of Ueno, meets them at every turn.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Higyaku no Noel
description:
Noel Cerquetti, a girl who lost her arms and legs in a contract, works together with the great devil Caron, to get her revenge against one man.  
  
This man – dubbed the "pride of the citizens" – is Burrows, the mayor of LaPlace.  
  
Why is this girl furiously seeking revenge against this unrivalled man, loved by the people for bringing peace to LaPlace that was once overrun by the mafia?  
  
While unsteady without her limbs, Noel doesn't give up on her path of revenge, as Caron watches mercilessly, at times risking his own life to support her.  
  
With vengeance, the pair begins their chase after Burrows.
tags: Action, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Alma
description: Ray and Trice grew up together in this post apocalyptic world. She was his only friend. But then one day... An unwelcomed guest arrives and says "Glory to Humans".
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Ichizu de Bitch na Kouhai
description: A story about a flirty kouhai seducing her senpai.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Waga Homura ni Hirefuse Sekai
description:
Homura, who has the desire to burn things (if there's a chance...), is summoned to another world. There, a group of similarly strange high school girls has gathered, all of whom have a special talent, and they're asked to "save this world". The Demon King has been resurrected after 100 years, and villains are rampant in the midst of the chaos. In order to correct this worldwide upheaval, the fate of the world is entrusted to these girls.
___
**Character Designer:** [Mika Pikazo](https://mangadex.org/author/3dff91ba-165f-4742-b84b-de97a31b1060/mika-pikazo)
**Demon King Castle Designer:** [mocha](https://mangadex.org/author/89a874e6-383a-4090-bbe9-2ff886f7d56b/mocha)

[Official X Account](https://x.com/homuseka)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Hachioji Specialty: Tengu's Love
description:
The life of a single-minded tengu bride and a lonely young man living together on the premise of marriage!

Kotaro, a lonely young man who has returned to his hometown for some reason, is reunited with Hime, a tengu girl, at Mt. Hime says that they must get married! A one-sided (?) marriage is assumed. Living together with a tengu is full of surprises!
___
**Note:** The series is authored by Nanao Tomo, which is an alias of Tsukizuki Yoshi.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever!
___
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10508/episode/345958) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
tags: Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Karada Sagashi
description: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Akanabe-sensei wa Tereshirazu
description: Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Dungeon no Aru Sekai de Kashikoku Sukoyaka ni Ikiru Houhou
description: Ten years ago, dungeons suddenly appeared all over the world. Yuma Minashiro fell into a dungeon on his way to a job interview. With no equipment and resigned to his death, Yuma obtained an incredible skill: summoning. It was tough because all the spirits he summoned were beautiful girls, and the only way to become stronger was to flirt with them, but he set up a company, made money, and lived a happy life as a dungeon explorer.
tags: Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
An apothecary who runs a small workshop in a rural village is one day approached by a familiar pawnshop owner, asking if he would take in a tattered elf as material for medicine. Feeling a deep anger at the countless scars covering her body, the apothecary reaches out to her and decides to treat her, but...
___
**Note:** This manga is an adaptation of the light novel that was an adaptation of [the original webcomic](https://mangadex.org/title/5a0ab49a-1e9b-4f19-9f86-da5d7d50885a).
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Medical, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Combat Support AI “GAL”
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Mecha, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Zannen Jokanbu Black General-san
description: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Military, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Osananajimi wa, Nyaa to Naite Skirt no Naka
description: In the cat-filled town of Miyakecho, there is an urban legend that says cats sometimes put curses on humans. Ichika and Maki were once childhood friends until a certain incident led them to stop talking to each other. When Maki rushes in to save a mysterious white cat from an oncoming truck, however, she somehow finds herself under the cat's curse with Ichika being the only one she can turn to for help.
tags: Animals, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ghost Town Stories-Trickle
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Adventure, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery

name: You're Mine
description: Mai's in high school now, and she's just started going out with her childhood friend Yoshioka. However, it feels like that hasn't really changed anything between the two of them. Bit by bit, they try to figure out what their relationship is, and what it means to be more than just friends.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Raika Days
description: 4-Koma comedy following the super genius grade school student Haruna Raika and her every day life. Where she's the class president, the room leader, the top student, and even fills in for the teacher when they've overslept!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mao
description:
Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived.
