In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era! The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?"
___
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Tentacle Hole
description: On the way home, Jin and his friend Komachi are suddenly transported to another world full of strange creatures and Jin is killed by them, but somehow manages to come back to life, but as a tentacled creature!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Kono Class ni Gal wa Inai
description: Mirei, a diligent honor student, longs for the flashy, fashionable "gyaru" lifestyle she admires in manga. With newfound courage, she decides to give herself a makeover and reinvent her image upon entering high school. There, she meets Yushin, a rough-around-the-edges boy, and... they hit it off?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Manga Yonin Shosei
description:
From Stone Bridge Press :
A "documentary comic book" from 1931, depicting the true adventures of four young Japanese men in America. Originally published in Japanese in San Francisco in 1931, The Four Immigrants Manga is Henry Kiyama’s visual chronicle of his immigrant experiences in the United States. Drawn in a classic gag-strip comic-book style, this heartfelt tale, rediscovered and translated by manga expert Frederik L. Schodt, is a fascinating, entertaining depiction of early Asian American struggles.

Note: Won in the Heritage Selection category at the 51st Angoulême International Comics Festival in 2024
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Historical, Comedy, Philosophical

name: 10-nenmae ni Time Leap shite Osananajimi no Ojousama wo Tasuketara Iinazuke ni Narimashita
description:
Reaching his limit due to daily work, the corporate slave Enami Shuusuke collapses on the station platform one day. In that moment, memories of his childhood friend, Yorumiya Hina, who died in an accident, flash before his eyes.

"I'm sorry, I couldn't save you then."

As Shuusuke falls into a deep sleep bearing regret, he finds himself time-leaping back 10 years!
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Love Lab
description:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he gets involved with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: One Piece (Official Colored)
description:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
With a height of 192 cm and a scar on his face, Ujioka Tasuku is mistaken for a "scary person" by those around him, and his student life has been lonely up until now. On his first day of high school, Ujioka is determined to make friends and have a fun high school life, but a shocking encounter with Shimohoshizaki Kodzuru awaits him after she trips on a banana peel! She's completely out of it, but Ujioka is touched by Shimohoshizaki's hard work and she doesn't judge Ujioka by his appearance, so they decide to become friends!?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E5%90%9B%E3%81%AF%E3%81%8A%E3%82%8C%E3%81%AE%E5%84%AA%E3%81%97%E3%81%8F%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84%E6%98%A5)

description: A life of a savage and proud Goblin King, Ish changed forever after being rendered into a human.

name: Not found
description: High school student Mizuno has a person that he's not good with. It's his seatmate Wakao-san. Mizuno is the only one who perceives Wakao's face as a blank slate, making it impossible for him to read any of her facial expressions. Furthermore, when Wakao tells him that she's using his expressions as "reference," the mystery surrounding her deepens?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
"If you get an erection...
You'll do as I say."

Mochida is a junior high school student who has become close friends with Aoyama, the most beautiful girl in his class. One day, while masturbating and fantasizing over her in the library, he is caught by Taira, a mysterious member of the library committee. In a tense and unexpected moment, Taira demands a kiss from Mochida. Confused and cornered, Mochida gives in... only to find himself ejaculating after the kiss... This strange encounter leads to an invitation to the secretive "Kissing Club", where boundaries blur and emotions run high.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan
description: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru

name: Kingdom
description:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.
___
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

name: What a good girl
description:
Lu Mingyu lost her parents at a young age and suffered ten years of physical and mental abuse in her uncle's family.
But thanks to her great inner strength, she managed to pretend to be a well-behaved girl and secretly prepared her revenge with the help of Duan Xiuming.
He is a wealthy and romantic young man who knows that Lu Mingyu is using him, but having fallen in love at first sight, he is willing to do anything for her and protects her with passion and devotion... and helps her rebuild her life afterwards.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Rengoku Dead Role
description: Meet Sakai Hiroaki, a high school teenage mastermind with a genius-level intelligence and a lack of interest in anything that is easy to him. During one unlucky day, in an attempt to stop a student from committing suicide, he ends up committing suicide himself. After he awakens, he finds himself not in the real world, nor in heaven, but in purgatory, along with a group of others who did the same: commit suicide. Sakai discovers that he and his peers are subjected to never-ending intense death games in this world for reasons unknown to him, and he tries to find a way to escape.
tags: Action, Psychological, Survival, Horror, Supernatural

name: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~
description:
The mom characters who appear in the game *MamaFan* are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. 

"Why... Why do such cute moms have to die?!"

Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then on a certain day, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of *MamaFan*... However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who's got nothing but the worst routes.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)

name: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!
description:
"If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!"
Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! 
Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!
Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness.
How will this complicate their relationship?
Will it develop into a forbidden romance?!
Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

description: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.

description:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."

Mitsuko is Japan’s first woman detective in the turbulent 1930s! When a handsome college student shows up with a new case, he ends up assigned as her new assistant! Join Mitsuko and Saku as they solve cases, explore the changing cultural landscape of early Showa-era Japan, and maybe grow a little closer along the way in this fashionable mystery series. [Azuki]

Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!

Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears.

He then noticed a spirit in his apartment, an amnesiac high school girl by the name of “Ako.” Since Ako was a relatively friendly and talkitive spirit, not to mention harmless, with her permission, Bambi used her as a model for his next work. But there’s another “Ako,” Yamashiro Ako, a gloomy high school girl who dreams every night from the spirit’s perspective.

Thanks to the Crown Princess, Ocoho, who lifted the taboo on the nature of infections, all the orphans of Caillite enter the course to become Sorcerer Knights. A godsend for all?

Among those wooded, Aquill, who left the forest a few months earlier, doesn't wish to become Sorcerer Knight. Only one thing is keeping him at the castle: finding his little sister, Tan, lost in the forest because of him...

name: Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality
description:
What if Petunia married a biochemist, and Harry grew up reading science and science fiction? Manga-style adaptation of the popular fan fiction by E.Yudkowsky: "Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality". Read left to right.

The original fanfic is complete at https://hpmor.com'

From the author Eliezer Yudkowsky:
This is not a strict single-point-of-departure fic - there exists a primary point of departure, at some point in the past, but also other alterations. The best term I've heard for this fic is "parallel universe".

The text contains many clues: obvious clues, not-so-obvious clues, truly obscure hints which I was shocked to see some readers successfully decode, and massive evidence left out in plain sight. This is a rationalist story; its mysteries are solvable, and meant to be solved.

All science mentioned is real science. But please keep in mind that, beyond the realm of science, the views of the characters may not be those of the author. Not everything the protagonist does is a lesson in wisdom, and advice offered by darker characters may be untrustworthy or dangerously double-edged.
tags: Time Travel, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Doujinshi, Philosophical, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery

name: Mobile Suit Moon Gundam
description: U.C.0092. Like our fragile reality, his world teetered on the edge of collapse. The forsaken space colony, Moon Moon, drifting in forgotten darkness. To rescue his homeland from the precipice of oblivion, Jutta Qasim shatters ancient taboos and ventures beyond the boundaries into the "outside." There lies a universe where the Earth Federation government rules with prejudice and iron control, while a shadowy revolutionary named Char of Neo Zeon secretly hones the weapons of his inevitable uprising. A fateful encounter with a steel giant known as a Gundam inexorably pulls Jutta into the vortex of this intricate power struggle. What cruel truth awaits at the end? This new chapter in the Newtype Saga bridges the events of Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack and Mobile Suit Gundam UC. Now, the forbidden door opens. Do not look, do not speak of the dark side of the Universal Century.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: I, Mashiro Saeki, raised in a large family without any private space, finally got permission to live alone upon entering high school. Although it came with a condition: "Don't have inappropriate relationships with the opposite sex." And yet, just after saving my neighbor and classmate, the gyaru Arisa Amagi, from a problem, she's been trying to seduce me in every possible way?! There's no way I can resist this! A romantic comedy with some spiciness and a lot of sweetness begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
"We're pretending to be lovers, right...?" "Let's break up."

Akira Watase is dating his best friend, Fumiya Watari. But it's all a camouflage! In order to keep girls away, Akira is playing the role of Watari's lover, who's famous among the female students at school. Watari even kissed him to prove it to the girls!? Akira was depressed, saying that his youth is completely over, but for some reason, he keeps pretending they're dating...?

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life

name: My Blue Garnet
description:
Inami Kon, age 24, has been job hunting for the past 4 months. However, she is having trouble being "normal". One day, she meets Ai, a woman whose personality is the complete opposite of her own. Is this encounter just coincidence or is it fate?

A mature yuri story about love at a crossroads.

This is published in Melody, a bi-monthly magazine.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Not found
description:
My boyfriend melted.

--

*Winner of Morning Magazine’s September Monthly Encouragement Award*
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Horror

name: Not found
description:
There are three female masters who are known to be the strongest in the world. The only thing they can't get their hands on… their ideal man.

“If there are no ideal men, why not raise one ourselves!?”

As they skim over the list of candidates, the ladies' eyes all fixate on one boy. A level 0 with no shred of talent…
___
**Character Designer:** [Tajima Ryuushi](https://mangadex.org/author/3ac15f57-6a12-4018-b549-30aab86fc6c8)
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation

name: Bocchi the Rock!
description: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music

name: Not found
description: While playing a ritual-like children's game called "Persona", students are knocked unconscious. While asleep, they encounter a man named Philemon who bestows several Personas upon them. When they wake up, the youths discover they can summon Personas.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Video Games, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: The Seductive Wife
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Full Color

name: Gohan ga Tanoshimi
description:
"So, what shall I eat today?"

Tuna and cheddar cheese, an egg sandwich, and strawberry daifuku toast are breads that brighten the morning.

The unforgettable pasta from that neighbourhood shop run by real artisans. Washing down sizzling hot dumplings with drinks would be the perfect weekend bliss.

A special brunch with the table filled with crepes.

Packing a pretty tin with all my favourite snacks.

My favourite cute cup.

Buying a new dining table to welcome a new way of living.

Ida Chiaki, beloved for 'Ie Ga Suki Na Hito', draws her very first essay manga here, depicting about the many small joys of eating. It's warm, grounded, and filled with the texture of everyday life. It's such a delicious ramble.

Well then, go ahead and dig in.
tags: Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around... So, she makes a choice...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Police

name: HELLPƎR
description:
An action fantasy manga that takes place in both this life and the next, featuring the boss of the guard tribe that protects the city, Jang Gwang Nam.  
  
 [Official Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/hellper/list?title_no=180&page=1)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Samurai, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Devilman
description:
Demons exist and their power is beyond what humans can fathom. In fact they are so strong that humans do not stand a chance against them in a fight. The only thing strong enough to defeat a demon is another demon and it is through this logic that Ryo Asuka hatches the plan to have his good-hearted friend Akira Fudo possessed by a demon. If a person is of pure of heart then he might be able to control the demon that possesses him and thereby acquire power equal to a demon. After raising some hell in a club the plan works and Akira is possessed by the powerful demon known as Amon. Now Akira is mankind's sole champion of justice against the hidden demon menace that has plagued humanity since the dawn of time.

[Official English](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/devilman-the-classic-collection/)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Gaikotsu Kishi-sama, Tadaima Isekai e Odekake-chuu
description:
The protagonist fell asleep while playing an online game. However, he awoke in a strange world with his game character's appearance. In a state of shock, he noticed that he was equipped with nothing but his strongest weapon and armor. To make matters worse, our hero's appearance was changed by the special avatar skin『Skeleton』when he enter this new world. The protagonist wanted to live without drawing attention, but he got acquainted with the dark elf Ariana and received her request.  
  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/skeleton-knight-in-another-world-light-novel/)
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Yuka, a university student, and Mahiro, a working man, have been dating for six months. They are so pure that they are nervous to even hug each other. But one day, Yuka's precious secret that she didn't want him to know about is revealed, and their relationship slowly starts to go weird!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence

name: Chou Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Koushiki Anthology
description:
The Internet Angel’s advent upon this manga world!!!

The super popular game *NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE*'s first official anthology!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Video Games

name: Miyu-chan wa Zutto Tomodachi
description: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Top Dog Kim Jian
description:
A loser named Kim Jian transferred to Sujung High School... But actually, he’s the top dog of them all... and he's a girl!!
Jian’s parents, worried about their troublemaking daughter who’s been in fights with boys in the past, want to send her only to an all-girls school. But Jian wants to attend a co-ed school.
In the end, she’s allowed to go—on the condition that she'll disguise herself as a boy and keep it quiet...
But it’s already getting noisy!! -_-^
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Majo to Kyurasu
description: Long ago, the talented witch Shien hid her apprentice Tama from the witch hunts and then disappeared. Hundreds of years later, the two finally reunite in modern-day Japan! However, Shien is no longer the same; a "downer witch" is sitting by the window, smoking a cigarette...!
tags: Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Cipher
description: Anise can't believe her luck when she finds herself in the same high school as famous former child star Siva. Although the cool and handsome Siva seems unapproachable, Anise manages to become his friend. But her happiness turns to surprise when she discovers Siva's secret: for years, he's been switching identities with his twin brother, Cipher!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Blue Lock
description:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.
___
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kirawaremono no Akuyaku Reisoku ni Tensei shita no ni, Naze ka Mawari ga Hanatte Oite Kurenai
description:
A modern Japanese office worker suddenly dies and finds himself reincarnated into a game world... as the ugly, pushover son of a villain, Klaus Muller! 

Realizing that if he plays out the game as it is in the original, he will be condemned and executed by the hero, he begins to take action to avoid the catastrophic ending. Klaus puts in a lot of effort and gains the trust of those around him, including the heroine and his family. In the midst of all this, he unintentionally makes a big impact and attracts attention...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world. His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils. A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: In the final battle against the Demon Cult, the Black Serpent leader Jeonghwa was betrayed by the Murim Alliance, losing all her comrades. Barely surviving, she swears to eliminate both the Demon Cult and the Murim Alliance who drove her comrades to their deaths. “Heavens! If justice truly exists… grant me the opportunity to avenge my fallen comrades!”
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Hoshikuzu Telepath
description: Umika is a very shy girl who has always been very bad at communicating with others. Over time she gave up on making any friends, until one day she meets the transfer student Yuu. Yuu claims to be an alien with the power of "Foreheadelepathy" - being able to read people's emotions by pressing her forehead to theirs.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: The Frozen Player Returns
description:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Amateur Vigilante
description: Action thriller about an obsessed lonely man with a delusional plot to save Japan by assassinating a politician. But his twisted plan is disturbed when he witnesses a young girl next door getting abducted by the Yakuza. He decides to save her but his attempt ends in a chaotic massacre where he manages to kill the gangsters. But things only get worse from here on out, now he's getting hunted down by even more ruthless killers.
tags: Thriller, Action, Gore, Drama

name: Not found
description: Take a child half succubus and half human.
tags: Loli, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: OMORI
description: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
tags: Psychological, Horror, Adaptation

name: Ishigami Senki
description: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...?
tags: Action, Romance, Fantasy

name: Ikkyu
description: This is a biography of the famous Buddhist monk Ikkyu from the late Hisashi Sakaguchi. Set in 14th century Japan, Ikkyu must learn to live and excel as a monk, despite the fact that his father is the emperor. His intelligence and purity help him succeed, but he continues to get the short end of the stick in life. Can Ikkyu persevere in his quest for spirituality in spite of everything that is set against him?
tags: Historical, Drama

name: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam
description:
The year is Universal Century 0133. Ten years have past since the armed resistance of the aristocratic fraction, the Crossbone Vanguard, was subdued. Tobia Aronnax is an exchange student onboard the spaceship Smashion to Jupiter, but during a surprised attack by a group of space pirates who call themselves the Crossbone Vanguard, he finds out that there were actually hidden agendas among those in the Smashion and in Jupiter itself.  
  
After being saved by a member of the pirates named Kincaid Nau, he was taken aboard the pirate ship, the Mother Vanguard, and was convinced by its captain, Berah Ronah, to join them. The pirate group's true identity was revealed to be a guerrilla group resisting the secret fraction within Jupiter, the Jupiter Empire, which intends to conquer Earth. Now Tobia must pilot one of the three powerful Crossbone Gundam to help this new Crossbone Vanguard in their quest to oppose the Jupiter Empire's plans.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama

name: Ai ga Nakereba Idol Dekinai
description:
Noa Kuroda worships Ibuki, a member of the super popular idol group ILY, as a god. After ILY's concert, Noa happens to run into Ibuki at a convenience store. When Noa learns that Ibuki is stressed out from being worshiped as a "god" and "charismatic" by his fans, she unconsciously hides the fact that she is an otaku, but...?!

(Source: SeishunScans)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Yojouhan no Ibara Hime
description:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again
tags: Psychological, Romance, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Kekkaishi
description:
By night, junior high student Yoshimori Sumimura is a "kekkaishi"–a demon-hunter who specializes in creating magical barriers around his prey. By day, Yoshimori's got some other demons to battle: an addiction to sweets and a seriously crotchety grandfather! Yoshimori's pretty 16-year-old neighbor and childhood friend, Tokine Yukimura, is also a kekkaishi, but their families are feuding over who is the true practitioner of the art.  
  
Won the 52nd Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Hooked on Captain Charming
description: One day, Mia, a mermaid with big dreams of romance, is reeled out of water by Jack, the coarse captain of the Heaven Pirates. To her disappointment, Jack looks nothing like the blond Prince Charming of her dreams, but Mia can't help but find herself mesmerized.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Sonna, 14-sai.
description:
Takahashi and Shioya are second-year middle school students who sit next to each other. A story of innocent 14-year-olds whose hearts are shaken by every word and expression.

(Source: Manga Mee, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The ability to manifest by committing sins, commonly known as Sin.

Amidst the rampant heinous crimes caused by Sin, Ren Hizuki, a detective in the First Investigative Division of the Metropolitan Police Department, was living a life of fierce battles day and night. One day, Ren is ordered to transfer to the newly established special ability crime investigation unit, Public Safety Section 9. There, she meets a cowardly detective named Yujiro Oboro. As she heads to investigate ability-related cases with Oboro, the secrets of Section 9 and the true identity of Oboro begin to come to light.
tags: Action, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
tags: Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: Douyara Ore wa Imadoki Gal na Toshiue Osananajimi kara Gekiomo Kanjou wo Mukerareteiru Rashii
description: Yuito Kujo, a high school student, constantly compares himself to his exceptional older brother and sees himself as a lesser, "degraded version." Caught in a spiral of self-deprecation, his adolescence turns even darker when he discovers that his childhood crush, Suzuno, is in love with his older brother. But just as Yuito begins to lose hope, Suzuno's older sister, Kano—a college gal—develops intense, overwhelming feelings for him...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Shadows House (Official Colored)
description:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
tags: Official Colored, Monsters, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Preuve de lien familial
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Lunch Bancho Hitomi
description:
Following instinct alone, a tale of solo lunch exploration!!
Hitomi, known as the 'Lunch Bancho' for her unmatched passion for a good meal, lets her own 'lunch antenna' guide her once again today as she hunts down another perfect 'nice lunch'.
A satisfying gourmet story presented by Qusumi Masayuki, the master behind 'Kodoku no Gurume (Solitary Gourmet)', and the talented newcomer Amei Ryo. Savour the delicious harmony created by these two!!
tags: Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Minigram (MILGRAM 4koma)
description: The day-to-day lives of the prisoners and guards of the Milgram Prison! But in a funny 4-Koma form!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A Cheat Hot Spring That Heals Female Adventurers, Makes Them Stronger… and Leads to Steamy Mixed Baths?!

Deep in the mountains, a young man named Rio manages an old, run-down hot spring. Using his mysterious skill, he adjusts the properties of the waters only to discover that what he thought was ordinary is actually cheat-level powerful!

News spreads fast, and soon female adventurers of all kinds flock to the spring. But there’s a catch… the waters don’t just heal; they also awaken certain desires…
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: The Wolf That Picked Something Up
description:
A story about a wolf, his encounter with a small puppy, and their life together following.

---

- [Original Manhua <AC.QQ>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647560)

- [Original Book <Taobao>](https://item.taobao.com/item.htm?ft=t&id=643452237497)
tags: Award Winning, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club
description:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Garan no Hime
description: A world where the machine civilization has perished and immortal monsters called "Monotsuki" ("Possessed") are rampant. Isana, a girl born in a remote village, meets an android who lost her memories and looks exactly like her sister, who should have disappeared in the ruins she wandered into. Convinced that her sister is alive, Isana gives the mechanical person the name "Hime" ("Princess") and they set out together on a journey to find her sister.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Mystery

name: Bakuchi Gui
description: Raised by an older brother who was a genius gambler and learned countless tricks of the trade, the man known as "Bull" knows every kind of cheat. However, he himself has never used any of them—he lives a regular life as a full-time office worker. Then one day, his brother goes missing. As Bull searches for him, he uncovers a clue: his brother has fallen into "the Swamp," a deadly gambling den where those consumed by greed end up. To save the kind brother he once knew—and to uncover his brother's hidden side—Bull steps into "the Swamp"!
tags: Traditional Games, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Horror

name: Melty Blood X
description: Satsuki Yumizuka, Sion Eltnam Altasia and Leez are outcasts of society, living in the alley, hidden from society. Satsuki and Sion are both vampires and together with Ries, they have been living aimlessly after the events of Tatari. Sion decides to use her alchemy powers to construct decent living quarters for them, but something goes horribly wrong and she ends up making a 100 meter pyramid in the middle of the city. Thinking there might be foul play, the trio investigate the pyramid and get things under control. Based on the Tsukihime and Melty Blood games, you will be introduced to other familiar characters like Kohaku and Akiha.
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Go Nagai SF Masterpiece Collection
description:
Collection of Go Nagai's short stories with sentral theme on Sci-Fi.
Many of the short stories are also collected in [Go Nagai Short Stories](https://mangadex.org/title/65efd7e6-cdd1-4fba-a79e-32134b2cef53/go-nagai-short-stories) compilation.

tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Mecha, Anthology, Incest, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Keiyaku Shimai
description:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Hanging Town: Shinomiya Shrine Series
description:
In a cursed corner of Japan, the past and present collide through tales of haunting and vengeance tied to the Shinomiya Shrine.

#### Volumes 1-3: Hanging Town
Believe in it or not, that doesn't matter. But “it” certainly does exist…

In the 1970s, in a certain prefecture in Kyushu, mysterious phenomena suddenly start occurring in a peaceful rural town like any other. Wild dogs, disasters, accidents, strange noises, and hangings… What on Earth could this be?

From elementary school to high school, “I” have experienced strange happenings and the tragedies associated with them. Please don't look away as you watch.

#### Volumes 4-5: The Story of How I Couldn't Enter the Mountains
In a land of rich greenery and shifting seasons, there are places a young man must never enter. When a series of uncanny events and a cursed video come to light, a new terror takes shape.


___
**Alt Official Raw:** [piccoma](https://piccoma.com/web/product/138204?etype=episode)
tags: Ghosts, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Twenty years.

For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve "saints" were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called "calamities" that were massacring the planet. Though no god had chosen Geon as a saint, he became the mightiest of them all, which made him a hero... and a target.

But now, Geon has brawled his way out of the tower, and he's back stronger than ever. All that's left is to exact brutal payback on each of the saints, but none of these powerful beings will go down without a fight.

Will Geon be able to stay in one piece while achieving the divine revenge of his dreams?

---

- [Tapas English Translation](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-disaster-class-hero/info)
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: The largest rise of Dark Skin Gyaru girls of this century! The start of high school life with best and strongest girls out there!! High School Teacher Imada Sasamichi has been assigned to work there at this school, only to find out that everyone in the class is a dark-skinned gyaru!!!! Kuroi, Kuroiwa, Kuroiso…all the names are Kuro (Black)!!! Meanwhile, Kuroi Mariko already fell in love with her sensei…!? It's the start of these lust-filled girls straight love-attacks on Sensei's life!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
When I woke up, I had reincarnated into the world of a game I played in my past life. And what's more, as a monster that's hostile to humanity! It couldn't be helped, so I just lived quietly so humans wouldn't find me, but...

The heroine, Noa, who was my oshi in my past life, was collapsed near my home!!

After I protected and nursed her, my oshi gave me the name "Rei", so I decided to protect my oshi for life and follow Noa. I meet other characters from the game too, and I'm watching over Noa's growth, but... the real Noa seems to be the type who's a bit clingy and has a... "heavy" love?

This is the story of me, reincarnated as a monster, somehow overcoming hardships together with my beloved oshi.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tenshi to Akuto!!
description:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Cooking Papa
description:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He's also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox... It's time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it. His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.
___
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery

name: Not found
description: The world has changed dramatically, and "dungeon games" have randomly appeared everywhere, and the monsters that appear are bloody killings on humans! The Chuunibyou manga artist Qin You has experienced countless dungeons in his dreams, and knows......
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Prince on a White Horse
description: Ozu Kotarou (25) recently changed his career from a white collar worker to a high school teacher. His new workplace is at Odawara High School, a girls only school. He starts off his first day by leaving a significant impression on the entire school by announcing that he has no interest in younger girls, especially under age girls. Kotarou is assigned to assist Hara Takako, a fellow teacher, until he gets experience teaching. Hara is a beautiful 32 year old woman but is insecure about being single and is worried about her future. How will the relationship between these two people develop as they start working closely together?
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: My Favorite VTuber Is Scary IRL
description: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Make It Real
description: A feud? A dating rumor? What's the drama between the hottest member of DOT, Yoon-chan, and the leader of the group, Kang Sol?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Music, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The last boss of the game Altena Fantasia...

...Isn't me. I was reincarnated as one of his underling mob villains. Determined to take the place of the infamous last boss, I resolved to liven up the game as a true villain. But for some reason, all my misdeeds end up being praised, and my reputation soars...?! How did it come to this? Somebody, please tell me!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Holiday Yasumi's Twitter Shorts
description:
Twitter manga posted occasionally by Holiday Yasumi.

Each post is self-contained, despite being numbered by chapter, so you can read them in any order you choose. Certain characters also make recurring appearances.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Mecha, Boys' Love, Incest, Zombies, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Crossdressing, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Shota, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: Na Honjaman Level-Up: Ragnarok
description: After witnessing the death of one of their own, the Absolute Ones — creators of the many universes outside of our own — frantically seek to fill the power void left by their fallen brother. With earth's existence in danger once more as gates spill monsters into our dimension, Sung Suho must answer the call and conquer the shadow dungeon while learning of his father's legendary legacy.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bungou Stray Dogs: STORM BRINGER
description: It's been roughly one year since Chūya Nakahara joined the Port Mafia, and he's got his sights set on an executive position. But as he makes plans to move up, a man by the name of Paul Verlaine—claiming to be his older brother—appears and vows to assassinate everyone he cares about! Now, Chūya must team up with Adam, a European A.I. investigator, to stop this lunatic before the storm swallows Yokohama once again…
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Isekai No Ochibi-chan wa Kyou mo Nanika wo Tsukuri Dasu
description: One day, Ochibi (5 years old) who lives in the slums suddenly remembers that she has been reincarnated from another world. Ochibi has the "Imagination Creation" skill, which allows her to create anything she imagines. She decides to start a business with the Japanese items she obtains with her "Imagination Creation" skill! A heartwarming story with a boy named "Onii" and a girl named "Nene" who aim to escape the slums!!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Vassalord.
description:
Vampires Charles J. Chrishunds (Charley) and Johnny Rayflo have a strange relationship. Charley is a cyborg and a vampire hunter for the Vatican, while his master Rayflo enjoys a playboy lifestyle. While fighting crimes involving vampires, Charley struggles to control his lust for blood and for Rayflo, while Rayflo delights in seducing his servant and attempts to deal with issues from his own past. Rayflo cares about Charley (also known as Cherry and Chris), and these feelings don't seem to be one-sided.  
  
*The second volume of Vassalord contains a bonus one-shot in the back, a fantasy story called "Zoul Harf" or "Zoul Half." This special one-shot was first published in the Comic Blade Masamune summer issue in 2003.
tags: Action, Comedy, Boys' Love, Girls' Love, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Touhou Chireikiden - Hansoku Tantei Satori
description:
The fifth official Touhou manga (and the first webcomic) written by ZUN and originally drawn by Ginmokusei. 

Touhou Chireikiden focuses on Satori Komeiji's endeavors as a detective, solving mysteries around Gensokyo.

*Serialization was paused for a few months after volume 2 was finished due to the health concerns of the original artist Ginmokusei. The series resumed serialization with Yuu Akimaki as the new artist.*

- **Links:**
[Manga on NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44569)

[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/356764/list/)
[EbookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/701436/)
tags: Crime, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Genikasuri
description:
Former pro boxer Harima Ryo plunges into a two-year vegetative state after a fateful match. When he awakens, he’s met with the crushing end of his athletic career, his father’s death, and ruthless betrayal by the gym he once called home. Consumed by rage and grief, Harima vows to claw his way back into the boxing world, not as a fighter, but as a promoter, manipulating the sport’s shadowy underbelly to seize power and profit.

A raw, unflinching tale of those who thrive in boxing’s darkest corners. A place where fists forge legacies, money fuels corruption, and survival demands bending the rules.
tags: Action, Crime, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama

name: KAMI KILL
description: In a run-down shopping street, brothers Fuji and Kiri run a small barbershop as they wait for their father's return. In their effort to make ends meet, every day brings something new to their door.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Nito Exorcists
description:
Gotsuji and Uruka, two exorcists, spend their days hunting down and banishing evil spirits. Their mission is to track down and slay a specific evil spirit. 

At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep, unresolved grief and desire for vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge, Uruka, who struggles to understand this obsession, faithfully stays by his side. 

Together, these two exorcists are bound on a journey, but where will it lead?
tags: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Shiba Inu Rooms
description: A newly built 1LDK apartment with rent of 4,800 yen! The reason is the "earthbound spirit of a Shiba Inu"...!?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Dogsred
description:
“If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?”

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaidou.  The year is 2010. 

Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life. 

Now nicknamed the “Rabid Prince”, Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/dogsred)
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant
description:
The popular action RPG series is finally being adapted into a manga!

Set in Edo in the fourth year of Keian, seven riders engage in a deadly battle—the curtain rises on “The Ritual of the Full Moon.”
tags: Historical, Monsters, Action, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The main character is Kyoutarou's older sister, Ichikawa Kana… commonly known as Onee! She has lots of female friends, but of course she doesn't have a boyfriend!! Featuring that older sister, this is a regrettable romantic comedy that seems like it's going to start being a romantic comedy but doesn't!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Getter Robo
description:
Ryoma Nagare, Hayato Jin, and Prof. Saotome pilot three specially designed combat jets, which can be combined together in different forms to form three different kinds of giant robots, Getter-1 (used for aerial combat), Getter-2 (for land-based conflicts), and Getter-3 (for undersea battles). They were assembled by Prof. Saotome and became Earth's first line of defense against the Dinosaur Empire, which is a civilization of reptile-like humanoids, who evolved from the now-extinct dinosaurs that roamed the earth millions of years ago.  
  
The series was groundbreaking in the anime mecha genre: for the very first time, it introduced the concept of separate machines combining to form a super robot. Using three jets, Getter Robo could combine in three different ways to create three different versions of Getter Robo for different conditions and situations. This idea was originally discussed during the creation process for Mazinger Z (the first super robot to be piloted internally), but was dropped and then developed for Getter Robo. This combination idea proved to be a very powerful concept that has been used in the super robot genre ever since.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: DOG MATIC
description: Not found
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Animals, Gore, Drama, Monster Girls

name: Liella! Comic
description: A series depicting a new side of the Liella! members serialized in Love Live Days
tags: Slice of Life, Music

name: Re-Kan!
description: High school girl Hibiki Amami has a sixth sense of perceiving and interacting with ghosts and supernatural beings as well as talking with cats and other animals. The story follows their everyday antics.
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
One summer day, Jin Konohana, is forced to carry luggage to a firework festival by his outrageous older sister, and before he knows, he finds himself in an unfamiliar mountain. In the mountains where no one is around, Jin begins a life of survival all by himself.
In order to survive... I want to throw away all the troublesome things and live peacefully and comfortably! 
A slow life in another world that begins in the mountains!
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Can Unpopular Magical Girls Also Date?
description:
Chae-na plays the unpopular Clover in [Magical Lucky Stars], the guardian of Madeleine Village.

She feels weak and lacking as a hero, so she lives inconspicuously and endures being an unpopular member. She finds the spotlight uncomfortable and awkward.

However, there is someone who accidentally sees her kindness and falls in love at first sight! It is Red, Seung-chan, a popular member of the [Hyper Rangers of Transcendental Expedition] group that protects the neighboring Eunha Village.

"I fell in love at first sight. I think I like you!"

She is thrilled by the appearance of Red, whom she admires, but refuses to confess, saying that she doesn't even know what kind of person she is... After hearing the heart-fluttering words that she doesn't know anything about you and wants to get to know you more, she eventually runs away.

"There's no way such a wonderful person would like someone like me. There must be some kind of mistake!"

A heart-pounding story about an ultra-popular hero and an unpopular magical girl who accepts his confession!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Superhero, Magical Girls, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... and the entire world!
___
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Umapaka Manga Theater
description: The slapstick days between Trainer and his Uma Musume.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tobi to Ryuuko
description:
Otogiri Tobi, a youth living with a "talkative bag", Baku. In his monotonous life, an inhuman girl calling herself Ryuuko appears in front of him and...!?

An unusual roomshare begins under a single roofー!!
tags: Adventure, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Usami-san wa Kamawaretai!
description: Usami Nagisa is a yankee who suffers from a supposed "rare disease" which causes her health to decline if she feels lonely. Sewa Natsuhito, the boy who sits next to her in class realizes this and keeps her company, but the only way Usami believes she can cure her "illness" is to make lots of friends, a process she might find quite difficult due to her aggressive looks and personality.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Super Ninja Dan
description: The Kyosha and Jinma clans are ninja organizations living in the modern age. They were called "super ninja," or "super shinobi." However, these two clans have been fighting a fierce battle to exterminate each other. Why? The unique tag team of Tetsu Kariya and Kazuhiko Shimamoto unleash a painful work!
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
The Adresia empire on the Vogel continent. There is a battle over the throne of such an empire that possesses powerful military and vast territory. With the successor undecided, the children of the emperor are vying to expand their power. However, there was one prince that everyone says will definitely not become the emperor. The seventh prince, Arnold Lakes Adler. The young man who was inferior to his younger twin brother in every way, the dull prince.

Incompetent and lethargic, Arnold wastes everyday just playing around. However, behind the scenes, he is one of the only five SS-Class adventurers called 'Silver'. Seeing the intensifying battle for the throne he decided "I don't want to die so let's have my little brother become the emperor..."
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Osananajimi no Koukousei no Aida ni Nikutai Kankei wa Seiritsu suru ka.
description: The innocent Oota Yuka, the sexually curious Niiyama Kasumi, the elusive Horie Yasuo and the lovesick Onosaka Ryuhei. The four high school boys and girls, who have grown up like a family, are bequeathed a house by an elderly woman, Hasebe Haru, for four million yen and a fixed term. Under one roof, the high school students' eccentric love and friendship unfold.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
**In this sexy romantic comedy, a young woman tries to figure out how to seduce her crush!**

Nobukuni Nodoka has spent most of her adolescence with her face buried in a book. Dating was the furthest thing from her mind. But all that changed when Sasaki, a boy from Tokyo, transferred to her school. She doesn’t know the first thing about romance or relationships, but with tried-and-true advice from a dating guru named Meeko, maybe she’ll have a chance at love?!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Slow Loop
description:
When Hiyori - a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing - headed out to sea for some alone time, she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.  
After a while, this girl - named Koharu - and her end up fishing and cooking together, and they get to know each other a bit in the meantime. During their brief time together Koharu finds out that the reason that Hiyori went out to sea that day was because she's hesitant towards meeting her new stepfamily that same evening. But what a coincidence! Koharu is also meeting her new family tonight! "No. It can't be a coincidence…" Follow these two 'sisters' and their new life together!  


---
tags: Animals, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description: A hitman targets a princess who lives in lavish luxury. When she arrives, she finds her flirting with the prince. The prince steps in to protect her, but in the struggle, the princess hits her head and dies instantly. Though the hitman succeeds without staining her hands, the prince makes an unexpected and shocking request…
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Hatoko no Ayakashi Yuubinya-san.
description:
Hatoko is a girl who can see youkai. Her job is to deliver packages to the youkai lurking around town. 

Today, like many other days, she will go around to meet them with the nekomata Kokone by her side. A not-so-scary yonkoma about youkai filled with laughs and a touch of sadness.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai Shachuuhaku Monogatari - Outrunner PHEV
description: One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car! He'll start his life a new in this different world!
tags: Time Travel, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
"Welcome to the Rose Mansion. This letter has been written to assist you in leading a safe and peaceful life in the manor for the coming year. Please make an effort to fully acquaint yourself with the following rules at your earliest convenience, and adhere to them as a matter of utmost priority under any circumstances. Bear in mind that you will bear full responsibility for any consequences resulting from the violation of these rules. "

Life plummeted in an instant after her father’s death. She struggled desperately, even amidst her mother’s extravagance and the mounting debts that they could not overcome.

“Mother, are you… are you really suggesting I be sold to a man older than you right now?”

Yet, everything collapsed with just one sentence from her mother. Then, an offer to become a tutor came from the wealthiest and most prestigious household of the kingdom, House Otis. She had no choice but to accept.

“Welcome to the most fragrant tomb in the world, Miss Richelle Howard. Let’s be good, amicable corpses together.”

A mansion covered in roses. The dazzlingly beautiful Otis family. Within it, strange incidents began, slowly tightening their grip around her neck. Now, it’s time to face the consequences of her choice.

"We sincerely hope you have a safe and enjoyable year. Let’s have fun together."
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 1: Legend of the Golden Witch
description: Each year, the Ushiromiya family gathers at the secluded mansion of its patriarch, the elderly Kinzo. It has been six years since Battler joined his cousins at the annual event, but their happy reunion is overshadowed by worsening weather and an eerie premonition from his youngest cousin-not to mention their parents' feud over the inheritance. Battler doesn't hold much stock in dark omens, nor does he believe the tales of the witch rumored to have given his grandfather a fortune in gold...and who walks the halls of the mansion to this day... But when the eighteen family members and servants are trapped on the island by the raging typhoon, the grisly events that follow leave Battler shaken to his core. Is one of his relatives desperate enough to kill for the family fortune? Or is this the work of the Golden Witch? [Yen Press]
tags: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Minato Seno's high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Osoraku Kanojo wa Ore no Aniki wo Neratteru
description: A high school guy who doesn't trust girls anymore has been tricked too many times by girls who just wanted to get close to his good-looking older brother. After all that, he decides he'll never trust a girl again. But then, a pretty girl in his class suddenly starts talking to him a lot. Is she just trying to get to his brother too...? Or does she actually mean something else?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Rebirth of the Water Margin World: The Strongest Wu Dalang
description:
Modern youth Wu Zhi travels to the world of Water Margin and swaps bodies with Wu Dalang, outwits Ximen Qing,
and uses his precognitive abilities to win over the heroes.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Sesame and Rice Cake
description:
Sesame saves Rice Cake in the park, and they part ways. Rice Cake saves Sesame in the park, and this time, they become friends after Rice Cake's owner takes in Sesame. They become friends, but will that friendship progress to something more? Oh, and they're cats. GL series, infrequent updates (translator made description)  
Author Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/xllb0118?refer_flag=1005055013_&is_all=1>
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Moon on a Rainy Night
description: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl's name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: FAIRY TAIL: 100 Years Quest
description:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail-100-years-quest/)
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Unmei Dakara Akiramete?
description: Taichi, who moved to Tokyo and dreamed of meeting his "soulmate" on his first day at university, suddenly fails miserably on a dating app! He is saved by a mysterious handsome man when he is in trouble at a hotel, and things are going well... or so he thinks, but they break up just before the two of them get together. While he is feeling frustrated about being toyed with, he meets the "mysterious handsome man" again, now known as Kiryu Chisato, who is actually a senior at the same university as Taichi!? A foolish DK who tends to go out of control and a super cool senior who is good at paying attention, are these mismatched two destined to be together? Or...?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Not found
description: Arc and Lily work as guild receptionists in the quiet town of Elwood, nestled on the edge of the Great Dungeon of Dagonalia. But when a mysterious threat known as the "Goblin Queen" attacks and the knights sent to stop her vanish without a trace, chaos descends on the town. As danger looms, Arc must decide whether to take up his sword once more—and uncover the truth behind Lily's hidden feelings.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Mystery

name: Catch Me if You Can
description: The fish circle the bait beneath calm waters of a lake. Inside the club, Jiang Rang follows Qing Zhou's invisible "fishing line" into a private room. Qing Zhou plays prey, but he's the hunter. As passion ignites, a hidden camera rolls and intimate sounds reach a third listener. Blood fades in the dark water. Who's really the catch in this deadly game of seduction?
tags: Thriller, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kimi Janakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo
description: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
The beautiful student council president is cornered by the handsome biology nerd!
Kirishima Sakura is a flawless, elite beauty and the student council president. Her dream is to become Prime Minister one day, and she diligently fulfills her duties as president to sharpen her leadership skills. But one day, she meets Seijirou Tanabe, the school’s most eccentric guy and a handsome biology geek, and soon finds herself swept up in his obsessive passion for living things.

And that’s when Sakura discovers it... The hidden side of Seijirou Tanabe that no one else has ever seen!!!
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Delirium
description:
In the fragile world Hotako Takahashi has built, every role is flawlessly performed.
Hiding behind her characters, she’s mastered the art of pretending. But when a dangerous obsession demands a part she’s not willing to play, her perfectly scripted life goes to hell. Forced to leave the stage she loves, Hotako ends up teaching drama as part of a rehabilitation program for young adults with a criminal past. Surrounded by the chaotic charm of her baby anarchists, Hotako helps them unlock their potential and finally decides to face the darkness she’s been running from. Healing, however, comes at a heavy price.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Self-Published, Delinquents, Web Comic, Tragedy

name: Shio no Kikan ~Moto Yuusha no Ore, Jibun ga Soshiki Shita Chuunibyou Himitsu Kessha wo Tomeru Tame ni Futatabi Isekai ni Shoukan Sarete Shimau~
description:
"How can my past self get so excited doing all those embarrassing things?!"
