When he was in the third year of middle school, Hizaki Shiou was summoned to another world to save it. After defeating the Demon King, he was forcibly returned back to the present day. Yet another three years later, he is summoned to the other world once again, this time to stop the rampage of the secret society "Helheim."

That organization was supposedly actually the one that he had founded during his *chuunibyou* phase, where he called himself the "Corpse King"—a dark past too embarrassing to remember!

Someone seems to be impersonating the name of "Helheim" and tarnishing its reputation. To uncover the truth behind this mystery and clear the organization's name, the Corpse King reunites with his former subordinates, the "Hakkai," who once made Helheim the strongest it had ever been. While agonizing over his dark past, he begins to take action in the other world once again.

Their first stop is the Steel City of Gagiul—rescue the city struggling through famine as well as the pale-looking count's daughter in distress.

"Helheim, moving out."
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Saikyou Ansatsusha, Class Ten'i de Isekai e
description:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mega Man Battle Network
description: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Anthology, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Tasogare Machi Prisoners
description: Not found
tags: Action, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Rooster Fighter
description:
This battle action manga tells the story of how humanity is threatened by overwhelmingly mighty monsters called "Kijū." 
While cities are destroyed and people fall into despair, a single rooster stands up against the threat trying to save humanity...
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Bitter x Sweet
description: Mikazuki is a quiet young man who spends his time alone, looking forward to a cup of coffee. In the midst of this quiet daily life, a cheerful and handsome man, Murayama, suddenly appears and confesses his feelings to him. His encounter with Murayama colors Mikazuki’s life with a sweet, sometimes bitter taste. Just like coffee…
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Namida Ame to Serenade
description: One day energetic high school girl Hina Katagiri suddenly time travels to the year 1907 in Tokyo. The first person she sees is a sorrowful man named Takaaki Hongo. Who exactly is this Hongo-sama? As fate works its gears, how will their romance unfold? Transcending time, two people meet their destiny.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama

name: Not found
description:
Benihana is a young woman who always wanted to become a maid. Their perfectly pressed uniforms, their brilliant coiffed hair, their catlike dexterity when shredding on a skateboard, their tendency to smile no matter what chores they do...

Beg pardon? "Maids don't skateboard?" Au contraire! A maid's entire worth is in their shredding capabilities. All the greatest maids know how to skate - Mary Poppins, Mrs. Doubtfire, Amelia Bedelia, Tony Hawk... and now that Hana has finally become a maid, it's time for her to follow in their footsteps!
tags: Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Jii-san
description: Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Meet Shisoya Toki, a quiet female teacher with a thing for “clothes”. Often seen as cold and unfriendly, her students call her the “unfortunate beautiful teacher”. 

But one day, while organizing supplies in the old school building, she finds a brand new pair of bloomers. Suddenly, her kinky curiosity about “clothes” goes wild!! 

Sometimes SEXY! Sometimes CUTE! Get ready for a wild ride full of seductive cosplay!!
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: This Sweet Online Date Is a Disaster
description: I was helping my sister win the heart of the game's top-ranked player, but it turned out to be a total disaster! I was even ridiculed by that gaming master!!! I guess no one can defy Murphy's Law! Just as the game was loading... Ding! Notice: Your husband is now online!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Oomuro-ke
description:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tower of the Sun
description:
Manga adaption of Morimi Tomihiko's 2003 debut novel.

Set at Kyouto University, a young man is taking his rejection hard, even going so far as to stalk the girl of his affection.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/morimi_taiyo)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Adaptation

name: Adachi to Shimamura
description: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kotetsu's Great Adventures
description: The little devil who barged into the detective agency, Rin. Also known as Kotetsu. Solving tough cases with martial arts skills that you’d never expect from her loli-like body!
tags: Action

name: Love Letter From the Future
description:
Ian Percus, a third-year student from the Academy's swordship department, wakes up one morning to find a flip calendar on his desk and a letter he doesn't remember receiving. The letter contains a cryptic message: "If we don't protect the future, the world will perish."

When he goes to the Academy, he finds out that, unbeknownst to him, a week has passed and that during that time, he defeated a previously undefeated junior. At first, Ian is skeptical, but as the events described in the letter begin to unfold, he gradually starts to believe what is written. What on earth happened during the week he has no memory of...? Will Ian be able to protect the future?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A cool gyaru tries to set her anxious friend up with a date, after thorough practice and preparation.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai
description:
"My seatmate, Shiraishi-san, is just too cute—and it's driving me crazy!"

They know each other, but they’re not exactly friends. Akaogi Ayame and Shiraishi Konomi are classmates—*nothing more, nothing less.* Ayame is strikingly beautiful, a standout athlete, and popular in class, whilst Konomi is shy, introverted, and has only one friend. They should’ve had no reason to interact... so how did things end up this way? What started as a small, trivial incident caused Ayame’s hidden feelings to overflow, now she can’t stop thinking about *her!*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Disney Twisted Wonderland: The Comic—Episode of Scarabia
description: On the way to his target audition, Yu, an ordinary high school student, encounters a mysterious carriage and is taken away. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a parallel world called "Twisted Wonderland"!? Yu has enrolled in Night Raven College, a school for training magicians, and has become accustomed to school life. While many students return home for the winter holidays, Yu and Grimm remain at school, and there they meet a student...
tags: Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Eko Eko Azarak
description:
Misa Kuroi, a beautiful girl who manipulates black magic. When the spell of "Eko Eko Azarak" resounds, 
something happens in the city and in the classroom... The gold standard of occult mysteries is finally here!
tags: Thriller, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Bungou Stray Dogs - Tantei-sha Setsuritsu Hiwa?
description: Over a decade before the events of the manga series, a chance encounter leads professional bodyguard Yukichi Fukuzawa to begrudgingly take an arrogant boy genius named Ranpo Edogawa under his wing. Their first job brings them to a local theater on high alert after receiving a bizarre death threat — a challenge that will require both Ranpo's brains and Fukuzawa's experience. The aftermath spurs Fukuzawa to establish the Armed Detective Agency, an organization that takes on dangerous jobs even the police won't handle!
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Military, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kono Fukushuu ni Gyaru wa Iranai
description: Nozomi Kashihara, a lonely hitman whose parents were killed, has never known warmth in his life. He betrayed the "family" that raised him and lived his life as a plain high school student, but after he saves a gal in his class from a group of delinquents, he somehow finds himself getting closer to her. Kashihara begins to suspect that she may be an assassin targeting him...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: The hero and his party finally reach the Demon King's castle. However, the Demon King's room is cursed with a death sentence for any virgin who enters it!! In order to defeat the Demon King, the virgin hero and his fellow heroines try various strategies to get rid of their virginity... The heroines are shocked by the hero's terrible behavior... but it turns out that they are all in love with the hero...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Kakkou no Iinazuke
description: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!

---
**Link:** Defunct Official English - [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc329?utm_source=mgd)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Is corporal punishment by teachers strictly prohibited under any circumstances!? 

Sakurai, a teacher, witnesses bullying in her class and unintentionally raises her hand against the main culprit student, unaware that a disastrous future awaits them because of their resentment...
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: The Academy’s Genius Tamer
description:
Our protagonist has reincarnated as Han Siha, a minor villain in the dark fantasy novel he once loved. 

To live a peaceful life without getting tangled up with the protagonists, graduating from the academy is a must. But for Han Siha, who has no magical talent and terrible social skills, this is an almost impossible task. Taming, however... it might be possible.

Alright, let’s just focus on making it to graduation like this! But then... the protagonists who were supposed to kill him in the original story are now starting to take an interest in him?! 

Can Han Siha really graduate safely?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
**A fantasy isekai adventure about a man who has to restart life…as an egg?!**

In a world full of dangerous monsters, our unnamed protagonist finds himself reborn at the very bottom of the food chain as an immobile, powerless egg. Even just hatching will require leveling up by fighting monsters–the same monsters who’d love to eat him as a snack. But with the help of the mysterious voice in his head, he’s determined to grow into the most powerful creature in the world!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment*

**Note:** When the manga initially began, it used the light novel's “Saikyou Igai Mezasa nee” subtitle, but by the time of Volume 1, it used its own “Ibara no Dragon Road” subtitle.
___
**Character Designer:** [NAJI Yanagida](https://mangadex.org/author/741e1007-4b08-4ce7-981c-b72ba391936e)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gay
description: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Hijinks
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Kairu Mitsushima, a middle-aged fighting game player who had his life changed after meeting the "living legend" of the fighting game world, Daigo Umehara, is reincarnated into another world after a traffic accident... This world turns out to be a brutal place where battles are fought using fighting game knowledge and techniques...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama

name: Not found
description:
My cousin and I were engaged at the same time. She was engaged to the heir to the duke's house, and I was engaged to the second son.
But the eldest son died in battle, and the second son has now become the heir. To escape her reputation as a husband-killer, my cousin turned to my fiancé.
On the eve of our wedding, my fiancé decided to take her as his first wife and me as his concubine.
Everyone thought I would either swallow my pride or defiantly refuse this union. Instead, I declared, "I will marry the deceased young master instead."
Become a concubine? No!
I'd rather marry a spirit tablet.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Adaptation

name: Yuri no Hajimari wa Dorei Kara
description: Chiyoko Hanamura, a self-proclaimed *gyaru* who failed her high school debut, was skipping class as usual on the rooftop when her junior, Sakine, approached her. It seemed like Sakine had a favor to ask, as she handed Chiyoko a love letter. "Could you turn down this confession for me?" she asked. However, the sender was unknown. For the sake of her adorable junior, and to maintain her *gyaru* dignity, Chiyoko resolved to take on the task and went to refuse the confession...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjou and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Goku, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Sanghyeon Kim has the talent and the drive to become a K-pop star—but one thing keeps holding him back: a false school bullying accusation.
After countless rejections, his dream feels more distant than ever.

But when the head director of a major entertainment company hands him a mysterious bath bomb that transforms him into his past-life self, he's suddenly staring at an unbelievably beautiful... woman?

Sanghyeon's second shot at fame is about to begin—in the most unexpected way!

(Source: WEBTOON)
tags: Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: In-kya na Tsubame wa Bocchi JK
description:
A short prequel to [Introvert Tsubame wants to change](https://mangadex.org/title/1007ec9d-af06-4f22-80a7-3934f02d30b7/introvert-tsubame-wants-to-change), depicting her gloomy High School days.

Originally released as a 20-days extra contents for the original series, Grande later published this manga as an independent book.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Nee, Mou Isso Tsukiacchau? Osananajimi no Bishoujo ni Tanomarete, Camo Kareshi Hajimemashita
description:
Masaichi Mazono, an otaku boy, and Toiro Kurumi, the most beautiful girl in school, are childhood friends. Toiro, who was always in Masaichi's room, was supposed to be like family to him. But one day, Toiro, who was constantly getting annoyed by her romantic troubles, asks Masaichi to play the role of her boyfriend. They thought it would be simple to pretend to be a couple because they’d been together for so long, but their ideal childhood friend can't possibly end up as a false lover...

_"E-eh no, holding hands is embarrassing."_

A childhood friend who is more than a lover embarks on a more adventurous lover's life than she could have dreamed!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mori no Asagao - Shinjin Keimukan to Aru Shikeishuu no Monogatari
description:
A work which highlights the “present” of the capital punishment system through Oikawa Naoki, a newly recruited prison officer, who faces condemned criminals everyday and agonizes. Based on close and careful research, the author tackles with the serious theme of the “capital punishment system” head-on.

Won the 11th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Fate/kaleid liner PRISMA☆ILLYA
description: Features Illya as a main character where she's living an alternate life as a school girl. However, she is chosen by the Magical Stick Ruby and is involved in a quarrel between Rin (Kaleido Ruby) and Luvia (Kaleido Sapphire).
tags: Loli, Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Fantasy

name: Fly Over the Sea
description:
Ji Chi, the young master of a gang, was betrayed and murdered by his fiancé. He was then transmigrated 30 years in the past into the body of a 19-year-old. Here, the Alpha was saved by a kindhearted and gentle Beta during a time of desperation. However, the person who he thought was an angelic savior, had the exact same face as the murderer who killed him in his previous life...

Merciless, younger, bad boy Alpha X Intelligent, soft boy, older, doctor Beta
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Mystery, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Rejoice in Your Enemies
description: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
It was in the year 2800 of the Midgard calendar. Back then, there was a Overlord who once reigned supreme and had reached the very brink of subduing the world. Her name was Lufasu Mafaalu, a great woman dreaded as the Black-Winged Overlord. She was too strong, too fast, and too beautiful. However, she was defeated by Heroes who opposed her ferocity, and her ambition was brought to an end.  
  
Or so went the story of our protagonist’s in-game character, whose body he now possesses for some reason in a world 200 years after Lufasu’s downfall. Follow our protagonist as he becomes unnecessarily feared by his surroundings and unnecessarily worshiped by his former subordinates as he―or now she―cheerfully travels around this fantasy world.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Nine Peaks
description:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
tags: Time Travel, Action, Delinquents

name: Not found
description:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Seinaru Kishi no Ankokudou
description:
Young Sain Forth has it made; as the famed Holy Knight, he has the people's love, the respect of kings, and the blessings of a literal goddess. His aspirations lie elsewhere, though. With his assistant Melia at his side, he leaves for an academy in a foreign kingdom, where he is treated as a deviant by his peers. It's his own fault, mind you—his stubborn insistence on wearing a custom, all-black uniform makes him stick out.

He isn't the only outcast in his class: Alicia, born into the Clan of Light but unable to use anything but fire magic, faces similar struggles, and the two quickly become allies. Alicia proposes that they enter the labyrinth below the school in search of a holy sword, but Sain has other plans in mind: a doom sword. And so, with his friends in tow, Sain ventures into the perilous unknown, driven by a wish to become the coolest, edgiest, most awesome thing in existence: a Dark Knight. There's just one problem. He can't use dark magic. Like, at all.
___
[Official English Translation of the Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/the-holy-knight-s-dark-road)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Phony Fortune-Telling Gyaru
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Jason Misawa is a typical high school boy until the night he gets attacked along with Yumi by an unusual creature. He is almost dead when a voice offers him power, and when he awakes he sees that he is a different person. He views the real demonic faces that are masked by the ordinary people, the mark on his hand can overpower the strongest, and he starts to be in peril constantly. Jason wants to know what took place that night, what this power signifies, and the reason why these monsters are manifesting in his life.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: KaguRai ~Kagura to Raito~
description: Kagura is a samurai girl known as the "Sword Saint" for her mastery of the way of the blade. And Raito is a boy who belongs to the race called "Nin'you" that is hated by the humans. The two met in their childhood and spent happy times together as best friends, until the difference in their races separated them. Kagura took up the sword for Raito. For the sake of them living together. The bond between the two transcends years, walls, races, reality! Surpass it all!!
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Samurai, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Crossdressing
description:
Update : 18-September-2023

---

Part 2 Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/111246570)
tags: Romance, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
I'm aiming for the  Akutagawa Prize with this crazy woman. So I can meet ‘that girl’ again, the one who gave me a reason to live. 
Meiko, a part-time writer, has had a string of failures since publishing her first book 10 years ago, and has struggled to fit into society. Her only emotional support was the opinions about her novels sent by ”Yuu-chan," a person whose face she has never even seen. But one day, a fire destroys everything, and Meiko loses the meaning of live.  At that moment, a beautiful and mysterious editor appears, claiming to be the one who best understands Meiko's work... The life of a writer sunk into the depths is reborn, enveloped in madness...!
tags: Psychological, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom -Gravure-
description: U.C. 0096 - As the conflict between the Earth Federation Forces and the Neo Zeon remnants, known as the Laplace Incident, draws to a close, a new mission is given to the unofficial mercenary unit Argent Keel, which undertakes missions for both the Federation and Zeon alike: the assassination of a high-ranking Federation official. It was by no means a major operation. However, this job shakes up the existence of Argent Keel, which has remained silent for a long time, and unearths the truth that has been hidden as an illusion.
tags: Sci-Fi, Mecha, Drama, Adaptation

name: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru
description:
I've gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like. I don't have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!? Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan's meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

"Marika-chan, you don't like me, so why are you so kind to me...?" What is Marika-chan's hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Cecil Perdium, the Mercenary King, was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death, he learns that Duke Delphine, the man who caused the downfall of his family, didn't work alone. 

Suddenly waking up as his teenage self, Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure, he has his work cut out for him. 

Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: Not found
description:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Osananajimi BIGLOVE
description:
I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. 

A yuri story between two childhood friends.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
On the evening of the summer festival, my sandals caused a foot blister so that I couldn't walk anymore, but then Takada-kun, a boy from my parallel class, stepped in to help me out. A straight and pure-hearted love, as well as all the intricacy of adolescence that comes with it.

(Source: Champion Cross, translated)
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A poor high school boy, Izuki Tomonari, got caught up in a kidnapping attempt on Hinako Konohana, a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates. On the surface, Hinako appears to be a brilliant and beautiful young woman, but in reality, she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However, due to family reasons, Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her, Izuki took on the job of caring for her. Eventually, Hinako began to spoil Izuki with all her might. "I don't want... Izuki to leave my side right now."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: The Twins' New Life
description:
Reborn as the prince and princess of a fantastical land, Arienne Yuriana and her twin brother, Arhen, should have been living a life of luxury… But instead of beautiful palaces, magical adventures, and attentive servants, the twins are left by the emperor to live with their abusive mother in a rundown castle full of cruel maids. However, after a freak accident suddenly leaves them without a guardian, their father reappears, saying that now he wants them to live in the palace! Thrown into an unfamiliar world of royals, can the twins forgive their neglectful dad and make the most of their new life with him? Or will this world prove too dangerous for the two of them to survive?

(The main story ends with Chapter 138, with 21 Epilogue chapters released afterwards.)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yakushi to Maou
description:
Previously a woman in science, she experienced a fated love in another world...

Seina Satou, who works as a pharmaceutical researcher, suddenly finds herself lost in a different world! One day, after managing to start life as the pharmacist 'Sena', she encounters a mysterious man. He is the demon king Dermatitidis, a man of immense beauty and strong magical powers, but sickly and weak. Sena's knowledge and experience in herbal medicine is recognized, and she becomes his personal apothecary, with whom he shares a special and unforgettable time. And so, before long, the two are drawn to each other.
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Our Aimless Nights
description: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Rudo lives in the slums of a floating town, where the poor scrape by under the shadow of the rich who live a sumptuous life, simply casting their garbage off the side, into the abyss. Then one day, he’s falsely accused of murder, and his wrongful conviction leads to an unimaginable punishment—exile off the edge, with the rest of the trash. Down on the surface, the cast-off waste of humanity has bred vicious monsters, and if Rudo wants to have any hope of discovering the truth and seeking vengeance against those who cast him into Hell, he will have to master a new power and join a group known as the Cleaners who battle the hulking trash beasts of the Pit!

*Source: Kodansha Manga, Vol. 1*
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Yuuto Kuroma, a 14-year-old with a serious case of chuunibyou, accidentally summons the ultimate Dragon King using a magic circle he had doodled purely on a whim... (Wait, seriously?) On top of that, due to certain circumstances, Yuuto ends up becoming friends with a lonely evil dragon girl who had been sealed away for 3000 years...! Now, the fate of the world is casually entrusted to one unsuspecting boy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Witch Hat Atelier
description:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she's never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody "knows" might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems...
___  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.
___
**Officially licensed:**  
- In English by [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/witch-hat-atelier/) as *Witch Hat Atelier*
- Indonesian by [Elex Media](https://elexmedia.id/detail/produk/Atelier-of-Witch-Hat-01/9786020458892/pencarian) as *Atelier of Witch Hat*
- In German by [Egmont Manga](https://www.egmont-manga.de/series/Atelier%20of%20Witch%20Hat) as *Atelier of Witch Hat*
- In Spanish by [Milky Way Ediciones](https://www.milkywayediciones.com/collections/all/atelier-of-witch-hat) as *Atelier of Witch Hat*
- In French by [Pika](https://www.pika.fr/serie/latelier-des-sorciers) as *L'Atelier des Sorciers* 
- In Italian by [Panini Comics](https://www.panini.it/shp_ita_it/atelier-of-witch-hat-1-matel001isbn-it08.html) as *Atelier of Witch Hat*
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [Panini Comics](https://loja.panini.com.br/panini/produto/Manga-Atelier-of-Witch-Hat-1.aspx) as *Atelier of Witch Hat*
- In Polish by [Kotori](http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/atelier-spiczastych-kapeluszy/) as *Atelier spiczastych kapeluszy*
- In Russian by [Истари Комикс](https://istari.ru/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/atel_e_koldovskih_kolpakov/) as *Ателье колдовских колпаков*  
- In Ukrainian by [Nasha Idea](https://nashaidea.com/product/ateliye-chaklunskih-kapeluhiv-tom1/) as *Ательє чаклунських капелюхів*
- In Korean by Haksan Media as *고깔모자의 아틀리에*
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Reincarnated from modern Japan as Reischel, the First Prince of the Kingdom of Agarham, the protagonist receives a supernatural power that allows him to heal any anomaly just by touching it. Following his father's death, Reischel is removed from his position as Crown Prince due to his younger brother's rebellion and is sent to the battlefront. Despite this, he spends his days healing wounded soldiers, both allies and enemies, and gradually establishes himself as the respected commander of the medical corps. One day, he treats a soldier who is on the brink of death, but that soldier turns out to be... ?! An intensely dramatic and slightly erotic isekai harem life begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Adaptation

name: 'Cause Calypso Can
description:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.

---
At age 3, Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen, and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around, Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is, she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?
tags: Reincarnation, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
In a far-off corner of another world where only nobles can use magic, a certain thirty-something salaryman is reincarnated as a five-year-old village boy named Ren.

For him, the slow-paced countryside life is peaceful and enjoyable—that is, until a group of adorable but terrifying little angels (a.k.a. troublemaking children) takes a liking to him.

Even though he just wants to be lazy, he ends up doing things perfectly—like playing hide-and-seek from morning till night, reading stories aloud, and calming their wailing cries—because he's just too good at taking care of others!

One day, while thinking of ways to slack off more, a monster suddenly attacks their once-peaceful village. And when the problem children are put in danger, the usually unmotivated Ren unleashes a hidden power he's kept secret—just to avoid getting dragged into more trouble!

A laid-back reincarnated boy ends up babysitting (and saving the kingdom) in this reluctant hero’s tale!
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A man meets a cute girl on a dating app and quickly they fall for each other. However, the girl lies about her job in her profile, saying she's in the fashion industry when she is in fact working as a prostitute. Eventually she reveals the truth to him, asking him: “Even if I date you, I won't quit my job. Can you still be with me?”. He decides to stay with her but this decision is the start of soul-eating inner turmoil of dealing with the knowledge that his beloved girlfriend is giving her body to other men.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Yuji Kuze, the hero who once saved another world, returns to Japan only to find himself without a place to belong—reduced to what society calls a “loser.” Just as he contemplates ending his life, he wanders into Kabukicho and encounters a peculiar concept café. This café is a special place where girls who are also “otherworld returnees” work. “You should try becoming a hero in this city again,” someone tells him—pushing him to stand back up. Thus, Yuji vows to rise once more! A new adventure begins for the man who once saved an entire world.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Superhero, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2
description:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he'll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
___
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Adabana no Yakusoku
description:
Also posted on artist's X (Twitter): 
[https://x.com/zwtkm_mng/status/1979140371335565713](https://x.com/zwtkm_mng/status/1979140371335565713)
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Gore

name: Not found
description:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: April Showers Bring May Flowers
description: Tabata Hana is a lonely, negative and unpopular high school girl. Her class's most handsome guy, Yousuke, accidentally witnessed her happily pretending to be a heroine in the classroom one early morning...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Wǒ Xīn Fěi Shí
description: In order to start a rebellion, Jiujin infiltrated the Western Region’s marriage convoy on its way through the central plains. But her cover was blown on the very first day. Fortunately for her, it appears that the princess she was escorting might also be a fake! Pursued by forces on all sides they must rely on each other to survive. Through close encounters and shared dangers, feelings gradually begin to blossom.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fugue Across Worlds
description: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice, Shinjuku - Shinjuku Phantom Incident
description:
The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I.
The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.
tags: Sci-Fi, Historical, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A very short take on a scenario everyone was hoping would come to fruition
tags: Oneshot, Romance

name: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
description: Tracy was only 16 when she was sentenced to death. Unloved and unwanted, she died as a forgotten side character in someone else's story. But fate gives her a chance to write her own story as the protagonist this time by sending her back into her six-year-old body. This time, Tracy knows every betrayal coming her way and refuses to be a mere stepping stone again. If survival means becoming the villain, she'll gladly embrace the darkness. Now, let the real story begin.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Full Color

name: Four Choices
description: A perfectionist model student believed love was a luxury. Suddenly, four choices appear and her heart wavers. Is this okay?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest has a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: APOSIMZ
description: The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Adventure

name: Not found
description: In the world of daily full-throttle dedication to his studies, there's Itsuki, a high school boy. The reason he's putting in so much effort into his studies is to reunite with his first love, a girl named Amane, and go on a date with her. While he's immersed in these study-centric days, by a twist of fate, he ends up living together with Amane and her sisters, Shion and Mone...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life

name: Kirakira Shitemo, Shinakutemo
description: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.
tags: Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ura Baito: Toubou Kinshi
description:
Ura baito, also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life. Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. To that end, they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs.
___
This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. We are not responsible for any damage to your health.
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Ballad of Tides
description:
In the rain-cursed kingdom of Vialla—where the sun hasn’t shone in 100 years—Princess Opalette is chosen to perform in the ancient Festival of Tides, a ritual said to decide the fate of the realm.
Ballad of tides follows Opalette, a sheltered princess raised under an eternally gray sky. The kingdom believes the festival, held once every hundred years, can restore balance and bring back the lost sunlight. But as the ritual approaches, Opalette struggles under her father’s emotional demands and the expectations placed upon her.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: The Heavenly Path Is Not Stupid
description:
Heaven and earth are benevolent towards everything…
Bullshit, I don’t agree with this! The former heavenly Dao was the villain, and the same heavenly Dao is full of slaughter and death! Watch me and how I straighten the yin and yang, reshape the cycle of reincarnation, and create a perfect world of cultivation. One in which all the rebels will….cough cough! In a nutshell, just watch and learn!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui
description:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay. One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yakoui Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
In today's Japan, "rental" services can deliver an afternoon with a "friend," a "parent," even a fake girlfriend! After a staggering betrayal by his girlfriend, hapless freshman Kazuya gets just desperate enough to give it a try. But he quickly discovers how complicated it can be to "rent" an emotional connection, and his new "girlfriend," who's trying to keep her side hustle secret, will panic when she finds out her real life and Kazuya's are intertwined in surprising ways! Family, school, and life all start to go wrong, too...

(Source: Kodansha Comics)
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
- Official English Volumes: [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The protagonist awakens to find herself reincarnated as Lunaria il von Solfege, her beloved villainess from her favorite game. However, along with this new identity come Lunaria's tragic memories—public condemnation, complete abandonment, and ultimately, a desperate attempt to take her own life with a dagger. "You can leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I am you, I will never let them get away with this," she vows.

*Source: K Manga*
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Power-Hara Bishoujo Company
description: The company employee Osanai is upset, because his superior, a middle-aged man, abuses him at work every single day. One day Osanai ends up drinking his pain away and accidentally buys glasses which promise to make middle-aged men look like beautiful girls. His everyday life changes drastically…
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, Office Workers, Supernatural

name: Urekko Mangaka X Utsubyou Mangaka
description:
A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka.
This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).
tags: Psychological, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Tenkousaki ni Oshi no Maid ga Ita
description: Not found
tags: Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
This is a story about a black cat who became a cat girl.

---

Alternative Tankobon Links - [Animate](https://www.animate-onlineshop.jp/pn/pd/3277397/), [Gamers](https://www.gamers.co.jp/pn/pd/10842472/)

name: Undercurrent
description: The manga begins as Kanae Sekiguchi, proprietor of the Tsuki no Yu bathhouse, struggles to reopen her business after the unexplained disappearance of her husband…
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: Detective Xeno and the Seven Locked Murder Rooms
description:
The story follows Detective Xeno, who after being found collapsed at the side of a road covered in blood and was taken to a hospital the first thing he said upon awakening was solving a murder that happened in the hospital!  
Xeno himself has no memory of who he is or where he came from, but after that huge incident and after leaving the hospital, he opened up a detective agency and in just a year he solved some high-profile cases.
tags: Psychological, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Konse wa Goen ga Arimasu you ni!
description: Drowning in the past, Kurose Kazuma is an example of someone who is gloomy, has no hope, no dreams, and has never felt love. One day while thinking about his past in high school, he remembered Mizuki Haruka, a girl who had recently become a renowned actress, and was once Kurose's friend. While wondering what he would have changed if he could go back in time to his high school days, he meets a goddess figure who seemed to be cosplaying as a bunny girl, and suddenly, Kurose finds himself back in his high school days. Given this second chance, Kurose resolves to fix the mistakes of his past and produce a happier outcome for his life.
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon ICMA
description: Not found
tags: Thriller, Action, Animals, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Mary-san
description:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara Janai
description: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Yu-Gi-Oh OCG STORIES
description: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
tags: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Beyond the Sky
description: Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years, and never thought that one day he would become one of the main characters in an epic. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was forced wield a knife and began to face everything he knew nothing about: the invasion of civilization, the Azure Alliance, the mobile energy suit, the unique witness corps; the blade of exile, the sharp streams... He is narrow-minded, he is "The Qing Major" painted on cars and high-rise buildings in the era of full-scale military conscription; he will make the first cut in the Zenith War.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Drama, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an "angel." Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she's also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Nicknamed “Belle Poupée”—the Beautiful Doll—duke’s daughter Lady Leticia is admired for her elegance and delicate beauty. But behind her porcelain mask lies her true self: a bold and compassionate soul, more knight than damsel. She ends up engaged to the infamous second prince, Gilbert, whose cursed crimson eyes and icy demeanor have made him the subject of troubling rumors. Fate binds together an infallible Princess Charming and a lonely, awkward prince as they search for their happily ever after in this ultimate role-reversal love story.

*Source: MangaPlaza*

----
Note: 実に愛い！ is romanized as Jitsu ni Aii! (“Truly lovely!” / “Absolutely adorable!”) rather than Jitsu ni Ui! (“Truly innocent!”) as it fits the term Belle Poupée (“Beautiful Doll” in French) better as it implies elegance and cuteness, not innocence.
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Please Take My Brother Away!
description: What's your brother like? To Miao, her brother Fen is someone who teases her and makes her go ballistic 100 times a day. There's rarely a peaceful day as the two are fighting every single minute. However, when trouble comes, Fen becomes a caring brother who protects his little sister at all costs.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Creepy and Freaky
description:
Step into "The Creepy and Freaky", where fear is our commodity. Take your time, shop around, and immerse yourself in these tales of terror for as long as you please.

(MANGA Plus)
tags: Monsters, Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Naruto
description:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
tags: Monsters, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Marriage Toxin
description:
Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have "no prospects with women" and marriage as "something not for him." However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to... force his little sister into doing "that". Driven to his wits' end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to...
___
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Delinquents

name: Fei Ren Zai
description: Chinese Mythical Beasts living in modern China.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Shihai Shoujo Kubaru-chan
description:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Robou no Fujii
description:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii...
tags: Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kakure Tensei Yuusha ~Cheat Skill to Yuusha Job wo Kakushite Dai Ni no Jinsei wo Tanoshindeyaru!~
description:
Yuuji Fujii was caught up in a class summoning. When he refused to transfer along with his classmates, he ended up being reincarnated as Toi in another world!

"Master, why don't you choose the hero job?"
"If people find out I'm a hero, it'll be a huge hassle, right? I want to live freely!"

Toi wants to hide his cheat skills and the "Reincarnated Hero" job.

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
120 years after the Emperor's death, the Emperor's messenger and a Former member of the hero's party, Benrira, awakens. 

Having lost her beloved student to the corrupt fatherland, she decides to deliver the Emperor's final message.

"I am the messenger who delivers the Emperor's words. Heed the will of the First Emperor!"
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. What will become of Lavi's adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota

name: Not found
description: Kazuya Niimi, a student at a music university, is known for having "immobile fingers"—hardly fitting for someone aspiring to be a pianist. One day, due to a sudden twist of fate, Kazuya finds himself lost in another world. In this strange new world, men are not treated as people—it is a society of overwhelming female supremacy and male subjugation. But in that world, Kazuya notices something strange happening to his body. His fingers now hold a mysterious power. Fingers that cause anyone they touch to physically react.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Sangokushi
description:
Manga adaptation of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, illustrated by the legendary Mitsuteru Yokoyama. Serialized from 1972~1986, it has since become the most famous manga adaptation of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

---- 
**Won the 20th Japanese Cartoonist Association Excellence Award in 1991**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Tenga Tensei - One Shota Elf to Sugosu Rinri Fuyou no Isekai Life
description: Tenga Matsuyama, who had long endured the disgust of his classmates (and even his own parents), managed to live for 18 years. The moment he finally decided to step into the "Adult" section after graduating high school, he was struck down by an oncoming truck, and should have died... However, he ended up reincarnating into another world as a handsome boy with cheat abilities! Now, he's living a life where he's unbelievably popular!?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Shota

name: Exorcist wa Midara ni Aragau
description: In a world where evil spirits and Yōkai have become a societal problem, there are "Exorcists" who struggle day and night to exterminate these creatures for world peace. In this world, a 15 year old boy named Mashiro is the leader of a certain exorcist unit. This unit is full of beauties but... They always lose and need to be rescued by him. Will Mashiro be able to make these girls into full fledged Exorcists!?
tags: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Horror, Fantasy

name: My Simulated Path to Immortality
description: Not found
tags: Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Otokojuku Gaiden - Akashi Gouji
description: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Akashi Gouji.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Gore

name: Dekisokonai Ouji no Nariagari ~Seikon Nashi no Dai San Ouji ni Tensei Shitakedo, Kondokoso Kazoku wo Mamoru Tame ni Saikyou wo Mezasu~
description: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Romance, Web Comic

name: Sentaku no Toki
description:
During summer break, a junior high school student Mitsuharu collides with an unusual creature while speeding on his bicycle. That unusual creature was a genderless alien called Toki who came to Earth for a "purpose". An unpredictable story about a lonely human and an alien starts!
___
**Links:**
- [Jump Square](https://jumpsq.shueisha.co.jp/rensai/sentakunotoki/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Code Geass - A Year's Worth of Emotions
description: Short fluffy Code Geass Twitter oneshot.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Hello, my name is Melodia Nonoire. I'm a magic soldier of the Royal Knights. Due to unexpected circumstances, I was transferred into a new unit, the Fenrir Knights. To my surprise, my boss, Captain Dietrich, is a dog!! And he definitely looks like the dog I used to keep, albeit Dietrich-sama is bigger and more fluffy, which suits my preference just fine but… Huh? What???

"Hm~ What an interesting girl. I will take you as my bride."

"WHAAAAAAAAAT?!?!?!"

Just what's going to happen to me from here on?!?!

A doting love story with a beast captain. A dog × dog(?) fluffy love fantasy is unfolding!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/7710), [ZERO-SUM Online](https://zerosumonline.com/zerosum/comic/fenmofu)
tags: Historical, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Player Hides His Past
description:
The real world is suddenly ambushed by rifts that threaten to spill out monsters from the VR game Chronicles of Arcana. These rifts can only be closed by Players, people who have awakened as their in-game characters with all the same stats and skills. 

Unfortunately for protagonist Lee Hoyeol, his awakening is the opposite of cool as his avatar happens to be the one he made during the height of his awkward phase in middle school, giving him all the mannerisms and speech of an absolute cringelord. 

Just how will he go on to become the hero humanity needs most?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Will my love destroy the peace of this town?! After discovering to have incredible stamina, Hanna begins working part-time as a mascot in a costume. Although she is sometimes bullied by children, she was meant to do her best as the mascot hero "Panbuu" to protect the peace of the town - but her true identity is about to be discovered by Ubukata-kun, who is in the class next to her!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: A Witch's Life in Mongol
description: In the 13th century, Fatima, a captive of the Mongol Empire, the most powerful empire on earth, was taken prisoner and assigned to serve in the imperial palace. With knowledge from Iran, the era's foremost experts on medicine and science, Fatima seeks a world in which she can display her talents. She meets Töregene, the sixth wife of the second emperor, Ögedei, who has mixed feelings about the Mongol Empire....
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Military, Drama

name: We Met in Ueno
description: The meeting in Ueno between Lin Ge and Hiroki Asano began with a misunderstanding, but the two gradually built up their friendship despite language and cultural differences. This is a cute and funny story of a Chinese boy and a Japanese boy!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: + Tic Nee-san
description: The story follows a third-year high-school girl (Nee-san) who likes building plastic models in a model-making club along with fellow club members Makimaki and Okappa.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: McRonald’s Trip into Existential Dread
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Web Comic

name: Merry Marbling
description: When he was young, Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then, Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon, who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building, could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival, Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly, Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However, Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it, Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know, whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water, these two create a beautiful dissonance.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Hodoite, Musunde
description:
Ms. Nohara is next to me when we change seats. Her hair is very beautiful, but she is clumsy and can't seem to do it herself…?

Haruki, who sets his sister's hair every morning, suddenly finds himself setting hers. As they tie her precious hair, they gradually become more and more aware of each other and grow closer. Untying and tying, their hearts are spun by their hair.

"A high school romance about a boy who is growing closer to a clumsy girl while fixing her hair."
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A shy girl has a message for her childhood friend and tells him in an unconventional way.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl… Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!
tags: Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The daily life of five girls who just became university students. They love delicious food, want to have lots of fun with everyone, and study a little harder to enjoy university life to the fullest!
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Phantom Movie Star
description:
In "Screen City", actors can go inside the world of a movie firsthand. One day, well-known A-list Screen City actor Nam Woo-Joo is in the midst of a performance when an intruder by the name of Woo Joo-Yeon repeatedly kills him one movie after the other, subsequently pushing Nam Woo-Joo out of his limelight as the star.
