Nam Woo-Joo, who can't help but grow spiteful, finally begins to face off against Woo Joo-Yeon, the movie terrorist, but...

"Just what is the reason you're doing this to me, Woo Joo-Yeon...?!"
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Oni Joushi Gokudera-san wa Abakaretai
description:
A lewd body, with lewd underwear... 
It’s insanely arousing. 

Even though he’s capable, Shouji is a corporate slave, who is always being berated by his boss, Gokudera-san.
In an unexpected turn of events, Gokudera-san accidentally sends him the link of a sexy man wearing women’s underwear instead of his dog’s social media account...
This can't be...?!?!
The gap between the boss who is devilish by day, and erotic and cute by night is enough to make a corporate dog explode in desire!!!
tags: Boys' Love, Office Workers

name: Not found
description: Shinozuka Takeshi and his family finally achieved their dream of owning a home. But their happiness was made possible by one person: their kind neighbor, Shirasawa! From helping with household adjustments to supporting them through child-rearing troubles and job searches, Shirasawa’s generosity knew no bounds. As days turned into reliance, Takeshi grew uneasy, but by the time he realized things had gone too far, it was already.
tags: Psychological, Drama

name: Ore no Aoharu ga Susumanai
description:
Never underestimate what might happen when healthy high-school boys suppress their desire for sex! 

With their first flushes of youth beginning to blossom, Subaru and Jinnai fell in love with each other and became boyfriends. However, ever since they caressed each other that day at Subaru’s house, Jinnai became reluctant to make any sort of move on Subaru.

“They don’t show what happens after the two lovers kiss each other in those shoujo mangas (bibles)!”

One day, with Subaru burdened with a sense of uneasiness for what’s to come, for the first time ever in their relationship, the mood had been set! However, Subaru’s tension was sky-high and he blurted out, “Since I’m doing it with you… I’m sure everything will go smoothly!” with a cheesy smile plastered across his face! 

You only get to experience summer as a high school junior once and Subaru and Jinnai have just taken a huge detour in their relationship. Where will their youth take them?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Kobato is a high school freshman who wants to live a normal life, not become a great detective. He tries to lead a quiet and modest school life with his like-minded friend, Osanai, but one mystery after another keeps coming his way. Even though he doesn't want to stand out, Kobato is compelled to solve mysteries. Will he ever find peace?

(Source: Magazine Pocket, translated)
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Vanilla land
description:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy

name: City Hunter - Rebirth
description:
A forty-year-old single woman, obsessed with City Hunter manga, is hit by a train only to find herself in the world of her favorite manga. 
Big fan of Ryou Saeba since her teenage years, she will do all she can to live a love story with him.

---
Official Release:
- French release by Ki-oon (2019)
- Indonesian release by Akasha (2020)
- Italian release by Panini Comics (2019)
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Mystery

name: House of Riddles
description: The brutal and bizarre murder raises the curiosity of the famous gentleman detective Lucien, but the crime scene is destroyed by a fire. And the last person to arrive at the scene was Scarlett Atissian, the producer of the house who learned from the crime scene. To find out the truth of the case, Lucien had to" bully" the strange lady to cooperate with his investigation. He didn't know Scarlett had so many bloody secrets...
tags: Thriller, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Itsuki Ichigohara is a married high-school teacher in her late 20's, who finds herself involved with a high school girl, her student, who is 10 years younger. The student's name is Rin Togawa. She is taller than Itsuki, with a beautiful face, mild-mannered but a little childish. She is a good girl, but she has had problems in her family life, and as Itsuki tried to counsel her, they somehow ended up kissing each other in bed. This is definitely an adulterous betrayal, not to mention a crime. How could she have got herself into so much trouble that could only lead to her own destruction?

— How could I have let this happen?

It is a lewd and immoral, but somehow warm relationship. A love story between a female teacher and her female student.
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
description:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Saitei Rank no Boukensha, Yuusha Shoujo wo Sodateru Orette
description: The old man who joined just to fill out the party is actually a legendary adventurer!? A hidden hero turns a talented S-class party of beautiful girls into full-fledged heroes! The greatest training fantasy from "Let's Become a Novelist"!!
tags: Action, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Happy Doll Days
description: Struggling under society's pressures, the fresh graduate, and new hire Yui is utterly exhausted. In the midst of everything, a photo of a doll on an SNS site catches her eye. Drawn in by the doll's cuteness, before she realizes it, it's all she can think about! One day at her regular karaoke place, while Yui gazes at the doll, a gyaru employee, Takanashi Iroha, suddenly starts talking to her?!
tags: Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Kutabire Salarymen no Ore, 7nenburi ni Saikai shita Bishoujo JK to Dosei wo Hajimaru
description:
Amae Yuuya, an office worker in his third year of employment, is completely exhausted by the daily grind. Then, for the first time in seven years, Yuuya meets Aoi Shiratori, a girl eight years younger than him who used to live in his neighborhood. She had grown up to be a beautiful JK girl who was good at housework, and she said to him,

"Yuuya-kun, would you like to live with me under the premise of marriage?"

Aoi desperately wants to live with Yuuya, her first love. Yuuya, who is puzzled, agrees to live with Aoi as a guardian for the time being, but Aoi's aggressive approach makes him very nervous inside.
___
[Japanese Light Novel](https://firecross.jp/hjbunko/series/492)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: One night, an assassin disguised as a high schooler runs into his drunk neighbor, who plants an unexpected kiss on him. From that moment on, he must keep his secret identity hidden while figuring out how to deal with the “mister” living upstairs.
tags: Official Colored, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crime, School Life

name: Daredemo Dakeru Kimi ga Suki
description:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even...!?
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls' middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale... now enrolling!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yubisaki to Renren
description:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
High school girl Sayama Umi is placed in the care of the neighboring Hiroi family while her mother is away on a long business trip. The Hiroi household is home to Shoya, an eight-years-older figure she admires, and Umi's heart races at their long-awaited reunion. But the Shoya she encounters is completely different from the one in her memories...

A faintly sparkling cohabitation story about meeting changed memories once more.
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains
description: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Amano Megumi wa Suki Darake!
description: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku-sensou wo Hajimeru
description: The Sage Dwight, along with the Hero, defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Urushi Uruhashi
description: Mihiro Kanayama is a third-year high school student who aspires to become a lacquer craftsman. He is given a challenge by his grandfather, who tells him to create while thinking about the person who he is creating for, but the meaning doesn't quite click. Then, he encounters Tsumugi Fukaya, a woman working at an inn. Pure emotions bloom within a young man dedicated to traditional craftsmanship. Though he may be clumsy in his determined perseverance, this young boy's efforts are admirable and cool!
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Dog Nigga
description:
Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA Plus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/wt2208302035572710014241408/) | [ART street](https://medibang.com/book/xb2005061537310810014241408/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/61917191/series/172665)
- Discord - [Server](https://discord.gg/BzQXA4vwXt)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Military, Delinquents, Police

name: Not found
description:
For Yu Suzukaze, reuniting with the childhood friend he adored feels like a dream come true. After ten long years apart, they can finally enjoy high school life together. But it turns out, this girl isn’t exactly “single”!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
___
See also the related [Web Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/bc53a34e-2771-43f1-b967-9046f4d7b8f1/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) version.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: 2.5 Jigen no Ririsa
description:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Furi2Play!
description: Daily life of a group of foreigners working for a game company in Japan.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Meguru Mirai
description:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
**Not even a zombie apocalypse can slow down a teenager's libido! One teen discovers he may just have the cure to a mysterious outbreak in this fun and sexy survival manga.**

When a zombie apocalypse suddenly breaks out during the school festival, shogi player Koutarou manages to save the beautiful and buxom Kana just before she's taken by a swarm. But when they reach Kosaka Kotaro was living his best life as a gamer otaku... until the zombie apocalypse hit. Now the streets are crawling with the undead—and his biggest regret? Dying a virgin.

Then he rescues the gorgeous Kana, who’s just been bitten... and doesn't want to turn into a zombie before losing her virginity. Kotaro's happy to help—and after their steamy encounter, something incredible happens: her bite begins to fade.

Could the cure be inside Kotaro? Kana’s not taking any chances. She's sticking close, keeping him busy—and making sure the "treatments" keep coming.

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, vol. 1*
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore

name: Not found
description: Six years ago, Natsuki Yura was summoned to another world as a hero. After defeating the Demon King and finally managing to return to his original world, he discovered that Earth was actually full of fantasy too—psychics, aliens, angels, gods, you name it.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Tachinomi Goreijou
description:
Cheers to you tonight! She is a graceful young lady, Miko Kanno, but her appearance is a little scary and she is feared by those around her. Recently, she has become addicted to “standing bars”! Potato salad, sea cucumbers, yakitori, fried chicken…
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02015/episode/366588)
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Someone Hertz
description: Mimei shares the hobby of listening to a late-night comedy radio show with the funny and mysterious Kurage from his class. And she's famous for sending in hilarious comments that are read on the show? But Mimei wants to be just as funny as her! Are they friends, are they rivals, are they something more...? This radio rom-com is on the air!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kaiibu ~M-ken Y-shi no Kai Genshou ni Tsuite~
description: When transfer student Sakuraba Sakura arrives in Yuuyamichou, she discovers a place steeped in bizarre, ancient customs. The children there all have strange names and are bound by a curse that prevents them from leaving the city until they graduate high school. Caught in an escalating nightmare, Sakura must navigate curses, summonings, and betrayals. To break the curse and free the children, Sakura teams up with Andou Uzu, the mysterious president of the Paranormal Club.
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Girls' Love, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Watashi no Omen ga Toreru Made
description:
"I've always thought you were cute." 

Shinotsuka Rei, who has difficulty expressing her emotions, is kept at a distance by those around her and even given the nickname "Noh Mask." Apart from Sasabayashi Minato, who greets everyone cheerfully, she rarely speaks to anyone. One day, Shinotsuka's colleague invites her out to dinner. She decides to go, thinking it's a chance to chance her aloof personality, but she can't keep the conversation going and is subjected to harsh words. At that moment, Sasabayashi comes to the rescue...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army. Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Survival, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Gluttonous Romance
description: This is story about a food-loving couple, who have a twelve year age gap, and how their relationship unfolds through these comical chapters and endless restaurant hopping adventures. Through their experiences, the chapters will explore the similarities between love and good food to share tips into finding the right person and the right restaurant.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
"Why is my favorite singer singing my song!?"

Tsunagu Kurose, a high school student with a passion for musics composing but a terrible singing voice, often receives criticisms whenever he posts them on the Internet. One day, while shouldering the responsibility of taking commemorative photos of the culture festival reluctantly with Otoha Hinomori - a quiet classmate sitting next to him, his childhood friend Tetsu Tamura was in a dilemma because of unavoidable accidents occuring on the stage run by his club. Without hesitation, Tsunagu gives him the demo instrumental songs he composed to save the situation. Unfortunately, Tetsu open the wrong music file with Tsunagu's terrible lyrics, making him feels like he wanna hole up due to that unfortunate disaster. In despair at this miserable situation, Otoha takes off her thick glasses, tightly grips the microphone and hums that song! 

"Isn't this voice similar to icy - the singer I've always admired...!?"

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Not found
description:
In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative official raw: [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_005466_S) | [Kadokawa](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/search/?auth=%E5%BD%B1%E5%B1%B1%E5%87%8C%E7%A9%BA)
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Dai-3 no Gideon
description: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?
tags: Historical, Action, Drama

name: Not found
description: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sanju Mariko
description:
The manga centers on veteran novelist Mariko Kōda, who lives with the families of both her son and her grandson in one house. Feeling like she no longer has any place in her home, she decides to leave the house and strike out on her own, beginning with living in a manga cafe in the city.

Won 42nd Annual Kodansha Manga Award for "Best General Manga" (2018)
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Due to an unknown phenomenon, no boys are being born, plunging humanity into an existential crisis. As male trafficking becomes rampant and governments establish shelters to preserve the remaining males, society struggles to adapt.  In this chaotic world, Jessica, a popular actress with a glamorous image, is sponsored by Valentine, the boss of a human trafficking cartel. Her seemingly perfect life takes a dramatic turn when a young man named Jin, claiming to be her long-lost brother, suddenly appears, unraveling secrets and shaking the foundation of her carefully constructed world…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Girls' Love, Drama, Full Color

name: Secret Love Affair Between a Former Saint and a Dark Hero
description:
Kim Jiyeon, a college student on hiatus living an ordinary life, suddenly finds herself transmigrated into the romance novel *Saint's Flower* shown to her by a friend. She becomes the character Iolara, who only appeared halfway through the novel. The romantic world of the female lead and the male lead, which clearly isn't hers.

Still, she thought she could be happy as one of the characters in the novel. Like she had become the novel's protagonist. But everyone despises her. Hates her.

She's Iolara, the villain who torments the female lead, a fake saint. But it's not true. Iolara herself was the true saint.

Returning to the beginning with the blessings of the gods, she didn't need her family, the people who hated her, the position of the saint, or her beloved fiancé. She was going to walk a different path from her past.

"Even if this world tries to make me a villain, it doesn't matter. I will survive and be happy!"
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: 335km
description: A girl whose wish is to see the ocean.  A boy who is afraid of the outside. A school trip that was canceled and a journey to fulfill her wish.
tags: Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Akujo Kyosei Keikaku
description:
"Hey, Seraphina. Even when you grow up, don't end up killing me, okay?"

The wizard Arvel meets his end at the hands of his former fiancée, Seraphina, who later became the emperor's mistress and a notorious villainess. However, when he comes to, he finds himself face-to-face with a young Seraphina! Astonishingly, he has returned to being his 13-year-old self. Seeing Seraphina before she became a villainess, Arvel makes a resolution: he will raise her to become a proper person and save his own life.

To start, he begins searching for a way to prevent the death of his brother, Sho, who was once engaged to Seraphina. However, the situation is far from simple, as he must contend with Seraphina's neglectful family, men vying for the beautiful Seraphina's attention, and a web of conflicting intentions. In this journey through time, can Arvel alter Seraphina's fate and save her from becoming a villainess...!?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Ranpo Amnesia - 21-banme no Jinkaku
description: Are you familiar with the mystery of the "Fiend with Twenty Faces"? A thief and a master of disguise, he used to steal only from the very rich. But it's been five years since he disappeared after developing a dissociative identity disorder. Now, his daughter Mayumi sets out to find him. In the process, she must find her way out of situations that keep getting more perverse and absurd as the story progresses... In this first volume of the series, Shintaro Kago offers us his take on the universe of the famous detective novelist Edogawa Rampo, one of the founding fathers of ero-guro. Kago's weirdness and Rampo's detective mysteries combine to form a world full of abnormalities and illusions!
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Demon Lord City
description: In the "Demon City" where humans and demons coexist, one of the seven demon kings is murdered. In order to solve the case, Alsarisa, the daughter of a hero who enforces justice under the law, teams up with Keed, a bad investigator who values honor over the law. In a world swirling with violence and conspiracy, the unconventional investigation drama of the two twisted people begins.
tags: Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Ruri no Houseki
description:
Mineral collecting is a modern-day treasure hunt!

Ruri, a high school girl who loves jewelry and accessories, ventures into the world of mineral collecting in mountains, rivers, and caves. The first volume features numerous minerals, including quartz, garnet, pyrite, gold sand, and fluorite. The collection scenes are full of fascinating scenes using specialized tools such as a panning dish, hammer, and topographical maps. This is an authentic science adventure based on the solid knowledge of the author, who is trained in mineralogy!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life

name: Shotgun Boy
description: While running for his life in the woods, bullying victim Gyuhwan stumbles upon a shotgun and just enough shells for his classmates. It’s a recipe for disaster. But fate takes an unexpected turn when he returns to find his classmates under attack by brain-eating creatures. Now, the only thing that stands in the way of their ravenous feast is a boy with a shotgun.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
description: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Fray
description:
"Add more firewood if you don't want to turn into ashes". 
In time of desperation he have flames that can kill demons. However the flames make its master a demon who desires ashes.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Scarlet Star
description:
In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone. That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty
tags: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Self-Published, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

description:
Anzu is a high school girl living under the strict control of her mother, in a household where the idea of defying her will is unthinkable. With no smartphone and no allowance, one of her few escapes is sneaking away to a nearby CD shop and listening to music.

But one night, in the plaza outside a train station, she encounters a shady-looking guy who has the looks of a devil... but plays the guitar like an angel.
tags: Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Detective Conan: The Culprit Hanzawa
description: The manga stars the black-silhouetted "criminal" who appears in Meitantei Conan series who represents the mystery culprits.
tags: Comedy, Crime, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Seirin Academy -- a famous academy with a long history, and one of the leading places of education for young ladies far and wide. It is also place where Tsujiura Mio just transferred to, and somewhat... strange. Seirin Academy has a number of taboos, one of which is getting involved with the upperclassman Nekonome Yuuka -- someone Mio can't help but be drawn towards. And when Mio does start interacting with Yuuka, she begins getting caught up in all sorts of inexplicable occurrences -- after all, Nekonome Yuuka _is not alive_.
So, who, or what, is Nekonome Yuuka? And what secrets are hidden away in the hallways the dainty young ladies of the Academy walk down every day?
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Muryoku Seijo to Munou Oujo ~Maryoku Zero de Shoukansareta Seijo no Isekai Kyuukokuki~
description:
One day, listless part-timer Tamura Nana was summoned out of her room and into another world, after which her summoners declared her a saint and asked her to save their world. However, though she was hailed as a saint, it turned out that Nana possessed no magical power at all! To make matters worse, she was chosen as a partner by a princess who can't cast spells...

The helpless saint who has no magic and the powerless princess who can't use magic. And so begins the adventure of these two leftover heroes!
tags: Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Pseudo Harem
description: The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Wo, Jinhua, Emo
description: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496607127115)
tags: Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Onmir The oddity
description: In a videogame based on a fantasy world, their players are know as Onmir. Our protagonist, a notorious killer of other Onmirs, logs in one day as usual but in the split of a moment, the environment changes giving a weird feeling, suddenly he realises that he cannot log off and that if he were to die, he will die in the real world. A fall into tragedy starts...
tags: Action, Demons, Self-Published, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess
description:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color

name: Not found
description: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
tags: Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: Kusunoki-san wa Koukou Debut ni Shippai Shite Iru
description: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past... except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Sugar Girl Drip
description: Marie, a sparkling university student who craves validation, takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There, she meets Akira, a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life, and they end up spending time together as...accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama

name: Not found
description:
What happens when a gay art thief and a conservative NATO officer cross paths? Disaster, of course. 
Dorian is an aristocrat, a thief, and a hedonist; Klaus is a duty-driven espionage agent with no patience for fools.

Follow them as they chase each other across the globe – from Britain to Baghdad, from Alaska to Alexandria or Moscow to Madrid. 
Spectacular locations and non-stop adventures await!
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Adventure, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Runin
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Manhattan, New York in a future where catastrophe has swept the world. Violence has replaced order, justice has collapsed, and emotions have faded. Two Japanese, Takeru and Gamon, live in such a time. 

What are the ideals that they are carving out for themselves? 

A near-future action adventure in a world in ruins!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy

name: Under Ninja
description: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A story about a little summoner girl that accidentally summons a shark from another world as her pet that has all of the powers seen in shark movies in the modern world.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Nanoha Takamachi, now age 13, and her friends work as magical girls!
tags: Action, Mecha, Magical Girls, Magic, Military

name: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
description:
High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/tsukimichi-moonlit-fantasy/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Kuina: Rise of the All-Girl Harem
description:
Kuina is a tough girl with a shitty past and an abusive father she swore to kill. Instead, she gets thrown into a crazy world with a System that makes her level up from bloody battles… and from being with women.

She builds a wild harem of dangerous, seductive, and broken girls  each one giving her power in their own way. Now she has to decide: will she use that power to burn the world down, or learn that maybe love really can beat hate?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Cute but dumb as hell… and somehow still the strongest!
...Reincarnated as an ostrich beastkin with innate physical ability?!

With intelligence from my previous life, I lead a flock through a monster-filled hellscape just to stay alive…
One day, after saving a party of human adventurers from certain doom, I finally made contact with the civilized world I had dreamed of!!!
Unlike the uncommunicative ostrich-kin I'm used to, I'm overjoyed to meet people I can actually talk to… However....!

Strong, silly, and completely out of control...
Watch out, the ostrich beastkin is on a rampage!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Survival, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.
description: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country's joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It's become too much of a despairing environment that he's come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Animals, Video Games, Philosophical, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Rappa - Yankee Ninpuuchou
description:
Ninja vs. Ninja!! A deathmatch to decide the strongest begins!!
Kazama Endo, an unbeatable delinquent, goes to scope out Hachisuka Ichiya, a boy who roughed up his henchmen. Endo, who lives and dies by fights with strong opponents, comes expecting another brawl, but it turns out Ichiya is anything but ordinary...!! A bacchanalia of bad boys seeking to put themselves on top begins!!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/rappa_yankee)
tags: Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Because of his involvement in a fight, the school's star student, Xu QingSong, becomes acquainted with the young delinquent, Zhu Chen, and falls in love with him at first sight. Then, for various reason, Xu QingSong becomes the boss of a gang. He launches an offensive against Zhu Chen, who is now his second-in-command, and leads the Sea Flower Gang on a rampage to… er… to rectify the town of Taifang.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: “Ethics” is the path of humanity, a principle that becomes the norm of morality. It is not necessary to learn it, but the lessons are laden with the truths of life. Cool ethics teacher Takayanagi confronts his students' problems and their beliefs.
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Chigau Miyahara Omae Janai!
description:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump+](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Appleseed
description:
World War III is over, and nomad soldier Duenan Knute and her cyborg partner Briareos struggle to survive in the abandoned cities and demilitarized zones of the post-war wasteland, the "Badside." Matters appear on the upswing, however, when they are found and brought to Olympus, an urban utopia and centerpiece for the reconstruction of civilization. Duenan and Bri join the Olympus police, a force that seems hardly necessary in such a paradise. But, like in most pretty pictures, perfection is an illusion, and Olympus's peaceful façade hides a dark secret, a violent struggle between human and cyborg that could once again plunge the world into war… and genocide.

**Was supposed to receive a 5th Volume which was partially finished and distributed into the English version's Hypernotes and ID. The series remains unfinished.**

---
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 1986**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Loli, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, Medical, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Magical Girl Chronicles
description: Stories of a city's inhabitants guarded by a magical girl, as well as her own stories and questions she answers.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Self-Published, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kiss n Karess!
description: This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: “…The only ones left alive are us, the Valkyries.” Oswald, a boy who had been scorned for his unusual magical power, awakens to find himself in a world several centuries after it was nearly destroyed by an evil god. It turns out that the sexual arousal triggered by Oswald’s magic is the key to empowering the Valkyries. In other words… it becomes a great power capable of saving the world!!
tags: Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Sana is the hardworking daughter of a shop owner, and she often ventures out into the forest to gather the herbs needed for the restorative potions they sell. But on one trip, she happens to pick up a mysterious strategy guide for a game—and it’s filled with detailed information about her town, those around her, and even what’s yet to come! However, the future may not be at all what she expects… With such a powerful—and dangerous—book in hand, what will Sana do? (Yen Press)
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/61995)
- [Official X](https://x.com/sekaino_hon)
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Franken Fran
description:
There is a Gothic-style mansion in a distant, rarely-visited part of Japan. There, the world's greatest surgeon, Naomitsu Madaraki, once lived but he hasn't come home in ages.  
  
Instead, the professor's "daughter," Fran Madaraki, lives there with a large amount of her own ghoulish creations and her "younger sister" Veronica. She's a very unusual girl, what with the stitch patterns on her face and the giant bolts on either side of her head. Just as skilled at surgery as her father, and if you're willing to pay her price, she can do everything up to and including raising the dead. Fran believes that a life should be saved no matter the cost, and keep that in mind, since the results of her surgeries are rarely (if ever) pretty.  
  
  
Fran can make anyone into anything, raise the dead, switch heads and bodies, and give you those eyes that you've always wanted. But do you actually want them? Is it a good thing to raise the dead? Do the ends justify the means? And does Fran care?
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "Book Forest", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games. Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things. When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: The Dark History of the Reincarnated Villainess
description:
Konoha Satou has a dark history, written throughout middle school-a fantasy adventure of love and magic about the Count's daughter Konoha Magnolia and the knights who love her! But when it looks like that dark history is going to be uncovered by her mother, Konoha panics and dies in a traffic accident! Opening her eyes, she finds that she's been reincarnated into the world of her own dark history as Iana Magnolia, the worst villainess of her own creation!  
  
Ghost-seeing School Boys oneshot included in volume 1 as chapter 3.5.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Happy End.
description: If you think this has a happy ending, you read the title.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Gore, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Seasons of Lovesome
description:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Favored Consort Is A Man
description: Xie Yanhuan, disguised as Chen's Ninth Princess, was forced to marry Emperor Yan Gui as a surrogate. On the night of the wedding, Xie Yanhuan's true identity is revealed, all hope appears to be lost. Isn't Xie male? Yan is aware of this, but why doesn't Yan seem angry?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Harem, Drama, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Short Kimi to Tsuzuru Utakata after story.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Nakami is a studious but cranky and antisocial high schooler who gets on his classmates' nerves. However, his bad attitude comes from the fact that he has a sleeping disorder, and frequently spends nights on end without a single minute of sleep. During the preparations for the school festival, he is begrudgingly sent to the school's astronomy observatory to gather cardboard boxes, a place which is said to be haunted by the dire happenings of the now defunct Astronomy Club. He finds the isolated place a haven ripe for him to sleep, but while rummaging around, he stumbles upon his classmate Magari Isaki sleeping inside a toppled-over locker.   
  
Isaki, unlike him, is a personable and popular girl at class, but who also hides her own problems with insomnia. Looking for a middle ground, they find that there's comfort and ease in sleeping together, so they resort to make the observatory their own private cubby to sleep… Have they found the comfort they're looking for?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Dodonpa!
description:
This is nothing more than an epic manga about piling toppings on rice and eating it deliciously.

With over 230,000 twitter followers, food-loving illustrator Aya’s smash hit series finally comes to print.

Even if you’re hopeless at cooking or just prefer eating, you’ll be more than satisfied with this easy and tasty manga essay. 

A single bowl becomes a canvas for edible art. That’s what a donburi (rice bowl) is. 

There's the garlic butter oyster donburi with its aroma that fires up your appetite, kakuni donburi with pork that melts in your mouth, teriyaki mayo chicken donburi so glossy you can’t take your eyes off it, torotaku (toro with pickled daikon) donburi with its mushy-crunchy-snap textures that make eating fun. 

This book crams in donburi you can savour with all five senses, in full colour.
tags: Official Colored, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Datenshi Sopurano-chan no Fukushuu
description: Back in sixth grade, Mirei hurt her best friend Soprano with heartless words after she confessed to her. Five years later, Soprano, now a famous model, transfers to Mirei's high school. While Mirei hopes to reconcile with Soprano and go back to being friends with her, friendship isn't what's on Soprano's mind.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals
description:
It is illegal for civilians to use their quirks out in the open; that privilege is reserved for registered heroes. However, a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes, but the reputation of villains.

This is their story.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Drama, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: A hero with a production skill?? Akina Shoji, a salary slave, had a dream to open his own business. However, When he almost made his dream come true, He’s been summoned into another world with a “Cultivation” skill…
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: HANA
description: Hana is a child who is only known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Arknights: Rhodes Island's Records of Originium - Blacksteel
description: The story of Operator Franka, Liskarm, Vanilla, and Jessica before and after they came to Rhodes Island.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Video Games, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Gekizumi Dungeon Desu ga "Skill: Hanshoku" de Gyakuten Shitai to Omoimasu
description: Reborn as a dungeon master in another world, Akira Hanamura quickly constructs a comfortable dungeon within his first 30 minutes in this new realm. However, he soon realizes his creation is a "zero-defense" setup—vulnerable to the constant influx of adventurers and, if conquered, spells instant death for him. Faced with this dire predicament, Akira must use his unique Reproduction skill to multiply his monster minions and fortify the dungeon. With each encounter, he gradually transforms his humble lair into an ultimate stronghold, utilizing strategies, monster alliances, and swift adaptability to fend off every challenge.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Bang Bang Dream Dream
description:
Developing various media mixes Next generation girls band project a>The forbidden 1st comic of "Banban Ridori", which caused a huge response when it started serializing in CoroCoro Aniki, is finally released!! Kasumi tries a hot water bath! Arisaki and Tae are relatively safe! Saaya defeats enemies with blood! Saaya grows in gacha! Saaya has an abnormally small face! Rimi becomes a beast in search of chocolate coronet! Kasumi with sparkling withdrawal symptoms! Saaya is fired! Rimi is parasitic on me! This is a big deal!!
“BanG Dream!” feat. Nyaro melon!!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music

name: Arknights: Rhodes Island's Records of Originium - Rhine Lab
description: Ifrit discovers an uninvited guest aboard Rhodes Island, a girl named Darya. Darya's small form casts a long shadow over Ifrit, Silence, and Saria as she conjures in them memories of a buried past.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Adaptation

name: Isekai Shounin - Skill <Isekai Tokou> wo Kushi Shite, Yuuyuu Jiteki na Okanemochi Slow Life wo Okurimasu
description: One day, the protagonist Allen, who has been reincarnated from Japan into another world, realizes that his unique skill, Moon Gate, allows him to travel freely between Japan and the other world. With this power, Allen comes up with the idea of traveling between Japan and the other world and making money by selling various items to people from the other world, those who have been transferred, and those who have been reincarnated, who are hungry for entertainment! Before long, he gets to know the daughter of a large company and the princess of a kingdom in the other world, and enjoys the other world to the fullest...!!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A girl who calls herself a devil appeared before a timid student named Fumio Kijima. The girl claims to be a campaign girl from the demon world and she gives him the ability to "summon a room" from nothing but thin air. At first he doesn't abuse his power and uses it as a convenient ability in his every day life. But one day he is bullied by his classmates under an unfair pretext and is made to suffer. In the past, he would have wallowed in misery and cried himself to sleep, but now he had a power to call upon.

"I will make them regret it!"

Using his powers to summon his "room", he begins his era of confinement and brainwashing to achieve his goals.
tags: Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Koshaku Shisoku No Shuchaku Kara Nigerare So Ninainode, Nigenai Koto Ni Shimashita
description: The baron's daughter Fleur had been troubled ever since her childhood, when Victor - the magically-gifted son of a duke - first proposed to her and kept persistently pursuing her. In her frustration, she decided to turn the tables and do back to him what he'd been doing to her... only to have him respond with, "I'm so happy you care about me this much!" - delighting him instead!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Becoming a Witch in a World Full of Monster Stories
description:
Day 1: Recently my eyes seem to be a bit off, always seeing strange things. Wait, the cabinet seems to be moving, I'll go check it out.
......
Day 13: I see them! Damn! Why is this world full of monsters!?
......
Day 101: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore! Donning a witch's gown, I've become a monster myself!
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure
description: When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: 29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world. He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Dandadan
description:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Napoleon - Age of the Lion
description: This is a story of the life of Napoleon. The tale begins just before the Battle of Austerlitz. Then, it jumps back to 1769 to tell the story of Napoleon's life from the very beginning, including the circumstances of his birth, his childhood on Corsica, and his difficulties as a Corsican boy in a French school. All of these experiences eventually culminate in his becoming the famous Emperor of the French.
tags: Historical, Action, Military, Gore

name: My Marriage to Saneka
description: Tatsuhiko inherits his grandfather's home after his passing. It's been ages, so he heads to the old homestead for a visit. In a storage room there, he encounters a tanuki who claims to be a god. Tatsuhiko and the tanuki god repair the home together while sharing stories about his grandfather. Following this strange turn of events, the two decide to get married?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
"Candy", a mysterious drug whose main ingredient is just ordinary sugar, is spreading like wildfire in Tokyo. When Susui, a narcotics agent who has infiltrated the yakuza to get closer to Candy's manufacturer, finds himself in danger, a self-proclaimed "magical girl" named Riri Hoshina comes to his rescue...!

(Source: MANGA Plus)
tags: Action, Crime, Magical Girls, Mafia, Magic, Gore, Drama, Police

name: Not found
description:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Few would consider Louie to be a sorcerer - especially Melissa, Merrill, and Genie. (After all, what kind of “sorcerer” spends his time drinking at bars and beating the stuffing out of the local street toughs?) But much to the chagrin of these three gorgeous female adventurers, divine will has dictated that Louie, the enchanter-gone-street fighter, is in fact a prophesied hero–who they must pledge themselves to serve! Could this bad-boy possibly have what it takes to be a hero? Or has the war god Mylee made a mistake? With a bevy of babes at his side, Louie launches into a series of adventures that range from the harrowing to the bizarre. Get ready for swords, magic, and lots of black eyes and broken noses, because when Louie fights, it's no holds barred!
___
**Character Designer:** [Yokota Mamoru](https://mangadex.org/author/00ae4ff4-9c04-43fe-9e31-fa4f2e916706)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Third Prince Theodulf has been banished to a wasteland known as the Land of Death because he didn't receive a gift from the Goddess. It's a barren land where the air is so noxious, nothing can grow there. Surviving there is impossible... or so everyone thought! As it turns out, Theodulf is a reincarnated being and has received a power known as "Auto-Craft" from the Goddess. Using this powerful gift to automatically create everything, the prince proceeds to turn the Land of Death into one brimming with life!!

(Source: K Manga)
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Strikeout Pitch
description: The Souha Public High School Baseball Team is one step away from the pinnacle that is the Summer Koushien. They only need a star pitcher to have a chance. Could the Baseball Club Slasher, the powerful pitcher who appears every night and terrorizes other players, be their guy? There's only 1 problem: he can only pitch 3 full-power balls a day!
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Sports

name: Mahou Shoujo 201
description: Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...
tags: Loli, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The life of Nora, a young boy who has known only abandonment and pain, takes an unexpected turn when, after a plea to the heavens, Aloha, a unique and mysterious being, literally falls from space right in front of him. This encounter becomes the spark of warmth and hope his dark world needed, forging a bond he dares to call "family."

However, this new and fragile happiness is threatened by a sinister presence. A shadowy organization, whose agents—the fearsome G-Men—possess advanced technology and ruthless methods, is determined to hunt down and capture Aloha at any cost.
tags: Sci-Fi, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Aliens, Mystery

name: Secret Diary
description:
After the final exams, everyone in the noticeably looser atmosphere of the school is planning and looking forward to summer vacation. Yujin, a sincere and good model student, is completely absorbed in an exchange diary.

The exchange diary is one that is passed back and forth daily through an empty locker, and the identity of the partner is kept secret. Yujin develops feelings for that partner and tries to arrange a meeting before summer vacation starts, while Sang-kyu grows increasingly worried about Yujin…
tags: Romance, School Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Yuri dies after a long illness, and is reincarnated by a god into another world. He is given "Saiteigen no Nouryoku" ("just enough/basic skills") and a new name, Yuri, and hopes to live a slow, self-sufficient life. But upon reincarnating, things get dangerous immediately (gets attacked by a wild boar etc.), and he has to use his skills to survive, build up his living conditions, deal with monsters, etc.
tags: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Zombies, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Wuxia, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet?
___
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Yomi no Tsugai
description:
The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)
**Official Indonesian Volumes:** [Elex Media Komputindo](https://elexmedia.id/produk/judul/yomi%20no%20tsugai%20-%20pair%20of%20the%20underworld)
tags: Monsters, Action, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Arknights: Let's Eat Together!
description: Even siblings have different tastes.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Arknights: 123 Rhodes Island!?
description: Get to know the operators with Amiya and the Doctor!
tags: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yaiteru Futari
description: Dating can be tough when you nerd out over barbecue. Kenta, a practical pitmaster, looks for a grill-friend in Chihiro, an aloof and faultless business babe... or is she? Scared of being rejected for who they really are, the two of them find comfort in food and each other... and all is well until Kenta must transfer away. With their developing relationship at steak, Chihiro proposes they tie the knot and they marry for better or wurst. Winging a long-distance marriage is one thing, but here's the rub — they barely know each other!
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: Black Moonlight Heroine Always Wants to Mark Me
description:
A scheming, manipulative alpha pretending to be an omega × an omega pretending to be a cool-but-cowardly alpha

Gu Yu, who was originally a top designer at a high-end bespoke fashion boutique, happened to read an ABO novel without purchasing a subscription. Shortly after, she was inexplicably forced to transmigrate into the story. Worst of all—she became the novel's evil side character, a fake alpha who was actually an omega, left to the grim fate of being burned alive by the heroine for abusing her. As she stared at the blackened "two-faced" heroine Su Yue kneeling in the rain outside, Gu Yu felt completely devastated.

To save her life, Gu Yu decided to risk acting out of character and she secretly—yet while openly caring for the female lead—designed the most beautiful and unique evening gown in the world for her, clung onto her tightly, provided her with resources, and helped her dominate the entertainment industry and reclaim everything that was rightfully hers. But Gu Yu never expected that the "innocent little princess" she had been caring for so preciously not only turned out to be a fake omega, but an alpha! This wasn’t how the story was supposed to go! Believing her days were numbered, Gu Yu waited for her impending death in despair. However, Su Yue, exuding a strong red wine-scented pheromone—pinned Gu Yu down and whispered, “Are you prepared to be marked by me?” That familiar voice rang in Gu Yu’s ears, completely disrupting her soft heart.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ninko-chan wa Ochikazuki ni Naritai
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Medetai Sensei
description:
Tachibana Mami, a very petite 29 year old P.E. teacher, was out for a run underneath the cherry trees when she slips and falls and sprains her foot. A tall, beautiful, mature woman was passing by and saw what happened. Thinking Mami was a kid, she princess carries her to to her house. Afterward, Mami can't stop thinking about what happened.

A few days later when Mami is preparing for her classes before school starts for the year, a new teacher is introduced. It turns out that Sakurai Shouko, the new teacher is the same woman who carried her home the other day. 

Shouko ends up getting way too close to Mami, and it seems to be getting troublesome for poor Mami.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Shinsei Kishi Diana no Shokuzai
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Dungeon Gakuen no Teihen ni Tensei Shita kedo, Naze ka Ore ni wa Kouryaku Hon ga Aru
description:
"Takashi Takasugi is the lowest-ranked student in his class, plagued by bad luck. He clashes with the protagonist, leaves the academy, and is rumored to have died—a truly unfortunate character." That's how the game's strategy guide described him... and now, the protagonist finds himself reincarnated as this bottom-tier nobody!

Drowning in despair, he searches his classroom desk—only to discover the very strategy guide he bought in his previous life. "If I use this, I can become the strongest!?" Determined to escape his tragic fate, Takasugi sets off to secretly grind his skills in dungeons... but hardship awaits at every turn. However, when he starts traveling alongside the game's beautiful heroine, Hanagasaki, his destiny takes a dramatic turn—accelerating toward an unexpected reversal!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
I don’t know how it happened, but somehow I’ve died and reincarnated into my favorite academy game. And if that wasn’t weird enough, I’m now the depraved and lazy villain, Weiss Fansent, whose misdeeds lead him to a deadly end - something I’m determined to avoid at all costs. 

With little time left until the academy’s entrance exams, I have no choice but to dive headfirst into serious and grueling training. Which means swordsmanship with the S-rank adventurer Miruku Abitas, followed by intense magic practice. It was demanding and exhausting, but getting stronger means I have a better chance of avoiding my disastrous end. 

But I seriously underestimated just how powerful Weiss truly is, and I wind up stunning everyone at the exams! Have I somehow become more powerful than the hero?

___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69646)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
“I want to become like Mister, A Great Swordsman! To cultivate strength and help those who are powerless!

Born with the secret techniques of a forbidden unorthodox sect, the child Jang Seol becomes the disciple of Hwangbo Cheol-seung, former sword, a close aide of the Murim Alliance Leader, and begins to take his first steps as a martial artist.

He possesses one special ability…

“This child can read the memories of iron.”

Jang Seol grows stronger each time a weapon passes through his hands.

He throws himself into the chaotic Jianghu to search for the legendary ‘Ten Great Martial Records,’ a legend of the Jianghu!
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ancestor is beautiful and elegant
description: Bai Chuwei waited for five thousand years before entering the original plot, debuting as the ancestor of all humanity. Wealth? The largest assets in the world she has.
