The eight aristocratic families? All just her servants. As everyone is worshiping their ancestor, Bai Chuwei, the fourth young master of the Duan family in Haicheng, held her in his arms. What the heck! Bai Chuwei was just trying to absorb the spiritual energy from this guy, whom she witnessed growing up. She didn’t expect to lose her heart
tags: Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: On the Way to Meet Mom
description:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Hyper Warrior Gundam Boy
description: Taiga Amachi, a diehard SD Gundam fan, joins the Gundam Research Group (also commonly known as "G-Group"). He does battle in a Gunpla battle simulator against the many enemies aiming to take down G-Group.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Samurai

name: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete
description:
One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.

"We won't have any deeper relationship... We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Half-blooded Leon was born between a human and an ogre. But all that returns to him as a half-blood is exploitation and betrayal by humans. 

Leon despises such humans and vows revenge. 

To Leon, who always suffered because he lacked power, fortune comes calling, and he’s given an opportunity to take revenge on humans.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Killed by her own husband, the prince, Lady Amelie wakes up one year before her doomed marriage. Determined to change her fate, she proposes a contract marriage to Duke Gazelle Isaac—infamously known as the “Grim Reaper.”

His only condition?

She must bond with his emotionally scarred twins.

Surrounded by secrets and shadows, can Amelie rewrite destiny—for herself and the feared duke?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Villain of the Octagon
description:
Shin Chi-beom is a talentless amateur mixed martial artist.

After disappearing for a week, he suddenly shows up for his next fight, suffering from extreme anxiety, and steps into the cage and kills his opponent, leaving everyone wondering why he's changed.

A week ago, he fell asleep and woke up in ancient Greece, where he was a combat slave in the Pankration, a murderous martial arts competition. Five years of life-and-death duels, dozens of times a day, in countless battles, have passed...
After the final battle, he is returned to his original body.

Shin Chi Bum is left with severe trauma and a mental illness. The only place he can find peace of mind is in an octagonal iron cage. The only place he can find peace of mind is in a cold, octagonal iron cage. He continues to search for the strongest... 

Will he ever find rest at the end of the fight?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A group of high school students visit the inside of a mountain on an agricultural trip. While staying at a farmer's home, they learn the rural life. However, the village doesn't exist…? A shudder runs down everyone's spine as a lot of inexplicable events happen in the village, that now restricts entry. What are the high schoolers' fate?
tags: Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Mobile Suit Gundam N-Extreme
description:
One day, Amagi Sai and Ebihara Chikage are transported to another world by a mysterious woman who wants them to save the world. 
The first volume of the collaboration comic for the popular arcade game "Mobile Suit Gundam EXVS.2 XB" is now available!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Isekai

name: Unnamed Memory
description:
*"As long as you're the master of that sword and I'm a witch, someday you'll have to kill me for real."*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
tags: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hirano to Kagiura
description: Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Sonna Kazoku nara Sutechaeba?
description: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?
tags: Psychological, Drama

name: Blues
description: A funeral. A man who won't stop following him. Orlando’s world begins to crack—first in his sleep, then in waking life. He’s no longer sure what’s real. At first, it's unsettling. Then it becomes unbearable.
tags: Long Strip, Self-Published, Mystery

name: Myther
description: In the 6th year of the Enka era, a scientist invented Myther, a device designed to create an ideal personality. With it, people could become their ideal selves and break away from their weak selves. However, underneath the surface, Myther Crime - a hidden social issue -  has emerged, where those who abuse Myther suffer from their minds breaking, before carrying out horrific acts of violence. Kyo of Special Intelligence Agency, directly controlled by the Japanese authorities, works from the shadows to fight against these crimes. All for the sake of loyalty to the government...
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Nozomi Sendo wakes up... as a ghost at her own funeral? Nobody can see her, except a shady psychic who asks 'Do you have any... regrets?'

Note: This is mostly good natured, but death and suicide are major themes, so don't read if that's not good for your health.
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Ghosts, Comedy, Office Workers, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: LEGO LEGO Let's LEGO Ninjago!!
description: Not found
tags: Ninja, Comedy, Adaptation

name: Isekai H Eiyuuden ~Bishoujo Senshi-tachi wa Saikyou Gunshi no Muchana Onegai ni Sakaraenai~
description: Noa Zuiho, a second-year high schooler with amazing tactical analysis skill, is brought to another world! In order to save this other world from monsters, the goddess gives him the Power of Wisdom, which increases his tactical insight through... erotic actions?! In an epic war between humanity and monsters, who will prevail? A brilliant strategist rises — with unorthodox methods and adult incentives to motivate his all-female army!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy

name: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off
description:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!
___
* Alt. Official English: [Square Enix](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/on-and-off-work-life-imbalance)
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Second spin-off featuring Otoha and his manager.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: The Boy Forced to Crossdress by His Manga Club Senpai
description: Not found
tags: Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic

name: Hana-Uta Memoir
description: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
tags: Time Travel, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
"Renjo-kun, I want you to be my fiancé."

Renjo Toru, who helped the most beautiful Nordic girl in school—Aino Luthi—at a bookstore, is suddenly asked by her to become her fiancé. At first, it was merely a request to avoid a political marriage, but once Aino learned that her partner was Toru, she suddenly became eager about marriage...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Pumpkin Night
description: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
tags: Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: MF Ghost
description: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.
tags: Action, Sports, Slice of Life

name: Vengeance
description: After witnessing her secret girlfriend's murder, normally calm and cool-headed police detective Seolah becomes obsessed with finding him and taking revenge.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Bunny Day
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Web Comic, Full Color

name: ILY.
description:
"I was always thinking about you, Airi."   
Motoki continued to send emails that were never delivered to his beloved.   
Until one day, he receives an answer that will transform his depressive life.   
A unique mystery about an unforgettable "girlfriend".

---
**Links:**
[ComicFuzz](https://comic-fuz.com/series/2415) | [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/926770)
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Mystery

name: Not found
description: In a world where steam engines have been developed using a special fossil fuel called "Meteorian Coal", Kanata, a boy who works in a coal mine, studies hard and improves himself despite the poor environment. Then, the boy's destiny begin to turn as he works to open up a new vein of coal.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy

name: Gun Blaze West
description:
America, 19th century. Viu Bannes, a young and determined boy gets to know the legend of Gun Blaze West—a perfect place, where only the best gunmen can get. With his friend, the wanderer Marcus Homer, they began training to be able to overcome the difficulties during the planned journey to Gun Blaze West. But soon they have to face the first enemies, and the gang of robbers are just the first step during the long-long journey…

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/gun-blaze-west)
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Ueno-kun wa Kaihatsuzumi
description: "Spring! My college debut! The blossoming of my sexuality! Even now, I can't cum without being harassed by them." An unfortunate story in the spring of youth.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem

name: Persephonia
description: "I wished upon a star-filled night to meet you again." My love was granted in a distorted form. Me, a human, and you, who devours humans. In such a cruel world, how do we weave our love?
tags: Romance, Gore, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
I walk in a different world with my strongest management and smithing ability!  
  
I belonged to the management team of MMORPG "Armed Edda", and when I awoke one day, I was embraced by a red-haired girl in a strange world. What's more, my figure and ability are exactly like the game's debugging character, Blacksmith Laguna Smith, and the girl Rein who helped me is the legendary weapon "Laevatein" that I trained in the game! When I live, I start to explore the mysteries of the world….!? Using a trained Legendary weapon as a bride, fantasy begins!  
  
Author's Twiter: [@amauisiroichi](http://twitter.com/amauisiroichi)
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology
description:
Now, to the story of finding your true feelings...

The popular game "Project Sekai Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku"'s first comic anthology!

The world of 'Proseka' is expanding with this all-new comic book.

Each unit's daily life is presented in a large volume!
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Music

name: Loser Fox
description: This is the life story of a cute and dumb fox.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Chichi Chichi
description: One day, a picture book writer named Yorozu Hikaru was asked by his close online friend, Chintarou, if they could share a room together while he attended a nearby university. Although they only knew each other through online interactions, Hikaru agrees to it without much thought. However unbeknownst to Hikaru, Chintarou, despite having a male name, is actually a girl: a very well endowed girl.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Shota, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: The talented thief Golden Bat is after the “Ruby Diamond”, a jewel belonging to the Duke of Sarada. Will he be able to get his hands on it?! (From [ogonbatter.web](http://ogonbatter.web.fc2.com/tezuka.html))
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Along with the sound of the discharge warning siren, a declaration roars: "Open the dam's gates!" This is an epic story about building a dam to resolve a water shortage in another world.

The water of the vast Holy Valley River has disappeared...?! William Parthenon, a reincarnated person and dam engineer, meets Caliba Acombo, a mage; Archana Hoover, an adventurer; and Gravy, a swordsman. Together, they rise to face this difficult challenge!

The incident begins with the suppression of the rioters who were fighting over the water supply. While suffering from amnesia, William volunteers to be the guard to investigate the local water conflict. During his investigation, he deduces from the shape of the stones in the riverbed that there must be something drying the water up. The party heads for the headwaters where the water spirit, Undine, lives.

All for the sake of delivering the blessing of water to the people! This is a unique Dam x Isekai fantasy!!
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Akuyaku Ikka no Okugata, Shi ni Modori shite Kokoro wo Irekaeru
description:
The Duchess of Farrens is a prominent noble family that supports the backbone of the Kingdom of Istoward. Elaine Farrens, the duchess of Farrens, after her misdeeds and attempted usurpation of the country, finally died, her life taken by her own daughter. In her dying moments, her high pride was finally broken, and she truly regretted what she had done, but it was all in vain. The ducal family itself was destroyed, and its notoriety was to be forgotten in time.

However, Elaine regained consciousness the next thing she knew. And what’s more, she was giving birth. She immediately realised that it was useless to try to understand her situation in such a situation, and decided to face the life in front of her, thinking about it after the birth for now.
tags: Action, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san
description: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Saikyou no Shuzoku ga Ningen Datta Ken
description:
Elf? Dwarf? No! Humans are the strongest!

I was summoned to a different world where humans are the strongest living beings. In my previous world I was just a normal everyday salaryman, but in this new world, I seem to have become a rare existence. I, who have obtained the strongest power through my race, have decided to enjoy this seemingly stress-free life to the fullest.
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu wo Mezashimasu~
description: The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it. In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!!: Fune Shoukan Skill de Isekai Rich Life o Te ni Irero
description:
Wataru Toyoumi, an average college student, suddenly finds himself stranded in another world. Just when he’s at a loss, he discovers he has a unique skill: the ability to summon ships! With enough EXP and money, he could even call forth an unsinkable luxury cruise liner... But how can he do that with no sea in sight? Set sail for adventure aim for luxuries in another world!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
tags: Action, Crime, Superhero, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy

name: The Story of My Village
description: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.
tags: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Ultraman Blazar
description: Tsuburaya Productions official manga adaptation of "Ultraman Blazar"
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Mecha, Superhero, Adventure, Military, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He's being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can't show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou's inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn't take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a "cousin" like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raw:** [KADOCOMI](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004640_S?episodeType=latest)
- [Official X](https://x.com/itokonoko0804)
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Slice of Life

name: Mononobe Koshoten Kaikitan
description:
Shoutaro is a man of few words. He manages a used books store called Mononobe Koshoten and has an efficient young boy named Shiro to help out with the work while he reads the day away. But behind this normal and mundane facade Shoutaro has another job: the collection of some rather unpleasant old books…  
  
Author's Twitter: [Link](https://twitter.com/kn_sousaku)
tags: Historical, Action, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Shinobi Undercover
description:
Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official English:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/shinobi-undercover)
- [Official X](https://x.com/shinobigoto_off)
tags: Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: The wizard Haru spent his days being abused by the hero, his childhood friend Leticia, when one day while being scolded he thought to himself, "This is no good". And thus began Haru's adventure to regain his true self!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Metaphor: ReFantazio
description:
The United Kingdom of Euchronia is thrown into chaos following the assassination of its king…
Our Hero, the Traveler Will, and his Fairy Companion Gallica, race to Grand Trad to undertake a Special Mission.
Discover the bonds that form between eight races across three countries. (MangaPlus)

Based off [the award-winning game!](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2679460/Metaphor_ReFantazio/)
tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bakushin Ojou-sama Dou!
description: Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy, a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion, but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
There was an unbelievable talent in the ten-year-old girl! A heartwarming school story brought to you by the girls with the strongest smiles and magical powers.

Ten-year-old girl Ferris works as a slave in the magic stone mine.

Her daily work is harsh, and her appearance is poor, but she never fails to smile.

One day, unidentified magicians destroy the magic stone mine, and Ferris is the only one who survives.

In her escape, she encounters a beautiful young lady named Alicia.

Ferris, in a desperate frenzy, rescues Alicia, who is about to be kidnapped by a suspicious person.

In gratitude, Ferris is invited to Alicia’s mansion, where her magical talent is discovered.

The strongest ten-year-old girl with the power of smiles and magic presents a heartwarming magical school story.
tags: Action, Magic, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Conquer My Heart
description:
“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

---
Arrogant Duke Ixor Malkuth is used to getting absolutely everything he wants... until he meets the beautiful Daon, a slave who refuses to give in to his demands. As the conquerer of Daon's territory, Ixor tries to treat her like his mistress, but when she runs away, he decides to charm her into loving him. Yet with every attempt to seduce her, Ixor finds himself slowly falling for her instead. Will the prideful duke succeed in stealing Daon's affection, or will he find his own heart conquered?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: What Can I Do Alone
description: Byeon Tae-in was an ordinary geek, completely engrossed in webtoons and internet culture—until one day, everything changed. Gates opened, monsters poured out, and humanity teetered on the edge of annihilation. But unlike everyone else, Taein didn’t feel fear; he felt a rush of excitement, as if he had been thrown straight into one of his favorite webtoons! “These monsters look like the weak ones that always show up at the start to highlight the hero’s new powers!” And then, something extraordinary appeared before him: [You have been chosen.] status window? Perfect! Taein had consumed every webtoon in existence. Now, if he becomes the strongest in this world… what kind of epic story will he write next?
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Grappler Baki
description:
"To be the strongest in the world!" That is Baki Hanma's dream. The mysterious, young, martial artist aspires to follow in his sinister father's footsteps as the world's strongest creature. But to what lengths will Baki go? We follow the young grappler as he matures in a world full of some of the strongest fighters and how he overcomes all obstacles in order to face his father one day in the fighting ring.

From the jungles to and underground martial arts tournament, Baki is put to the test from fighters all over the world.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Heisei Haizanhei ☆ Sumire-chan
description:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

“You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.”

Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: GaCen Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
description: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Goblin Slayer Gaiden: Year One
description: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Published in the Bessatsu Shounen Magazine July 2021 Issue.
tags: Oneshot, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon
description: Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.
tags: Loli, Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Darwin's Game
description:
High school student Kaname Sudou receives an invitation from a classmate to play Darwin’s Game, a mobile game he has never heard of. However, as soon as he opens the application, a green snake suddenly pops out from his phone screen and bites his neck, leaving him unconscious. Waking up in the infirmary without any signs of a snake bite, he is told by the school to take the rest of the day off. Although he is puzzled by what has happened, he dismisses the surreal experience as a hallucination and boards the train home.  
Unfortunately, his curiosity gets the better of him and he uses the application once again. As the application appears to be just like any other battle game, Kaname breathes out a sigh of relief and decides to start his first match. However, the pleasant surprise is short-lived, as his in-game opponent unexpectedly appears right in front of him and attempts to hunt him down with a knife.  
As he desperately runs for his life, Kaname puts two and two together and realizes that Darwin’s Game is not an ordinary game, but rather, it’s a brutal fight for survival.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Video Games, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kemono Sumu Natsu
description: When he was a child, Ritsuki brought home a kitten and named it "Tama".  He spent his days raising the cute ball of fluff only for it to take the form of a young beast-man who goes by the name of "Shuri". However, as they become high schoolers, Ritsuki mysteriously starts to distance himself from Shuri who had always been by his side...
tags: Animals, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
In a world where an infection dubbed the "10-Year Disease" has taken over the world, half of all children will die before the age of 10. Our protagonist is Clair, a demon-loving 10-year old who dreams of becoming infected with the disease! While tensions with her priest grandfather rise, she gets the disease! With only a little life left to live, what kinds of trials will Clair and her grandfather go through!?
A serious story of action and survival awaits in CoroCoro Weekly!
tags: Thriller, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Gore, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery

name: Isshou Senkin
description:
"Yup! Just as slow as I thought."

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Gore, Delinquents

name: Houkago no Idol ni wa Himitsu ga aru
description:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life ~Chuunen Otoko ga Kaifuku Skill ni Kakuseishite, Eiyuu e Nariagaru~
description: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level [Healing Magic]! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: 24 Hours Resurrection of the Villainess
description:
The mission window in front of me flashed.

A villainess possessed the body of a lady named Banpoon. A survival-type epic romance where people hide their identities and fall in love!

And the end of the secret relationship.
Who will ultimately win her heart and complete the mission?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Yamada is the plant appointee, tending the school's garden of flowers on her own. She isn't the slightest bit athletic and she's actually quite clumsy. However, that doesn't stop her from having feelings for the star athlete in the class next-door, Kase-san. Slightly shy, Yamada is reluctant about her feelings for the enthusiastic Kase-san. Slowly but surely, the pair are helping each other to grow in confidence for both themselves and their budding relationship, each blush and brush of the hand at a time.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Yamada & Kase-san.+ (BOOTH)](https://takashima.booth.pm/items/1179739)
- [Official Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/napal_cace)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Though I’m a Homebody, I Found Myself in a Dark Captive Genre
description:
I died of overwork. I opened my eyes and was transmigrated into a Rofan?! But even if I transmigrated, why did I possess the princess' representative of state affairs...!

No eating because you're sleepy when you eat, so no eating because you have to save time to sleep.

On behalf of the evil employer, Princess Lemeia, I was working all night waiting for the day I die of overworking when I was lucky enough to be kidnapped...?

But being kidnapped is so comfortable. They feed you, let you sleep, and even pay you...!

That's how life with the kidnapper, Archduke Blayle, and the life of imprisonment began!

I'm a former K-worker and slave of the current princess, can I be freed from overwork in this life and keep a comfortable life of confinement?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Erin suffered her entire life from the abuse of the Marchioness and the malicious rumors she spread, until she finally died.

After two reincarnations, she returned as a genius Sword Master.

This time, everything will be different.

---
"Your Majesty wants you to hear this. Your family will soon follow you."

Murdered after years of abuse and false accusations from her stepmother. Thought it was over, after two reincarnations, she returned to her original self, Erin Rexus, known as the greatest villainess. Before losing everything and even losing her loved ones.

"I know there are things you can't tell me. When you're ready, tell me."

The kind and compassionate Second Prince, Ferdin Rexus. When she returned to the past and faced him again, she vowed to herself. She would save him. Even if it meant becoming a true villainess.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Person I Was Meeting Was a Kidnapper
description: After gaining her long-awaited fox form (but losing her human shape), a white fox beastkin escapes kidnapping, only to face her captor again at a mandatory royal matchmaking. The wolf who once dragged her away now sits across the tea table, smirking.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: I Was Reborn as His Highness the Prince's Little Evil Dragon
description: An 18-year-old young man who lived a peaceful and normal life is murdered by an unknown man. He is reincarnated as an evil little dragon who is the pet of the crown prince of a magical kingdom. He discovers that the prince is actually his reincarnated assassin, and that he has a secret mission to destroy the kingdom. The little dragon will have to face the dangers and intrigues of the royal court, while at the same time trying to get closer to the prince and discover his true feelings. Will he be able to stop the prince's evil plan and find his happy ending?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Astraea, the world's strongest swordsman,
One day, she realizes that she has reincarnated as a character from a novel.
Not just any character, but the one destined to be killed by the final boss, the evil god...

While hiking, she saves a child from some thugs and discovers that this child is destined to become the evil god in the future.

"Well, if that's the case, should I raise him well and completely reform him?"

She decides to take the child in and raise him, but...

"Astraea, where are you going? Are you going to meet that guy again?"

The child who she saved becomes an obsessive man who follows her around, monitoring her every move.
**Somehow... it feels like she might have raised him wrong.**

(Source: Kakao Page, edited)
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yowamushi Pedal - Spare Bike
description: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama

name: Make Sure You Regret It
description: For Olivia Madeleine, illegitimate daughter of a duke, her only hope of a better life away from her cold-hearted family is her betrothal to arrogant crown prince Leoford Franz. When the revelation of his tryst with another debutante comes as an unsurprising wake-up call, she has no choice but to barter for her freedom with Edwin Lowell Vikander, the ruthless, war-hardened Grand Duke of the north. As her dangerous dance with Edwin begins, Olivia seeks to leave her former fiancé with the coldest gift that vengeance can impart… A heart made bitter with regret.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Unmei no Hito ni Deau Hanashi
description: Yuuki is a 20-year-old college sophomore who has wished for one thing since moving to Tokyo: to find her soulmate. Growing a bit desperate after a long drought, she goes along with a friend to a club for the first time. Her friend thrives, but it’s chaotic and loud…just not Yuuki’s scene. Just when Yuuki begins to despair that she’ll ever find a real, adult relationship, she meets Iori, a man with bleached hair and a slightly scary demeanor…but first impressions don’t always tell the whole story. Could destiny still have more cards to play? [Kodansha]
tags: Romance

name: Not found
description: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
tags: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Apocalypse Online
description: When the end of the world came, in the hopeless darkness, Gu Qingshan broke away from time and space, and returned to the world before it collapsed, determined to change his fate. But as time went on, he gradually realized that the apocalypse is not as simple as it seemed…
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi
description: Shirahama Kenichi is a book lover who has just entered high school, but he is often bullied by others. One day, he became good friends with the new transfer student, Fuurinji Miu, who was also looking for a friend. Kenichi was shocked at how powerful she is at first, but he is still somehow attracted to her…so he later goes to the dojo of her family and starts a training that will change his life.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama

name: Your Throne
description: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Kishi Danchou no Elf-san datte Otome ga Shitai.
description:
In a famed kingdom, women are not allowed to enter the knighthood! And yet, a female elf becomes the temporary captain of that very order of knights?! Enjoy the daily life of the elf captain, Gilga, who is cool and powerful on the outside, but maidenly and pure on the inside!!
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/even-the-elf-captain-wants-to-be-a-maiden-manga/531/)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Fantasy

name: Mugi Kaoru Futari
description:
Hugo, the grandson of Adam, is struggling to reopen the bakery left by his late grandfather. However, he is not good at baking. Then, Adam's former apprentice, Sumino Mitsuyuki, comes to the store. Hugo decides to ask Sumino, who he's not very fond of, if he can help reopen the bakery, but it turns out that Sumino hasn't made bread for three years! Hugo is at a loss, but... how does the bread made by Sumino taste?

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Your Head’s Fallen Off Again
description:
Everyone knows slaying monsters make you level up.
But me? I AM the monster...

I'm the only zombie on Earth who can survive having my head fall off. In order to stay alive, I've hidden my identity, laid low, and pretended to be just another corpse.

Also... I couldn't stop worrying about my frail ex-girlfriend—so I decided to protect her from the shadows.

But, who knew she’d turn into a badass zombie-slayer? And now she’s found me?!

I flee, she hunts. Our fates are like an entangled mess.

And KA-BOOM! The whole world is doomed!

Alright then, no more hiding.

The truth is... I'm the vaccine.
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Zombies, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Girls' Love, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Not found
description: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The protagonist who was rarely ever at school during his middle school and high school days, is unemployed even as an adult. From morning till night, it was video games. For him who was ranked first worldwide, it was his life. One day, his character is suddenly hacked. The data was unrecoverable and there was nothing that could be done. Feeling great despair at having lost his rank that he had bet everything to achieve in a world that controlled his life, the protagonist attempts suicide. When he awakens, he finds himself inside the video game, no, it was a real world that resembled it. There, he notices that he has reincarnated into the the body of a sub character that he had created and bought premium benefits for long ago but had left neglected.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: One day, Karina, a lady who has been groomed to be queen, suddenly has her engagement broken by her fiancé, the prince. Now he is sending Karina into exile while standing beside her sister, Aurora, instead. Exiled to the far north, where monsters are said to dwell, Karina ventures out to investigate the identity of a disturbing sound and has a fateful encounter in the snow...?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description: One day, Satsuki Yamato saw the jagged teeth behind Kiraragi Aisu's mask. As he approached her, those teeth marked the beginning of a sharp and prickly romantic comedy.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Estio
description:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Don't Mind Me, Daddy
description: Jayna’s life is a parade of misfortunes: born to a dragon mother who dies early, bullied by other dragons throughout her childhood, disregarded by her human father, and murdered as a teenager. At least, according to the novel she’s been reborn in. At 10 years old, she’s given the chance to live with her father, the Master of the Magic Tower, Diamid. She’s aware her father and destiny will not be kind to her, so her only goal is to enjoy the small luxuries of life until she dies at 17. But will this life truly be the same tragedy?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Marry My Husband
description:
Her best friend and her husband cheated on her. If that were not enough, he killed her, his terminally ill wife. Ji Won, who died like that, miraculously returned to ten years earlier. In order to change her future, Ji Won pledged to hand over her ill fate to her "best friend" Soomin.

'So, marry my husband instead of me.'

---
[Original Web Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4812845)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6728079), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=783769)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/qinghewodelaogongjiehun/list?title_no=2027)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/marry-my-husband/list?title_no=4110)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/marry-my-husband/list?title_no=3866)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001993&t=1652447837954)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/marry-my-husband/list?title_no=3987)
tags: Reincarnation, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Moeru Aki
description: Not found
tags: Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Since When Do Guys Find Divorcees Attractive?
description: "I'm going to enjoy my second time being single!". Ono Kazuha has divorced her husband at 35 over an affair. She stood tall and announced "I'm officially divorced" to the fashion magazine's editorial department where she works. To add insult to injury, a handsome new hire happened to overhear. She expected it to be awkward, but for some reason it made him attracted to her?
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: To Remain a Magical Girl Is Hard
description:
Chosen from above, a selection of teenagers are made into magical girls to fight for the city and to aspire everyone! Rin Yamabuki has just moved into town and still has a lot to learn about and still needs time to get adjusted to everything. Rin's close friend, Wakaba, reveals he himself is a magical girl.

As things start settling, a monster appears in the city that almost defeats Wakaba. With his friend in danger, Rin, now faced with new dangers must act on a decision and quickly.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Drama, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Nito no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun ~Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?~
description: Hidako Masamune is a high school student who suffers from continuous bullying by his classmates. Becoming tired of it all, he decides to commit suicide, but instead he is transported to another world along with all his classmates. When they arrive, they find that they now possess amazing abilities but he was only granted the status of a "healer," the weakest skill of all. The king decides to get rid of him by transporting him to another faraway place, but not before Hidako swears revenge against the king, the kingdom, and all of his classmates.
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kanchigai no Atelier Meister - Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
description:
Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him, he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking, building, magic tool crafting, etc.
___
* JP Web Novel: [link](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/292207951/264201950)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I Become A Villain In My Novel
description:
A third-rate writer that is destined to go to hell because of it's bad novel ending, got reincarnated in his own novel instead, reborn as the villainous son-in-law - Li Yu Guo. The battle of wits and courage between him and the original protagonist begins now…  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mahou Shoujo?
description: Not found
tags: Magical Girls, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon
description:
The Skeleton Soldier is a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

"I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!"

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Little Mushroom
description:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…
______

**Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Abandoned ~Tsuyosugite Buki ga Kowareru Yuusha to Buki Shokunin no Elf~
description: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: I'm Being Raised by Villains
description:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
tags: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen
description:
In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3297eu/)
tags: Reincarnation, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Villainess, Adaptation

name: A Morning Kiss at Tiffany's
description:
The building was taken away by her first love. Yu Hari, the owner of the "Tiffany" building in Cheongdam. Eunho, her first love who came back after 5 years, pushed the transferring registration paper in front of her. 

“Ah, the name of this building has changed since yesterday to Cha.Eun.Ho.” Thus, Hari went from being a building owner to a homeless person overnight. 

"From now on you’re not my first love, you're my first loser." She hated him so much that she wanted to pour out all the curses in the world and strike him with lightning, but she needed to sort out her bare necessities first. That's how Hari got employed for the first time in her life as a resident helper for Eunho, the "first-loser." Her new job was difficult day in and day out, as she used to spend 99.9% of her life eating and messing around. She was also angry at Eunho, who was openly rude to her, but it was more bearable than she thought. No, sometimes it was fun. And…You know what they say, old habits die hard, she fell back into the habit of having feelings for Eunho... 

"The second clause in the contract is that the employee does nothing to seduce their fellow employee." Will Hari be able to regain both the Tiffany building and Eunho?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kono Ura Aka, Sensei desho?
description:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Chimera hunter Number 17 has spent decades hunting monsters. On his latest mission, he’s ordered to ensure the human hunters’ escape and never return to base. In other words, he’s meant to die. As his body dissolves, his life flashes before him: kidnapped as a boy, forced into endless battles, reduced to a mindless weapon. But against all odds, his body reforms into his human form. No longer Chimera Hunter Number 17, he stands before a vast open land on his own two feet as Do-un Cheon, a human, ready to start his life anew, making friends out of monsters and building the family he never had.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Drama Queen
description:
After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable...

(MANGA Plus)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Kuroko's Basketball
description:
Kuroko is a member from the legendary middle school basketball team known as -The Generation of Miracles-, and while nobody seems to know about him, the main 5 players of the team all admit that he is a better player. When he joins the high school basketball team, everyone is surprised to find out that he is small, weak, and easy to miss. What is the secret that makes him so strong, and how will he help his high school team?

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Kuroko's Basketball** (2013)
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Me & Roboco
description: The year is 20XX... A time when every household owns cute maid robots known as OrderMaids. Average grade-schooler Bondo dreams of having his very own robot. But what he got was... Unable to compute!!! Life is gonna get a whole lot weirder when Roboco, the most powerful clumsy maid ever created, shows up at his door!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking, Music

name: Not found
description:
It's been 68 years since the Culling Game. In 2086, an alien race known as the Simurians arrive on Earth in a spaceship.
The fate of the world lies in the hands of two jujutsu sorcerers Yuka and Tsurugi Okkotsu.

**Jujutsu sorcerers and aliens, what chaos will be born from this meeting?**

(Source: MangaPlus)
tags: Action, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Centuria
description: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Red Cat Ramen
description: Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats, with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats, and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person, she is easily hired. However, her job is not to run a ramen shop, but to look after cats...?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Kagurabachi
description: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Magic, Gore, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Akane-banashi
description: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama

name: Tsui no Hanayome
description: Selma is one of the most beautiful women you might ever see.  Wherever she goes, everyone - both men and women - are captivated by her charms.  But wherever Selma goes, death also seems to follow - for she is no ordinary woman...
tags: Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Witch Watch
description: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof...
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Sakamoto Days
description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day... he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then... Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger?
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Elusive Samurai
description: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Tokiyuki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Tokiyuki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Harem, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?!
tags: Award Winning, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: My Vampire System: A Dragon's Revenge
description: I was once the legendary red dragon who stood at the top of the world. For thousands of years, my brethren have been murdered by humans and the desire for revenge slowly turned into my only mission in this world! However, I failed. On the day of the decisive battle against human beings, I died with hatred in my heart... if there is an afterlife, I will definitely avenge my kind. If there is an afterlife, I will make these filthy humans pay with their blood! If there is an afterlife—hmm? I was reincarnated as a weak human baby?!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Swordmaster's Son
description:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Alexander Eiyuusenki ~Saikyou no Tsuchi Majutsu-shi~
description: In a world where people are given several skills as a blessing from God when they turn 10, the eldest son of the Desemann family, Alec, was only able to acquire one unpopular skill, earth magic - even though everyone in the family is amazing!! But his younger sister Maria says, "You're a monster, big brother."
tags: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Regnard defies expectations by enrolling in the esteemed Royal Academy of Lasarzia despite being a dropout. However, during the Blessing Ceremony, he receives a peculiar skill called "Blessing of Sleeping Together," leading to ridicule from classmates. Despite the mockery, Regnard discovers the true potential of this skill when he spends the night with Frost, an honor student. This revelation leads to unexpected adventures and a harem fantasy, as Regnard navigates the challenges of his newfound abilities and hidden desires.
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she's determined to carve her own path.
___
[Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Survival, Adventure, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 4-shou—Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majo
description: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei
description:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school... Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Kamieshi no Oshigoto
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct. He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...?
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru!
description: A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has neither friends nor a girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses a group of mysterious men dressed in black attempting to kidnap Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class. Apparently, Maya's parents sold her off to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he obtained through investments. Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Kamen Rider X (TV Magazine)
description: The tokusatsu TV superhero Kamen Rider franchise, which was overwhelmingly popular among children in the Showa era, has been made into a manga! "Kamen Rider X," serialized in the popular magazine "TV Magazine", is now available as a long-awaited reprint! Keisuke Jin tries to save his father Dr. Jin from an attack by G.O.D. and is shot and killed in the process. However, in exchange for his own life, Dr. Jin resurrects Keisuke as the cyborg Kaizorg! Learning of his mission from Dr. Jin's last words, Keisuke becomes Kamen Rider X and battles G.O.D.!
tags: Action, Superhero, Gore, Adaptation

name: Fights Break Sphere – Return of the Beasts
description:
The demonic race from outer territories have invaded The Great Thousand Worlds once again, The Ruler Mu Chen, Martial arts godfather Lin Dong, Flame emperor Xiao Yan and other strong ones fight to the death in order to protect billions of lives.  
  
While also at this time, Godly Beast continent is shrouded in the shadow of war. Ministers plotting for power while the Ape King was assassinated. The youngster Lu Zhun that wandered for three years has returned to Dong Chuan, the territory of the Ape race.  
  
Lu Zhun, a member of the Ape race, will he be able to uncover the truth behind his father’s death, can he seize the throne that's rightfully his? Can he become the True Emperor of the Godly beast race!?
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces. Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Blink Master of the Magic Academy
description:
In the game Aether World, **Baek Yuseol** is considered the most useless character because he can't use magic like everyone else. His only skill, Blink, is a short-range teleportation ability most players consider worthless. But when he’s tasked with reaching the game's true ending, Baek Yuseol decides to use his unconventional skill to achieve this impossible goal. 

Can this so-called "**TRASH**" character outsmart his powerful peers, form unlikely alliances, and ultimately master the game?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Again!!
description:
After three unfulfilling years of high school, Imamura Kinichirou was finally graduating. Because of his delinquent-esque looks, he was feared by his classmates, has made no friends, and his greatest regret was not joining the ouendan (cheer club), which was now disbanded. After an accident on the day of his graduation, he and classmate Fujieda Aki are transported three years back in time, freshman again in body but with high-school memories intact. Can Imamura fix the mistakes of his past? Can he re-do his high school years in the way that he's always wanted? Again!! The universe suddenly shouts.
___
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English: [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/again/)
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: The New Gate
description: The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players. Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game's final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Eli is a witch who lives in the Sea of ​​Trees. Eli, who has lived for a long time, has written down her records in the form of a book, which has been passed down to future generations. One day, Eli sets out on a journey to a town where there are parchment craftsmen. On the way, Eli hears rumors of a monster from a merchant, and when she stops at an abandoned village, she is attacked by its residents. However, the residents have their own reasons for attacking Eli…

The story of a witch who lives to understand the world unfolds.
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Psycho-Pass - Kanshikan Kougami Shinya
description: It is an original story that depicts young Kougami Shinya when he was monitoring officer.
tags: Action, Psychological

name: Not found
description:
**Qingmei said,** *“My husband’s medical skills can bring the dying back to life, and he has the heart of a true healer. He is the most renowned physician in Yuzhou City...”*
 
**An Jing said,** *“My wife is gentle and virtuous, excels in cooking, and is a beauty beyond compare...”*
 
Beneath the moonlight, two swords clashed with each other as two figures exchanged blows.
 
**“Husband, aren’t you a doctor?”**
 
**“Wife, aren’t you supposed to be a proper lady of a noble family?”**
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sweet Home
description: Now a major adaptation on streaming. After an unexpected family tragedy, a reclusive high school student is forced to leave his home -- only to face something much scarier: a reality where monsters are trying to wipe out humanity. Now he must fight alongside a handful of reluctant heroes to try and save the world before it’s too late.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
"If you were to disappear... I might just lose myself."
