Arcs is reborn into the world of the wildly popular otome game Celestia Kingdom. He thought he was just a background character—until it's revealed he's actually the childhood friend of the final boss! Determined to avoid the bad ending, he throws himself into his daily life as her servant. But it seems the true cause of her descent into darkness is... her childhood friend!?

An unpredictable tale of master and servant, between a slightly (maybe more than slightly?) yandere heroine and an obliviously overpowered protagonist, begins...!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: The Knight Who Only Lives Today
description:
Is dying repeatedly a blessing? 

Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! 

Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Ninja Knight
description: Ninjas, known for their exceptional physical abilities, mastery of various tools, and expertise in stealth operations. Knights, who pledge loyalty to their lords, excel in advanced swordsmanship, and are skilled in combat.
tags: Action, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Buta no Fukushuu
description:
After rampant bullying, high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world, where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot Web](https://web.mangahot.jp/works/detail.php?work_code=z_R0185)
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/revenge-of-the-pig-manga/803/)
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Survival, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom! Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course... Night-time battles!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou Suru~
description: The **former** savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appear from "gates" and rampage, and those called hunters fight them using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Watashi no Shitsuji wa Nabiite Kurenai
description: She wants to win the heart of the cool and handsome butler, Yuichiro Fujino, but he is always too mature to understand her feelings for him. But then he unexpectedly spoils her or is overprotective.... She is at the mercy of Fujino's words and actions, whose true intentions are hard to read, but she is determined to push forward with her love, and you cannot take your eyes off of her!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-hen
description:
In December, Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However, unlike previous years, they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come" — it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.  
— If she is elected, her brother will be free.  
— If she becomes the next head, she will be forced to marry someone else.  
Miyuki's heart is a mess.  
The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The Basketball Girl
description: The unknown interior designer, Hans Duan (22 years old), was involved in a criminal dispute as he designed the house for one of the members in that group. Unfortunately, he was persecuted as a murderer due to the case and sentenced to death. In the prison, he met a scientist from the government (Code name No.73) who asked him to take part in a human experiment. But the experiment failed and Hans died. His body was buried in a dump in the city. However, the experimental medicine left in his body leads to gene mutation. Hans is revived and changed into a female. What will happen on him (her)?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Crime, Sports, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Reliance
description: Spin-off story of 14-sai no Koi, featuring Aoi Shiki (a lesbian side character in an unrequited love with the FMC of the main story) and a new character, Iori Tachibana, in their 3rd year of middle school.
tags: Girls' Love, School Life

name: Duck Leeks are Poisonous: Professor Kamo's Lecture on Human Economics
description:
"Hey, are you a sucker?"

Kamo Youhei is a genius economist whose "Suckerism Economic Theory" has gained worldwide acclaim. He is a "weirdo" who pretends to be many things under the guise of "fieldwork," but in a society where the economically weak are exploited and cheated, he puts his economic theories into practice and feeds poison to the crooked and powerful!
tags: Psychological, Office Workers, Drama

name: Not found
description:
Kuroto Hinata is searching for his sister, who "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shizuku, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him.
___
* Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ame to Umi
description: One week after Otosaka Ame starts high school, he happens to glance down the hallway and spots a familiar face—Karakisaki Umi, a classmate from the same middle school who had mysteriously stopped showing up right after the school year began. Even when she does come to school, she avoids eye contact, forces a polite smile, and keeps her head down. Concerned, Ame decides to reach out to her...
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Isekai Nonbiri Nouka
description: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: 20-Nen de Iroiro Kawacchatta Hero to Shounen
description: Bravely is the hero of justice. 20 years later, he wakes up and finds that he somehow has become a cute girl...?!
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Omomaru, a middle school student. A boy with a strong belief of hating and resenting everything in this world, thinking that all humans should just die, one day meets a female ghost named Reiko. This encounter will have a major impact on his life....‼ A great journey to find the "best ending" in the afterlife begins‼
tags: Ghosts, Adventure, Philosophical, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: When You put on Loafers
description: Rinne Miki is a normal first year's high school girl who loves fashion and is close with her friends. But, she has a caring personality too, so though she has opposite-sex friends, that never became romantic, and she lived her life without romance. But, on the day of the school festival, she meets Toma, a boy with a slightly mysterious atmosphere to him... though she's bewildered by how aggressively the younger boy approaches here, gradually, she starts to see him as...?
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Shota

name: Ansatsusha de Aru Ore no Status ga Yuusha yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi no da ga
description: Oda Akira, a high school student who excels in erasing his presence, was summoned along with his classmates to another world. In this world of sword and magic, Akira and his classmates were asked to become heroes and bring down the demon king. Having a bad feeling about the king and the princess who asked them, Akira uses his special skills to sneak into the king's library, in hopes of discovering the truth. Whether to help or abandon his classmates who knew nothing, it all depended on Akira.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dungeon de Nariagare! Osananajimi kara no Kirawarete Goblin ni Saekate Nakatta Ore ga, Dungeon Ruler no Shidou wo Uketara Tsuyoku Nareta no de Imouto to Musou shimasu
description:
It has been 30 years since dungeons were established in Japan.
Kyoichi has been accepted into the same extremely difficult high school as his childhood fiancée, Tsubaki, but... Rumor has it that he kneels before a goblin, and he becomes the target of class teasing.
He tries to turn the situation around by exploring a dungeon, but is beaten up by a group of goblins.
Thinking of his younger sister, Koyoi, he is ready to die, but...
He is saved by a dungeon ruler named Kyoji.
This encounter changes Kyoji's destiny.

Every time you fight, you get stronger and stronger!
The Warriors' Dungeon Adventure with his sister is about to begin!
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, School Life, Fantasy

name: Tengoku de Akuma ga Boku wo Miwaku Suru
description: Kaoru Jahana, a boy who aspires to become a true man, begins his high school life on a solitary island in the sea. There, he meets a charming girl, Kanra, who is actually a demon who feeds on men's spirits... and it turns out that all the women on this island are the same demons!?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, School Life, Monster Girls, Shota, Supernatural, Mystery

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 9:  The JOJOLands
description: O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand...
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Luciole Has a Dream
description:
The story of two people trapped in a devastated world on a fantastic journey.

Lou wakes up from a cold sleep. The first thing he sees. And it is dazzling light and Claude, a self-proclaimed great wizard.

The whole area is desolate, not even a shadow of a human being is to be seen. Only he and Claude are alive.

Lou travels aimlessly to find the others. He sets out on a journey without a clue...
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Nyaight of the Living Cat
description: A virus spreads across the world, transforming all humankind into wild, slavering, furry beasts: cats, to be precise. Those few survivors who remain human take refuge in the dark corners of the earth as they fight back against the feline horde. Kunagi, a man with no memory of his past yet a deep knowledge of cats, struggles to hold on with only his wits and a will to survive. Yet the virus transmits merely through cuddles, and Kunagi finds kitties so hard to resist! Is his willpower strong enough to withstand this hair-raising cat-tastrophe?
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror

name: What's Our Hero Doing?
description: Hans wakes up as a minor character in Vantablack Ring, a game he's cleared countless times. To survive the monster attack, he decides to stick close to the hero, Kadith, only to see him immediately killed in battle. Shocked, Hans sets out to find the other heroes... but soon learns that the same fate awaits every one of them and that he seems to be absorbing their abilities. With his plans to lay low gone awry, will Hans have to become the hero and save this world himself?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
A polite and lethargic boy was reincarnated in another world as a vampire bishoujo. In this world of swords and magic, this protagonist who was reborn replete with all kinds of cheat powers was searching for one thing??!

"Three meals a day, snacks and an afternoon nap, I guess."

Are you really the protagonist!? And thus begins the fantasy comedy of a vampire looking for the ideal moocher lifestyle.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan o Erandeiraremasen—Dai 4-bu: Kizokuin no Toshokan o Sukuitai!
description:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou
description:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn't have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called "Incompetent" by his classmates.

The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a "Synergist", and his very mediocre stats. "Synergist", to put it in another word, was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?
___
**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Imaizumin-chi wa Douyara Gal no Tamariba ni Natteru Rashii ~DEEP~
description: During the day, Imaizumi attends his classes like any dutiful student, only to return each evening to a home full of hotties! It seems his home has become the go-to hangout for the coolest gyarus in town. From endless gossip fests to snack binges to getting downright physical with his three new housemates, his once-quiet abode is now buzzing with non-stop energy and exciting escapades. Can Imaizumi keep up with the lively antics of his lusty gal pals?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul. In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.
___
**Awards:**
- Won the 2020 Next Manga Award in the Web category.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taishou Award.
- Won the top prize of the 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards.

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/boku__yaba)
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hito no Kokoro ga Yomeru Kanojo
description: A young woman whose mind-reading ability drove her to cynicism is asked out by a young man who is unexpectedly sincere and wholesome.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Hanitora! Shoukan Yuusha wo Hameru Honey Trap Hoi Mou
description: After defeating the evil god with his companions, Yuuri's adventure had come to a term. All that remained was for him to go back to the world he came from... or so he thought, but it seemed like he would have to stay here?! Now that he has to live in this world, Yuuri isn't sure what to do next and fears remaining a NEET. In the meantime, the princess Lunaria, who knows Yuuri has little interest in power or luxury, sets up a honey trap as part of her plan to make the hero never leave her country.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Otobe Yukari: Avid reader, but average in anything else. A self-proclaimed “background character” who prefers to keep to herself – especially when it comes to Fujimi Shouko, fellow classmate and center of attention.

That all comes apart when Yukari ends up in the Gardening Committee with her, and falls head over heels after their first interaction.

Now lovestruck, Yukari yearns for any chance to get closer to Shouko – a wish that’s immediately granted, after she stumbles in on her weeping from a broken heart…

Follow the daily troubles of a gullible introvert and her shining protagonist!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Boku no Ikezu na Konyakusha
description: Miyuki-san is a young lady born in Kyoto. My relationship with her cannot be described as good. Because... "You're very good at flattery." Are those words sincere? Or just for show?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Erotic x Anabolic
description: Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class. He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit! Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kurosagi Corpse Delivery Service
description:
Your body is their business!

Five young students at a Buddhist university, three guys and two girls, find little call for their job skills in today's Tokyo... among the living, that is! But all that stuff in college they were told would never pay off — you know, channeling, dowsing, ESP — gives them a direct line to the dead... the dead who are still trapped in their corpses and can't move on to the next reincarnation.

The five form the *Kurosagi* ("Black Heron", their ominous bird logo) *Corpse Delivery Service*: whether suicide, murder, accident, or illness, they'll carry your body wherever it needs to go to free your soul! The kids from Kurosagi can smell a customer a mile away — it's a good thing one of the girls majored in embalming!
tags: Comedy, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Birds Junkies
description: Naruse is a new working adult who is exhausted from his unfamiliar life. He reaches his limit and storms into his neighbor's house! There, he finds "that thing" that even makes Naruse addicted to it. A person who knows Naruse says, "He is addicted to birds more than anything else. The person who is addicted to birds is the worst of all..."
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Five dragon girls without an ounce of sense between them. Going nowhere at the breakneck pace of 4 panels per page.

This is the Dragon Girls' Nowhere Zone.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, Monster Girls

name: Menkui
description:
“My sister… Is she really my sister?”
Can you truly say, without a shred of doubt, that the person you love by your side is family?

Haruka lost her parents when she was just a child. For a time she was separated from her older sister, Yurina, but now the two live together again, seemingly close as ever. To Haruka, beautiful Yurina is the very picture of the perfect sister.

But even so, two unsettling doubts have taken root in her heart. The first one is that every time Yurina starts dating someone new, she always calls him her “first love.”. And the second one is whether Yurina is truly her sister at all.

Desperate to shake off these suspicions, Haruka opens her sister’s old graduation album. What she discovers inside leaves her reeling.

And one night, her worst fears take shape before her eyes. Haruka catches Yurina “carving up” her so-called first love with a kitchen knife…?!
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Meiten Restaurant
description: As the distinguished son of a family who run a financial conglomerate, Gatarou Barazono took full advantage of his money to live a rosy life and enjoy it to its fullest. But one day, he suddenly got hit by a truck, and when he awoke, he found himself in the "Afterlife!" There, he finds the dubious-looking "Meiten Restaurant" (Underworld Restaurant), where the deceased are served their final meal before going to rest in peace...
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: In the hero party, he was treated as an unreasonable piece of junk, but he's loved by the spirit princesses! Young man Univas who contributed the most to the defeat of the Demon King by the hero party, using his ability to bond with spirits called "Spirit Taming". However, he is expelled from the party by the hero Braveban and his group, who do not recognize his talent, and loses his job. Univas was in despair, but he meets his old acquaintance, the Wind Spirit Princess Tifon, in a fateful reunion at the "Spirit Wedding" ceremony where the hero and the spirit princess get married...?
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A dark comedy for the modern era, from CoroCoro Comic!

Enter Black, the "Demonic Yo-Tuber"! With his sidekick Camera-chan, and the aspiring 5th grade Yo-Tuber Satoshi, he makes all kinds of crazy videos using his demonic powers. Filming the "true natures" of anyone from top honor students, to class idols, to supernatural monsters, he makes crazy videos with his demonic powers! What will Black film next...?
tags: Demons, Comedy, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Nee-chan no Tomodachi ga Uzai-banashi (Pre-Serialization)
description:
The Story of Nao. 
From the original manga The Story of a Guy Who Fell in Love with His Friend’s Sister
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Nicola Traveling Around the Demons’ World
description: Nicola, human, ends up in the Demon World where she is found by wandering trader, Simon. Unfortunately, humans don't seem to be appreciated all that much in the Demon World, but that doesn't stop Nicola from running her mouth all the time.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Disney Twisted Wonderland: The Comic—Episode of Savanaclaw
description: Hirasaka Yuuka, a high-school student who lived an average life, and a black carriage that suddenly appeared in front of her one day on her way home from club. After seeing it and losing consciousness, she awoke in another world called "Twisted Wonderland"...?
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Black Jack
description:
Black Jack is an "unregistered" doctor with a clouded, mysterious past. He works with his little assistant Pinoko (who has a massive crush on the doctor), dealing with medical cases not very well known, which can be strange, dangerous, or not known at all. But he is a genius, and can save almost any of his patients' lives (as long as they have the money for it), and is known to many around the world, especially to those of medicine and science. He's a man of science himself, and does not believe much until he has seen it, yet it is many times he is surprised by love and nature often overpowering the science he bases his life in.  

Out of a total of 243 chapters chapter 113.5: 'U-18 Knew' was released in a Weekly Shonen Champion special issue and thos it's unnumbered. Also, 11 chapters were not included in the Vertical English release, out of those 11 chapters: 3 were exclusively Included in the hardcover editions of volumes 1-3, and 5 of them are labeled as [Sealed](http://tezukainenglish.com/wp/?page_id=573) meaning they have been excluded from almost every collected release because they were controversial or Osamu wasn't happy with them.

---
- **Won the 1st Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1977, which it shared with Tezuka's other serial, Three-Eyed One**
- **Won the 4th Japan Cartoonists Association Special Excellence Award in 1975**
---
**Volumes 151-168, 366 and 367, 370 and 371 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

---

description: A very loose adaptation of the story-light cult-classic Super Famicom/SNES video game of the same name. Umihara Kawase (who spells her name differently, indicating this is an alternate universe story compared to the games) must contend with a sinister organisation and confront the legacy of her oceanographer father with the help of her new friend Kouichi Shioji. Serialised in Comic Burger in 1995, it ran for eight chapters. The first six were collected in tankobon format.

description: After confessing to my beloved Hanazono-san, I was rejected with the reason, 'I already have an engagement arranged by my parents.' That person is the wealthy and handsome Ikegai-kun, who also happens to have a good personality. Thinking that I had no chance in a straightforward competition, I, Hachiya, decided to cross-dress as a maid and work at the Ikegai house. My plan is to make Ikegai-kun fall for me and break their engagement... Thus begins a slightly silly, cross-dressing maid's comedy that leads to a chaotic love triangle (?)

A few snippets of The life of a pair of rommates.

name: Koisuru Psycho no Shirayuki-kun
description:
I will kill everyone for your sake.

"Hey, I think I like you!" Shirayuki says with a smile.
Haruki endures relentless bullying from a trio of classmates. One day, a beautiful transfer student named Shirayuki suddenly approaches him and asks if he would date him if the bullying stopped. Haruki dismisses it as a joke. But the next day, one of his tormentors disappears. Then another. One thing's for sure—Shirayuki is a psychopath that lacks common sense and empathy.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Adaptation

name: Souboutei Must be Destroyed
description: A mysterious mansion has towered proudly over the Tokyo district of Numanakarai since the Taisho period. Those who enter either never escape, or leave having experienced horrors untold, and with the desire to take revenge.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
"Don't underestimate my reincarnation cheat!"

Elroy, the fifth prince of the Norgard royal family. He possesses the memories of his previous life and a cheat skill bestowed upon him during his reincarnation, which grants him luck that can turn the tide in dire situations [Luck - All or Nothing]. Although Elroy was recognized as a prodigy from a young age, his brilliance made him a target of disdain from his brothers, leading to his forced exile to the desolate and remote region of Ouroboroslant, where he was destined to die a miserable death. However, liberated from the palace's constraints, Elroy, alongside the strongest maid, utilizes his reincarnation cheat to transform the barren wasteland into a magnificent territory!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

A fantastic cat named Tenohira Neko, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, appears to Kanade, a first-year high school student. He is told that if he likes it, it will live with him…?

name: Blue Valentine
description: PREVIOUSLY: The six girls of NMIXX set off on a journey to reach MIXXTOPIA, a world where everyone's individuality is cherished. Experiencing many difficulties along the way, they fall victim to the villain Monopole's trap and even have their ship set aflame. While repairing the burned ship the girls stay in FIELD, confronting the stubborn prejudices of society and gathering people willing to travel to MIXXTOPIA. The newly repaired MMU sets sail safely once again. In order to reach MIXXTOPIA, NMIXX heads forth into a vast black hole.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The more you do it, the stronger you get!? Iijima Satoru. 32 years old. Virgin. Today, he was idly masturbating while listening to the vibrator of the woman living upstairs... but suddenly the ceiling collapsed, and the woman, completely exposed from the waist down, fell! And then... she landed on him...?!

He suddenly found himself in another world... the world of an eroge, famous for its goofy setting. In this game, the heroines always have some parts completely exposed, whether it be their breasts, their lower bodies, or wearing thongs - a veritable paradise! 

What's more, Satoru has the skill "Ero Note." When the favorability rating of the person whose name you've written reaches the maximum, it becomes an unstoppable skill that allows him to do whatever he wants with them!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Kyou mo Veranda de
description: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.

name: Ultimate Scheming System
description:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hareta Hi no Dress Code
description:
If only I could wear my favorite clothes however I want—

Natsuki Yonei, a first-year high school girl, thought about wear slacks to school, but she ended up going with the "safe" option of a skirt instead. But she notices another girl, Miwa Omi, who is wearing pants, even though almost all the other girls are wearing skirts. Intrigued, Natsuki tries to befriend her, and she learns the reason why Miwa doesn't wear skirts...

Uniforms and a first love, in a bright yet slightly bittersweet chapter of high school life.

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kimi ni Sasageru Otokomae
description: "I'm going to tell you I love you every day!" A younger handsome guy confesses his love on their first meeting! An uneven love story between a good looking boy and a manly girl begins.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
description:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki
description: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.

name: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha ~Maou wa Sekai wo Seifukusuru Youdesu~
description:
After a life seemingly devoid of meaning, a man reincarnates in a new world as Yuri Ho. 

Immersed in novel experiences and embraced by parents who shower him with unprecedented affection, his will to live grows like never before. The future that lies before him is a peaceful existence on his father's ranch, breeding and raising birds to be ridden by warriors fighting distant wars. His new home, the Shiyalta Kingdom, has enjoyed peace and prosperity for centuries, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established following the collapse of a once-great empire. It seems no threat can compromise this idyllic lifestyle. 

However, when the effects of a neighboring kingdom’s war throw Yuri's family into crisis, he finds himself unable to stand by and watch.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Main character Zack has hit rock bottom.

His family hates him, and his fiancee called off his engagement.
A black object appears before him. It turns out to be Sura, a powerful black slime that speaks human!

A great adventure, with the strongest slime! They're aiming to rule the continent!?
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
An unexpected transformation into a girl with tiger ears!

Momoyama Richou is an aspiring novelist and high school student. After suffering a major blow to his ego through a reality check, he found himself contracting "Beastification Syndrome." Tiger ears? Check. A tail? Yup. Becoming a girl on top of that? Just a nice addition.

How will he live his life from now on? Find out in this wild comedy filled with transformations into beast people and gender-swapping!!!
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The House Without Time
description: An abused little girl with nothing to live for meets an old man with a nasty personality.

name: Saenai Kanojo (Heroine) no Sodatekata
description:
A highschool otaku named Aki Tomoya runs into his dream girl one day…only to find that she has the faintest presence to his chagrin!   
  
Now with his otaku passions, Tomoya wants to turn the girl into a heroine in the only realm he is familiar with: 2D dating simulation game. To accomplish this objective, he scouts Eriri Spencer Sawamura, his half-foreigner childhood friend equipped with artistic talent, as the illustrator, and Kasumigaoka Utaha, a famous prodigy writer, as the script writer.  
  
Oh, did we mention the dream girl's name?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Kaira

A collection of one-shots by Abe Yoshitoshi focusing on the theme of "memory and consciousness".

1. Furumachi (古街)
2. Jusou (樹葬)
3. Haiiki (廃域)
4. Shirasame (白雨)

description: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...

description: Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I'll let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.

name: My Mobster Girlfriend
description:
Zhang Nan, the young master of the declining Fu Long Clan just wants to be a normal person, but he is sent to an aristocratic training school by his grandfather. He is accidentally assigned to a female class by the teacher, and is tormented by his peers to the point where he wants to leave school.  
Will his experiences at Blake Academy and the girls he meets change him so he can face his identity as the heir to his clan?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Harem

name: So Shine!!
description: Not found

name: Vampire Knight
description: Cross Academy is attended by two groups of students: the Day Class and the Night Class. At twilight, when the students of the Day Class return to their dorm, they cross paths with the Night Class on their way to school. Yuki Cross and Zero Kiryu are the Guardians of the school, protecting the Day Class from the Academy's dark secret: the Night Class is full of vampires!
tags: Action, Romance, Incest, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Koibami Shoujo
description: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Mystery

name: Noragami: Stray God
description: Yato is a homeless god. He doesn’t even have a shrine, not to mention worshippers! So to achieve his ambitious goals, he’s set up a service to help those in need (for a small fee), hoping he’ll eventually raise enough money to build himself the lavish temple of his dreams. Of course, he can’t afford to be picky, so Yato accepts all kinds of jobs, from finding lost kittens to helping a student overcome bullies at school.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Demon King who lost his Job
description: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha, Isekai Kikansha-tachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru
description:
Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess, Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world. He was ridiculed as a "failed hero" at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered. However, he became the strongest and most unique hero, having trained for 30,000 years in another world with the most evil demon king, Felice, who has destroyed 3,000 worlds! Now Kyouya's unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes!
___

name: Not found
description:
In the land of the cat people, it is a serious crime for outsiders to enter without permission. However, Nene, a mouse-girl, has managed to sneak into the country with a mysterious goal. In the meantime, Nene finds work at the Rai Rai Teahouse. Working alongside beautiful cat-girls, she struggles to learn how to "be a cat" from her senpais.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Animals, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Shugo Chara! Jewel Joker
description: The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kimi no Sei Nan Dakara, Sekinin Totte yo ne.
description:
I'm an office lady, and a part-time rental girlfriend. I'm good at getting along with people and can do anything. I'm not particularly interested in romance right now, but I imagine I'll get married and have kids someday...

Then I met Sui-chan, my first rental girlfriend client. At first, I was hesitant because we're the same sex and she's younger than me... but then I thought, wow, I'm good with women too!?
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Koi Koi Koi
description: This is a romantic comedy about Sakura, a girl who gives her all for love and Matsuyuki, a boy who absolutely hates romance.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mousou Sensei
description: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita
description:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—?!
___
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4886hw/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kimi wa Shuumatsu
description:
An 'apocalyptic' boy-meets-girl rom-com about high school boy Yutaka Kuromori and the beautiful, popular girl adored by everyone, Aru Hoshina. Yutaka might shyly deny it, insisting “we’re not dating”, but Aru is always clinging to him, and the two are seen as the talk-of-the-school couple.

But behind what looks like an ordinary boy–girl high school relationship lies a secret — one so ruinous and capricious that, if mishandled, it could bring about the end of the world.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Douran no Joshou-hen
description:
March 2097—Brazil deploys the strategic-class spell Synchroliner Fusion in South America, starting a wave of unrest that will reach as far as Japan, where the new school year is just beginning. Tatsuya and Miyuki have entered their third year at First High, but anti-magician sentiment has been steadily rising. As many young scions of the twenty-eight families gather to discuss what to do about the concerning political climate, a much more immediate threat sits just beyond the shores of Sado Island…

Adaption of Light Novel 21-22.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I Love You de Moyashite Misete
description:
A romantic comedy between a popular, handsome actor and a high school girl who comes to Tokyo to take care of her grandmother. The story begins when the actor, Kitano Hiiragi, asks the high school girl Mairu to go on a date with him, in order to "go down in flames" so he can quit show business.

(from mangaupdates)
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Not found
description: He reincarnated as… the villainous princess’ instructor from the grotesque, yandere-filled eroge he used to play obsessively in his past life!? When Alfred regains his memories, he realizes he’s destined to be beheaded by the princess, and falls into despair! Determined to shout “I don’t wanna die!” and change his fate, he uses every bit of game knowledge revived from his past life to begin a full-power survival strategy. But in reality, the princess is unexpectedly adorable…!? Betting his life, he aims to prevent the heroine from turning into an S-queen (…or push her that way?), in this fate-changing romantic comedy—now begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: The high school freshman Kishino Mamoru was expecting a fateful encounter and he met the pretty girl classmate Oshii Koko, and happened to know her secret. To his surprise, he found out Oshii-san's bladder is super weak...!! To not 'leak' this secret, Kishino Mamoru swore to protect Oshii-san('s bladder).
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Rotten Petal
description:
They often say “Love is a game of heart and mind”. 

They also say that when you fall in love, you become stupid. 

But what if both sides participating in the game are fools? Then no one will have the upper hand right? It's so obvious, yet only the outsider can see it. 

That is why Hà and Ngân can only blame themselves for being friends for 11 years straight. Who knows when it will end? Definitely not these two dumbasses.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Average company worker Shimono spends his days constantly being helped and scolded by his superior and section chief Kamijou Touka. One day, he finds himself having traveled back in time to his high school years. He sees this as a chance to aggressively approach the section chief a second time around, only to find out that very woman had turned into a girl constantly acting lovey-dovey towards him!
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Kaijuu no Tokage
description: Hitomi stumbles upon an egg in the forest, and from it hatches Tokage-chan, a lizard girl who just wants to be recognized as a kaijuu.
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ultra Kaiju Humanization Project "GALAXY DAYS"
description: A comedy 4-koma manga that reimagines the monstrous kaiju from Ultraman as adorable high school girls!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: The Descent of the Demonic Master
description:
The first life: After a tragic accident losing his family and legs, he ends his own life.

The second life: He earned fame as the Red Demonic Master in Zhongyuan, but was betrayed by the man he trusted the most.

And now comes his third life. In his life back in the modern world, Gang Jinho decides to live a normal life. However, he was too used to the Zhongyuan life to become a normal person!

"I wanted to live peacefully. But you are the ones who started it. I hope you're prepared for this."

In front of the threats of his new life, can Gang Jinho shake off his impulses as the Red Demonic Master and obtain the 'normal life' he desires? The adaptation story of a legendary martial artist in the 21st century!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather
description: After getting rejected by her fiancé, 20-year-old Mary Menoushire passed out from the shock. She then got possessed by a 50-year-old lady from another world... who thinks her (ex) fiancé's grandfather is hotter.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi

name: Not found
description:
In his past life, Liam was hardworking and honest. This got him nothing but debt and betrayal. Now he's been reborn as the ruling noble of a planet. Time for some payback. This life he'll grind the world under his heel! He's only looking out for himself. All his underlings will suffer! But try as he might, his tyranny only seems to make his subjects happier.

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The party's resident troublemaker, Healer Arte-chan, continues to crush parties with her cuteness as her weapon!
tags: Comedy, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: The whole company knew that they they were polar opposites who fought like cats and dogs. Yet during the year-end party, the wall between them shattered after they got drunk! And so the two of them went from always being close to going off on each other to feeling very strange things following the accidental mishap...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
She was once known for her powerful magic — the very reason she was chosen to be the crown prince's fiancée. But when a "saintess" appeared, fear of losing everything drove her to make desperate, reckless decisions. Accused of committing evil acts against the saintess, her engagement was broken off and she was exiled to a monastery. On her way into exile, she was ambushed by bandits... and killed.

But death wasn't the end. When she opened her eyes, she had gone back three years into the past! Yet her body was now frail, and her magical power had all but vanished. This time, she resolves to choose a different path — to pursue happiness, even if it means breaking off the engagement herself. The twist? The crown prince refuses to let her go! And even more shocking... a mysterious dark spirit, one never before seen in this world, chooses her as its master!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Isekai Yakkyoku
description:
When a young pharmacologist gives his life to his research and dies from overwork, he finds himself reincarnated as a boy named Farma, the son of a court physician. In this new world where faulty remedies run rampant, Farma uses his knowledge of modern pharmacology and his cheat powers to cure all of the diseases around him.

(Edited One Peace Books)
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Darkest Corners of the Heart
description:
Scary stories tend to hide what's truly within an author's heart.
What exactly could this truth be, as it comes to light between author and listener...?
Frightening yet gentle, eerie yet warm.
A new and exciting therapeutic horror story takes the stage!

(Source: MangaPlus)
tags: Psychological, Horror, Mystery

name: Home at the Horizon
description:
Ryouma runs a public bathhouse with his grandfather in a seaside town. One day, during his usual routine of running the bathhouse after school, a boy named Reo appears, claiming to be his father's illegitimate son.

(MANGA Plus)
tags: Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Youki ni Naritai Shigure-san
description:
Yoshida is a gloomy second year middle school student whose precious youth has been spent stuck in the corner of his class without being able to make any friends. Shigure is the girl who sits next to him in class and she is as gloomy as he is. One day, she struck up a conversation with Yoshida and declared, "I'm going to become a cheerful person!"
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Tonari no Young Jump](https://tonarinoyj.jp/episode/3269754496338555558)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Hayamiya Suzuri leaves her boring countryside life behind to chase her dream: moving to the city and marrying a rich, elite man!
But her heart has other plans... when she finds herself getting flustered around the calm and mysterious Haruno-san — a plain, quiet co-worker who’s nothing like her ideal… or is he?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic

name: Miharu no Senjou
description:
The fate of an entire nation rests on the shoulders of one girl. World War III has finally broken out.

After fierce battles, Japan has been carved up and placed under foreign rule. Miharu, a prodigy with unrivaled sniper skills, meets Shou, a former marksman who can no longer bring himself to pull the trigger on a human target. Together, they are drawn into fights that will decide the fate of their homeland.
tags: Action, Military, Drama

name: I Became Invincible After Descending
description:
After cultivating for 10 years and reaching the Innate Stage, Liu Mo decided to descend from the mountain to experience the world, but…

“I only reached the innate stage at 18, yet this world has 8 year-olds who have already ascended?! Sigh, my talent is totally garbage!”

This world is too scary. It has experts everywhere.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Full Color

name: Nitamono Doushi
description:
Teru is a boy who, haunted by a childhood trauma, sees himself as a loner and avoids human connection.
His only joy comes from video games… until a fateful encounter at his usual arcade starts to shake up his quiet world.
A heartfelt, 88-page, full-length boy-meets-girl story of two awkward souls drawn to each other night after night.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Not found
description:
Before he became a legend, before the Tower trembled at his name—

Urek Mazino was just another Regular, climbing the Tower for a purpose greater than power: To chase after the enigmatic being, Phantaminum.

This is the untold story of Urek’s early days— his trials, battles, and relentless spirit as a chosen Regular. Witness the rise of the man who would one day shake the very foundations of the Tower itself. The legend of Urek Mazino begins here.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hell Mode ~Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Haisettei no Isekai de Musou Suru~ Hajimari no Shoukanshi
description:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Ri-chan
description:
Due to work, Tatsu moves back into his parents' house; soon after that, he encounters a young woman who turns out to be Ri-chan, the little girl he used to play together with in his childhood. However, this girl he reunited with has somehow become very different from the cheerful childhood friend in his memories...

---

name: Zenbu Kowashite Jigoku de Aishite
description: Kurumi Yoshizawa, the student council president, has excellent grades and an inviting, friendly personality... on the surface at least. In reality, her days are spent struggling against her domineering mother and agonizing over her teachers' expectations. One day, Kurumi reluctantly goes to meet Naoi, her truant classmate, at her homeroom teacher's request to look after her. The situation sours quickly as Naoi sees through Kurumi's facade and makes her animosity clear. On the verge of a meltdown, Kurumi is barely able to stop herself from shoplifting, unaware that she's being recorded by Naoi…
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description: Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school. For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: In the Land of Leadale
description:
The last thing she can remember is her life support beginning to fail. Her body had suffered terribly after a fateful accident and the only freedom left in her life came from the VR world of Leadale. Now she finds herself in a country very similar to Leadale and 200 years have passed.
___
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1247p/) (Japanese)  
- [Official English Translation of the Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/9781975308681/in-the-land-of-leadale-vol-1-light-novel/)
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Watashi ni Pool ha Semai Sugita!
description: Not found
tags: Sports, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Ponkotsu Android Hama-san
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time... How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Barbara
description:
**"Tokyo swallows and digests tens of millions of human beings, then expels them. And here is some of the excrement: her name is Barbara."**

(from ebookjapan):

Yosuke Mikura, a popular and indulgent novelist, meets a shabby girl named Barbara at a train station. Ever since she's been staying at his house, MIKURA's inspiration has been brilliant and he finds himself on top of the world.

 ...Is she a demon or a goddess?　

A mysterious tale of an artist's glory and pain!

[Official English](https://emanga.com/products/barbara?variant=32122317702)

---
Link to the Live Action Film Adaptation's Trailer on **[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y2vKPj8gxkA)**

---
**Volumes 145 and 146 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
tags: Award Winning, Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kareinaru Akujo ni Naritai wa! ~Aisare tensei Shoujo wa, Tanoshii Nidome no Jinsei wo Okurimasu~
description:
A girl named Metea is reincarnated as a noble in the Magic Kingdom. Her dream is to become a cool, elegant villainess and live a free life. However, in a world where magic decides everything, she can only use lowest grade magic, domestic magic. Because of this, she is exiled to a remote borderland as its new lord.

But that land turns out to be the perfect place to make her dream come true and do whatever she wants! Her refined domestic magic skills, honed over years of study proves incredibly useful in the borderlands, and before long, talents begin to shake not only the frontier but the entire noble society...?!

This is the story of a girl from the bottom aiming to become the strongest villainess.
tags: Reincarnation, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Lyle, a boy born into a prestigious family of magicians, was hailed as a prodigy for his overwhelming magical power. But when it turns out he can only use “life magic”—magic for chores and farming to make everyday life easier—he’s thrown out of his home. Determined to become the world’s greatest support specialist, he sets out on the path of an adventurer!! This is the story of a self-proclaimed support hero who, using his versatile life magic, unknowingly becomes unstoppable.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Renas, the "Strongest Hero", defeated the Demon King only to be left on the verge of death by a deadly poison. To save his life, he was placed into a frozen sleep for a century until a cure could be created. During that time, the one who waited faithfully for him was his wife and fellow party member, Fina, an elf!
Finally reunited, the couple set off on a honeymoon across a world where they are now hailed as [Legends]!

They hide their true identities to enjoy some uninterrupted lovey-dovey time, but trouble seems to break out wherever they go! Unable to ignore those in need, the former strongest hero and his wife begin a journey to correct the world's wrongs while flirting nonstop!

All with power that defies logic.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: One day, 430 transfer students suddenly appear across every high school in Tokyo. With their strange, almost unnerving beauty, they silently begin to invade the hearts of those who carry “shadows” within them… But who are they? Their purpose is unknown. Their connection is unclear. Their identities remain a mystery. A dark, unpredictable psychological thriller crafted by the genius Toshiki Inoue!
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kikaku-gai no Danjon Kouryaku-sha, Jitsu wa Isekai Kaeri no Moto Yuusha
description:
In an era overtaken by dungeons, hunters who make a living by conquering them have risen to prominence.

After killing the demon lord in another world, the former hero Yuuki Rento returned tired of wars and vowed to spend his remaining life peacefully playing video games.

However, when his friend discovered his identity and dragged him into the job of conquering dungeons, his overpowered abilities quickly become known across the world.

"At this rate, I won't even have time to play my gal games!"

Will the day Rento can finally enjoy a peaceful life ever come...?!

A refreshing fantasy where the hero who once saved another world now dominates with his overpowered abilities!
tags: Isekai, Fantasy

name: One Room, Hiatari Futsuu, Tenshi-tsuki.
description:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven??? Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity?
___
**NOTE:** The Omake chapters at the end of each volume are usually "prequel", not directly happened after the last chapter of said volume. Please refer to the Table of Content or the chapter number itself for details.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Bukiyou na Senpai.
description:
Kannawa-senpai is considered many things, but smooth is definitely not one of them. Then she meets Kamegawa, her new Kouhai. He's cute, a little nerdy, and easy to talk to. How will this awkward Senpai be able to handle these new feelings?!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Hetalia World★Stars: Gangsta
description: Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."
tags: Historical, Comedy, Mafia, Magic, Adaptation

name: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta "Jugushi" ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~
description: Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment! Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou
description: Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King. However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being. Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description: 6:58 AM, Commuting to school via a train bound for Maihara. That girl whose name I don't even know, me,... and the passengers!? The bittersweet atmosphere created by the two high school students gets the passengers excited and reveals their true feelings!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A man who yearned for a life of freedom reincarnates into another world and becomes a carrier—a non-combative class considered useless. Can he make use of his skills to live his dream life or could he be meant for something more? A sexy isekai manga about a man proving there’s more to him than his class!

Sei has always yearned for a life of freedom, and when he’s reborn into another world, it seems like he would finally have his dream life. Except he was born as a “carrier,” a non-combative class that mostly uses their abilities to transport goods. But Sei has found a way to use his powers both in and out of fights, surviving on his own despite his low class. And while he travels the land seeing sights and picking up women, he’ll prove that a lowly carrier is capable of conquering the world!
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation

name: I Am the Sorcerer King
description:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---
