name: Makemasen kara to Iiharu Kao no Ii Onnanoko wo, Zenryoku de Kuppuku Saseru Yuri no Ohanashi
description: The Hyper Onee-sama, forged by hard work vs. The Flawless, Natural-Born Beauty! Who will be the one to... submit first!?Kureha Sara is the reigning "Super Onee-sama" of an elite ladies' academy, a position she's earned through nothing but relentless effort. Her status is suddenly challenged by Mareshino Rui, an effortlessly perfect beauty who proposes a secret contest to determine who is truly fit to get on top.With the school-wide popularity poll just two months away, they need a way to settle the score, just the two of them. Rui's method is... quite unexpected."So, that's why... you're going to be my girlfriend.""Huh...?"The rules of their new relationship are simple: the first one to make the other completely submit proves she is worthy of ruling the school! And so begins a secret war of seduction, with each girl launching an all-out offensive to make the other fall for them first. In this heated battle, whose heart—and body—will be the first to surrender? And who will be the one to conquer them? Prepare to be dominated by this romantic comedy showdown between two pretty girls!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
High school student Kudo Akira is a man who can travel between Japan and another world called Do Merta. All he wants is a carefree, leisurely life in an isekai world!

From conquering labyrinths, exploring gourmet food and all sorts of other spicy "teehee" moments (and not the food kind)!! Trying to live the life he's always dreamed of! The story of a laid-back, infinite adventure begins!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: The 108 of Them
description:
Empress Desa, a great witch and ambassador for the founding of the country, proposes a bet to find herself among 108 people with identical faces to test the emperor's sincerity. Meanwhile, 'Arit', a young witch who admires Desa, secretly participates in the bet to stop Desa?!

---
Dessa, a witch who built an empire for the human she loved, but did not believe in him. In a situation where she must renounce her witch’s powers and become an ordinary human in order to give birth to an imperial heir, she proposes a bet to test Emperor Hartwan, who swore eternal love. To find her among 108 women with the same face. Emperor Hartwan accepts this, and in the end, no matter who he chooses, he even puts out an unconventional condition to welcome the chosen one as an empress. The empire and 107 women resembling the witch gather at the imperial palace. Meanwhile, Arit, a young witch who admires Dessa sneaks into the imperial palace in order to prevent Dessa from becoming human, interferes with the her bet with the emperor?! The search for the empress proceeds with chaos. Who will win in the end?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Love Me for Who I Am
description: High school student Tetsu Iwaoka notices that his classmate Mogumo is always alone at school. Wanting to give Mogumo a chance to make some friends, Tetsu invites Mogumo to work at his family’s maid cafe. Although Mogumo is initially enthusiastic, there is just one problem: this is a cross-dressing boys cafe, but Mogumo is adamant about being neither a boy nor a girl.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama

name: Kara no Kioku
description:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.

Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.

With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.
tags: Action, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam: Day After Tomorrow - From Kai Shiden's Report
description: Written and illustrated by Tsukasa Kotobuki, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized by Gundam Ace magazine between May 2005 - January 2007. This manga shows numerous points between the One Year War and the Gryps War.
tags: Sci-Fi, Mecha

name: Koibumi to 13-sai no Actress
description: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him... She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than many adults.
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.
description: The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young women—and for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Re-Living My Life with a Boyfriend Who Doesn't Remember Me
description:
Magic school is a lot harder when you're trying not to die!

Life seemed perfect for Oriana after she started dating Vincent in the winter of her fifth year at the academy. Little did she know, her beloved would soon die under suspicious circumstances. Before she can process anything, she wakes up to find herself back in her seven-year-old body with no idea how she died. When she finally returns to the magic academy in hopes of reuniting with her boyfriend, she finds out Vincent has no memory of her! Now she's back at square one. Can Oriana navigate this second chance at life and change the course of Vincent's fate? Making her crush work out really is a matter of life and death!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Otona wo Shiritai Onnatomodachi
description:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is... appreciating lewd vide*s. "I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs." A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love... However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place! Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

"I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you...?"
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Gathered here are five "murderer" prisoners. However, they have all lost their memories.
The "crime" they committed is probed by a guard girl, Es, who has also lost all her memories of her past.
The past of the "Murderer" is gradually revealed, and the cruel "punishment" that will be inflicted on them――?
When you know everything, will you be able to forgive their "sins"――?

The long-awaited manga version of the shocking work born from the music project "Milgram" by DECO*27 and Takuya Yamanaka!!
tags: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Because Tang Chao (α) had never mentally experienced the onset of secondary sexual characteristics, she had been working as a cover model as a beta. After unexpectedly having sex with an omega, she found out that she can only be close with this omega. The next day, she met her new colleague Li Zhixu, who seems to be that omega. But... isn't this Li Zhixu a beta?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Ultraman Nexus
description:
*Based on the 2004 Tokusatsu TV series Ultraman Nexus*

TLT is a covert international anti-monster unit, established secretly to combat the Space Beasts, mysterious monsters that are out to attack humans in the year 2009. One of the TLT's new recruits, Kazuki Komon, is attacked by one of them prior to reporting for duty. However, he is saved by a silver giant that he names "Ultraman". What no one knows is that the silver giant is an Ultraman — to be precise, Ultraman Nexus, ready to fight the Space Beasts to save the planet Earth.

From Shogakukan:
"Ultraman Nexus" by Takashi Shiina, which was serialized in Televikun, has been revived after 10 years. Includes 28 pages of the last story completely written by Shiina, and beautiful pinups. A must-have for not only Ultraman fans, but Shiina fans as well!

Originally serialized in 2004, released as a full book in 2015, and then in 2022 digitally.
tags: Monsters, Action, Mecha, Superhero, Military, Drama, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Yumeji Akari to Mahou no Hon
description: Not found
tags: Magic, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Tokimori-san ga Muboubi desu!!
description: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Lord of Mysteries (Remake)
description:
With the rising tide of steam power and machinery, who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness, who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?

Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries, Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery, cannons, dreadnoughts, airships, difference machines, as well as Potions, Divination, Hexes, Tarot Cards, Sealed Artifacts…

The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the world—both orthodox and unorthodox—while he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.

Like the corresponding tarot card, The Fool, which is numbered 0—a number of unlimited potential—this is the legend of "**The Fool**."

---

**Updated Monthly**: 1st & 15th
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Ayumu Ototori, a man who can only love married women, is spending another day indulging in his favorite adult films. But when an earthquake strikes, a falling DVD shelf crushes him—and he wakes up to find something unimaginable right before his eyes… A bizarre and risqué comedy exploring twisted desires and unexpected circumstances!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Orphaned after the his parents were murdered, Uta Rain was ultimately auctioned off as a slave. Certain that he would be treated terribly no matter where he was taken, Uta was in despair. But what awaited him was... a luxurious meal and five pretty sisters. However, they were the daughters of the demon lord who was defeated by the hero 16 years ago?!
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Shota

name: Not found
description:
**One day, I suddenly found myself with a shut-in dragon stepsister**

Gyao, a spoiled dragon who's been pampered by her papa her whole life, and Himari, brimming with curiosity about the ways of other worlds.

Along with their quirky friends, they bring you a slightly naughty, over-the-top yuri gag 4-koma!
Pushing yuri to its very limits—Kirara-style!

(Source: NicoNico Manga, edited)
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: I Want to Be the Director's Husband
description: Kang A-jin, the CEO of Korea's No. 1 security company, and Joo-hyun, a super rookie in the actor community, will start a heartbreaking marriage! There is only one taboo: never fall in love.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Unstoppable Young Lady
description: The classmate she's crushing on is secretly a butler at a butler cafe?! To win him over, Bang Gowoon is serving up desserts at 999% sweetness in her all-out effort to capture his heart. A sweet and fluffy romantic comedy about fresh love and even fresher desserts.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color

name: Beyond 23 Seconds
description: A young protagonist who, feeling disconnected from his surroundings, leaps from a high bridge and experiences a transformative journey into an alternate reality. This act serves as a metaphorical gateway, prompting him to question the nature of his existence and the world around him. Throughout the series, the protagonist confronts various challenges that interplay between reality and illusion, compelling him to make choices that define his identity and destiny. The narrative explores themes of self-discovery, the courage to pursue one's convictions despite societal pressures, and the quest for authenticity in a world rife with facades.
tags: Award Winning, Long Strip, Sports, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: I Made a Harem in the Underworld
description: Zhang Xiao entered a game called “King of Hell”, but after his death, he came back to life in another body. From then on, he counterattacked and reached the peak of his life. Can he overturn the conspiracy of the whole hell on his own and conquer all the girls here!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mii-chan to Yamada-san
description: Shinjuku, 2012. Yamada, who works as a hostess in a night club, meets Mii-chan, a new girl who is no good at anything she does. Mii-chan is energetic and motivated, but she can't read kanji or the atmosphere, so she is ridiculed by those around her and labeled as "pitiful." Nevertheless, Yamada is gradually drawn to Mii-chan as she works diligently.
tags: Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Distinguished Cute Master
description:
Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Soredemo Ashita mo Kareshi ga Ii
description: Kouhei and Mako are a couple deeply in love, but Kouhei worries about Mako’s reluctance to have sex with him. One day, Mako makes an unexpected proposal…
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Not found
description: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she's a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it's not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of Vengeance”.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Nade Nade Skill de Maryoku Chuunyuu!!
description:
Caressing the lewd monster girls’ XXX ♥

The deadpan-faced boy, Fushimi Mahiro. Because of his facial expression, he's feared in his school, without a place to belong. One day, he gets transferred to another world by a squid he picked up! The squid then turns into a beautiful girl, calling him "Demon Lord-sama", and gets attacked by a hero...?! Scouting lewd monster girls & strengthening them to protect the demon castle!!
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Hedgehog and Contrast
description:
Akashi, a virgin college student started a part-time job at Necafe to correct his timid personality. He had a bad impression from his colleagues from the first day. In the meantime, a colleague Kagei, who has the exact opposite personality to Akashi, treats him kindly. The true meaning is mysterious――?

A story about a true and mysterious sunny handsome man x dark virgin who pretends to be cool.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Shop With No Name
description: In a deserted alley travelled by few, is an antique shop. It has no sign, no name. It sells the usual items, but if you believe the rumors, this particular shop also sells undisclosed wish-granting items—for a price, of course. And buyers who fail to follow an item's directions for use will pay an especially high price.
tags: Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
A comedy series based off the real life story of Haru Urara.

Source: AniList
tags: Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life

name: Deretai Kanojo no Uraomote
description: Hyouka Shinonome is Iori Majima's childhood friend. They used to be close, but partway through middle school her attitude changed drastically. The once‑sweet Hyouka became, true to her name, an icy girl who greeted Iori with frosty words whenever they met. Yet when another childhood friend—You Amaya, who boldly pursues Iori—enters the picture, Hyouka's behavior toward Iori also starts to thaw...
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I'm 27 She's 40
description: A story about a 27-year-old salaryman, Nakano Shinpai, who has a 40-year-old girlfriend, Okuda Kanpeki, the CEO of an IT company.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Shota, Web Comic

name: Tyrone handsome
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Self-Published, Police, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Fogland, a mysterious international prison, traps Dante Kang a science teacher sent to reform prisoners during a sudden riot, leaving him with only one way to escape: by becoming a leader.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Meet Lifestyle Man, part-time superhero. Screwing up at work by day, smiting evil, saving lives, and earning gratitude by night, the most beloved hero of all time gets his own slice-of-life comedy series!!
tags: Comedy, Superhero, Slice of Life

name: Iranai Akuyaku Reijou, Waga Kuni de Hikitorimasu wa - Yuushuu na Go-reijoukata wo Tsuihou da Nante Orokana Mane, Kuni wo Horoboshimashite yo?
description: I was reincarnated as the Princess of a small, insignificant country only referred to as the Struntz Kindom. I, Brünhilde Rosenmüller Stuckenschmidt (yes I am aware my name is quite the mouthful), am the future Queen of my country. My Nation is surrounded by four other countries. Even though it's a small country, it's quite okay. All of those foolish surrounding nations have the tendency to banish their people who happen to have extraordinary talents with abilities so amazing that they are almost cheat-level skills.
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Nagisa, a web editor, has a crush on Inukai, her boss. She is often compared to her sister, who is a famous model, and the quiet and kind Inukai is the only one who looks out for her. One day, Nagisa receives a 'Magic Charm of Love' at a drinking party, and she accidentally presses its button on her way back home in a taxi with Inukai. To her surprise, she hears a song that says "You've been called to fall for the person in front of you" and the very next moment, Inukai kisses her. Nagisa, who has been keeping a lid on her feelings, is unable to stop them from overflowing at the slightest opportunity.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama

name: Kasane Teto ♀ ni Natta Otoko ♂ no Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Sekai wa Owattemo Ikirutte Tanoshii
description: Today, there'll be discoveries and encounters again. For the girls marching forward in a world in its afterlife, there are still various things to experience: The remains of an extinct civilization, other living things, as well as lessons taught by the ruins... there is still a lot to be seen in the world. That's why... living is still fun!
tags: Sci-Fi, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Space Juggernaut
description:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Aliens, Tragedy

name: Dreamcore: Still Life
description: After casting a spell to control time, Micchan is teleported to the 4th dimension that exists in every moment at once, getting trapped in illogical landscapes with no apparent way out. Will she be able to escape? Or will she succumb to the mental burntout of loneliness in these bizarre places?
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Psychological, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Super Scary Senpai who's only nice to me...
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Rin-chan wa Suezen Shitai
description: Kobayashi is a thirty-something high school art teacher, and Rin-chan is the beautiful and popular girl at the school. These two people shouldn't have anything to do with each other, but actually they share a common secret.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description:
"I will take in and raise this child."

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it. Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like "Please give me your daughter?" No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

"Ayako-mama... I've always loved you. Please go out with me."
"...You like me (mama), not my daughter!?"
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Renkinjutsushi to Ao no Tomoshibi
description:
A Fantasy Love Story: A beautiful homunculus left behind by a great alchemist master――
Joshua, a young alchemist, travels with a homunculus named Coco. Even though he has no emotions, Coco is the only partner Joshua can trust. Coco pretends to be human to hide his true identity, but for some reason, he hugs Joshua every night with passionate eyes...!?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Meet Tanaka. He’s a 26-year-old freeter, a guy who makes his living on various part-time jobs. He works in warehouses, directs traffic, and generally does whatever work he can find in order to get paid.   
  
However, recently Tanaka has had a problem. He occasionally is transported into another world, usually in front of people who need help. Knowing nothing, can Tanaka add another part-time job to his repertoire?
tags: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A collection of short gags of different series by Ryuugamine Ryuuto.
The first batch parodies:
-Toaru Kagaku no Railgun
-Mankitsu shitai Jouren-san
-Umamusume
-Pokemon
-Precure
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Doujinshi, Supernatural

name: Smiley!
description: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Horror, Mystery

name: Just a Goblin
description: For centuries, adventurers have slaughtered monsters for sport and hunted goblins for their body parts and linens. But why? This is the question, Nog, the goblin inventor, has been trying to answer. After accidentally unlocking an arcane power that allows Nog to "level up" and grow in strength, he finally discovers the confidence to chase the answer to his question. Nog will set on a perilous quest across the world with his best friend, Gubble, to discover why humans hunt goblins! Can monsters and adventurers live in peace?
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sakamoto Days (Official Colored)
description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
tags: Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, a poisoning death for a poisoning death: this is the belief of Sakura Kayoko. If Kayoko, who has such beliefs, confronts bullying as a school teacher... The bullying will get a fair payback♡.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Dao of the Bizarre Immortal
description: High schooler Li Huowang can close his eyes and be transported to an uncanny world. Over there, he is a medicine primer who will be made into pills by his "Master" at any given time. Meanwhile, in the real world, Li Huowang is living in a mental hospital, unfit to continue school. The doctor told him that the uncanny world is just his hallucinations. What is real, and what is fake? Li Huowang really does not know.
tags: Sci-Fi, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Fate/stay night [Unlimited Blade Works]
description:
The Holy Grail War is a battle royale among seven magi who serve as Masters. Masters, through the use of the command seals they are given when they enter the war, command Heroic Spirits known as Servants to fight for them in battle. In the Fifth Holy Grail War, Rin Tosaka is among the magi entering the competition. With her Servant, Archer, she hopes to obtain the ultimate prize—the Holy Grail, a magical artifact capable of granting its wielder any wish.

One of Rin's classmates, Emiya Shirou, accidentally enters the competition and ends up commanding a Servant of his own known as Saber. As they find themselves facing mutual enemies, Rin and Shirou decide to form a temporary alliance as they challenge their opponents in the Holy Grail War.
tags: Historical, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Survival, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Tales of Graces f
description:
Taking place on the planet Efinea, Asbel Lhant seeks the strength to protect those he holds dear. Along with his childhood friends and the mysterious and innocent Sophie, he must explore the bonds of friendship as they find themselves drawn into the conflict between three kingdoms competing for dominance of the planet.  
  
Based on the role-playing game of the same name by Namco Tales Studio.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa, Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de, Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!
description: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sora Tobu Violin
description:
Yoshida Yoshio, a boy who has been playing the violin since he was a child in order to live up to his parents' expectations. He feels burdened by this situation and is unable to fit in at his new school, leading a lonely life. One day, Yoshio spots a girl he has never seen before, Amano Tessera, in his classroom. Suspicious of her existence, Yoshio chases after Tessera, but...

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Not found
description: One day, humanity was faced with a threat it could not resist: dragons. The crown of a pitiful machine. The great divine beasts that descended from heaven. When two sentiments intersect, the world begins to spin violently.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Military, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Sexual Violence, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: An entire local factory has been transported to another world. Veteran engineers working at a local factory will use their technical skills and knowledge to conquer another world?! As the battle between the human army and the Demon King's army intensifies, the first site the engineers arrive at is the extremely shady weapons factory in the Demon King's castle! In order to save the oppressed goblins, Japanese corporate warriors will start a revolution!! The closest thing to a god in this world is... an engineer!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy

name: Asura’s Verdict
description:
"Only do good deeds."

Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. 

Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...
tags: Demons, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu
description:
"It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!"

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A spin-off manga created by Toyotaro, and based on the arcade game Dragon Ball Heroes. It debuted in the November 2012 edition of V-Jump, the release date of which was October 20, 2012.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Supernatural

name: Tomehane!
description:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Project Yuriforming!
description: Yuri addict and alien Lily in search of new stimulus sets her sights on two childhood friends Iori and Runa who can't be honest about their feelings, to create "real yuri" by her own hands!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Not found
description:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Re:Monster
description: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Gobrou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, Gobrou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
First official comic anthology for the much-discussed Adachi to Shimamura!  
  
Iruma Hitoma's popular novel series Adachi to Shimamura now in comic anthology form!
tags: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Koroshiteyaro to Omotta Aitei ga Dekiai shitekite Komarimasu
description: Mira lived comfortably as a princess of the kingdom of Axia. But one day, Mira is attacked by a neighboring prince, Leon, and dies vowing revenge against him. The next time Mira wakes up, time has rolled back two months before the incident ......? A reincarnated love story full of miscalculations, starting with revenge!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hajime no Ippo
description:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.
___
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
tags: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yadonashi Ikemen Hiroimashita
description:
26-year old office worker Ao Ichinose is feeling crushed after her boyfriend who she had been dating for 3 years dumps her for a younger girl at work. Getting drunk in her friend's bar, she makes the impulsive decision to sleep with a younger man she picked up there. It was just supposed to be a one-night-stand, but then she happens to meet him again on a rainy day. What's more, he's begged her "Can't you pick me up ...?"
A fun story of a strong lady and the puppy-dog boy she lives with!
tags: Romance, Office Workers

name: Asayake Refrain
description: Shin is a high school girl whose hobby is quietly uploading her original songs to the internet. When an unexpected character responds to one of her songs, her blinded youth suddenly picks up with a boom!
tags: Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Flame of Recca
description: Becoming a ninja is just a childhood dream for sixteen-year-old Recca, until a fateful encounter reveals he has inherited ninja powers, including the ability to wield fire! As Recca learns to master the ancient ways of his ancestors, he is drawn to protect a mysterious girl named Yanagi…
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Ninja, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: An E-Rank Apothecarist
description: Kal is an E-Rank healer; the lowest rank of adventurers. Even though her comrades call her useless, she continues to diligently make medicine for them, hoping they will accept her as one of them... Until one day, she is kicked out of the group she was traveling with! She wants to go back to her village, but she doesn't have the money. She is left helpless in a village she is completely unfamiliar with. Then, one day, she comes upon an adventurer, Kaido, who is on the brink of death. She heals him and offers him medicine she has created. He is impressed and fascinated with her medical skills! A fantasy about an "incompetent" healer whose talent blossoms as she goes on adventures with a handsome companion!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Superhuman Era
description:
When the xenoterran invasion began, the only ones who stood between us and the monstrous creatures were the superhumans. But while some chose to use this power for good, others had more sinister intentions. Kang Lim is a high school student with a secret -- he’s the vigilante superhero known as the White Cap, fighting back the mysterious monsters whenever he can. But the world he protects isn’t what it seems -- there is more to the emergence of the xenoterran than meets the eye, and strange forces are at play in the shadows...

---

tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Koi wo suru Hi no Lingerie
description: Nazumi is looking for a new job for the first time since her job was closed. When a customer makes fun of her chubby figure at a lingerie store she started working at through a friend, she is taken out by Leo, a junior high school classmate and former delinquent whom she has been wanting to meet for a long time.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: The young man who reincarnated as the boy Leon is bewildered by the inconvenient life... After reincarnation, Leon tries to learn magic in order to lead a more comfortable life. --And he finds that he was a cheat ability user who could use not only 'fire, water, wind, earth, and healing magic' but also physical enhancement!? Utilizing knowledge from the modern world, he aims for a prosperous life in this slow-life.
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Love Revolution
description: Romance, such thing cannot exist between us!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yoru no Kurage wa Oyogenai
description: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.
tags: Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Peerless Dad
description:
Noh Gajang is a strong, dedicated, and humble man, with much respect for the martial arts. But after the death of his lovely wife, this muscle-for-hire just wants an easy job that allows him to be a good father to his three little babies. He’s even happy to pull guard duty and fend off amateur fighters if it means he can return home safely each night. 

But when a creepy cult starts stealing children from the city, Gajang must step up to the challenge and discover his true warrior potential.

---
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 1](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52226628)
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 2](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59925132)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47154)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/132)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: My Succubus Girlfriend
description:
Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yama, Kaimashita ~Isekai Gurashi mo Warukunai~
description:
When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world! And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)
tags: Animals, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Cute Baby Arrives: Mommy is Super Fierce
description: When the not-so-famous actress Jane wakes up in the morning, her cute-but-nagging son Ian already had her day plan out for her – go on a blind date and find a father for the household. However, her date turns out to be Mark Quinn, the biological father of her son. The sullen business man obviously doesn't have the best impression of Jane and would not have expected that they will enter marriage soon with the help of Mark's father and Ian...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Death Penalty
description:
In the present day, tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.

Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day, making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune, and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers, but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment, leaving him completely late to the game.

Aiming for a quick turnaround, Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower, and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.

When reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.

The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.

In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum — the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Action, Comedy, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: I Woke Up as an Imprisoned Villainess
description: "That's not me!" Sophia Alcott wakes up and is mysteriously in the body of the beautiful yet villainous Violet Elford imprisoned in a tower. Used to her shabby life of neglect as a humble apothecary, imprisonment almost seems like heaven with food she's never eaten before! While Sophia enjoys her new life of luxury, Violet awakes in a room not even fit for a dog. What is she up to? As she moves forward with her own agenda, she makes drastic changes to Sophia's life. How will these two polar opposites alter the course of their lives?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
description: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet", he might just be able to do it.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Kurumizawa's Folly
description: The year is 1971 and the once popular manga artist Kurumizawa is in a major slump. The pressure builds as each new submission is rejected. But one day, he meets a young, promising artist named Hata. When he sees Hata's wonderful work, Kurumizawa hatches a dark plan...
tags: Historical, Psychological, Drama

name: Night Light Hounds
description: Jimmy is a gang member in one of the world's few underground cities, Silent Bay City. One day, he meets a girl and gets embroiled in a fight between the creatures of the night.
tags: Monsters, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires

name: Physics Of The Wasteland
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, some humans gained special powers. Ayato, once a low-ranking nobody, survives an assassination attempt and rises amid chaos.

He teams up with a healer girl and fights off mutated beasts called Chimera.
However, powered humans can no longer reproduce. To save humanity, Ayato and his allies battle the odds—and finally create a cure to restore hope for the future.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy

name: The Long Way of the Warrior
description: In the second half of the 2nd century, Naru, a warrior from the state of Koryo, was sold as a gladiator-slave to the Roman Empire and waged a desperate struggle for freedom.
tags: Traditional Games, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Lucia Agnes has confessed to her longtime crush 98 times over the past 13 years.

And Herwin Peneus has always turned her down.

After her 99th confession is also rejected, Lucia finally decides to give up on Herwin and agrees to meet a suitor chosen by her parents.

But just as she makes up her mind to get engaged to this new match, things start to take an unexpected turn...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Love Interest Zone
description: Myungha Tae is going to die in 300 days. Well… maybe. After getting sucked into his friend’s novel, "Love Interest Zone," 29-year-old Myungha becomes a 19-year-old high schooler again with one mission—make Yeowoon Cha happy or die. With only 300 days to succeed, Myungha must break past Yeowoon’s barriers and prevent him from experiencing the same tragic fate as he did in the novel. But with Yeowoon’s favorability toward him in the negatives, will he be able to survive?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Stellar Swordmaster
description:
The so-called “Lighthouse of the North,” the prosperous trading town of Schoarra, hides a dark underbelly: seedy slums ruled by five ruthless crime bosses.

When streetwise orphan Vlad finds the brothel he works for decimated by a disgraced knight, he turns to the path of the blade, pledging himself to the pursuit of power by sword. 

Blessed with the ability to seek wisdom from his sentient sword, Vlad embarks upon a journey of growth and peril as swordsman in service to the powerful House Vayezid.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou
description:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Gyaru

name: Yume de Furarete Hajimaru Yuri
description:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yasashisa Ippai no Tsuchi no Ue de
description: Nana was raised by robots, and is now a research student living with Hachitsu, a gifted scientist also raised by robots. One day, Hachitsu collapses from a disease. In order to gain the time to develop a cure to save him, Nana proposes they place him in cold sleep. Hachitsu goes to sleep, leaving behind the clones that he created to help Nana. When he wakes up decades later, Hachitsu finds Nana grown into an old lady and yet more clones. Hachitsu is saved by a surgery, but the elderly Nana seems to be nearing the end of her days. While Hachitsu slept, a war had broken out and devastated the world, and robots and AI who had been turned into weapons had started hating humanity. Nana devoted the rest of her life to creating robots to clean up the earth. She had a dream that humans and AI would be able to reconcile. As she lay on her sickbed, Hachitsu and the clones vowed to carry on her dying wish...
tags: Sci-Fi, Drama

name: Not found
description:
**You better prepare yourself, damn world.**

Everything in this world is absurd. The heroes who pretend to fight with grace, the minor villains who can only commit petty crimes, his classmates who always hang out in groups… and his own weak and miserable self.

And so the boy yearns to change everything, not only himself but also the world—for he will become the lonely, the aloof, the ultimate Great Villain!

A new villain story drawn by Fujichika Koume, author of *The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses*!
tags: Thriller, Action, Superhero

name: The Doctor Is Out
description:
Rita Estelle knows that Duke Erwan Cereus will fall ill and die, leading to a bloody rebellion. She knows this because she would've died in that rebellion had it not been for a kindly sorceress who sent her back in time. With her second chance at life, Rita seeks to use her medical genius to get close to Duke Erwan as a child and cure him. But the closer she grows to him, the more she suspects his sickness is caused by foul play. Can Rita save Erwan and the whole country before it's too late?
___
When the duke, who was in poor condition, suddenly died, the land fell into the hands of the rebels. In a short time, the rebellion was suppressed by the royal family, but… The point is that I, Lise Estelle, will be hanged for treason. “It’s not fair!” I’m simply the best doctor in the area. If that’s the case, I’ll become the duke’s doctor this time so there’s no rebellion, and I’ll make the duke’s heir healthy! “No one cares about you as much as I do. Therefore, you must definitely listen to me!"
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hare to Mononoke
description: "You're impure." Toki, a man who claims to be an immortal mononoke, and Yashio, a high school student who is suddenly told that he is impure. In the name of purification, a strange living arrangement between the two begins. Although Toki is nothing but teasing words and actions, Yashio can taste the loneliness he occasionally exhibits. As they spend time together, Yashio feels more and more drawn to him. However, knowing that Toki already has a loved one—
tags: Boys' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Boukansha no Koi
description:
"I want to be by my sister's side until the last moment..."

In the fall of her twenties, Rachel married her childhood friend Noah, who had been her longtime crush.
She knows that the person Noah really loves is Alicia, his older sister and Rachel's best friend...
Noah and Rachel live a married life full of deceit while Alicia has only a short time left to live.
Rachel feels as much guilt and heartache as she does happiness, but who is the real 'bystander' in this love?

The long-awaited first volume of the comic adaptation of the pinnacle of "a fake marriage of unrequited love" that wrenches the heart with hidden love, irreplaceable friendship, and the sadness of passing each other!
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Tragedy

name: Magi Craft Meister
description: There is only one Magi Craft Meister in the world. After the death of the last Meister over one thousand years ago, Jin Nidou was transported to another world in order to succeed her will. After obtaining the knowledge of the Magi Craft Meister, Jin attempts to use a warp gate but it malfunctions, transporting him to an unknown world. Along with that, an automata he recently restored also uses the warp gate in order to search for her "father".
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Prince's First Love
description: The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first, the two cannot stand one another, as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances, rescues, and secret rendezvous, Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen, and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne, he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty, can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Apocalyptic Thief
description: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Gekai Kiara wa Shibou Furagu wo Yurusanai
description: Akira Kirihara, a genius surgeon, is suddenly reborn as Kiara Bellworth, the protagonist of "Cinderella's Engagement." In Kiara's world, injuries were cured by magic power, but those who could not be cured by magic power were abandoned. After providing first aid to Prince Cecil's follower, Chiara is favored by the prince, who wants to revamp the country's medical system, and he proposes to her. With the prince's backing, she performs surgical procedures on patients who cannot be cured by magic. At first, the prince and Kiara are like partners, but they gradually become attracted to each other.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I'm in Love with the Villainess
description:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Game Center no Kokoro
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Sports, School Life

name: Hazure Waku no [Joutai Ijou Skill] de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete o Juurin Suru made
description:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori's skills are abysmal at best, and he's banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he's become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
___
**Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f)
**Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita
description: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Klyrode as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenrys of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Flio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: In early summer, 2nd year of high school, Koguma's mom suddenly abandons her, leaving only a note that says "Bye." She is alone, having no parents, no friends, no hobbies. She silently reflects, "I don't have anything." But a chance encounter results in her buying a Honda Super Cub with a disturbing history, and a new life suddenly blossoms open.
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
