name: Heaven Burns Red Official 4-Koma
description: A humorous 4-koma series about the daily activities of the Seraph Squadron that helps us to know a bit more about their personalities and outlook on life.
tags: Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Ryuu to Ryuu no Kekkon
description:
After a long war, Lycoris, a princess of the Wyvern Kingdom, and Leihua, a princess of the Dragon Kingdom, are to be married as a sign of peace. Former enemies, the two begin a new life together…

Lycoris has complicated feelings about the political marriage, but she can't help becoming attracted to Leihua, who seems so lonely, despite her outward indifference.

Two girls who do not know how to love, bond with each other as they heal each other's broken hearts.

(Source: Shiori-on, translated)
tags: Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Denji and Reze's Reunion
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Office Workers, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard SkyRide
description:
A single encounter with a card will take you to the skies!
The Card Game that Soars through the Skies, this is Vanguard's New series, 'SkyRide'!
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Sports, Adventure

name: The Life of a Fox
description:
Trash Town is the most anarchic and dangerous district of the City, a giant metropolis that covers the entire planet. Tanya leads an unremarkable life as a cleaning lady, constantly facing deadly dangers.
But if her life is already hanging by a thread, why not try to become a badass mercenary?
She decides to break into the big leagues - or die trying.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Crime, Self-Published, Military, Gore, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Ryota Shinonome, who is struggling to become a professional manga artist, is fed up with the advice of those around him that his resolution of romantic comedy is low because he has no experience in love. On the other hand, Akemi Oda, a doujinshi artist who also works as an office worker, is troubled only by the pressure from her family to get married. These two met through a marriage proposal, and because of their mutual interests, they decided to join the family after zero days of dating.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kao ni Denai Kashiwada-san to Kao ni Deru Oota-kun
description:
Meet Kashiwada-san, a female middle-school student, who remains emotionless regardless of how she is meddled with.  
And Oota-kun, unable to control his facial expressions, is the complete opposite of Kashiwada-san–but he keeps messing with her, against his better judgment?!  
Though the two of them are the exact opposite, will a mutual love eventually develop between them…?  
 

---

**Links:**  
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/zktldhkek)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Major
description:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: One day, Hajime Tamachi, an apathetic man, receives an unexpected message from Renafalt, a friend he met five years ago in an online game, whose face he has never seen: "Senpai, how about hiring a home security guard?" Convinced that Renafalt is 200% a man, Tama arrives at the meeting spot and sees someone with a red suitcase, just as they had arranged. However, that person turns out to be a beautiful girl with large breasts. "Ah... A-Are you... Senpai?"
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Tensei Arasaa Joshi no Kotoyo Kaikatsu - Seiryaku Kekkon wa Iya na no de, Zatsugaku Chishiki de Tanoshii Kaikaku Life wo Kekkou Shichaimasu!
description: Not found
tags: Reincarnation, Survival, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Golden Kamuy (Official Colored)
description: A tale of high adventure and survival on the Japanese frontier!   In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi Sugimoto searches the wilderness of the Japanese frontier of Hokkaido for a hoard of hidden gold. With only a cryptic map and a native Ainu girl to help him, Saichi must also deal with every murderous cutthroat, bandit and rogue who knows about the treasure!
tags: Official Colored, Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Cooking, Mystery

name: Puniru Is a Cute Slime
description:
The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!

Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: The young man's new apartment is haunted, but as it turns out, even the dead have their own personal shortcomings... issues of the flesh included. For the dead have lingering desires, and are more susceptible to the world of the living than what one may think. There's anger, there's hate, there's curiosity… and there's love too. Here he finds a ghastly girl who observes him quietly, certainly desiring *something*... (No wonder the rent is cheap!)
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: A salaryman, Ryuji Ando, is enjoying his corporate life by working from home. However, he has a problem: Ayano, the college girl next door, is always trying to tempt him into slacking off!She is languid and always in a downer mood, and whenever she comes over to Ando's place, she always tries to corrupt him by using various means (wink-wink)...!!!! Can Ando withstand the temptations of Ayano-san?
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Gwak Hajun Gwanchalilji
description:
Cha In-woo, a shy student with zero presence, becomes partners with Kwak Ha-jun, who looks exactly like his favorite game character. While Cha In-woo is excited to bond with him while working on homework assigned by his teacher, Cha In-woo suddenly finds himself drawn into a cruel bet by Kwak Ha-jun...

A heartwarming romantic comedy between two high school students!
tags: Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Delinquent and the Transfer Student
description:
The strongest sukeban × air-headed transfer student!
A beautiful girls' comedy with too much happiness!

Riri Kanzaki, a transfer student, is looking forward to hanging out with Atsuko Nagumo, a sukeban, every time they play their silly word game.

As Atsuko sees Kanzaki's happiness, she begins to think that it's not so bad...

---
**[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/suketen_pr)**
Licensed in Spanish by Arechi Manga.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology (Fan Colored)
description:
Now, to the story of finding your true feelings...

The popular game "Project Sekai Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku"'s first comic anthology!

The world of 'Proseka' is expanding with this all-new comic book.

Each unit's daily life is presented in a large volume!
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Kitagawa is a funeral home employee with zero tolerance for irregularities. One day, while she's transporting a body, it suddenly strikes up a conversation—a talking corpse! Thus begins its final escapade—a wild car chase!
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: "Sana" is a short story - now fully adapted into a manga - from the viewpoint of Sana Kuramoto, a main character from the online novel "Packages from an Unknown Sender" featured on the website "Omocoro." It reveals her daily life spent with her husband, up until "that moment"...
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation, Music, Tragedy

name: Sousei no Onmyouji
description:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: Inside the Tentacle Cave
description: Deep in the tunnels of an abandoned mine lurks a demon that absorbs the power of anything it touches: the Black Ooze. When it consumes its first human male, it acquires both intelligence and ravenous sexual desire, much to the distress of a sorceress who mistakenly enters its domain. The heroes who seek glory and riches in these caverns are about to learn why monsters should be feared!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dancing With Uninvited Guests
description:
In the new semester of her second year of high school, Ji Haero finds herself in the same class as her ex-boyfriend, whom she dated in secret and subsequently broke up with.

But uh-oh!
"I wanted to die when I saw that my ex-boyfriend was in the same class as me, but this jerk had someone he liked in our class!"

What's more surprising is that someone turns out to be Choi Jinyoung!
Ji Haero and Choi Jinyoung share a secret that must remain concealed.
Will Haero safely navigate through this phase of puberty, surrounded by these uninvited guests?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yuutousei wa Unmei no Akai Ito ni Sakaraitai
description:
There's a red thread tied to my finger, and at the other end is... the yankee who sits next to me?

One day, straight-laced honor student Miyanari suddenly sees a red thread connecting him to his yankee classmate Hashiba. "There's no way this sort of person can be my destined partner!" is what Miyanari tells himself. However, perhaps through a trick of the red thread, Miyanari ends up in all kinds of situations with Hashiba, such as getting injured and being tended to, and getting trapped in an elevator together. As Miyanari continues to spend time with Hashiba, he realizes that Hashiba is nothing like his outwards appearance, and gradually comes to learn his kindness...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
A world that’s stained black.
Because of the Black Witch, humanity was forced into massive cities where all remaining light and color gathered.

Kay is a boy who wants to become a member of a Pioneer Corps that continues the effort to reclaim the world, yet he is rejected because he is one of the ‘Colorless,’ and cannot possess any color.

One day, however, an unexpected incident causes Kay to gain the color Black...
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Soul Catcher(S)
description: Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts, though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better, and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine, who knows nothing about music, will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!
tags: Action, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Music

name: Neko ni Naritai Tamagawa-kun
description: For Tamagawa, volunteering at a cat café is the only relief from his stressful job. The manager tells him to, "relax and learn to be spoiled", but he doesn't know what that means until a new customer, Shindo Rai, comes to the café and tells Tamagawa he wants to keep him as a cat! Enter their strange, but fateful relationship. A pure-hearted and soothing romantic comedy.
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Apocalypse Zero
description: A series of natural disasters has reduced the world to rubble, with the survivors doing whatever they must to survive in a world gone mad. But one young boy, Kakugo, gifted with amazing martial arts and a superpowerful suit of armor by his late father, has been charged with making the world (or at least his school) a safer place. But his brother has a matching set of skills and equipment, and he's on a mission to bring peace to the world… by wiping out humanity!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Incest, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Ore no Kingdom
description: A boy awakens "the Voice of the Conqueror," a holy power that allows absolute control over all females.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Fire Emblem - Engage
description: Alear, a divine dragon in human form, wakes up from a long sleep with no memory. People say that Alear is a hero who fought against an evil dragon that threatened the world 1000 years ago, but... He is confused by the people's reverence and expectations, and the shadows of battle and deception once again loom over him.
tags: Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kuchibeta Shokudou
description:
For five years, she's been eating at the set-meal restaurant but didn't feel comfortable saying anything more, and the waitress at the restaurant who wanted to talk to that regular customer but couldn't get the words out. Their feelings are leaking out, but they just couldn't express their love for each other in many ways.
___
- **Note:**
*Kuchibeta Shokudou*, originally released under the title *Otagai Iitai Koto ga Ienai Tenin Okyakusan no Manga* (お互い言いたいことが言えない店員とお客さんの漫画), is a web manga released on the [author's Twitter account](https://twitter.com/i/events/1378283683996528643) since February 15, 2019, and it was picked up for commercial publication on December 10, 2021.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Special Civil Servant
description: Socially-awkward Maru Han bombs his fifth attempt at getting a dream job in the civil service. But after a strange creature attacks him in the mountains, he finds himself recruited into the Special Civil Service for the Ministry of Environment. This secret organization is dedicated to fighting nachal, human-devouring demons who appear in clouds of yellow dust. As Maru struggles in his new job fighting nachal, he must find out why they're mysteriously drawn to him before the prophesied end of the world arrives.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Obake no Q-Taro
description:
Little Ghost Q-Taro, by Fujiko Fujio, is a Japanese manga about a ghost, Q-Taro who lives with the Ohara family. Q-Taro, also known as Q-chan or Oba-Q, is a mischief-maker who likes to fly around scaring people and stealing food, though he is deathly afraid of dogs.  
  
The story is usually focused on the antics of Q-Taro and his friends. The manga was drawn in 1964–1966 by Fujiko Fujio (Fujiko F. Fujio and Fujiko Fujio A) and in 1971–1974 by only Fujiko F. Fujio. An English manga volume was published in Japan as Q the Spook.
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Hanayome-kun wa Tensei Zen'ya
description: Not found
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: The Spark in Your Eyes
description:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Childhood friends who've been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but they're too close to be honest. What connects them is the I Love You Game that they've been playing since they were little. The conclusion of their love is entrusted to this silly game, where you win if you make the other person embarrassed!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Elf ga Gendai ni Itara
description:
An anthology about Elves living in modern society.

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55153) (Compiled with [If Elves Existed in the Present Day ~Part Timer~ (Pre-Serialization)](https://mangadex.org/title/e42799d9-4829-4b4c-b898-96f3b0b45566/if-elves-existed-in-the-present-day-part-timer)), [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/libre1907/status/1366501046890024962) (Chapter 1)
- Defunct Twitter/X Chapter Index - [Twitter Moment](https://twitter.com/i/events/1430365122187304960)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chinyuuki
description: Genjou is a monk on his way to Tenjiku (early East Asian name for India). Along the way, he happens to visit a house and meets an old couple. The couple has an adopted son, Taro Yamada, and they ask Genjou to rehabilitate Taro who makes trouble with his magical powers. Genjou takes Taro and travels with him to Tenjiku.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Aliens

name: Not found
description:
Miyako is stressed out at work. Seeking solace, she tries to get a cat, but is unable to do so. She returns home dejected… only to find a child with cat ears and a hoodie lying on the floor…! When she rushes to take care of him, she finds out that he is a very beautiful boy!

The cute and dangerous life together of a beautiful boy and an office worker begins!
tags: Comedy, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Now I'm a Pet Slime!?
description:
A slime girl gets sealed away into the body of a human. . . 

. . . and these humans don't listen! I'm not one of you!

Will she be stuck in this nightmare, or will she be free once again?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dignity Proof
description: Not found
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: KimiKiss: Various Heroines
description:
Kouichi and Mao are childhood friends, but as they enter High School, they become more and more distant. And as Mao becomes more popular and beautiful, Kouichi wishes he could be popular too, and eventually get a girlfriend. Mao decides to help him…  
  
Based on a bishoujo game.  
  
As per the title, "various heroines", each volume of this manga focuses on a different girl Kouichi can eventually end up with.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: The story is about Jisuwon, a typical high school freshman with a talent for drawing. He falls for a girl who is already taken, but then meets Seolhyorim, the most beautiful girl in school, and falls for her instantly. He draws pictures of her secretly, but they are discovered by Yang Jinsu and revealed to Seolhyorim. Can Suwon's second first love be maintained?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Don't Think That I'll Be Cute Forever! ~If You Make A Wish From The Sacred Stone, You'll Become The World's Strongest Beautiful Girl~
description:
I intended to become the world's strongest "man", but I ended up becoming the world's strongest "woman"...?!
The adventurer, Lydel, wanted the sacred stone, "Baetyl's Eye", to make him the strongest "man" in the world. 
The result? Lydel became strongest, but turned into a girl at the same time. 
In order for her to return to being a male, Lydel embarks on an adventure to find a new sacred stone, but...?
tags: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Fantasy

name: Hen-Zemi
description: Matsutaka Nanako is a normal university student, who happened to enroll in Abnormal Physiology Seminar. She tries to keep her mental state sound, but other abnormal classmates start to influence her personality…
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Dance in the Vampire Bund A.S.O.
description: Third part of the story of Dance in the Vampire Bund, and direct continuation of Dance in the Vampire Bund - Scarlet Order. We return to the story of Mina Tepes, the princess of the vampires, and Akira Kaburagi Regendorf, her faithful guardian, in her search for the coexistence between vampires and humans.
tags: Action, Romance, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Kaoru Shinonome, who had been living as a freelancer, invests her inheritance in property and buys a vast old condominium. Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants, only spirits, and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents! (Titan Manga)
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/wakearimanshon)
tags: Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Renge to Naruto!
description: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Gyaru

name: Momose Akira no Hatsukoi Hatan-chuu.
description: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Boruto - Two Blue Vortex
description:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)
___
**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
tags: Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Aliens

name: Hitomi-chan wa Hitomishiri
description: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why...?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A story of awkward first love between two honor students. They're hesitant yet bold when it's just the two of them in the classroom after school.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi
description:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.

tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Nightmare Funk
description:
Kurusu Hiyori is a young policewoman and the daughter of a former police chief. She has the unusual curse of having predictive dreams of a person's murder the following day. Tragically, the first of these dreams she experienced showed her the death of her own father. Over time, the dreams have led to her social isolation, a kind of grim-reaper reputation, and a lot of problems at work– the police are not fond of her habit of rushing off to investigate future crimes she saw in her dreams. Even worse, the dreams that have left her as an adult bedwetter have not enabled her to save a single person.  
  
That all changes, on the day after she dreams of the assassination of Claus Haida, a creepy foreigner. She is overjoyed to have rescued him, but it turns out that he is something of a monster himself. He works for a foreign company, and has decided that it is in both of their interests for the two of them to team up. He is undeniably useful, but can Hiyori really join forces with such a person?
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Shinju no Nectar
description: Sakura, the last surviving princess of a fallen kingdom, is being hunted down for the power of Ambrosia she possesses - the ability to grant divine strength, but only to a human. With no human companion, she decides to summon one from another world in a desperate attempt to find a knight to protect her, but the man who answers her call is less than what she had hoped for.
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description:
Two women, hidden away in a vast estate, who save each other through their roller coaster of a relationship!
Bai Yuetao, wife of a rich businessman, blames herself for her husband's skirt-chasing tendencies. After spending another night alone in their lavish residence, she sees a graceful woman appear in her newly bought western mirror. This woman calls herself "Butterfly Dream" and says that she can teach Bai Yuetao how to "hook" her husband's heart. But the price she demands?
Bai Yuetao's body.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Maison and the Man-Eating Apartment
description: The clock strikes at the single second before the end of the world. Yet humanity has escaped extinction and carry on with their daily lives in the strange and terrible apartment where time stands still. A young girl Maison, Landlord by birth, is on the brink of revealing its secrets...
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: The Plain Salary Man Turned Out to Be a Hero: He Was Invincible, Only to Be Exposed on His Niece's Dungeon Stream
description: Keita Sato (41, single) is overworked at his corporate job, dealing with tedious and stressful tasks day in and out. How does he relieve his stress? By sneaking into modern-day "dungeons," using them as a batting cage, and blasting away ferocious monsters! One day, his live-in niece Hikari secretly follows him and livestreams his adventures, only for his unbelievable strength to go crazy viral!! Keita unknowingly captures the attention of not only viewers, but other big-name streamers.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Office Workers, Adaptation

name: Lunatic Terrapop
description: Seventeen year old Satsuki Moriyama is enjoying her life to the fullest with the boyfriend of her dreams! After 3 months of dating, they finally hold hands and Satsuki is over the moon! Sasaki-kun is the coolest and her reason for living, yet...
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Aliens

name: Gunze Arabaki's Magnificently Maniacal Menagerie!
description: Sixteen-year-old Inari Anamori has always had a soft spot for animals. But on his first day at his new school, things take a wild turn—he's suddenly attacked by a bizarre creature he encountered in the forest! Just when things look grim, he’s rescued by Gunze Arabaki, a mysterious loner with a deep disdain for people. Their fateful encounter throws Inari headfirst into a chaotic school life filled with strange creatures, wild antics, and nonstop surprises.
tags: Comedy

name: Not found
description: A series of strange events begins to unfold around the main character, Tsumugi. Each odd occurrence gradually leads toward a major incident.
tags: Horror, Mystery

name: Tensei Shitara Ore ga Heroine de Aitsu ga Yuusha Datta
description: Keito Azumi, an ordinary high school boy, was reincarnated as the heroine in a different world when he woke up in an accident! The worst thing about this is that his best friend became the hero!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: ZINGNIZE
description:
The story of the "Three Jinnai from Edo" (Kosaka, Tobisawa, Shoji)  
Eight year of the Keicho era, 3 years after the Battle of Sekigahara (1603 AD) Okubo Nagayasu calls on Kosaka Jinnai, who is known as the best thief in Japan, to eliminate the bandit gang led by Fuma Kotaro.  
A fierce battle between the Jinnais and the Fuma clan opens its curtain !!
tags: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: High School Boy
description:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bug Ego
description:
Two high school students are using bugs in our reality to exploit them for their advantage. But then a ridiculous exploit leads to severe consequences for one of them…
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/bug-ego)
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Wind Breaker
description: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy

name: Bocchi no Boku ni Kyousei Kanojo ga Yattekita
description: On my 24th birthday, I came home to find a woman who wanted to be my girlfriend! As a "loner" since junior high school, I was confused by all this. But the truth is she is my mother's junior at work, and my mother asked her to!? A pseudo-romance between two people with the same interests has begun!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Sentai Red: Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru
description: In the final battle against the evil Exterminators, Asagaki Tougo, a power ranger, traded his life for the enemy's. It seemed like everything was over, but suddenly he found himself in another world! He becomes an adventurer, transforming into Kizuna Red, and continues fighting to save people in trouble!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Superhero, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
[The strongest witch who was turned into a villain is now back as a child to start over!] 
 
Riesz, a peerless archmage, lost her life as a human sacrifice to seal a magical disaster known as the "Magic Abyss".  

A hundred years later, she manages to return to life, only to find that the Magic Abyss' influence has transformed her back into a young girl.  

From a kind-hearted adventurer named El, saved by Riesz, she learns that due to the Church's schemes 100 years ago, she has been falsely branded as the arch-criminal "Witch of Disaster". Though outraged by this revelation, Riesz decides to enjoy her second chance at life.  

A refreshing fantasy where the strongest mage reigns supreme!
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Convict Colosseum
description:
32 convicts. 1 tournament.

Who are they? And why do they fight? Where is this "colosseum" held and for who's entertainment?

And most importantly... Who will win it all?
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Web Comic, Mystery

name: Monkey Peak the Rock
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas Gaiden
description: A series of side stories focusing on each of the Gold Saints from [Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas](https://mangadex.org/title/3312/saint-seiya-the-lost-canvas), exploring events that occurred in their lives mostly before those of Saint Seiya - The Lost Canvas.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Takato Washimi, a third-year employee at a toy company, is troubled and worn down after struggling to get his project approved. One day, he encounters a bunny girl in the city, and his life changes completely. His work fatigue, worries, and mistakes—everything is soothed and purified by a sexy bunny girl! An invitation to a night time dreamland! Welcome to the bunny girl bar, Jackpot!
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
In one of the worlds that exist within virtual reality, Kagami held the title of one of the Nine Sages, a position that placed him at the pinnacle of magicians. One day, he fell asleep in-game after pulling an all-nighter. When he opened his eyes, what he found was a world that was different to the one before... More important than anything else, was that the grizzled and dignified veteran's body that he was used to, had now turned into an innocent little girl's. If his true identity was leaked, honestly speaking it was a situation where it was very possible that the solemn image he had built up until now would be destroyed. And to deal with this problem, the excuse that he came up with was...
___
**Note:** MangaDex decided to follow the magazine numbering for Chapter 1-56 and includes Chapter 53-56 in volume 9:
