name: Marionetta
description: A mysterious circus. A missing friend. A dangerous deal. Julia Lazarrett is happy with her honest, predictable life. But when her best friend Kamille convinces her to visit a travelling circus, they both get more than for which they bargained. Thrust into a world full of secrets, magic, and death, Julia finds herself presented with the most horrific of deals in order to survive.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Our protagonist, Soraike Mei, confessed her unrequited love to her friend at the high school graduation ceremony... That was the plan, at least. Her confession was a failure. Because of that, she is keen to "Definitely get a girlfriend during college!" But for some reason, one woman after another keeps on approaching her?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
"It's impossible for two girls to date, after all."  

One day, Marika Sakakibara, a popular high school girl, is suddenly shown a million yen by the cool, beautiful, Aya Fuwa.

"I'll buy you. Ten thousand yen a day for one hundred days. Why don't you try it? See just how 'impossible' it is between two girls."
"…Huh? Huuhhhh?"

So begins their daily afterschool [REDACTED] time.

From gently stroking breasts and holding hands, every day, Fuwa's actions begin to escalate!!

And, after one hundred days, will Marika really still be able to proclaim that "It's impossible!"? (She will not.)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: Haru no Hikari ni Nomarete mo
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Soshiki no Shukuteki to Kekkon Shitara Mecha Amai
description:
"...I hate you!"
"What a coincidence. So do I."

The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but...

"I love you, Rou-kun."
"Me too, Ritsuka."

After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work. But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kao dake yoi Classmate ga, Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri no Hanashi.
description: Ritsu Kaidou, a member of the top social caste at school, had a boyfriend—not out of love, but because it was what everyone expected. As their one-year anniversary approached, the moment finally came for their first kiss... But just then, Tsuzuru Yarai, a quiet classmate, happened to witness it all—!?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: Mayaka-neesan wa Uso ga Tsukenai
description: Junya is a third-year junior high school student. He's good at sports, but when it comes to studying... well, let's just say he's really bad at it. Lately, he's been troubled by something. His childhood friend, Mayaka-nee, has been messing with him in all sorts of ways! Could it be that she actually likes him...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
**A chaotic and ecchi romantic comedy about a goddess out to curse a family and the unfortunate guy who falls for her!**

Kuro, a black cat, is a god of fortune down on her luck. She’s turned into a “vengeful god” against her will, and the only way to return to her former status is to curse seven generations of the Nishikori bloodline. She’s close to being free, but to get there, she needs to make sure the seventh generation actually gets born. That means finding a match for Nishikori Kotaro…which is harder than you might think, because Kotaro is tragically unpopular. Not only that, he insists that the only woman he wants…is cat-eared Kuro herself!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Cat System: The Emperor Is a Cat Lover
description:
The cat lover teenager Meng Changji travels through truck-kun and is bound by a cat system in a parallel world!   
  
What is the cat system? I have a big giant kitty as a system! The cat system uses the road not taken! It is the practice that does not take the usual path! When you are kidnapped, other people are looking for opportunities to escape, but this young master walks away while he slaps you right up in the face! Haha!   
  
When this Emperor meets a pretty girl for a competition invitation, others used male chauvinistic ways and strength to conquer her, and this young master… This young master acts like a cat really oh… I'm so weak… Of course, it's important to hold her thighs if she's stronger!   
  
Strong waifu is the best waifu! Don't you know this?! This Emperor does not practice according to the routine, harvests the cultivation value like a miser.   
  
By the way… did this Emperor mention I might be the future god of cats too? Eh… just a hunch. Ahh… cats are so cute. I just want to pet them all day! Ahh!!!   
  
My system is a CAT!!! This is life! Thank you, Cat God!  
  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Space Sheriff Gavan
description: An another story to the 1982 tokusatsu. Retsu Ichijoji, aka Space Sheriff Gavan, returns to Earth in 2004, a chaotic time where everyone has lost sight of justice. Gavan still holds onto his own justice however, and meets a police officer struggling to hold onto his.
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Action, Superhero, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Waiting for the Sunlight
description: Summer of 1940 in Shigaraki, Shiga Prefecture. Yoko Matsubara is a young girl with a talent for pottery. She dreams of becoming a ceramic artist, unaware of the horrors yet to come… In commemoration of the 80th anniversary of World War II, Shonen Jump+ presents an untold account of life during the war.
tags: Historical, Drama

name: Blooming Love
description: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Enishi-kun wa Masho (Harem) Taishitsu ni Mezamemashita
description: Enishi Kazumichi is a teenager who still acts like a child of death, because of that attitude he is often considered like a child even by his own childhood friends. When his feelings for the girl he likes are destroyed by his childhood friend, Kazumichi decides to be alone and starts eating his lunch in a quiet place at his school. But someone suddenly appeared out of nowhere and asked Kazumichi for help. Then, from that moment on, Kazumichi's life changed, filled with complicated harem problems. Will he be able to overcome the problem? and what kind of harem troubles will he face?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Kindergarten WARS
description:
Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!

Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?!
___
* Alt. Official English: [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/kindergarten-wars)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural

name: Ruri Dragon
description:
Ruri faces the usual high school issues: pushy classmates, annoying teachers, and... waking up with dragon horns?! Just after starting high school, Ruri gets hit with the biggest reveal of her life—she's a dragon! Well, a half dragon. Her mom admits Ruri inherited her draconic traits from her father, who, yes, is actually a dragon. As if dealing with curious classmates wasn't already challenging enough, Ruri and her dragon genes literally turn up the heat in the middle of a lecture. Her life is about to be anything but ordinary!

(Source: Viz Media, edited)
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
For some strange reason, Itadori Yuuji, despite his insane athleticism, would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, he soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Fushiguro Megumi is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori…
___
**Alt Official English:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/jujutsu-kaisen)
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Mashiro Naomoto wants to have a taste of romance and even get to try lewd things, now that she has become a high school student.

However, she has low self-esteem and as a result of lacking confidence in herself, she began to think that it's probably impossible for her. Right at that moment, to her surprise a handsome male classmate named Oosagi-kun confesses to her. Mashiro starts to suspect that his confession must be some sort of punishment game, but her own desire to do lewd stuff wins over it and as a result, she does the opposite and makes a move on him... it's a case of sexual desire winning over suspicion?!

(Source: Comic-Meteor)
___
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomattaaaaan/status/1851462156996551019) (Preview) *Posted with the caption: Doushitemo Sukebe Shitai JK no Manga Kakimashita (どうしてもスケベしたいJKの漫画描きました) "I drew a manga about a high school girl who wants to do perverted stuff no matter what"*
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Hanayome wa Motodanshi.
description: Chii and her husband are like any other happily married couple, except for one thing: Chii was assigned male at birth. Chii details her autobiographical account of growing up with gender dysphoria and ultimately deciding to transition in her early adult years. Shortly after Chii starts transitioning, she meets a man who is instantly enamored by her, and although he is surprised when Chii eventually tells him she used to live as a guy, he still wants to go out with her. As Chii continues to transition, her boyfriend supports her through the process, culminating in their marriage once her transition is complete.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Vampire Dies in No Time
description:
Vampires are said to have many weaknesses to balance out their incredible powers. The vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to… everything. He dies, disintegrating into a pile of sand, at the slightest shock.

After a disastrous encounter with the vampire hunter (and author) Ronaldo leaves Draluc's castle destroyed, Draluc decides to pack up his remaining belongings and adorable armadillo familiar John and move into Ronaldo’s office (despite the hunter’s protests). Chaos ensues as this unlikely duo is forced to work together while fending off perverted vampires, Ronaldo's terrifying editor, Draluc's eccentric family, and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vampire-dies-in-no-time)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
This is a love story of a man and a woman who doesn’t believe in anyone.

The popular psychological betrayal web novel finally gets a manga adaptation!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Sports, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Inept at dealing with people, Hikawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?! The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raw:** [Shounen Jump+](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/14079602755350023318)
- [Official X](https://x.com/ramparts_ice)
- [Official Anime Site](https://korinojoheki-pr.com/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Youkai Gakkou no Sensei Hajimemashita!
description: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Idol Yamerukedo Kekkon Shitekuremasu Ka!?
description:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence

name: Not found
description:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Catastrophic Love
description: I'm going to tell you a story about a failed relationship. I didn't know it would turn out like this. But everyone has a similar story.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Splatoon - Squid Kids Comedy Show
description: The manga is mainly based on Splatoon 2, featuring a pink male Inkling named Hit as the main character and a pink female Inkling named Maika appears alongside him. It is published in CoroCoro Comic monthly magazines and collected later in volumes.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Hachuurui-kun
description: Tatsumi lives a tired life because of his work at a sketchy company. His only reason for living and his passion is reptiles. Kotani lives next door to Tatsumi and unexpectedly one night after a misunderstanding ends up helping him create a channel to talk about reptiles.
tags: Animals, Romance, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Magical Girl Site
description:
Asagiri Aya is a young girl who has fallen victim to bullies at her school. Looking for a way to escape her troubles, she looks to the internet for distraction, when a mysterious website called “Magical Girl Site” appears. Simply viewing the page is all it takes to hurtle Aya headlong into the deadly world of the Magical Girl Apocalypse. There, it’s fight or die, against a seemingly endless array of savagely adorable, frilly-skirted killing machines, each armed with magical powers and an unquenchable thirst for blood and chaos.

(Source: Seven Seas)
tags: Action, Psychological, Magical Girls, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Did You Reject Mr. Lu Today?
description: Gu Yi Xue is a headstrong and beautiful woman, but her family's company is facing bankruptcy. Lu Li Yang, a bossy company president, offers marriage to save Yi Xue's family, but she refuses. But even when Yi Xue doesn't want to marry Li Yang, he'd do anything to make her his wife
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Saint Seiya: Another Story of Hades - Dark Wing
description: A high school student suffers an accident and wakes up in Elysium, the World of the Dead. In search of answers, he meets Hades, the God of the Underworld, who sends him on a mission only he can fulfill.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Muteki Shounin no Isekai Nariagari Monogatari ~Gendai no Seihin wo Jizai ni Toriyoseru Sukiru ga Aru Node Isekai de wa Rakushoudesu~
description: An orphaned college student , Daichi Asakura, suddenly finds himself lost in another world—along with his beloved cat, Nike. Upon discovering his "Trade" skill, which allows him to import modern products, he uses both that and knowledge as his weapons. He's now aiming to make it big-time as a merchant—thus begins a fantasy isekai success story.
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Futoku no Guild
description: Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Chainsaw Man (Official Colored)
description: Broke young man + chainsaw demon = Chainsaw Man!   Denji was a small-time devil hunter just trying to survive in a harsh world. After being killed on a job, he is revived by his pet devil-dog Pochita and becomes something new and dangerous—Chainsaw Man!
tags: Award Winning, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Gore, Horror, Monster Girls, Police, Supernatural

name: Crossplay Love: Otaku x Punk
description: The cute and cheerful girl working at a Japanese style maid cafe, Hana. The black haired cold beauty, Mei. Though the two are in love with each other, they have not realized it. However, they have a secret that should not be discovered…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Kyou kara, Hitozuma Mansion ni Nyuukyo shimasu.
description: In this apartment complex, all the residents are married women whose husbands are away on business—except for one. Sachiya, an office worker with an unusually high libido, finds himself as the only man in the entire building. Surrounded by lonely wives, he quickly becomes the center of their growing frustration… and desire.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: DODODODO!
description: It has been 150 years since the Declaration of Victory by Women. Since then, all men have been reduced to slaves, forced to serve, obey, and satisfy women. In this matriarchal society, the story unfolds of a slave who fights to build a nation where men and women can coexist. Stimulation and pleasure!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo
description: When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.
tags: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Bijin Onna Joushi Takizawa-san
description: Kouta Takeda is a young office worker, who at the entry level at XOX Corporation is put under the direct supervision of Kyouko Takizawa, a stunning and voluptuous woman with a fearsome reputation at the company as an inflexible and cruel boss, but Takeda has the privilege of finding out that Takizawa is no iron lady, and that she's no stranger to kindness where it's dispensed.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Motokano-tachi to YaReNaoshi!?
description:
Minato Haginouchi, heir to the prestigious confectionery company "Haginouchi", is transferred to its headquarters in his third year to begin successor training. But at a company party, his father publicly names him the next president, declaring that any woman who wants to be the president's wife is free to pursue him.
Suddenly, in a workplace already teeming with his ex-girlfriends, Minato becomes the unwilling target of their relentless advances!?
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Harem

name: Ai ni Muragaru Mushitachi wa
description:
For Youta, Maiko is the goddess who fills the void in his lonely soul. What he doesn’t realize is that she has other plans for him.
Sex without affection. An unrequited love.
A suspenseful story of both pure and immoral love.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: Tenkaichi - Nihon Saikyou Bugeisha Ketteisen
description:
Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan.
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raws:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496359886083), [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%83%86%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AB%E3%82%A4%E3%83%81_%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%B7%E6%AD%A6%E8%8A%B8%E8%80%85%E6%B1%BA%E5%AE%9A%E6%88%A6)
- **Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Mexico, and Brazil only.
- [Official X](https://x.com/tenkaichi_MYM)
tags: Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore, Drama

name: Maro Maro
description: Maro is a beautiful goddess who lives a peaceful life in the heavens and uses her water ladle to control the weather at her command. But she clumsily drops it onto Earth and hurries to retrieve it only to find that it was picked up by possibly the worst person it could have been. Kiriko Toshiki seems to be a great kid who is kind to everyone, smart, athletic and good looking, but that is all a façade and underneath it all is a sadistic elementary school kid. When he finds the water ladle, his life changes. With the water ladle in his possession, he now controls the weather and Maro is left helpless until she gets it back from Kiriko. But until that day comes, Kiriko plans on teasing and torturing Maro in so many ways.
tags: Fantasy

name: Tonari no Kurokawa-san
description:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Type-Moon Gakuen - Chibi Chuki!
description: A gag manga written by Hanabana Tsubomi. It features numerous characters from various TYPE-MOON works in a school setting.
tags: Comedy

name: Traceless Knight
description: Hiding his extraordinary magical potential, young Fabian Trevin leads a quiet life in his family's vineyard, sheltered from the scrutiny of noble society under his strict father's watchful eye. But before his tenth summer, the arrival of Lady Knight Iliora Rozene shatters his peaceful existence, setting his fate on an irreversible course.
tags: Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Yuugai Shitei Doukyuusei
description: Yatsuhashi Miyako is a diligent class rep while the girl who sits next to her, Miyakonojou Reika, was discovered to not be wearing panties. Will Miyako be able to reform Reika into a normal high school girl?!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description:
"Jin... I'm expelling you from the party."

Jin had been adventuring with his childhood friend, Reki the Hero, aiming to defeat the Demon Lord. Along the way, they were joined by Yuuri the Saint and Ryushika the Sage, and at last, they reached the Demon Lord's castle. However, just before the final battle, Jin was suddenly told he was no longer part of the party. Heartbroken, Jin returned to his hometown... But soon after, the remaining party members—who swiftly defeated the Demon Lord—began showing up one after another with marriage proposals!?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Class of Brains
description: All of his classmates, including his best friend and his crush, have been reduced to nothing more than brains. An alien who calls herself A-sensei informs the protagonist, Satoki Tsutsuno, that to protect the earth, they must use their collective brains. With Tsutsuno being the only one left in his class, what trials await him and his classmates...?
tags: Sci-Fi, School Life, Horror, Aliens, Mystery

name: High School Hack and Slash
description:
Touma Funasaka is offered an unusual recommendation for his next school by his homeroom teacher. The school in question is Toyashihara Academy—a national, full-boarding institution that accepts only students through recommendation, with no general admissions. It also happens to be his teacher’s alma mater.

The low tuition and full-boarding system seemed like the perfect opportunity, so Tōma decides to enroll.

But what awaited him was an academy that defied common sense—a place built atop a vast underground dungeon, ruled by sex and violence.

Though bewildered at first, Toma quickly adapts to the decadent academy life. While indulging in a corrupt and hedonistic youth, he also joins comrades to form a party and challenge the dungeon’s depths!
tags: Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tsuyoshi - Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa
description: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama

name: Not found
description: The plot of the series revolves around Mankichi Togawa, who at the start of the series is a single delinquent student with one dedicated follower. Like many later iconic shonen protagonists, Mankichi's power is his ability to appeal to the others around him who join his cause (sometimes only after first losing to him in a fight). Join Mankichi as he fights other delinquents, dangerous criminals, and even juvenile detention camps!    Historically, this is Weekly Shonen Jump's first major hit, the title that got their magazine to sell millions. The authors of both Saint Seiya and Fist of the North Star have both stated in interviews that Otoko was their inspiration to get into the manga industry, and it was one of the first shonen manga to get its own anime. While it may seem insignificant now, nearly every Shonen Jump manga out there owes its existence to Mankichi.
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Metroid EX
description:
After Greed, a creature of the same species as Ridley, stole Samus's suit upgrades using the Dominion device, Samus, Joey, and Diesel embark on a quest to retrieve them in the Extreme Galaxy and restore Samus back to full power. However, Greed has given Samus's upgrades to each of his most trusted henchmen known as the Deadly Six Stars.

Note: This manga was only published in Comic BomBom and was never collected into volumes.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Yontou-ryuu no Saikyou Haishin-sha ~Yari Konda VR Game no Settei ge Genjitsu Sekai ni Hanei Sareta node, Haishi Yotei Datta Job de Musou Shimasu~
description:
**Without warning, the real world synced with the game. Towers and dungeons materialized globally—now, conquer them with *Quad-Wielding*!**  

Hayate, a solo player of the ultra-popular VRMMO *FWO*, cherished his obscure class: *Quad-Wielder*. But his world shattered when he received the worst possible news: **"Quad-Wielding will be removed!"**  

Teamed up with Elena, a chaebol heiress and archer, Hayate unleashes his ultimate Quad-Wielding technique *"Obscuring Moon"*—all while unraveling the mysteries of the Creation Goddess. Then suddenly… **the game and reality merge.**
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kasane to Subaru
description: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kindaichi Papa no Jikenbo
description: Not found
tags: Thriller, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found

name: Kon'ya Coin Randorii de Aimashou
description:
Narita, a family restaurant employee in his late twenties who is always busy with work, is feeling down about the results of his job interview,
while he is having dinner, he is absentmindedly watching a video recommended to him on a video site.

The video shows Sasa Yoruzaki, an artist with an overwhelming sense of fashion and singing ability, despite her cool and slightly cheeky responses.

Later, when he goes to an old laundromat to deal with some laundry problems, he suddenly notices a woman and feels something is off about her. The woman seems familiar, but it is Sasa himself, the one he had just seen in the video.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Geroi in the Far North
description:
Historical war drama set in Summer 1945 on the northern Kuril islands. Even though the Pacific War has ended already, 
a group of Japanese tank soldiers is suddenly confronted with an unexpected battle.
tags: Historical, Military, Drama

name: Not found
description:
The day Nice Nature’s indomitable fighting spirit clashes with the legendary Tokai Teio — who will emerge victorious?

Artist socials: [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/98155)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/darkside22423)
[Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=1724911)
tags: Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Death of the Universe
description: After the death of his friend, Luciano Ojaverde breaks her final gift to him in a grief-fueled rage. When Luciano then finds himself in outer space, he's met with the fact that it's filled with life. ...But why has Earth been quarantined away from it all?
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Aliens, Full Color

name: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onnanoko
description:
A sweet essay comic by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on social media, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life…!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Kimi ga Hoeru Tame no Uta wo,
description: Oogami Haru, a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group...
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Music

name: Kimi no Kiss Ga Naiteiru
description:
Haruto, a second year high school student, has two secrets.  The first is that anyone he kisses loses consciousness and their memories of the preceding five hours.  The second is darker and more bloody, and binds him - like the friendship bracelet he wears - to first-year student Umi, although she cannot remember why.  Secrets, like memories, can come to haunt you...

Debut serialisation by Minato Ayase.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery

name: The Rose of Versailles
description:
In 1755, in three European countries, three people are born who will eventually have a fateful meeting in Versailles, France. 

Hans Axel von Fersen, born the eldest son of a Swedish senator; Oscar François de Jarge, born the youngest daughter of a French general; and Marie Antoinette, born the princess of Austria and the Habsburgs! 

The great masterpiece that shines in the history of Shojo Manga is finally here!
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Crossdressing, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
“When combined, even trash skills become the ultimate power!!”

Yuichi is an unremarkable convenience store clerk. On the day he finishes a grueling overtime shift that lasted nearly 24 hours, he gets swept up in a magical summoning meant to bring a group of high school delinquents to another world. While the officially summoned students each receive powerful skills from a goddess, Yuichi—who was never supposed to be there—ends up with a massive pile of leftover “trash skills” that were slated for disposal.

To make matters worse, the king who performed the summoning declares him useless and banishes him from the royal palace. However, drawing on the resilience forged through years of harsh work and the practical mindset he’s cultivated over thirty-five years, Yuichi is determined to survive in this new world by “making the most of what he’s got”!!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: This Life's Universal Superstar
description: Hard-pressed to find good luck in this universe, Sun Woojoo gives up on his dream of becoming an idol in favor of living a normal life. That is, until he finds himself waking up from a car accident on his exam day! But as luck would have it, Woojoo can now copy any move exactly as he sees it, and his two left feet that kept him from debuting are now moving to the beat! With this newfound skill, will Woojoo be able to turn things around and become the star that shines the brightest on stage?
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Music, Full Color

name: Hyouketsu Reijou-sama wo Follow Shitara, Mechamecha Dekiai Sareteshimatta Ken
description:
Alicia Ozrind, known in noble circles as the Frost Duchess, is feared for her cold and unyielding demeanor, earning her the reputation of a villainess among the aristocracy. But beneath her icy exterior lies a girl who simply struggles to express her true feelings. There is, however, one person who has melted her frozen heart—a young servant named Gray, who works as a cleaner in her grand estate.

"You're the only one who truly understands me!"

Completely smitten and vulnerable around Gray, Alicia showers him with unrestrained affection. Whether it's during meals, in the bath, or even before bedtime, her overwhelming sweetness knows no bounds! But their relationship isn't without its hurdles—Alicia is a noble lady, and Gray a mere commoner.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Uchi no Tsukaima ga Sumimasen
description: In this world, Makai, every Demon gets a Familiar summoned using their magic. Patty, a Demon Girl who's magic is so weak she can't even summon an animal is forced to get a famliar. So, reluctantly, she chooses an older human named Norman as her familiar. Norman has an incredible fascination with examining all types of lifeforms around Makai, claiming he loves learning about them. This weird combination of a weak demon girl and a goofy old man leads to a journey of adventures the two go through.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: "Eiyuu" ni Akogareta Shoujo wa Kyuuketsuki ni Ochitemo "Eiyuu" wo Mezasu
description:
"We'll kill all vampires. Sharing our own fallen 『 blood 』 as a weapon...!!"

Arbitration Knights travel around the world to protect peace. Rinslet, a girl who has just become a regular knight, meets Yuri, a vampire girl with cool silver hair and crimson eyes. 
Rinslet learns that she is an abomination who kills her own kind by manipulating the power of 《 blood armor 》, which materializes blood into swords, bows and arrows. She becomes Yuri's kin in exchange for her life, and her goal is...?

A Yuri x Vampire x Dark Fantasy!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires

name: Koisuru Idol Ryusei-kun wa Kujikenai!
description: Ryusei, a handsome idol who is rapidly gaining popularity, has a crush on his childhood friend Daichi. However, Daichi is obsessed with the "idol Ryusei,'' and even when he approaches him, he doesn't turn around. On the other hand, Daichi also secretly has a crush on Ryusei, but he hides his romantic feelings for him and supports "everyone's idol Ryusei"...? A love story between a popular idol and a healthy childhood friend, with mutual unrequited love ♡
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic

name: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster
description:
After dying in a car accident, an office worker finds herself reincarnated as Giselle Rozevin, a villain doomed to be poisoned while awaiting a death sentence. Although many assassins try to poison her, they all end up failing! In fact, the poisons Giselle ingests actually taste… good?! Can Giselle leverage this ability to survive her new surroundings?
___
After waking up in the body of Giselle Rozevin, possibly the worst character from the novel, *The Poisoned Apple*, our protagonist has one goal: escape the original Giselle’s miserable fate of being poisoned to death by assassins while trapped in a prison cell. Thankfully and strangely, she finds out that poison is ineffective on her and that she can distinguish them by taste. Thus, having fallen out of favor with the good guys, Giselle uses her new unique skill to appeal to the villains. However, is joining hands with the villains really the right choice?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Crushing Weight Of This Universe
description:
What will you do to get what you want?

[Updates monthly (usually).]
tags: Sci-Fi, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Eiken
description: Zashono Academy is unique in all the world. It has 54,000 students and this allows for some VERY specialized clubs. There are clubs for just about everything you can think of… and then there's the Eiken club. No one seems to know just what it's about, but they do know that it's filled with some of the most bodacious babes ever to be brought together! …and then there's Densuke. Densuke is a little awkward and clumsy and he always seems to be in the most compromising positions with all the other club members. And all he really wants is to be with the cutest girl on campus, the lovely Chiharu. Will he ever be able to get away from the uncomfortable club activities and let Chiharu know what's really on his mind?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life

name: Childhood Sweetheart Liaoliao
description: Exhausted mentally and physically, Song Liaoliao is ready to leave it all behind. She couldn't have anticipated that the new director is her old sweet- no, her old classmate. It should simply be a reunion of old friends, but Song Liaoliao unexpectedly finds herself gradually falling into Pei Yu's love trap...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Rikka Kitan
description:
Touma, a young wolf beastman who loves a peaceful life, is a regular policeman who protects the peace of the town of Edo. One night, he meets a mysterious girl who is being attacked by thugs. The girl's name is Rikka. She is a princess from the faraway country of Izumo, and is being pursued because she has a big secret. Touma happens to help her and ends up hiding her. Tired of her life on the run, Touma decides to offer peace to Rikka, but living with a girl for the first time is far from peaceful and marks the beginning of a very turbulent life!

(Source: Comic Days, translated)
tags: Historical, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Mystery

name: Not found
description: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Slice of Life

name: Kajiya de Hajimeru Isekai Slow Life
description:
One night, Eizo—a hapless corporate slave, saves a cat and gets hit by a truck. The cat which seems to be related to another world, in return for his help, grants Eizo a skill of his wish and reincarnates him to another world. Eizo, who has craftsmanship as a hobby and wishes to use this skill for a living, chooses to be reincarnated as a blacksmith. And so he starts his life in another world as a blacksmith just as he wishes. However, Eizo's creations are at another different level that will shake this new world.
___
**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/series/my-quiet-blacksmith-life-in-another-world)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
He's a nice guy, but way too plain...

That's Fukusuke Mogi, who secretly admires Kureha Yua, the most beautiful girl in the class. However, the one rumored to be with Yua is his best friend, Fujisaki Yusei, the ace of the basketball team. Feeling down about being a "mob character" overshadowed by his best friend, Fukusuke discovers another super cute girl who's hidden in Yua's shadow and doesn't stand out—Usuba Amari! "W-Would you... be my friend?" Sharing similar circumstances, Fukusuke and Amari decide to practice "becoming normal" together—what could possibly happen next?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
**Even if it’s a cursed mansion, it’s the only place for me to live!**

As if being reincarnated into a generic fantasy webtoon wasn’t enough, I have to be the ‘Necromancer’ who is sacrificed for the protagonist...

Since it has come to this, it can’t be helped. Even if I can’t become a rich noble lady from a romance fantasy, I want to at least protect my life and live comfortably.

Let’s go to that place, the one full of curses and ghost stories. To the mansion of the villain, Archduke Illestone!

**"I will break the curse on this mansion for you, In return, please raise me."**

(Source: MangaUpdates, edited)
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Mysterious Tatari-chan
description:
Kamino Tatari, known as Tatari-chan, gets bullied everyday for her appearance and behavior, however, she has strange magical powers that help her in her daily life...

Note: Kamino Tatari is pronounced the same way as 神のたたり which means "God's Curse". 
Her classmate, Noroi Kakeru's name is pronounced the same as "Put a curse on"
tags: Magic, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Guilty Gear Comic Anthology
description: Guilty Gear Comic Anthology, from the Broccoli Game Anthorogy [sic] series, is a Japan-exclusive comic anthology based on the original Guilty Gear and published by Broccoli Co., Ltd. The cover is an illustration by Daisuke Ishiwatari.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Anthology, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Samurai, Video Games, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Splatoon
description: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Adaptation

name: Evil Baby
description: Yu Yang had never thought the world could harbor something as bizarre as evil babies. But meeting Zhang Cheng changed everything. The man who nurtured him and tended to his every need was, in truth, his greatest enemy. Now, Yu Yang faces an impossible choice: should he kill him?
tags: Official Colored, Action, Romance, Boys' Love, Horror, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: A collection of yuri stories by Takeshima Eku. The first chapter is identical to the original oneshot.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Girls' Love

name: Darn It!
description: A story about a pretty, ditzy ghost and a cold guy. But wait, how is their first meeting in a bathtub?!
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural

description:
A collection of Magia Record side comics, written and illustrated by a variety of artists.

tags: Action, Psychological, Anthology, Magical Girls, Drama

name: Mad for Love
description: After traveling into a historical BL novel, the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen, which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yan’s first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan, the prince’s foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role, he accidentally captures the prince’s heart, and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold, overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming, perverted fiancé—chaos ensues!
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fatale Game
description:
A story about the relationship between Tainaka Seri, a mid-career manga artist who has only had one successful work, and her new editor Futami Sumire. When her editor, who has been with her for 10 years since her debut, decides to transfer, Seri is introduced to her new editor Sumire. Sumire says she is a fan of Seri's, and while Seri is surprised by her unique way of closing the distance, she is somehow fascinated by her...

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Legal Pirate Parfait
description: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Omega Tribe
description: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.
tags: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai
description: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: A serialized project that portrays the IKIZULIVE members true selves, showing sides they rarely reveal. Bringing you stories that touch on their inner worlds.
tags: Slice of Life, Music, Full Color

name: Re/Member: The Last Night
description: Karada Sagashi is back! Set in an amusement park after midnight, this latest installment in the hit survival horror series is set to hit theaters in Japan in September 2025 as a live-action film. Don't miss the manga adaptation before the movie drops!
tags: Gore, Drama, Horror

name: Wú Guīzé Shìjiè · again piān
description:
A regular high school girl loses her way en route to a friend’s birthday party, only to stumble into a twisted realm where wishes are granted through bloodshed. Her escape becomes a surreal nightmare: endless misfortunes, a mysterious guardian, and a crimson sky frozen in eternal dusk. As she glimpses the world’s hidden face, will the joy of survival crumble beneath the weight of a brutal truth?

“Do you have a wish you’d kill to make real?” The demon with violet eyes raises its gun. “There is no such thing as kindness.” “Welcome to: the Lawless World.”
tags: Action, Psychological, Survival, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ochiru Iro wa, Kohakushoku
description:
The long-awaited comic book adaptation of the popular social media series! How will the twisted relationship between the two end?

In a world still engulfed in war, Theo, who serves as a military lieutenant, feels uncomfortable around Kaguma, the captain of another unit, who constantly hits on him.
However; one day, while shielding Theo from a sniper, Kaguma sustains an arm injury that takes a month to heal. Feeling responsible, Theo offers to nurse Kaguma for the month until he recovers, but... When he witnesses Kaguma masturbating, Theo ends up helping him deal with "that" as well...?

An army BL story between a doting captain and a tsundere vice captain, featuring awkward soldiers.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Military, Drama

name: Sunadokei
description: Not found
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
"...Is this a death game?" 

The full-dive RPG "Life is Adventure" has 100,000 players due to the failure of management, and it has turned into a death game that is going out of control. Yamamoto Rinka, a beautiful player in her thirties, curses her fate and falls into despair - or did she?

"It's a forced long vacation! If I'm going to do it, I might as well take my time and enjoy the game!"

Moreover, due to a cheat skill that was activated despite her own will, she suddenly became an all-round player...
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yuutousei Couple no Himitsu
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Doujinshi, Delinquents, Web Comic

name: Dragon Ball: Goku Shiden (Doujinshi)
description:
Son Goku has defeated the Red Ribbon Army and is training alone in preparation for the next Tenkaichi Budokai! What adventures has he had during those 3 years? Let's figure that out...

Story created by ThomasduCrest on X
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi

name: Dragon Ball AF (Young Jijii)
description:
Based off of the critically acclaimed manga series Dragon Ball and Dragon Ball Z by Akira Toriyama, Young Jijii sets the stage for an excellent story and awesome adventures in the Dragon Ball Universe! Dragon Ball AF takes place three years after the end of Dragon Ball GT, following the adventures of the Z-Fighters and their fight against the all-mighty Lord Ize, son of Frieza!   
Dragon Ball AF has no affiliation with Akira Toriyama, Funamation, Toei Animation, or Fuji TV. Dragon Ball AF is a fan-made doujinshi created by Young Jijii and is made purely for entertainment.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Hon nara Uruhodo
description:
October Hall (Juugatsudou), a secondhand bookstore where people and books may meet anew. Run by a laid back young man with a ponytail, the shop is visited by all kinds of customers. Join him as he interacts with anyone from a book-loving regular, a high school girl growing into adulthood, a man looking to simply get rid of some books, and a widow selling her late husband's collection. A gem of a slice of life story for all lovers of books and those whose lives have been changed forever by their encounters with books.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [KADOCOMI](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_006231_S?episodeType=comics)
tags: Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Dragon Ball Multiverse (Doujinshi)
description: 20 timelines that diverged from DBZ meet in a multiverse tournament! This ignores DBS.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Superhero, Magic, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Uzonoshiniko Houkoku
description:
Uzonoshiniko is known to bring disasters when adopted as the name of a person, animal, or inanimate object.

Because it consistently marks the origin of abnormal and unexplainable events, any appearance of the name is treated as taboo.

This document is the unofficial reporting system, continued since the 25th year of the Meiji era by the government, military, investigative agencies, detectives, and civilians, established to clarify the nature of the phenomenon and to formulate appropriate measures.
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Crime, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: RoboMonkey
description:
In a world where the line between human and machine fades, an organization known as CTR fights to eliminate cyborgs.

Among their operatives is Sun, a skilled assassin loyal to their mission. Partnered with Wrench, a cybernetic monkey hybrid, he is sent to infiltrate Affamato, a ruthless cyborg mafia that holds Florence in its grip.

But when the mission goes awry, Sun's left to navigate a world where allies and enemies blur into one.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Crime, Superhero, Mafia, Self-Published, Gore, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: "Bungaku Shoujo" to Shinitagari no Pierrot
description:
The "mysterious school comedy" centers on the unusual members of a high school literary club. Tooko Amano, a high school senior who calls herself the "literary girl" as the club president, is actually a supernatural creature (youkai) that devours stories, she tears pages from books to munch on them. Her club subordinate is Konoha Inoue, a second-year high school boy who writes stories every day for Amano to eat. He once wrote an award-winning novel, but he wrote it under the pen name Miu Inoue so readers thought the author was a mysterious 14-year-old bishoujo novelist. The stress from the novel's fame and its movie and television drama plans turned Inoue in an introverted recluse.  
  
Adapted from the "Bungaku Shoujo" series of light novels
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kaijuu Jieitai
description:
In year X of Reiwa, an undersea landslide caused a massive tsunami in the Pacific Ocean. However, this was only the beginning of a new disaster. Monsters have appeared, but there are no heroes. Can humanity win peace by its own strength?! Inoue Junya of *BTOOOM!* presents with history and military specialist Shirato Seiichi a mega-realistic monster-busting story!

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%80%AA%E7%8D%A3%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%9B%E9%9A%8A)
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Survival, Military, Drama, Supernatural

name: Almark
description: Born the son of a mercenary in the war-torn north, Almark sets out on a long journey to the Nork Academy of Magic in the south to fulfill a promise he made to his father to become a sorcerer. After a long journey, his life at the academy was completely different from the world he was in. Almark is always confused by the gap. However, while making mistakes, with the help of his colleagues and teachers, he gradually shows a glimpse of his talent. With the pride of being the son of a mercenary, Almark takes the first step toward becoming a sorcerer.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yume ka Utsutsu ka
description: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school, she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Yoshida the class president has a nervous temperament. But recently her worries are caused by one of her classmates, Yano. He somehow always arrives at school covered in all sorts of injuries, she can't get her eyes off him! She can't control herself, she needs to patch him up!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu. Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he's been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi's arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tensei Akuma no Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku
description: Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level devil in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another "different world," liberated from the harsh underworld. Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated. Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Living a self-destructive lifestyle, young Aoi finds her room visited by various symbols of spring - cherry blossoms and butterflies - all silently watching over her days. A new tale of love and life from the unique mind. (MANGA Plus)
tags: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Gundam Pilot Series of Biographies - The Brave Soldiers in the Sky
description:
Chronicles the life of the four more prominent pilots of the Zeon Principality before and during the One Year War:  
  
Mission.1 - Johnny Ridden  
Mission.2 - Shin Matsunaga  
Mission.3 - Elliot Rem  
Mission.4 - Thomas Kurtz  
  
March 0078, Thomas Kurtz, an Earth Federation test pilot is testing mobile suits when the war broke out.

name: Chronicles of the Reincarnated Demon God
description:
The Young Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woonhwi, attained the position of cult heir in the Heavenly Demon Cult with only supernatural abilities. His life of chaos finally meets its end during the rebellion of the vice cult leader and the elders. 

[Even if you needed to kill me, you should have remembered what kind of man I am. So, all of you, die!] 

After dying together with all the traitors, he wakes up in a place he could never have imagined. 

[A branch of the Tang Clan?] 

Tang Woonhwi of the Sichuan Tang Clan's Nine Dragon Branch Family now dreams of rebuilding the Heavenly Demon Cult!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hoshikawa Ginza Yonchoume
description: This story lets us look into the relationship of Matsuda Otome (a home schooled girl) and Nakagawa Minato (a high school teacher). Otome has been through a difficult past and is now under the care of Minato-sensei. Otome becomes suspicious of Minato's day-to-day routines and investigates. What will Minato tell Otome when she confronts her?
tags: Loli, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Kimi Tonara, Ashita o Utaeruno
description:
That day, when I met you, my world, where I couldn't even speak, was filled with music.

High school student Fujieda Yuzuki is a kind girl who is liked by everyone. She prioritizes the people around her - her friends and her boyfriend - and hides her true feelings. She's not good at using her own voice. Putting others first had been Yuzuki's way of life up until then. That is, until she met you.

One day, Yuzuki comes across a girl singing and playing the guitar on the street. Unable to forget the voice, she was humming a tune alone in the classroom after school when the girl from that time, Terada Hinata, appeared. It turned out to be a student at the same high school. What's more, she spoke to him, saying, "I've come from the future to save you" --!?

A girl meets girl x school youth story!!

(Source: Young Ace Up, translated)
tags: Time Travel, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Music

name: Not found
description: Leopard and Magia Sulphur have made Magia Baiser seriously mad and now they've been trapped in a room until they have OO. The only way they can escape is for the two to start 'getting along'. See for yourself how they'll get 'closer'.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: The King's Avatar
description:
No one could ever come close to “Battle God” Ye Qiu’s skills in Glory, a popular game that took the world by storm. His professional team, however, replaced him with another captain, and even seized his account.

He was left to start anew at an internet café as a manager. When a new District 10 opened up in Glory, he dives back, armed with a decade of experience and an unfinished custom weapon.

His path to redemption, filled with strategy and memories, marks his thrilling return to the summit.

---

***Note:*** This is a webcomic rerun of [The King's Avatar](https://mangadex.org/title/83d08adf-6118-4859-a0e7-082f3707604b).

Alternative Official English Translation: [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/the-king's-avatar_17959825305729101)

name: Not found
description: Ooyama Takeru, a young normal yet perverted minded guy, got accepted and now goes to a school that, unknown to him, was where combat and magic is used. On the first day, he meets again after three years: Amaya Haruko, his childhood friend, Kushiya Inaho, a girl who says she's his fiance, and Himegami Kodama, a blonde who wants to kill him. Finding out that there are many girls there that just don't like him, he is told that everyone there uses a special magic ability while using an item or weapon called a Maken. Later, he finds that no Maken is acceptable for him and doesn't know what to do, since in this school the students get into duels that showcase their magic and combat power, to which he seemingly has none.

After a rookie part-time grim reaper's mistake, the main character, 'Kim Geonpyo,' is forced to live on without her soul.
From that day forward, it seems like the entire world is against her—especially that grim reaper!!

description: A serialization about the story of a mute transfer girl who uses a sketchbook to talk to people, and a bullish classmate with a special ability who befriends her.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Shameless School
description:
The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Harem, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Camera-senpai to Sewayaki Jouzu na Kouhai-chan
description:
The goal of the camera department manager, Ayato, is the ultimate beauty that he has set himself.

To take "boob pictures". 

The ideal that we once met at the beachIn order to take a picture of a beautiful girl with breasts, I involved my junior and assistant YukiLet the beautiful girls on campus take a "breast photo"! But--?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A boy named Atsumu was branded as "useless" by his famous sisters and banished from his entertainment-industry family. However, hidden within him was an extraordinarily talented "behind-the-scenes support" skill that neither he nor his family had noticed! After transferring schools, Atsumu is now determined to live a normal life, but as he crosses paths with talented entertainers—VTubers, idols, and models—his natural ability starts to shine, making him their indispensable support. They can't help but adore him, turning his simple wish for normality into a showbiz underdog success story!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Beyblade X
description: What has not yet been seen, and what cannot be seen - "X". Beyblade, accelerated to the limit (extreme), blasts through a new era!
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Sports, Adventure

name: Not found
description:
High schooler at the bottom of the social ladder x Beautiful King of the topmost caste! Nagira Yuu’s big hit series, now a manga!!

Beautiful, aloof, he reigns over the class. Kiyoi has the innate qualities of a king.
At the start of a new term, in the middle of the stifling classroom, Hira, who is silent, friendless, and at the bottom of the class’s social ladder, has his heart captured in a single glance by classmate Kiyoi. Though in this world there should be no chance of them ever interacting with each other, Hira, who is treated as a gofer, suddenly finds himself with Kiyoi’s phone number entered into his phone! A single world from Kiyoi, even the spare change he receives, is precious. These lonely, suffocating feelings, could they be love? A love story interweaving two opposites begins!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Happily Ever Afterwards
description:
I transmigrated inside the novel of my favorite character, the second male lead. A tsundere who listens to all the words of the female lead while grunting, with a straight forward personality, and a handsome face. Matching all my preferences, he was even single after the ending. Nice! I’ll pick up the second male lead! However, I overlooked one thing… The tsundere, who had been abandoned by the female lead blackened, and had become a terrifying man!

“Get lost.”

…I-is it safe for me to pick up the second male lead?

---
What would you do if you were reborn as a character from your favorite romance novel? For Peony, an avid fan of *The Song of Askar*, the answer is simple: Marry her favorite character, of course! Reincarnated as the princess of the Kingdom of Garten, Peony is determined to marry Richt, the second male lead of *The Song of Askar* and former prince of the Fairspren Empire, who was banished to an inhospitable land after the novel’s happy ending (which didn’t end so well for him). Amidst trials and tribulations, can Peony and Richt make the most of their second chance at life and love?

---

name: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!
description: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kimi no Na wa.
description:
The story is set one month after a comet has fallen for the first time in a thousand years in Japan. Mitsuha, a high school girl living in the countryside, wants to live in the city because she is tired of life in the country. Then, there's Taki. He's a high school student living in Tokyo with his friends while working as a part-timer at an Italian restaurant. He also has a strong interest in fine arts involving architecture. One day, Mitsuha dreams of herself as a young man. On the other hand, Taki also has a dream where he is a female student attending high school in the countryside. What's the secret behind their dreams?

---

name: Not found
description: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yomuin-san wa Yuusha ja Arimasen node
description:
A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isn't a student or the homeroom teacher... it's the janitor.

At the time of their summoning, the students and teachers each gained a power formed from their soul, but not the janitor. As the janitor was about to be bestowed with a power that would protect him, his power was forcibly taken from him by an arrogant student. Having gone three years without a contract extension, he failed to get a job after having graduated from a third-rate university. Somehow he is still a contractor at 25 years old and was a janitor for 2 years, with a take-home monthly salary of less than ¥120,000. From a society that rejected him, he was thrust into a world that rejected him. And what janitor-san wished from the Goddess who took pity on him was...
___
**Character Designer:** [Iwamoto Eiri](https://mangadex.org/author/6072165b-41b3-4b12-9afc-f99efff4cb72)
tags: Monsters, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake... He loves me... We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him, "......Brother, do you like me by any chance?" "Of course I do."

The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused... "I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now." Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings", has begun!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202111jitsuimo)

description: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this...?
