name: Higanjima - Saigo no 47 Hiai
description:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Aru Hi, Totsuzen Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita
description: Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancée!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Pick Me Up
description:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Transmigrating as a Secretly Illegitimate Millionaire heiress, I Try to Curry Favor with the Real Heiress to Survive
description: Transmigrated as a fake millionaire heiress, Ye FengLai has to rely on currying favor with the real heiress to survive, only to be given the "villain card" by the real heiress. What can she do? No problem! Step 1: Pretend to have amnesia and become a cute girl; Step 2: Start groveling. The plan is a huge success! She saved her own life, got the money, but... why is the real heiress's gaze towards her getting weirder and weirder?! A sweet, innocent girl who thinks she's groveling but is actually flirting without realizing it X A cold, aloof, and self-assured kitten skilled at conquest.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Girls' Love, Isekai, Villainess, Full Color

name: Kemutai Hanashi
description:
Takeda and Arita haven't met since their high school graduation, but after taking in an abandoned cat one rainy day, their relationship begins to change. It's not romantic love. They don't have a reason to live together. And yet, they still want to be by each other's side. Faced with these feelings, the answer they decide on is...

A slice of life manga series about trying to break free from the urge to label relationships a certain way.
___
Note: Nominated for the 2022 Next Manga Award (Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Taishou) for Best Web Manga.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: Arasaa Majutsushi no Yuru ii Harem Life ~Black Shachiku ga Isekai de Jiyuu Kimama ni Yuukyuu Shouka~
description: This is the story of a nearly-30-year-old office worker who suddenly remembers—he was a powerful mage in a past life! Now, he switches back and forth between the two worlds, living a laid-back, slow-life existence. But one day, out of the blue, he's approached by a fierce female adventurer—from the legendary all-women Valkyrie party, rumored to hate men! Just what will happen to this near-30s mage’s peaceful, dual-world life now!?
tags: Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Yell Girl!
description:
From Maiu Cafe:  « A voice, some cheers… and a destiny that changes! »
Yuyu, a first-year high school student, is instantly captivated by the cheer squad’s performance during club introductions. Determined to join, she’s shocked to find herself paired with Kozuka, the most irritating boy in her class…!? A thrilling story of friendship, love, and the passion of cheerleading.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Kara Kita Elf to Tomo ni Sugosu Nichijou
description:
"I'm going to start living with an elf!"

Oribe Eiichi, a young man without a job and at the bottom of his life, picks up a mysterious stone in the park one day. When he opens his eyes, he finds himself on top of a giant tree with a beautiful elf in his arms! Eichi tries to save her, but he falls from the tree and loses consciousness.

When he wakes up in the hospital a short time later, he finds Kurokawa, who claims to be a public security officer, and the elf Tia.

There he learns a shocking truth...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Support magic enhances a person’s abilities or weakens their enemies, but because many of its effects can be replicated with items, it is dismissed as inefficient and derided as mere "babysitting magic."

Thor, once a member of the hero’s party, now works as a low-ranked instructor at Velen Magic Academy, teaching this disregarded form of magic. After helping a student named Reina who looks up to him, Thor is abruptly fired.

With no job prospects, Thor takes Reina’s advice and heads to the Neustadt Empire’s capital. There, he is unexpectedly hired as a court mage by Princess Elena. Though Thor doubts his own worth, thinking, "I’m not skilled enough for this," yet his support magic proves to be anything but ordinary.

Furthermore, his students, such as Reina, have been achieving great feats across the land. With the thought, "At the very least, I want to be cool in front of my students," Thor finds the motivation to act and, without even realizing it, begins to shine as the strongest Sage.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Valkery Arcana
description:
This tells the story of Cid Valiant del Loco, who one day emigrated with his squire to the kingdom of Florentis for a better life. However, they had a small problem: they were illegal immigrants. Even knowing the consequences that implied, they normally lived their lives eluding the authority of the Valkyries, or so it was until one day everything changed.
This story is normally shown in one-page format
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Trigger
description:
Nam Ji-il rolled into the high school that is famous as the Royal Kingdom of the delinquent. On the first day of school, he becomes a well-known bread shuttle boy in the entire school. While suffering from chronic heart disease, his weak body also has to suffer from assault any other kind of bullying, however, caused by an unexpected event his life reaches its turning point…  


---
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Zechs has a younger sister. Her name is Caron, and he loves her very much. However, if things continue as they are, she will die an untimely death. This world is the same as the RPG romance game he played in his previous life where Caron is destined to die in every route. There was no way Zechs would allow his beloved sister to die so cruelly - that's why he'll resist fate to the bitter end!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Mob Douzen no Akuyaku Reijou wa Dansou Shite Kouryaku Taishou no Za o Nerau
description:
"That's right. I can become a potential love interest as well."

A ray of inspiration strikes, in an otome game where men are treated favorably, the side-villainess starts a crossdressing revolution?!

The world is unfair. Just because I am an extra villainess, I'm doomed to always face the bad ending... If that's the case, can't I just dress up as a man and capture the heart of the game's heroine by becoming a potential love interest and live happily ever after?

The fiancé with the temper of a kid; the tsundere classmate; the puppy-like brother-in-law; and the beautiful icy-hearted prince, they are all my rivals. Just wait and watch, you handsome heartthrobs! I, Elizabeth Burton, will become a seductive knight who'd softly whisper love and capture the hearts of maidens with a mischievous wink! 

A heartwarming school romance comedy, where a crossdressing lady aims to become a noble and a fabulous love interest, begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Video Games, Crossdressing, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Jibaku Shounen: Hanako-kun
description:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san... are you there?"

At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom... but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san... is a boy!
___
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Akuyaku Kizoku to shite Hitsuyou na Sore
description:
A story of a man with evil charisma: A young man who's lived in modern Japan suddenly realized that he had been reborn in his favourite fantasy novel, *The Tale of the Rhinana Kingdom*. Yet he wasn't reborn as the protagonist, but as the famous villainous marquis in the story. With the fate of being overthrown looming above him, he takes all action to break free of his determined fate by using his future knowledge along with the strongest skill "Absolute Evil".
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66135)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama

name: Not found
description:
On a daring quest to save a life, two friends are hurled into another world, where an evil sorceress seeks to enslave them. But then the lion Aslan's song weaves itself into the fabric of a new land, a land that will be known as Narnia. And in Narnia, all things are possible.
___
**Translator:** Tsuchiya Kyouko
tags: Time Travel, Animals, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Risou no Himo Seikatsu
description: One day, average salaryman Yamai Zenjirou has an out-of-this-world experience—literally! He's pulled from Earth and dragged to another world where magic thrives and a gorgeous, powerful queen needs a consort. Now he's being pressured to marry that very monarch and help her bear a child. Will Zenjirou accept this life of lazy, luxurious love at the cost of leaving his home behind?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Fate Rewinder
description: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, School Life, Police, Mystery

name: Re:Ascension
description:
After the loss off his mother, Amon Catierre, embarks on a journey to learn the secrets of resurrection magic.
Finding himself stuck living in a country suffering from poverty, war, and corruption without end, Amon sets out on his path to seek an opportunity greater then his provincial life and the consequences of his ambition.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Gu Ning, a total rookie at romance and a hopeless case when it comes to galgames, suddenly finds herself transmigrated into Above the Empress, a court intrigue game notorious for its extreme difficulty, becoming the perverted Commander of the Imperial Guards, Gu Ning.

She knows she must protect the Empress, Jiang Yuelin, and wage war across the land to unify the human race. She has a system, she has knowledge far beyond this era, but she’s still panicking—because this cursed political strategy game also has choices, and whenever it’s her turn to pick, she always ends up choosing the wrong one!!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ninpou Isekai Tensei - Fuuma Kotarou wa Isekai de Ningen wo Torimodosu
description:
In the 15th year of the Tenmon era, Fuuma Kotarou—the fifth in a long line of fierce warriors—fought for survival in a world torn apart by endless warfare and haunted by dark, supernatural forces.

Driven by a single, unyielding resolve—to do whatever it took to stay alive—he cut down countless foes, narrowly escaping death time and again. Yet fate had its own plans: captured and executed, his life seemed to come to a tragic end.

But just when all hope was lost, a mysterious figure known only as “THE SEER OF WORLDS” reached out to him. In that fateful moment, the cycle of reincarnation was unleashed, and Fuuma Kotarou was reborn in a completely new realm—a second chance to reclaim the humanity he once lost.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Gore, Drama, Fantasy

name: Gamer ga Isekai Konten Shite Harem Jinsei e Continue suru Sou desu
description: After opening the last route of a certain FPS game, the protagonist jumps for joy, slips and dies. However, due to God - a game lover - feeling sorry for him, he decides to continue his life in a different world as the boy Wayne (although he seems to have no memory of his previous life). Life at military school in a world where magic and adventure are commonplace, and meeting heroines who truly love him.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation

name: Inkya Gyaru demo Ikigaritai!
description: Ichiko and Kuran are members of the subculture research club. They like various subcultures and they like cute stuff. Read along as these two asocial gyaru spend their days in their new kind of "youthful moratorium."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru

name: Canvas 2 ~Rainbow colored sketch~
description:
Hiroki was going to be an artist after high school, but has stopped drawing for an unknown reason. He became a teacher at Nadesico Academy, where his cousin, Elis, attends. Then, his childhood friend, Kiri, became a PE teacher at Nadesico who seems to be part of the reason why he stopped drawing….


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Canvas ~Rainbow Sketch~** (2011)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama

name: Not found
description: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. "I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder.", laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! 

So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Starry Fantasy
description:
A collection of Mizuno one-shots, including some of her earliest works:
- **Night of the Blue Star** (青い星の夜, Aoi Hoshi no Yoru) - Toshiko, a girl in poverty, has always longed for the pair of red shoes at her local store. On the day of her town's star festival, Toshiko encounters a puppy being harassed by some children. This puppy takes an unusual liking to her...
- **Carnival!** (カーニバル！) - Marietta is a poor commoner who was found and raised by a family of musicians. One day, she and her family set off to perform at the carnival. It's said dreams one has at the carnival are real... What dream will Marietta end up having? 
- **Granite**  (みかげ石, Mikageishi)
- **The King Who Ate Blue Roses** (青いバラをたべた王様, Aoi Bara wo Tabeta Ousama)
- **The Swan of Tuonela** (トゥオネラの白鳥, Tuonela no Hakucho) - Adaptation of Sibelius's tone poem.
- **Tale of One Snowy Night** (ある雪の夜の物語, Aru Yuki no Yoru no Monogatari)
- **The Mermaid Lights the Fire** (人魚が火をともす, Ningyo ga Hi wo Tomosu)
- **Star Child** (星の子, Hoshi no Ko) - The 'title' one-shot of this compilation. Goro is an astronomer down on his luck, struggling to discover something. One night, an little angelic being named Chiru comes down from the stars, changing Goro's life...
- **Glass Angel** (ガラスの天使, Garasu no Tenshi)
- **Two Suns** (二つの太陽, Futatsu no Taiyou)

(Note: Official raw only for Star Child).
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Samurai, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Shouji Osamu is an elementary school teacher fresh out of college about to embark on his first day. At the school gate, he was suddenly hugged by Chise, a girl he doesn't recognize who seems to know him. He later finds out that Chise is a fifth-grade student in his class, and that she lives in the same apartment building as he does. During a late-night rendezvous, he learns that nothing about their encounter is coincidental.
tags: Time Travel, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: Rojiura de Hirotta Onnanoko ga Bad End-go no Otome Game no Heroine Datta Ken
description:
Could you let me stay at your house?

“Hey, you’ll catch a cold if you stay out here like this!”

Ash Leben, a reincarnator into the world of an otome game, attends the Royal Academy of Magic in the lower-noble class. One rainy day, he encounters Fine Staudt, the game’s main heroine, crouched in a back alley, soaked to the bone. She confides in him that she has been labeled a “villainess” by the Academy’s Four Knights and her friend Elise and is being pressured to withdraw from school.

Determined to help, Ash challenges the Four Knights to a duel, rescuing Fine from her plight. Afterward, Fine asks, “Please let me live with you as the caretaker of your estate,” and thus begins their life together.

This is a school romantic comedy about saving the heroine after her bad ending.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Hetalia dj - What You Feel Is Love!!
description: Prussia x Old Fritz
tags: Boys' Love, Doujinshi

name: Video Girl Ai
description: High-school student Yota Moteuchi is so unpopular that his classmates have given him the nickname "Dateless." So it's no surprise when the love of his life, Moemi, is not interested in Yota but instead is in love with Yota's best friend, Takashi. Yota turns to a video rental shop for comfort, but little did he suspect that the shop was magical and that the cute girl on his rented tape would pop out of the television and try to fix his ruined love life!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Aitsu no Kanojo
description: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
tags: Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Two years have passed since the CCG's raid on Anteiku. Although the atmosphere in Tokyo has changed drastically due to the increased influence of the CCG, ghouls continue to pose a problem as they have begun taking caution, especially the terrorist organization Aogiri Tree, who acknowledge the CCG's growing threat to their existence.  
  
The creation of a special team, known as the Quinx Squad, may provide the CCG with the push they need to exterminate Tokyo's unwanted residents. As humans who have undergone surgery in order to make use of the special abilities of ghouls, they participate in operations to eradicate the dangerous creatures. The leader of this group, Haise Sasaki, is a half-ghoul, half-human who has been trained by famed special class investigator, Kishou Arima. However, there's more to this young man than meets the eye, as unknown memories claw at his mind, slowly reminding him of the person he used to be.  


---
tags: Action, Psychological, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Akatsuki no Yona
description:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red...

But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.
___
Yona reels from the shock of witnessing a loved one's murder and having to fight for her life. With Hak's help, she flees the palace and struggles to survive while evading her enemy's forces. But where will this displaced princess go when all the paths before her are uncertain?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Tokyo Fears Rhapsody
description: Peaceful human society is threatened by monsters called fears! In such a world, No. 28, a fear fascinated by human life, lived quietly as a human, but……?
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy

name: Ginga Densetsu Weed
description:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Gore, Drama

name: Diagnosis From a Fallen Angel
description:
Somewhere in Tokyo exists a general hospital where cunning and heinous criminals who’ve slipped through the cracks of the law are admitted.  

Working there is nurse Reiko Mikazuki — beautiful and brilliant, admired by both patients and fellow medical staff.  

But behind her angelic face lies another side.  

She is an enforcer who delivers merciless punishment to evildoers.  

With blood on her hands, is she a beautiful angel in white... or a seductive demon of judgment?  

A complete good-vs-evil, spine-chilling suspense thriller!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Medical

name: Urasekai Picnic
description: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Managing Director Shima Kōsaku
description: Having become a managing director, Shima Kōsaku is appointed to be supervisor of Shanghai Hatsushiba. Now the story is brought to a highly competitive marketplace for electronics manufacturers the world over, China. Facing language and cultural barriers and some persisting deeply-rooted anti-Japanese sentiment, Shima Kōsaku keeps up his fight without ever giving up his personal style in this new world.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Sports, Martial Arts, Mafia, Office Workers, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kaze no Iro made Oboeteru
description: The first year of high school: Spring Mori, who has just entered school, learns of his classmate, Michioto, who is rumored to be the "treasure of the boys' school." Mori volunteered to ask for Michioto's contact information on behalf of a friend who was too scared to talk to him. Mori headed towards Michioto without really thinking about it, but the moment Mori sees him, it's love at first sight....
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description: Gull, a mercenary boy whose life was saved by the highly ranked magician Kuon when he was young, now accepts a job to serve with a group of knights to subjugate a magician and retrieve a stolen magear. However, as the knights are on the way they are discovered by the magician and a battle ensues. Faced with an opponent with overwhelming power, Gull is…!! After that, Gull somehow becomes Kuon's apprentice…?!
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: High Score Girl DASH
description: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin wo Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~
description: Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King's daughters.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
description:
*In order to obtain or create something, something of equal value must be lost or destroyed.* That is the core tenet of alchemy.   
  
After the death of their mother, brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric decided to do the impossible: use alchemy to bring her back to life. However, their ritual went horribly wrong: Edward lost his leg, while Alphonse lost his whole body. Wanting nothing but to bring his brother back, Edward sacrificed his arm to bond his soul with a suit of armor.   
  
Equipped with mechanical "auto-mail" limbs, Edward becomes a state alchemist, seeking the one thing that can restore his brother and himself… the legendary Philosopher's Stone.  
  
The classic manga returns, now fully colored and reformatted into a long-strip Korean webtoon to read on a smartphone.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: I Ran Away and Got Married
description:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%A4%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%84-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%90%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3299), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61190666)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tamed the Monster Prince
description:
"I ended up taming the Monster Prince in the imperial palace where I was sent off like disposable property."

Irena, a bastard child from a prestigious noble family, was married off to the Frist Prince, who carried the stigma of being a monster prince due to a curse. This marriage was no different from being disposed of. 

She thought she was destined to die on her wedding night, just like previous princess candidates, but unexpectedly, she managed to calm the monster prince with an unforeseen ability and began to live with him...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I’m in Love with My Foe
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: In This Life, I Won’t Live as My Twin Sister’s Shadow
description:
Only on the verge of death did I realize I'd been deceived my entire life by my perfect twin sister. Shocked by the betrayal, I wished I could just close my eyes... but when I opened my eyes, I was back in my childhood!? 

I had to pretend to be a princess with my sister without letting her know I was a twin! Now that I'm back, I won't just live like in my past life, being taken advantage of by my sister. The relationship with my family I'd longed for, the friendships I had with my friends, the healing power I hadn't realized in my past life. I'll make then all mine! 

Then, by chance, I met the talking bird, Yan. He told me that if I didn't protect him, the kingdon would fall. 

What did he mean? Will I be able to survive?
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: As Leticia Wishes
description: Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as "Leticia" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Nippon Sangoku
description: In the near future, after the collapse of civilization, a young man stands up to reunite Japan, which has once again become a warring nation. His name is Seiki Sankaku. He was later described as a military genius, and now his legend begins!
tags: Action, Psychological, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Kakeru
description: When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough, he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush, Natsume, disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.
tags: Thriller, Crime, Sexual Violence, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Humans and demihumans live together in peace, and in this world, there's a normal human named Hironori Tabata. One day, an angel named Suzuki Lina went out to find him and said she wants to have sex with him... the reason—? The Demon King will be resurrected in the future and Tabata's son will be the hero that will fight and defeat him.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Gyaru

name: Ore no Zensei no Chishiki de Teihen Shoku Tamer ga Joukyuu Shoku ni Natte Shimai Sou na Ken
description:
Due to an accident, the protagonist Varius died and was reincarnated. He was shocked to find in this new world, his former job as a Tamer in the previous world was acknowledged as a low class job in this new world. Utilizing his knowledge from his previous life as a basis, he then applied unique buffs to his beasts, taking back the ultimate power that he once possessed. With this power in his hands, he sought to start his life as an adventurer. However...
___
[Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7251fq/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ishuzoku Reviewers
description: In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste... Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, showing us that their fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru
description:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, School Life, Monster Girls

name: ChäoS;HEAd - Blue Complex
description:
Takumi is a high school student. He is withdrawn and is not interested in 3D things. In his town, a mysterious serial murder case happens and people get panicked. One day, when he chats on the internet, a man suddenly contacts him and gives him an URL. He goes to the website and finds a blog image that suggests a next murder case… On the next day, it really happens…  
  
Takumi Nishijo suffers from intense delusions as a result of his apparent schizophrenia and the extremely secluded lifestyle he lives as a hikkikomori. One day he accidentally stumbles upon a gruesome murder scene, a part of a chain of events called "New Generation." After this, his life gets caught up in these events, and he meets a bunch of increasingly insane anime girls with swords.
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Harem, Mystery

name: Not found
description: A man who was once called the world's strongest agent ended up becoming a teacher after his retirement, to train a new generation of agents. After many years of training his disciples, he was killed at the age of 60 by a secret organization's ruse and was reincarnated in another world with his memories intact. Though he was surprised by the existence of magic and the strange species in that world, he quickly adapted to his condition as a newborn and took advantage of it. He acquired special magic and gained a massive amount of strength thanks to his rigorous discipline, in order to reach his goal: Resume his career as a teacher which he left halfway through in his previous life.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: To conquer the dungeons that suddenly appeared on Earth a hundred years ago, students now attend academies to train as adventurers. Among them are two rivals: the academy’s strongest delinquent, Sainokami Kuroto, and the elite noble honor student, Mononobe Yukihime. One day, the two of them find themselves trapped in a dungeon… inside a room that they can’t escape unless they hold hands!? Will these sworn rivals be able to clear this high-difficulty mission and conquer the dungeon—!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Adaptation

name: Goth Girl & The Jock
description: An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler, as they go through their high school life, sitting next to each other in class!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Night Bus
description:
A young man's introspection on love and life experience.

An uncollected one-shot not present in any of Kimura's tankobon.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Supernatural

name: From Monday to Weekend
description:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Nibanme no Unmei
description:
Kyouka, an office lady, has fallen for her coworker Wataru. But there’s a twist. He’s haunted by the ghost of his ex-girlfriend, Madoka! Determined to clear the way for their romance, Kyouka tries to exorcise Madoka, who keeps interfering with their relationship…!?

A heartwarming love story about a complicated love triangle with a ghostly ex, created by a promising newcomer from Jump’s Manga School!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Aisai no Ura Aka
description: When Sousuke Yamada stumbles upon a shocking video online, his life is shattered. A woman who looks exactly like his wife is caught in an intimate act, filmed in their daughter's elementary school classroom. Is it really her? Who is this other man? Just how will Sousuke uncover the culprit hiding among the PTA's members?
tags: Romance, Drama, Mystery

name: Love Gives Me Superpowers
description: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Daily Life of a Couple in Which the Boyfriend Became a Girl One Day
description: A couple's daily life as they adjust to the boyfriend turning into a girl.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!? It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world. However, as a final condition he is asked "Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left," and he is shocked by what he sees.

"Okay, I'll do it! I'll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!"
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu
description:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Fantasy

name: Mayuri-san no Iru Sentou
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Dungeon Odyssey
description:
When the war between the aboveground and underground ended, humanity was joined by so-called "dungeon babies," those gifted with supernatural abilities and an obsession with the labyrinths below ground. 

Despite being a dungeon baby, Kim Jinwoo suppressed his instincts, choosing to live an ordinary life as a guide and caring for his family. 

But when an expedition goes wrong and he somehow ends up becoming the new owner of a labyrinth, he discovers that he cannot ignore his instincts forever...
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dorei Senshi no Isekai Taneuma Seikatsu ~Mahou mo Bujutsu mo Saikyou Dashi Harem made!?~
description: "Ryuu" is a former modern human reincarnated in another world. He is a slave in this new world. However, once the knowledge of his previous life was revived, his magic power is also awakened. He gained strength at a speed that was incomparable to other slaves, and he easily defeated strong opponents, becoming the strongest gladiator among slaves. Ryuu is bought by the noble Juller. The Juller Family, who saw slaves as power, wanted to own a great slave. The first instruction given to Ryuu as a slave was to "seed" a beautiful female slave...! I'm a Slaves but super free!

She suddenly pins him against the wall! She also started saying, "Give me a month, and I'll make you fall in love with me... I'm not going to let you go so easily!"

That sight was burned into his young heart, an image that would never fade. Years later, people tell him it was just an illusion, a trick of his childhood mind. He refuses to accept it. Because if "growing up" means forgetting... he'd rather never become an adult at all.

name: Not found
description:
The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  
  
As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  
  
Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  
  
Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

description:
Love, friendship, and a glorious adolescence—that’s what Hodoka Nanamura hoped for when he entered high school. But by his final year, he had none of it. Then, on the eve of graduation,  he sacrifices himself to save his classmate, Sora Hanamitsuji, from on oncoming truck, ending his life… Or so it should have.

Instead, he and Hanamitsuji were both transported back in time to their first year of high school, just before the entrance ceremony. Though Nanamura resigned himself to reliving the same unremarkable, lonely high school years, Hanamitsuji swears that she’ll drag him out of his loner lifestyle!

With a second chance at high school, Nanamura gets to experience the best (and worst) coming-of-age romcom of his life!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*

description: Souichi Negishi is a common boy, timid, quiet. He loves flowers, walkings and musical hits like the ones that radios play. But he is also Krauzer II, leader of Detroy Metal City (DMC), the most popular underground metal band of Japan! Souichi would like to change his life and start to play Swedish pop songs with peaceful and loving lyrics instead of the violent and vulgar ones of DMC, but when he is playing with his band he completely changes his attitude and behaviour…

name: Saikyou Juzoku Tensei ~Majutsu Otaku no Risoukyou~
description:
I, who should have died after being hit by a car, was born again in another world. However, I was born in a shady minor family that used magic and controlled wooden puppets called the Marren Clan. Possessing a strong interest in magic since my previous life, I spend my time zealously studying magic to the point where even the people in the vicinity draw back. One day, I heard I was to be married to my little sister when I turned 16 in accordance with the traditions of the Marren Clan and decided to flee to the city. For now, since I have the strongest magic, I guess I should idle around making only enough money so that I don’t have to work for my whole life.

**Title Note:** When the manga first released, it was under the same title as the light novel, *Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation ~The Cheat Magician's Slow Life~*. However, by Volume 1's release, the subtitle was changed, making the new full title: *Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation ~A Magic Geek's Utopia~*.

**Character Design:** [Mika Pikazo](https://mangadex.org/author/3dff91ba-165f-4742-b84b-de97a31b1060/mika-pikazo)

Under Lisellia's care, Leonis is shocked to see that the world has completely changed. Bewildered and confused, Leonis finds himself enrolling at the Holy Sword Academy.

She was banished to the frontier. Rescued from her desperate plight was Gilbert, the terrifyingly handsome commander of the knights, nicknamed the “Demon Wolf Knight.”
As she encountered the sincere kindness hidden within him, Elise—once known as the “Ice Maiden”—gradually began to heal, her heart sweetly melting away...

The fate of this love story, born from a flight into exile—the ultimate dramatic romance begins.

name: Watashi no Kokoro wa Oji-san de Aru
description: With no friends, family, or romance to speak of, Haruka has lived his life just going through the motions—until the day he awakens in the body of a beautiful, and womanly, dark elf! Suddenly, a world beyond his wildest imagination awaits, and uncontainable excitement races through him. There's just one problem: He gave up on putting himself out there a long time ago and has no idea how to strike up a conversation with other people. Teenagers and (other) women are certainly no exception. But with a bottomless well of mana and a ridiculously tough body to boot, Haruka won't let any overthinking get in the way this time. Little by little, the dark elf works past his (her) fears and self-doubt, forging deep bonds with precious new friends and growing together with them.

name: Ushiro no Seki no Gal ni Sukarete Shimatta. - Mou Ore wa Dame kamo Shirenai.
description:
What if you find the cutest girl in your class, soaked in ditch? Sandai helped her... and his life changed from that day!

A high-school boy Sandai, who liked to spend his time alone, accidentally helped the most beautiful girl in his class, Shino, when she fell into a ditch near his home. He let her use shower at his home, and lend her some clothes, although he had never talked with her before.

From that day, she started to act like his friend. In fact, she seems to like him... but that can't be! She's the most popular babe in his high school! But what he didn't know was, Shino had never went out with a guy. She was not very good with guys, and Sandai was the first guy she could talk naturally with. As they spend time together, Sandai can't help himself to have special feelings for Shino.

(Source: BookWalker Global)

Alice, a girl in black, confronts these malevolent spirits as a Funeral Spiritist, facing foes against whom no weapon or magic can prevail. With lost memories, twisted love and hatred, and complexly entangled schemes, the mysteries deepen. As she guides lost souls to their rest, Alice continues to traverse the “Gap” each day.

 A gothic fantasy begins, where a maiden in black exorcises the wandering dead.

But one day, Leet decides enough is enough, and he flees for a neighboring land where the talented rise up through the ranks instead of languishing in thankless, dead-end jobs. Under a new name, Lilt, he enrolls in a training and job placement program, and rapidly discovers that, easy as “wax on, wax off,” his butlering skills make him a valuable asset!

*Source: Kodansha Comics, Vol. 1*

With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline.

He's giant, uncouth, and couldn't be more different than her sweet angel and childhood friend, Takuto. But when Abe-kun injures his arm protecting her, she takes it upon herself to get him healed—after all, the school's pride is at stake—but finds the tables suddenly turned when he confesses to her! Now she's the goal he's aiming for, and she'll soon find out how driven a national champion can be!

I don't trust any human being.

An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.

Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

name: Not found
description:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. "Skills" exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with 
"Noblesse oblige." When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, "Noblesse oblige" is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces! Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that "Noblesse oblige" can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine!
tags: Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shaman King: The Super Star
description:
Do you know what a shaman is?　It's said that they have the mysterious ability to connect this world with the other world and communicate with gods, spirits, and spirits of the dead. The third generation shaman, Anna, a.k.a. Aluminum Nium Birch, is searching for a super class spirit to win the proxy war of the gods. The story intersects as the beautiful stars gather in Nagano, followed by Aluminum, Death Zero, and Hana.

___
*Continuing after the events of Shaman King Flowers, the group of "Super Stars" will join together and spin together a new legend…*
  
**Officially licensed:**  
- In Taiwan by [Tongli](https://www.tongli.com.tw/BooksDetail.aspx?Bd=KD1554001) as "通靈童子THE SUPER STAR"  
- In Thailand by Siam Inter Comics
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowai Sugirundaga~
description:
Haruyoshi Kuga's power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars! He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can't use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn't need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

At a rural junior high school, a man and a woman vowed an eternal friendship. The relationship between the two who became a fateful community toward one dream-two years have passed without any particular progress...! Yuu Natsume, a flower-loving plant boy, and Inuzuka Himari, a girl who hasn't been in love for the first time yet, have been peacefully close friends in the gardening club with only two of them.
___
**Links:**

tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Genjitsushugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki
description:
"O, Hero!"

With that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure - did not begin. 

After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! 

In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! 

What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Promise Isn't Mine
description:
"Kill me, as you promised." 

When her twin sister Leyla, the Holy Maiden, suddenly disappears one day, the ordinary Elena finds herself having to marry Crown Prince Kyle, a man infamous for his ruthlessness, in her stead. After a dreadful marriage ceremony, Kyle demands that a certain promise be fulfilled, to Elena’s confusion.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color

name: Banquet With Deer Crying
description: Inside this house of splendor, human desire runs wild, and justice is almost nonexistent. Courtesan Su You receives a visitor, who offers a large sum to buy her freedom, and even claims that she knows the future, hoping that Su You will lend her a hand and save the world.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: The peaceful and uneventful life of Shonan surfer Uba Kazuomi begins to change little by little with the appearance of Sannomaru, who is the spitting image of Kazuomi. A suspense story of love and hate!
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Sports, Mystery

name: Mahou Shoujo × Haiboku Saiban
description: In this world, Magical Girls are the only ones who can fight the "monsters," the invaders from another realm. They must be courageous, inspire hope in people, and above all, they must never be defeated! However, some girls crumble under this heavy responsibility and lose to the monsters, tarnishing the name of Magical Girls. In the courtroom of the "Defeat Trial," their disgrace is exposed, and they face severe punishment. To save these unfortunate girls, the rookie magical lawyer, Misago Yuuri, rushes to their aid!
tags: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Magical Girls, Sexual Violence, Magic, Supernatural

name: Only Sense Online
description: Utilizing a system called "Sense," each player aims to create their unique character in the VRMMORPG "Only Sense Online." Joining this realm is Yun, an absolute beginner in the world of gaming, equipped with some of the worst customized "Sense" ever. While his two sisters, both veterans in this world, criticize his choices of equipment, he continues to delve into the skill sets he has acquired. Along his way, he meets the art of "production" and people that have mastered this art. Watch as a total novice creates a revolution in the gaming world and create the "ultimate" support class.
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I, a Harvest Mouse, Will Take Cinderella Away
description:
After marrying the prince, Cinderella’s “happily ever after” ends when he falls for another woman and proposes to her. A small, powerless field mouse, who dearly loves Cinderella, wishes she could smile again. Mysteriously, the mouse dies and wakes up in the past, when Cinderella was still mistreated by her stepfamily. Then comes a twist: the mouse isn’t ordinary, but a noble beastman from the prestigious Field Mouse clan. With her true identity revealed, she decides to run away with Cinderella — before the prince and his glass slipper ever show up.

---
Cinderella married the prince. But she never thought that her vow of eternal love would end in just 10 years. The prince fell in love with a certain young lady at first sight, made her his mistress, and even proposed to her. 'Damn!' But she couldn't do anything for Cinderella, who was withering away day by day. Because I was, "Click!" a mouse! And the smallest of all mice, the lowest in the hierarchy, a field mouse. 'Fairy grandmother. I'm just a disgusting mouse. Cinderella was the one who embraced me. What I wish for is... '... I wish Cinderella could smile again.' I thought I died. When I woke up again, I was back in time. Back to Cinderella's childhood when she was being abused by her stepmother and older sisters. 

"I came here on the request of the Ratson family."

But I wasn't really an ordinary mouse, but a beastkin of the field mouse family? My family was desperately looking for me? Then, Cinderella, run away with me! Prince, I'll take her away before you come looking for her with that glass slipper!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The story will combine the legend of a demon king with a hero who crosses over time and other things. The comedy will involve traveling between a Japanese living room and another world.
___

- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/42960)

name: Not found
description: A pro player suddenly finds himself transported into a game, inhabiting their own max-level priestess character. Now, he teams up with a dragon-maid girl, embarking on a journey in a different world! But wait... Why are all these ladies looking at her so strangely?
tags: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Detective Conan: Chianti's Last Supper
description: A one-shot about the eponymous sniper of the Black Organization, written by Gosho Aoyama and illustrated by Boichi.
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Action

name: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend
description:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

description: Not found

name: Not found
description: A year ago, Matsuyama Katsuhiko's girlfriend Arumi quietly disappeared from his life. However, she suddenly returns to his home and creates a bizarre and erotic love triangle between him and his current girlfriend Yukino. But which one will he choose in the end?!
tags: Romance, Harem, Slice of Life

name: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa
description:
A salary man is quite depressed, especially on Mondays. At his lowest point a well-endowed High-School girl calling herself Ai-chan stumbles breast-first into his face. The concussion she gave him served as the start of their relationship.
___
**Notes**:
 - This page refers to the Twitter manga's official serialization, which began in Weekly Young Magazine on November 16, 2020.
 - For the separate Blue Edition for the serialization, click [here](https://mangadex.org/title/f5818aee-080b-42b5-b717-b1dae81f049c/getsuyoubi-no-tawawa-blue)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi
description:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…

Won 1st place in the 2018 Next Manga Awards Web Category.

name: Gakuen Babysitters
description: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Confession
description: A story between the handsome yet loving pilot Zhou Jingze and a gentle yet dependable doctor, Xu Sui. Summer has always been warm, so is the boy I love. Stay tune to see the undying love of the "infatuated playboy" Zhou Jingze.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Medical, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Baby Shachuuhackers
description:
“School is a bit suffocating.”
16-year-old high school girl Yonagi Fuji lives and sleeps in her car, but only in the backyard of her house because she doesn't have a driver's license. She wants to sleep in her car wherever she likes. Then, she meets a cheery girl from the same school who has a driver's license, Ichinose Asahi?

A story that, if you read it, you'll definitely want to sleep in your car!? The curtain opens on a new and exciting high school girl × car-sleeping hobby life manga!!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Shinkon dakedo Kataomoi
description: A seemingly perfect looking newlywed couple but the affection is one-sided.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: Shinoi Aina hates her coworker, Tsutsuhara emi, who she believes is using an act to get people to like her. And after hearing she likes girls and an embarrassing situation. She creates a plan to get revenge
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic

name: Noppiki Naranu
description:
Seven years ago, Toraji met the most beautiful man he had ever seen.

The time they spent together was as passionate as it was brief, and the man disappeared among the multitudes of Edo, the shogunate's capital. Toraji never learned his real name, or address, or occupation - but he never gave up on finding him again.

Only, he didn't expect that when he did, the man would turn out to be the master of a high-class ryokan and restaurant, or that he would have a young daughter. How did this happen? Why did he run? Who is the child's mother and where is she?

And most of all, will Toraji get a second chance to pursue the one great love of his life?
tags: Historical, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Midori no Kaze ni Kimi wo Hiraku
description:
A house surrounded by lush, overgrown greenery, and a beautiful, but distant man - this is what the gardener Nishikigi finds at his new workplace. He's not sure what to make of the master of the house, Kuraoka, especially when he asks to observe him and his work for his new children's novel.

Nishikigi is only certain that the two of them are from different worlds and see everything differently - maybe even irreconcilably so. But just like the light and wind start to come in once he tames the overgrown garden, so love begins to flow into their hearts.

And thus, a slow and beautiful romance begins between two complete opposites.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Kuroki Kemono to Yoru no Hana
description: Shiga Azuma, a promising young leader of an underground organization, stops to buy flowers for his father's grave from the flower shop of the blind Anji Haruki. And he keeps coming back, drawn to Haruki's inner light and comforting presence - the complete opposite of his world. But their relationship unearths darkness, obsession and secrets on both sides, and threatens to destroy them both.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Mafia, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yoki Himo to Yoki Kainushi
description:
Melon is clumsy and bad at everything - he knows this much about himself, and he's never let it bother him.

What does bother him, though, is that he has no money, no place to stay, he's quit school, he's hungry, he's in a city he doesn't know well, and it's raining...

And yet, he meets someone who's having an even worse day than him, one Kawai-san, who wastes no time in inviting him up to his apartment for a hot meal and sex.

Melon decides on the spot that he'll be Kawai-san's kept boy! Why not? Kawai-san is rich, and Melon, as it turns out, likes sex with men. But are things between them really that simple...?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Cooking

name: Super God Card Maker
description:
While everyone else has some sort of blessing or gift when they get transported to another world, LuMing seems to have been given a body of a crossdressing salesman in deep loanshark debt. Originally LuMing was already an overworked programmer, a shitty life it was already.

He now lives in a world where people have abilities that make up professions! As a cardmaker he falls deep into thought. If the working mechanics behind cardmaking is similar to programming in his old world, wouldn't he be ridiculously overpowered? In theory, couldn't he just compress the entire world or realms within a card?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Servamp
description: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Sense Life
description:
Noah is a quiet boy looking for a meaning in his life, his days will disappear after he meets Kaleb, a drug user who has a big bounty on his head.

---
[Catarse](https://www.catarse.me/sense_life_7bfc#about)
[AMV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mEBSDpToOpA)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: The strongest female delinquent in history, Kongou Basara. Undefeated in fights! Always covered in blood spatter! She who laughs with excitement was called 'Berserker'! For some reason, she keeps following around Yuuki Seigi. A violent and erotic romantic comedy featuring her appearing daily saying 'Let's play!' and Seigi!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Gore, Delinquents

name: Not found
description:
"Your lunch, Shimoya-san? Pathetic~!"

Poor high school girl Hinako Shimoya lives in poverty and is left all alone in class because of it. But when the ultra-rich heiress Okumi Kanamori takes a bite of Hinako's homemade lunch, her delighted cry of "This is my first time~!" echoes through the room. A clash of poverty and privilege— as the two girls share more and more "first times" together, a friendship that money can't buy begins to blossom in this offbeat school comedy.

Source: Comipo (Translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Digimon Paradox
description: Reiji is a high school student who was saved by a Digimon, a biological weapon from the future... A battle that transcends time and space is about to begin!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure

name: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai Shitai ~Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu~
description:
The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger. "Lets be treasure hunters," said Cry Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest... but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent. But that was only the beginning of his adventure.  
  
"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."  
"Rest assured, Cry. We'll protect you!"  
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"

Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures. Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter?
___
[Alt Official English](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/276659/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Ikusei Skill wa Mou Iranai to Yuusha Party o Kaiko Sareta no de, Taishokukin-gawari ni Moratta "Ryouchi" o Tsuyoku Shite Miru
description: It feels like I (27 y/o) who specialized in [Training] skill was no longer necessary for the Hero's party which had grown stronger to a certain degree. At first, I was the center of the party but in the end, the hero dismissed me from the party. However, because I had "Made a great contribution to the party until now," I received a small Fief instead of retirement money. With my heart feeling the loneliness of leaving the adventures frontline and after seeing the seven villages with their 2500 population of my territory, I had the following thought, "I wonder if I train these people, won't my territory become strong enough that could even defeat the demon lord?"
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description:
Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.  
Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.  
So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.  

----
Alternative English: [MANGA Plus](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009)
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Care for Something Sweet?
description: Wheat, a young man with a passion for making sweets, starts working in a kitchen in a strange world full of magic! The treats may be a little quirky, but they're cute and oh so delicious! Thus begins a soothing café tale.
tags: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
