tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Purgator Of Perdition
description: Purgator of Perdition follows the journey of Lucas Graham — a man trapped between a sinful past and a present full of danger. He wakes up in Mortalis, a brutal and unfamiliar land plagued by bloodthirsty creatures, madness, curses, and shadowy forces lurking at every turn. With no memory of how he got there, Lucas is forced to confront the ghosts of his past while struggling to survive in a world that seems determined to destroy him...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~Akuma no Niidzuma~
description:
Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish. 
He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind, to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand to join in his future adventures together.
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Out
description: 17-year-old Iguchi Tatsuya has just been released from juvenile detention and is on probation. He's been relocated to a new area, away from the bad influence of his old friends, and is under the care of his aunt. He is determined not to be sent back to lockup, and he works hard in his aunt's restaurant. However, he still has the same personality, the same tendency to violence, and still falls in with the same sort of people. It's going to be difficult for him to stay out of trouble.
tags: Action, Gore, Drama, Delinquents

name: Yarikonda Renai Game no Akuyaku ni Tensei shitanode, Gensaku Chishiki de Heroine wo Kouryaku shimasu
description: I, Yuuto Hatano, love the bishoujo game "Houkago no Flare Story" and have played it over and over again. I thought, "If the world were like this, going to school would be fun..." Then, when I woke up the next day… I had entered the game world! And not as the protagonist, but as the villain, Kanji Aku! I had hoped to do all sorts of things with the heroines I admired, but as a villain, their affection for me was at rock bottom. With this, conquering them is nothing but a dream within a dream... Moreover, if I choose the wrong option, what awaits me is death!! As a villain with the lowest stats and lowest affection level, I must overcome deadly choices, conquer the heroines, and escape this world—Go, Kanji Aku!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Isekai, School Life, Delinquents, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!
tags: Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Tensai Bishoujo Sanshimai wa Isourou ni Dake Choro Kawaii
description:
An ordinary boy and a trio of geniuses under one roof — a slapstick harem romcom packed with MAX-level cuteness!

“…Will you come to my place?”

After suddenly losing his home in a fire, Riku ends up living as a house guest at the home of the Tennousu sisters — admired beauties blessed with both looks and talent.

Seeing their house in shambles due to their disastrous lack of life skills, Riku decides to use his household talents to support them!?

The geniuses slowly find themselves drawn to Riku, who is earnest and always considerate of others…
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Arase Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arase doesn't realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kimi no Negai ga Kanau made
description:
For his high school debut, Minto Shishidou pretended to be an outgoing playboy, spinning lies about the girlfriends he goes through. This corner he backed himself into weighs heavily on his mind when he joins a school trip, and he’s determined to use the occasion to get a girlfriend for real.
But then an unimaginable incident strikes him and his classmates, setting the stage for a locked-room love comedy centered around the wishes of these boys and girls.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Sakura Kouzuki, a top-tier gyaru who's the star of the class and even works as a reader model, and Houri Kazami, who prefers talking otaku stuff with his comrades in the corner of the classroom. These two, who seem to live in completely different worlds, are actually step-siblings—and secretly live together as a couple. And none of their classmates know the truth. While Sakura sparkles at school, once she's home she relaxes completely and falls head over heels for Ori's cooking. And Houri, who’s in charge of meals, doesn’t mind one bit—— “The simmered fish is so good!” “As expected, your cooking is the best, Brother!” A sweet and fluffy feeding story about a cute gyaru and their double life at school and at home!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: The once-famous chuunibyou idol "Nightmare of Calamity"—nicknamed Mea—had taken the world by storm. Reo, who used to take photos with her and post them online to make them go viral, unexpectedly reunites with her at his new high school. However, she has already graduated from her chuunibyou phase and now goes by Kanagi Nagi, the socially awkward, introverted class representative! On top of that, due to certain circumstances, Nagi is aiming to become student council president and asks Reo for help, pulling him back into producing her once again...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: 10-Nen Buri ni Saikai shita Kusogaki wa Seijun Bishoujo JK ni Seichou shiteita
description: Yuu Arizuki returned to his hometown after quitting his job at an exploitative company in Tokyo. Just as he was getting ready to start a new life back home, he met a beautiful and innocent high school girl, who turned out to be Haruyama Miya, one of the little girls (brats) Isamu used to play with when he was young. But Isamu didn't recognize her because of how much she had changed after growing up...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree
description:
Aseo, a poor, Tarnished wretch, finds himself cast out into Limgrave—naked, penniless, hopeless, and maidenless. His only hope in his harsh, unforgiving new home is a mysterious woman named Melina. She urges him to follow the guidance of grace to the Erdtree that looms over the Lands Between. But it won't be an easy road; a cast of colorful characters awaits Aseo along the way—Patches the Untethered, Blaidd the Half-Wolf, Margit the Fell Omen, Godrick the Grafted, and of course, Ranni the Witch... With little but a loincloth between Aseo and certain death, he strikes out for the first stop on his quest: Stormveil Castle. Will he make it there, or will his journey end before it even begins?
___
**Note:** Aside from the original Japanese, this series is being digitally simulpubbed in English, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Latin American Spanish, and Thai. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310))
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/elden-ring-the-road-to-the-erdtree)
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Drama, Slice of Life

name: A Boy Who Satisfies His Need for Approval Through a Crossdressing Account
description: Not found
tags: Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Maseki Gourmet - Mamono no Chikara wo Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!
description:
A reincarnated boy with a secret skill aims to become the great king!

Ein reincarnated as a noble with the skill "Toxin Decomposition EX". The skill was not something he wanted, so he was disappointed... but then learns that he has a very rare talent to absorb magic power by eating magic stones. They even taste good! He then found out that his real identity was a prince of the largest kingdom of the continent. He was luckier than he thought!

(Source: BookWalker Global)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bungou Stray Dogs: Wan!
description: Spin-off series about the everyday life of the members of the Armed Detective Agency and the Port Mafia.
tags: Action, Comedy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Cats and Sugar Bowls
description: A collection of different oneshots from Yukiko with different themes. The tagline was "not your everyday yuri stories".
tags: Romance, Anthology, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Subarashiki Hibi - where happiness lives+
description: A remake of Subarashiki Hibi doujinshi (where happiness lives) created by the original character designer Motoyon with additional content.
tags: Romance, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to
description: Nonoa, an elf who works as an assistant to a researcher at the Imperial Geographical Survey Institute, rides a motorcycle with her partner Kago to investigate the roads along the local roads where demons and monsters roam, which have changed dramatically. She was working to update the maps. Nonoa takes a bath in a spring to rest, but what appears before her...?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Because I'm Super Lucky, I Got a Second Chance at Life
description:
Yukito Takahashi, a G-rank adventurer, has spent decades being mocked as useless because no matter how much he leveled up, his stats never improved. Even as he grew older, he dreamed of being young again and stronger, but he died during an adventure without ever getting better.

However, after his death, something unbelievable happened—a mysterious message appeared:
"A critical bug in the status system has been found. Your life will be rolled back."

With that, Yukito was sent back to his younger self, but this time, all his stats were maxed out at 9999! Now with godlike powers, Yukito can live the life he always dreamed of.

This is not your typical story of an unlucky protagonist—it's a tale of ultimate luck and overwhelming power! Get ready for a thrilling adventure where luck changes everything!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

tags: Genderswap, Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life

name: "Sono Hen no Kusa demo Kuttoke" to Tsuihou Sareta Munou Skill [Shokubutsugui] Mochi Tenseisha, Elf no Sato de Maboroshi no Shokubutsu wo Tabete Musou Suru
description: "Just go and eat some of that grass over there," was what Aki, a reincarnated person, was told when he was banished from the Viscount Guinas Household because of his useless skill, [Plant Eater].  However to Aki, being banished was an opportunity for him to break free from the constrained life of a noble and enjoy his second chance at life.  "Your stats have been drastically increased.", "Skill [Absorption] has been acquired."  Aki's skill which should've 'only' allowed him to eat any vegetation, truly manifested after he ate various mythical plants, including a leaf from the World Tree itself.  By using his skills, he became a legendary existence sought after by the whole country. After saving the elf girl Saras, he became the only human to gain the elves' trust. Brushing aside the nobles, royalty, and other people in power who wanted a connection with the elves, he became an existence that could represent the entire continent.  As for the Guinas family and Aki's younger brothers who banished him, it became difficult for them to get a connection with the elves, and what's more is that they  got themselves into a nasty predicament, but...
tags: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: A yakuza who was supposed to be dead suddenly reincarnates as a pregnant woman just about to give birth! Now a single mother with the spirit of a hardened gangster, he faces the challenges of parenting for the first time. This is a hilarious yet touching manga that takes readers through the ups and downs of raising a child in the chaotic world of yakuza, with plenty of unexpected charm and humor.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Three years ago**, Gu Nian and Fu Jingshen **split on bad terms** over a misunderstanding. Concealing the truth, she fled to Seattle to study abroad. **Now**, with the Gu family in crisis, Gu Nian has no choice but to **spend a night with Fu Jingshen** and force him into marriage to save her family.  

As they reconnect, **past sweetness clashes with present misunderstandings**, pulling them back into a whirlwind of uncertainty.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
This is the story of a busty girlfriend who wears tights and is impatient to get cozy with her senior boyfriend whenever she wants.

Separate entry with the Fanbox extras.
tags: Romance, Web Comic

name: My Ex-Husband Wants to Remarry Again
description: Ye Linghan’s wish to remarry his ex-husband, Ji Ran, turned the latter from an Alpha to an Omega. Despite enduring the physical changes and the pain of rejection, Ji Ran also endured Ye Linghan’s repeated hurtful behavior. When Ye Linghan finally divorced him, Ji Ran was left heartbroken. As for Ye Linghan, he got what he wanted, but upon looking at the empty villa, he suddenly came to his senses.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: I Just Want to Game in Peace
description: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking their lives, I’m here getting stronger by gaming.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ikenai! Runa-sensei R
description:
The legendary manga is reborn with new art! Wataru, a lazy high school student, is visited by the earnest and slightly airheaded teacher, Runa-sensei! So that Wataru can become a respectable adult, she gently starts giving him naughty private lessons!

(Source: Comic-Days)
___
**Note:** This is a remake of the 1986 original "Ikenai! Runa-sensei" manga
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Tsuma no Nakami wa Kodomo no Mama Datta no de Aru.
description: I live a pure and simple newlywed life. But, if I had to name one problem... It'd be that my wife is still a child inside! She doesn't know anything about what happens in the bedroom! We are still a couple but I can't force myself on her. I really don't know how to convey my feelings to her either... Oh, my god. Everything's jiggling! My pure, naive wife's driving me crazy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Otis
description:
Lee Si-an is a woman who was cursed to die in May, the month when her entire family was massacred.

Perhaps it was fate. Or perhaps it was a bad relationship.

Tae Go-on, is a dangerous man who promises to save her. His boiling possessiveness was focused solely on her.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends
description: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Reverse Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kaijin Reijou
description:
Asuma Sudou has always been a proud pervert, but he's sworn to give that up to chase the girl of his dreams. Having received a special invitation to enter the same all-girls school as her, he's planning to live his romantic youth to the fullest. But those plans are cut short when it turns out the school is a front for a secret organization dedicated to battling kaijin-monsters created when people succumb to their murderous impulses! The girls of the school fight using the relics of defeated kaijin, but when the bloodthirsty instincts sealed within threaten to overwhelm them, Asuma is the only one who can bring them back to their senses!

(From: Yen Press)
tags: Action, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: It's the Golden Week, and Morizono Yuuta can't wait to spend the next 11 days staying home and conquering all of his games and manga. After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Steins;Gate - Hiyoku Renri + Nyan² Crisis ☆
description: Adapted from the Faris route of Steins;Gate Hiyoku Renri no Darling.

name: Menhera Usagi wa Yandere Ookami ni Dekiaisareru
description: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama

name: "Koko wa Makasete Sakini Ike!" wo shitai Shinitagari no Nozomanu Uchuu Gekokujou
description:
Nao has had it rough. His girlfriend dumped him and ran off with another man, and now his life has lost all meaning. As he contemplates suicide, he catches sight of an advertisement for Space Force—a military force dedicated to protecting the planet from extraterrestrial threats. Finally, a sign that maybe he can do more with his pathetic existence!

Without a moment's hesitation, he joins the force with a simple plan in mind: he'll sacrifice himself for his comrades after a suave line and be free. Except... Nao is too good at this job! Like, really good—there's no way he’ll die on his own at this rate! Can Nao find his sweet release, or will he become a hero and have to live with it?
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Military, Adaptation

name: Ano Oni Kyoushi ga Boku no Ane ni Narundesuka?
description: A boy is initially overjoyed at the news of him having an older sister, due to his father remarrying to a woman who has a daughter. That is, until he finds out that his new sister is actually his school's strict PE teacher, Shina. With his father going off to live with his new wife, the boy will live alone with his new sister. In their new life together, the boy finds out that Shina at home is completely different from Shina at work: clumsy, scared of insects, and kind.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Hotokesama Kara Ecchi Item wo Morau
description:
Thanks to Buddha... you can do all the pervy shit you want!

A Buddha suddenly appears in some guy's dream.
And it looks like he's handing out some items...

1. A potion that lets you become a pair of undies for a day.
2. A wall ass summoning machine. 
3. Butter that you have to lick the moment you see it.

These were just some of the miraculous items that made all kinds of naughty things possible!

A shameless and outrageous gag manga that's blowing up on social media is getting its highly anticipated book release, complete with a brand new, exclusive chapter!
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: Kimi Wo Hitori Ni Shite Agenai
description:
*"I won't let you be alone."*

Chigusa, who struggles to express herself, ends up building walls between herself and other people. She's always alone at school, until one day a stunningly beautiful boy transfers to her school. To Chigusa's surprise, the boy turns out to be Iroha, the only person she ever considered a friend in her childhood. Iroha tells her that he changed schools just to see her. He effortlessly crosses the walls Chigusa has built around her, steadily closing the distance between them.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Sahoko Quest: Inkya Joshi, Shinshi Muke Doujin RPG Sekai de Yuusha ni Naru
description: Due to overwhelming popularity, it's now a full serialization! A shy, self-doubting girl is transported to a world that looks strangely familiar... and way too erotic!? In a world ruled by sex battles, her goal is to clear it while staying a virgin! From Toshinori Takayama, the creator of i・Shoujo, comes a new isekai pleasure fantasy!
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
A "what-if" alternate history in which the Japanese Self-Defense Forces (JSDF) fight a desperate struggle 
against the Soviet Union after it launches a surprise invasion on Japan during post-Cold War tensions.


*This is the original story ("Tokyo Wars") as published in 1991, not the 2008 "Raid on Tokyo" re-release, 
though there are few differences to note other than the title.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Military, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Fed-Up Office Lady Wants to Serve the Villainess
description:
A heart-pounding reemployment(!?) story between a fed-up corporate slave and a cold, callous, villainess!

Three years after graduating college, Natori Midori, who once idealized the "grown-up adults" she saw as a child, is working hard at her job as a temporary employee. However, one day, her contract is suddenly terminated for an absurd reason. As she sits there, wondering if there would ever be a workplace for her to devote herself to, her phone flashes and she finds herself in the world of the novel RPG she was playing. And before her eyes is the villainess, Lapis Tenebrae, who betrayed the heroine and committed countless atrocities before losing her life!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60556)
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Video Games, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Behind the Scenes
description: In a grand annual production secretly funded by the mafia, washed-up actor Lu Huaming is unexpectedly cast as the second male lead, alongside the wildly popular actor, Lu Zuo. However, filming delays test everyone's patience, especially that of Long Xiaoyue—the project’s supervisor and mafia boss's son. Frustrated by Huaming’s lackluster acting performance, Long Xiaoyue quickly becomes hostile toward him. Yet, as their interactions deepen, Long Xiaoyue begins to suspect that Huaming is carrying a hidden and painful burden.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Will you be able to resist her charm? This demon girl will confuse you and hit straight to the heart!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Egao no Taenai Shokuba desu.
description: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness!
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Omae ni Ore wa Dou Utsuru
description:
A society where humans and beastmen coexist—

Mizuki, a human police officer, fears beastmen due to “a certain past.”
But the new partner assigned to him is Ryo, a beastman.

Ryo's relentless, unapologetic closeness
keeps throwing the serious Mizuki off balance.

Despite their incompatible relationship, they're dispatched to a crime scene.
When Mizuki is saved by Ryo's beastman powers in a pinch... ?

Beastman × Human: An Uneven Love Action!
tags: Action, Animals, Boys' Love, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Police

name: Inochigake Dummy Romance
description:
"This guy's my lover."

Ryou quit his job after his girlfriend invited him to join a pyramid scheme.

One day, when he went to her home, he was worried about her and found a large number of Yakuza!

Ryou is in a desperate situation when he is suspected of being in league with his girlfriend, who has absconded with money belonging to the Daikoku clan, and is rescued by Miyoshi, a junior high school classmate who happens to be a member of the Daikoku clan.

The two end up living together as fake lovers until the situation cools down, but Miyoshi, who was supposed to be a good friend at the time, is quite cold toward Ryou...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Mount Celeb Kaneda-san
description: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!
tags: Comedy, School Life

name: Redo of Healer
description:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Loli, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: UTAKATA80s
description:
"Smartphones? SNS? Pixiv? Those things don't exist in the 80s!"

A man who is trapped and bound in the 80s, Hiroshi Utakata!

Dressed in a new suit, driving his imported car, and relaxing with his favourite cigarette...
What are his true intentions as he lives a unique lifestyle?

A message from the 80s to those in the 2000s who have lost something precious...
tags: Sci-Fi, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
The Animal Liberation Alliance, an eco-terrorist organization, rescues a pregnant chimpanzee from an animal testing lab—only for it to give birth to a half-human, half-chimpanzee "humanzee" named Charlie! Fifteen years later, Charlie's human foster parents are finally ready to send him to a normal high school, where he makes his first friend: a human girl named Lucy. In the meantime, however, the ALA's stance has become ever more extreme, and now they're here to drag Charlie into their terrorist plot...
___
Winner of the prestigious Manga Taisho, as well as an Excellence Award at the Japanese Media Arts Festival.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: In order to plunge the human world into a spiral of chaos, the demon girl Leopold descended on earth. The one she choose as her first target was a high school girl who seemed a bit dull. Her attack is a success, and Leopold laughs loudly. However, what Leo doesn't yet know is that this high school girl is the worst enemy of a demon...
tags: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Wild Half
description: This is a shounen manga about a senior named Taketo Iwase and a dog named Salsa. As they set off early on to resolve a problem with a criminal that Toshifumi (Taketo's brother) is having, Taketo sees that there is more to the dog (that can communicate in the human language) than meets the eye. Together they solve a number of troubles and also meet other different species (cat girls, dogs, birds, etc). The author clearly shows that she is capable of drawing dynamic illustrations, especially in the fighting scenes although it make look somewhat shoujo at times. Wild Half has some very funny gag lines, some moving plots, helpful morals, in short, a little bit of everything packaged into one.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai Drug ~Yakugaku Chishiki de Monster Musume-tachi wo Toriko ni shite Nariagaru~
description:
One day, Dr. Shiro, a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture, is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory. It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls! In this grim world, he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63813)
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Blue Lock Legions
description:
Rai Genji always dreamed of becoming a world-class professional football player, especially one to play for the Japanese team. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai learns time and time again that he needs to learn and improve beyond anything he thought was possible to survive. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he be doomed by the very people he stands with?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock spin-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

Blue Lock Legions stands independently from the original Blue Lock Manga, and is posted on Mangadex without any involvement in the websites views, beliefs, practices, or problematic norms. It is simply here as the website provides a proper layout for the series to be viewed.
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Sports, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic

name: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai no Majutsushi
description: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: There Are No Bad Warriors in This World
description:
Hyeonseok Choi finally becomes the undisputed heavyweight MMA champion of the world, but gets hit by a truck, and dies. 

A fairy, Rahel, appears and convinces him to fight as a hero in the afterlife, but accidentally sends him to the side of the demons. 

Stuck in the demon world, he sweet talks his way into positions of power, but slowly discovers this battle between good and evil isn't as clearcut as it seems.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: N
description:
My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N."

The case of five missing middle school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes.

An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is "N," a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago.

What exactly is "N"?
tags: Psychological, Crime, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Saikyou no Shounen Seikishi, Tenseisha o Karu
description:
The Reincarnated are beings that threaten to break the peace of the world. Blessed with the transcendent power of cheat-like skills, they rampage freely, doing as they please. 

A young boy, Rai Conwell, lost his family and everything he had when a reincarnated burned his village down. Drowning in despair, he swore vengeance, "I will never forgive the reincarnated." 

Years later, after undergoing relentless training, Rai becomes a Purge Knight, a warrior specialized in hunting down the reincarnated. With swordsmanship and physical prowess that surpass even their cheats, he completely overwhelms them.
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Shukufuku no Ceska
description: The small island republic of Nankan is home to the Makari Academy, a school governed by the whims of its richest students from the royalty of neighbouring nations.  Ceska, a genius polyglot and fanatical anthropologist, is asked to act as interpreter and chair for the squabbling members of this Council of Royals, particularly to prepare for the arrival of the first ever students from the Yaguu - those who cannot use magic, in a world where magical blessings called Lua are supposedly conveyed by the goddess Saryaa.  When the Yaguu - and their enigmatic crown prince Shiki - arrive in Nankan, tensions run high; when a tense Council meeting somehow ends with the disappearance of Lua from the entire world and a mysterious homogenisation of language, Ceska decides to investigate what is going on - as no-one is quite who they seem to be on Nankan...
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Genderswap

name: Flash of the Exorcising Blade: The Strongest Swordsman Pierces the Darkness
description:
Thirty years ago, fallen gods and fallen towers suddenly appeared across the land. Monsters poured forth from the fallen towers, destroying the world's peace. In response, all the gods above bestowed sacred weapons upon outstanding humans. Heroes who rose to reclaim peace by conquering the towers and purifying the fallen gods. Among them stood an unmatched warrior named Shotaro Kusunoki, wielder of the 'Exorcising Blade,' was hailed as one the Three Great Heroes.

Watching his brother's legendary feats from the sidelines was Hiromu Kusunoki, a lowly baggage carrier who longed to see the day peace returned. However, fate took a cruel turn when the fallen god Futsunushi possesses Shotaro's body, turning him into a vessel of darkness. On the brink of death, Hiromu hears a mysterious voice call out from the Exorcising Blade. That voice is Gayamaru, the mighty god sealed within the blade. To save his brother, the boy forms a pact with the mighty god, and together, they will climb to the peak of power and overcome darkness itself!

The curtains rise on a modern battle fantasy of gods, blades, and the bonds between brothers!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Kaede, an ordinary high school girl, suddenly wakes up in an unfamiliar alleyway—only to realize she's been transported to a mysterious world inhabited by beastmen, elves, and dragons. Among her belongings, she discovers a strange book that wasn't there before. To her surprise, it allows her to create potions simply by chanting the word "create." Relying on these potions to survive, Kaede navigates the challenges of this fantastical world while clinging to the hope of one day returning to Japan. Her journey of struggle and discovery in this otherworldly realm is just beginning...

(Source: Anilist)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Advanced Player of the Tutorial Tower
description: After being trapped for 12 years in a tower full of regenerating monsters, Hyeonu Kim is more powerful than just about any human or monster on Earth. Now that he’s free, he’s determined to find out who was behind his imprisonment, even if that means he has to kill hordes of monsters -- and inadvertently save the world -- along the way.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Home Coven
description: Cynthia is a carefree young witch. She lives peacefully with her mentor, Leander, hidden among humans in a small village. Their potion shop is their little corner of paradise, far from the conflicts between humans and sorcerers. However, murders are on the rise within the magical community, and the appearance of a mysterious agent is about to turn their world upside down.
tags: Ghosts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
description:
Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raws: [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004657_S?episodeType=first), [KADOKAWA](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/uzakichan/)
- [Official X](https://x.com/uzakichan_asobi)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere
description:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Azur Lane: Bisoku Zensin!
description: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Worth a Billion: Modern-Day Courtesan
description:
Yoshiwara, old Edo's paradise of pleasure, has been reborn in modern-day Tokyo…. In this playground of the powerful, where money rules all, women sell both their bodies and the idea of romance to their male clientele. Thrust into this world is the ingenue Asuka, who's been sold out by her foster parents to pay off their debts. While at first oblivious to the nature of Yoshiwara, she accidentally barges in on a “transaction” between a courtesan and her client. Confronted with her new reality of being bought and sold, she longs to make a break for it… but is there anyone around her she can trust…?! (MangaPlaza)
___

tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: Not found
description:
When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  

"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?"

Without a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?

"I… What should I do…"

---
The beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. 

Will she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!


---
**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51880368), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=3903318), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3240000001)

tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga
description:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Conquering Dungeons With Copy Paste!
description: Seo Han-Jun, the protagonist, is cursed by a Transcendent being with a skill called “Copy-Paste” (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) and given only 20 years to live. However, this skill only works on himself, and its growth is stunted, leading him to live a disregarded life as a low-level hunter. One day, while fighting in a dungeon, he discovers a way to develop his Copy-Paste skill! With this newfound power, he quickly becomes a world-class hunter. Now, together with his companions, Han-Junmust prevent the impending catastrophe. Will Seo Han-Jununcover the Transcendent’s identity and save the world?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy

name: Kizetsu Yuusha to Ansatsu Hime
description: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Let's Meet at the Witches' Gathering
description:
Unofficial compilation of [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/tags/%E9%AD%94%E5%A5%B3%E9%9B%86%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%A7%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%84%E3%81%BE%E3%81%97%E3%82%87%E3%81%86)/[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hashtag/%E9%AD%94%E5%A5%B3%E9%9B%86%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%A7%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%84%E3%81%BE%E3%81%97%E3%82%87%E3%81%86) oneshots with the hashtag #魔女集会で会いましょう

tags: Anthology, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Just Read Me Already!
description:
300 years. 

That was how long it had been since he had last been opened. For 3 whole centuries, the mysterious book of magic, also known as Grimoire, has been stuck on the shelf of the Le Temis Royal Academy Library. 

Just then, an apprentice mage opens the Grimoire, only to die in a freak accident. As the dismayed Grimoire awaits his teleportation to a new location, the library door creeps open and a mysterious girl, Riley, approaches and opens the Grimoire, becoming his new contractor.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Nemuro-kun wa Kao ga Ii!
description: Nemuro-kun sits next to me. He always hides his face with his bangs, and most people at school do not know his real face. One day, Takamura happened to know his face, and she couldn't take his eyes off Nemuro-kun! I love Nemuro-kun's face. But that is all I know. This is a school love comedy that begins with a face, where they gradually get to know each other!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mujihina Akuyaku Kizoku ni Tensei shita boku wa Shouaku Mahou wo kushi shite Mahou Sekai no Chouten ni tatsu ~Heroine nante inai to Akiramete itara Mukou kara katte ni Yottekimashita~
description: I was reincarnated as the villainous aristocrat, Vanitas, and decided to defy my destined destruction. By using the absolute power of Domination Magic, I will protect the heroines who were originally meant to be taken away, and push forward on my path to the top of the magical world.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Warning! Beware of the Dog
description:
By some sort of fate, exorcist xiao-Yu is forced to "live under the same roof" with the succubus named Obsidian, who killed her adoptive father. Yet she discovers that the succubus seems to have lost her memories! Unable to accept the fact, xiao-Yu decides to spy on Obsidian's every move, yet the latter doesn't seem bothered by the least. Instead, she starts to thirst after xiao-Yu openly and often teases her body to satiate her own hunger...

Although they seem to have a love-hate relationship, they both know that something dangerous is stirring beneath the depths. Something related to why her adoptive father was killed, why Obsidian's memory was sealed away, and...
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Top Dungeon Farmer
description: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Nikubami Honegishimi
description: It was 1999, the year Nostradamus predicted the end of the human race. Riding the unprecedented occult boom, Inubousaki, an editor of a third-rate occult magazine, is covering strange incidents with her photographer Asama, who is psychic to boot. As Asama's psychic powers draw them together, the two encounter a number of terrifying and bizarre phenomena. On the other side, in the present day of 2023, an elderly Asama is visited by someone investigating Inubousaki.
tags: Ghosts, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Lynette, in place of her sister, is to marry Alfred, a rumored playboy who wants a young lady who can "wrap men around her fingers". In order to avoid being kicked out, she tries to act like the villainess Alfred wants, but his reaction isn't so good!? On the other hand, Alfred isn't actually a playboy either, but a very pure and innocent novice in love matters. But he decides to pretend to be a playboy in order to find out the intentions of Lynette, who was sent by the rival queen, are!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: This love comedy begins when Shio, a man with the peculiar quirk of expressing affection through preparing and serving fish, meets a mermaid. His first instinct? To fillet and eat her! But he soon learns their families share history: long ago, his ancestors were saved by mermaids, and in gratitude, vowed to wed their descendants. As it turns out, this mermaid and Shio might be connected by more than just fate...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Virgin Knight: I Became the Frontier Lord in a World Ruled by Women
description:
Reborn from modern Japan into a medieval fantasy world where gender roles are flipped, Faust is an anomaly—a rare male knight! Raised as a frontier lord, his old-world values clash hilariously with his new life. The queen’s attire leaves little to the imagination, and the busty duke’s “friendly” advances verge on harassment! Despite getting flustered in court, Faust is a dazzling hero on the battlefield whose prowess can turn the tide of any battle.

When Faust is tasked with advising Princess Valiele on her first mission, what was meant to be a simple skirmish against bandits quickly spirals into an unimaginable trial. Dive into the first volume of a heroic gender-bent saga!
___
**Character Designer:** [Melonnyinyi](https://mangadex.org/author/e26bb514-85e4-4383-bc9e-9178797466f2)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Buchigire Reijou wa Houfuku wo Chikaimashita. ~Madousho no Chikara de Sokoku wo Tataki Tsubushimasu~
description:
Lady Elizabeth has her engagement annulled at a party by the crown prince, whose heart has moved on to another young noblewoman. She is then imprisoned in the dungeon over unjust accusations, and learns she has been betrayed by the country to which she has devoted everything...

At the peak of her frustration, Elizabeth finally decides to defect, with a grimoire holding hidden and formidable powers in hand!! She begins her new life and trade with the help of Viscount Lucas from the neighbouring country. With a fierce desire for revenge against her home country in her heart.
tags: Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Shenmue Side Story
description:
Shenmue Side Story is a 4-part comic that incorporates Chapter 2 of the Shenmue saga. Naturally, it takes place between Shenmue and Shenmue II.   
It was included as an unlockable in the Xbox version of Shenmue II and tells stories of the main characters not mentioned during the game.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure

name: Not found
description:
"After school, I fell in love."

Surrounded by four handsome childhood friends, Mizuho is thrilled every day. ♡ Moreover... the youngest one of the group, Kizuki, has recently started to quickly get close to Mizuho?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Dungeon of Demonking
description:
When humanity becomes tranquil and relaxed, the Demon King arrives once again⸻!?

Published in the Dragon Age February 2020 Issue as the 2nd of 4 Age Winter Oneshot Fes oneshots.
___
**Additional Buy Links:**
- [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/ZNAWO47452)
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: To Hunt a Vampiress
description:
It was supposed to be a simple mission, hunt down a werewolf pack with the teammates assigned to you (which you didn't want nor asked for), then go home and collect your reward.
Helen thought it was going to be uncomfortable at best. It really was supposed to be simple.
That is, until a vampiress, the monster she hates the most gets involved.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kimi Meku Yoru ni Kogarete
description: At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night...
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Itadaki! Nariagari Meshi
description: Yankee cooking manga. MC is a yankee boy who cooks delicious food - his friends and rivals can’t get enough of it, so they fight then they eat and they bond over it.
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Nee-chan no Tomodachi ga Uzai Hanashi
description: Nao Misumi, a first-year high school student, has known his older sister Rio's best friend, Sena Ikuta, since elementary school. Even though he feels annoyed at Sena's habit of calling him "Lil' Bro", she is someone he can't leave alone...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sayonara, Watashitachi ni Yasashikunakatta, Subete no Hitobito
description:
The girl dedicated her life to taking revenge on the seven people who killed her sister.

Akada Town, a rural area surrounded by mountains on all sides. Shiori Nakagawa, a high school student in this town, had stopped attending school due to bullying. One day, Mei Satou comes to live with Shiori as a cohabitant. Mei, who doesn’t open her heart to anyone, reveals her purpose for coming to this town only to Shiori.

“I want to kill the seven people who drove my sister to her death.”

Three years ago, Mei’s sister, Akari, was subjected to horrific bullying in this town and took her own life. Mei has returned to exact revenge. She plans to perform the blood-soaked ritual ‘Okakashitsutsumi,’ handed down at Akada Shrine, to embody the giant serpent god ‘Okakashisama’ and kill the seven people involved.

On the night of the summer solstice, Mei successfully performs the ritual. From that point on, with the power of the god and together with Shiori, Mei begins to kill those involved in her sister’s death, one by one each day. Amid their days of vengeance and escape, the two eventually develop romantic feelings for each other. However, Mei keeps one secret from Shiori: anyone who performs the ‘Okakashitsutsumi’ must ultimately offer their soul to the god, meaning Mei’s own death is inevitable.
tags: Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Koi Hajime wa Ochi Yuku Tsubaki no Shita de
description: Haruichi Azuma lost his parents in an accident and was left on his own. He was treated coldly and betrayed by the relatives who took him in. One day, an old friend of his father's invites him to his house to take care of his daughter. However, what awaits him is Tsubaki, the second daughter of the Yaotome family, who is selfish and arrogant. He is fed up with this type of person, but like Haruichi, Tsubaki also has loneliness in her eyes.
tags: Historical, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: I Picked Up A No-Good Useless Prince
description: Kuruhi, first prince of Gahama Kingdom, is the epitome of a spoiled brat with his arrogant attitude and behavior. After countless misdeeds, he is finally banished from the royal family and reduced to a commoner! The wandering, mud-covered former prince finds himself at an inn run by Emma, a girl who has a severe obsession with royalty drama. Emma is bewildered by the sudden appearance of her "Oshi", and determined to get him back on his feet, she embarks on a grand project!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess

name: Suterare Shiro Mahoutsukai no Koucha Seikatsu
description:
“Thank you for your efforts so far, Amalia.”

Amalia, a white witch, was traveling in a party with her friends, but when the group failed to defeat the dragon, Amalia was mocked as a “useless old woman” and was abandoned on the dragon mountain.

Amalia was ready to die, but the golden dragon took a liking to her and took her to the Magic Realm to heal her injuries.

The dragon seemed to be interested in the Human World and took the form of a human child to live with Amalia in the countryside.

Amalia was living with the dragon child, making the most of her skills in white magic and her favorite hobby of making tea, when a mercenary appeared in front of her.

He was once the young boy that Amalia had lovingly raised in the orphanage.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Koi yori Aoku
description:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat
description:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Ctrl+Alt+Resign
description: Max and Joy may sit just inches apart at work, but they're miles apart in every other way. Max prefers to be a fly on the wall, while Joy is the office's social butterfly. So when Max accidentally sees something on Joy's work laptop he wasn't meant to, he's pulled off the wall and thrown straight into the tangled web of workplace dynamics. Maybe this change is exactly what he needed... or is it?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Natsume Arata no Kekkon
description:
Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to “meet the criminal who killed his father”. That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as the “Shinagawa Pierrot”.

**Award:** Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
In London, there lives a "witch" that prefers to eat only men. In order to exterminate them, an agency, known as RED, was created by MI6, the British Secret Service. Ruby Blood is a young “witch-hunting” genius who works at the agency, but she is also an ordinary girl who loves food and her family, She looks forward to the dinners her father cooks for her every day.

But on Christmas night, her destiny changes forever.......

Eat or be eaten, girls' suspense story!
tags: Action, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Washizu - Enma's Mahjong
description: A spin-off of Akagi that depicts the charismatic exploits of Washizu Iwao, Akagi Shigeru's ultimate enemy, in his younger days. In 1948, under the American occupation of Japan, Washizu is undefeated in high-rate mahjong games against American commissioned officers. Eventually, they hire a cheater as a rep player, who has a grudge against the Special Higher Police, to play in their place to counter Washizu, who has a terrifying brain and used to belong to the Special Higher Police...
tags: Traditional Games, Historical, Psychological, Drama

name: Kimi ni Koi wo suru Nante, Arienai Hazu Datta
description:
Yasutaka Iijima, the glasses boy in the corner of the class, has a hard time with Ema Kitaoka, a gal in the same class at high school.
However, after coming into contact with her at a third-year camp, they start to talk to each other outside of school. They are both unsure of each other's "true feelings."
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Night Reset Kilometer Post
description: Tsutomu spends the day driving as if fleeing from something. Exhausted and sick, he stops at a service area where a strange woman offers him water. She asks for a ride, and though he feels a lingering unease, Tsutomu reluctantly agrees…
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: The version of Space Family Carlvinson that ran in Animage Comics for some time, before the series moved to Shounen Captain and restarted. By the time this version was collected in a tankoubon, however, the Shounen Captain version was also being collected, so “Original” was added to the title.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Houkago H Kenkyuu Kai
description:
"Why do boys find underwear and breasts so erotic?"

Let's study this question in depth with Densuke Murai, the "perverted gentleman," in this academic (?) ecchi comedy!

(Source: Cycomics)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru

name: Mazinger Z
description:
One of the first Super Robot manga and the one that introduced most of the traits of the Mecha genre. Constructed with the Super-Alloy Z, Mazinger was built by Professor Juzo Kabuto as a weapon against the Mechanical Beasts of the evil Dr. Hell. Koji Kabuto, the grandson of Professor Kabuto, becomes the pilot of Mazinger Z when his grandfather is killed, and battles from there on against Dr. Hell and his allies. This is the first series that introduced the concept of a pilot inside a Mecha, which all series from then on have followed.  
  
**Note: the scanlation uses Kodansha version which altered the chapters order, includes TV Magazine chapters, some pages were altered(like redesigns for Sayaka, Professor Yumi and Brocken) and there's missing pages, the missing chapters of Shonen Jump serialization along with some TV Magazine chapters were moved to Great Mazinger volume 1.**
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: A single ship drifting through the vast expanse of space. A woman and a cat are heading toward Earth, but they cannot seem to reach it, and their hunger only grows. Then, someone arrives at her spacecraft...
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Aliens

name: Space Family Carlvinson
description:
When a motley band of traveling performers have a deep-space collision with another spacecraft, 
they unexpectedly find that the sole survivor of the other craft is a humanoid infant. 
They decide to raise the child as their own on the nearest planet as they wait for other members of the girl's race to come and find her. 
Corona-chan grows up as their daughter and the manga details her funny adventures with her fuzzball mother, her robot-soldier father, 
their living-central-nervous-system pet and the other bizarre members of the local village.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Gangster Love Simulation
description:
Barely scraping by as a part-time delivery driver, Taeha suddenly hits the jackpot when he wins the lottery. But on his way home, he gets involved in a motorcycle accident and blacks out. When he wakes up, he finds himself back in his high school days 10 years ago. What’s crazier is that he realizes he’s stuck in a weird dating sim!

“Find the capture targets and raise their affection levels!”

Can Taeha charm his way through the game and return to the real world?
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Isekai, Web Comic

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Ichijou Masaki Tenkou-hen
description:
A terrorist bombing strikes the Ten Master Clans Conference. In order to investigate the incident, Ichijou Masaki, the eldest son of the Ichijou family, one of the Ten Master Clans, known as the Crimson Prince, temporarily transfers from Third High School to First High School. This also means becoming classmates with the goddess he admires, Shiba Miyuki.

A spin off from the main story of Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei Shizoku Kaigi-hen
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Military, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Great Mazinger (Outa Gosaku)
description: An alternate Great Mazinger manga by Outa Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by Nagai Go.
tags: Monsters, Mecha, Gore

name: Not found
description:
Here I am, reincarnated into the world of Love & Magic Academy, an otome game with RPG elements, and I’m one of the love interests: cool, bespectacled Arius.
Wait. Which means… I’m going to get dragged into the romantic scenes just like in the game?!
But I have zero interest in romance. And this world isn’t just about romance scenes. It has magic and monsters, and you can raise your stats through dungeon diving.

Since I have no interest in romance, I’m going to start off by training and increasing my stats with sword and magic, then I’ll head deep into the dungeons, smashing countless monsters along the way.

**Here I go, ignoring the romance scenes as I dive into dungeons in order to get stronger!**

(Source: Cross Infinite World)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Inevitable
description: About a boy who’s 14, who wants to destroy the world so he summons a demon but it’s not what he expects. He still strives to destroy the world in whole even with the inconveniences.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: FUGA: Melodies of Steel
description: This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live. Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...!? A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank "Taranis"' and fight to save their families!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Gore, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Mafia, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
A very popular early work from Kinoko Nasu from the Tsukihime & Fate fame, the Kara no Kyoukai universe has meet great success as an animated film adaptation, novels and radio dramas.  
  
Kara no Kyoukai depicts a world where the true dark nature of the human being is being reviewed and exposed by shocking and ruthless events, and in the center of it all we have Ryougi Shiki, the true heir to the long lived, wealthy and mysterious Ryougi clan and Kokuto Mikiya, a would be normal high school student if it wouldn't be for his amazing deductive & investigative progress.  
  
The moment Kokuto and Shiki meet is the moment that the wheel of fate started to turn, however is this fate moving forward naturally on it's own accord, or is it all being orchestrated from behind the scenes by an enigmatic persona? Only time will tell.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Texts of the Three Kingdoms
description: A brand new way of interpreting the "Romance of the Three Kingdoms", where we find the characters with a modern look with access to phones and internet. A mix of history, fiction with contemporary technology.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Reiketsu Ryuuou Heika no "Unmei no Tsugai" rashii Desu ga, Koukyuu ni Hikikomorou to Omoimasu
description: Upon reaching adulthood, Efinia, the fairy princess, is set to have an audience with the Dragon Emperor. However, as soon as she meets Emperor Glendil, it is revealed that Efinia is his "fated mate." Shocked, Efinia overhears the emperor's heartless words, "It's outrageous that someone who looks like a child is my mate." In that case, fine! I don't desire the love of an arrogant emperor! Undeterred by the harassment from other concubines, Efinia thoroughly enjoys her life in the harem. She eventually befriends a small dragon that wanders into the harem, but it seems this dragon has a secret...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Fathoms of Atonement
description: Jinshuilang, a mer, tries to atone for his past mistakes that killed his best friend, Huoliu. He was able to save Huoliu's soul for reincarnation. After a century of searching and regretting not having realized his feelings for Huoliu sooner, he finally finds the reincarnation of his best friend, now a human named Wen Honglin. But the price of a second chance may be more than he can bear.
tags: Reincarnation, Official Colored, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: One Piece Academy
description: A spin off where the One Piece cast goes to a big academy & lives modern lives.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Chrono Monochrome
description: Inubuse Kuromu aspired to be King in Chess, he was so skilled he represented Japan in the World Youth Chess Championship at age 11. However, due to his loss to a mysterious, wolf-like player, he developed a condition where he can't sit in front of anyone?! Because of this condition, he stopped playing Chess and chose to solely focus on his studies until his fingers break. Three years since his loss, while desperately still holding onto his title as 'King' through internet Chess, he meets an incredibly strong opponent. This game…starts his tale to become King.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, Supernatural

name: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending
description: When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story's most hated character who was even given the title "King of Trash" by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
tags: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Real demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?
description:
High school student Machino, who longs for the 'love of destiny', encounters the dating simulation game 'Celestia'. Despite having maximized affection with all the heroines, she can't decide on just one, leading her to spend days of anguish unable to advance to the confession event. At that moment, an explosion along with a shooting star occurs in her house, and when she opens her eyes, she meets the main heroine of 'Celestia', Sofia...

"Machino... I always wanted to say it... I like you."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy

name: Seven Seas, Seven Skies
description:
(from mangaupdates):

Tyrian’s stepfather, a notorious womanizer, decides to remarry, and his victim is a sickeningly sweet and innocent girl named Juliet. But the girl is kidnapped off of Tyrian’s ship, first by pirates and then by more pirates in the form of our dashing Luminous Red Benedict. 

The neatly woven threads of conspiracy which have been supporting Tyrian’s life begin to unravel, and he flees to Spain at last. Captain Red redoubles his pursuit. Conflict between Tyrian Persimmon (ancestor of one Major Klaus Heinz von dem Eberbach) and Luminous Red Benedict (AKA, pirate ancestor of one Dorian Red Gloria).
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Supreme Ocular Master: The Peerless Heiress
description:
"Luo Qingtong, a young lady from the 24th century who ranked first among those with superpowers, miraculously transmigrated into a different world. There, she begins her journey of vengeance as the crippled, oldest daughter of a duke from the lower kingdoms, where villains line up to get face-slapped and scumbags and manipulative bitches wait to get tortured!

An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth. She'll exterminate anyone who offends her! All is going well... but then she accidentally gets involved with a man of peerless beauty, whom she attempts to flirt with whenever she's unable to win against him in a fight. From there on, it becomes a story about their romantic pursuits..."
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: It's not Ba, it's Va
description:
Choboraunyopomi x Vanguard

The crazy unit comedy four-panel story begins!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Aliens

name: Sei-chan Capacity Over desu!
description: When my favorite childhood friend Sei-chan moved in with us, he started teasing me such as pushing me over, sneaking into my room, and taking other liberties! The daily flirting attack from the handsome Sei-chan is too overwhelming!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Regression of the Shattering Sword
description:
The ability to perfectly copy martial arts, Superior Interior Power!
Qin Tianlang, who was branded as the "World's Greatest Killer," met a miserable death because of this ability.
When he woke up, he had possessed the body of his son, Nam Gungcheon, who had committed suicide three days ago.
Nam Gungcheon, who had been deeply despised because he was the son of the "World's Greatest Killer".

"This time, I will become the "First Heavenly Dragon" in my son's name and take revenge on the world."
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The Kingdom of Albein was blessed with the appearance of the Miracle children, individuals with the greatest talents ever seen. Despite being around ten years old, with abilities many times stronger than the average adventurer, they managed to reach a strength score exceeding 100,000 points, granting them the adventurer grade SSS. With a mere party of five persons, they defeated the Demon Lord regaining the kingdom's peace.  
  
After that journey, Dick Silver, the most balanced between them, racked his brain to not draw public attention. In the end, he decided to become the guild master of a suburban guild as a reward, becoming its twelfth successor. After five years he reached his aim and then became a regular of his own guild's bar. But one day, as he was drinking at the bar as always, the daughter of a certain aristocrat came to pay him a visit.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Tonari no Seki ni Natta Bishoujo ga Horesaseyou to Karakattekuru ga Itsunomanika Kaeriuchi ni Shiteita
description:
She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case……
___
[Alt Official English (Tentai Books)](https://tentaibooks.com/novel-author/aresanzui/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
The swordsman, Jir, had just joined a well-known S-rank party when he finds himself stranded all alone in the hardest labyrinth. Normally, there’s no way to survive such a situation other than to wait for rescue. Relying on nothing but his heroic sword skills, Jir decides to escape on his own! “Heh! You’re all bark and no bite, Labyrinth!” he boldly declares. Due to his extremely poor sense of direction, he’s completely unaware that he’s headed towards the deepest level where the labyrinth boss awaits!!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37/toi8)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hazure Skill Nendouryoku (Tadashi Level MAX) de Musou suru ~Te wo Kazasu Dake desu. Eishou to ka Hissatsu Waza to ka Irimasen. Nenjiru Dake de Taosemasu~
description:
"With your power now, no one can defeat you – Even the Gods guarantee it!"

Elk Kinesis, the protagonist, was born as the eldest son of a prestigious duke’s family. However, due to his weak and seemingly useless skill, "Telekinesis", he was ridiculed and looked down upon by those around him. One fateful day, he was betrayed by his own father and half-siblings.
