In front of the only person who truly cared for him—his maid, Emma—he was brutally killed.

When he awoke, he found himself before the goddess Pipina. Despite being offered a powerful skill, Elk refused. Instead, he wished to grow stronger using nothing but "Telekinesis". Moved by his determination, Pipina subjected him to an unimaginable 2,000 years of training.

After centuries of grueling effort, Elk was finally sent back to the mortal world by the goddess. Reuniting with Emma, he now sets out on his ultimate goal—to take revenge on the Kinesis family that betrayed him!
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: A Younger Man From Today
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
"Class 5's Chitose Saku is a fucking playboy!"

Chitose Saku is at the top of the school caste. He and his friends are textbook examples of normies, despised by the less fortunate. Surrounded by girls and boys of every kind, he's chosen to lead his second-year class by his laid-back advisor.
___
- Adaptation of Light Novel - [Anilist](https://anilist.co/manga/121795/Chitosekun-Is-in-the-Ramune-Bottle/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tonari no Stella
description: Chiaki and Subaru have been the closest since they were kids. Chiaki has always liked him but as Subaru walks further into the world of entertainment, Chiaki decides the time has come to move past her one-sided feelings and find new love. Does she have enough resolve to meet someone better, or will she find herself shaken by her long-time love? A close, yet distant love story between a normal girl and her actor childhood friend!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: S-Rank Butler
description:
Butler Kim is the raid leader of the VR game Metariaand in real life the guardian of two cats. One day, a mysterious boss forces him into the unwanted Butler class, where he must serve monsters and do menial chores.

Just as he begins adjusting to this strange new role, an unbelievable truth is revealed:

"A cat… logged into the game?!"

His beloved pet Peechu has entered Metaria.

But Peechu is not just Peechu. The "Master" who reclassified Butler Kim and has been giving him orders is actually Kalinas, the Incarnation of Darkness, now trapped inside the cat’s body.

With the world’s balance at stake, Butler Kim is tasked with carrying out Kalinas’s dark mission. Yet instead of worrying about the will of darkness, is he simply happy to adventure through a fantasy world with Peechu?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ars Goetia ~Munou to Yobareta Shounen wa, 72 no Akuma wo Shieki Shite Musou Suru~
description:
"I have decided not to expect anything from you anymore."

One day, Norman is told this by his father and is kicked out of the house. There was no way around it. Because Norman could not use magic at all. However, Norman's fate changes drastically when he encounters the Grimoire "Ars Goetia". This grimoire was used to summon 72 demons. The demons summoned by it, however, bring about a shocking revelation to Norman. Yes, there was a reason why Norman could not use magic.
tags: Action, Demons, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
I was hit by a car while protecting a child, and before I knew it, I had been reincarnated in another world as Yumie Granbell, the extraordinarily beautiful daughter of a count.
When I looked in the mirror, the reflection staring back at me was that of an angelic girl, absolutely peerless in beauty!

The Granbell family, into which I was born in this life, is a prestigious magical family with considerable influence. I thought I had hit the jackpot, reincarnating into a winning life, but it turned out that the family was on the verge of collapse. And to make things worse, the cause of that collapse was... ME!?

Now, I want to finally obtain the family I've always dreamed of! With my cuteness, I'll solve any problem and restore the family to its former glory!
___
Alternative raw: [Niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69838)
tags: Reincarnation, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: City: Crime Stories
description:
The city is a terrible place to live. Greedy corporations, crazy cyborgs and shootouts on every corner.
Armed gangs look at the rest of the inhabitants as their legitimate prey.
Alice is a young girl who accidentally finds herself in the center of a criminal showdown.
Now she can only dream of a quiet life, but it will soon become clear who is the real predator.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Edwin and Leira had grown up together as childhood friends. Their relationship began to change when they had just entered adulthood.

**“Teach me how to masturbate.”**

Swayed by Edwin’s puppy-like pleading eyes, Leira reluctantly agreed to his request. Soon, he finds himself growing accustomed to the filthy pleasures Edwin brings him. But one day, Leira discovered a green-eyed monster in Edwin’s bath...

"Leira. Stop thinking. You don’t need to. Just like always, I’m the only one who can split you open inside and pump you so full your stomach bulges. Nothing’s changed..."
tags: Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy

name: Nuclear
description: A pessimistic man hits 30 and accepts a high-paying illegal job. He and another thug are asked to rob a bag from an old lady. But what should have been an easy gig suddenly turns into chaos when the old woman shoots his accomplice in the head. The man manages to flee with the bag, but when he opens it he can't believe his eyes. It's...!?
tags: Thriller, Action, Crime, Drama

name: Chiikawa: Nanka Chiisakute Kawaii Yatsu
description: The sometimes happy, sometimes sad, and a tad stressful daily life of "some sort of small, cute creature" known as Chiikawa. Chiikawa enjoys delicious food with bees and rabbits, toils hard every day for the rewards of work, and still maintains a smile.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Gachi Koi Maou-sama
description: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Fate/Grand Order COMIC à la carte PLUS! SP Showdown!
description: Anthology of "one-shot" manga drawn by various artists and centered around battles between the Servants of Fate/Grand Order.
tags: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Fantasy

name: Look Back
description:
Fourth-grader Ayumu Fujino regularly draws 4Koma manga for her school newspaper and is lauded as having the best artwork in her class. One day, she is asked by her teacher to turn over one of her manga slots in the school newspaper to a truant student named Kyomoto. When Kyomoto's manga pops up alongside Fujino's, it receives high praises for its detailed artwork, making Fujino furiously jealous. Refusing to be beaten by someone who barely attends school, Fujino devotes herself to learning to create manga. As time goes on though, her goal of outshining Kyomoto seems to only get further and further away, and Fujino, now in sixth grade, eventually gives up and quits making manga. Graduation day arrives, and Fujino is asked to deliver Kyomoto's graduation certificate to her. Through chance, the two end up coming face to face, and their unexpected meeting will end up having consequences far beyond what either of them could ever predict.

---
**Link:**
- Alternate Official English - [MANGA Plus](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100167) (MANGA Plus MAX required)
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru
description: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front." The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata
description:
Yoshiko Yokozawa is an office lady who loves cute things and being cute herself. Because of this, she is often not taken seriously and she is fed up with it. On the other hand, Chiaki Kurisu, a sales representative from a trading company, always seems very serious when she visits for business. For some reason, Kurisu suddenly invites Yokozawa to dinner!? Outside of work, Kurisu-san is completely different from her usual business-like behavior, being totally open and vulnerable...!?

"This woman, is cuter than me!?"

You can't help but fall for her. ♡ Adult girls-love ♡
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love

name: Not found
description: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."
tags: Traditional Games, Psychological, Mafia, Drama

name: Not found
description:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Yaoguai Mingdan
description:
A beautiful nine-tailed fox. An acacia tree demon. A Taoist believer who is seeking spiritual enlightenment but got rejected by the goddess. It isn't easy, being caught in the middle of this dangerous group of women, but our hero Feng Xi must fight in order to protect the peace and save the world!  
  
[Anime](http://v.qq.com/detail/o/o9b10rhvd7y5i9h.html)
tags: Romance, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: As part of the celebration of Mitsuru Adachi's 55th anniversary as a mangaka, Gosho Aoyama and Rumiko Takahashi contribute two essay manga about their friend and colleague.
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life

name: Pokémon SPECIAL Scarlet & Violet
description: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Yaotome x 2
description: Yaotome Kai is a sixth grade elementary school student with a new neighbor living in the apartment next door. The slightly weird girl Yaotome Haruru. Eating school lunches, having likes and dislikes, and forgetting things as elementary school students do. Casually hanging out whilst their parents get along, as next-door neighbors do.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Advance of Zeta Re-Boot: Gundam Inle - Black Rabbit Had a Dream
description: Set in U.C. 0091 after the end of the First Neo Zeon War, the plot follows ReZeon forces which have regrouped on Mars under a woman proclaiming herself Supreme Commander Alicia Zabi and absorbed Titans remnants who fled the Earth Sphere.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Okomorigurashi no Fafnir
description:
Spin-off of Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon. The series focuses on the life of the otaku dragon Fafnir.  


---
tags: Loli, Monsters, Comedy, Office Workers, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Bakajo 26-ji
description: Atsuko and Yuri were classmates in elementary, junior high, high school, although they hardly ever spoke to each other during their school days. At their first reunion in 15 years, Atsuko discovers Yuri's secret and makes a move. What is the destination of these two opposites, who have completely different interests and groups and whose personalities do not match?
tags: Crime, Girls' Love, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
I already possess the body of a woman who will marry the devil. In a role haunted by her husband until death.

"I will always be by your side!"

I've decided to be nice to this poor husband for a while. But before one day, when I had reached adulthood and planned to divorce. A little angel appeared in the night full of surprises. Oh, man. So I tried to run away before being discovered…

"Richard? Something's not right…"

"I have no intention of letting you run away, even if you die, you must stay in my arms. Elisha."

Trying to cry and beg with a pretty face is also not possible.

"Where are you going to take our child?"

Did he even chase after me with those cold eyes? …I guess I was wrong to run away like this. How to solve this situation?

---
After losing her parents at an early age, noble lady Elissa Lohengrin is brought into the powerful House Rubelin by the duke so that she can marry his grandson, Richard. However, having read this story in her past life, Elissa knows Richard is destined to murder her! To avoid this, Elissa makes a deal with Richard to divorce when they become adults. But as she plans for her future single life, Richard's feelings begin to grow, and a whirlwind of events begins that pulls Elissa closer to danger.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mega Man Maniax
description: A series of short and comical stories, essays, and projects requiring reader participation that were originally published in Comic BomBom between 1997-1998.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, 4-Koma, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: “I’m gonna make the funk music I love popular.” This was once Aida’s resolution, but time slipped by, leading to an ordinary career instead. Now, with each passing day, the sensation of being trapped continues to torment him. In the midst of this, a former bandmate extends an invitation. And when Aida takes up his bass guitar for the first time in a long while, sure enough, his heart trembles to the music…
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Music

name: Trigun
description:
Vash the Stampede is a gunman on the run with a 60 billion double dollar bounty on his head which has made it difficult for him to go anywhere without being chased and shot at. Because of the bounty, every town he ever visit ends up being destroyed because of his pursuers, and miracliously, no one ever gets killed.   
Meryl and Milly are two insurance agents that have been sent to find Vash the Stampede and keep him under surveillance so no more damage is caused. Meryl, who leads the pair, can't believe that the man they have met can possibly be the legendary gunman.   
This spikey haired, gangly, and blonde young man is extremely friendly, a pacifist, hates blood and suicide, absolutely loves donuts, and is a dork and a crybaby…there is no way he could he be Vash the Stampede, a notorious outlaw. However, there's more to Vash than just smiles and doughnuts.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: Global Collapse
description:
Car-chasing accidents, derailed trains, gas explosion and orphanage bankruptcy… Through all those terrible events, Mathew Gu is still alive. 

In order to eliminate Mathew from this beautiful world, the lord in charge keeps bringing him various types of trouble. However, Mathew never gets knocked down. 

“What’s beyond my expectation is that this truly happens to my life”, he says when the game starts.

[Welcome to the global evolution game. It’s developed by the planet and all humans will be its players.]
- - -
The game is launched on earth, and all of mankind are the players.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tonari no Kuderella wo Amayakashitara, Uchi no Aikagi wo Watasu Koto ni Natta
description:
Katagiri Naomi, a high school student who lived alone for two years, meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes, who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman, and her nickname was "Quderella" because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others, but she's actually quite naive, so Naomi decides to help her.

"Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken, huh?"
"That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today"
"I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it"
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: SCIFER
description:
An implant surgeon is poisoned with a neurotoxin.
He survives, but the incident distorts his perception of time and robs him of his sight. Now all he can fill the rest of his eternity with are thoughts of revenge.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Superhero, Self-Published, Philosophical, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?
description:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan
description:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
tags: Animals, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Dan Hiroki, the Chief of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department's 1st Investigation Division. An elite among elites with a brilliant career, his hidden face is that of a serial killer who enacts vigilante justice upon sinful villains.

This is the second official spin-off of "Trace: Reminiscences of a Forensic Scientist." The devil's pleasurable record of condemnation, preying on the wicked, begins.

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: Is It Strange to Feel Dysphoric After Coming Back from an Isekai?!
description:
A oneshot from Twitter artist @Squipkechi

A freelance video editor falls asleep while playing a videogame only to wake up in the game's world, but with their gender reversed! After completing their quest, they are returned to their own world, only to find that they have developed some new feelings...
tags: Oneshot, Genderswap, Isekai

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Philosophical, Drama

name: Not found
description:
The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization documented by the web-based collaborative fiction project of the same name. 

In universe, the SCP Foundation is responsible for locating and containing individuals, entities, locations, and objects that violate natural law (referred to as SCPs).  
  
This manga summarizes the reports of the SCPs currently under the Foundation.  
  
----

Based on the [SCP Foundation](http://www.scp-wiki.net/).
tags: Sci-Fi, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Magic, Doujinshi, Horror, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Raoul, who had defeated the demon king as the strongest hero, should have become the savior of the world. Having his treasured companions and family killed by power-hungry aristocrats, he was executed with false charges brought against him by the princess. Just before his life collapsed, at last, his heart fell into darkness.

"I'll tear those traitors from limb to limb. Burn them at the stake. Sever them to pieces. Skewer them. I'll kill every one of those bastards without mercy and make them taste hell's suffering......!!!"

Obtaining the power of darkness, Raoul was revived. Sneering, he vowed revenge. "Oh, I'm looking forward to it – from now on, I'll bask in their blood as I please." Several days after the hero's revival in the imperial capital where flowers bloomed in profusion, the parade that would advance towards tragedy began.
___
**Storyboarder:** [Hanji](https://mangadex.org/author/ce336432-7da7-45a0-bcdd-523cc0e5c3e5)
**Character Designer:** [Araya](https://mangadex.org/author/01944b4f-2580-447d-9e18-9b1eac224beb)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39335)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Harebare Biyori
description: One day at a funeral, after Chiharu's mother remarried, Chiharu met the child from her new stepfather's previous marriage, Rui. Rui decided to live on her own after the death of the grandfather who raised her, and Chiharu decided to live with her.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Oushiki Toori is a passionate and energetic manga editor. One day, Tooru, a mangaka she has been pursuing for years, invites her to meet for the first time. Oushiki is excited, but just before the meeting, she learns that Tooru has posted on social media about quitting being a mangaka...!?(Source: Shodensha, translated)
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Marshal King
description:
Nobody on the continent hasn't heard of the evil deeds of the great outlaw M. Godspeed. But one day, a young man claiming to be the criminal's son suddenly appears trekking through the harsh desert. This Jim Godspeed says he's killed his father and has the corpse to prove it!

(Source: MangaPlus)
tags: Action, Crime, Gore, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
“I wanted to die in battle.”

There once was a great hero, capable of killing a god, who longed to fight even at the brink of death. What awaited her was her reincarnation as Nia Liston, a beautiful but sickly daughter of nobles in a future world. Now in her second life, she gets another chance to rampage in fights, dabble in broadcasting, and even experience academy life! Thus begin the epic battle records of a heroine who will one day be called the “The Merciless Maiden, Nia Liston”!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sensei to Mondaiji? no Yuri
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Watashi, 2-banme no Kanojo de Ii kara.
description:
Kirishima and Hayasaka are two classmates who have a secret relationship in the public eye.

In their school life they act as if they do not know each other, but secretly, there is much more than people can imagine. Both of them get into a relationship that becomes difficult to break and ends up being impure, unhealthy and complicated since the relationship between them was nothing more than a fling that simply generated a love triangle before Kirishima's first love and second love.
___
**Links:**
- [Official LN (JP)](https://dengekibunko.jp/product/nibanmenokanojo)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Todoroki Daimaru no Kikai Taikendan
description: Many myths, folktales, and legends are filled with themes related to sexuality!! What is the true fieldwork of Daimaru Todoroki, an associate professor at a university who researches these myths and local traditions?!
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Persona 5
description: The story focuses on the 16-year-old protagonist, Akira Kurusu, who got transferred to Shujin High School in Tokyo after he was sued by a man with political connection for a non-existent violence when Akira saved a woman from being molested by the man, leading to his probation. Arriving in Tokyo, he finds a mysterious app got installed into his phone that enables him to enter another world formed from corrupt hearts of adults where he awakens his power called Persona. During his times there, he is joined by two fellow students Ryuuji Sakamoto and Ann Takamaki, and a shape-shifting cat-like creature known as Morgana. Feeling suppressed by their environment, the four form a group known as the "Phantom Thieves of Heart" to steal corrupt hearts of adults and reform society.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Video Games, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari
description:
Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.  
As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Tsuiraku JK to Haijin Kyoushi
description:
Mikoto Ochiai is ready to jump off the rooftop of her high school's building after she got rejected by the boy she loves. However, homeroom teacher Jin Haiba suddenly appears on the rooftop for a smoke, talked to her, and saved her from falling down. He even asked her to go out with him rather than die.   
  
A black comedy manga about love, life, and death.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Red Blue
description: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life

name: Hellper 2 <KillBeros>
description: Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: The Wi-Fi Love Story
description:
Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

Omake arts done by [Flygombal](https://www.fiverr.com/zamrutzh)
Cover arts done by [Artiya](https://www.fiverr.com/kazisain)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: A White Rose in Bloom
description: Ruby is a student at an elite European boarding school. Things are going pretty well for her until she finds out that she won’t be able to go home at Christmas. Instead, she’ll be stuck at school with only one other student–the aloof and beautiful Steph–for company. As Ruby tries to understand Steph, she becomes more and more interested in the other girl. But can she break through Steph’s icy exterior?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Punk Gun
description: On the outskirts of the crime-infested Dead City, a young boy named Aiboba and his band of orphans become involved in a dangerous incident.
tags: Action, Crime, Drama

name: Yui Can Only Live In the Shadows
description:
On a summer afternoon under the blazing sun, Aki, a boy who’s often bullied, decides to confess his feelings to his childhood friend, Yui.

However, on their way home, Yui suddenly disappears. Even though they had been walking together, she vanishes without a trace.

Losing Yui — his only ally and the girl he loved — Aki falls into despair.

But then, Yui appears before him once more.

"I’ve become a shadow."

Her appearance was eerie. She extended her arms and legs from within the shadows, moving as if swimming through them.

As long as there was a shadow, she could come and go freely — through the ground, the ceiling… even through people’s bodies.

Was she really Yui... or something else entirely?

Desperate to bring Yui back, Aki sets out in pursuit, but against his wishes, the nightmare of the “shadow” begins to consume them both.
tags: Thriller, Romance, Horror, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
"Why did that happen?!"

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let's take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
description: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma's choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike...
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica: The different story
description:
Mami's warm personality has made it difficult for her to adjust to her solitary life as a magical girl, where survival often takes precedence over kindness.   
When she meets Kyouko Sakura, a fellow lone wolf, she is excited at the prospect of working together with another magical girl and forging a friendship built on ultimate trust. But many are the sacrifices all magical girls must make, and the consequences of Kyouko's choice are only just becoming clear to her.  
When the pain becomes unbearable, will Kyouko remain standing beside Mami as a force for the greater good…?
tags: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Brinny and the Empty Seat
description:
The story of a possessor from a book who, for the sake of its goal, won’t mind killing others.

Brinny, who’s living while adapting to her stepfather, thought that story had nothing to do with her. Up until she was swept into an incident with the sickly second prince, Lucian.

In the midst of the crisis, Brinny rescued Lucian by displaying her superhuman strength, and looking at the possessor ‘Ariadna’ tied up had reassured her that everything had been resolved.

But for whatever reason, her beloved older sister and the first prince died in a carriage accident, and then even Lucian, who later becomes her fiance, started to display some abnormal behavior.

The possessor wasn’t executed in the past.
Would ‘Ariadna’ still be alive?
In order to regain the empty seats of their lost loved ones, Brinny made a decision.

To fight against the possessor.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color

name: Boku-kun
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Yo-Jo Life!
description: Akihiko Shimura, 20 years old (male). When I woke up in the morning, I was a little blonde loli.
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: YuruYuri & Pokémon - Something about YuruYuri and Pokémon (Doujinshi)
description:
One day at school, the Amusement Club pick up an odd game cartridge and suddenly find themselves transported to the world of Pokémon! They're trying their best to get home with the help of their newfound Pokémon, but will their adventure be as laid-back as their official story? Can they survive in this new world? Can Akari manage to catch her first Pokémon!?
  
A crossover between Yuru Yuri and Pokémon with over 700 pages originally published at <http://www.geocities.jp/manzyu2003/yurumon.html>  
  
With Geocities closure, the author has migrated the series to <https://www.pixiv.net/user/929540/series/54941>
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Girls' Love, Isekai, Doujinshi, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A time-rewind anthology from ZERO-SUM focusing on stories published on Syosetu.

Cover Illustrator: Takamatsu Tsubasa.

**Volume 1 Contents:**
1. "Hakanage na Reijou wa Yarinaoshitai" (儚げな令嬢はやり直したい), Art by Mayuzumi Kei, story by Sakimori Aoi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9416gm/)
2. "Gyakkou Reijou wa Moto Konyakusha no Sugao wo Shiru" (逆行令嬢は元婚約者の素顔を知る), Art by Yumoto Miko, story by Nakamuro Akina. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9896gg/)
3. "Maki Modori Joou Heika wa Saishou no Tenohira de Odoranai" (巻き戻り女王陛下は宰相の手の平で踊らない), Art by Toyama Koma, story by Ecchan. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2337gw/)
4. "Kon'yaku Hakisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa Danzai Event wo Yarinaosu" (婚約破棄された悪役令嬢は断罪イベントをやり直す), Art by Kosaji, story by Mizuno Saaya. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8029ge/)

**Volume 2 Contents:**
1. "The Wimpy Daughter and the Frog's Guide" (弱虫令嬢とカエルの手引き), By Kurosuke Kuina.
2. 巻き戻った星薔薇の乙女は悪夢を祓う, By Nakakura Chikage.
3. 七度目の人生で、私が願ったことは, Art by Gemuta, Story by Kiramomozo. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1129hv/)
4. 死に戻り令嬢ヴィオレッタ・マルタンが愛されるのを諦めて好きに生きたその顛末。, Art by 鱧永あるひ, Story by Michikusa Yamori.

**Volume 3 Contents:**
1. たとえその身が蛞蝓になろうとも. Art by Hoshina, Story by Kizaki Yuu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5421fu/)
2. 過去に戻ったので姉をヤンデレから守ったら、代わりに妹の私が監禁されたのですが. Art by Urita Nohito, Story by Kobato Kosuzu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0944ho/)
3. 初恋は二度目に叶うみたいです. Art by Azuya Chitose, Story by Asagao. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6160gk/)
4. 死に戻り令嬢の優雅な仕返し. Art by Takamatsu Tsubasa, Story by Michikusa Yamori.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Anthology, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace...? I'll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!
___
* Alternative raw: [Nicovideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)
tags: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Ore no Haitoku Meshi wo Onedari Sezu ni Irarenai, Otonari no Top Idol-sama
description:
A meddlesome high schooler, Mamori Suzufumi, helps her neighbor who had collapsed from hunger. The neighbor turns out to be none other than the extremely popular high school idol, Sasaki Yuzuki! Yuzuki had been excessively restricting her diet in order to maintain her image as the perfect idol. But when the worried Suzufumi serves her a homemade meal...

"...Aahhhhhhhhhnn! I can't take it anymore!"

With a face full of bliss, Yuzuki devours the meal completely! Seeing her eat so happily, Suzufumi decides to tempt her with her favorite dishes and make her succumb to 'food bliss.'
___
**Character Designer:** [Hizuki Higure](https://mangadex.org/author/58898e8a-597d-48fd-8cf3-e489cb2e9f7d)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation, Music

name: Game Akuyaku Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore wa, Chiito Kin'niku de Musou Suru
description: Our protagonist is reincarnated as the scum of a noble Noah Francis in the famous game "Absolute Oblige". In order to somehow evade all the game scenarios where he dies, he will have to fight against fate with his muscles!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sword Art Online: Unital Ring
description: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
tags: Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: O↑re↓mmusume JK ga Shou 4 Danshi Sugite Tanoshii
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Sakura-chan to Amane-kun
description: A story of a boy and a girl who share a secret they can't tell others.
tags: Romance, Crossdressing

name: Hataraku Saibou Neko
description: Vomiting, poisoning, constipation, vaccines, etc., what is going on inside a cat's body at that time! A must-read manga for cat people to live a healthy life with cats!
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, Medical, Slice of Life

name: Mono
description: The Photography Club is in danger of shutting down?! And the Cinema Club too?! Fret not, for they shall merge and become... Cinephoto Club! Now, club members Satsuki, An, and Sakurako are asked to be the main characters for manga artist Haruno's latest work that's centered around action cameras. The girls head out to capture the lovely sights of Japan, exploring gadgets around them, and of course, chomp on the local delicacies along the way!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Valentines' Stories - Bitter & Sweet
description: A furoku anthology for Nakayoshi's February 1996 issue, centered on Valentines' day.
tags: Romance, Anthology

name: The Predatory Marriage Between the King and the Paladin
description:
"Yes, I'll become a king. I'm going to take everything I want."

Bloody Calliope, a warlord who usurped the throne and began her quest to take control of neighboring countries.

Ezekiel, a famous, noble paladin, heads to Alpensia to stop the war.

His mission was to execute the King's command in order to stop the war, but…

What awaited him when he arrived at the Royal Palace was not his King, but the frightening Calliope.

Calliope, the warlord, and Ezekiel, the paladin, can the relationship between those two, started by force, develop into love?

---
Ezekiel is a gentle and noble paladin who commands the Order of Silver Knights in Panroem City. But when the new ruthless tyrant of Alfensiad, King Calliope, orders him to join Duke Heilich's family as his successor, he has no choice but to comply in order to save his powerless city-state. Little does he know that what he thought was a diplomatic mission would lead him into a forced marriage with "Bloody Calliope" herself! It's even more of a shock when Ezekiel discovers that Calliope is actually someone he knew in the past... and with the grudge she holds against him, it looks like he's in for a tense marriage. Can the unlikely couple clear up the misunderstandings between them and make something of their relationship, despite its rocky beginnings?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Those Who Hunt Elves
description:
Junpei, a thick-headed martial artist. Ritsuko, tomboy and gun Otaku. Airi, award winning actress. These three are transported from their homes in Japan to a High Fantasy parallel world. Enlisting the aid of the most powerful elven sorceress in the land, they try— and fail —to cast a spell that will return them home. The result? The spell is made manifest as fragments on the bodies of five elven women throughout the land. To return home, they have to collect the fragments of the spell and join them into a working spell.  
  
The catch? They don't know precisely which elves have fragments of the spell on them. The solution? Find every elf woman in the land and take off their clothes.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Otona ni Narenai Bokura wa
description: A silly and endless story about how some kids kill time while repeating July 7th every day.
tags: Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Miyaji Miyuki (16) moved away when she was little, not long after going on a spree of proposing to several different girls in kindergarten.

Years later, she returns to her hometown and transfers to a new high school, where she is forced to reckon with her past...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life

name: Jukai
description:
Kuyou Temple is a place where all kinds of cursed objects are brought.

One day, the head priest of a neighboring temple risked his life to deliver a book called the “Record of the Strange.”

But what happens when that book is opened…?!
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends... He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Wasteland: Desolation
description: After Lyren Morsman destroyed the world in the past and reshaped the world, transforming it into a "wasteland", Eric Lassen wanders in the new reality he created.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Ninja, Survival, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Philosophical, Horror, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Revelation of Youth
description: Lim Chungah is a highschool student whose household got swindled by her own trusted uncle. With her parents leaving in pursuit of finding her uncle, she is temporarily left alone to live in her uncle's empty house. HOWEVER, what if Chungah's family weren't the only ones duped by her uncle's con? Enter Millenium Adventist Church, the biggest cult in their community and one of her uncle's scam victims. Lim Chungah finds herself cohabitating with Kim Yohan, the cult leader's one and only son. Oh God, will their living situation be okay?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Tsuugakusei Nikki
description:
Anyone has a bittersweet anecdote or two about commuting to school from back when they were still students.

Even when it's cold, or when you're not allowed to take the long route and buy snacks to eat, or when you're not supposed to wear a sports jersey; just getting to exchange glances once with that person you liked made it all okay! Unfolding on the stage of a certain high school is an anthology about going to and from school, an offering meant for everyone who's ever been a student before.
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Wolf x Rabbit
description:
Shape-shifting wolf and rabbit couple  
  
  
  
[Creator's weibo](https://weibo.com/u/2673967277)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Almost 11
description:
*A mysterious story that begins with a lost child!*

The story unfolds at a lost child center where a 10-year-old boy claiming to be an alien appears... A delightfully mysterious short story by Takako Shimura.

*Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project*
[Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Tokyo Shinobi Squad
description:
Tokyo, 2049… Thanks to the Galapagos Reform enacted by the government, Russia, China, America and Japan are now connected by a Hyper Loop system. This globalization has turned Tokyo into the most crime-ridden city in the world. To fight the rising crime, those who have been working in the shadows since the Sengoku period are needed… They are…the Shinobi!  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Kazé](http://manga.kaze.fr/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
description:
Naruto was a young shinobi with an incorrigible knack for mischief. He achieved his dream to become the greatest ninja in the village and his face sits atop the Hokage monument. But this is not his story… A new generation of ninja are ready to take the stage, led by Naruto's own son, Boruto!

---

**Notes:**
- Includes the one-shot "Naruto: The Path Lit by the Full Moon".
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Dawn of the Legend
description: Japan has collapsed in the wake of a zombie outbreak. Yet Dumitru the vampire continues his journey, alongside Ren; a young survivor whom he keeps around to serve as nourishment. What does he make of this world as they wander its ruins...?
tags: Oneshot, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Ron Kamonohashi: Deranged Detective
description: This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi, a private investigator with serious issues, and Totomaru Ishiki, a pure-hearted but dim police detective, team up to solve the most baffling mysteries!
tags: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Time Paradox Ghostwriter
description: On a cold and stormy night, I decide to give up on my dream. But lightning strikes! And now I have an issue of Shonen Jump from the future! Teppei Sasaki is a passionate rookie manga artist who dreams of getting a series in Weekly Shonen Jump. One day, he gets a copy of Jump from ten years in the future. Is it all a coincidence, or is it fate? Whatever the case, destiny is about to change… Time warps! Destinies intersected! For a tomorrow that was never meant to be! The future of Jump is here!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Rosario to Vampire Season II
description:
The story continues where the first season left off only months into the future. Yuokai Gakuen has been repaired and the new semester is underway. Tsukune and gang are back, and more powerful then ever. Anti-Thesis's true identity is relieved. With new adversaries looming on the horizon, and something much more sinister then the gang has ever faced before.   
  
Tsukune is battling with the monster inside him. With the help of Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, and Yukari. Tsukune trains to get his vampire blood under control and the strength to protect what he holds dear.  
  
The new season focuses more on the girls, their past, and their families. New confrontations await them. New friends and allies will join them by their side. Together they will discover the secrets of Moka's rosary, and her lineage…  
  


---
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Shishunki Renaissance David-kun
description:
The statue of David is one of Michelangelo's greatest masterpieces and one of the most recognizable works of art of all time, right up there with the Mona Lisa. It's a celebration of the male form and also served as a warning to Rome to not infringe upon the freedoms of the city-state of Florence. But did you also know he's a panty-obsessed pervert? And a braggart? Dio bono!  
  
[Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/megapann?s=20)
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Assassination Classroom
description: In the blink of an eye, the night sky is forever changed when, with a great explosion, the moon is blasted into a permanent crescent. Confronting the governments of the world, a yellow tentacled monster boasts that it was the one responsible for the catastrophe, and in a year's time, it will do the same to Earth. Zooming around at Mach 20, the creature makes a peculiar demand: a teaching position at the prestigious Kunugigaoka Junior High School. Desperate to keep the creature in one place, the government agrees, and so the students of Class 3-E find themselves faced with an impossible task—assassinate the creature responsible for destroying the moon. But as the enigmatic creature—whom they dub Koro-sensei—educates them in both assassination and academia, the children slowly find the courage to rise up and take aim at their target: the greatest teacher the world has ever seen.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, School Life, Mystery

name: Dr.STONE
description:
Imagine waking to a world where every last human has been mysteriously turned to stone…  

One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he's not alone! His science-loving friend Senku's been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!

---
Alt. Official English: [Viz](https://www.viz.com/dr-stone)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Black Clover
description:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Banished to the Frontier for My Useless Earth Magic—Now I'm Developing My Territory Aggressively!
description:
Ecto, the third son of the Count Glenreed family, received the skill "Earth Magic" during his coming-of-age ceremony. Earth magic, which is not suitable for combat, is also called the "failure attribute". He was disowned and appointed as the lord of the ultra-remote Boda Village. However, thanks to "a certain secret", Ecto devised a way to use earth magic that ordinary people would not have thought of! Together with his bodyguard female adventurer party "Advancing Wings" and his companions, they defeat magical beasts, clear up forests, cultivate fields...

Thanks to earth magic, Boda Village undergoes remarkable development!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Hiiragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Taiyo Enomoto. Tsukino is slightly taken back by Taiyo, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she cannot hear. When she carefully reads the shape of his mouth, she finds that he is actually saying nothing but nonsense...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A Quiet Love Story with My Mute Companion on the Morning Commute
tags: Long Strip, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Goblin Slayer: Day in the Life
description: The manga will cover the story from the Goblin Slayer novel's 12th volume, and will focus on the adventurers' development as they live their everyday life.
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Ore Igai, Zenin Mushoku.
description:
Mankichi Akatsuki works for a publicly traded IT company, and his work and relationships are going great, but there's one thing that sets him apart: the rest of his family (mother, older sister, and two younger sisters) are all unemployed. Though they're all motivated, for some reason they can't find work. On top of that, his childhood friend Minayo loses her home and comes to live with them... His goal is for everyone to become independent! And to wed his childhood friend!!

(Source: Houbunsha, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: It's My Life
description:
Astra Ludger Doomsday, former captain of the royal knights has finally achieved his dearest wish: To retire and use his savings to get his very own house.  
But not long after finally arriving to his sanctuary, a young girl crashlands into his house. The girl is an apprentice witch, and seems to mistake Astra for someone else…
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Wazawai Kitsune no Kuzure-chan
description: One of the 800 tails of the mighty Disaster Kitsune has escaped confinement and manifested itself as a helpless young kitsune to find Naoto, the boy who released her through his kindness. Now Naoto feels obligated to take care of the fox-girl.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Slime wa Saikyoutaru Kanousei wo Himete iru
description: In a world where one's entire life is determined by contracts with magical beasts, Zeke, a pauper who formed a contract with the weakest of them all - a Slime - lived a life filled with regret and scorn from those around him. He eventually grew old and met a despairing end... or so he thought, until he found himself regressed to his childhood! Determined to give [Fios] - the only partner he truly connected with in his previous life - a better fate this time, Zeke resolves to turn his life around. Aiming to rise from a slum cleaner to the head of a grand merchant association, he sets his sights on the slime's ability to dissolve anything. What's more, it seems his slime partner also possesses a hidden power...?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: All-Star Saiyaman
description:
Join Son Gohan and Videl, 2 young teenage fighters descending from powerful martial artists, as they fight crime together as the infamous superheroes, Saiyaman 1 and 2!

Story takes place shortly after the defeat of Majin Buu and before the arrival of Beerus, The God of Destruction.

Be sure to support @sekora2000 on IG, Tiktok, Twitter, and Patreon!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: A-DO
description: Developed as instruments of war, the existence of the young Adou's have yet to be known by the residents of a futuristic globalised Japan. Join Riko as she spirals into a government conspiracy.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Military, Drama

name: Watashi no Arika
description: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
tags: Thriller, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
description:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Parashoppers
description: Mitsusada, a high school student with a unique way of looking at things, accidentally started a smartphone application that allows him to buy and sell special abilities. Suddenly, he is attacked by another person with special abilities, and he decides to use his abilities to fight back.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Supernatural

name: Marine Corps Yumi
description:
Nagumo Yumi is an airhead high school girl, whose post-graduation plan is to go to the US and become president. 
To her high school friends' amazement, she actually manages to make it to the US during summer vacation. 
After befriending some elderly veterans, she becomes convinced that joining the Marine Corps is the best way 
to move her dream forward. The waitress Linda Crawford joins her to sign up at the recruitment center, 
and she also makes friends among the new recruits, Rita Fernandez and Donna King. 
Will they have what it takes to become a Marine?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Military, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ponkotsu-chan Kenshouchuu
description:
Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him, but he scares people off at first sight. That is, until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her.  
  
Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God, as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year.  
  
Sure, the goal is to save the planet, but when a boy and a girl spend time together, there are more tender things to discover too!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A kind-hearted holy beast, Behemoth, awakens to find itself in the afterlife. Honored for its achievements, it is granted the opportunity to reincarnate into the future as a human. Taking on the name "Chrono," it resolves to live a new life as an adventurer. On the way to the imperial capital, Clarial, Chrono rescues an elf being attacked by bandits—only for the elf to offer their body as a token of gratitude...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultra God Mission!!!!
description: Continuation of the Super Dragon Ball Heroes manga series and adaptation to the video game of the same name. Goku and Vegeta face new opponents from across parallel timelines and different universes!
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Supernatural

name: The Band
description: As an elementary schooler, Araki Yuuhei saw a live music show and was deeply inspired. Now in middle school, he reunites with his music-loving friend Matarou and gets a strange crescent-shaped guitar. From there, Yuuhei becomes obsessed with guitar and ends up performing at his first live show with Matarou!
tags: Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Bullshit Love Stories at School
description: There are those that date publicly, those that love each other but are too dense to realize and those who date in secret. These are the bullshit love stories at school.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Isekai ni Otosareta... Jouka wa Kihon!
description:
One day, a dull young man from Japan gets caught up in a heroic summoning and goes to another world. The next time he wakes up, he's not in a castle with a king, but in a deep forest since the summoning failed! You'd think he'd be at a loss, but he starts living a life of survival with a positive attitude that doesn't involve deep thought! Then, before he knows it, he saves the cursed forest and magical beasts one after another with his magical powers, and is befriended by wolves and dogs in a healing paradise! However, he doesn't realize that they are actually legendary demonic beasts and spirits at all. What's more, that they are adored!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/flung-into-a-new-world-time-to-lift-the-200-year-curse)
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0223eu/) (Japanese)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Kanojo no Real ga Kirinukenai!
description: Riku Mikami, who is starting as a university student in the spring, finds out that his favorite VTuber is taking a hiatus. The one who cheers him up is Rui Saionji, his classmate. Will Riku resolve to make Rui his "oshi"?
tags: Romance, School Life

name: Ben 10: Bloodtrix
description:
The Omnitrix — once a weapon created by Azmuth to achieve peace — has gone terribly wrong. Now it serves as the ultimate instrument of war, and Ben Tennyson is no longer an ordinary hero. After discovering a corrupted and unstable version of the device, known as the Bloodtrix, Ben is forced to coexist with powerful, violent aliens — creatures driven by an insatiable hunger for human flesh.

Each transformation drags him further away from his humanity, blending his consciousness with that of the grotesque beings trapped within the watch — entities forged in pain, hatred, and agony. The line between hero and villain begins to fade. Will Ben be strong enough to hold on to what he believes in?

This is the story of a cursed boy... trying to be a hero.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Crime, Self-Published, Magic, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Fuu-chan has "holes." Sometimes they are big, sometimes they are small. Fuu-chan has "holes." It's exciting and thrilling. She manages to make the most out of it, both inside and outside the house. Her daily life is a tightrope, but she lives with the attitude "what doesn't kill you makes you stronger."

(Source: Square Enix, translated)
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A totally normal high schooler whose only good point is his toughness, Tetsu. The lizard he happened to pick up one day, turns out to be a super rare dragon?! Not knowing how to raise his dragon, he turns to the internet. However, his walk with his super rare dragon is a trending topic. What kind of insane turmoil will this bring into his life…? Here comes the long awaited manga adaptation of the super popular novel series!!
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Aoki Hagane no Arpeggio
description:
Suddenly, a fleet of ships with mysterious super-weapons called the "Fleet of Fog" appeared all around the world. Humanity didn't have the technology to fight such a fleet, so they were driven out of the sea…  
Seventeen years after the battle, for some reason, Gunzou Chihaya and his crewmates aboard the I-401 and the personification (Mental Model) of the I-401, Iona, started fighting the Fleet of Fog…
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
The not-so-distant future, Asticassia High School, Kanagawa Japan. A transfer student named Suletta happens to meet Miorine, the daughter of a prominent local family. With Miorine unable to find her dream for the future, Suletta makes her a proposal. -

"Wanna help me fill out my list of things I wanna do?"

These two girls and their friends spend their glory days exploring new frontiers!
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Mecha, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Satomi Oka moved to Tokyo from Osaka when he entered university. On his way home from a new year's party, he stops by a family restaurant and starts a part-time job...

---
- The MC is Satomi Oka, from author's previous work, [Let's Go Karaoke!](https://mangadex.org/title/212e9236-c0e3-4e85-ae92-087495820251)
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Brave Universe Sworgrader
description:
The story revolves around Taira Yunokami a boy in fifth grade that helps his father run a food truck. One day, he meets a famished girl in a park on his way to school. After helping the girl, the city is suddenly attacked by Glutton, an inter-dimensional threat that endangers the world. 

Amidst the chaos Sworg, a young member of the Space Administration Bureau Braver saves both Taira and the girl. Sworg has come to Earth to pursue the enigmatic and malevolent Glutton. When fate brings Sworg and Taira together, they'll find themselves unexpectedly thrust into an extraordinary journey through multiple dimensions.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha

name: Jakusha Danshi to Sorcière
description:
“Witches.”
Women who soar through the sky, wield the elements, and bend monsters to their will.

Once thought to exist only in legends, they have exploded in number in the modern age.
Now that every woman on Earth has become a witch... they have finally seized control of society.

Witches drunk on their own privilege.
And in their shadow... the losers who can barely breathe.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy

name: A Stripeless Tiger Is Now a Gal!
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi
description: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Gachankii
description: Jikkai High, with a low academic score of just nine, is a bottom-tier school where delinquents from all over the country gather, with new transfer students arriving almost every week. Our protagonist, Jou Sago, is terrible at fighting and spends his days being looked down on by everyone... but everything changes when the strongest of them all, Goku Hitomi, transfers in.
tags: Action, School Life, Delinquents

name: Tenohira Kaitaku Mura de Isekai Kenkokuki ~Fueteku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintou Life~
description:
Kai, a sickly kid, wished for a lively normal life on his deathbed when he was suddenly reincarnated into another world. Not only the boy's wishes were fulfilled, he was also gifted an ability to be a god of his own little world at the back of his palm. Yet such bliss did not last long...

Kai was abruptly separated from his loving adopted family and banished into an uninhabited island teeming with dangerous creatures. Using his ingenious wit and a help from a mysterious horned girl, Kai managed to survive and establish a small foothold with his army of cute stubby helpers. Watch as Kai tries to further tame this wilderness, building up his sanctuary and harem. Easy living!
___
**Character Designer:** [Aruya](https://mangadex.org/author/9bad1f2c-05c3-4d04-b7f3-2ea7fbca765e)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Guiding Him Patiently
description: Fashion stylist Ji Xun, who travels through ancient times, expects to marry a rich and beautiful woman and reach the pinnacle of his life, but instead he is targeted by a man who stares him down! Is all this a bad debt in this life or an unresolved bond from his past life?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color

name: All You Need Is Kill
description:
Since the alien Gitai invaded the Earth, humankind has been retreating. Now that Japan is almost surrounded by the Gitai, Keiji Kiriya is just one of many new recruits forced into a suit of battle armor and sent out to kill aliens. On a joint mission with the US special force led by Rita, known as the Bitch of the War, Keiji dies on the battlefield, only to find himself reborn.   
After 4 times of "death," Kiriya realizes that he has to win the battle to get out of the loop…  
  
**Notes:**   
- [The 2014 movie 'Edge of Tomorrow' starring Tom Cruise](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vw61gCe2oqI) is an adaptation of the original novel (with a different ending).  
  
 [Official Vietnamese](https://www.fahasa.com/all-you-need-is-kill-cuoc-chien-luan-hoi-manga-bo-2-tap.html?attempt=1)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Gal to Oyasan
description:
Kotoha is a second-year high school student who puts all her energy into her part-time job, her studies, and her fashion sense. One day, when she returns to her boarding house, she finds out that Itsuki, a university student, is her temporary landlord!? Itsuki is great at cleaning, cooking, and being considerate, but Kotoha can't hide her excitement and confusion at his perfect landlord skills and his doting attitude!

A peaceful battle between an independent-minded honor student gyaru and a naturally charming university student begins.

(Source: Pixiv, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Toudou-kun Chi no Maid Shota
description:
Rennosuke, a scion of the influential Toudou Group, has a terrible relationship with his family. He spends his days getting told off by his father and older sister, who say things like "Did you get into a fight again?" "Having a delinquent for a son of the Toudou family is an embarrassment". 
One day, Rennosuke chances upon a hungry child. The sight of that child hungrily devouring a piece of bread reminds Rennosuke of the dog he once owned, and he asks half-jokingly "If you don't have anywhere to go, why don't you come to my place?".  The child then comes to the Toudou house and starts working as a maid.
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaihara-senpai approached him. Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Warui ga Watashi wa Yuri ja nai
description: In an attempt to win her homeroom teacher's heart, Itsumi Toudou purchased a shady love potion, and tested it out on her stuck-up student committee president, Yomotsuka. Now, she has an uncharacteristically affectionate girl to deal with, and she's not even a lesbian! Right?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Futei no Olympia
description:
A dull, unreliable middle-aged salaryman, Tamaki Kuroudo, is treated as a hopeless old man by everyone. Teased about his pot belly, treated coldly by his daughter at home, and when he happens to glance at his wife’s phone, he sees suspicious call logs with one of her coworkers. 

As he spends his pathetic days, his capable subordinate Ayase Mizuki invites him to the equipment room. While helping her move some equipment, he accidentally touches her breast and she records that very moment on video. After work, he’s blackmailed with the video and taken to, of all places, a sports gym? 

The price of sexual harassment is body transformation? A secret muscle-training comedy he hides from his wife!
tags: Psychological, Sports, Office Workers

name: Otogi Bukkoro Shiamu
description:
"Granma didn't tell' em like that..."

Everyone has a favorite hero from their fairy tales, but who's the strongest of them all!?

This is a tale of death and rebirth. In order to accomplish their dream, hopes, wishes, revenge and salvation, the heroes of classic fairy tales will engage in a duel to death!

The warriors are resurrected and summoned to the Nightmare Coliseum by a mysterious monster who calls himself "Grimm P." and he promises the ultimate prize "You can resurrect anyone you want and live happily ever after"

This tournament is filled with bloody carnage, if you want to win, you better toss common sense out of the way because it is not needed.





This is a dark fantasy battle action manga where bizarre characters from fairy tales come to life. Legends like Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Pinocchio, and Beauty and the Beast engage in surrealistic killing matches. Right of the bat, we have Son Goku versus Momotaro!



32 characters will engage in sudden transformations, bloody battles, and tragic stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.



Sure grandma didn't tell 'em like that!!
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.
Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game (Yokoyomi)
description: This is the horizontal version of "Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game", which is available exclusively in digital format.
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Chernobyl no Inori
description: An adaption the critically acclaimed novel *Chornobyl Prayer: A Chronicle of the Future* by Belarusian Nobel Laureate Svetlana Alexievich, a collection of several accounts of people affected by the 1986  Chornobyl nuclear catastrophe and its aftermath.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Survival, Military, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Initializing the Sect System
description:
The protagonist, who had worked himself to the bone at the Murim Alliance, finally retires and heads back to his hometown to fulfill his dream of becoming a sect leader.

Due to his meager savings, he ends up purchasing a manor that was suspiciously cheap, and rumored to be haunted.

But then, an unfamiliar system suddenly appears before him.
