Though startled at first, the protagonist soon begins to use the system to efficiently recruit disciples and manage the sect’s finances and resources.

In time, with the help of the system, his sect grows rapidly, so much that it starts drawing the attention, wariness, and hostility of other Murim factions…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Archangel of Death
description:
During the French Revolution, a revolutionary known as the Angel of Death sent both Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette to the guillotine. His name was Saint-Just and his quest began with revenge... Delivering brutal and bloody justice to one noble after another, punishing their cruel misdeeds with death, he soon became entangled with the burgeoning revolution of the time. This is the story of the man who destroyed the kingdom of France for love.

(Source: MangaPlaza)
tags: Historical, Sexual Violence, Gore, Tragedy

name: Neoeui Wandukongeur Moggo Sipeo!
description:
Ordinary high school girl Ok Su-Yeon has a complex about her hair sticking up on her head. One day, a new transfer student comes...

"He's half-soybean?! But what? I'm a vegetable too?!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Couple of Mirrors
description: In the Republic of China, famous Shanghainese author Xu Youyi has everything anyone could want– until the day an anonymous letter arrives, revealing the truth behind her perfect life. Betrayed by both her best friend and her husband, she meets Yan Wei, the outwardly cold but inwardly warm owner of a photography studio. They click instantly, both independent yet in harmony with one another. Growing closer in the turbulent dangers that surround them, the two different women soothe the scars within each other's heart. Will they be able to save each other?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: ugly complex
description:
Ajin, who's only interested in baking, is a loyal girl who thinks "the Friendship is the best!"
When the super handsome Junwoo approaches her, an ordinary girl with glasses and braces,
her daily life begins to go awry…
"Why are you so mean to me?"
"Because I like you."
A truly heart-fluttering school romance between the straightforward Junwoo and the innocent Ajin!
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Full Color

name: Imiko to Yobareta Shoukanshi
description:
"I will show no mercy to anyone who lays a hand on my family!"


A world in which people are desperate to obtain the power of spirits, who possess enormous magical power and wisdom. Vilm, an abomination with black hair and black eyes, spends his days protecting the village with his spirit family. One day, he is forced to take responsibility for a decision he made and set off on a journey to the outside world...
An exhilarating summoning battle fantasy in which a loner and a spirit beast sister "ultimately" change the world begins now!  

The long-awaited comic adaptation of the exhilarating summoning battle fantasy in which a human x spirit family shakes the world!
  
[Orignal Webnovel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n4180ei/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kyou no Yuiko-san
description: The story of the protagonist, Tomoya, and his everyday life with his girlfriend Yuiko-san.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kokoha Kazoku Gakieru Machi
description: In the tranquil suburban town called Miho, where neighbors get along well, it is said to be the perfect place to build the “ideal family.” One day, a family moves into their long-awaited dream home. Yet, that family harbors a hidden secret…! And their neighbors conceal an even darker, more sinister truth…?!
tags: Thriller, Gore, Drama

name: Not found
description: A gate appears in Tokyo's Ginza district sometime in the 21st century. From the gate pours out monsters, knights from middle-age Europe, and other fantasy-like beings, and they kill many of the citizens of Tokyo. This event is known as the Ginza Incident. The government sends a small group of soldiers from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces to the alternate world beyond the gate. Led by otaku soldier Youji, they find that the villages in the world are being attacked by a dragon. An elf girl who is a survivor from the dragon's rampage joins the group in their travels across the dangerous new world.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There's just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world. Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Horobi Club
description:
A collection of short stories:

1-6. Horobi Club
7. Usagi no Frau
8. Happy Days
9-13. Kiri no Iitokoro de.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Truth Weavers
description:
In the country of Lavarta, mages are oppressed and seen as filthy beings. Leon is a talented but rather weak mage. Zechs is an orphan boy with great innate magical talent. Their meeting will change their lives as well as the world around them.

Note: "Lineage of sorcery" is the literal translation of the Japanese title, but it's not the official translation.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he?
___
- **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550668106005965940)
- [Official X](https://x.com/goldenman_comic)
tags: Action, Romance, Superhero, Mystery

name: Fushi no Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village
description: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he can’t bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the church’s resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chief's daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Death followed part 2
description: Not found
tags: Thriller, Traditional Games, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Dungeon no Osananajimi
description: At the bottom of an impregnable underground dungeon awaits the final boss, the mighty black dragon Obsidian. The one who dared to challenge Obsidian is Van, an experienced adventurer who has fought many battles with the dragon over the years.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Buried Injustice
description: Xue Zhao came looking for a missing woman in Chenjia Village. However, he learns that the village answers to a cult devoted to a forgotten Gu deity. Xue Zhao then tries to escape with his companions, but he soon realizes that there are even more terrifying, hidden secrets within the village. These unknown horrors go far beyond anything he could have imagined...
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Ichigo Mashimaro
description: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kinnikuman
description:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Maju Battlefront
description:
A secret society of scientists seek to create advanced humanoid lifeforms through the hybrid of man and beast for their almighty Lord Yeshu and the new world that is nigh.   
When young Shin'ichi Kuruma is pulled into this inhuman pursuit and loses everything, his path of bloody vengence leads him into the depths of a conspiracy greater than he could ever imagine.   
  
From Ken Ishikawa, creator of Getter Robo and Kyomu Senki, is a tale of biblic myth, violent patricide and monstrous demonbeasts. This is Majuu Sensen: The Demonbeast Battlefront!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Kanojo ga Senpai ni NTR-reta node, Senpai no Kanojo wo NTR-masu
description: Yuu Isshiki, is a freshman in college. For the first time in his life, when he learned that Karen, his girlfriend was sleeping with his senior in the circle, Kamokura, he was so shocked, angered, and desperate that he called Kamokura's girlfriend, Touko, and told her with an impulse. Please have sex with me, Touko senpai! " If you get NTR-ed, then the return should be NTR as well! A topical "revenge" romantic comedy that depicts the relationship between the mind and body of four college students, a shocking story now in manga form!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ane no Musume (Serialization)
description: Her trust broken by her girlfriend, Saya moves out of the room they were living in, and, with nowhere else to go, she has no choice but to stay with her sister's family. There, she reunites with her sister's daughter, Rui, who she often used to play with when she was younger. Rui used to be such an innocent girl, but now she's almost like succubus meant to lead people astray, boasting calculating smiles and charm unbefitting of her age. Day after day Saya is filled with confusion and doubt, her resolve gradually wavering away due to Rui's intimate sense of distance, until eventually she loses sight of any reason to turn Rui down...
tags: Romance, Incest, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!
___
There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
By the time he opened his eyes, Kubota Tamotsu (34 years old) has been reincarnated into another world. Moreover, as a 6 years old slave with "Level 1 Barrier" skill. To surpass his limitations and become a powerful Barrier master Kubota begins a hellish training, full of obstacles and struggles.
___
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3631do/)  
[Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/130407/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Dragon Ball Z - Elsewhere (Doujinshi)
description:
A Dragonball side-story fan comic set during the seven years between the defeat of Cell and the coming of Majin Buu. Yamcha, long-time ally of Goku, finds himself lost at a crossroads in his life. Thrust back into his mysterious past, Yamcha is forced into a position where he must face his fears, failures, duties, and the culmination of the myths and legends of the Dragonball universe!  
  
This fan comic started in 2001 and took a hiatus for a few years between 07-14. Expect the first few chapters to be a bit rough because of their age!  
  
Read LEFT to RIGHT!
tags: Action, Adventure, Doujinshi

name: Duffle Coat Army
description:
Six transfer students transfer to a high school on the same day. After school, they gather at karaoke to talk girls...but what they thought was a rather disturbing strategy meeting was taking place. The Yamato Liberation Front is behind the secret plan to bomb a school. In order to save the school and the country from the crisis, a special force made up of high school girls, ``Duffle Coat Army,'' moves into action! 

Version Française : Six étudiantes sont transférées dans un lycée le même jour. Après l’école, elles se réunissent pour chanter au karaoké et discuter entre filles…

Sans se douter qu’au même moment, une réunion stratégique des plus dangereuses se déroule dans l’ombre.

Dans le secret le plus total, le Front de libération du Yamato, un groupe terroriste, finalise les préparatifs d’un attentat à la bombe visant l’établissement où elles ont été transférées : le compte à rebours est déjà lancé.

Pour sauver l’école — et protéger le pays d’une menace grandissante — la Duffle Coat Army, une unité spéciale composée de lycéennes, entre en action !
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Military, Drama, Tragedy

name: JESUS Sajin Kouro
description:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Drama, School Life, Police

name: AV Danyuu Hajimemashita
description: When your company goes bankrupt and your marriage is on the rocks, what’s a guy to do? Move to Tokyo to become an adult film star, of course! This diary-style comedy explores the pitfalls of an everyman who tries to break into the world of porno because it seems like a pleasurable way to restart his life. He soon learns that it’s a harder job than he bargained for!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: "SHOPSKILL" Sae Areba, Dungeon ka Sita Sekaidemo Rakusyou da ~Hakugai Sareta Shounen no Saikyou Zamaa Life~
description: High school student Boji Nichiro is isolated from the rest of the world due to fierce bullying. One day, however, the world is transformed by the "dungeonisation" phenomenon! In the midst of the chaos, Nichiro awakens the unique skill "Shop". It was an out-of-the-box skill that allowed him to buy everything from food and daily necessities to unrealistic items!
tags: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shikyouin Hibiki no Kareinaru Oasobi
description:
PriPara is a place where anyone can be an idol. However, a major update went haywire and now PriPara is in danger of disappearing! In the fashion capital of PriParis, the former Prisiennes who used to be charming and sparkly idols have lost their memories and now go about their day-to-day lives feeling as though they’re missing something. 

Things suddenly change when one of these Prisiennes receives an invitation card. On a sleepless night, the rich scent of casablanca fills the air and Phantom Thief Genius Neo appears.

“Bienvenue! Let us fall together into nighttime Idol Land PriPara!”

Shikyouin Hibiki’s brilliant play begins in secret while a detective named Chris searches for the truth behind Phantom Thief Genius Neo!
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Drama

name: Futari Solo Camp
description:
Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo.
___
**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: San Yan Xiao Tian Lu
description:
The heavenly general Yang Jian, also known as god Erlang Shen, was ordered to descend to the mortal realm for the task of get rid of demons and evil spirits.  
After he woke up in the mortal realm, he noticed that Taishang Laojun who was in charge of his transfer absused his power and reincarnated Yang Jian as a woman.  
 Yang Jian is not used to this new body and to make things more worse it seems that he can't use his full power. now he must learn to adapt to modern society and take care of a hidden danger that is going to put the whole world into chaos.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: She's My Type
description: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Zatsu Tabi - That's Journey
description: Chika, who just started her career as a manga artist, was trying to find a right story for her first manga but her editor was rejecting all of her stories. Exhausted, Chika suddenly came up with an idea to travel somewhere. Somewhere, not here. She asked her social media followers which direction she should go. When the direction was decided, she sets out for her trip--a trip without any plans. First, she travels north--despite not knowing what awaits her, she manages to eat and see amazing things which she never expected. She stays in a fantastic place, enjoys everything. Sometimes, her friends join her trip... which she enjoys also.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A fateful encounter in a foreign land...
Zack, a blond-haired, blue-eyed wandering traveler. Grace, a wealthy, brown-skinned man from a desert nation. They are oil and water from the moment they meet. Working for the infuriating Grace is already a challenge, but when a night time summons reveals the true, intimate meaning of “attending to his everyday needs,” a romantic adventure and a battle of wits and wills begins!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor
description:
One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. 

And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Doumo, Suki na hito ni Horegusuri wo Iraisareta Majo desu
description:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://crossinfworld.com/Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Punishing: Gray Raven — In Sync with You
description:
"Could you get closer to me? Like the dream that will never come true. What's in the dream...? It's a secret."

This is a story about Liv and the Gray Raven Commandant — a tale of connection and healing. 

In reality, no matter the circumstances, Liv has never given up hope. Perhaps for her, fairy tales can come true.

Created by meteorgale, an officially approved content creator on PGR's Global server. Artists: meteorgale and zenokim. 

Primarily slice of life genre/romance, not action.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: I'm the Great Immortal
description:
In his previous life, he was a peerless genius in the Immortal World but was killed by 3 celestial beings.  
  
He exploded to death and accidentally got reborn to his 20s back on Earth.  
  
Determined to return to the Immortal World, he became the strongest man on Earth who can control clouds and rains at his will, and whoever offends him will have no choice but to disappear completely!  
  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Long-Awaited Feelings
description:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I've Never, Ever Learned This
description: Serika's younger cousin, Taichi, 6 years her junior had passed his university entrance exams and until he's found a place to rent, Serika will be looking after him. Although he appears to be as pretty as girl and a sweet angel, he's grown into a sadist devil in the time they haven't seen each other! He suddenly hugs her and kisses her - Serika's self control is on the brink of collapsing before Taichi, who has grown into such a splendid man.
tags: Romance, Incest, Reverse Harem, Office Workers, Drama

name: Keishichou Majuu Taisakushitsu – Oukami Keiji to Mezame no Kenja
description:
The story is set in Japan, 700 years after the age of swords and magic, where science has replaced magic. Social problems caused by magic and magical beasts are on the rise, and the Metropolitan Police Department establishes the Metropolitan Police Department's Magical Beast Control Division to deal with them. Kamishima Jingo, a werewolf (lycanthrope), is investigating a horrific case as a detective in the Magical Beast Control Division.

Meanwhile, the great elven sage Sajuel, who had been asleep for 700 years in preparation for the return of the Demon King, wakes up. However, the Demon King was resurrected and defeated 40 years ago. Sajuel is shocked to learn this, but he lends his wisdom to the Magical Beast Control Division and begins investigating with Kamishima and the others. A fantasy of magic and police unfolds.
tags: Crime, Magic, Fantasy, Police, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Tensei Youjo.: Shinjuu to Ouji to, Saikyou no Oji-san Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru
description: Upon awakening, a little girl named Lizey finds herself standing alone in an unfamiliar meadow. In front stands a massive dog. Such a creature had never been seen near home before. At that moment, a conclusion forms that this must be what is called reincarnation into another world. Soon, a band of muscular mercenaries appears, seemingly on a mission to subdue the giant dog. However, it turns out this dog is no ordinary beast, but a divine beast. The divine beast, Ranag, becomes deeply attached to Lezay, the only one it can communicate with. In response, leader Alragia offers to take both Lezay and Ranag under the protection of the mercenary troop...? A little girl, a divine dog, and a mercenary squad. This is a bizarre off-world fantasy with some strange members!(Source: Alpha Manga)
tags: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ayuuah
description:
In a dream, Riku is being called to a strange place he does not know.
Living in a small forest around the Mother Tree, these woods are all that Riku, Axi and Ben have ever known.

However, they are drawn to the edges of this World, seeking somewhere.
Somewhere that seems to be calling for them...
tags: Action, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Houseki wo Kau
description: One day, Nayu, who quit her job due to social phobia, meets Karen, who is as beautiful as a jewel. Karen has a high fever and is curled up outside. Unable to bear the sight, Nayu takes Karen into her house, bathes her, and takes care of her. However, Karen is homeless and moves from one friend's house to another, and by chance, they end up living together. Sensitive Nayu and free-spirited Karen. Nayu's closed heart gradually opens up as she sees the contrasting lives of the two, and she begins to have special feelings for them. However, it seems that Karen is hiding a secret from her past--!?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Double Hard
description: Hayami Daiki, half of the legendary team “Two-Man Army” and an unbeaten knuckle-fighter, has come back from Los Angeles. His partner is Takayama Jin, a big-name that even the yakuza take their hats off to. The ultimate duo, Two-Man Army, is back!!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Delinquents

name: Black Snow. White Moon. Eternal Blossom.
description: For what reason, do they continue to live? For what reason, do they continue to eat? They put on the most beautiful masks and commit the cruelest acts. White moon, Black snow, Withered maiden, Eternal blossom. Vicious X Evil, Tyrant X Unhinged, Maiden X Maiden, Hunter X Prey. This is a poem of self-reflection, or a stimulating speech for this numbing world...
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: My Lovey-Dovey Wife is a Stone Cold Killer
description: Meet Setsuna. She’s cute, sexy, and deadly. When she's not out murdering people as a professional assassin, she’s nesting at home, trying to adjust to a domestic life with her new husband. She skewers ingredients for dinner, draws a knife on unwanted solicitors, and sleeps with one eye open, just in case enemies sneak in. Her lovestruck husband doesn't ask her a lot of questions about her day job, so this arrangement can work if love conquers all, right?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crime, Slice of Life

name: Kouhai-chan Who Wants to Tease
description: A Kouhai wants to tease her senpai, but she has a weak defense.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Arcadia Service - Kaishi kara San Nen Imasara Hajimeru Kasou Sekai Kouryaku
description: Despite its ultra-premium price tag of 3 million yen per unit, the full-dive VR game "Arcadia" continues to captivate players. Haru, who spent all three years of high school working part-time jobs, finally gets his hands on an "Arcadia" system where a fateful encounter awaits him in-game...?!
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Watashi yori Tsuyoi Otoko to Kekkon shitai no - Seiso na Biji Seito Kaichou (Jitsu wa Moto Banchou) no Himitsu wo Shiru Inkya (Jitsu wa Kanojo wo Koeru Saikyou no Yankee)
description: Akira Kogure, an introverted loner high-school student befriends the student council president Shizuka Takasaki, who excels in both academics and athletics, blessed with beautiful looks from birth. Though their relationship may seem to be normal, both are keeping a secret that they can't reveal to anyone?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Adaptation

name: Jigoku ni Ochite yo, Onii-chan
description: College student Yuudai spends his days heartbroken after an untimely breakup with his first girlfriend. He is filled with a sense of emptiness, but when he meets his new younger sister Yuna, who has moved in with him after their parents remarried, he feels more than love at first sight. However, Yuna has a big secret…
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Lin Tian reincarnated as a goblin, the lowest rank of magical creatures, and initially, he had to lie low. Later, he fully unleashed the true nature of a goblin. Blessed with many offspring, the more children he has, the stronger he becomes thanks to the blessings from the gods!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Otona no Houkago
description: Short comedy series about a bunch of adults (and some children) who are somehow connected to one another.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
"Please teach us naughty things."

One day, Itsuki is transported to another world, where he is confronted by sisters who serve the goddess. In order to return to the real world, he must give them practical sex education!
tags: Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Chuuzai-san to Watashi
description: A human drama depicting the encounter between a delinquent high school girl and an unpredictable local police officer. Ura, who lives in the rural town of Tsuzumi, surrounded by mountains and national highways, doesn't like the new local police officer who has been assigned to the town. She thought he was a smirking guy who was disrespected by the townspeople and had no authority. However, a certain incident causes Ura's image of the local police officer to change.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Wakaranai Desu Yoshida-san
description:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Rikuto, an illustrator, and his wife Natsuki, a civil servant, have been married for a week. Their newlywed life has only just begun. His wife is too perfect in every way, but Rikuto can't forget the way he once saw her in a disheveled state. He wants to see her again in a disheveled state somehow, but he always ends up being defeated!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Shinmai Renkinjutsushi no Tenpo Keiei
description:
After her parents are killed by bandits, young Sarasa Feed is sent to an orphanage where she learns about the prestigious world of alchemy. Determined to follow in her late parents' footsteps and become an independent business owner, she enrolls at the Royal Alchemist Academy to train and get certified as an official alchemist.

Five years later, Sarasa graduates from the institution and nearly achieves her dream before realizing that she lacks the funds to do so. Left with little choice, she makes do with a low-priced storefront in a town situated far away from the bustling capital. Despite the threat of treacherous terrain and dangerous monsters in the remote countryside, Sarasa begins her exciting new life as an alchemist.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/management-of-a-novice-alchemist)
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Oku-san
description: The series follows Kyouko Okita, a buxom housewife who's just recently moved into a new neighbourhood with her husband. There she tries to adjust to her new neighbourhood, make new friends, and deal with the quirkiness of her everyday life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Gal to Dungeon to Shuukai Okure no Tansaku Eiyuutan ~Moto Legend Ima wa Wakeari tei Rank Tansakushana Ore ga, S-Kyuu Gal ni Natsukare Makutte Ikusei wo Makase Sareta~
description: Kaoru Kunou, a former legend known as the "Dungeon Maniac," is now, for certain reasons, a bottom-tier explorer. Though worn out by reality, he continues to chase the fleeting dreams and youth of his past. One day, by chance, he saves S-class gal streamer Shion from a crisis, and she falls for him at first sight. Initially flustered by Shion’s overwhelmingly bright and charming advances, Kaoru gradually finds himself healed and drawn to her. Eventually, the two form a temporary mentor-student duo and set out to challenge the depths of a dungeon tied to their pasts, but what lies ahead!?
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Kahe Tantei Bu
description: Tsubamegaoka Private Academy - All Girls' High School, located just inside the city and has clubs a plenty. From the common ones to some freakishly impressive ones, it varies greatly. It's always okay to make one, no matter what kind of club. It's not uncommon to see students join this school for the sole purpose of making a new club. But what happens when five girls want to make a club and only one new club is allowed?
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yamikin Ushijima-kun
description:
During the past decades, Japan has become the shining star of Asia, with its noteworthy achievements in the fields of science, technology, medicine, quality of life, and many others.

Yet, while there are a great number of rich and successful Japanese people, there are even more of those engaged in a furious struggle for something as simple as earning to cover their day-to-day living expenses; all the while battling dangerous and money-consuming addictions such as gambling and alcoholism.

What would these poor and not-so people do when they require the money to fulfill their never-ending desires, the desires that are part and parcel of being human? Just how miserable and dangerous might their lives become were they to fall into traps laid by *yamikin*, the loan sharks of the Japanese financial world's dark side, whose only goal is to ensnare such weak-willed souls?

Adapted into film and a J-Drama.

---  
- **Won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2011**
- **Won the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award in 2020**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: Demon Slayer - Zenitsu's Final Selection (Doujinshi)
description:
A doujinshi imagining Zenitsu’s Final Selection.
This is something I posted on Clip Studio Share last year.
I wanted to draw Zenitsu's cool side.
Note: Contains some blood and mob demons.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Drama, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yokohama Buddy Paradox
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Not found
description: Follow the daily school life of Galko, Otako, and Ojou in this series of comedic short stories. Galko has a tendency to speak rudely, but she's basically friends with everyone. Otako is the quiet loner of the class, but she is good friends with Galko. Ojou speaks her mind freely and naturally.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Song of the Riverbank
description:
There are many perils in this desert world. Countries war and enslave, goblins prey on humans, monsters and magic run amok, and — most critically — wells run dry. Those desperate for water may undertake an ancient water prayer ritual, a grueling journey to beg the aid of Kahaku, the god of water. These are the various stories of people from all walks of life, each driven by their need to survive in that world and save the ones they love. Sometimes, these desperate souls cross paths with a pair of travelers, En and Jinghua, who help them on their journey.  
  
A series of interconnected oneshots, each volume with a different title.  
  
Volume 1: Kishibe no Uta  
Volume 2: Kumo o Koroshita Otoko  
Volume 3: Touzoku no Mizusashi  
Volume 4: Akumujou no Aruji  
Volume 5: Tabibito no Ki  
Volume 6: Kageboushi-tachi no Shima  
Volume 7: Kita no Ouji to Minami no Sakana  
Volume 8: Kareno no Hanayome  
Volume 9: Tsukikage no Choujou
Volume 10:  Suna no Shita no Shirabe
tags: Historical, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tatsuki Fujimoto Short Story Collection
description:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Love Thy Neighbor
description: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Huijin Huayuan
description: In the medieval witch-hunting religious tribunal, the squad leader, who only slaughtered foreign tribes, was appointed to care for the vampire—an experimental subject who happened to be the murderer of her father.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Mietemasu yo! Aizawa-san
description:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Death Note
description:
A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm.  
  
High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.  
  
With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.
tags: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: BADBOYS
description:
Tsukasa Kiriki is a boy that comes from a rich family. He spends his life sheltered from the outside by his parents undetermined to change. That is until his homeschool teacher, Mrs. Michie, says something that gives him the drive to be a delinquent. These are how he spends his days as a Bousouzoku.  
  
This manga ran for 22 volumes from 1988-1996.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=3260) (anime)
tags: Action, Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Saint Seiya: Episode G Requiem
description: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Blade of the Immortal
description:
"To end his eternal suffering, he must slay one thousand enemies!" Manji, a ronin warrior of feudal Japan, has been cursed with immortality. To rid himself of this curse and end his life of misery, he must slay one thousand evil men! His quest begins when a young girl seeks his help in taking revenge on her parents' killers… and his quest won't end until the blood of a thousand has spilled!  

[Official English](https://digital.darkhorse.com/series/373/blade-of-the-immortal)

- **Won the 1st Japan Media Arts Award Division Excellence Prize**

name: Shinigami no Hanayome: Yomei 7-nichi kara no Koufuku
description:
The reaper loves seeing the cries of humans before swinging down his scythe to reap their souls. He lives for the hunt of humans souls before their passing. Yet one night, he encounters a dying girl with flowers blooming in her room looking back at him with a smile.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/bride-of-the-death-god)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: This Beast Stays Awake All Night
description:
"I know that? The more you push away, the worse you want to be.”

She was willing to become a villain for revenge.
In front of me, a brave knight of the Empire, Count Weiss, the emperor's right-hand man, appears.
He is the ragged boy whom I abandoned long ago.
The beautiful face that was crying is still good in my eyes, but now he has become a dangerous man and approaches without hesitation.

“So did you approach me? Do you have to take it from me to marry the princess?”
“Well, was that really what I wanted?”

Deadly cohabitation with this beast.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: One day, Haruto Akihara, a high school student living alone, moves in with his classmate Rei Mikoto, an extremely beautiful girl! Rei, nicknamed the "Goddess of Ice", has a cold attitude towards Haruto, who is devoted to her, but gradually...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I'd Rather Be the King
description:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Rine🐈‍⬛ to Hinano🐕
description: Daily moments between childhood friends who are secretly in love with each other.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Meririrarariri
description: When she loses her calm, she is unable to use magic. In order to become a great witch, Merrily has lived her life according to her mother's teachings, keeping her mind clear no matter what. Then one day, Merrily meets a boy named Danka. As she interacts with him, Merrily's heart changes...
tags: Oneshot, Action, Magic, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Seventh
description:
Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: An Extra Stole the Male Leads
description:
Reborn as Selonia Bessin, the heroine of a romance fantasy novel, a girl is thrust into a demon-slaying mission with the novel's three male leads. They successfully defeat the demon lord, but Selonia falls unconscious for three months on the journey back. Upon awakening, she discovers the trio is now enamored with Grace Benet, an unknown extra. Moreover, the supposedly defeated demon lord is back in hot human form! Why has he returned, and who is this mysterious Grace stealing the limelight?

---
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Azelda: Spirit Master's Contract Marriage
description: Not found
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Lady Dragon
description:
A being that appears to be human, but is stronger than them, Shil. These mysterious beings scattered throughout the world, remain dormant unless Simeone bestows them with a name. After that, their only purpose is to protect that person. Julitan, a simple cook in a small fishing village, encounters a Shil and gives her a name that resembles her crimsom eyes. “Please, tell me my name”. She requests. “Kanellian, the contract holder of noble souls, swears to become the servant of Knight Julitan as her master.” However, Julitan soon realizes that his ordinary abilities cannot handle Kanellian’s extraordinary powers. In the end, he embarks on a long journey to find a new contract holder capable of matching her formidable abilities…

---

**Original Novel**
* [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62069534), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=9860252), [Ridi](https://ridibooks.com/books/5054003184), [Mr. Blue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/E000108506), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/novel/detail.asp?serial_num=sf6306), [Onestory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H044600040)

**Official Translation**
* [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/151715)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ann's Forbidden Memories
description:
In a small village that suffers from famine, a young girl full of life named Ann does her best to face the challenges life throws at her.

---
You can find chapter previews and sketches on the author's [Twitter](https://twitter.com/pokorotomas).
tags: Loli, Historical, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: 【Oshi no Ko】After story
description:
This work takes its own route from the original "Oshi no Ko" manga from chapter 158. It portrays a daily life of Aqua and Ruby.

What whould happen if Fuyuko Niino actually stabbed Ruby Hoshino, being envious of young idol's success?
tags: Reincarnation, Psychological, Romance, Incest, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: I Was That Trash
description:
I possessed the body of a villainess inside a reverse harem romance-raising game.
Tullia Frazier, the F-rank villainess destined to be executed after committing every evil deed imaginable.

"How am I supposed to survive with stats this awful?!"
"What's with that insolent tone?!"

No money, no luck, and literally hated by everyone.
No one loves me, but if I want to live...

I'll have to grind every stat to the top
and max out the male leads' affection until I reach A-rank!

"No matter what it takes, I'm going to survive!"
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Gibbet Room
description: A girl's memories, emotions and humanity are shattered like so many pieces of a puzzle. Lacey, a girl who's lost everything falls into a labyrinth of chaos. To step inside, is to step into a world of chaos and death. The Gibbet Room. Even so, the girl opens the door, to find what she has lost, herself.
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Magic, Gore, Horror, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: In modern Japan, where vampires that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as Madara Villa, a unit notorious for being full of troublemakers. Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly “dangerous”, even among the eccentric residents of Madara Villa.
tags: Action, Gore, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Koi no Tsuru wa Hanarerarenai
description: Yuu practiced archery in his grandfather’s dojo until he met Hajime. Both join their school's archery club and aim for nationals, but in reality Yuu has no interest in tournaments despite possessing amazing talent and ability, in fact joining the club was due to Yuu's secret feelings for Hajime.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sports, School Life

name: Yari no Yuusha no Yarinaoshi
description:
***The comedy spin-off story focuses on the Spear Hero, Motoyasu Kitamura.***   
  
Summoned to another world to serve as the Spear Hero, Motoyasu Kitamura is a pitiful young man who eventually finds himself only able to love filolials. But after being fatally injured in battle, Motoyasu wakes up yet again in the exact circumstances of when he was first summoned. It turns out that his spear possesses an ability known as Time Reversal! With his stats unaffected by the reset, Motoyasu decides to fight once more. His motivation: to once again see the smile of Filo, the filolial that he loves more than any other! Could this be considered the start of a new game in god mode?! The long-awaited otherworldly redemption fantasy begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: BLUE GIANT SUPREME
description:
After leaving his mark on Japan, Dai is taking on Europe!

Direct continuation of Blue Giant, a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich, without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English, he manages to secure a roof over his head, food and drink, but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.
 
A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe, from Germany to France, accompanied by his instrument, growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.


[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Karaoke Iko!
description:
"Can you give me some tips to sing well?"

The head of the chorus club, Satomi, gets entangled with a yakuza called Kyouji and was asked for singing lessons. Kyouji really wants to get better at singing so he kidnaps Satomi every week despite his unwillingness to teach him to sing.

But before long, a strange friendship begins to grow between the two of them…?
tags: Comedy, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead
description: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai (♀) to Gisou Kekkon Shitemita
description:
Morimoto is getting bugged by her parents to marry (a guy). Her (female) kouhai suggests she fake her marriage so her parents would stop but they will scrutinize every guy she might choose no matter what. Since there's a new law that allows homosexuals to marry, her kouhai suggests herself; only this kouhai has confessed to her before. What will become of their married life?  
  
Incluedes additional oneshot: Anaerobic Love  
Your back is always facing me. I'm watching you way up close.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Coppers
description: An overview of the entire precinct and the characters.  A police procedural but it shifts towards their personal, everyday lives. Fairly lighthearted takes on the lives of a group of cops working out of a precinct in the Bronx, with a running commentary on the importance of doughnuts.
tags: Action, Drama, Police

name: Touch
description:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

---
- **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Sasaki, a member of an occult club, is told by his junior colleague Kurihara about the existence of a certain blog. The blog has many “pictures” drawn by the blogger's wife, “Yuki”. A chilling story that unravels the mystery hidden in nine pictures! When the mystery is solved, all the incidents will be connected.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/uketsu_hennae)
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Drama, School Life, Horror, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Seasons of Blossom
description:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Isekai Izakaya "Nobu"
description:
Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"!
___
Adapted from [web novel (raw)](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9773bj/) / light novel of same name.
- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%B1%85%E9%85%92%E5%B1%8B%E3%80%8C%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B6%E3%80%8D)
tags: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...?
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Aliens

name: Mobile Suit Gundam - Valpurgis EVE
description:
Haman Khan's sister stands up for her country!

In January 0089 of the Universal Century, Neo Zeon is defeated by AEUG in the final battle. Defeated by the ZZ Gundam, Haman Karn is killed in battle, and the remaining Neo Zeon warriors decide to fight in mourning. In order to counter the one-sided attack, Serana Khan, Haman Khan's sister, makes a sortie with the NT exclusive MS prototype Demartell. The secret story of the birth of the fake Haman Karn from "Mobile Suit Gundam Valpurgis" and the story of the birth of Over. On, which has never been told before, will be depicted!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha

name: Yaiba!
description:
**From Toriyama's World:**  
Yaiba's whole life has been spent training to be a samurai and he doesn't know about anything else, not even girls. When he returns to Japan, a pair of cursed swords makes life even more exciting… and hilarious.  
  
Note: Starting at chapter 80, EMS Team started using bunko scans, so the volume numbering is a little different.  
  
---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award in 1993**

- Published in Indonesian by Elex Media Komputindo as **Yaiba**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Double Play
description: Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed... Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.
tags: Romance, Sports, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Bungou Stray Dogs
description: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Drama, Vampires, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
The Saintess Luna used her immense power to save the people, only to be executed for a crime she didn't commit. Now, she's been reincarnated 300 years in the future, with all of her incredible powers intact.

"I don't care if someone's in trouble anymore. I'll never save anyone again. I'm going to become a villainess!"

With this new vow, she enrolls in the Saintess Academy, aiming to secure the role of the story's villainess. She even starts a side career as an adventurer, hiding her true identity beneath an armor. But her overwhelming holy power ends up causing massive trouble wherever she goes?!
___
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0740ih/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Korogaru Hoshi No Asuterizumu
description:
In a Japan laid to waste by a meteorite strike, two survivors, Habane and Saku, travel the desolate landscape in a lone 4x4. They have a single goal: to journey south to a place where they can finally see the Southern Cross in the night sky. But their path is far from easy, as every person they encounter on the road is more eccentric, unpredictable, and dangerous than the last...

(Source: Comic Days, translated)
tags: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou - 30 Day Countdown Until the Final Volume (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Reincarnation, 4-Koma, Doujinshi, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: BE BLUES ~Ao ni Nare~
description:
If you're born in Japan and you play football, you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends, Yuuto and Yuki, their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!  
The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.  
  
Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.  


---
tags: Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter
description:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Harem, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Joshikousei no Mudazukai
description: One day out of boredom, Tanaka decided to give her classmates nicknames based on their quirks. Her friend Kikuchi became "Ota" for her nerdy interests and her other friend Saginomiya became "Robo" because of her expressionless face. In retaliation, her friends decided to name Tanaka "Baka".
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Catbox Reverse
description: For the sake of saving her most precious person, the fourteen-year-old girl Ai Wen enters a time machine. However, before she knows it, she has accidentally travelled to the future! There, she meets Ulysses and many other previously unimaginable characters…
tags: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu ~Gakkou no Minna to Isekai no Mujintou ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou desu~
description: I'm Shinomiya Hokage, a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day, everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then, I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but I’m the leader in this world.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sirens Won't Sing For You
description:
Towa Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya. Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Towa musters up the courage to confess to him—only to get completely rejected on the spot! But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret...?

(Source: MANGA Plus)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Police

name: My Childhood Friend Is A Dragon Who's Embarrassed About the Size Of Her Tail
description:
Life's already tough for a dragon girl with an unusually large tail, but when she starts having feelings for her childhood best friend, life gets even tougher. With a little help from her friends, maybe she'll be able to navigate the trials and tribulations of young love.

An original 4-page webcomic formerly hosted on Twitter, now available in chapter format.

Reads left to right.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
As an apprentice adventurer, Serk was nothing more than his party's errand boy. After being constantly ridiculed and called useless, he was eventually kicked to the curb by the very comrades he served.

But his former party had no idea what they’d just thrown away. They had no idea that Serk's long, thankless life of running errands had caused an incredible, new talent to blossom within him.

He now wields the "SSS-Rank Shopping Skill",  a unique power that makes him stronger with every single purchase. By buying and massively enhancing items, Serk is ready to become an unstoppable force on his quest to become the most powerful adventurer in the world!
tags: Action, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ore ga Isekai no Goshujinsama!? ~Daredemo "Ore no Senzoku Maid" ni Suru Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ken~
description: Exhausted from working at a black company, the protagonist longed for a peaceful life and is reincarnated into another world. But the one overseeing reincarnation was a strange goddess who loved maids.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota

name: Outo One Ope Golem Master. Masakano Tsuihou!? ~Jiyuu no mi ni Nattanode Deshi no Bijin Yuusha-tachi to Issho ni Saikyou Gouremu Tsukurimasu. Modotte Koi to Iwarete mo Mou Shiran!~
description:
Horace, man who was singlehandedly handling the Diamante Kingdom's operations by using a countless number of machine puppets called [Golems] remotely by using his skill that goes beyond comprehension, was dismissed from his work thanks to an ignorant noble. He set out on a leisurely journey to search for ore to aid his research, but... the beautiful hero (disciple) who admired him wouldn't let him be!! She had already made preparations to build him a home in order to repay him but it was all a ploy to keep him for herself?!

But not only did the tomboyish female alchemist barge in as well, he also caught the attention of the troublesome eldest son of a marquis...

"Come at me, I'll settle this with one punch."
"As expected of my master!!"

Unwavering like a rock, unleashing a devastating single punch that shows no mercy!
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: My Co-worker Is an Eldritch X!
description: An Eldritch being disguises itself as a convenience store worker to understand the meaning of life.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Danna ga inu ni natta
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Salvos (A Monster Evolution LitRPG)
description:
The Netherworld: A world inhabited only by Demons, creatures born from the dark abyss. For Salvos, a curious newborn Demon with a penchant for making friends, surviving this hellish landscape was always going to be a difficult task.

And when her companion's life is threatened by a mysterious Demon King, she'll have to adapt, gain experience, and evolve to do what it takes to save him. Even if it means separating from him and being tossed into an unfamiliar world with Humans, monsters, and a bright blue sky where she is scorned for being born a Demon.

After all, the law of evolution is survival of the fittest, and Salvos will survive.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shiikuin-san wa Isekai de Doubutsuen Tsukuritainode Monsutaa wo Tenazukeru
description:
Tame dragons, Cerberus, and all kinds of monsters to create your dream zoo!

The ambition of Ikuhara, who was suddenly thrown into another world, is to build a zoo filled with animals, but before him are monsters never seen on Earth...!

With the knowledge and skills of a zookeeper, he can tame any monster, as long as it is a living thing. First, let's start by taming Cerberus, which is ranked A in danger!

An exciting breeding comedy set in another world begins!!


  
Author’s twitter:

name: Umamusume Pretty Derby: Zero Catches : Call me KING
description:
El Condor Pasa, Special Week, Grass Wonder finished their career with impressive results before entering Dream Trophy

King Halo, hasn’t won a G1

Seiun Sky, suffer an injury

Darkness is approaching both,

They are facing pressure, expectation and most dangerous, self-doubt…

Trainers won’t abandon them of course, but is that enough to help them achieve their dream?

What will be their ending? Triumphant victory or a pathetic failure?

Only our Uma can decide for themselves

name: The Villainess and Miss Demon Lord
description:
Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: NekoDamari
description: Imagine going home after a tiring shift from work… when you open the door, there lies a paradise of three fluffy house cats! This story is about a tired office lady living with her three unique cats. They interrupt her meals and when she's cleaning, and has to put up with their moody attitudes. Her everyday life is constantly at the mercy of her cats!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Boita Boine
description: Haine is a boyish tomboy highschool girl who wants her very own yuri harem. She gets confident after helping a girl on the first day of school, but standing in the way of her goal is Shizuka, another boyish highschool girl who's seen as a prince and steals girls' hearts without even trying! Haine's new goal is to defeat Shizuka and build her yuri harem! A yuri comedy full of ruthlessness and bickering between two rival tomboys!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hajimete no Gal
description: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: The Concept-Grasping Magical Genius
description:
Pauline became a mother figure to Rowan, who had lost everything. After Pauline left, Rowan grieved her and awakened to a power called 'Mana'. What's more, Rowan could even see the Mana of other people! 

Through mana, even though he's apart from Pauline, he can always feel like she's with him...

One day, Rowan encounters a shocking sight of Pauline, who he believed had left for a noble family.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon - Iruru wa Koi toka Wakarimasen!
description: Not found

name: Ghost Dating Simulation
description: Struggling streamer **Doyeon Choi** downloads a mysterious dating sim game, ***Heart-Racing Ghost Dating Sim***, only to find himself trapped in a deadly loop-- where the love interests are real-life ghosts with unresolved deaths. From haunted highways to murder cases, **Doyeon** must navigate a world where romance, horror, and mystery collide. Every wrong move could cost him his life...again.

description: A one-shot booklet created by the Pokémon Special duo for a Pokémon theme park promotion.

description:
The story follows a young Karate practitioner named Tsukumo Mutsu, 40th master of the deadly Mutsu Enmei Ryu style.
