name: Isekai Walking
description:
Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven "chosen heroes" meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly "useless" skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he's never seen before!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Isekai Metaller
description:
Alex, a devoted metaller, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band's breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble…

When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a metaller's dream, featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. 

Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey!

**Note:** Originally serialized on ebookjapan as “Another World Metaller Lv.999” starting in March 2021. In March 2024, it was picked up by HERO'S, and the “Lv.999” was dropped.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Music

name: Agnes Tachyon and Manhattan Cafe (Umamusume)

name: Everyone Loves Her
description: With the sudden acquisition of the ability, Kang Mina’s life is completely turned upside down. Now, she stands at a crossroads where a single choice can lead to irreversible consequences. Amidst anger, confusion, and a suppressed sense of justice, Mina struggles with how to use her newfound power as she embarks on a new journey. Where will her power take her?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
My Tarou is handsome, his gestures are deliberately adorable, and, ultimately, he's too cute. I want to protect him...! But... treating a person like a pet isn't right, is it...?

“Tarou, come home.”

A clumsy office worker trapped by what is “right” and a lazy freeloader:
A strange romantic comedy about living together!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
description:
Wi Yeonho, the Radiant Martial Sovereign, is the great martial artist who ended the world's calamity.  

He was a nobleman, a paragon, and a peerless hero...  

"That man? He was a complete and utter scoundrel."

A truth too shocking for the world to know.   The real face of history's greatest hero is about to be exposed!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Solitary Gourmet
description: This manga simply describes how Gorou Inogashira, the main character, chooses and takes a meal. Unlike other gourmet manga, Gorou likes to eat at cheap restaurants and no trivia on cuisine is given. The authors are trying to depict the essentials of the act of "eating" by Gorou's monologue, which comprises most of the lines of this manga.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Vocalize
description: Sela Seo is a high school girl who has a complex about her deep voice. Ever since she was teased about her voice in middle school, she has been unable to say what she thinks out loud and has been unable to fit in with her class. In Sela's class was another outcast, Tatsuto Narukami, a boy who always wore headphones. She assumed he was just another “loner” like herself, but when she saw him singing behind the school building during lunch break, her feelings changed.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Gokurakugai
description:
Gokurakugai, a bright and bustling working class district with a hidden dark side. In this area without order, Tao and Alma work as troubleshooters for hire. Their missions involve helping a young boy find his lost friend, a person who disappears without a trace, and disfigured animal corpses. All the while, the evil spirits who live in the shadows bring out a different side to these troubleshooters!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/gokurakugai)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Yuri Terrorism
description: Yuriorists win.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Crime, Girls' Love, Web Comic

name: Isekai wa Neko to Tomo ni
description: Matsumoto Yuu, a systems engineer, was transported to another world along with his pet cat, Orihime. There, he meets Annemarie, an impoverished noblewoman, and decides to help rebuild her territory... Using his programming knowledge and skills, he works hard to restore the land! Moreover, Orihime also gains an incredible power... What will happen next?! The revolutionary fantasy of a development-loving systems engineer begins in grand fashion!
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ikiru
description: Every night a young woman would try to end her life under the moonlight, on one night she meets a man…
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life

name: God of Blackfield
description:
“Who am I?!”  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the “God of Blackfield,” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

“I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”

Revived three years later, this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
I was confessed to. It was during the summer of my first year. I ended up dating Kana. Even though I didn’t understand my own feelings…

*Source: MANGA Plus*
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Dore dake Doryoku Shite mo Mannen Level 0 no Ore wa Tsuihou Sareta ~Shin no Teki to Yobareta Shounen wa, Shachiku Megami to Deatte Saikyou no Chikara wo Te ni Ireru~
description: No matter how hard he tries, adventurer Tinto he can't raise his level, and is called [God's Enemy]. When he was finally expelled from the party, the goddess Esther appeared to him - and got down on her knees. To his surprise, Tinto was still at level 0 because of her mistake!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Absolute Reign
description: Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Everywhere & Nowhere
description: Based on two of Shakespeare’s most beloved supporting characters, Everywhere and Nowhere follows the time travelling adventures of best friends Anne Guildenstern and William Rosencrantz, as they explore, fight and flirt their way through history. Their first stop is Ancient Greece, where the pair find themselves at the right hand of a very charismatic Greek leader loved by men and women alike, who also may just be bringing his people to the brink of war.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Kurahime to Koikarasu
description:
Asaki Hibana (16), a member of the Hibana family, a prestigious family of exorcists, is a once-in-a-century genius, but because she can see demons that ordinary people cannot, she is regarded as weird by those around her, and she is worried about not being able to make friends. Asaki's grandfather, the current head of the Hibana family, tells her that her condition for quitting as an exorcist is to capture the Hibana family's sworn enemy, the Yatagarasu clan. While Asaki is struggling to find Yatagarasu, a mysterious transfer student, Amahara Ten, appears in front of Asaki and suddenly kisses her hand and says, "I am Yatagarasu, the crow whose life you saved."

(Source: Shortcake Club)
___
Note: Due to the popularity of Oneshot, the series will now be serialized.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi
description:
A tragedy wipes out Hiroto Amamiya's whole class. A god suddenly appears and says he will give all of them special protection and skills before reincarnating them in a new world. But when the god makes a mistake, Hiroto goes into his new life without anything at all.
___
**Character Designer:** [Ban!](https://mangadex.org/author/ecb0d0e9-d2ac-44fd-b40c-52ee54a2c336)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Shota, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Minamikawa, the most popular girl in class, comes to my place every day after school. She quickly slips off her underwear, gets on top of me, and we surrender ourselves to desire.
It feels like we have a connection, but... what exactly is our relationship? More than sex friends, less than lovers.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Kimi no Tamenara Nando demo
description: Yugo, who is deeply in love with the heroine, Shiina, has witnessed her death countless times. His abnormal love for her has given him the power of a magical gun to transcend space and time. However, every reset comes at a cruel cost: causing her memories to fade one by one. Even so, his burning flame of love never fades. To save Shiina from her untimely demise, and until Yugo can reach the one irrefutable "proof of love"—a kiss—he won't stop pulling the trigger.
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Too Cute to Handle
description:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!
description: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Inari no Kekkon
description: Not found
tags: Loli, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Make Haste Slowly.
description: Following the death of her grandmother, Taku, who now lives in Tokyo, heads back home to Kobe for the funeral.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Philosophical, Drama

name: Garouden
description:
What does it mean to be strong? What attracts men to fight in hand to hand combat? These and many other questions are explained and detailed in Garouden, a novel series by Yumemakura Baku (illustrated by celebrity manga author Itagaki Keisuke).  
  
Fighting expert Bunshichi Tanba enjoys defeating TV fighting champions and celebrities on the street, until he stumbles upon the underground wrestling club known as FAW (Federation of Amateur Wrestling), and unfortunately he is defeated by one of the underdogs of the wrestling world. He forces himself to improve and looks for a rematch.  
Years later, he returns better than ever, and his fights attract the attention of the two "monsters" of the fighting world who are in constant competition, Makoto "the Great" Tatsumi, owner of the FAW and possessing a power and charisma unrivaled in the ring, and "the Demon of Karate" Matsuo Shozan, owner of the best Karate schools in Japan and possessing a power and speed that's almost godlike.  
Both will try to recruit Tanba to their own side, and Tanba will experience a wold of fighting like he has never seen, with friends and rivals everywhere, and he will have to step up to the many challenges that confront him.  
Features other martial arts characters from his other fighting novel series, The Gate of the Lions. Currently the best "serious" martial arts manga title in Japan, this is another of Baku's masterpieces that, unlike his other fantasy epic titles, has surprising realism in its deep exploration of martial arts and those who use it.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Futaribocchi no Yoru
description: A short Oneshot about a girl that gets locked out of her home and has to stay over at her childhood friends house.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ochikobore Eji Minarai no Shounen. (Jitsu wa) Saikyou Saiaku no Asashin.
description:
In a certain kingdom’s capital, war is approaching. A young boy named Il, an apprentice guard, is treated as a useless person who can’t do his job properly, living a lazy life while constantly relying on his stepsister. Amidst this, a certain rumor is spreading throughout the city. It is said that a mysterious group of assassins known as the Night Dwellers are operating in the shadows.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66455)
tags: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru @comic
description: Hachiman Hikigaya is a cynic. He believes "youth" is a crock-a sucker's game, an illusion woven from failure and hypocrisy. Unsurprisingly, he's not the most popular guy. Meanwhile, there's Yukino Yukinoshita - brilliant, beautiful, and chillier than winter in Antarctica. Would you believe she's not exactly beloved by her classmates either? The unlikely pair gets forced into a club dedicated to helping solve their fellow students' problems. But will an ice queen and a screw-up really be able to help anybody?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Chaser Game W
description: The story of a game development company employee and her boss, who happens to be her ex-girlfriend.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Adaptation

name: Kami-sama ga Mitenai kara
description: Sakuya, who was raised in a church, was supposed to be living a modest but warm life alongside Sister Lamia, or that's how it should have been...! Though she tries to appear seductive, she's actually pure. Though she can be slightly dimwitted, she's adorable. Even though he tries to resist, Sakuya is continuously being led around her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Sekai no Owari no Encore
description:
The valuable treasure, the "Encore" which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the "Fake Brave Hero".

The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. "Do you want to come with us?" This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Succubus ga Yattekita Ohanashi
description: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Fate/ Grand Order: After A Singularity (Doujinshi)
description:
The story follows Taida (Female Ritsuka), the final master of Chaldea, and her shenanigans with her friends, Mash, Astolfo, and Mordred, across Chaldea and its residents after every singularity.

After A Singularity is a fan comic with the approval of MangaDex staff.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Self-Published, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Majomajo S-WITCH
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Magical Girls, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kuuki ga "Yomeru" Shinnyuu Shain to Buaisou na Senpai
description: A slice-of-life story about a new employee who can literally read emotions and an inexpressive but actually very kind senpai at work.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Dramatic Irony
description: Can you give me a happy ending? Komatsu Risa is in love with her childhood friend, Sano Chihiro. Although they have a very close relationship, and are often mistaken for a couple, Chihiro is unaware of how Risa feels and accepts a confession from another girl… Heartbroken about her first love, she confides in her seemingly indifferent homeroom teacher, Natsuo.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: "Issho ni Netaindesu yo Ne, Senpai?" to Amaku Sasayakarete Kon'ya mo Nemurenai
description: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: FAIRY TAIL
description:
Celestial wizard Lucy wants to join the Fairy Tail, a guild for the most powerful wizards. But instead, her ambitions land her in the clutches of a gang of unsavory pirates led by a devious magician. Her only hope is Natsu, a strange boy she happens to meet on her travels. Natsu's not your typical hero - but he just might be Lucy's best hope.

**Awards:**
- Won the 33th Kodansha Manga Award for Best Shounen Manga.
- Won the Society for the Promotion of Japanese Animation's Industry Award for Best Comedy Manga.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail/)
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Depressed Hero
description: The hero in this story is struggling with depression and feels like he has no purpose in life. One day, he is approached by a 500 year old demon lord who takes an interest in him. The demon lord, who is beautiful and powerful, offers to care about a depressed hero from another world the hero and take care of him.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A young man named Shi Quan lives alone, leading a simple and uneventful life. Unbeknownst to him, he is injected with a mysterious power that allows him to control his own blood. Yet, he has no knowledge of where this ability came from, nor any memory of his past. Though his memories are lost, fragments of his former life haunts him.

An encounter with an alien named Monday begins to unravel the secrets of his past; an all-powerful corporation, a crumbling old-world order, strange extraterrestrial beings, and superpowered humans. On the stage of this new world, Shi Quan embarks on an unexpected adventure alongside his companions, seeking the truth behind his blood and the memories buried deep within.
tags: Action, Superhero, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: A company drone who died from overworking was reincarnated as Sawadi, the third son of a merchant in a different world. His cheat skill is restoration magic and support magic. With these cheat skills, he came up with a new business model where he used his restoration magic to cure cheap slaves and made them earn money for him. Although his earnings are steadily increasing, he also has to suffer the consequence of getting his workload also increased... Will Sawadi ever be able to live leisurely without working?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: When he realized it, the protagonist was in another world and had become a sword that was stabbed on an altar in a great plain, crowded with devil beast. The world he was in had a game like system; HP, MP, Strength, Vitality, Agility, Intelligence, Dexterity, Titles and Equipment. Following his instinct as a living sword, he traveled to find the one who could be his wielder, until he met with a cat girl that was about to be attacked by a bear type devil beast.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Makikomarete Isekai Teni suru Yatsu wa, Taitei Cheat
description: One day during lunch break, High School student Takanashi Kyousai and four friends are suddenly transported to another world of Swords and Magic. The Princess of the Other World, who was the Time-Space Magician that summoned them, wants them to be Heroes and defeat the Demon King to save her world. While his four friends were taken aback by this sudden turn of events, Kyousai was calm and said, "It's just like a story." However the Princess made a shocking statement: "I only summoned four Heroes, didn't I?"
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
He’s in the deepest part of the Jianghu. Keep your eyes wide open if you do not wish to get dragged into the abyss.

Kidnapped children raised 7 years in darkness for a single assassination mission that goes awry.

---
Pyo Wol was an orphan who wandered around the continent until he bumped into a mysterious man and lost consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a dark, confined space with only one iron door for an exit. Wol survives the next several grueling months, trying to keep a cool head and stay in shape. When the iron door finally opens, he discovers he's not the only one in this miserable situation. A group of masked people has kidnapped 300 children to train them into human weapons. Wol must fight and kill the others, for only a handful of the strongest will be selected. Will Wol be able to become one of the chosen and find a way to free himself from his captors?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55706014)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%82%AC%EC%8B%A0%ED%91%9C%EC%9B%94/2937), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59771249)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/the-reaper)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%AD%BB%E7%A5%9E%E6%BC%82%E6%9C%88/380)
* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/614)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-reaper-de)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119365)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tamberlane
description: A town full of woodland creatures finds a human child... and has no idea what it is! The arrival of a mysterious furless creature sets the town of Treehollow into a tailspin: what is she, and does she have anything to do with the ominous Abroad?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Self-Published, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color

name: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu
description: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Itoko no Onee-chan ni Amaechau?
description: Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest

name: Not found
description:
A girls' school, Hibiscus Academy, where only selected young women can attend.
At this academy, there is a princess and a prince.

The “Princess of Hibiscus,” student council president Suzuran,
and the “Prince of Hibiscus,” vice president Emma.

In public, they both play their roles as prince and princess perfectly, loved by everyone,
but when they are alone, they are two trusted friends who joke around and talk naturally.

However, their relationship takes a sudden turn due to a certain event.
That event is... Suzuran's heartbreak.

This twisted yuri story begins at an all-girls school!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Boukensha Sakaba no Ryourinin
description: Yoishi, the owner of a bar, is disappointed with the poor food his adventurers are eating. One day, he begins to explore the cooking method, a bitter and inedible food found in the city's labyrinth, for a group of new adventurers.
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Oshi no teki ni nattanode @COMIC
description: A hundred years have passed since women began to awaken supernatural powers or "Lux", turning society into a place where men are looked down upon.  Ibuki is a rookie member of the evil organization known as "Nega Messiah (Vow of Salvation)". Despite being a man, he has a Lux called "Separation".  His true identity? A normal person reincarnated into the world of his favorite manga. But even before his reincarnation, he was a huge fan of Hinata, a member of the organization of justice "Prim Libra (White Scales of Order)". So, the battlefield between good and evil to him was nothing but "the very forefront of his idol-worshipping activities"!  Sometimes, he would act as Hinata's reliable older childhood friend, other times he would become her rival from the enemy organization. Ibuki enjoyed wallowing in his selfishness, having a life filled with battle together with his favorite, but things that didn't occur in the manga started happening...?  I, my favorite's enemy, will protect her future! A secret illuminati that moves through love alone!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Chou Nankan Dungeon de 10-mannen Shugyou shita Kekka, Sekai Saikyou ni ~Saijaku Munou no Gekokujou~
description:
The Most Incompetent Person in the World.

Kai Heinemann received this gift at the age of 13. The effects of the gift resulted in Kai's significantly reduced physical abilities, and he became despised and bullied in the gifted supremacy of Lamour. Kai is forced to leave his home and is attacked on his way to the royal capital, and while desperately running away, he wanders into a dungeon. In the dungeon, he had to clear the "Trial of the Gods" to get out, and the time did not progress. Kai, feeling like he was going to die, spent 100,000 years clearing the dungeon. In the process of clearing the trial of the gods, Kai becomes the most powerful being in the world, gaining unique and strong friends along the way.
tags: Action, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: A Revenge Guide for the Terminally Ill Maid
description:
Framed for a crime she didn’t commit, Isabel died leaving behind her little daughter. 10 years later, she awakens in another woman’s body, with only one year left to live.

But the world she returns to is even crueler. Her daughter is now married to the very man who murdered her, all in the name of revenge.

With just one year, Isabel must find a way to save her daughter, no matter the cost.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A slice-of-life comedy about an ultimate weapon in the shape of a cute little girl named "Alma", and the two scientists who created her! These two scientific geniuses are constantly being befuddled by Alma's incisive questions and analysis of their relationship!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Yokohamasen Doppelganger
description: Kenzaki Makoto, a debuting sculptor, was arrested as the serial killer of the Yokohama Line series of murders. He insisted that he was innocent but was sentenced to the death penalty. He was executed 11 years after the crime. But when he reopened his eyes, by a twist of fate, he had returned to 11 years ago, 25 days before the crime was committed. Burning with the desire for revenge against the real murderer, Kenzaki begins to take action. The only one he can trust is HIMSELF. The crime suspense story of two selves fighting against fate unfolds.
tags: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Youngest Sister-in-Law in a Tragic Reverse Harem
description: One feverish night, 6-year-old Liliana Bercchio suddenly recalls the plot of a tragic reverse harem novel. Unsure if she's been reincarnated or has time traveled, her young mind struggles to make sense of it all. Her family is doomed to get caught up in the protagonists' mess—but there's still time… or so she thought. When she witnesses the female lead's death and the deranged male leads appear before her sisters, the story takes a turn. They seem different now, but is her family truly safe?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kawasemi-san no Tsurigohan
description: High school student, Kawasemi, who has transferred to the countryside, spends her days alone due to her shyness. One day, she is approached by her classmate Misago, a so-called 'countryside Yankee', and was taken to the mountains. Kawasemi was afraid of what she would do, but then Misago starts fishing!?
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Both the Same
description:
‘Ha Miro’, a clumsy yet loveable rookie magazine editor, meets mosquito man ‘Mo Ginam’, who can become a ‘normal [ilban]’ person (when together) when ‘blood [pi]’ is ‘cha’.

‘Ha Miro’, the rookie editor for a third-rate fashion magazine company receives an e-mail from rookie model ‘Lee Jihyeon’s manager. With an excited heart, she excitedly sends a deposit over the phone……
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Girls und Panzer
description: In this world, Sensha-do, the art of tank-combat, is a traditional Japanese martial art for girls. Miho, a girl who just transfered into the Ooarai Girls' Academy in Ibaraki Prefecture, has been ordered by the academy's student council chairperson to join the school team and compete in the national Sensha-do championships.
tags: Action, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Chikin - "Drop" Zenya no Monogatari
description: Spin-off from Drop. Follows the daily life of legendary thug, Tatsuya Iguchi who is not afraid of anything or anyone.
tags: Action, School Life, Delinquents

name: Not found
description:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world! ――This is a light for life in a different world. When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf...?!
___
- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
**One tomboy is determined to win the heart of her childhood best friend–but will it take more than a makeover to win him over?**

Wakaba is cocky, condescending, foul-mouthed, and absolutely in love with her childhood friend, Daiki. For as long as they’ve known each other, Wakaba’s been the very image of a roughhousing tomboy, but all that’s about to change. When she shows up in front of him, wearing a cutesy, feminine outfit, will she get the hopeless late bloomer’s heart racing? When you can’t put your feelings into words, an image change might just be the right gambit!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Batsu-Hare
description: Wakou Ichiro decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear
description: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days! Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Manuke na FPS Player ga Isekai e Ochita Baai
description: The protagonist is a player of a VRMMOFPS game who ends up falling off the map, and ends up being transported to a fantasy world retaining his in game equipment and user interface.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: A Star Brighter Than the Sun
description: Sakuhide Iwata is a girl who is stronger than average. Her childhood friend who was small and weak when they were little, grew into a handsome man. She thought that they had drifted apart, but they were reunited for the first time in a long time at the last athletic festival in junior high school ...? A refreshing story begins!
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kimi ni Aisarete Itakatta
description:
Kanae is a girl who is struggling to fit in with the popular clique at her high school. Because she had been bullied in middle school, she has developed an acute inferiority complex that had led her to engage in questionable after-school activities in order to feel wanted.   
  
In comes Hiroshi, a high-school baseball star who became drawn to her after finding her crying during a group date at a karaoke bar. Thus begins an unhealthy relationship between a mentally unstable high-school girl and a jock.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: Winning Answer!
description: Not found
tags: 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kaminagashijima ~Rinne no Miko~
description: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Gore, Horror, Mystery

name: Lycoris Recoil - After This Night... (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: NOMADS
description: A time when humanity left Earth and migrated to other planets in the galaxy. Mads, a Martian whose life is threatened by the mafia, and Vigne, a Venusian who is the galaxy's greatest diva, are two unrelated people who meet due to a mysterious "orb" that fell from space. They are unaware that it is a sign of a major event that will shake the solar system. This is the beginning of a thrilling and entertaining sci-fi manga with a last-century view of the universe!
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Aliens, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: _Note: Released at Comiket 105._
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi
description:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Art served as the butler to the incredibly selfish Lady Wenty. After collapsing from overwork, he was cast out. Lost on the street, the infamous Ice Princess, Urk, appears before him.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Negatte mo Nai Tsuihou Go kara no Slow Life? ~Intai Shita Hazu ga Nariyuki de Bishoujo Gal no Shishou ni Nattara Naze ka Mechakucha Natsukareta~
description:
Reito Harukaze, who had climbed to the highest rank of adventurers, had retired. One day, as he was thinking of living a quiet, retired life, a beautiful gal named Karen Hiiragi appeared before him.

"Hey, mister, buy me a meal!"

Upon hearing that Karen was in trouble with money, Reito decided to give her a basic lecture on dungeon conquering.

"Thanks to you, I was able to conquer my first dungeon! Master!"

He actually wanted to retire and live a slow life...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?
description:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Music

name: Girls und Panzer - Tatta futari no kakumei (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Unable to sleep or find true satisfaction in his daily life, Yamori Kou begins wandering the night streets. He encounters a strange girl who offers to help soothe his insomnia by sleeping beside him, but it is not merely a one-way exchange…

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Blue Orchestra**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Sanada Shirou thought escaping his dead-end corporate job would mean peace at last—until he wakes up in a world where women rule the battlefield and men are treated like fragile treasures. Gifted with creation magic, Shirou figures the smart move is to open a cozy inn and live the slow life he's always wanted. But "slow" doesn't last long when the fiercest fighters and boldest beauties of this matriarchal world start checking in... and checking him out! Between building the perfect inn and surviving as the entertainment for his rowdy residents, Shirou's new life is shaping up to be anything but ordinary in this sexy isekai romp.

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Koutsugou Semi-Friend
description: Kuruma Suuna, a gloomy and socially awkward girl, begins her high school dorm life only to discover her new roommate, Hamanasu Ruka, flirting with another girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Strayed
description:
Born to a first time omega father, Katsu Keiichi goes through his life with a handful of hardships. He struggles to keep up with school and life outside of it whilst also facing the troubles of being an omega.

When he transferred to a different school fit for his creative talents, Keiichi met Mochizuki Kaiten, an upperclassman alpha who was the first person to befriend him. 

Despite leaving his home town, Keiichi still has some inconveniences shadowing him — bullies, rivals, conflicting feelings, and the fear of becoming a stray.

[ This is my first time doing this manga thingy, so it's not much or perfect. I do this for fun though! Just wanted to share the stories I have in my head. Hope it's not too bad! ] —Mao.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Dragon Ball Z - The Super Warrior Saiyan Warrior
description:
This story is a parody drawn by Alex Connor, an Italian artist who wanted to draw a crazy fanfic written by an Italian boy called Andrea Sala

(The grammatic errors are intentional, as they are taken from the fanfic written by the clearly young but very creative boy.)
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Magic, Doujinshi, Delinquents, Aliens

name: Not found
description: A Tamer is the dirtiest job because they have to deal with monsters, the job of a new rank D adventurer Lint makes him despised in the guild, but his life changes when he meets an S rank adventurer girl who tells Lint to tame her with a way in...
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Mahou Shiba Inu★Hanamaru
description: Magical-girl loving Airi one day wakes up to a talking plushie? But just as she thinks this is her time to become a magical girl, her pet dog Hanamaru(♂) ends up making a contract instead...
tags: Animals, Comedy, Magical Girls, 4-Koma

name: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru
description: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.
tags: Historical, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu
description: The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again! The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided! Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ochibure Zeus to Dourei no Ko
description: Zeus, the omniscient and omnipotent god, had his soul sealed in a human body by his children, Apollo, Athena, Ares, and Artemis, because of his unmanageable behavior. --The soul of Zeus, which had been sealed in a human body while reincarnating for 1,000 years, was then inhabited by Chetho, a child of Egyptian slaves. When Chet's life was threatened due to an incident, the 1,000-year seal was broken and the soul of Zeus was finally unleashed on earth.
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Tankathlon is a new form of tank sport gaining slowly gaining popularity among Senshado enthusiasts. While also involving tank battles, Tankathlon is distinguished by its lack of official oversight allowing any school with tanks to participate in a battle anywhere at any time, and a 10-ton weight restriction on tanks used, limiting battles to light tanks and tankettes.
tags: Action, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Military

name: To Be an Actor
description: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Oswald the Overman in the Lesser Planes of Hell
description: An idiot wakes up in hell, and goes on a journey to reclaim their life.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Isekai, Horror, Supernatural

name: Tora wa Ryuu o Mada Tabenai.
description:
In a distant place, on a certain mountain, a young dragon has been captured by a beautiful female tiger. The two, who were predator and prey, begin a journey to find a way for two animals with very different life spans to live by each other's sides.

TL;DR: Tiger Woman x Dragon Boy
tags: Action, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Monster Girls, Shota, Tragedy

name: D-kyuu Boukensha no Ore, Naze ka Yuusha Party ni Kanyuu Sareta Ageku, Oujo ni Tsukimatowareteru
description:
If you become a hero and defeat the Demon King, a lazy life awaits you!! That's what Jirey, a young man, believed, and he worked hard day and night, achieving results. 

However, when he found out that the role of the hero who defeated the Demon King was a very hard job, he retreated into seclusion. He wished to spend his days in idleness, but the girls Jirey had "unknowingly" saved up until then started to flock to him one after another, trying to win his heart and body...!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
description: Mukouda Tsuyoshi has been summoned from modern Japan to a different world of sword and magic. He eagerly thought of what kind of a huge adventure was waiting for him, but actually, Mukouda is just a civilian who got caught in a Hero Summoning. On top of that, Mukouda's base status is shabby compared to the legitimate heroes. Suspecting the king of foul play, as he's morbidly obese in a kingdom in crisis, apart from being war-happy, Mukouda decides to leave the castle by presenting his lack of martial prowess. The only thing that Mukouda can rely on in this world is his unique skill Net Supermarket, that can only order goods from modern Japan's internet to the new world.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: The Dragon Cubs Arrive! Mommy Is a Dragon
description: Five years ago, she left an egg and said, "This is the son I gave birth to you. When he grows up, that will be my return date." A few months later, the son broke out of the shell, with two shiny eggs on his head. Xiao Longjiao, she hadn't returned at te date. She disappeared for five years, and he went crazy for five years, until the little dragon cub brought back a woman... But the little dragon cub said, "Dad, she saved me, and I want to commit myself to her!" Infighting.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: COLOR/LESS
description:
A gray Earth, where humanity was transformed into deformed beings. The curtains open on an action series where the goal is to recover a lost world, with the help of a strange-looking gun!
 
An enormous solar flare caused the planet to lose all of its colors. Humans are deformed and declining in numbers. The key to reclaiming the old world lies within the power hidden in *color*, and one *girl*. Knowing that the few remnants of colors in the world yield a great power, Avidia, who is conducting research while protecting a girl named Chie, uses the colors to expand his own power, and throws himself in a battle against the Cult.

---
A cosmic disaster changed the Earth forever, stripping away every last drop of color from the world. Mankind also changed: the familiar human face is almost forgotten in a world now populated wholly by mutants. Against the backdrop of a moody urban landscape, a lone-wolf investigator named Avidia relies on both his wits and extraordinary gun to hunt down the world's last hidden scraps of color. He soon crosses paths with a very special girl -- one who just might hold the key to bringing back what the world has lost.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Mystery

name: 'Tis Time for "Torture," Princess
description: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Blue Proustian Moment
description: Kazuki, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, and a straight-A student at a prestigious school for girls, meets Moeka, a wild girl from a rowdy school. What becomes of Kazuki when witnessing a steamy moment between Moeka and her boyfriend leaves her all shaken up...?! Find out in this seaside tale of two polar opposites and their fated encounter.
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Dark Hunter - Houkago no Futari
description:
Keinoshin and Shotaro are students who spend their after school hours as Dark Hunters. Darkness and light both exist in the world, and it is their job to protect the balance between them. Kei and Sho used to be close friends when they were little, but now they are only reluctant partners. At school, they're seen as opposites--the cool and aloof Sho and the cute and friendly Kei. However, they must work together if they want to stop the forces of darkness. Their first case of the manga involves the mysterious vanishing of many cats and dogs in the area, and a second involves a little boy who can see the 'ghost' of an old homeless man he had befriended.

(from mangaupdates)
tags: Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kurage no Uta
description: Winner of the 105th Newcomer Manga Award.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: The Flower That Wields a Sword
description:
An empire stained with blood

That day, consumed by the cursed sword, I cut down the people I loved most with my own hands.

Fifteen years have passed under its curse. Now, having claimed all ten legendary swords forged by man, I made a wish upon the holy sword.

"Take me back—to the time I killed anyone."

Time rewound to the moment before all tragedies began. And yet, the sword remained in my hand.

This time, I won't succumb in the same way. Neither the cursed sword, nor fate, nor anyone else will control me again.

"There won't be a second miracle.
This time, I will find happiness."
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Rules for Peddling in Another World
description: If you accidentally crossed over into another world, what kinds of abilities would you need to reach your peak in life? Would you became an Enchanter? A Hero? Or maybe a Cultivator of Immortal Techniques? Of course not. You would take advantage of your present day knowledge in this other world to do business and earn big bucks!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The mask causes disaster. The mask prefers slaughter. The mask has a will. A traveling mask merchant Pell who can create a mysterious mask that grants abilities. In a city with a gloomy atmosphere, I meet a mysterious girl, Sona…!?
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vermilion-mask)
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru ~Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni, Taisei Shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken~
description:
Middle-aged Beryl Gardinant has only ever accomplished one thing: running a humble sword-fighting dojo in the quiet countryside. 

But when he’s paid a visit by his former pupil, Allusia, he discovers that she has become an elite commander — and she’s hardly the only ex-student who’s a renowned warrior! 

Now forced by Allusia to become a special instructor to the strongest order of knights in the kingdom, can Beryl reach his full potential even though he’s an old man?
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Official English Light Novel:** [J-Novel Club](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Kanae Yano, a 28-year-old single woman with no boyfriend, is suddenly summoned to another world. There, she encounters Rita Scryne, the duke's daughter who looks exactly like her, and Rita's father, Zack. They ask her to take Rita's place in an arranged marriage with the ruthless and feared King Eugene Astaroth—known as the "Merciless Wolf." Upon learning that the summoning magic can bring people from another world but cannot send them back, Kanae finds herself with no choice but to accept. However, when she meets King Eugene, she makes a shocking discovery—his true identity is none other than her first love!
tags: Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Doutei Otaku to no Sex ga Ii Hazu ga Nai
description:
Makoto Mitsuya, an economics student living in a dorm.

After his roommate was hospitalized, he indulged in his otaku hobbies to the fullest while living alone. However, his new roommate, Ken Hayami, turned out to be the complete opposite—a flashy, party animal with a totally different personality and appearance!

Frustrated by their clashing personalities and Hayami’s annoying behavior, Mitsuya initially held a grudge, but slowly begins to open up thanks to Hayami’s attempts to get closer.

One night while drinking together, Hayami teases Mitsuya for being an inexperienced virgin. Annoyed by the teasing, Mitsuya impulsively pushes him down. But when Hayami reacts with obvious pleasure, Mitsuya gets carried away—and the two end up having sex…!?!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Gyaru

name: Desharow Merman
description:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Solo-fessional: Solo Katsu Danshi to Bocchi Joshi no Koubousen
description: Hasama Shin is a solo guy who loves being alone. He even changed jobs to enjoy his time alone after coming home, and one day, a girl living in the apartment next door asks him if he wants to hang out with her. It's creepy that she asked me out on our first meeting, and more than anything, I don't have time for other people! ...Or so I thought, but I was tempted and ended up hanging out with her, and she started following me around every day...?! A comedy about the struggle between a solo guy and a lonely girl!!
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: The Aquatope on White Sand
description: Gama Gama Aquarium, a small aquarium in Okinawa, is an hour's bus ride from Naha. Kukuru Misakino is an 18-year-old high school student who works there, and she knows about the "secret" of the aquarium: sometimes you can see mysterious things. One day Kukuru meets Fuuka, standing in front of a water tank with flowing hair and a tear rolling down her cheek. Fuuka has given up on her dream of becoming an idol and she has run away from Tokyo to Okinawa. Wanting to find a place to belong, Fuuka earnestly asks to work at the aquarium. The manga follows Kukuru and Fuuka as they deal with the issues of the secret of the aquarium and a looming crisis of its possible closure.
tags: Animals, Drama, Slice of Life

name: A Summer Shower
description: Little Geuroo was curious about him. That boy from next door who asked him a strange question. The boy, Lee Garam, who always avoided him even though all Geuroo wanted was to get close to him. But before Geuroo could even confess, Garam disappeared in thin air, leaving only clusters of blue light behind. And then, one summer, he appeared in front of Geuroo as if nothing happened…?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: My Eldritch Girlfriend
description:
"My Eldritch Girlfriend" is developed by [Crystal Blitz](https://www.youtube.com/CrystalBlitz) and Artists! 
If you would like to support us, follow the additional links.
_____________
**Additional Links:**
- Twitter: [X (Formerly known as Twitter - Follow us for Updates!)](https://x.com/superficialmoth)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Cooking in Summer
description:
Cooking in summer is really hard labor. Whether you’re going to buy ingredients, doing something in front of a fire, or even dipping your hands in cold water and washing dishes, you’re sweating. It’s hard to eat and even have a fever in your body.
However, the chef at the restaurant who arrived in the heat of the day said, “You can’t starve,” and she was introduced by a friend. Why do you feel like you’re in a relationship now? Can I start a new relationship?

---

tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color

name: Dragon Ball - New Hope
description: Dragon Ball: New Hope is a fan-manga that tells an alternative story of the Cell saga, where Gohan is defeated by the villain.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Demons, Superhero, Adventure, Magic, Doujinshi, Supernatural

name: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" Dattan dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?
description:
"I have a fiancée...?"

One day, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, an ordinary high school student, is told a surprising fact by his father about an arranged engagement. His fiancée is Kiryu Ayane, the "Villainess" at school, known to everyone for her sharp tongue and coldhearted personality.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A story about a girl whose pet dog suddenly becomes a cute human girl. What happens when a dog's love for her owner is translated into human form? Will her dog learn good or bad things from humanity?
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: If Her Flag Breaks
description: Hatate Souta, a young man who can see the "flags" that stand at the crossroads of life, transferred to “Hatagaya Academy”, a prestigious school in the metropolitan area. Not only does he meet beautiful girls in his busy school life, he even goes as far as living with them under the same roof! Surrounded by these flags, this enviable romantic comedy begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Yopparai Reijou ga Eiyuu to Shirazu Kyuukon Shita kekka
description:
Viera, a poor noblewoman working tirelessly in the Magic Bureau’s Technical Department, has no money, no time, and no connections. One day, she's suddenly tasked with finding a husband!

On a whim—and under the influence of alcohol—she proposes a contract marriage to a nearby stranger, a knight named Lukash, offering a deal: “We can divorce after a year.”

To her surprise, he agrees.

But later, she learns who Lukash really is...?!

What was supposed to be a divorceable contract marriage born from a drunken promise takes an unexpected turn when he says, “I have no intention of letting you go.”

A marriage fantasy filled with romance between a highly capable, broke noblewoman and the country’s strongest divine beast knight!

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7038hv/)
tags: Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dungeon ga Arawarete 5-nen, 15-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.
description:
Five yeas ago dungeons appeared in the world. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful. 

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.
tags: Action, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Otome no Okazu
description:
Shirai Otome is a beautiful honor student who seems serious at first glance… But deep down, she’s endlessly curious about all things naughty! 

These are the rose-tinted days of Shirai Otome, an “Ero Seeker” who explores the hidden eroticism tucked between the cracks of everyday life!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Saegusa-san wa Megane-senpai to Koi wo Egaku
description: Saegusa-san is a cool lone wolf who in reality is asocial, a downer, and overall sucks at interacting with others. But she harbors a secret. She's actually going out with her senior, referred to by everyone as Glasses-Senpai. In order to close the gap between them, every day Saegusa-san puts herself on the line (in more ways than one!) On the other hand, Glasses-Senpai is agonized over Saegusa-san's unintentional sex appeal. If he is Saegusa-san's first boyfriend, then she is his first girlfriend, and neither of them have any clue about how far they should go! Where will this romance end up?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: Roped into fleeing from her ninja village, Satoko, a ninja with the ability to turn non-living things into leaves, ends up encountering a high school girl named Konoha, who just so happens to be a professional assassin. With Satoko needing protection from the ninjas pursuing her for her desertion and Konoha needing someone to help dispose of evidence, the two begin living together.
tags: Ninja, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Umi ga Hashiru End Roll
description: After turning 65 and bereaved of her husband, Umiko visits a cinema for the first time in decades. A shocking, life-changing event awaits her. When she meets Kai, an art student majoring in film, Umiko realises that she wants to make a film. She realises that she is on the side of "the people who want to make films"... Lured by the waves that stir her heart, the 65-year-old dives into the sea of film!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: White World
description: When one day a Meteorite crushed on earth, the lifes of the three best friends Hitokazu, Nic and Victor suddenly changed as on their last jointed school-year they are faced with the consequences the meteorite brought with itself. The people that had survived the impact have suddenly developed powers and abilities human beings normally can not achieve but those who didnt gain those new abilities, just dissolved.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Aliens

name: Not found
description:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god's whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world. She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere. And that girl can do no more than a single thing… Survive the Sengoku Era – that's all.
___
**Character Designer:** [Hirasawa Geco](https://mangadex.org/author/0a9ec8b8-a3f9-423b-a4e9-2ecb118c27a4)

**Additional Links:**
- Official English: [emaqi](https://emaqi.com/manga/sengoku-komachi-kurotan)
- Official Raw Web Novel: [Shousetsuka ni Narou](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/)
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Boukenroku ~Jichou wo Shiranai Kamigami no Shito~
description:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi
description: The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races! Can you keep your reason?
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Mabataki no Oto
description: The young boy “I” becomes swallowed up by the pleasure of drawing and completing a painting, embarking on a long creative journey. Along the way, he must confront “you” who lies in the shadows. What is the true nature of “I,” that weaves between impulse and imagination?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life

name: Rebuild World
description:
At the risk of his own life, a young man sets foot in the ruins of a devastated old world. His name is Akira, and in order to claw his way out of the hellhole that is his birthplace of Slumtown, the boy became a hunter. In the wastelands he happens upon a strange woman, standing perfectly still, stark naked.   
She is beautiful, but it seems that only he can see her. She exists incorporeal, tantalizingly beyond any touch, and she tells him her name is Alpha.  
Alpha won’t show even a sliver of her real intentions, but with a wide smile, she brings Akira his first commission as a hunter. Akira takes the task, if only to become a stronger hunter, and having entered a contract, their dramatic lives in the hunting profession was set to begin.  
  
From Stories of the Boy Hunter as recorded by the Eastern Hunters’ association.  
Written post-collapse of scientific civilization.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Starting Over as a Tree
description: One minute, he was choking on water, and the next, he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality, the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy, every living thing started to mutate, and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily, he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Otome Kobanashi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Koyoi, Lorenzi-ke de Kanbi naru Chuusei wo
description:
Rita, a girl with the legendary "Golden Eye," was caught by a human trafficker and put up for auction in the black market. It was the mafia boss, Albert Lorenzi, who won the auction, taking home Rita who lost her voice and was in despair due to past trauma.  
  
Rita follows his sweet whisper, "You'll be my bride," but discovers the ruthless side of him who points a gun at people with a smile on his face!  
  
What kind of fate is awaiting Rita who’s greeted by a dangerous mafioso?!
tags: Action, Romance, Mafia, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sutochiru
description:
Homeless and penniless, but enjoying the "now". That's the punk-rock way these girls spend their day. 

In Okachimachi, a corner of Tokyo's downtown district, a group of girls hang out, getting dirty looks from passers-by, facing the harsh realities of the world and rarely having anything good happen to them. Nevertheless, Chamcham, Stella and Ozaki are having lots of fun everyday! Ignoring the rules of society is what they're all about.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Otoko X Otoko no Yatsu
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Crossdressing

name: Not found
description: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls

name: Net Game Haijin no Isekai Tenseiki - Kobushiou to Yobareta Saikyou no Kobushi ga Tsukaenai node, 1-nichi 8-jikan Konbou wo Furu Koto kara Hajimeta
description:
In the VRMMORPG Versus Online, Kazuya was known as the Fist King. But when he defeated the Labyrinth King Pharaoh, he woke up and had somehow been transported back to when he was 12 years old! Moreover, this world is a game world where monsters exist?! However, he can no longer use his once-invincible fists, and his stats are all at beginner level. For now, Ichiyo starts by practicing swinging a wooden staff for eight hours a day...

In a world where heavy weapons reign supreme, he aims to become the strongest by utilizing analog weapons, his fists, and the cheat skills he alone knows from the game world!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Masquerade Confidence: The Conman and the Girl’s Masked Journey
description:
A man who uses masks to impersonate others and swindle money—
The con artist, Linus Krueger.
Obsessed with money above all else, Linus's world comes crashing down when, one day, a girl named Chronica, who can read souls, sees through his lies and steals the fortune he painstakingly amassed.
Using his own fortune as leverage, she drags him into a life-threatening journey.

In a modern fantasy world where bullets and supernatural powers fly—
The runaway adventure of two incompatible souls begins now.
tags: Thriller, Action, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Yusha ha Osorezu
description: Elizabeth longed to become the chosen hero, so she joined the hero academy and worked hard every day to hone her swordsmanship. The men at the academy shunned her and told her to give up because she was a woman. But then, tragedy befalls Elizabeth. However, she will never give up her dream of becoming the hero! This journey of a girl who has nothing now begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy

name: Android wa Keiken Ninzuu ni Hairimasu ka??
description: Beautiful, brainy Tsuda Akane is indispensable at the robotics manufacturer where she works, but her colleagues never saw her private side. At home, Akane’s a hot mess with an apartment that looks more like a landfill than a living space. When she drunkenly orders a maid to help her tidy up, the lady android who arrives is a horny hottie who’s about to give Akane more service than she bargained for!
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love

name: Essei Manga Matome ~30-nen Akiramezu ni Mangaka ni Natta Nīto no Ohanashi~
description: This is an essay-style manga about a person named Yamase Chika and their journey to becoming a manga artist. She is known as the author of The Jeweler’s Maid.
tags: Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
It's his first day after transferring to a new school. In front of his new classmates, wearing a poker face, Sannomiya Makoto, a high school boy, introduces himself. He's there because there's a female student he absolutely has to meet— Azami Yako, the daughter of a CEO, and also his fiancée! He's seen a picture of her from middle school, and now their meeting in real life is seconds away! The veil over her is removed to reveal…
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70647)
- **Voice Comic:** [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VVcqUbzgq_U)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Worst Gaiden Mr. Zetton
description: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
tags: Action, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents

name: Oshi Korosu
description: After making his impressive debut as a high school student as manga artist Taku Omori, Yu Komatsu fell into a slump. Unable to draw any new work, Komatsu entered a university thinking he would never draw manga again, where he met a woman named Miaki En who declared she would kill Taku Omori...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Genkaigoe no Skill wa, Tenseisha ni Shika Atsukaenai - Over Limit Skill Holder
description:
A fantasy adventure about bonds forged with people in a different world. The setting is a world, where everyone has eight skill slots. In these slots people can put skills like "Strengthen Arm ★" and "Fire Magic★★" from skill orbs, abilities which prove extremely useful for survival. The total amount of stars your skills have can never exceed your slots. 

Reiji, worked as a slave that mines skill orbs, until 10 years old. Along with his precious older sister, Lark, they worked gruelingly in the mines until one day, where the chance for rebellion occurred at the mine and Reiji got his hands on a ten-star, a so called "overlimit" skill, called "World Ruler". 

Reiji went from a powerless slave to having an ability that surpassed human limits, but in the chaos of the revolt, he was separated from the only person dear to him, his sister Lark.  
  
"To regain his bond with her, to make her his true sister," earnestly thinking so, Reiji's adventure to distant places starts!
___
**Note:** The chapter number resets after each arc.
