tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation

name: Stories of the Mask
description: The mask of Hannya, a jealous she-devil located in an old antique store, scrutinizes the darkness of men's hearts and knows the secrets of all the objects that have been accumulating there since time immemorial. Prepare well because certain death comes at odd times, and whether you are a young man or a tired old man, whatever she finds you, she will take you with her to hell.
tags: Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Samurai, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: 35-sai Dokushin Yamada, Isekai Mura ni Risou no Second House wo Tsukuritai ~Isekai to Genjitsu no Iitokodori Life~
description: Yamada, who works as an ordinary company employee, goes to visit the family home left behind as an inheritance by his late grandfather, and there he finds a door to another world!! Beyond the door, he meets a talking black cat and a homunculus girl, and as he begins living together with them, he enjoys a cheat magic life in modern Japan and a heartwarming slow life in another world♪
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Pita-Ten
description: Higuchi Kotarou is a slightly cool sixth grader preparing for junior high school entrance exams. His mother died in an accident when he was young, and now he lives an ordinary but peaceful life with his busy father. One day, a mysterious girl named Misha moves into the room next door to Kotarou's house. When Misha finds out that Kotarou does not have a mother, she declares that she will be Kotarou's mother and wants to take care of him in any way she can. In fact, Misha is actually a half-human angel who came to the human world to stand on her own...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: KANOIN: My Incubus (Girl)Friend
description: This is a love story between a man and an incubus.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Crossdressing, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Bocchi the Rock! - Broke Quest (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: The Big Bees
description: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.
tags: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: I Dominate a Magical Continent with an Industrial Revolution
description:
This is a **Medieval Fantasy World** brimming with magic and adventure, where various races and cultures coexist. 

The protagonist, a young lord, inherits his family’s lands and wealth, but must overcome many challenges. With the aid of his system, he introduces an industrial revolution to this magical continent and ultimately rises to dominate it!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana
description:
Set 10 years prior to the original series, the story centers around Sword Maiden's party of six adventurers on their journey to the Dungeon of the Dead to kill the Demon Lord.
___
**Note**: *Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2 - Tsubanari no Daikatana* is a spin-off series of the main Goblin Slayer! light novel. This is the second manga adaptation of the light novel after the cancellation of [the first one](https://mangadex.org/title/46704) after only 3 chapters.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign
description: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Melancholia
description: An omnibus collection of interconnected short stories by Douman Seiman.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Superhero, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Happy Happia!
description:
Yuki, a tsundere human transfer student, transfers into a special Academy for demi-humans to escape her past trauma. Koneko the crazy catgirl forces her friendship upon Yuki.  Koneko's friend, Hako the box-headed ojou-san, completes the group. 

This is mostly crazy school girl comedy like *Nichijou* or *Asobi Asobase*, where the trivial becomes hilarious. There's the mermaid class rep who can't stop thinking scandalous things about catgirls' butts (purely for the sake of maintaining morals), the too kind elephant teacher, the anti-social bat girl, the crazy goth lolita president of the Fortune Telling Club, and many others. Most chapters involve Koneko spectacularly self-destructing, but it's cute, funny, and sometimes heartwarming - and no significant Drama to worry about.
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: In the 99th year of the Yuanjing Era, the empire stands proud—its emperor revered, its people flourishing. But behind the veil of peace, a ruthless campaign unfolds. The imperial court has declared war on monsters, scouring the land to wipe them out without mercy. Among the forgotten is the Yi Clan, ancient beings once sustained by the faith of humanity. Now abandoned and weakened, they teeter on the brink of extinction. As despair closes in, a long-buried prophecy stirs—whispering of a final chance to defy fate… and survive.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A wormhole with the ability to travel back to the Middle Ages appeared before Fan Li. The Middle Ages, where pastoral songs could be heard, while war and chaos ran rampant. One could have a harem of wives and concubines, and one could also compete to be at the top of the world. But no matter the kind of ideals you strive to achieve, acquiring a wealth of money is the first step.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Song of the Sky Pacers
description:
(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)
tags: Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

description: (BASED ON DEEPWOKEN!) Yumi is the weakest perma-freshie this world has seen. So much so that he ends up being pushed to the verge of death by the weakest monster in the verse! Forcing himself to sign a pact with the illusive woman, Misumi, his life is saved and now in her hands. As Misumi teases and messes with Yumi, he remains focused on obtaining his goal- becoming the strongest in the world!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Gore

name: Last Boss-tachi no Kakushigo
description:
Reincarnated into the Demon King's castle?! Magic developed using programming skills! And even the Demon Kings recognize that magic——?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/68401)
tags: Action, Demons, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ryuroden
description:
Middle schoolers, Shiro and Masumi, encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived, they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events, Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death… Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past.  
  
In 1997, Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen manga.
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Ashita no Ashita
description: Chisayo, a high school girl, has a weakness for her best friend's face:  While being pushed around by her good-natured best friend, she enjoys today and tomorrow to the fullest!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Elf Dorei to Kizuku Dungeon Harem - Isekai de Netotte Nakama o Fuyashimasu
description: Mars, a boy who was reincarnated in another world, travels with the Elf slave, Lilia. His goal is to conquer the world's main dungeon and obtain a "forbidden magic book" that has powers beyond common sense. But... since he fucked with Lilia every day, his conquests tended to be delayed.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Katsute no Ansatsusha wa Raise de Chigau Ikikata o
description:
"I never wanted to be born an assassin..."

Mira, who was hailed as the strongest assassin, regretfully loses her life at the hands of a rival female knight. However, she awakens to find herself reincarnated as the daughter of an aristocrat, in the same world with the same name one year later...!? Mira lived a low-key life, trying not to be discovered as a former assassin, but eventually she became interested in a life of protecting people, the polar opposite of her previous life, and decided to aim to become a soldier.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Pet Girl of Sakura Dormitory
description:
After being kicked out of the main dorms for bringing in a stray cat, Kanda Sorata is forced to live in the smaller Sakura Halls where problem students are sent to live. Although he doesn’t mind his roommates, Sorata can’t wait to move out of Sakura Halls. But when Shiina Mashiro moves into the dorm, everything changes. Mashiro is an artistic genius who, at a young age, won many awards for her skills, but due to her childhood being so focused on art, she has no common sense and social skills. Forced to take the role of taking care of Mashiro, Sorata learns about himself and begins on a path of self improvement.  
  
Adaptation of the light novel series written by Kamoshida Hajime with illustrations by Mizoguchi Keeji
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yuukoku no Moriarty: The Remains
description: A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~
description: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Villainess, Gyaru

name: Records of Nothingness
description:
In Confucian Era 14276, a violent showdown unfolds in the space surrounding Planet Lagra. And with that, the story begins. Unfolding on Earth and in far-off galaxies, in the past, the future, and across dimensions, the curtain has risen on the final war between light and darkness. A great, galactic epic spanning the author’s career begins here!  
  
Kyomu Senki is made up mainly of four series: “The Tiger of 5000 Light Years” serialized in 1980-82. “Kyomu Senshi Miroku” and “Jaki-oh Bakuretsu”, both of which started serialization in 1987, just a few months apart. Lastly, “Skull Killer Jaki-oh”, a mech series set in the 20th century that originally started in 1990.  
  
Along with the four main series, it also includes four short stories: “New Rashoumon”, “Ninja Arts at Honnou Temple: The Black Magic of Koji Kashin”, “The Strange Living Dimension, Dogura”, and “The Dogura War Chronicles”.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Ninja, Anthology, Samurai, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Naruto (Official Colored)
description: Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
tags: Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: PET
description:
"If you're coming, then just come. You missed me didn't you."  
"Understood, 'Master'."  
  
A florist and his regular customer…  
On the surface, they seem normal but they have a very special relationship…  
Restraints, handcuffs, toys, SM…  
The florist is a master and the other is a dog who listens obediently…  
However, things take an interesting turn when their already unusual relationship grows into something more.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic

name: Morumo 1/10
description:
A young high school couple out on a date saw what looked like a falling meteorite, and inside, they discovered a little baby girl! The two of them married and adopted the girl, who they named Morumo, as their own. The only problem with this feel-good story is that now, as a high school freshman, Morumo is 16.4 meters tall!  
  
Morumo still has a pretty happy life. She's popular with locals and tourists alike, and she goes to school everyday with her childhood friend Miharu. Then one day, a mad scientist, who specializes in experimenting on young ladies, injects Morumo with a serum that reduces her to 1/10 of her normal size. Her weight remains the same, so she is super-dense and tough like a superhero. Suddenly, it seems like all the joys of an ordinary life are within her grasp!! Sadly, the serum's effects are temporary and soon Morumo returns to her giant state.  
  
But now that she knows a normal life is possible, Morumo is not going to give up! Even if it means she and Miharu have to allow a mad scientist to experiment on her, surely the ends will be worth the means!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: Kita wishes to be lovey-dovey with Ryo. Her wish is granted in a strange way.
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Not found
description: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A man visits a painter renowned for his skill but also known as an eccentric, having been ordered by his lord to commission a fusuma painting. The painter insists he won't paint the next work until he can properly depict a cat. As the man grows increasingly anxious over the never-ending, incomplete painting...?!
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Samurai

name: Your Distance
description: My boyfriend, that was 287km away is now 3km away? Professor Bo Chang Yi used to be good at understanding others but is now no longer humane. The happiness in Ting Shuang’s heart vanished in an instant, leaving only fear, if you think about it, it seems that there will be disaster in the near future.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: GALAXIAS
description:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!!
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Aisare Teru Baai Janai no
description: Betrayed by love and cast aside by society, Liz finds herself at the edge of despair, with nothing left but her tragic fate. As darkness slowly closes in around her, a flicker of hope appears – a chance to reclaim her life and rewrite her story. Should the naive girl who once believed in love’s promises face her cruel destiny, or transform into a force of vengeance against those who deceived her? The decisions Liz makes will shape her destiny, and the world around her, forever.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Azure Wants to Turn Me into the Ideal BF
description:
Everyone likes strong women—until they get beaten by one.

Azure says she’s helping the boy becomes the perfect male individual.

But between combat drills, emotional breakdown graphs, and her sketchy smile...

The boy starting to wonder—is he in training for war?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Self-Published, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sensou Kyoushitsu
description:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
tags: Action, Psychological, Military, Fantasy, Mystery, Music, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the "baby of fate"...

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king. Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby. Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Kitsune no Oyome-chan
description: In Kyoto, the capital of a thousand years, a fox spirit and a young man meet and fall in love. And so begins the lovey-dovey life of a human-kitsune newlywed couple. Of course, it's full of fluff!
tags: Romance, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Akuyaku Reijou wa Ouji no Honsou (Dekiai) wo Shiranai
description:
Isekai, reincarnation, romcom of a Yandere Prince × super insensitive villainess daughter!

In a meeting with Prince Dylan, Belltier suddenly recalls her previous life and realizes that she has been reincarnated as the villainess in an otome game.

In order to avoid the bad ending, just as she thought to distance herself from the Prince, she was chosen as his fiancée.

"Do not let the prince have a sad childhood!”

It's only 5 years until the lonely prince meets the heroine. She is a temporary fiancée, but she decides to become a friend and support him until then.

But as we get along smoothly, the skinship of the prince gets intense?!

I love you so much.

Not the heroine, but I have been doted on ──?!!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: You Shou Xi Hua
description: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline.
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, 4-Koma, Full Color

name: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken
description:
Amane Fujimiya’s neighbor in the apartment he lives in is the school’s number one lovable angel: Excellent and with a level of beauty that can only be described as angelic – Mahiru Shiina. Amane, an ordinary student who doesn’t stand out, is her neighbour, but until now, they didn’t interact with each other. After meeting the soggy angel in the rain:   
  
“I’m returning what I borrowed. By the way, clean up your room. It’s filthy.”   
“None of your business.”   
  
A relationship with a slightly sharp-tongued angel begins, starting with handing over an umbrella. From catching a cold and having someone take care of you, to making a meal for someone because they neglected their health, to joint work (cleaning rooms)…'  
  
This is a short comic intended to only introduce the light novel. The serialization of the actual manga will be done by 三描子 and 優木すず.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Eunuch of Empire
description:
Eunuchs, the only men allowed to serve in the secret garden known as the harem. When a young eunuch named Jafar encounters three beautiful sisters there, their meeting shakes the country to its foundations!

(MANGA Plus)
tags: Harem, Gore, Drama, Shota, Mystery

name: Shinryaku! Ika Musume
description: The sea in our world has been polluted. All sort of trash have been thrown into the sea, making it unpleasant to live underwater. One of the inhabitants of the sea, Ika Musume (Squid Girl) seeks to exact revenge on humanity for throwing trash into the sea. Clueless about the surface, she tries to invade humanity alone and rule over the world, only to find herself slaving away at one of the nearest beach houses for breaking a side of its wall.
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Crows Gaiden Housenka - the beginning of HOUSEN
description: Before Narumi Taiga, Bitou Tatsuya, King Joe and Tsukimoto Mitsumasa, there was Terakado Butta. This is the story of how, under his leadership, Housen became the powerhouse that would become Suzuran High School's greatest opponent. Butta was there the year the school was founded, and without him, we would have never had the Housen Hitman we know and fear today.
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents

name: Kuroneko to Majo no Kyoushitsu
description: Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch, but she can't use magic. She needs a tutor to get into the magic academy she's always dreamed of, but she doesn't have the money or the connections... But suddenly, Spica meets a mysterious, talking black cat who can use magic! He agrees to make her his apprentice, but only if she promises to rid him of his curse! But to break it, she has to kiss him on the...!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: Nee Nee, Nene-san.

name: After Becoming Financially Free, They Offered Their Loyalty
description: Shen Yuan, handsome and rich, became a second-generation loser and was mercilessly abandoned by his money-worshipping girlfriend after his family’s business shut down. However, because of this, he obtained the [Perfect Life] system. As long as he spent money on the opposite sex with a favorability of 60, he could receive double the amount back. From that moment on, he made full use of the system to win the hearts of beautiful women and earn a fortune. The more he spent, the richer he became. He spent money like water and rose to the top 0.1%, living a happy entrepreneurial life filled with endless passion

description: Tells the story of a girl who always thinks positively even though she is in a world full of zombies...
