name: Utsumi-kun no Koi no Uta
description:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!
tags: Romance, School Life, Music

name: Kono Koi wa Harassment desu ka?
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers

name: Not found
description: Kohinata Riko's love interests are very low. However, she doesn't want to admit it, and knows there's no way she'll be able to admit it, so she keeps it to herself for a long time. One day, while she was having a study session at her classmate Tomoka's house, a girl with a school bag appeared in front of them! It turns out that Tomoka has a younger sister who is still in elementary school. Riko feels like time has stopped because she's so cute, but it seems like the sister has some hostility towards Riko...? A high school girl who has pedophilic urges for children and a girl who wants to become an adult...
tags: Loli, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. "...I don't have a home anymore." Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn't leave a girl alone, so he took her home. "Thanks for the help." "I-It's fine..." When Akira heard about Aoi's complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
S-class Hunter Kim Yiyoung can't wait to leave the novel she woke up in. She gets the chance after defeating the story's final boss, but instead of returning home, she's sent into another novel! Yiyoung becomes Lady Renee Markious, a petty villainess who's just been framed for murder. Fortunately, Yiyoung has a secret weapon nobody knows about… her skills from her past life! Can Yiyoung clear Renee's name and find her way back to her own world? Or will she be trapped in this tale for good?

---
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Anata no Danna Uwaki Shitemasu yo
description: The manga focuses on a hero's wife, but monster girls seeking children of heroic lineage keep coming after him to steal him away. The hero's wife chooses to deal with the monster girls herself.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Harem, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
"Sharon Ray Fondevole. I'm breaking off my engagement with you right here and now!"

Sharon, a duke's daughter known as the flower of society, is inexplicably told by her fiancé, the crown prince, that her engagement is broken, and then she is kidnapped and sold off to a brothel. Sharon, now resigned, takes control of the brothel with her education and leadership skills, and pursues the truth behind the broken engagement. Sharon then meets Travis, the duke's son, whom she once had feelings for...
___
* **Original Web Publication:** [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00202651010000_68/), [Nico Nico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55619)
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8385gp/)
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Prince of Tennis II
description: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Having lost his beloved lifelong master Altesia, Kaltz vowed to take revenge on those who framed her. After making all his preparations, he "returned" to the past. Now 10 years old, and armed with the knowledge he gained in the future, Kaltz begins to operate behind the scenes as the "True Mastermind."
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I Belong to House Castiello
description:
"Pink Eyes," a young girl, has lived a life filled with battery and abuse by her mother, but she has two unexpected factors that may play a role in her life: first, she has gained memories of her previous life as Seo Young, a 23 year-old Korean woman, and second, she is a nobleman's illegitimate daughter.

One day, her prostitute mother takes her to the empire's sole Duke and claims that the girl is his child to gain alimony from him. Although he seems to not believe her, he nevertheless buys "Pink Eyes" for 20,000 gold. With that, her new life as "Estelle" starts.

But what truly awaits her? And is she really a child of this house?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ikitsuku Saki wa Yuusha ka Maou ka - Moto Hai Player ga Iku Isekai Kouryakuki
description:
"I've found you!"

Mamiya Yuuto was transported into another world after hearing those words, but all he got out of it were a younger body and the ability to see his status screen at any time — in overwhelming detail. Survive in a different world with skills and magic, armed with the experience of working life and the knowledge and perseverance of a retired gamer!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Dismissed as a good-for-nothing who could only manipulate sand, Horus, fifth prince of the Magref Empire, was banished. Dumped in the scorching desert, he used his sand magic to create a colossal sand fortress. What had seemed like a hellish wasteland became his personal heaven, and he decided to make a life for himself there. Yet, through conflicts with magical beasts, he gathered companions from diverse races, eventually establishing a kingdom with himself as its ruler.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Nyotaika Yankee Gakuen ☆ Ore no Hajimete, Nerawaretemasu.
description: Delinquent student Torao is tired of losing to the school's top dog, Inuzuka Ryouhei. One day, before his latest challenge, Torao accidentally drinks something from a vending machine that turns him into a girl! Worse yet, Inuzuka has fallen completely head over heels for her! What will Torao, now Torako, do to change back and ward off Inuzuka's advances?
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, School Life, Delinquents

name: Reality Quest
description:
Ha Do-wan is a bullied gamer, whose bullies force him to grind to obtain in-game items for them. 

After one such bully demands that Dowan obtain an impossibly rare item for him or be beaten in front of the prettiest girl in school, Dowan games day and night for a week until he drops dead from exhaustion. 

However, as soon as he dies, he respawns back in his classroom one week before his death. Everything is the same as it was before, except now he has all the skills he’s acquired from the games he’s played in real life! 

Will Dowan be able to use his newfound abilities and gamified existence to defeat his bullies?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kanojo ni Norowareterukedo Shiawase Nanode OK Desu ☆
description: Being kind to girls is the most important thing to 17-year-old Iida Harunari. As the kind of guy to carry the bags of all the girls in his class with him to school each morning, those around him sarcastically called him the "ultimate gentleman Iida". One day, he encountered a beautiful girl with a strange aura, Kageura Sari, but he noticed a cursed-looking monster emerging from her body. Iida was going to hurry and flee, but wasn't something amiss...? He was cursed by the heroine?!
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Damekko Mii-chan
description: Mi-chan is a bad child. She can't do well what everyone else can do. At school, her friend Akemi-chan always throws buckets of water on her. Then one day, she meets Mike-kun, who is playing a game on the rooftop...
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, School Life

name: Kataude no Amy
description: Amy is an ordinary girl who lives with her beloved father. However, she is not human, but a doll made up of cloth and cotton. Why was she created, and what does her future hold?
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Wataru Sajou, who is deeply in love with his beautiful classmate Aika Natsukawa, is continuing to approach her without getting discouraged while having dreams about their mutual love. However one day he woke up thinking, “I am not really fit to be together with someone as good as her, huh…” Upon realizing this, Wataru started keeping an appropriate distance towards her, much to Aika’s surprise. “Could it be that he hates me now…? ”Did his intentions slip by her because she was getting impatient after arriving at the wrong conclusion!? This is the start of a romcom revolving around two people who just cant get their feelings across and both think their love is unrequited!

[Official English Light Novel](https://monogatari-novels.com/collections/the-dreaming-boy-is-a-realist)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Achilles
description: Not found
tags: Historical, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore

name: Not found
description: A spaceship in the shape of a horse-drawn carriage travels across the galaxy. Riding in the carriage is Ridley, the scientist who built this eccentric spaceship, and her partner Watari, a shy girl. The two leave Earth, which has become uninhabitable due to environmental pollution, and set off in the carriage. Their goal is to find a safe planet to settle. However, all the planets they visit are very strange! A planet with a god who can bring all things back to life, another planet where the luckiest people are considered the greatest, and a planet with countless libraries... The two girls are sometimes thrown for a loop by these strange worlds...
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Girls' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo
description: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: My Dear Lass
description:
They met in a town of peaches.

Mu Xiaoen, a willfully incomplete moon, and Shi Xingyuan, a star who could not sparkle.

*Hey, my dear lass. I want to give you the entirety of Peachtown's summer.*
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Psycho Eyes
description:
Watanabe Kei can see the “connections between people”. Because of his ability, he avoids popularity, withdraws into himself, and leads a self-indulgent life…

One day, after being questioned by police officer Zen, Kei finds out he has the ability psycho eyes, is forced into a super important police investigation, and ends up playing a part in solving the case!?

This is the story of a young man who leads a depressing daily life, who meets a mentor who also has the ability to see, and changes his destiny and the world!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Supernatural

name: Kuromaku Ikka ni Tensei Shita kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru
description:
The protagonist, who has been reincarnated into the world of a game he played extensively, has become Yuri, the third son of a villainous family!! His father, siblings, and the entire household are the worst and most ruthless, all doomed to be brutally massacred. As for Yuri himself, he is destined to betray the Hero as the final boss, dragging the heroine down with him to meet the worst possible death. Not wanting to die, he decides to completely distance himself from both his villainous family and the Hero's party, intending to live a peaceful and carefree life... Or so he thought, but now, one by one, the original story's characters keep gathering around him...!?
___
**Compositor:** [Kasama Sanshirou](https://mangadex.org/author/03725218-796b-4514-b7f6-caad06847d56)
**Character Designer:** [Ruroo](https://mangadex.org/author/c3fecffb-c301-4e20-90d9-309e4acf19fc)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71281)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Star of Girls' Garden
description:
The story starts when Kagawa, a student, delivers the class journal to Hoshi-sensei. As the students play word chain game "Shiritori" in the form of drawings in the remarks column of the journal, Hoshi-sensei becomes troubled...

---
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award for Manga in 2022**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi Hen
description:
After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris...!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shirotaka](https://mangadex.org/author/38c0c039-c347-42fa-a196-3d0315451b4c)
___
**Note:** MangaDex's chapter numbering follows the series' magazine chapter numbering.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Tenka no Yell
description: Not found
tags: Sports, Web Comic, Music

name: Tsuihou Sareta Maou wa Chikyuu wo Mezasu!
description: Exiled by her own kind and sealed by a hero, the demon lord is finally revived after an eternity. She awakens in a wasteland, with a dark sky full of twinkling stars. The air feels thinner, and her body strangely light... After gathering herself and trying to sense the hero's presence, it seems the hero is on a distant blue planet in the sky...? She doesn't know exactly where she is, but one thing is certain: the demon lord will fight to defeat the hero!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy

name: Mild 7
description:
Nagai's ecchi parody of Mikiya Mochizuki's [Wild 7](https://mangadex.org/title/b5e3ba0f-f735-4a32-a617-2bd3db500091/wild-7?tab=chapters)

(from ebookjapan):

The Seven Soldier Family is the world's most powerful mercenary family. We call them the "Mild 7"!  Wherever they go, they have no enemies. Where the Mild 7 goes, Mild 7 kills everyone who stands in their way! Led by hippie dad Dolaemon, 36 years old, the Mild 7 make use of machine guns, missiles, rockets, tanks, fighter planes, and even a submarine battleship, the Yamato, which was converted from the sunken Yamato, in their basement. 

This is Go Nagai's quintessential masterpiece, a messily erotic and violent work!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Incest, Crime, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life

name: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!
description:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Misao no Keiyaku
description: Muramoto is a dull university professor despised by his wife and disrespected by his students. His only salvation is the presence of Yoshino Misao, who treats him favorably. However, he discovers that his wife is having an affair. Muramoto, sinking into despair, is gently embraced by Misao...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: Ekiden Bros
description: Nobunaga grew up at a dormitory full of long-distance runners training for the Ekiden marathon. He dreams of being a runner, but struggles to take the first step. But when he gets pulled into a race at school, he'll catch the attention of the running club.
tags: Sports

name: Not found
description: In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability," Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However, for some reason, his stepsister Rei, the most powerful ability user, harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power, Rei will kill him. With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then, a certain spirit appears before him, revealing an unexpected secret about his ability...
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Ensmile
description:
I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night, while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery
#mystery #thriller
tags: Thriller, Long Strip, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Manyuu Hikenchou: The Anthology Comic
description: A collection of short 4-Koma comics from various artists for Magi-Cu Magazine based off the Manyuu Hikenchou anime and manga
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Anthology, Samurai, Adventure, Girls' Love, 4-Koma

name: Ping-Pong Peril
description: Millions in debt, high schooler Taira's only path to redemption is in the world of underground ping pong! "Gimme a flat table, a ball, and a racket, and I'll show you some ping pong!" A shining table and a burning ball. Nobody will keep their sanity when this crazy ping pong battle begins!
tags: Sports, Drama

name: PPPPPP
description: Gakuon Otogami was a genius pianist whose name is among the greatest in the annals of the music world. He had seven children who also all became genius pianists. All seven except for the one named Lucky that is. This is the miraculous story of a regular kid taking on godly talent!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music

name: Haisha-san, Atattemasu!
description: A human drama between a villain-faced yakuza and a dominant dentist! Give it a read and maybe your "wall" will be broken down...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Mafia, Crossdressing, Medical, Police, Slice of Life

name: Part-Time Grim Reaper
description: “I’m from the afterlife.” Lee Do-jin needs money—a lot of it—to cover his younger sibling’s medical bills. With nowhere else to turn, he calls the number on a strange, ominous business card he finds by chance. At the meeting point, he encounters a silver-haired woman shrouded in mystery— a grim reaper, known as a Chasa. She makes him an unbelievable offer: Work as a temp worker for the Underworld. His mission? To stop “Mokdugi,” predators that feast on souls tainted by sin, before they can drag the damned into chaos. Thrust into the supernatural world of death, debt, and spiritual battles, Do-jin must navigate his new double life— balancing his humanity with a job that demands he walk the line between life and death.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tokyo Demon Bride Story
description:
Ten years ago, a young Jinta promised to marry a certain girl. And now that he's all grown up, a wacky oni girl shows up at his door! Get ready for a hilarious mononoke battle manga!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/tokyo-demon-bride-story)
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Hikotei's Legend of Zelda Body Swap Twitter Comics
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Self-Published, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kaiju No. 8
description:
Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain, Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force, he decides to try out for the squad once more. There's just one problem. He's made the Defense Force's neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, Horror, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Hell’s Paradise: Jigokuraku
description:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/hells-paradise-jigokuraku)
tags: Historical, Action, Samurai, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Boku no Hero Academia
description:
One day, a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities, known as "quirks," which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately, Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk, suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet, he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible, Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy, UA High.  
  
However, everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol, All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end, the powerless boy undergoes special training, working harder than ever before. Eventually, this leads to him inheriting All Might's power, and with his newfound abilities, gets into his school of choice, beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet.
___
**Note: Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of My Hero Academia are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/my-hero-academia), with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MANGA Plus for free at the link below.**
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mobile Suit Gundam UC (Unicorn) - Bande Dessinée
description:
The year is Universal Century 0096, and Banagher Links is a student at the Anaheim Electronics Industrial College training facility at an incomplete space colony. There, he rescues a girl named Audrey Burne and helps her to evade capture by Zeon remnants known as the Sleeves. The Sleeves are after "Laplace's Box" an item the Vist Foundation has had in its possession since the beginning of the Universal Century which can be used to topple the Earth Federation government, and Cardeas Vist, the head of the family plans to hand them the key to it. Audrey, fearful of what will happen, wants to convince Vist not to give them the key. The Earth Federation's Londo Bell unit attacks the Sleeves and Banagher is drawn into the chaos.  
  
**Notes**:  
Adapted from the light novel series that were later adapted into a feature film series.  
* Day of the Unicorn: Chapters 1-12
* Red Comet: Chapters 13-21
* Palau Capture Battle: Chapters 22-26
* Ghost of Laplace: Chapters 27-29
* In the Depths of a Gravity Well: Chapters 30-38
* The Black Unicorn: Chapters 39-51
* The Sky and the Stars: Chapters 52-60
* Over the Rainbow: Chapters 61-62



---

**Links:**  
- [Original Novels (on Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B07YZTJ135)
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Strange Lessons by Professor Terror
description: University professor Tim Lorentz leads a unique seminar for new students on terrorism and cults. The terrifying lesson begins... What is terrorism really? What are the hidden roots of terrorism in everyday life? All the theories about terrorism that have been spread in the media so far are lies. Professor Terror teaches us the truth about "terrorism and cults," which is scary to know, but even scarier not to know.
tags: Comedy, Survival, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Hachigatsu Kokonoka Boku wa Kimi ni Kuwareru.
description:
In order to eat me, my enigmatic stalker is protecting me from other strange women―  
  
A high school boy, Sakurai, has a secret he cannot tell anyone: he has been plagued by stalkers since he was a child. One day, his classmate, Ueda, suddenly transforms into a monster, revealed to be one of his stalkers. Miyako, who has always been closely following him, appears and saves him. She tells Sakurai that the monsters, commonly known as urban legends in Japan, are after him because they love him. What will be the fate of Sakurai who is loved by countless creatures disguised as beautiful girls?
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Gore, Drama, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ni Watashi wa Naru!
description: In middle school, friendless otaku Arimoto Airi had a revelation after reading (legally distinct) *Gals Can't Be Kind to Otaku*. If she turned herself into a gal, wouldn't she be able to make a ton of friends? Now in high school, her plan is about to come to fruition.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Gyaru

name: Chiseigaku Boys ~Koku ga Salaryman ni natte Hataraku Kaisha~
description: Geopolitics is a hot topic of study that looks at a country's politics and economy from the aspect of geography. Japan is a country with a lot of boys from the U.S., China, Russia, and other countries who work too hard for their own good, and who are in the dark.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
description: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Code Geass: Pure Almaria
description:
The fourth year of the Kowa era.

Some time has passed since the last Emperor of the Holy Britannian Empire, Lelouch vi Britannia, was defeated by the unrivaled hero Zero.

The world, which has had a long history of conflict and hatred, has moved towards the future, hand in hand, with dialogue instead of force, with compassion instead of hatred, since the death of the evil Emperor Lelouch, who plotted to conquer the world.

There have been small-scale incidents such as the kidnapping of Zero and Nunnally a few years ago known as the "Confusion in Hashvess", but these were quickly resolved by the Black Knights and Glinda Knights, under the direction of the United Federation of Nations.

Yes. The world has changed. It has been reborn into a world where peace is the norm, and not conflict.

However...

Even though the world has been reborn into peace, conflict has not been eradicated.

There are those who cannot live without conflict, those who want to gain wealth through conflict, and those who want conflict in the first place.

As long as people live and society is formed by people, conflict will never completely disappear. The unrest happening here in Krygyzstan was one of them.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Hiyoku no Tori
description:
The setting is ancient-China. Our main characters are poisonous (sometimes domesticated) harpy-like creatures, who get their poison and the ornate coloring that they’re so proud of, from the toxic plants which they eat.  
  
This is a yaoi focusing on the (somewhat fraught) relationship between two such harpies.  
  
If you’re here for a human x harpy relationship… Well, let’s just say you won’t be disappointed either.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: Fushigi Yuugi - Byakko Senki
description:
From Nyan-Nyan Rampage:  
  
"The final arc of the story begins…  
  
When Takao Osugi receives the mysterious "Universe of the Four Gods" book from his mentor, Einosuke Okuda, he does everything to keep it away from his young daughter, Suzuno. But when disaster strikes Tokyo, can he still protect her from her fate?  
  
Shortly after the tragic finale of Genbu Kaiden, young Suzuno Osugi's tale as the Priestess of Byakko beings to unfold!"
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...
description: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her "slave" status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...
tags: Demons, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Eroge Sekai ni Tensei Shita Ore ga, Oshi e no Ai de Netorare Heroine wo Shiawase ni Suru.
description:
"Suck it nicely, you weakling!"

The one servicing that bastard's thing was my beloved girlfriend. There was nothing I could do before that scene...

After starting to play an erotic game recommended by a friend, Mitsuki falls head over heels in love with the game's main heroine, Kotoha. But this game is a NTR game in which the heroine is seduced by the player's best friend, Ryou?! While searching for a happy ending with Kotoha, Mitsuki accidentally falls onto the train platform. When he wakes up, he finds himself faced with none other than… Kotoha!? To his surprise, Mitsuki has been reincarnated as the player character of "that" game…!

With his vast knowledge and love of games, Mitsuki is determined to change fate this time. In order to protect Kotoha and the others from Ryou, he must achieve a perfect happy ending!
___
**Additional Official Raws:**
- Individual Chapters: [comipo](https://comipo.app/series/web/20610/), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CTHPS4K3), [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/811406/)
- Volumes: [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/comic/work/=/product_id/BJ01208710.html)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Drama, School Life

name: Bad Guy
description: For 10 years I tried to be a good person for her, whom she could love. But then I found out that she did not notice my feelings and fell in love with a bad guy! So from today, I decided to become bad.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shino-chan Can't Say Her Name
description: "I can't say my own name," says Ooshima Shino. When she enters high school, she makes her first friend. Communication full of nothing but awkwardness begins. Suitable words always come to mind after some delay. But adolescence can turn even a klutz into a star… right?
tags: Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music

name: Rikujou Jieitai Tokumu Chouhou Kikan - Beppan no Inu
description: In the Special Operations Group, an elite unit of the Ground Self-Defense Force, there is a female member who is bored with her daily routine of training. One day, at the behest of her superior, she heads to a certain garrison and is recruited by a mysterious man to join a black-ops unit known as “Beppan”. Given the name “Nana”, she finds herself on the front lines of a national defense war filled with schemes and violence.
tags: Action, Crime, Adventure, Military, Gore

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Nankai Soujou-hen
description:
Spring is here, and the graduating seniors of First High are planning a getaway to sunny Okinawa. At the same time, Tatsuya and Miyuki will be on the island as the Yotsuba family’s representatives at a memorial service for the victims of the invasion there several years earlier. Of course, this is just a cover for their true purpose: foiling a terrorist plot hatched by some deserters and Australian operatives. Their primary target is a party that Shizuku and Honoka will be attending—What are the chances? Romance is in the air, and danger is on the horizon, making this a vacation they’ll never forget!

Manga adaption of the 'Southern Sea Riot Arc' from the 20th light novel.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Grand Metal Organs
description: A boy killed by his superhero idol, then he decided to become a Dark Walker. "Saving the world by destroying the world"
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: For nearly two centuries, the vampire Maria slumbered in her coffin — until Xing Lan (星阑), a wandering werewolf girl, happened upon her resting place and awakened her. As Xing Lan opened the coffin, a curse sealed itself upon her, leaving her none the wiser. The naïve but spirited wolf girl cheerfully embraced her newfound companion. Together, they embarked on a journey to the city...
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Iga no Monogatari
description: A prequel manga to the Assassin's Creed Shadows game, it tells the story of Tsuyu, Nagato, and Hanzo, how they met, and their lives before their lives changed completely.
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Ninja, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Familyman
description: While Gang-ho was working at the local factory, he slept only three hours a day and worked like a horse. However, after his face was burned with the fire, he was dismissed from his workplace. He now does not want his daughter to be scared of his face, so he decided to wear the costume of SUPERHERO, “Guru-man”, and stay with her.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Dangerous Lover
description:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Mystery, Full Color

name: Let's Play
description:
Sam wants to be a game developer, but before her career can get started, a popular gaming personality posts a video of himself playing her first game and gives it a bad review. To make matters worse, she soon finds out he's her new neighbor! A story about gaming, memes, and social anxiety. Come for the plot, stay for the doggo.

---
Alt. Official English: [Webtoons (expired)](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/letsplay/list?title_no=1218)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it
description: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Ichinomiya Shingo, a young 25 years old, single, company worker, while thinking of tomorrow’s busy working day goes to sleep. However, the when he wakes up, it was a room unknown to him.

He learns that he is inside a 6 years-old boy and has taken over his mind. Furthermore, he learns a lot from the memories of said boy: he was born as the youngest child (8th son and 10th child) of a poor noble family living in the back country. Having no administrative skill, he couldn’t do anything to manage the vast land his family has. Fortunately, he was blessed with a very rare talent, talent of magic. Unfortunately, while his talent could bring prosperity to his family, in his situation it only brought disaster.

Yes, this is the story of the boy, Wendelin von Benno Baumeister, opening his own path in a harsh world.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dark Gathering
description: Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Doomsia's Healing Sessions
description: A devoted cleric's journey alongside a Draganonian warrior who suffers under an ancient curse of Lust.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Self-Published, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Full Color

name: Subtle Disaster
description: A webtoon writer, Songshin Ha, lives in the apartment, at the top of the hill, that has serious problem with neighbor's noise; and he desperately wants to solve the problem with his neighbors.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Full Color

name: Perfect Glitter
description: Momo spends her days posting pictures on social media and survives on the few "likes" she gets. One day, she suddenly receives an invitation to meet up with her idol, Ichika, an influencer. Momo is overjoyed by the unexpected good news, but what awaits her ahead? Is it heaven or a one-way ticket to hell?
tags: Psychological, Drama

name: INNU - Girl Meets Dog
description:
Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out, she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily, the pug isn't a regular dog either, but a super strong badass fighter.  

(Synopsis by Manga Mogura)
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Military, Delinquents

name: DINKs no Totsukitoka "Umanai Onna " wa Damedesu ka?
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama

name: BOX - Something's in the Box
description:
Seven people received a "puzzle" and ticket from an unknown sender, and followed the ticket to a strange square house. A mysterious woman who came "out of curiosity" joined them, and what awaited those people in the house was a girl as beautiful as a doll and maze beyond imagination. They cannot leave unless they solve the puzzle. When it's solved, part of your body will disappear! Can they escape? And, just who invited them there?

From [Anilist](https://anilist.co/manga/113065/Box-Hako-no-Naka-ni-Nanika-Iru/)
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Houseki no Kuni (Minimalist Color)
description: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
tags: Action, Fan Colored, Adventure, Drama, Mystery

name: Princess Princess
description:
Why is Toru Kouno receiving such an overly warm welcome at his new all boy's school? He has yet to discover the secret system called "Hime (Princess)" in effect at the school. Boys who are chosen have to dress up as a girl in every school event! Little does Kouno know that he would be the chosen one…  
–  
Contains the story Tore x Puri (Train x Princess) in volume three.
tags: Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
My peaceful school life... is officially over.

Izumiya Ryouta, an introverted otaku, suddenly finds himself surrounded by the top three beauties of the class after a seat change. In front of him sits the little-sister-type Miyama Airi. To his left, the cool and detached gyaru, Ichinose Yuria. And to his right, the refined, black-haired class rep, Kuroki Ruri. On the surface, they're flawless beauties—but Ryouta stumbles upon secrets that none of them can ever let out...

"P-Please...! Just don’t tell anyone about this!"
"From now on, we're in that kind of relationship."
"This is a secret... just between you and me, Ryouta-kun."

All he wanted was a quiet otaku life—so how did things end up like this?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Katabutsu-kei Joshi ni Kokuhaku shitemita
description: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Bokutachi ga Yarimashita
description:
We aim for the bowling high score…   
Next week, we watch the TV…   
Our senior friend is rich…  
Yes, our life is full of hope!  
  
 The story centers on a group of friends who are satisfied and complacent with their everyday lives. The friends include Tobio, a passive high schooler who makes it a rule not to hope too much; Maru, a scheming boy who gossips behind people's back; Isami, a gaudy student who likes girls and recently got a girlfriend with big breasts; and their senior Paisen (slang for senpai, or upperclassman), a 20-year old man who is rich and has long graduated from high school.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Crows Zero
description:
The story starts with Takiya Genji, the son of a Yakuza boss, entering Suzuran All-Boys High School as a transferred senior with the goal of conquering it. During the Freshers' orientation lecture, Yakuza arrive at the school seeking Tamao Serizawa to avenge an injury.  
  
* Based on the first live action film.
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life

name: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite
description: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tensei Shita Kuukan Mahoutsukai wa Shoutai Kakushite Medachitai!
description:
"With this power, couldn't I become a mysterious mage who stands out while no one knows who he is?" 

Higashiyama Touri is reincarnated and granted the ultimate talent for a rare and special type of magic, "Dimensional Magic" by God himself. Dreaming of becoming the cool, enigmatic powerhouse whose name spreads through whispered rumors while he enjoys a quiet drink at the bar, Touri decides to act out his fantasy. Right after reincarnating, he rescues an adventurer party from being wiped out by a giant monster. Expecting the girls to spread rumors about him, he is shocked when instead... the country's strongest party, full of beautiful women, starts following him around?!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
These girls aren't human. Still, they adore humans more than anyone. 

I am Hitoma Rei, a NEET nearing 30 years old who was traumatized by  human relationships.  When I changed jobs, I ended up at an all-girls school whose purpose is to take non-humans and make them human!? Spending my days with the strange students Minadzuki Kyouka, a mermaid; Oogami Isaki, a werewolf; Usami Sui, a rabbit; and Haneda Tobari, a bird...

Why do they want to be human? What do they want to do once they become human? I will teach them about humans. This may be an alternate world, but it's not like I've been reincarnated.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Amigara Dansou no Kai
description: Following an earthquake in an unnamed prefecture of Japan, a fault is discovered on Amigara Mountain, very close to the epicenter of the quake. On the slopes of the mountain, two hikers meet; a man named Owaki and a woman named Yoshida. The former assumes that they are both here to see the fault, which has captured the attention of the global press. Following the sound of voices to the fault, the two of them marvel at the strange sight before them: countless human-shaped holes in a rock face exposed by the earthquake.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: DD Fist of the North Star
description:
**"In the year 199X… The world was NOT engulfed by the flames of nuclear war!"** 
  
Bat is your ordinary college student, working several part-time jobs to get by. But all that changes once his friend, Lin, brings in a man named Kenshiro to work at his convenience store. Bat quickly grows to hate Kenshiro - but unfortunately for him, that's just the beginning of many wacky adventures… And all he can do is retort!  
  
This is a gag manga of Fist of the North Star (Hokuto no Ken). Taking place in a world where the end of the century didn't happen, all the characters have relatively normal lives. The martial artists are all drawn Design Deformed (or DD), while most other characters look normal. However, this can be enjoyed both on its own and as a companion piece to the original Fist of the North Star!  
  
**Note:**  
[Was up for consideration for localization by SMA.](https://www.manga-audition.com/comic-zenon/dd-hokuto-no-ken-by-kajio/) However, SMA has stopped all attempts at localizing manga after December 2016.

Done by Osamu Kajisa, of [Bartender à Paris](https://mangadex.org/title/13da00cf-f2e1-40a5-a625-77c2c048e2b9/bartender-a-paris) fame. Here, he goes by the pen name Kajio(カジオ) which is a combination of his first and last name.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The War of Corpses
description: In an era where Necromancers create their own knights to fight, "War of the Corpses" is the ultimate sport. Amidst a brutal battle where countless people pour their passion and dreams into the fight, who will emerge as the final victor?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Magic, Fantasy

name: Makenshi no Maken Niyoru Maken no Tame no Harem Life
description: Fujinomiya Soujirou is transported to a fantasy world with only his Daisho (pair of samurai swords) in hand. The katana can talk and swiftly informs him that it is Hotarumaru, the legendary national treasure of Japan thought lost during World War II. The wakizashi is too young to have a voice, so Souji names it Sakura. This is the story of Souji and Hotarumaru's journey through a new world as he seeks to achieve... a sword harem?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: From the creator of "The Duke of Death and His Maid" comes Inoue's latest one-shot! When flashy high school gals Yua and Reina casually decide—on a whim—to date each other for a year, their spontaneous choice kicks off a wild and heart-thumping ride of laughs, love, and gyaru energy! A vibrant, youthful gyaru x gyaru couple comedy explodes onto the scene!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Ao no Tatsuki
description: Yoshiwara, the largest Yukaku in Edo. In this town where the passions of the living and the dead swirl, Ao, a popular prostitute, was lost in a strange shrine. It was a "Chinese shrine" between Ukiyo-e and Meiji, where only those who strongly seek the benefits of the spiritual test can reach it...! Only prostitutes with a beautiful but sad past visit the company. To guide and save the soul... Ao unravels their lives with Rakumaru, the priest.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Ore ga Ojou-sama Gakkou ni "Shomin Sample" Toshite Rachirareta Ken
description: In a hidden school surrounded by mountains, young ladies of good families are taught everything a high class lady needs to know. They are also completely cut off from the outside world, keeping them sheltered and innocent. However, a problem has come up recently– more and more graduates are failing to cope with the modern world after graduation. To deal with this problem, they've decided to kidnap a male commoner student, and enroll him as a student. They hope that this will be a gentle way to introduce the girls to the outside world. Kagurazaka Kimito is chosen for this dubious honor, mostly because he seems utterly average. However, the school leaders also seem to have concluded he's a homosexual with a muscle fetish. When Kimito hears that the alternative may be castration (to protect the girls' purity), he eagerly plays along with this misconception. Now he'll just have to survive the attention of many high class young ladies that are completely out of touch with the world.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
This apartment complex has a problem with perverted women!

Yoshida is a tiny, frail highschool graduate who became an unwilling manager of an apartment complex when his father, the former manager, injured himself. Unbeknownst to him, this apartment complex houses quite a few women with very... unusual sexual preferences. This becomes a problem when a mysterious entity begins giving "Libido Cloth" to these women - skimpy outfits that give them superpowers and cause them to go on lewd rampages! Will Yoshida be able to stop them?
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Monster Girls, Shota, Supernatural

name: Rokuhōdō Yotsuiro Biyori
description: At the popular Japanese-style tea house Rokuhoudou, customers can count on receiving not only excellent food and drink, but - if they wish for it - a helping hand in solving any problem that may be plaguing them. Serving in Rokuhoudou are four men who are consummate professionals in their individual fields: tea expert Sui, barista Gure, pâtissier Tsubaki and chef Tokitaka.
tags: Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Gaiden REBELLION: Space, at the End of a Flash...
description:
Universal Century 0079, in the midst of the One Year War and in preparation for "Operation Star One", the SCVA-72 Thoroughbred and its crew are tasked to intercept a Zeon supply route behind the Moon that leads to the Space Fortress Solomon. To accomplish this, the Thoroughbred has been assigned two Gundams, the RX-78-4 Gundam Unit 4 "G04" and its brother unit the RX-78-5 Gundam Unit 5 "G05" piloted by Luce Kassel and Ford Romfellow respectively.  
  
**Note**:   
- The series was later recompiled (alongside all other Matsumoto's Gundam-related titles) within a new 3 volumes *Shinsouban* edition, now labeled as **Mobile Suit Gundam Gaiden REBELLION: Space, at the End of a Flash...** with new additional feautes.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: A girl trapped in her dreams to escape reality falls apart, forcing her to face the reality that haunts her.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Self-Published, Fantasy

name: Soretomo Time Leap ni Suru?
description:
A lovey-dovey daily life with ara~ ara~ wife who can time leap!

Tokina is a self-proclaimed Timeleaper who loves to pamper her husband, Nobumichi. But today, there's something wrong with Nobumichi! While her husband accepts her sweet behavior without embarrassment, Tokina's flirting gradually escalates...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Nisemono no Renkinjutsushi
description:
In another world,
there was a person
who made their living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle……
A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy

name: Sono Apato, Zashikiwarashi-Tsuki Bukken ni Tsuki
description: Ryutaro Saeki (32) was divorced and returned to living alone again. He is quick to find a suspiciously cheap property, but in that room he was greeted by Zashiki Warashi. Bizarre and funny life of two people living together will start!
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Emiya-san Chi no Kyou no Gohan
description:
"Fulfilling meal... a familiar view.”

In this story, Fate and food meet in a delicious and gentle world. It's nothing but an ordinary meal scene... Delicious meals are served at the Emiya's dinner table every day, through spring, summer, fall and winter. – Let's see... what's for dinner today?
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Ashi-Girl
description:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life

name: Gin no Mugibatake
description:
The "Golden Wizard" is the hero who saved a kingdom, and the "Silver Wizard" is the wicked mage who killed the king.
One day, May, a baker's daughter living in the country where the legend of the two wizards was born, finds a grain of wheat in shining silver on the outskirts of town. What awaits her is a "silver wheat field" covered in shimmering stalks of silver wheat. This is a silvery fantasy woven by wizards.

(Source: GFantasy, translated)

---
Note: Originally a one-shot story published in GFantasy, it was picked up for full serialization by the magazine starting 2023-02-18.
tags: Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his 'wisdom from his past life,' he would rule over his lands as a thorough 'realist.'

"Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?"
"Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy."

"Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?"
"To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct."

"The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?"
"Not bullets, shoot them with cannons."

And like that, Astaroth 'reformed' the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Go Rush!!
description: Not found
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Aliens, Mystery

name: Not found
description: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru

name: Legendary Prodigy Of The Duke
description: Summoned into another world, Han Sung worked his entire life as the empire’s SSS-class monster hunter. After countless struggles, he lost his life and came back as the first-born son of the Jackson Duchy, ‘Dale’. He was the continent’s greatest dark magician and the leader of the dark tower, The Black Duke’s son. ‘I will destroy the empire with my own hands.’ Swords, magic, and the art of strategy. With his previous life’s knowledge and intelligence as his background, Dale is reborn as the genius of the duchy. Just how far will his abilities go? His adventure starts now without an inkling of hesitation!
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Summer Moon: The Cupid
description:
"Under the pink-tinted summer moon, a high school girl's 'magical girl double life' begins!"

Wolgo High School is famous for its mystical forest that will help you find your soulmate. With the 'Summer Moon Festival', the school's biggest summer festival where you can find the love of a lifetime, just one month away, the school grounds are filled with pink excitement. Freshman Han Yeo-Reum, whose goal is to find someone to confess to by the festival day, tries to confess to the most popular male upperclassman in school... but at that moment, out of nowhere, she turns into a ☆magical girl☆?!
tags: Romance, Magical Girls, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he's always dreamed of!
___
**Links:**
- [Alternate Official Raw](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000061_S/episodes/KC_0000610000100011_E?episodeType=first) (JP)
- [Manga Volume](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/series/245044/?i=322402000012) (JP)
- [Light Novel](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/series/210413/?i=322405000828) (JP)
- [Official Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/) (EN)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Shinyu ga TS shita hanashi
description: A 4-Koma Ts comics of The typical Cliche where the Mc's Bestfriend turns into a girl one day.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
A yakuza who lived his entire life as a lone wolf is reincarnated into another world as Ryu, the third son of a noble knightly family. For the first time, he experiences the warmth of a loving family and grows up cherished. However, he soon realizes that his kindhearted family, though strong in battle for generations, is hopelessly bad at business and incredibly poor! Deciding he has no choice but to step up, Ryu first sets out to reform their finances.

Utilizing his mysterious "Gokudo" skill and knowledge from his past life's shady dealings, he successfully sells the crops he cultivates. He even makes a fortune with a food stall at a local festival, launching one new venture after another. But as the family's fortunes rise, so too does the jealousy of worthless nobles who begin to hold a grudge against them.
tags: Action, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Male God, Your Persona Has Collapsed!
description:
Reborn back to his college days, Zhou Yuwen knew well the importance of maintaining one’s image.
In this life, his labels were: maturity and extraordinary talent!

“I’m a rather traditional guy. I believe love comes with responsibility — so one must be cautious when falling in love.”

“Zhou Yuwen, let’s remarry!”

“Get lost! I already have a girlfriend!”

He runs, she chases — and even with wings, there’s no escape!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy

name: The Last Immortal's Theorem
description:
"I thought I was doomed to endless despair."

Ylledia, an immortal, "trapped" by eternity, feels helpless witnessing her loved ones perish. Her deep sorrow intensifies when she has to let go of the only other immortal in the world.

Yet, just as she's losing all hope, a vibrant, golden-haired mortal named Dennis enters her life, suggesting they "link up". The moment Ylledia meets Dennis, a glimmer of hope for the world is rekindled within her. Could this boy be the key to saving the world?

Fueled by the newfound hope over their magical connection, Ylledia commits to saving the world once again.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: VOCALOID - The Daily Life of Master & Hatsune Miku (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Narutaru
description:
The story could basically be split into two halves. The main story is about Tamai Shiina, who is an energetic middle-school teenage girl. She visits her grandparent's over the summer where she runs into a very strange creature. Shiina has had lots of strange dreams as of late and also when she was younger, and this strange creature is somewhat related to her visions. She names the small cuddly star-shaped creature, Hoshimaru.  
  
Little did she know that this cuddly creature is really part of herself. After her vacation, Shiina goes back to her home, living with her father. She runs into other children with similar creatures the following days. However, these children have developed their creatures, and they have complete control over them. They mostly use these creatures for their own destructive pleasure and not for good. There is a group of teenagers that all have these strange creatures, and they plan to basically conquer the world, creating a utopia of whatever they desire. Will they succeed? Will Shiina ever develop Hoshimaru?
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
description: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Kizoku Tensei ~Megumareta Umare kara Saikyou no Chikara o Eru~
description: Born as the Thirteenth Prince, Noah was originally in a position removed from the imperial succession, so he freely passed his time in the fief granted to him. However, the Crown Prince died before the Emperor. The imperial succession would be fairly contested among the remaining princes. Noah, being the strongest despite living freely, overwhelmed the other princes and eventually became the Emperor with the most power in the world.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Danjo-hi 1: 39 No heikō sekai de sumire no sakurasō (sakura sou) wa futsūjanai...
description:
A parallel world with a 1:39 male to female ratio. Sumire, the older sister, notices something strange about her younger brother, Sou. Sumire challenges her brother's "unusual" affection and the truth of love and longing in this world. 

This is a fan comic of the manga  "A Parallel World with a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio is Surprisingly Normal."
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Steins;Gate - Mendou na Danjo no Tsukiaikata ni tsuite (Doujinshi)
description: A short slice of life Kurisu x Rintaro story.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Asana Tansaku Kikou
description:
---

name: Norainu to Tenshi-chan
description:
His name is Touji, 20 years old. Following a certain incident that made him infamous, his only way get by is by working insconspicuous part-time jobs without involving himself with others. 

One day, while working at a supermarket, he gets dragged into a conflict between an employee and a rude Customer and ends up getting acquainted with a beautiful high school girl named Sakuya. 

Though she is blessed with an astounding memory, which some even call her ''super eye'', she struggles to adjust to her school life. In this illustrated human drama, those two who have difficulty adapting to this cruel society begin their share-house lifestyle and grow together.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kotei no Sakaime.
description: Not found

name: Bel's Hell
description: A nun falls in love with her sleep paralysis demon.
