name: Youkya ni Natta Ore no Seishun Shijou Shugi
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo-tachi ni Kakomare nagara Boukensha Seikatsu
description:
Akira Kusaba is summoned to the other world of Rumisia by the beautiful silver-haired woman Lucia. Akira wasn't summoned to save the world... but to help her make money!?

Feeling exhausted, Akira begins working part-time in the other world, but gradually he notices the strangeness of this world. There's a female adventurer who wants to have her breasts wiped by a man, a slime that tries to drain the vitality out of men, and even Lucia, who summoned him, forces him to sleep next to her and secretly enjoys solo play in the bed next to her...?

Yes, this other world is a world where the concepts of chastity between men and women are reversed!
tags: Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ki ni Naru Kurumi-san!
description: A plain, quiet guy named Fujimori admires a girl who's too beautiful — Kurumi. Because of his shy personality, he freezes up and can't speak when he gets attention, so he's never once talked to her and they shouldn't have any connection… or so he thought? A wild, emotionally intense beauty and a gloomy, oblivious boy — their clumsy, mismatched love comedy begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Inazuma Eleven Special
description: A promotional manga recapping the story of inazuma eleven
tags: Action, Sports, Aliens

name: Imouto ga Onna Kishi Gakuen ni Nyuugaku Shitara Naze ka Kyuukoku no Eiyuu ni narimashita. Boku ga.
description:
My little sister enrolled in an all-girls academy that trains aspiring knights. Even at this academy, renowned as the most prestigious in the kingdom, my brilliant little sister still easily displays her overwhelming prowess!

"Nii-san, I told you already—you're much stronger than someone like me!"

No, I'm just an ordinary commoner, you know...
(※That's a lie. Nii-san is insanely strong. He just doesn't realize it.)

Because of that, a female knight from the academy appeared and challenged me to a mock battle.
(※The strongest female knight in the academy instantly realized the difference in their strengths.)

Then, I gave her some post-battle care.
(※The female knight enjoyed Nii-san's massage so much that it became popular among the nobility.)

And just by doing what I normally do, I caught the eye of the QueenーEh? Why!?
tags: Comedy, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Banjou no Orion
description:
Losing one match after another, shogi prodigy Yuhi Ninomiya became a shadow of his former glorious self. It was then that he faced his old rival Kanata Kuji in an official match. However, the record-setting match ended with Kanata winning his 27th consecutive game, and Yuhi losing his 17th consecutive game. Feeling frustrated and depressed, Yuhi stops by a bar, when he has a fateful encounter with a certain girl! Her name is Tsuki Kayamori. Although she is overbearing, self-centered, and eccentric, her sharp and unorthodox playstyle is as if she was chosen by the shogi God!

(Source: K Manga)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Childhood Friends Competing For Height
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Superhero

name: Yarinaoshi Kizoku no Seinjinka Level Up
description:
One winter day, Selim succumbed to the Devil's Temptation and transformed into a Demon. Before being killed by the Hero, he slaughtered the people of the Royal Capital and the nobles, and pulled the trigger for the devils to invade the Kingdom. After Selim's death, the devils overthrew the Royal Capital and destroyed the Kingdom. Selim, who was trapped by the devil and watched the Kingdom fall, somehow found himself returning to his 14-year-old self. A message written on a transparent panel floats in front of him.

"You have become a seeker. By doing the right things and accumulating virtues, your level will increase."
tags: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Futari nara Doko e demo
description: Office worker Joji got married a month ago, and his wife is Karen from Russia. She is beautiful like an angel, and shines with her bright silver hair. However, Karen is a mangaka, so they can't do what a married couple would, due to her busy schedule. When Karen's work settles down, they can finally spend time together after a while. In order to do things a married couple would, Joji decided to take his wife on... a honeymoon!!! The couple who got to know each other through travelling decided to return to their roots and headed for Niijima Village...!! Let's go on a trip together♪
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Web Comic

name: Toki no Ori ~Shini Modori no Reisou Tsukai, [Copy] Nouryoku de Saikyou e to Itaru~
description:
"I'll kill the Demon Lord who's trying to wipe out humanity no matter what it takes..."

In a desperate battle against the Demon Lord, Link loses one of his dearest friends. Fueled by his comrade's dying wish, he unleashes a desperate final blow. But it's not enough. The Demon Lord’s army of magical beasts overwhelms humanity, and the world falls. Link should've died. And yet... he wakes up, back in time, as his ten-year-old self?! Now, with the memories and battle experience from his past life, Link vows to change the future. This time, he'll do whatever it takes to defeat the Demon Lord once and for all.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I Became a Doting Father
description:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Queen's Seed
description: Yuto follows Mikoto, a childhood friend and high school girl who is one year older, to enter the same high school. When she goes home with Mikoto for the first time in a year, it turns out that Mikoto only sees Yuto as her younger brother. Yuto is a little dizzy about the difficult road ahead, but an alien "onee-san" in a very erotic outfit appears in front of the two...!? "One Shota" space opera opens here!!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Horror, Shota, Aliens

name: CMYK - Sameda Kazuou wa Chuunibyou ga Naosenai
description: Sameda Kazuou who has finally escaped from his Chuunibyou syndrome, wants to erase the fact that he was like that at all, and decides to bury all of his school photos that are engraved with his past. However, there are three beautiful girls in the school who want those photos...
tags: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy

name: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi
description: A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"! Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Four years have passed since the Demon King's defeat. To honor the deceased Hero, the now-at-peace Kingdom launches a project to compile his many achievements. The Hero's former companions, the Sword Saint Leon, the Saintess Maria, and the Great Sage Solon, are interviewed. All of them are unclear about the truth behind the Hero's death. Why did the Hero die? Was it the Demon King who killed him, or his companions?

**Award:** Won Google Play's Best Fantasy Manga Of 2025.
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37)

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/daregayu)
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Nimotsu Mochi no Noukin Musou
description:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill "Porter," which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party "Black Lion of Foresight." One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk's skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kirei na Onee-san to Nomu Osake wa Suki desu ka?
description: By chance, ordinary salaryman Hiyoshi ends up becoming a drinking buddy to his admired senpai from work, Tsukizawa-san. However, all the drinkeries that Tsukizawa-san brings him to are weird places…!? An adult love comedy featuring drinking spots that exist in real life!
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Fuyuki Senpai to Natsui
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Winners Circle e Youkoso
description: Being a manga author has always been Yamakawa Nanao’s dream. He even postponed college for two years so that he could pursue it, but when his work that he put everything he has into it is rejected by every publisher, he loses hope. At a below average college and no real direction in life, Nanao meets a fortune teller that leads him to the horse tracks. There, he meets a group of college students, Beniko, Midori, Shun and Soukichi, who form their own winner's circle, a group of people who bet on horses not for entertainment but as a form of income. Nanao has no knowledge of horse betting but his ability to see the smallest of details in the horses shocks the members and he is allowed to join the club. If he plays it right, he could make an extremely comfortable living off of this new found talent.
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama

name: The Sales Rep Who Absolutely Won’t Come VS The Researcher Who Absolutely Wants to Make Her Come
description: A researcher for an adult toy company has created a new product for women, but needs to convince the sales rep of its quality...

name: Yukidoke no Hito
description: The Love Story of Yuki Onna
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~
description: In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self?? To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures... "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mao Zhi Ming
description: The young girl Moli who was about to enter high school, was struck by lightning while running late and was sent to Continent of Mingzu. What is this, so it’s a Q version of a world?! What about the promised beautiful youth! Oh well, at least everyone is half beast~ I’ll reluctantly join in for the time being! The status of a magician or some other heavy responsibilities like that, I don’t want it. I just want to foolishly spend my sweet time being. Selfish!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma, Fantasy

name: Nine Methods of Ascending the Clouds: First Ranked Immortal
description: If you want to learn how to be a god, you can ride a crane to the sky. Turning stones into gold? You can do so in mere seconds!
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Full Color

name: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~
description: One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!?
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Poro's Foreign Exchange Records
description:
The manga centers on Poro, a demon from the underworld who comes to the human world.  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Poro's Foreign Exchange Records were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.
tags: Action, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Mitakihara Youchien Mahou-gumi
description: A light-hearted spin-off of Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica where Madoka, Homura, Sayaka and Kyoko attend a kindergarten operated by Kyubey with Mami as the teacher.
tags: Comedy, Magical Girls, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Densetsu no Ore
description: Ozma, a former court magician, is executed for saving a girl, Felia. However, he is reincarnated in a world 300 years later. There, his previous life, in which he was supposed to have been executed, has left his mark on history with a series of feats of which he has no memory, and he has been praised as a god. Like a legendary hero!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Natsume's just an ordinary kid, except he can see spirits just like his grandma Reiko could. Reiko, though, used to bully the spirits, and bound them to her will in the "Book of Friends." Now that Natsume has inherited this book, a never-ending stream of spirits is coming after him. With the help of a spirit "cat" (who really just wants Natsume to die so he can have the book), Natsume spends his days dissolving the contracts that bind the spirits and trying not to get killed.
___
Extras:
* Manabiya no Sumi (In the Corner of the Schoolyard) in v.6.
* Natsu ni wa Tameiki (w)o Tsuku (Heave a Sigh in Summer) in v.7.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Sekai de Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-san, Nibanme wa Ore.
description: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him—!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero
description: For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does. The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone. It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters. He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: A long-distance relationship next door
description: The male and female leads, college students, are neighbors. Even though they live right next to each other, they don't encounter each other. But gradually, they acknowledge the other's existence, and fall for each other.
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Sasha-chan to Classmate Otaku-kun
description:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me "Master"!?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Raising an Eggplant Girl Using Online Polls
description: An eggplant raising(?) manga where online polls decide the outcome.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Itsumo Baka ni shitekuru Bishoujo-tachi to Zetsuen shitara, Jitsu wa Ore no Koto ga Daisuki Datta you da.
description:
"I want to break up with you." 

In the winter of his first year of high school. Yuta Miyamoto, who tries to be "kind to others," was told by his girlfriend, Yumi Asakawa, that she had to break up with him. While he is still recovering from his broken heart, Akane Kurosaki, a junior, calls him "unable to get a girlfriend," and Ruriri, his favorite maid, calls him "like a slave". Yuta, fed up with the situation, declares his intention to break off relations with all three, but the reaction is not what he expected!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Meido Daigaku Genzou Seminar
description:
Human beings have formed societies and created various civilizations on Earth.

At the same time, there have always been strange, unknowable entities that have slipped through the cracks, avoided the light of civilization, and festered in the shadows—gathering stagnation and decay.

Though born from human emotions and will, these entities were never understood, never named, and even now continue to lurk and squirm in the darkness of modern society.

They are information-based lifeforms.

Humanity calls them “phantoms.”

The most terrifying urban legend seminar—now in session!
tags: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Doraina Tenchou ka to Mottara
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon - Elma OL Nikki
description: Some people live to work, others work to live. But Elma works to... eat! Elma is a Harmony Dragon who came to the human world to bring fellow dragon Tohru back home. In order to stay close to Tohru, Elma has taken a job as an office lady (OL). This charming new series from the world of Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid follows the 9-to-5 adventures of Elma as she learns to work and eat her way through the OL life. From mixed-up mixers to death marches, Elma learns that being an OL is just as hard as being a dragon...
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Yuureitou
description:
In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Kurozakuro
description: Sakurai Mikito is a wimp who is constantly bullied and never fights back, as he doesn't want to hurt others.This all changes when a mysterious sphere enters him - Zakuro. He soon begins to feel different feeling desires to eat… humans. Is he still human, or will he succumb to his desires and fully become a monster?
tags: Action, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Cerberus
description: Kei often gets involved in fights, despite of him being weak and always end up losing. One day, while helping a friend to bring some textbooks to an old building of his school, he and his childhood friend, Tomoe, are attacked by a monster. In order to save his friend, Kei will choose to become a Grave Protector!
tags: Action, Comedy, Harem, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Homebodies
description:
"Home is where the heart is."

Today, once again, the day sprawls out before us. Happy days, and not-so-happy days - no matter what, here at home you're always wrapped in the warmth of your favorite place. It's the little things: the small joys, scattered all about, that make everyday life worth living.

A full-color collection of vignettes about daily life at home, presented by popular illustrator Ida Chiaki..
tags: Anthology, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: I Eat Soft Rice in Another World
description: Zhang Hao fainted upon witnessing the once-in-a-century blood moon. When he came to, he realised that the entire world had changed...... Gender roles and concepts had completely switched, from marrying off females to marrying off males, with the female side even having to pay bride dowry. Women working to put food on the table and men being househusbands had become commonplace, and the women without a car or a house are now not only looked down upon, but also hard-pressed to find themselves a man. A woman pursuing a man is not worth batting an eyelid, but the reverse can raise eyebrows...... "Even in this world where chicks all chase after me, I insist on being a real man!"
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Roland is an assassin who, one day, breaks from his team and single-handedly "kills" the demon king. After returning to the kingdom, the king graciously promises Roland whatever he wants for his heroics. Conflicted in his desires - he hasn't thought of anything outside of killing for years - he remembers that one of his teammates told him what she plans to do after evil is defeated: Live an ordinary life. And so Roland, with his ability to become unnoticeable and the disguised demon king/queen Laila at his side, decides to live a - say it with me - slow life.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yuusha Party ni Kawaii Ko ga Ita no de, Kokuhaku Shite Mita
description: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight...
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Back to Spring
description: Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Youngest Is Preventing the End of the World
description:
"The stupid youngest one, the one who doesn't know how to do anything, but causes trouble with her cute face."

Exasperated, I looked in the mirror once again and exclaimed, "Why am I the 'stupid youngest one' Diana Cartier!"

In the novel *The Ending Can't Be the Destruction of the World*, Diana is an evil woman who repeatedly commits evil deeds and is brainwashed by the villain, contributing greatly to the destruction of the world! If something could go wrong for the villainess, it will. But when something went wrong for me, I recalled my past life instead? As an ordinary college student in my past life, I made up my mind when I realized that I had been reincarnated as Diana Cartier, the villainess in the novel.

"The world is going to end. But I'm not going to let it happen."

Yes, I will prevent the end of the world with my own hands! And save my brothers from the conspiracy at the same time! Wait a minute. What's that pitch black thing sprawled out on the floor over there? Wait. That face, where have I seen it before? 

'Is that Linus del Stein?!'

Why are you lying there, Mr. Protagonist of the novel who will destroy this world?

Diana and her brothers are trying their best to stop the end of the world! And cute animals and other stuff? Our sweet youngest is preventing the end of the world, get out of the way!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: How to Survive as the Daughter of the Emperor Who Killed Me
description:
Betrayed and slain by the man she once loved, she begs a dragon to grant her the strength to protect her daughter. Her wish is answered but not in the way she expected. 

Returned by fate in a strange and twisted form, she must now fight to change her tragic destiny and guard what truly matters.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
A prequel spinoff depicting Roxy's early life!
  
Having discovered that she has been born without her race's racial ability, Roxy went through a childhood of isolation, but her chance meeting with a magician broadened her horizons. What awaited the young girl that, looking for freedom, left her hometown was…!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shirotaka](https://mangadex.org/author/38c0c039-c347-42fa-a196-3d0315451b4c)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/31808)
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Man! Sea of ​​Japan
description: Kai Nihonkai, a high school student living in a rural town, tries to run away from the town with Yuki, a woman who is about to be forced into a political marriage, but the chase ends in failure. Nihonkai, who has become uncomfortable in his hometown due to the eloping scandal, cuts off the relationship with his father, who is the chief priest of the temple, and leaves his hometown alone to meet various women.
tags: Comedy

name: Chie-sensei wa Mienai
description: Chie-sensei works at a certain kindergarten. She enjoys taking care of her class, but one thing is bothering her: her kindergarteners see something that she herself cannot...
tags: Oneshot, Ghosts, Crime, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Nick & Lever
description:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
tags: Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Gazing at the Azure
description:
Long, long ago, there were two orphan brothers, Ogna and Syra. To make a living, they spend their days tending to the fields and raising silkworms. One day, the younger brother, Syra, starts to be concerned about beauty and what it means to be beautiful, much to his older brother's chagrin. A rift begins to form between the two brothers when Syra encounters someone in a lake, someone who loves him for his beauty...

Serialized in *June*, this one-shot has never been reprinted or collected in any tankobon.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, Supernatural

name: Glamorous Fellows!
description:
A short story anthology featuring a great many "glamorous" bodies.

---

027 [上瀬達也 ] グラマラスで いこう！

- One of two special bonus books that you could receive if you sent in a ticket included with Harta 50-52.
tags: Historical, Monsters, Romance, Anthology, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Shinozaki-kun no Mente Jijou
description:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Otokodakedo Shinigami Hime no Yome ni Narimashita (Kari)
description: "From now on, you are wedded to me." When I was reincarnated into a strange world, I was captured by villagers and dressed as a woman to be the sacrificial bride to the God of Death. When I was brought to the Death God's castle, what I found was a beautiful girl with no housekeeping skills. A story about isekai newlywed life with a fearsome goddess x girl!
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Spy Crocodile Bird
description:
A secret organization, Crocodile, a private intelligence agency under the National Intelligence Service (NIS). 

Crocodile Bird, a freelance spy working there, codenamed Crocodile Bird, fights against the NIS, which seeks to kill his father and swallow up the organization!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Saunoa!
description: The story centers on Kokage, a high school girl who doesn't really like bathing, at least not in traditional Japanese baths. She meets a Finnish exchange student, Lyydia, and reluctantly ends up going to the sauna with her. The group also is joined by Serika, a self-proclaimed sauna-otaku, and Maki, whose parents run a super-sento (bathhouse).
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Make-upper
description: (from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei, a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone, arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mamono no Mori no Shojo Nova
description: Nova, a spirited young girl who was raised by monsters in the forest, has one big wish—she wants to use the earth's blessing known as "Magia." However, it seems there is a secret about Nova that only Cerberus, the leader of the forest, knows... Unaware of this hidden truth, Nova continues to run happily and innocently through the forest today.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life

name: Bouncer -Tokyo Fist-
description:
Jouichirou Shishido, a 19-year-old man whose frank honesty has cost him 26 part-time jobs. One night, he runs into a group of muscular bodyguards who protect the streets at night, members of a private security firm known as “Tokyo Fist”, which ends up changing his life.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/bouncer-tokyo-fist)
tags: Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Delinquents

name: Yuru Camp△
description:
Rin, a girl camping by herself at the base of Mt. Fuji. Nadeshiko, a girl who came to see Mt. Fuji on her bicycle. The scenery the two witness over a supper of cup ramen marks the start of a new friendship and many adventures to come, camping in the great outdoors!  

  ---

  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/yurucamp_anime)  
- [Official Drama Twitter](https://twitter.com/yurucamp_drama)  
- [Official Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yurucamp_insta/)  
- [Official Drama Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yurucamp_drama/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](https://yurucamp.jp/)  
- [Official Drama (JP)](https://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/yurucamp/)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Event Diary
description: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Event Diary (バンドリ！ガールズバンドパーティ！ イベントダイアリー) is a comicalization of the event stories from the game Girls Band Party! by Kurobuchi Kashiko.
tags: Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Munou Nintei de Bouken Mono Kubi ni Natta kara Jimoto ni Kaette Kekkon Suru ~Kekkon Aite ga Sekai wa Horoboshi Kaketa Ryuo no Musume de Ore no Nouryoku ga Kakusei Shita~
description: Judged for having no chance of getting a skill, Alex gave up on his dreams of becoming an adventurer and put his days in a guild behind him. Upon returning to his hometown, he was approached by his childhood friend, Heroine Nadja, who proposed her hand in marriage. The two then decided to spend the rest of their lives in peace. But then, a flock of monsters attacks their town...
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Kanojo wo CharaMake!
description: Body modification of a cosplaying childhood friend with efficient meals! Full breasts and a toned waist! Create the "ideal heroine" through nutritional balance and calorie management!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Cooking

name: Saint Seiya: Saint Mariya
description: Mariya enters Graad Academy and looks forward to her school life. However, something strange occurs in the auditorium due to a mysterious evil action...
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Makoto-senpai no Mae de wa Kakko Tsukerarenai!
description:
Handsome girl x handsome girl!? A short love comedy set in an all-girls school!

Jun, a handsome girl character, is popular at the all-girls school.
To stay true to her character, she tries to live her life in a stylish and gentlemanly way, but whenever she's in trouble, the "true handsome girl", Makoto-senpai always appears...?
A short love comedy between two handsome girls!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Doro no Bunzai de Watashi dake no Taisetsu wo Ubaouda Nante
description: Protect the girl who is destined to die an untimely death. That is the mission given to me and my senpai from the heavenly realm. How is it a job... to come down to earth and protect stupid human beings? Moreover, protecting an ordinary girl...? Why do we, beautiful angels, have to do such a thing! Senpai must have been thinking that way all along. I believed that, but why that kind of--?
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Mochizuki Mikoto, 21 years old, sales office worker! Her happiness as a gentle and soft-spoken girl is... binge eating!?!? She eats hearty, thick, mountainous portions of food without stopping. It's a devilish pleasure that can only be obtained by skyrocketing her blood sugar levels.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Kumamiko
description: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Maji de Tsukiau 15-fun Mae
description: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. They’ve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes they’re a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea— what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless…?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Morning Glow is Golden: The IDOLM@STER
description: The spinoff manga centers on the character Kotori Otonashi, an office clerk at 765 Production, during her high school days.
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shikatanaki Koui
description: A work drawn to be submitted to COM's reader submissions corner, Gra-Com, in 1967, but which was later never published.
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Music

name: Yakutatazu no Takaramono
description: Collection of short stories.
tags: Anthology, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Abnormal-kei Joshi
description: High schooler Shiina Shinya thinks that all girls are pretty much good-for-nothing, mostly because he doesn't understand them at all. That doesn't stop him from being surrounded by strange girls! Tsubasa Tooka, a cute, much-admired girl, stalks him. Shikimura Masami is majorly into masochism, and has recruited Shinya into her play sessions. Ikari Satsuki seems suspiciously interested in the recent serial stabbings, and seems to want to drag Shinya into it. Banjou Yoruko, a normally quiet, bookish girl, has decided she and Shinya are bound up in some fantasy setting. Uchida Yumeji is the school's sleeping beauty, who spends all of her time in the infirmary because she requires so much sleep. Shinya brings her newspapers, so she can keep up with current events in the short time she spends awake. Lastly, Okui Akane is convinced she is a vampire. For all Shinya knows, it could be true, but in practice it just means that he has to let her drink his blood. How will Shinya deal with all these good-for-nothing girls that complicate his life?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: The King of Fighters 2000
description: Based on the 2D fighting game series King of Fighters. King of Fighters is a battle between the strongest teams in the world, the teams are composed of 4 since the King of Fighters'99 tournament, also the hero since KoF'99 has changed to K'. The story follows K' starting from 9 months after KoF'99 and his entry into the King of Fighters 2000 tournament.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Adaptation

name: One-Punch Man (Webcomic)
description: Follows the life of an average part-time hero who manages to win every battle with a single punch. This ability frustrates him as he no longer feels the thrill of fighting a tough opponent, which leads him to question his past desire of becoming strong.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Ano Kiss wo Tadotte
description: At the place where 20-year-old Kota works, a college student starts working as a part-timer for the summer. His name is Chizuru, a boy Kota never wanted to see again. They were classmates in junior high, and were forced to kiss each other in a punishment game. Chizuru must hate him, but for some reason, he tries to kiss Kouta whenever he gets a chance! What's more he says that he came to work here just so he could see Kota again!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: The God Before Me
description: Lately, Odachi has been struggling with a lack of confidence in his play. Since his debut match, where he faced off against the “God” of shogi, something has changed within him. Will the day come when he can surpass the God of his generation? A tale of a self-proclaimed average shogi player, his friends, peers, and rivals, and the God before him.
tags: Traditional Games, Sports, Drama

name: Hametsu Flag Kaihi no Tame Yamaoku e Hikikomotteita Saikyou no Akuyaku wa, Tasuketa Heroine ni Yotte Omotebutai e Tatasareru
description: Alba is happy living a quiet life deep in the mountains... until the day he accidentally saves a beautiful girl — an act that shatters his plans completely. As fate would have it, this girl is one of the key characters responsible for his death in the game's original story! Now dragged into the elite academy where the game unfolds, Alba must dodge danger at every turn if he wants to stay alive.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Eroi Koto Suru Tame ni Kyonyuu Bishoujo Dorei wo Katta Hazu ga, Oshishou-sama to Shitawa Rete Omotta Toori ni Ikanaku Naru Hanashi
description: Halo is a talented female elf magician who has memories of when she was a man in her previous life, which is why she wishes to make out with a cute girl. Halo decides to buy Filia, a beautiful female slave with big breasts, but things don't go as she expects them to...
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media 
  
The following link is to AnimeNewsNetwork for all of the various manga, anime adaptions, sequels, and spinoffs:  
[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Fantasy

name: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu
description:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop. Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento...
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Eight
description:
Millennia have passed since the dawn of humanity. The relentless march of science and technology, the mastery of biotechnology... all of this should have been our salvation, freeing us from the chains of conflict and suffering, leading us towards an era of endless prosperity.

Eternal Calendar, year 2030. Earth, once the cradle of humanity, is now beyond human control. Only 258 survivors remain, and a single Gundam.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, Aliens

name: Kieteshimau Koto
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Drama

name: Not found
description:
There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game. Suddenly, a notification message "Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose "Yes" without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. —Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play...
___
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kemono Michi
description: Zoos are made of small and big dreams… but it takes more than a dream to feed the animals! And that, Haruko will realize quickly, as she takes her first steps as a caretaker at the Hidamari Zoo. Despite an overwhelming enthusiasm, her inattentiveness has earned her the dislike of the director of the park, who puts her to the test by entrusting her the care of withdrawn and uncooperative animals… It is now up to the curious talent of the young girl to decipher the secret emotions of the animals through their scent!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Spy Life in the Demonic Sect
description: Iseo Jang, the Murim Alliance’s prodigy spy, has spent 14 years deep undercover in the Demon Sect, earning the ruthless title of “Rabid Dog” for his work as their counterintelligence agent. But his newest mission is his most absurd yet: make the Sect’s laziest, most notorious delinquent -- Wu Ma -- the next Cheonma. To pull it off, Iseo ditches his post and applies to be Wu Ma’s official aide. In a world of betrayal, martial arts, and political games, can even a talent like Iseo turn a hopeless young master into an heir?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Watashi no Gochisou wa, Kimi.
description: A cute and dangerous love story of a popular boy with glasses in class and a girl who has a desire to eat him starts.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shokubutsu Monster Musume Nikki ~Seijo datta Watashi ga Uragirareta Hate ni Aruraune ni Tensei Shite Shimatta node, kore kara wa Kougousei wo Shinagara Shizuka ni Shokubutsu Life wo Sugoshimasu~
description:
Who knew that even a stationary plant could be surprisingly capable?!

Our protagonist is a saint—or was, until she was betrayed by one of her fellow saint apprentices as well as her fiancé, a hero. 
In her final moments, she recalls her previous life, when she was just a normal Japanese high school girl, but that doesn't help the fact that she's being eaten alive by a massive plant monster.

And yet, by a stroke of luck, she doesn't die for good, but instead reincarnates as said plant monster. With the upper half of a human and the lower half of a plant, she must now spend her life as an Alraune.

And so, she tries to live the peaceful life of a plant, photosynthesizing all day!
Welcome to the diary of a plant girl who just wants some peace and quiet, but something always gets in her way!

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4444ge/) (jp)

---
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Inaka de Koi wa Muzukashii!?
description: “I ended up with a cute fiancée in a traditional village—” Yuto Azue, a boy born and raised in the city, moves to his grandmother’s hometown at his mother’s request. However, this village has a shocking custom — everyone is forced to have a fiancée! Waiting for him at his new home is his betrothed, Nene Nemuen, who wastes no time trying to seduce him in all sorts of ways. To make things even more complicated, he also catches the eye of Sakurako One, the granddaughter of the village chief who wants to break the old traditions! Will Yuto choose a sweet and steamy life with his fiancée, or will he pursue freedom and love with the bold older girl? An immorally charming slow-life romantic comedy set in a village bound by outdated customs!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Mystery

name: The Dragon Tamer
description: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
One day, a girl is reborn in a fantasy world as the blind daughter of a duke. In her previous life, she was sickly and spent all her time in the hospital, so she decides to enjoy her new life as she pleases, even though she is blind!

She was enjoying her reincarnated life to the fullest, playing with Kyle, the fifth prince, whom she befriended by chance, and training in magic. However, as Alicia grows up, inexplicable events begin to occur. This world is apparently not just a fantasy world—..?

---
I was born weak and passed away at the age of 18 due to illness. Before I died, I made a wish to be born again.

It came true, but I was born blind. Little by little, I came to know the gaps between the previous world and present one thanks to my fiancé. This is the story of the Duke’s only daughter.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Epic of Gilgamesh
description: Tludia was on her way to become a Knight within the Order when she was unexpectedly kicked out for breaking too many weapons and – wait for it – eating too much. But that doesn’t mean she should stand idly by when she witnesses an old man about to be attacked by a band of robbers. Luckily for her – because she was a second too late – the old man did not need saving. It’s Tludia that needs saving. Much older than his appearance suggests, Tludia rekindles a long lost memory in him, and he decides to repay her for her efforts by finding a cure for her disease (with promises of food, of course). Thus begins their journey to bring life to one, and long-awaited peace to the other.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: AKB49: Ren'ai Kinshi Jourei
description:
This manga based on the ever popular AKB48 group.  
  
This series is about a guy called Urayama Minoru crossdressing as a girl to participate in a female idol group audition (AKB48). The main objective is to help the girl he likes, Yoshinaga Hiroko, pass the audition. Yoshinaga Hiroko's dream is to become like her favourite idol who is in the AKB48 group. This audition happens to be her final try, so Minoru crossdresses as Urakawa Minori and takes part in the audition to make sure she realizes her dream. Hiroko got qualified eventually, however, the shocking news was Minoru was qualified as well. Thus, the road to becoming a female idol begins…
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw: [Kodansha](https://www.kodansha.co.jp/titles/1000005357)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Music

name: Tenjou Tenge
description: In one unusual Tokyo high school, education takes a backseat to brawling as warring clubs wreak havoc in the hallways and chaos in the classrooms, all vying to be the baddest team around! Although they often contribute their fair share, only a handful of students serve to stem the tide of violence in this untamed outpost. These are the few, the proud, the powerful: the members of the Juken Club!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: 2024 Rookie Short Story Collection
description: A selection of Hell Camp short stories produced directly by legendary writers Lee Hyun-se and Lee Du-ho! Introducing the strongest rookies of 2024!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kouchuugun Shikan Boukensha ni Naru
description:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Ame no Hi ni Aeruyo
description: A mysterious day for a god and a kid whose family owns a bathhouse.
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Full Voice!
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama

name: Eating Me Is Not Allowed!
description: Nam Haesul, who is handsome but famous for his dog-like personality, is only nice to his childhood friend, Yang Miru. "It's clear that he's nice to me because he likes me!" But is it really like that? Miru has no idea about Haesul’s true feelings. Then one day, she finds out about the 'black heart' that Haesul harbors! Cracks are starting to appear in their 10-year friendship...! The wild growth story of a wolf boy and an innocent girl!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shards of a Broken Glass Slipper
description:
Everyone adored my stepsister, Loena. And I, her elder sister Siché, hated her.

“Loena. I really hate you.”

After losing everything, Siché left behind those final words and ended her life before Loena’s eyes.

That should have been the end...

“My name is Loena. Are we going to be family now?”

Life began to repeat itself. Cruelly, hopelessly so.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kemuri no Mukou ni Koe ga Kikoeru
description: In the hot spring town of Yugawara, not far from Tokyo, Mitsuru Kadono runs a handyman business. An avid smoker, he harbors a unique secret: through the smoke of his cigarettes, he can hear the inner voices of others. Whether it's weeding gardens, giving tours, or offering life advice, Kadono listens to these unspoken thoughts as he supports the townspeople in their daily lives. And so, with a calm demeanor and wisps of smoke curling around him, he continues his quiet, reflective work.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: A Bird
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, Tragedy

name: Just a Man
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Drama

name: Girls' Frontline
description:
Based on the popular mobile strategy game from MICA Team.  
  
In the year 2030, "The Belian Island Incident" happened where a highly radioactive alien substance was accidentally exposed to the atmosphere, causing half the world's population to be killed or mutated into zombie-like creatures called ELID (Euroky Low-Emission Infectious Disease) and the land becoming contaminated and uninhabitable. 

In response to the world suffering a shortage of Manpower, highly advanced androids with superior strength and advanced AI capable of expressing emotions called A-Dolls (Autonomous Dolls) were created.  

When World War 3 broke out in 2045 to 2051 over uncontaminated land and resources, Private Military Companies used A-Dolls with the ability to fight called T-Dolls (Tactical Dolls) in the war, which made them rich, becoming the de facto police and military of many nations after the war ended. 

However, in 2061, T-Dolls of the world's largest PMC, Sangvis Ferri, suddenly rebelled, killed their human masters and attack nearby human settlements. In response, Grifon & Kryuger PMC and their T-Dolls were hired to stop and contain the Sangvis Ferri Forces.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation

name: Catulus Syndrome
description:
Catulus Syndrome - A strange illness which causes girls to develop catlike traits. Modern science has figured out two things about this illness:  
  
1. They're really cute!  
2. There's a high chance of other girls making their hearts flutter.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kanojo no Tomodachi (Fan Colored)
description:
He's got a cute girlfriend. But his girlfriends friend is so much sexier... And she's tempting him to cheat. 
What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?
tags: Romance, Fan Colored, Drama, School Life

name: Akuyaku no Oujo ni Tensei Shitakedo, Kakushi Chara ga Kakuretenai
description:
Abused in the back palace, Lusienne remembers her previous life with the shock of a blow to the head... You're lying, right? Lusienne la Verrier is the name of the villainous princess in that otome game I liked. But wait, how old am I now? Isn't Lusienne's life too hard from the very beginning?
___
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0551gv/)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Tyranny
description: I am from Egypt. I love drawing manga as a hobby. I am not good enough, but I am trying. Your comments and testimony motivate me to continue.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Superhero, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Netto Aidoru No Haishin Wo Tetsudatte Ita Maneejaa No Ore, Nazeka Buzzutte Shimau
description: The manager of the MeiQuber agency, Kayano, is fired after refusing to engage in sex-for-promotion deals. The only one who believes in Kayano is Miona, the idol he manages, and the two decide to continue their streaming activities together. However, unexpectedly, Kayano becomes an internet sensation too!?
tags: Action, Fantasy

name: Inukami!
description: An Inukami, a sacred being with a dog-like appearance, forges a contract with a powerful human tamer to help them eliminate evil monsters and demons. Though Kawahira Keita is the descendent of a long line of Inukami-tamers, he seems to lack the necessary ability and has been forsaken by his family. One day, he meets a cute Inukami named Yoko, who, at first glance, looks graceful, obedient, and beautiful…but upon forging a contract with her, Keita discovers that Yoko is a wild and mischievous Inukami that no one has ever been able to control.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Asu wa Oyome ni
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Drama

name: Kage
description: Select one-shots from the early Gekiga magazine "Kage". The ebookjapan release serves as a sort of "Kage: Best Selection" from the many famous faces who appeared in it. For further information on Kage, please read Yoshihiro Tatsumi's "A Drifting Life".
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Anthology, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Hidamari Sketch
description: Accepted to a high school specializing in the arts, Yuno moves into a nearby apartment complex to make her commute easier. Just a few days into her new routine, she quickly discovers that creativity doesn't end with the art school bell! Her neighbors – Sae, Hiro, and Miya – are all fellow students, and each has her own hilarious quirks. And eccentricity clearly rules this school; Yuno's homeroom teach is a cosplay otaku and the principal is just weird. Will the quiet Yuno be able to handle this creatively kooky cast of characters?
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kanan-sama wa Akumade Choroi
description: Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet
description:
Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…

---
At Dahlia Academy, a prestigious boarding school attended by students of two feuding countries - the eastern Nation of Touwa, and the Principality of West. Romio Inuzuka, leader of the dorms' Touwa first-years, wishes for a romance that can never be. For his ladylove is none other than his arch-enemy, Juliet Persia, leader of the dorms' West first-years! Is Inuzuka ready to risk it all to confess his feelings? And even if Persia somehow agrees to go out with them, how long can they keep a forbidden relationship under wraps?
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Beyond the Mirror
description:
A new one-shot by the talented Tomio Ogata!  
  
This is a story about a young girl working in a manor, and a demon who lives within a mirror.
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Demons, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Fork in the Road
description: A "wolf" follows a young girl in plain sight everywhere she goes, watching her every move…
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural

name: Meirei Kuchou na Onna Senpai to Boku no Hanashi
description:
Late at night, I happened to encounter a female senpai in my friend group (she barely shows up). One thing led to another, and we ended up drinking together, but...

A story depicting a glimpse into college romance.

----

These were a short series of web comics which were compiled by the original author into a single compilation release.
tags: Romance, Self-Published, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: My Forever One-Sided Love
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Music, Tragedy

name: Inu to Kuzu
description: Haruma Sakuraba's childhood friend Shuuji Inukai was a cut above him in every way imaginable, living out the glamorous life bestowed upon him. Haruma, an unassuming salary man, has lived his every day clutching onto his inferiority complex, existing only in Shuuji's shadow. One day, Haruma coincidentally met Shuuji's wife, Reika Sumi, who Haruma had always secretly admired since his high school days. With feelings of envy, jealousy, and more, a "secret" is born from Haruma's repetitive days.
tags: Romance, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Before he knew it, Masato had been transported to a world where there were just a few more women than in his original world. However, aside from the fact that women were a little more assertive, the world wasn't much different from the one he came from... or so he thought. Little did he know, the kindness he spread, based on the standards of his old world, was saving those around him more than he could imagine. He was unaware that this kindness was causing the women around him to develop intense feelings for him.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: VTuber no Ending, Kaitorimasu.
description:
High school student Gou Karube is a big fan of Noa Mukanae, a member of the VTuber idol group "Hoshigaoka High School". Gou dedicates both time and money to support Noa, and his hard work has become famous amongst her other fans, the "NoaTomo". 

Noa, whom he's devoted all of his youth to supporting, one day decided to hold a solo live show, which had been her dream. Her fans were supposed to witness the moment when her dream came true... is how it should have been.
tags: Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Music

name: Kotodama Kanaete! Tokie-sensei
description: In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students.
tags: Comedy, Magic, School Life, Adaptation

name: Favela no Mangaka
description: Mangaka Takei Hiroto was rejected once again at a serialization meeting, so he decides to give up on his dream and go on a heartbroken trip to Brazil to get over everything. In a favela (slum) he accidentally wanders into, Hiroto meets a poor boy with sharp eyes named João. Living on the exact opposite side of the Earth, João surprisingly has the dream of becoming a mangaka...!!
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Drama, Tragedy

name: Kabeyaku Nado Fuyou to Tsuihousareta S-kyuu Boukensha, <Dorei Kaihou> Skill wo Kushi shite Shijou Saikyou no Kunizukuri
description:
Alex, a holy knight, is suddenly expelled from his adventurers' party.

He tries to live a comfortable life by accepting a quest to cultivate a remote area, but suddenly he is given the extra skill "Slave Release"...?

Summon beautiful girl slaves and cultivate a demon territory overrun with demons! A slow life of harem in a fantasy world is about to begin!
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kanzen Kaihi Healer no Kiseki
description: A college student, Sakurai Hiroki was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord. And since he got "Priest" as a job, his starting Recovery Stat was more than enough to heal any wounds, so he dumped all of his Stat Points into Evasion. In other words, he's aiming for an Evasion Healer who will never get hit by enemy attacks. But unfortunately, people in that world couldn't understand his ideal! The King got angry against him and labelled him as useless almost immediately!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kokumin-teki Idol ni natta Osana-Najimi ga Boro-Apart ni Sunderu Ore no Tonari ni Hikkoshitekita Ken
description: My childhood friend who became separated three years ago is dancing on TV as a top idol. And it was the childhood friend who moved to the next to my room to see it!?
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I Was Supposed to Go See a Movie with My Male Friend, but…
description: Decided to go to a movie with my friend. Little did I know, he had a different idea in mind…
tags: Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color

name: TS Fox Girl Glaring at Me
description:
Author’s DESCRIPTION: 

...I think TS girls who are unknowingly jealous are the best...
He probably doesn't mean to stare at you.
I just couldn't help but follow her with my eyes...
When she sees her best friend (male) happily chatting with another female
And when he sees his best friend (male) talking happily with another female, he can't help but show his jealousy on his face...
You used to be a male, but now the female in you is coming out little by little.
I bet he subconsciously thinks the male belongs to him...
He's a possessive lover...
tags: Genderswap, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Why Did They Do This to Me?
description: Not found
tags: Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color

name: IseGure - Isekai Cheat Musou - Ore TUEEE-kei Ikiri Tenseisha ni Kamaseinu ni sare Tsuzuketa Elite Kishi, Chou Gureru.
description:
"I'm not just a foil!"

In order to stop more people from reincarnating into his world, the former elite knight leader sets out on a mission!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Delinquents

name: Shingetsutan Tsukihime
description:
The story follows Tohno Shiki, a teenage boy who, after a near-fatal accident in his childhood, gained the mysterious power to perceive lines covering everything around him. When he cuts along these lines, whatever it was immediately falls apart with a clean cut; in other words, killing it. He would have quickly gone insane from living in a world that could fall apart so easily, had it not been for a wandering self-proclaimed magician who gave him a pair of glasses that blocked his unnatural perception when worn.  
  
Soon afterwards, he was disinherited from his family and sent to live with some relatives. For eight years he lived a normal life, hiding his special eyes, until one day he receives a letter inviting him to come back home. Shiki suddenly becomes caught up in a strange and life-threatening series of events, ones that are somehow linked to his childhood accident and a forgotten past…  
  
Adaptation of the visual novel Tsukihime by Type-Moon.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Romance, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Dansou no Hametsu Seijonanoni Kyuukoku Kishi ga Amayakashite kuru
description:
Akurei—better known as Akira—was born as the only being possessing the holy power of the Saintess.
Fearing that, just like in past wars, a Saintess might once again become the spark of conflict, Akira’s parents raised her to live as a boy.

Now at eighteen, Akira sets off to study abroad in a neighboring country.
She wishes only for a calm, peaceful, and uneventful school life… but before long, she somehow catches the attention of three captains of the Holy Knight Order—

“We want you to join our knight order.”
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Subete no Jinrui wo Hakai Suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.
description: In everything he does, it seems like geeky Tokiwagi Middle School student Hajime Kano comes in second place behind popular honor student Emi Sawatari. But when Hajime takes a trip to a new game store he’s been hearing about, their rivalry takes an unexpected turn. Welcome to the early years of *Magic: The Gathering*, when a trading card game shaped a generation forever!
tags: Traditional Games, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Doko Dere?
description: A lonely young boy finds his solitude disrupted in a way he hadn't hoped. But perhaps he can make the best of it...
tags: Romance, Self-Published, Harem, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Twenty-six-year-old Shibakusa Tohru is about to make his major label debut when his bandmates fire him. In the midst of his despair, he learns that his former classmate Shigure Narahara, now a top singer, has committed suicide. Tohru, who had been a devoted fan of Shigure, loses his emotional anchor and jumps off a balcony to follow her, but instead of dying, he finds he has taken a time leap back to his high school days.
tags: Time Travel, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Music, Tragedy

name: Dimension Wave
description:
Dimension Wave—a super popular VRMMO game where players can experience several years of fantasy in just twenty-four hours of real time. Enticed by the entry ticket his sisters won, a young man takes part in the project’s Second Wave. However, as soon as he enters the world of the game, he finds that his sisters have played a trick: he’s been transformed into a girl with the cringy name Kizuna†Exceed. But instead of letting it get to him, he decides to chill and take this new life as it comes. Without sparing a fraction of a second deciding, Kizuna immediately chooses to fish rather than fight on the front lines in this fantasy world. Alongside his sisters, Kanade and Tsumugi, a Japanese-style beauty named Shouko, Yamikage the fake ninja, and other quirky comrades, he works to enjoy his second life to the fullest.

NOTE: Many characters that appear in “Dimension Wave” also appear in “The Rising of the Shield Hero.” However, despite the many similarities, the characters in both series are not related to each other. “Dimension Wave” is not a spin-off of “The Rising of the Shield Hero”, but a separate story in a different universe that shares many similarities.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dimension-wave)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy

name: Alcatraz of Desire
description: A shipwreck that occurred under dubious circumstances leaves survivors stranded on a remote, desolate island. On this island, desires begin to take root. The lucky survivors, each with their own hidden agendas, the fierce, voracious beasts, and the cannibal tribe lurking in the shadows are all enemies in the name of survival. On this forsaken, desolate island, who will be able to overcome all odds, emerge triumphant and return home?
tags: Action, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience a craft fantasy that depicts the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Aria
description: On the planet Aqua, a world once known as Mars, Mizunashi Akari has just made her home in the town of Neo-VENEZIA, a futuristic imitation of the ancient city of Venice. The technology of "Man Home" (formerly Earth) has not entirely reached this planet, and Akari is alone, having no contact with family or friends. Nonetheless, the town, with its charming labyrinths of rivers and canals, becomes Akari's new infatuation, along with the dream of becoming a full-fledged gondolier. Reverting to a more "primitive" lifestyle and pursuing a new trade, the character of Akari becomes both adventurous and heartwarming all at once.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Polaris Will Never Be Gone.
description:
Tajima Sora was an idol at the peak of popularity when she died and now the people who had gone crazy over her are slowly returning to days where they have forgotten everything about her.
Mizu'umi is a high school girl who cannot accept this fact because the late idol is a god-like existence to her. So one day, 2 years after her idol's death, she committed a taboo act.

This is a young adult fiction about an everlasting and undying idol and is dedicated to the current times where feelings of "like" are concentrated.
tags: Drama, Music

name: ANTI-MONSTER
description: J.A.C.K.O, The merc squad has gotten a brand new mission: Traversing Deadland, in order to find... life.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Self-Published, Gore, Mystery

name: Shiniki no Mahoutsukai ~Shin ni Aisareta Rakudaisei wa Mahou Gakuin e Kayou~
description: He was a sorcerer from the divine realm, a master of magic who introduced revolutionary new theories. On the verge of death, he cast a reincarnation spell and was reborn 500 years later. Now living as Lucien, the son of a farmer, he discovers a world where the common sense of his past life no longer applies—a world where magical technology has drastically declined――?!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A female college student, Himesaki Toko, suddenly finds herself living next door to a new neighbor — Hon, an exchange student who also happens to be a dragon person.

Despite her divine appearance, Hon is clumsy and absent-minded, and Toko just can’t bring herself to ignore her.

Thus begins a laid-back fantasy comedy about cross-cultural exchange, set in a student dorm!
tags: Monsters, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Luma
description:
A demigod's purpose is to serve gods and mortals from birth to death, reincarnating to repeat the cycle.
Carrying out her duties, a young demigod is sent out on a routine mission to exorcise a spirit but finds more than she bargained for.
Secrets are unearthed, conspiracies are formed, and the demigods find themselves as pawns in a divine game played by gods.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Living Together In Summer
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Cleric of Decay
description:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Arte
description:
Firenze, early 16th century. The birthplace of the Renaissance era, where art is thriving. 
In one small corner of this vast city, one sheltered girl's journey begins. 
She dreams of becoming an artist, an impossible career for a girl born into a noble family. 
In those days, art was an exclusively male profession, with woman facing strong discrimination. 
In spite of these challenges, Arte perseveres with hard work and a positive attitude!
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan o Erandeiraremasen—Dai 2-bu: Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!
description:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Agents of the Four Seasons: Dance of Spring
description:
At the beginning, the world had only one season, Winter. Winter, unable to bear its loneliness, gave up part of its life to create Spring. Eventually, the earth's wish brought Summer and Autumn into being, completing the four seasons. The changing of seasons was to be carried out by human children, and those who fulfilled this role were called "avatars of the four seasons."

Hanaha Hinagiku, the incarnation of Spring, together with her escort Sakura Himetaka, begins to travel around the land of "Yamato" in order to bring about the spring season for the first time in ten years...? The sad but beautiful "Tour of Spring" chapter of the story about living deities and their guardians, who are responsible for bringing the seasons into the world, opens here.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Apartment Where Strange Wails Echo
description: **Alternative Official Raw:** [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/123940307)
tags: Oneshot, Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic

name: Isekai Shoukan wa Nidome Desu
description: There was once a man who was summoned to another world, and saved it. Of course, he became too popular there, and turned into an isekai-normie. However, that man fell into a "trap", and was forcibly returned to his original world. Moreover, he had to start over as a baby!
