tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Illios
description: Kameyama Paris, a young leader of the Kamematsu clan, attends a party of the Akaiyakai, Japan's largest chivalrous organization. There, he takes away Elene, the wife of the clan leader he met. Furious, the chairman of the Akaiyakai calls Achilles, a man called "demigod," to go after Paris...
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Supernatural

name: Goth Boy & The Jock
description: A goth boy and a jock forms a bond over time...
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Pastel Love
description: "Millie" (golden haired), the perfect little girl whose life is fully equipped with everything, but because of her timeless mother, Millie has become an indifferent day-to-day person until she meets "Zen" (black-headed), an ordinary little girl whose life focussed on only studying, without Zen knowing that she herself was stirring up Millie's heart to beat again.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Full Color

name: Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Shita Inaka Musume ga Bad End Kaihi ni Idomu Hanashi
description:
A girl living in the countryside is attacked by a monster and meets an unexpected death. When she wakes up, she has been reborn as the villainess in the story of her favourite book! In order to avoid a life of "certain doom" in which she will be killed by the Demon King as the enemy of the heroine, she acquires the strongest power, but ends up embarking on an unknown route in which the Demon King proposes to her...?! Armed with knowledge of the story and the strongest power, she challenges the bad ending, and a great reversal fantasy begins!
___
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7604hy/)
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 1: Phantom Blood (Official Colored)
description: Young Jonathan Joestar’s life is forever changed when he meets his new adopted brother, Dio. For some reason, Dio has a smoldering grudge against him and derives pleasure from seeing him suffer. But every man has his limits, as Dio finds out. This is the beginning of a long and hateful relationship!
tags: Official Colored, Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Seven Deadly Sins
description:
The "Seven Deadly Sins," a group of evil knights who conspired to overthrow the kingdom of Britannia, were said to have been eradicated by the Holy Knights, although some claim that they still live. Ten years later, the Holy Knights have staged a Coup d'état and captured the king, becoming the new, tyrannical rulers of the kingdom. Elizabeth, the king's third daughter, sets out on a journey to find the "Seven Deadly Sins," and to enlist their help in taking back the kingdom.  


---
tags: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!
tags: Monsters, Action, Crime, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
A tired middle-aged man, Makoto (38, single) was attacked by thugs in a night park and died. Or so he thought, but when he woke up, he found himself in a dungeon in another world! Not only had his body become younger, but he also possessed the power of a spirit mage who could control black flames!! Glad for this opportunity, Makoto bid farewell to his terrible days in Japan and teamed up with Yuuka, a tsundere high school girl with a witch hat who has her own circumstances. Together, they decided to start a new life. Defeating monsters, completing requests, and realizing a slow life! For that purpose—first, escape the dungeon!!

"Your job is to protect me from monsters, easy, right?"
"What are you expecting from a guy who was almost 40!?"

The odd couple of a former middle-aged man and a high school girl, who get along well despite their bickering, aim to become the strongest for the sake of a slow life.
tags: Action, Survival, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Witch And Another World Girls
description:
A young girl dies in a car accident because of a drunk truck driver, then she wakes up in the middle of the forest and finds herself in a different world. Akira is the young girl and she runs into a strange woman in the forest and it turns out that woman is a witch also a demon?!

But the Witch saves Akira's life and brings her back to her shop. The Witch found out that the girl was Heroine?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Kimi ga Bokura wo Akuma to Yonda Koro
description: Yusuke Saito is a normal high school kid...well, normal enough, though there's six months missing out of his memory. But when he starts to get confronted by people who insist they're from his past, who allege that he did horrible things to them...suddenly Yusuke realizes that those missing six months may be crucial to remember. Otherwise, the skeletons in his closet may just make him a skeleton, too...
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery

name: Kare to Kanojo no Sentaku
description:
A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!  
  
After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Matsuura is a calm high school boy who has lived his life by keeping up a superficial appearance. He can easily see through other people's true nature, but for some reason he is approached by Kyuuragi-san, a beautiful girl with twin tails from a group of extroverts...!? Whether it was intentional or innocent, Matsuura was caught off guard by her cunning moves…
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Second Life Ranker
description:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: There won't be a next time
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Demons, Ghosts, Supernatural

name: Ore Dake Yoyuu no Isekai Survival ~Tenisaki no Mujintou de Tanoshimu Harem Life~
description: Kaito Saejima, an eccentric boy with a passion for survival, is suddenly transported along with his classmates to a deserted island in another world. To survive in such a dangerous environment, he starts living together with the beautiful girls from his class and shows off his incredible survival skills like a true expert! A harem survival life where I’m the only one taking it easy and having a good time with gorgeous girls!
tags: Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Ryousangata Nike x Sousaku Shikikan (Doujinshi)
description: A manga set in the NIKKE universe, this story takes place 100 years before the game story. The protagonist, Claude, is the commander of an all mass-produced NIKKE squad who sees them as more than easily replaced tools of war and tries to protect them and fight for their rights.
tags: Monsters, Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Doujinshi, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Teradate Ten doesn't like getting involved with people and thus hasn't been watching TV or looking at her smartphone. As a result, she is the last to learn that not only has a UFO landed on Earth, but the alien visitor, Lulucielamo Mocophishim Klasslamonira, has transferred to her school and chosen her as her bride!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens

name: Momo Kanchou no Himitsu Kichi
description: A sci-fi story about Captain Momo, a woman on board the space freighter Blue Chateau. She is alone on the 500-day one-way journey, accompanied by a cat, when she realizes that the electronic replication range that converts electrical energy into food can replicate non-food items as long as it has the data. The story depicts the freewheeling life of Captain Momo, who spends most of her time naked because she lives on a spaceship all by herself, and the serious troubles that occur during such a life.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy

name: Sotsugyou Album no Kanojotachi
description:
"A love that was supposed to be just a memory starts moving all at once!!"

Kanae Meguru, a movie enthusiast, had potential romantic interests throughout elementary, middle, and high school. However, due to his lack of experience in love, he was never able to take action. Learning from that, he vowed to focus entirely on his university film club activities, completely ignoring romance. But that resolve was short-lived—before he knew it, he found himself falling for Ootsuka Ozora, a girl he met in the film club...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem

name: Kujou's Deadly Sins
description: Kujou is a lawyer who would even defend the Devil. In this new Reiwa Era where chaos is spreading, he's the “guardian of darkness” who operates behind the scenes.
tags: Mafia, Drama, Delinquents

name: Piccolina
description:
Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽

**Note:** “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description:
Noble young lady Nicole has had her heart broken more times than she can count. Her fiancé Keios is so devoted to Princess Caroline, his childhood friend and the unrivalled belle of their aristocratic academy, that he seems to forget Nicole even exists. But no longer. Tired of waiting around and conforming to Keios’ needs, Nicole makes a most liberating decision: I’ll give up on love and go it alone. Her arranged marriage may be unavoidable, but that doesn’t mean she can’t enjoy her own life, right? Emboldened and excited, Nicole begins to shine as she never had before—so brightly, in fact, that even the clueless Keios can’t help but notice…

*Source: Kodansha Comics*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Killing Bites
description: People have been created that are human-animal hybrids, and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day, which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi, who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger, which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya, for his protection! Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: Aishiteii no wa, Karadadake
description: Tohgoh Haruka, who is respected (and sometimes feared) by her coworkers, has been hiding the fact that she's a lesbian. She is starting to feel attracted to Sayama, who is the only coworker who really acts friendly to her. Tohgoh has built up a wall around herself because she doesn't like it when people feel uncomfortable around her. However, Sayama recently found out that Tohgoh is a lesbian. Will their work dynamic change or will something else change?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
During the busy lunch hour at “Ma’s Southern Southern Cuisine,” a delivery order comes in. The person calling turns out to be a police officer who has feelings for Ma, and he seems to be in a desperate situation…?!

*Source: MANGA Plus*
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Police, Cooking

name: The Worn and Torn Newbie
description:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Joo In-gong was dragged into the remake of a game he was playing called <Knight Saga:Re>.

However, something wasn’t right. The only playable characters should be Loch of the human side and Zephyr of the demon side. Instead, he awakens in the body of Shutra— the ninth prince of the Demon Realm, a character who actually didn’t exist in the game’s story.

Granted two mysterious powers, “Protagonist Setting Adjustment” and “Power of Conquest,” Joo In-gong now must alter the game’s plot to survive against Zephyr.

Yet, with every twist of the plot, he garners more attention…
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Le Vampire Diabolique
description: Oneshot
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady
description:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....
tags: Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Mythic Item Obtained
description:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: White Tiger and Black Tiger
description:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).
tags: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Witches' Quarter
description: As demons start creeping in through the Witches' Quarter, its protector must rise to the occasion and stop them from invading the human world.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Zombies, Reverse Harem, Magical Girls, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Obake Yori Kowai Mono
description: Shuuhei, a reporter for a trashy tabloid magazine, becomes obsessed with Nao-kun, a mysterious amateur ghost-hunting streamer who secretly works as a camboy on the side - and after he attempts to meet Nao in real life, things take a turn for the bizarre when he tries to understand more about the lonely, slutty boy.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Boys' Love, Supernatural

name: Céu Azul
description: Not found
tags: Adventure, Self-Published

name: Yuusha Party kara Oidasareta Fuguushoku [Wanashi] Yunikku Sukiru [Yajirushi] de Saikyou ni Naru
description:
"That’s why... as of today, you're out of the party."

Forty years have passed since dungeons began appearing across the world. Keiichiro, a member of an elite S-rank adventurer party, is suddenly expelled by his childhood friend for being "too weak." His job, Trapper, is seen as useless—after all, it lacks any offensive abilities. Stripped of his future as an adventurer, Keiichiro sinks into despair—until he encounters a mysterious girl who grants him a unique skill.

The skill, Arrow, shatters the limitations of a Trapper, transforming him into an unstoppable force. Determined to reclaim his place as an adventurer, Keiichiro embarks on a journey to become the strongest!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Knight in the Area
description:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Seikishi ni Natta kedo Danchou no Oppai ga Sugosugite Kokoro ga Kiyomerarenai
description: The aspiring sword master, Ruga, was chosen to join the Order of the Holy Knights due to his sincerity and swordsmanship prowess. He is assigned to the Sixth Order, rumored to be a "living hell," and prepares himself for tough times. However, he ends up meeting the big-breasted Commander, Leon Myrie, who says "Welcome, Ruga. You are the only male knight of the Sixth Order." Looking at his right, he saw big breasts, at his left, beautiful women! Will Ruga's reason last in the face of this inescapable Order?!
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Love and Lifespan
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Wallaby
description: Kokoro Kosaka is shocked when her recently deceased classmate comes back to life in the form of a stuffed wallaby toy! How will she handle this new companion and what are his reasons for returning from the dead?
tags: Comedy, Supernatural

name: Mousou Telepathy
description: Nakano-san is a high school girl who can look into people's minds. Because of that, she finds out that the mind of the popular Toda-kun is full of wild fantasies about her! Or is it?
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: S-kyuu Guild wo Tsuihousareta kedo, Jitsu wa Ore dake Dragon no Kotoba ga Wakaru no de, Kidzuita Toki ni wa Ryuu Kishi no Chouten wo Kiwametemashita.
description:
Cyril was expelled from the top-class dragon knight group, S-class guild "Lindwurm", for certain reasons. However he has a hidden skill... the unconventional ability of being able to "communicate" with dragons! 

After meeting and partnering with several unique dragons, Cyril starts his own guild. Perhaps due to his incredible talent, the guild's level soars at the fastest rate in history! Cyril's skills are finally recognized, and he makes a name for himself as an extraordinary dragon knight!
___
**Character Designer:** [Pairan](https://mangadex.org/author/2dff3aac-5474-4044-bb73-3bfb86667515)

**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/56371)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Pharaoh's Concubine
description: She is a girl that everyone loves but she cannot speak of the love she has for her brother because her brother already loves someone else. In despair, she gets dragged into Ancient Egypt by a snake shaped bracelet that is engraved with a three thousand year old love oath. There, she meets the Pharoah's heir, a party boy….
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Bury Me
description:
"Please bury me," the boy said before their eyes even met, and ever since then, he has been seeing that boy everywhere - on the way to work, at the restaurant, at home - asking if he would bury him.

He is afraid. He is terrified. But not because there's clearly something wrong with all of this.

It's because he remembers.

He knows there's a reason the boy is asking him this. There's nothing strange about it.

"Please, bury me?" the boy asks again.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Boys' Love, Horror

name: MoMo -the blood taker-
description:
In Tokyo, suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them.
Mikogami Keiji, a detective who also wants revenge for his lover, killed 10 years ago, pursues the culprit, the “Man with two faces”.
What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him…?
___
**Assistant:** [Hoshikawa Danpa](https://mangadex.org/author/3814dd6f-c7b9-4ced-a9ee-a393eb4c06a7)
tags: Thriller, Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ai no Kuchisake-Onna
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Dominate the Three Realms
description: Three hundred years ago, he was know as the great Martial Emperor, but the night before his wedding he was betrayed and killed by his fiancee; three hundred years later he is reborn, and this time nothing will be able to stop him from his goal to dominate the three realms!!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)
description: The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited! Yujiro Hanma, the world's strongest creature, vs. Baki Hanma, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Military, Philosophical

name: A Superstar From Birth
description: After being reborn for the umpteenth time, 7-month-old Lee Seojun finally gets the chance to fulfill his original dream of becoming a superstar actor! Using magic abilities from his past lives, baby Seojun captivates his playmates and becomes an overnight sensation with a viral mukbang video that helps fussy kids eat. Soon, he's shooting a baby food commercial, and his uncle's entertainment company is knocking at his door... but will Seojun be able to keep up the magic to match the demand?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ponkotsu Dai Shuryou-chan to Ossan Sentouin-san.
description: The Evil Secret Organization Gokuark has been destroyed by the heroes. The next Great Leader who barely survived and her henchman Saito start a new life in a run-down apartment. But can the reclusive, clumsy, and yet adorable Great Leader bring Gokuark back to its former glory?
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Insomnia
description:
20 nights, 20 terrifying stories. Masaya Hokazono tells us the horrific stories he has experienced as well as those that have been told to him. Even in a technologically advanced modern Japan, traditional spirits never cease to torment the living.

Included oneshots:
Volume 1: Hanashicha Ikenai (Don't Tell), Kengai Imouto Kaidan (Out of Bounds: Sister Ghost Story) [Story: Kihara Hirokatsu]
tags: Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Horror, Supernatural

name: Amelia no Koukiteki Romance
description:
From Maiu Cafe : Ameli, a model student and class representative in her first year of high school, has her world turned upside down after a month of classes when her secret is uncovered by Haruka, a second-year student with a devilish charm !

Amelia... What’s really hidden behind that pseudonym ?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ibitsu
description: A boy went to take his trash out late one night, and found a strange, creepy, gothic-lolita-dressed woman sitting amongst the garbage bags. She asked if he had a little sister, and he answered her, hurrying afterwards back to his apartment. When he looked out the window, she was gone. Who is the strange woman, and why does she give him such a bad feeling?
tags: Thriller, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
The Calamity War that engulfed all of Earth, and the Gundams deployed then which were said to have brought it to an end. 300 years later, some have been hidden, some abandoned.  
  
Argie Mirage, a boy who carries the past of his family's death at the hands of a Gundam, meets Volco Warren, a boy who wishes to rebuild the Gundam his family left behind.  
  
To destroy a Gundam. To rebuild a Gundam. In the midst of the two boys' intersecting fates, the Astaroth will awaken from its 300 year slumber.  
  
Side story set in the Mobile Suit Gundam - Iron Blooded Orphans universe.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Katenai Ko
description: Two female classmates engage in a playful game challenge involving games such as poker, shogi etc... with the loser forced to fulfill embarrassing requests. Confident at first, one girl quickly loses each round, leading to increasingly awkward and funny situations.
tags: Traditional Games, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru

name: Vampire Savior: The Soul's Lost Child
description:
In the world of Makai, there are horrible monsters that humans fear, called Darkstalkers. Lillith, a fellow Darkstalker, falls to Earth (London) and befriends John. What will he do when he finds out what she is? Will Lillith survive Master Jedah's attacks??  
  
Based on the Vampire Savior installment, from the DarkStalkers video game series produced by CAPCOM.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Martial Arts, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Boku wa Ai o Shoumei Shiyou to Omou.
description: In love and romance, it's all about TECHNOLOGY, and TECHNOLOGY always wins. Watanabe is a young 26-year-old lawyer who fervently believes in pure love and would give everything for his beloved girlfriend. However, reality makes him realize that love isn't the fantasy he's always dreamed of, but rather a game of probabilities and intelligence. Together with Watanabe, you'll learn the latest technology that will make you irresistible to any woman: “Love Engineering”.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Adaptation

name: Moto Maou-sama no Nangoku Slow Life - Buka ni Uragirareta no de, Mofumofu-tachi to Tanoshiku Slow Life suru no Ja
description: Ragurindo Jenerufu Korasoda, the overworked Demon Queen, had enough. After an assassination attempt and a betrayal by her underlings, she faked her death and escaped to a tropical paradise. There, among palm trees and beaches, she found a herd of adorable, fluffy slime creatures. Life as an ex-Demon Queen had never been so sweet.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Waves, Listen to me!
description: On a night out drinking to get over being duped and ditched by her last boyfriend, Minare Koda ends up providing a massive drunken rant for Matou, the director of a radio station. The next day, she is shocked to hear her own voice being broadcast on the radio! She rushes to the studio, leaving her job at a curry soup and bread restaurant in jeopardy. However, her drunken rant and the next day's impromptu damage-control live broadcast end up earning her an invitation to try working at the radio station!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Music

name: Farmer of Spirits
description: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?
tags: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Q Ken
description: Not found
tags: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Chao Xia
description: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gacha Gacha - Secret
description:
Akira Hatsushiba is just your typical, average high school kid . . . until a glitch in a Gacha Gacha video game changes his life forever. Now, every time Akira sneezes, his entire body undergoes a gender-bending switcheroo! That’s right, Akira is always just an achoo away from getting in touch with his feminine side. But it’s not all bad. Akira has had a crush on Yurika Sakuraba ever since he first laid eyes on her. He’s always been too shy, but now that he can change into a girl, Akira finally has a chance to get close to Yurika. Being a girl certainly has its advantages!  
  
Part Two and Volumes 6-16 of Gacha Gacha.   
Part One is known as Gacha Gacha - Capsule and ran as Volumes 1-5.  
  
English OOP from Del Rey ISBN for those who maybe interested in supporting the author.

Vol 02: 9780345493200  
Vol 03: 9780345493217  
Vol 04: 9780345493224  
Vol 05: 9780345493231  
Vol 06: 9780345499172  
Vol 07: 9780345501691

name: DB Red
description: The Red Ribbon Army returns! Their mission: to defeat Son Goku!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Military, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Cute Aggression
description: Natsuo, the ever-reliable office senpai, always calm, always composed, always there when someone needs help... is hiding his weak and anxious nature behind his perfect facade. How long can he keep up the act?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers

name: unOrdinary
description: The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization… that something needs to change…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Homura-sensei Is Probably Unpopular
description:
High-school student Hasumi-chan is drawn to Homura-sensei, a young, socially awkward biology teacher generally seen as weak and boring but recognized by her to be kind.   


---
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Ikemen Dansou Reiya ni Koishiteru!!
description:
Assistant cameraman Osaka Kippei is one day invited to a cosplay event by his coworker where he meets the most handsome man he has ever seen: Ichinose Makoto. And through twists and turns they become friends.

In reality, however, Kippei is mistakenly thinking Makoto is man and Makoto, trying to avoid disappointing Kippei and losing him, is doing her best to act like a man for him. But what are these conflicting feelings they feel!? The mistaken love comedy between Kippei who thinks she's a man and Makoto the handsome crossplayer starts!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama

name: Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta
description:
In place of her sister, Wisteria took on the job of becoming a guardian of a poisonous otherworld. One day, a man who resembled her first love dropped out of the sky. His name was Lloyd. To her surprise, he was the son of her first love!

 To win the hand of the princess, he has come to ask for Wisteria's partner, Saltis, a sentient holy sword. Having survived in the other world frozen in time, Wisteria easily defeated Lloyd and told him to go home... But despite her best efforts at persuasion, Lloyd refused to leave. 

"Please take me as your apprentice, until I get strong enough to defeat you!" 

So began a one-sided relationship between master and apprentice. Will her time, which has remained frozen for so long, begin to move again? A master-student love fantasy between a lonely former noble lady and a prodigy prince!
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Taisho Junai Fukushuutan - Haha wo Yaki Korosareta Watashi wa Oni to Kasu
description:
Yuu is born to a concubine of the Todo family, a prominent family, and is mistreated and treated like a slave from an early age.
In particular, her half-sister Nadeshiko pretends to be friendly with Yuu in front of Shinnosuke, whom she has a crush on, but behind her back, Nadeshiko bullies Yuu to no end.
Yuu had hoped to be free someday, but she was unable to do so because she could not abandon her mother, who was locked up in a dungeon.
One day, her mother dies in an unexplained fire, and Yuu, who went to save her, also disappears.

Seven years later, Yuu, who was thought to have disappeared, grows up beautifully as if she were a different person, changes her name to Haruhi, returns to the Todo family, and begins to take revenge for the death of her murdered mother.
tags: Historical, Drama

name: Shinigami-chan wa Mimamoritai
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Ooh La La
description:
The hilarious adventures of a newly couple.  
  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Vampire Knight Memories
description: Beginning as four bonus chapters following the end of 'Vampire Knight', 'Vampire Knight Memories' is now an official sequel series written and illustrated by Matsuri Hino. The series follows the events that occurred whilst Kaname slept for a thousand years, as well as his time in the future with Yuuki's daughters, Ai and Ren.
tags: Romance, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Hitman Stans
description:
A legendary assassin found the light of life. It was an underground idol!

Endou Owaru is the most powerful assassin in the Fujisan-kai, a huge black market organization. He was feared as a “killing machine” because of his ruthless work and overwhelming fighting power, but one day he decides to retire. The reason for his decision was to live his life proudly with Kaorin of the underground idol Ro~Xesia.

Can a man covered in blood and sorrow protect the light of life that he has finally obtained?!
tags: Action, Comedy, Drama

name: Yamiochi Shuudou Onna-chan no Nichijou
description: Not found
tags: Action, Web Comic

name: Shukuteki Onee-san wo Taosenai
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: How to Walk the Protagonist's Path of Flowers
description:
Life never goes according to plan—something I had yet to learn back then.
Because of a friend from my past life, I begrudgingly read a male-oriented fantasy harem novel… only to wake up as a character inside it: Kang Nahyun.

Special perks for reincarnators? Ha! As if.
I had no money, no connections, and nothing but a hardcore survival mode to keep me going.

But just before high school, I awakened into the “Sniper” position, earning myself a spot at the Awakener Academy!

And if I can’t be the protagonist, then I’ll just hitch a ride on the protagonist’s flowery path, right?

So I make it my plan to stick close to Na Yuhan, the real hero of the story, snag a few scraps of luck, and quietly bow out…

Except something feels off.
With every passing day, my steps are veering further and further from the plan…

The chaotic Academy life of sunshine-heroine(?) Kang Nahyun begins now!
“How to Walk the Protagonist's Path of Flowers” — coming your way!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated, peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising, the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin, for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Mecha, Military, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Soshite, Mina ni natta
description:
In broad daylight, a horrific mass murder occurs, claiming the life of Mina, a high school student. Miraculously, she survives through a heart transplant. As Mina begins to settle back into a semblance of normalcy, she becomes alarmed by an overwhelming surge of murderous intent that she's never experienced before.

Unbeknownst to her, the heart she received belonged to Misako Shimizu, the very perpetrator of the mass murder.

Mina's parents watch in confusion and fear as their beloved daughter starts transforming into a person they can no longer recognize. The murderous urge only grows stronger and seems unstoppable.

Witness the beginning of an unprecedented family suspense drama!

(Source: Bookwalker)
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Byakuda no Hanamuko
description:
A white snake who is a divine messenger and a childhood friend with a mystery. Entangled obsessions in a Japanese-style fantasy.
Tsubaki, a high school student with a predisposition for bad luck, has a one-sided love for his childhood friend Sakuya, who is both beautiful and talented. Then, one day while leaving school they are randomly attacked on the street.

In the ancient capital Kyoto, a lovestory defying fate unfolds.
tags: Psychological, Romance, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tsuihou Sarenakatta Otoko ~Nidome no Jinsei wa Dogeza kara Hajimarimashita~
description: A mere villager, Cross Vish, somehow ended up joining the hero's party by some strange twist of fate. Cross, an ordinary man with no special powers whatsoever. Yet, for some reason, the heroes genuinely considered Cross a true comrade. There was no way he would ever be banished from the party. And that was precisely why Cross kept agonizing. What could a useless person like him possibly contribute to the hero's party? And then... Cross came to understand his role. At the very moment when the Demon King, on the verge of death, unleashed magic toward the hero—.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
"There is a girl among you who has become a witch."

On the morning she was supposed to start her first year of high school, Emma woke up inside a dimly lit cage. Imprisoned within a remote island prison mansion for a crime she doesn't remember committing, a confused Emma receives a declaration from a single owl:

"You have been identified as a potential witch — one who brings harm to this world."
"You will spend the rest of your life here as a prisoner."

The everyday life she took for granted completely collapsed. As Emma gets to know the other girls, all fellow witch candidates, during her imprisonment, the owl eventually gathers all the prisoners and declares:

"A witch trial will now commence."

And so began an utterly cruel game — a process of selecting, one by one from the thirteen girls, the witch... that is, the one to be executed.
tags: Monsters, Crime, Survival, Magical Girls, Magic, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Horror, Adaptation

name: Galnanajimi wa Koko ga Suki
description: Hiro, a high school boy living in the countryside, is walking along the beach one day when he is approached by a black gal who looks like she belongs in Shibuya. He is surprized to find out that she's Rio, his childhood friend who he used to play with in the old days! An explosive reunion × countryside × sea romcom with heart-throbbing situations, delivered in a double feature!!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Haikyuu!! - Magical Horror Knight ~ Tricky Kisses (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Lucifer's Wish
description:
A mysterious girl wakes up one day in a twisted and demonic world, filled with death, despair and nightmarish like creatures. May she find the true meaning of her relation to this world? Or shall she fall victim just like the rest...

Chapters and Volumes uploaded by the artist.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Self-Published, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Mizu Zokusei no Mahoutsukai
description:
Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but it's enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought.

The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there's nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but he's ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.

Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? They're the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Jujutsu Kaisen - Omoide wa Kimi ni Azuketoku (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Gojo Satoru x Itadori Yuuji
tags: Reincarnation, Boys' Love, Doujinshi

name: Not found
description:
In the light of day, Sister Alicia Snowell is a faithful and devoted bride of the gods, dedicated to serving the Holy Church and its followers. In the shadows, she's one of the Church’s top inquisitors, tasked with hunting down and eliminating heretics by any means necessary.

Alicia's latest mission: assassinate the Hero Elcyon, slayer of the mighty Demon Lord, whose growing fame threatens to eclipse the Church's political power. In order to kill the divinely protected, supposedly unkillable Hero, Alicia first needs to win Elcyon's heart. There's just one problem — Elcyon turns out to be a girl named Cion! Alicia's at a loss for what to do, but while she tries to figure out how to seduce a girl, more trouble brews on the horizon. With remnants of the demon army still at large, Alicia and Cion face one deadly supernatural battle after another! Where will the two girls' intertwining paths lead them?
___
* **[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-killing-bride)**
* **Character Designer:** [Enji](https://mangadex.org/author/c2125541-abf3-4041-839d-f303e2987659)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kuro no Senki II - Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu
description: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford), a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world... Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the "Harem King." Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire's rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Harukawa-san wa Kyou mo Ueteiru
description: Meet Natsumi Harukawa, a young office lady. During work, she is asocial and constantly looks cranky. However, the truth is that Harukawa-san is simply very hungry, and spends her time after work eating delicious foods.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Whispering the Rain
description:
Life has been tough since Viola's Dad passed away 3 years ago. After days by days training, she embarks on a mission to explore ruins hoping for a fortune, together with two explorers she hired, Rain and Bleu. 

Little does she know, that this expedition will cause her life to turn inside out. What she hopes for a fortune, goes into a curse instead. A strong curse which could turn her into a demon, a fairytale like in which people already think of as extinct.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Reverse Harem, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: High Teen Boogie
description: Momoko Miyashita is at the top of her class at school, but her home life is another story. An orphan, she lives with her aunt and cousin and works long hours at their coffee shop. One day, a transfer student named Shou Fujimaru joins her class. He looks like a delinquent with his pompadour, motorcycle, and leather jacket, but in reality, he's the son of a distinguished family. He falls in love with Momoko, and is ready to do anything to meet her standards, but a romance like this won't be accepted by the people around them…
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Bedtime Agreement
description: As the eldest son of the Li Group's President, Li Dao'an has a secret: He is intersex. At the age of 13, Li Dao'an's secret was accidentally revealed by the Chu Group's heir, Chu Xiao. Despite being old rivals and often bickering, Chu Xiao didn't mock or shun Li Dao'an, but instead proposed to him, surprising everyone.
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: Turning Point
description:
Baek Sarang, who was comfortable eating alone, meditating alone, and drinking alone.
Yu Pyeonghwa wants to get along with others even at a loss.
Love and peace, who have lived conflicting lives, meet each other and learn a new way of life.
A realistic romance that is more adult than you think and more childish than you think
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Onikirimaru
description:
There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn, this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human, he is pure oni.  
  
Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans, he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now, in the mother world of Japan, he is still out there slaying oni.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Usagi to Taka no Su
description:
High school boy Towa lives with his father Takaaki, a truck driver, in a working-class neighborhood in the Kansai region. They eat well, but don't like to cook elaborate meals. So what's on the dinner table today? 

An old, small apartment, a warm meal, and casual conversation. They thought it was just an ordinary house you could find anywhere, but...!? 

A heartwarming dining tale about a single father and a high school boy!
tags: Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description:
Takashi, a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well, is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However, on a particular occasion, his skill is activated! For some reason, the companion it worked on was a girl!?
___
