name: Hitozuma to JK
description: A housewife and her daughter's friend have a little affair. Will they be caught or will it end as just "sex-friends"?
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Hone To Kawa To Ga Hanareru Oto
description: That day, a beautiful young man visited the detective agency, troubled by strange, mysterious noises of unknown origin. Detective Sakagami, driven by ulterior motives, offers an overnight investigation, but time passes by without any clues. Yet, something feels off…
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kamiina Botan, Yoeru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana.
description:
Kamiina Botan is a 20-year-old college student. At the welcome party for the dorm she was assigned to, the dorm leader Ibuki gives her a highball to drink and she becomes tipsy, leading to her involvement with Ibuki from now on...
___
Official Manga Twitter: [@Kamiina Botan](https://twitter.com/kamiinabotan)
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description: Japanese parody gag manga series by manga artist Norio Sakurai about the adventures of the characters in the Baki series and life in their over-the-silly-top world they live in.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, 4-Koma

name: Zero no Tsukaima Gaiden: Tabasa no Bouken
description: The adventures of Gallia's knight Tabitha.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy

name: Triangle High School
description:
NOTE: Includes an adaptation of ***Day of the Dead*** at the end of volume 1 and a ***Re-Animator*** adaptation at the end of volume 2.

Miyuki, a girl who bought a pair of mysterious binoculars from a shady antique store, gets angry and thinks that the binoculars, which do nothing, are fake.
Just when she was about to stop her occult-tinged observations, there was a black figure flying in the sky at the end of the binoculars!?
Miyuki was so shocked that she lost her composure. However, as a result of this, a major incident that involves the school occurs!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Zombies, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: The Villain Wants to Live
description:
Deculein von Grahan-Yukline is the mid-boss of the AAA-grade game REW was developing. A villain who dies 999 times out of 1,000.

One day, Kim Woojin, a game developer for REW, woke up as him.

As a villain, Deculein is inevitably destined to perish.

[Primary Survival Goal: Become necessary to the game.]

If death is his fate, then he will twist fate itself to survive.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: I Only Want to Beat You
description: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Humanoid Monster Bem
description: The "Bokura" version, the phantom comic, has finally been made into a paperback version of the famous "Yokai Ningen Bem" horror anime. A complete collection of all 9 episodes of a serialized magazine that reveals the "secrets of birth" of Bem, Bella, and Bello, which were not introduced in the anime version.
tags: Psychological, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Hero Who got TS'd
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Atama Pink na Megane-chan
description: The story of a guy and a girl with glasses in the next seat over who always has her mind in the gutter...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Shirokuro Sansui, a Japanese student, was accidentally killed by God, then sent to another world in apology. There, he received training from a sage for 500 years in order to become "the strongest." After training enough to be considered the strongest by the world's current standards, he happened upon a baby near his training grounds, thus beginning his otherworld adventure. His training was normal, his moves are boring... even though he's the strongest person in the world, everything else about him is just plain. The curtain opens on the sword saint who fights with just a normal wooden sword.
___
Official English LN release: [J-Novel Club](https://j-novel.club/s/the-world-s-least-interesting-master-swordsman)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: New Year's TS Girl Before & After Illustration Board
description:
Author’s DESCRIPTION: 
My New Year’s TS girl sketch!

My buddy kept whining about wanting to visit the shrine with his girlfriend.
The wish came true—though instead of going with a girlfriend, he went as one.
The gods knew what they were doing: turned him into my ideal type—tiny but busty, super cute—and even put him in a kimono!

He’s so adorable everyone’s staring, and since he doesn’t realize how cute he is, he keeps clinging to me nervously, especially since he can’t walk properly in sandals and a kimono.

What an amazing first shrine visit of the year!

…Well, in the end, I got TS’d too, and we ended up as a pair of pretty girls in kimonos.
tags: Genderswap, Web Comic

name: The Princess in the Henhouse
description: Princess Soria has been cursed to live in her dilapidated kingdom as a chicken for the last century. Her curse can only be broken through true love with her Prince Charming. Unfortunately, the only fitting candidate for her comes in the form of Emperor Lenok, who doesn’t know a thing about romance! He also needs her help to save his empire from a long-term drought, a problem that can only be solved by breaking her curse and restoring her kingdom. But how is a poultry princess supposed to fall for such an unattractive ruler?!
tags: Action, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: As the Line Goes
description: Imagine finally adjusting to your new lifestyle as a girl and they hit you with the “free trial’s over, time to turn you back to a male!”
tags: Genderswap, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Red Book
description: The more you think about it, the scarier it gets. This is about things that are everywhere and nowhere.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dokidoki Dokidoki
description:
The main character, Suzuran, is an ordinary high school girl who is in love with her classmate Usagi. However, she accidentally has the ability to turn back time when she gets excited. She just wants to have a normal romance, but because of this ability, nothing goes right. What's more, she accidentally ends up being targeted by Usagi...!?

(Source: ComicWalker, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Miya-chan no Kyuuin Life!
description:
Sucking up all the boys' nectar.♥

Miya-chan, a member of the track and field club, has been in poor condition for the last few days due to some unknown reason... So she thought, but one day, she suddenly became able to see heart marks on top of the boys' heads...!? Not only that, but she even saw a picture of herself being used for what looks like XXX!? Just what will happen to Miya-chan!?
tags: Loli, School Life, Supernatural

name: A Playthrough of a Certain Dude's VRMMO Life
description: Typical company employee Tanaka Daichi (38 years old, single) loves games and plays a new type of VRMMO called "One More Free Life Online" under the username "Earth". Inside this free world he chose several skills that are generally regarded as useless. Be it wasting time crafting potions, cooking up pointlessly tasty food, or hunting monsters with some absurd weapon he crafted, he simply enjoys playing the game.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: See You Tomorrow at the Food Court
description: Yamamoto and Wada are two childhood friends attending different high schools who convene every afternoon at the food court at their local mall to engage in blissfully mundane conversations.
tags: Comedy, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Hive
description:
Gigantic oxygen-doped bees are attempting to dominate the human race by reversing the food chain. Lee is a mid-level manager at a large company who only has one thing on his mind: to save his family from the bug-apocalypse.

---

• [Naver Webtoon Fan Translation (English)](http://webtoons.com/translate/episodeList?titleNo=65&translatedWebtoonType=WEBTOON&languageCode=ENG&teamVersion=0)
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Horror

name: Renata: Goddess for Hire
description: Renata, a once almighty goddess, has returned in the modern day and must do odd jobs to earn offerings in order to restore her powers and save the world from an incoming monster uprising.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Alm, who worked at the temple as a saint, was physically and mentally worn out from the power harassment from the priest Johannes. However, one day, the thin thread she had been holding onto snapped, and she declared her resignation as a saint. 

Alm, who had run away from the temple, bought an abandoned park and decided to live a leisurely life there. On the other hand, the temple - which had lost their saint and was no longer able to function - was in a frenzy!
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Eugene Dawson is a young man with a goal: to become strong. He trains under and lives with his mentor, Liza Parsandra, who is regarded as a Sword Saint. In terms of physical prowess, Liza is without equal, and despite her scatterbrained nature, Eugene still enjoys each day with his adorable mentor. However, her defenseless nature, drop-dead gorgeous looks and tendency towards unintentional skin-ship make training feel like an impossible task...?!

"Is this really going to help me get stronger?!"
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: RATS
description:
In a dystopian future, Nikolaj lives in the grim, overpopulated city of Efesto, where his violent, alcoholic father abuses him.
Struggling with self-harm and drug abuse, he skips school frequently.
Once he comes back he befriends Faye, a bullied girl, daughter of a prostitute, but their bond is threatened when a mysterious client of her mother becomes obsessed with her.

(Source: Tapas)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Iwakura Mitsumi always had big dreams, of leaving her small town, advancing to a top tier university, and then contributing to the country before retiring back to her home town. So focused is she on her goal that she is oblivious to all the other ways she comes up short, much to the chagrin and concern of her friends and family. Can a naive country girl make it in Tokyo?
___
**Note:**
* Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award, came in third behind the winner Blue Period and second place, Spy x Family.
* Winner of the 47th Kodansha Manga Award in the Best General Manga category in 2023.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Nagasarete Airantou
description: Ikuto Touhohin just had a last fight with his old man, one that led him to make a rash decision to run away from home. He boards a ship, deciding to take a vacation, but the ship is suddenly hit by a huge storm–one that sends Ikuto overboard! When he regains consciousness, he realizes he is still alive... on some island. An isolated island. An isolated island with nothing but girls. Stranded on an island with only girls, no electricity, gas, radio, television... like he was back in the stone age.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Aliens, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
This is my love story with a landmine girl who's convinced that I'm her childhood friend.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/onnoveltet/status/1829430063294738758)

**Buy:** [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2704719)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: I Became the Duke's Servant in Disguise
description:
I woke up as a maid in a tragic romance—a woman who gave her heart and loyalty to the scheming Duke, only to be discarded and executed.

Roselia, now a servant in the Duke's household, is destined to become a pawn in his grand game, ultimately betrayed and exposed by the Crown Prince, the male lead, leading to her public execution.

To avoid catching the Duke’s attention, she takes a bold step—disguising herself as a man.

But wait... why is this happening?! Even in disguise, the Duke insists on keeping her close.

Somehow, instead of being a maid, she ends up serving as a manservant in the Duke's household.

"This wasn’t part of the plan!"

Caught in a web of danger, deceit, and unexpected roles, can Roselia change her doomed fate?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Rinjin-chan ga Shinpai
description:
Yano Maya, an office worker tired of work and seeking healing, met a naïve and weak God “Rinjin-chan.” This is her daily life with a God, being gently swung around and healed.  
  
Note: 'Rinjin' is a pun on '隣人' (neighbor), replacing the kanji for 'person/人' with 'god/神'.
tags: Monsters, Office Workers, Magic, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kiichi VS
description:
*Second arc of Kiichi!!, taking place 10 years after the events of volume 9.*

Ever more uncompromising in the face of injustice, Kiichi has become a star. Known around the world for shaking the Japanese establishment, he doesn't intend to stop there. Now at the head of a big company, between school of thought and mafia, whose members number in the thousands, he wants once again to get the population moving, even if it means provoking the powerful of the country!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Police, Tragedy

name: Horror Anthology Comic Blindside: Tainted Love
description:
From just beyond your field of vision—

The gem of horror anthologies, “Comic Shikaku (Blindside),” returns with an all-new lineup!

Nine brand-new stories that explore the thin boundary where love and madness meet.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The God of High School
description:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Replica datte, Koi wo Suru.
description:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sunao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Kono Boukensha, Jinruishi Saikyou desu ~Hazura Skill "Kantei" ga "Keishou" ni Kakusei shita no de, Amata no Eiyuu-tachi no Chikara wo Uketsugi Musou suru~
description: Lacking any combat skills, Eustus was just another adventurer stuck at the bottom. That is, until the day his life changed forever when he awakened "Inheritance", the power to gain the memories and abilities of anyone, simply by touching something they once owned! He starts by tapping into the legacies of the heroes who once saved the world: the unmatched Sword Saint, the far-seeing Archer, the god-speed Lancer, the miracle-working Saintess, and the prodigy Archmage... inheriting their very lives and skills!
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kaettekita Motoyuusha
description:
Once, a hero has been summoned to a different world in order to defeat the demon king. After the war stretching 3 years ended, the commendable hero slayed the demon king. And he was forcibly deported back to earth after being dismissed.

"Give me a break! Elves in addition to beast race, dwarfs and demon race. Even though I wanted to make a harem in the different world I saved! My dream will not come true on earth, where there is no magic at all."

Thus, the hero returns on his own. Without the blunder of being extradited to earth this time, he will build a harem of his own in a different world.
tags: Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: A-Rank Boukensha no Slow Life
description: Aldred, the leader of a kingdom's A-ranked party, Black Silver, has accomplished the task of slaying a dragon. However, he who has pursued strength his whole life has lost sight of his goal from taking down a monster of the strongest species. As he worried about what to do next in his life, it was the scenery of Nordende that popped up in his mind; A rural village by the countryside, full of natural beauty, which he only visited once during a quest in the past. After declaring the disbandment of his party, he heads towards Nordende for a comfortable, relaxing life.
tags: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Dam of the Forest
description:
Dam, who at some point stopped growing, avoids people and leaves to the forest.  
  
 [Author's twitter](https://twitter.com/dahongcomic)
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate. A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery... the land Leif called Vinland.
___
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: OL ga Gesen de Atta Yankee Danshi Koukousei ni Natsukareru Hanashi
description: Office lady Haru frequents the arcade daily to distract from her discontent with her company. There she easily crushes a delinquent high school boy in a game and somehow, he becomes attached to her. From acquaintances who just met at the arcade to gaming buddy, and beyond that, their relationship is...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Delinquents

name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
description:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: I'll never stop fighting tooth and nail to safeguard humanity and all people under heaven. It's time to power up the system once more, ramping up its capabilities to meet this crucial challenge!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Oddspin
description: They are twins. Suddenly, the sisters find themselves drawn to a con artist who pretends to be the owner of a piece of land and swindles people out of their money. The two sisters, "Ei" and "Hotaru," who are genetically identical but have slightly different personalities, somehow get things moving when they get involved. A new twist in the crime suspense genre is born.
tags: Thriller, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Rororro!
description: Chitose Morishige is a 12-year-old seventh-grader without a friend in the world. Her father, Professor Morishige, built a robot companion for his daughter to ease her loneliness. The only problem is that Ichika Robata, the android, is so lifelike that Chitose believes she's a normal human girl who either ran away or was kidnapped by her father. Ichika attempts repeatedly to prove that she's a real robot, with hilariously disastrous results.
tags: Loli, Comedy, Mecha, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tensei Renkin Shoujo no Slow Life
description: Meria, a village girl who is on her third life after two overworked lives. She is determined to live a slower life this time, but her enthusiasm is tempered by an alchemy that she did not know was already out of date, however, said alchemy led to her suddenly being taken away...!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz - Glory of the Losers
description:
Centuries in the future, in the year After Colony 195, Earth is surrounded by orbiting space colonies. The colonists are cruelly oppressed by the Earth Alliance, which uses huge humanoid fighting machines called "mobile suits" to control the populace. Behind this tyranny is the secret society called "Oz," which has infiltrated the Alliance military and steered it towards its repressive course.  
  
Now, the space colonies are ready to strike back. Five young pilots, equipped with advanced mobile suits called "Gundams," are sent to Earth to wage guerrilla war against Oz and its Alliance puppets. The war to decide humanity's destiny begins…
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation

name: Ano Ko to Futari de.
description: The same part-time job, the same surname, the same family environment - other than that, Satou Yuna and Satou Ema have absolutely nothing in common. But due to a strange twist of fate they end up sharing an apartment... Sometimes they fight, but maybe it's because they're total opposites that they can be together. A new-generation of girls story about young women who live flexibly and resiliently!
tags: Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Rabuka
description:
The story takes place in Japan, right now, where the Coronavirus has completely changed our way of life. In the house of a young man, his childhood friend who lost his job due to the Coronavirus moves in. However, this childhood friend is a scumbag...

The story depicts the depressing feeling of not knowing how long the coronavirus will last, and the rotten relationship between the two young men.

(Source: Yanmaga, translated)

Note: The one-shot that was published for Young Magazine's 40th anniversary project "Wagaman".
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Kyuuketsuki-san wa Chitoraretai
description: The overly serious vampire, Chitose's first love is her childhood friend, Santa. But when she sucked his blood, she realized. There's no way I have a fetish like this...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life

name: Academy Organization
description: An orphan whose family was destroyed by the underworld discovers a shocking truth—the very organization that took everything from him was built by his own father. Fueled by vengeance, he infiltrates a school that trains future crime syndicate leaders, determined to take down the traitor responsible for his mother’s death. Surrounded by enemies, he must climb to the top through sheer strength and strategy. The battle for revenge begins now.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Project Mars
description:
A drifter who lost his family to aliens as a child.
He possesses the rare ability to manipulate black holes but keeps it hidden.
One day, aliens attack the city in a terrorist act,
and when he faces them again, they threaten his life...
"Sorry, but I can't die for you. Do you know what I went through to survive?"
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Aliens, Full Color

name: Classroom 101
description:
Reginald Guevarra, a 4th year college student felt like his life is stuck on repeat.
Every day is the same schoolwork, research, thesis, exams, and more. He misses the fun and excitement of his senior high school days, where everything felt exciting for him.

One day, he gets a strange text with a QR code and a location. Curious, he decides to go  and on the way, he meets a familiar face from the past. But what waits at the end of the road is more than just a reunion.

All his old classmates are there, and they’ve been forced in a massive game venue. To escape, they’ll have to play  and win.

Friendships will be tested, memories would be a weapon, secrets will be revealed, and there’s no guarantee everyone will make it out.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Traditional Games, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Self-Published, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Goblin Slayer
description:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: BIBLIOMANIA
description:
Alice had woken up in Room 431 of a mysterious manor.  
  
"You must not leave this room," warned the Serpent, but she paid it no heed and her body began to rot…  
  
Will she be able to escape the cursed manor?  
  
*Was nominated for the [2019 Japan Media Arts Festival Awards - Manga Category](http://archive.j-mediaarts.jp/en/festival/2019/manga/).*
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
"Everything for the Score"—nicknamed "Esco"—is a renowned masterpiece in the world of yuri games. A boy who reincarnates into its world suddenly finds himself in the role of Sanjo Hiro, infamously known as "the guy who gets in the way of yuri."

Hiro is a nuisance character who ends up ruined no matter which route he's in. To avoid triggering his death flags, he begins to train and search for a safe path—but for some reason, heroine events keep unfolding around him as the central figure...!?

"I don’t want a harem romcom! Just give me yuri! Let me see the yuri!"

[Official English Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/series/the-only-thing-i-d-do-in-a-no-boys-allowed-game-world-novel)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Impossible Love Suicide
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life

name: Netori Mahoutsukai no Bouken
description: Young swordsman Alvin has put together a nearly perfect adventuring team with his best friend and ranger, Renka, and the adorable priestess Milis. Though they have managed well so far, things really start improving after the wizard Shinji joins their group. Now, they're becoming the best team ever! But what Alvin doesn't know is that while Shinji is a capable and reliable wizard in the streets, behind closed doors, he's tangled up in the ladies' sheets. And his lust doesn't stop with his teammates—Shinji's also managed to find his way into the beds of companions and enemies alike. Will Alvin remain blissfully unaware of Shinji's lecherous ways, or will things come to a head if he finds out?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Lock Up: Warera Akatsuki Pro Wrestling-dan
description: (from ebookjapan):Samson Takaki, president of the impoverished indie organization "Akatsuki Pro Wrestling Troupe," is terminally ill with cancer. Although his body is in shambles after years of wrestling, he continues to put on a good show. He believes in turning his life around. ...The Mandala of men's lives! Life is wrestling!
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, Medical, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Duke Pendragon: Master of the White Dragon
description:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Gorin no Megami-sama ~Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan~
description: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the "dormitory" was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!
tags: Traditional Games, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
description:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

---
