tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Naruto: The Whorl within the Spiral
description: The story of Namikaze Minato (Fourth Hokage), the winner of the world-wide popularity poll project--NARUTOP99! Just how exactly did Minato, the father of Naruto, develop a certain jutsu...?
tags: Oneshot, Ninja

name: Not found
description:
"Wanted: People who don't care what happens to their lives! Monthly salary: ¥150,000~ ※Must live on-site"

With no savings or home left, wandering aimlessly, Takahiro stumbled upon this job listing - managing an apartment unit as a live-in caretaker. The employment condition: "You must get along with your neighbors." Having nowhere else to go, Takahiro drifts into the apartment... only to find his "neighbors" are clearly not human.

"This is a story I heard from a friend..."
Every day, his neighbors tell him "ghost stories" - fictional tales of events that never happened in reality. At least, that's what they should have been—

A wildly popular horror story from Kakuyomu, now adapted into manga!
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Trash Will Always Be Trash
description:
I refuse to be taken for granted any longer!
After six years of waiting patiently for my fiancé to return from battle, he shows up with a woman carrying his child. What's worse, I now have to live with her, watching as he neglects me yet showers her with affection. I cannot stand it! Should I stay and stand my ground or bid this place farewell?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Totsuzen Parallel!
description: After falling through a magic mirror, Nanako and company find themselves stuck in a world where the people are talking animals - and now must find their way back home.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Isekai

name: Freezing
description:
Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat, an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora," who can wield special weaponry and armor, was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister, an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette, nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated, until he came… and slowly changed her.  
  
The Prequels gives back story to several characters; does not effect the main story.  
  
Most FTH and all LetItGo are joint with Vexed Scans.

There were 33 volumes when the series went on hiatus, however, the site producing the chapters is still ongoing.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Hana ni Kamiguse
description: Even in her second year of high school, she has no friends. A young lady, Suu, who is a "loner" to the extreme, dreamed of a normal, uneventful adolescence. Then one day, a beautiful young man named Yuki appears in front of her. He was a mysterious boy who had lost his memory and was the first friend she had ever made. But what is he really...?
tags: Romance, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Laid Back Arcanadea
description:
A 4-panel comic depicting the easy-going daily life of the Arcanadea girls.

Arcanadea is a Sci-Fi/Fantasy line of Bishoujo Plastic Model kits by Kotobukiya based on illustrations done by various artists.
tags: Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Himekishi ga Classmate!
description: After he and his entire class died on a field trip, Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. However, his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer, with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon, however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous, more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. But Odamori, of course, has something different planned for their reunion...!
tags: Loli, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Watashi no Koi no Hajimekata
description:
I want to see the look on Senpai's face when she falls in love.'' 
Chisaki, a reality dating show geek, has formed many couples in her daily life and because of this, everyone calls her Machiapu Senpai (MatchApp-senpai). She had given up on her love life, but Reo-kun, her popular and good-looking kouhai, somehow became emotionally attached to her! While supporting Reo-kun’s friend's love journey, she decides to rehabilitate her own love life with Reo-kun too?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Zettai ni Yuuwaku sarenai Otoko VS Zettai ni Yuuwaku suru Onna
description: Reishi Kiyota, a ronin student, has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor, Aika Toyokawa, an office worker, likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Tobioriru Chokuzen no Doukyuusei ni "Sekkusu Shiyou!" to Teianshite Mita.
description: My first love, Koga Kurumi. Her beauty and personality, which are beyond what you'd expect from a high school student, invite jealousy, isolate her, and - she was on the verge of jumping off the roof due to bullying. So, what can I do...? "Let's have sex!" I'll scream out my love to the death and make a place for you in this world!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, School Life, Adaptation

name: Koppa Mai Chiru - Sono Koro ni
description:
Maebara Kei Gets a Job!

In the 13th year of the Heisei era, in the Tokyo Metropolitan Area, Coastal Region. Due to the prolonged economic recession, the police force has weakened, and the growing number of disillusioned youth turning to loosely organized criminal gangs has led to a drastic decline in public peace... Amidst all this, Maebara Kei begins working at the ward office. Can he become a respectable public servant...?

(Source: Young Champion)
tags: Office Workers, Police, Mystery

name: Phoenix Queen
description:
Feng Wu was born with the true blood of the phoenix and was hailed as a peerless genius in all of Junwu. However, her blessing was also a curse...it placed a target on her back. After she was attacked and had her blood stolen, her master Mu Jiuzhou exhausted his spiritual power to save Feng Wu and disappeared right in front of her. Powerless, she could only watch.

Starting again from the beginning, she resolves herself "Zuo Qingyun, our relation is irreconcilable, I cannot live in a world with you in it!"

Watch how our "useless" protagonist becomes a phoenix step by step!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Catenaccio
description: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
tags: Psychological, Sports

name: Slow Starter
description: A guy who is satisfied with his 2D wife and anime and games. One night he ended up nursing a girl. Unexpectedly, the girl's love interest is… another girl! With this going on, what's going to happen to Midori?!
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Mane Mane Nichi Nichi
description: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun!
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Daydreamer
description:
Ritsuki, an elementary school boy, hasn’t been able to wake up early for half a year and now lives a reversed sleep cycle. 
One day, on his way to school, he wonders what will happen if he stays like this forever. 
Just then, a strange woman suddenly speaks to him, saying she want to be his big sister.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Adventure of Flash
description:
After dying in an accident, a young man is reincarnated in a world of swords and magic as Arte, the second son of a powerful marquis. His new life seems like a dream come true, surrounded by a warm and loving family. But everything changes during the sacred ceremony where he is granted magic.

He receives a mysterious, unique power called [Light], a skill immediately dismissed by everyone as a useless dud. Just as he faces their scorn, memories of his past life come rushing back. With knowledge from his former world, Arte alone understands the hidden, extraordinary potential of his magic.

Now, by applying the wisdom of his past, can he transform a "dud" into the strongest magic of all?!

Thus begins the saga of an adventurer defined by ultimate power and unrivaled freedom, the man who would become 'The Flash'!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Yurizon
description: This is a story set in the near future. One day, a cheerful but slightly shy high school girl, Ueshita Amami, receives an email from a mysterious sender saying, "I love you." Although shaken by her first love confession, Amami heads to the meeting place written in the email, intending to meet the man and reject him properly. Little does she know that this is the beginning of a major incident that will shake the world. Girl meets...? A love story like no one has ever read before begins now!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Sonic the Hedgehog (DS)
description:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Gal niPA-chan wa Semararetai
description: The popular teen model niPA, aka Asahino Futaba, is strong willed and independent, but the plain guy who is her seatmate refuses to budge before her... "Damn that four-eyed loser, how dare he tell me off!". However, at the same time, remembering that makes her feel somehow strange. Her fingers slip beneath her skirt as if by reflex and while thinking about getting assaulted by that disgusting man, she pleasures herself against her better judgment while she is brought to climax in her fantasies!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side... On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Gokufuri Kyohi Shite Tesaguri Start! Tokka Shinai Healer, Nakama to Wakarete Tabi ni Deru
description:
Many people suddenly find themselves in a white, empty space, where a God-like figure tells them that they are to be reincarnated and sent to an isekai known as Tesla. They are given a limited number of points to spend in various attributes, such as their race and abilities, which will determine their reincarnation into Tesla.

The story follows a young boy sent there along with his clanmates from an MMORPG, and they plan to stick together and specialize into different skills, just like they did in-game. Although his clanmates and everyone else sent there are strangely accepting of the situation, he finds it too suspicious and decides to go his own separate way, balancing his points out to be an all-rounder instead of a healer. He leisurely goes about life in Tesla as an adventurer, but it slowly starts to seem like there was a reason behind them being sent there...
___
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054885201112) (Raw)
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Legend of Crystania: The First Adventurers
description:
Legend of Crystania is set 300 years in the future from Lodoss, and is set on the continent of Crystania where the refugees from Marmo landed. It follows Pirotess's quest to free Ashram from the gripes of the animal god Barbas, and the hero Redon and his companions in a quest to free Crystania from Barbas' control.
___
**Buy:**
- Volume 1: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4073039245), [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/504016001)
- Volume 2: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/407304303X), [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/504016002)
- Volume 3: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4073046160), [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/504016003)
- All: [Suruga-ya](https://www.suruga-ya.jp/product/detail/WN965)
tags: Action, Animals, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Made in Abyss
description:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."

In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot...
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Psychological, Animals, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Villain Classroom
description:
Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Over Rev!
description:
Over Rev! is a manga about a senior graduate named Ryouko. A while back, she injured her ankle in a track meet. Since then, she didn't know what to do with her life, until she finds out about street racing…

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Over Rev** (2008)
tags: Action, Sports

name: For the Sake of Sita
description: A medical student passionately falls in love with a fallen goddess during his volunteer abroad in Nepal, and he desperately tries to fight off destiny to save his love.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing 0.5 Point Half Preventer-7
description: AC-197. Peace has returned to the people. And from this point on in history, weapons known as mobile suits, including the Gundams, were never seen again in the Earth Sphere. However, as long as mankind exists, there will always be battles. And that is precisely why an organization called the Preventers must exist. Heero and the others of PREVENTER-7 embark on a new operation to extinguish the flames that threaten to consume the perfect peace.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Adaptation

name: I Want to Make Black-Knight Fall In Love With Me!
description: My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment... The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared knight in the kingdom, Frost the Black Knight, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands". In an attempt to secure his family fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Les anecdotes de la SD
description: Not found
tags: Slice of Life

name: Fox Love Story
description: Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yukidoke to Agapanthus
description: Natsuki, the prince of an all-girls school meets an innocent (girl) transfer student, Shun, who doesn't treat Natsuki like a prince, but instead treats her as a "friend." Natsuki excels in everything she does and even has a fan club at school. Even though she was looked at with admiration, her days were somehow unfulfilled... Although Natsuki feels uncomfortable with her first "friend", Shun's innocent smile and bright personality make Natsuki's heart flutter...?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Joukamachi no Dandelion
description:
The everyday lives of the nine super-powered siblings of the royal family are monitored by more than 200 surveillance cameras and broadcast nationwide. The people of the nation who are watching the broadcast will have the ability to elect the next monarch. The story focuses on Akane, the third-oldest sister who can manipulate gravity. She is shy and desperately does not want to be caught on camera.
___
**NOTE:** Initially released as a 4-koma manga, Joukamachi no Dandelion has transitioned back to traditional format as of Vol.5 Chapter 49.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy

name: Fukanzen de Fueisei de Fushidara
description: The story of Yugami Maiko, a girl with a fetish for teeth, and Hizumi Ryuuji, a guy who hates his teeth.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Bukimi no Tani-kun
description:
Is this love at first sight a bug? A sci-fi romantic comedy about a humanoid machine and a human girl!

In this world, humanoids are widely used for various purposes, such as housework, work, and conversation partners. However, due to certain circumstances, Komiyama-san doesn't have a humanoid, and a humanoid named Tani-kun is delivered to her home. As soon as Tani-kun makes eye contact with Komiyama-san, he falls in love at first sight and proposes marriage...!?
Life under the same roof with a humanoid in love begins now!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.
tags: Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Mr. Mallow Blue
description: Featuring a cynical beauty, a reclusive NEET, and an expressionless hot guy. A group of high school students and a NEET find themselves in a boarding school in which a story unfolds through the sudden meeting of those with jaded hearts and the misfits of society.
tags: Genderswap, Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: We Are the Beatles
description:
This is the tale of the members of a [Beatles](https://mangadex.org/title/877aa28e-5c75-469c-84b1-4730bd321f53) cover band in Tokyo who find themselves 
transported back in time to 1961 -before anyone had ever heard of the Beatles-   
and decide to take the mantle of the world's greatest rock band for themselves!  
But will they dare to pursue this dream until the end ?
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music

name: Not found
description:
The manga centers on Hanayo, an elderly woman whose husband of many years has only recently died. 

After finishing a Buddhist service for her husband, she finds herself walking out in town alone for the first time in a long time. She stumbles onto a cosmetics store, and meets a beautiful woman named Yoshiko Doujima, and falls in love at first sight. Hanayo had long given up on makeup after her husband nagged her about it, but putting some on with Yoshiko's help brightens her heart.
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Drifting Net Café
description:
It all started with a "net cafe."

Toki Koichi is a soon-to-be father leading a complacent life. One day, he happens to stop by an internet café, and there he bumps into Kaho, his first love from his junior high school days. Having just fought with his wife, Koichi's heart is filled with his old feelings.

All of a sudden, a strange wave flows through the computers and cell phones in the net café, and the entire place blacks out, just before rain begins to pour outside. Unable to leave safely, both Koichi and Kaho stay overnight at the net café. The next morning, when they step outside, they find the world is completely different. Koichi is determined to find out why the entire café has transported him to a different world, and to return to his family in the original world.

As he fights against various fears and tries to solve the mystery, people start to disappear one after another. Can they all survive through such a crisis!? And what is the secret of his first love with Kaho!?
tags: Action, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: We Were Reincarnated Into a World Overrun by Monsters, but It’s No Big Deal Because God Gave Us a Deck of Mysterious Cards That Enable Incredible Transformations, So We’re Going To Work Together To Save This World: The Manga
description:
A manga about two men who were reincarnated into another world overrun by monsters, but it's no big deal because God gave them a deck of mysterious cards that enable incredible transformations, so they're going to work together to save that world.

From the mind of Kyogoro Miyata of "Nick & Lever" fame, comes a chaotic Isekai unlike any you've ever seen before.
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Monsters, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Police

name: Rune Symbol
description: Not found
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Saint Seiya: Rerise of Poseidon
description:
The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades.
In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis!
At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Urumin may be an idol—but she can’t sing, can’t dance, and her attitude is anything but sweet. And yet, she has one loyal supporter: Kimiya, her only fan in the enitre world. Their relationship isn’t quite like your typical idol-and-fan story… in fact, it’s a little weird!?

A heartfelt and hilarious rom-com about a hopeless idol and the one guy who keeps cheering her on. An “adorably devoted” love story that’ll make you say”this is what pure love looks like!

*Source: Mangamo*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Music

name: Astro Baby
description: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore

name: Saigo no Saiyuuki
description: Returning from school, third-grader Ryunosuke is introduced to a young girl. His father tells him that she will be his little sister starting that day. Her name is Koharu. She is blind and her arms and legs are prosthetics. She holds within her a power beyond human understanding… A bizarre and fantastic Saiyuki story for a new generation!
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: Gokutei Higuma
description:
Watch out malevolent fugitive souls, Higuma will send you straight back from where you came!

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/hell-warden-higuma), [Shonen Jump](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/hell-warden-higuma)
tags: Action, Demons, Adventure, Supernatural

name: Hen'ai Heartbeat
description: Meet Haruka Kawatsuji, a young boy who miraculously survived a fall from his apartment's balcony as a child. Unfortunately, despite his best efforts to find that same thrill in sports and horror movies, he's never quite managed to feel as alive since. However, that may all be about to change in a fateful encounter with one very eccentric girl!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, School Life

name: Kubo-san wa Mob wo Yurusanai
description:
First year high schooler Junta Shiraishi is a mob character who goes unnoticed even when he's standing right next to you. But his classmate, "heroine-level beauty" Kubo, always notices him and is there to tease him. Anyone can become special to someone, but it might be a little too early to call these feelings "love."

Perhaps this story is still two-steps from being a romantic comedy! A sweet comedy where a background character becomes visible!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kamio Yui wa Kami wo Yui
description: What is the terrifying secret behind beautiful honor student Yui Kamio's hair?! And why must she always keep it tied up? Super popular Kiito's high school life is plunged into chaos by the worst classmate imaginable! Hiroshi Shiibashi, the creator of Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan, delivers a comedy that isn't afraid to let loose!
tags: Action, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Supernatural

name: Ne0;lation
description:
A manga about tough guys and hackers? The classic combo! Let's see how this unlikely team came together!  
  
C'est l'histoire d'un jeune homme qui souhaite sauver sa ville.  
This is the story of a young man who wants to save his town.
tags: Action, Comedy

name: The Promised Neverland
description:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Nisekoi
description:
When Raku Ichijou was young, he made a heartfelt promise to his childhood friend that if they were to meet again, they would marry each other. Ten years have passed since that fateful day, leaving Raku's memory of her faded. But he still holds a relic of their relationship together—a locked pendant, which his childhood friend holds the key to. He hopes to reunite with her one day, despite not remembering what she looks like.  
  
Now a first-year student at Bonyari High School, Raku attempts to live a normal life, dreaming of becoming a public servant and marrying his crush Kosaki Onodera. However, this isn't as easy as it seems, as he is the unwilling heir to a large yakuza family, and Raku can't escape from his duties when the American Bee Hive gang wages war on his family's turf. In order to forge peace between the two feuding families, Raku is forced into a fake romantic relationship with Chitoge Kirisaki, the beautiful daughter of the Bee Hive's leader. The two quickly come to hate each other, but have to learn to live together and pretend to be deeply in love in order to keep their families at bay.  
  
However, Raku's quest for the key to his pendant isn't becoming easier as more girls—who were all involved with his pendant in some way—enter his life. Join Raku as he juggles his false relationship, maintains the balance between warring families, and unravels the identity of the girl who will unlock his heart.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Grim Reaper Online
description:
He, the grim reaper, who comes to guide the soul of a dead girl but gets trapped in the online game instead!?  
  
A grim reaper, who came to retrieve the soul of a deceased girl, gets sucked into a virtual game?!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Halloween Night
description: Some robots go trick-or-treating.
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Comedy

name: Isekai Tensei Ojisan wa Shizuka ni Kurashitai
description: After having several setbacks in real life because of his loner nature and holing up in his house, Toudesuke Saionji, a middle-aged man, throws himself into his inventions. Until, one day, he causes an explosion during one of his experiments and ends up reincarnating into another world. Now that Toudesuke has yet to find some way to go back to his old world, will he keep to himself along with Satalia, a vampire girl who adores him, and lead a quiet life where he dedicates his time to his inventions...?!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Snake Mountain
description: She died a year ago. Their grief still raw, her brother and her childhood friend go hiking to look for a snakeskin.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Psychological, Drama

name: Boku-kun Fanbox Extras
description: Free Fanbox extras from PenSis' fanbox page.

name: Oddones
description:
Years into the future, the world is infested with mutated insects. Society has split — the privileged live in safety, while the poor struggle to survive. Among them are the Scavengers, a community living in a bunker. They venture out daily into the overgrown, dangerous surface, scavenging resources from the abundant flora brought by the infestation.
‎
‎Despite their struggles, the Scavengers have found a sense of contentment in their harsh reality. But when certain events unfold, the community is faced with complications that threaten their way of life — and thus, the story begins.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Slice of Life, Aliens, Cooking, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Tekito na Maid no Oneesan & Erasou de Ichizu na Botchan
description:
"You can marry me when I become an adult"-said by me 10 years ago.  
I still remembered that precious promise even until now!

**Links:**
- [Original Web Comic](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37287) (Raw) (Niconico)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Story of Someone We Know
description: The story of three average women, and their not-so-common everyday life.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Sono Honoo no Na wa Seiheki
description:
The story is set in the near future, where the "NTR" genre has been banned due to the risk of causing brain damage. Akira Inui, an unsuccessful erotic manga artist, happens to encounter NTR and is drawn to its charm... This is the story of the protagonist's passion as he pursues the "ultimate NTR" together with Harumi, a cyborg equipped with a "sexual desire reactor" that converts sexual desire into energy.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Sci-Fi

name: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi
description:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: 10th Dimension Boys
description:
Short stories of boys in 10th dimensions.  
  
Raw has 124 + Afterword chapters.  
Official English has 118 + Afterword chapters.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: call my squall
description: Ten years of unreturned feelings left Kanta a bit wary of love. So it's pretty ironic when Ryo, whose older brother is now dating Kanta's former crush, grows attached to him. They easily bond over their shared passion for gaming and hang out together quite often. Kanta finds himself enjoying Ryo's cheerful and honest personality, not even bothered by the family connection to his past heartbreak. But then, out of the blue, Ryo admits that he might be falling for him!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Murderous Lewellyn’s Candlelit Dinner
description: Life on rough, rundown Ira Street isn't easy at the best of times, but a recent string of murders have left the residents traumatized. Not Shavonne though. He's too busy trying to get by to worry about some murderer. However, that all changes when he meets his peculiar new neighbor. Lewellyn is young and handsome, yet eccentric. Why does he spend all day peeling onions on the apartment stairs until his eyes are red-raw. And what's with those filthy black fingernails? Nevertheless, Shavonne reluctantly accepts a dinner invitation at his neighbor's place. But after he makes a gruesome discovery during the candlelit meal, suddenly the murders feel a lot closer to home...
tags: Thriller, Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto Gaiden: Xiaolan Kaisouroku
description:
The story of "The Apothecary Diaries" from Xiaolan's perspective.

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Historical, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Futari Escape
description:
A deadline-plagued manga artist and her jobless senpai try their best to escape from the oppressiveness that is "real life".  
  
Expansion of Taguchi's previous doujin *Ninin Escape*.
tags: Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Kokan Musou ~Kiraware Yuusha wa Mazoku ni Aisareru~
description:
Kantarou, who has ascended to heaven because he is too sick, reincarnates in a different world. Kantarou, who is distorted in character and is a fatty, is disliked even after reincarnating, but notices that a cloudy potion that cures anything from his crotch appears. Moreover, it also has the effect of powering up the demons, and it will be loved by the demons...!?
___
**Alt Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496640214685)
- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55354)
tags: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description: By the will of the goddess, Itsuki Shinomiya was given the privilege of choosing various abilities and being reborn in another world. However, before going to the other world, he didn't want to involve himself in scary, dirty, gross things like battles. Fiercely determined to live a slow life, he chose the unique skill [Pocket Money], giving him an amount of money once per day. "With this, I can hang out with girls without having to work!" Dreaming of avoiding battles and living with cute girls, Itsuki stepped into the other world! But the reality was not that simple. Getting attacked by giant bugs, getting caught up in arguments at the guild, and getting stuck with slaves?! In the end, will Itsuki be able to live his ideal slow life?! Using unique skills and manufacturing skills, an exciting other-world slow life with beautiful girls starts now! (hopefully)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Touhou Project Niji Sousaku Series - Koumakan no Onnatachi
description: A light-hearted comedy centered on the residents of the Scarlet Devil Mansion. Unofficial and non-canon. Published monthly in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Cherry Yuusha to "Sei" Naru Tsurugi
description: In a world where heroes are always women chosen by the gods, the legend of a male hero seems to be just a myth. However, when a young boy named Cherio finds himself in the middle of a battle against monsters that threaten humanity, a goddess grants him the power of the male hero and the ability to unsheathe the mythical Holy Sword. Now, he must decide if he is willing to risk his life, not only to save the people he loves, but to fulfill a destiny that no one thought possible.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Tada no Murabito no Boku ga, Sanbyakunen Mae no Boukun Ouji ni Tensei shite shimaimashita ~Zense no Chishiki de Ansatsu Flag wo Kaihi shite, Odayaka ni Ikinokorimasu!~
description:
Prince Rudolf gained knowledge of the future 300 years from now during a near-death experience. He uses his wits to change the future in which he will be assassinated as a tyrant prince.
Meanwhile, discrepancies between the story passed down to posterity and reality gradually emerge...
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ai no Senbiki ~Mamakatsu Shitara Mama ga Dekita Hanashi~
description: The protagonist ​​is a middle school boy named Hikawa Jun who lost his mother at birth. He glares at his classmates who complain about their own overprotective mothers and wonders what it would be like if he had a mother of his own. The story begins when Jun, who wants the warmth of a mother, lies about his age and matches up with a stranger on a sugar mama dating app.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Shota

name: Watashi ni Ai wo Oshiete
description: Though a bit of a fool, but hardworking, Suku, a second-year high school student and the new student council president, is in love with his reliable vice president, Ririka. However, for some reason, they always end up fighting. One day, Suku gathers the courage to confess to Ririka, but at that moment, he falls into a time loop. Every time he confesses, the loop resets! How can he ever date Ririka? A romantic comedy with a sci-fi twist, offering a heartwarming school story!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken!
description:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving associate Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Adventure, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Oshibana!
description: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Fanservice Paradox
description: The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Medium: Spirit Medium Detective Hisui Jyouduka
description: Spirit medium Hisui Jyouduka uses spirits to identify the culprit, and mystery writer Shiro Kougetsu uses logic to show evidence other than the medium. The two of them tackle a number of difficult cases, but the culprit behind the series of corpse abandonment incidents that shook the world is closing in on Hisui! The mystery drama of the beautiful detective Hisui Jyouduka begins!
tags: Drama, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Konyaku Haki made 10-Nikkan
description: Arrogant and selfish, the notorious daughter of an earl, Elena Boulder, lost her memory in a freak accident shortly after her fiancé, Viscount Oscar West, called off their engagement.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Munou no Akudou Ouji wa Ikinokoritai ~Ren'ai RPG no Akuyaku Mob ni Tensei Shita kedo, Gensaku Mushi shite Saikyou wo Mezasu~
description:
"Prepare yourself, Protagonist. With this power, I will change this predetermined future."

One day, he was suddenly reincarnated into the world of his favorite romance RPG. However, the body he had reincarnated into belonged to the 'Incompetent Evil Prince' Harold who had his engagement broken off with the heroine. On top of that, according to the setting, he wasn't able to use his magic power and would be defeated by the protagonist. But, it'll be different this time.

First, he stopped his engagement from being broken off with the heroine and started training himself. Then, he obtained a power different from the one he had in the original work, and overwhelmed everyone with the enormous magic power he shouldn't have been able to use! And before he realized it, his single-minded pursuit of strength had also gotten the attention of the other heroines...
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life ~Daini no Shokugyou wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita~
description: Sano Yuji, a black company employee, is summoned to another world while finishing his work at home. His profession in the other world, a Monster Tamer, is considered a job that makes it difficult to become an adventurer. However, thanks to some slimes he met, which read several magical books, he gained magical powers and the second profession, Sage. Yuji acquired overwhelming power, but is he conscious of his strength? Blindly becoming unparalleled and strongest in the world!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Jashinkankin Harem de Isekai Seifuku!
description: A chaotic, different world ruled by evil gods. The main character, Yuya, wakes up to the sound of a girl's voice calling his name. It is a temple of desire ruled by the evil god Liv where numerous people were immersed in pleasure like crazy. Even in the midst of all this, Yuya still maintains his rationality. Liv shows her interest and ties him up with special chains. However, the chain was originally a weapon that deprived evil of their powers by imprisoning and subjugating them. Due to the revelation of the old god Agnes, who resides in the chains, Yuya uses his power to imprison dangerous evil gods one after another.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The other world was... at Peace.

A kind world where the three races, the Spirit World's Magical Races, the Celestial World's Divine Races, the Human World's Human Races, they are kind neighbours to each other, with everyone living a peaceful and fulfilling life. But although I wished to peacefully spend a year before my return, for some reason, the heavyweights of this world keeps gathering around me, and...
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Double Helix Blossom
description: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Crime, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural

name: Kanojo Shoukan Shimashita!?
description: Yuta Agatsuma is a high school student who has never experienced first love. He doesn't know how to fall in love, but his classmate Nodoka Kanzaki is someone who makes him interested. Is this love!? Meanwhile, his younger sister named Yoru, who dreams of summoning demons, is performing her summoning ritual as usual. At that time, the summoning circle suddenly shines and a girl descends from the sky... She is Wrath, a demon from the demon world, and she offers Yuta a contract...!?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem

name: LESSA
description: A story about a demon hunter named Rano who is trying to find his sister. Along the way he finds a person who has the same teeth structures as demons yet is not affected by sunlight. This person, Lessa, seems to remember who Rano is, but Rano does not remember who he is. Rano only dreams of this person; what are the connections between these two?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Salty Studio
description: View the delightful everyday life of a sitcom consisting of NEET, college applicants, couch potatoes, and a Korean who acts like a foreigner.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: S.I.D. - Supernatural Investigation Department
description:
As a little boy, Si Mun, the grandson of a famous shaman, gained the ability to see—and communicate with—ghosts. His grandmother gave him a talisman which rid him of this ability and erased his memories of any supernatural phenomena he had witnessed.   
  
Years later, Si Mun is working a hectic, yet ordinary job as a homicide detective in the Korean police force. His grandmother has since passed on, but the powers she sealed away appear to be reawakening…  
  
Polski:  
Jako mały chłopiec, Si Mun, wnuk słynnego szamana, zyskał zdolność widzenia i komunikowania się z duchami. Babcia podarowała mu talizman, który uwolnił go od tej zdolności i wymazał wspomnienia z wszelkich nadprzyrodzonych zjawisk, których był świadkiem. Wiele lat później Si Mun wykonuje szaleńczą, ale zwykłą pracę jako detektyw z wydziału zabójstw w koreańskiej policji. Od czasu kiedy jego babcia odeszła, moce które zapieczętowała, wydają się budzić …
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: unTOUCHable
description: Sia Lee is a modern-day vampire who absorbs energy from humans by touching them instead of drinking their blood. She has been desperate to touch Jiho since the day he moved in next door—but he's a germofobem. Will Sia best his mysophobia and touch Jiho?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: I was walking normally until a girl appeared in front of me and tried to hypnotize me, as I didn't want to embarrass her I pretended... And now she thinks I'm really hypnotized...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Falling Blue
description: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Without a single friend, middle schooler Chigawa Kon lives on a small island and laments that she hasn't "fallen in love" yet, unlike her classmates. She often plays by "the Hole", a cave near the sea where a man-eating monster lives, according to folk tales.  
  
One day, as she meets with another girl who accidentally drops her smartphone in the sea, they fall from a cliff together but miraculously survive. It turns out Furuka is also all alone.  
  
Half chapters (10/12 pages) are published in Young Dragon Age (formerly Bessatsu Dragon Age/Dragon Age Extra), every 2 months, if the series isn't skipped.
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kono Yo wo Hana ni Suru Tame ni
description: Ryotaro is a boy who loves robots and lives out in the country with his three sisters but he's headed to Tokyo for high school. Before leaving, he runs across a humanoid military robot and has a fateful encounter with its pilot, a cute teenage girl who calls herself La Vie en Rose. Ryotaro will almost certainly meet her again in Tokyo, considering his family connection to the production of these humanoid robots–his father worked with them.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Harem

name: Rental Trash Girlfriend
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiro_y61294/status/1714491183240778129)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Blue Archive - Kankan's Blue Archive Logs (Doujinshi)
description: A collection of Blue Archive short comics by artist ポテトルス on pixiv.
tags: Action, Comedy, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Jo Ayoung is a university student who is a celebrity on social media, but who worries about other people's opinions.
She meets Kwak Joohyun, an underground rapper who doesn't care what others think of her.
The two become friends and later girlfriends, facing various challenges and adventures in university life.

(Source: MangaUpdates)
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Dorei to no Kiseki
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Ame no Ouji to Hana no Nie
description: The story goes that a prince slew the Dragon of Doom, saved a girl who was due to be sacrificed to it, and everyone in the country of Ryou lived happily ever after.  Yohira knows dragons are real - but she's not so sure about princes, as she faces being forced into being sacrificed to resurrect the Dragon of Doom by a wicked priest.  Five days before her sacrifice, she takes in an injured man, Jiu, that she finds outside her house and nurses back to health - and maybe something more.  But the day of the sacrifice draws closer - and with no princes on the horizon, Yohira must take control of her own destiny...
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ma Chérie
description:
After a heartbreak, a girl say yes to every girl confessing to her.

One day, she meets her Chérie at her school's infirmary.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: I'm the Only One With Genius DNA
description:
A status window appeared in front of Ryu Young-jun, a researcher at a pharmaceutical company.  
Rosalin's status window, an artificial cell that knows everything about biology.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EC%B2%9C%EC%9E%AC-DNA/2412)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64743)
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Oyasumi Fumi-san
description: Rinta, who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city, meets "Fumi-san," rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus, in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together, he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly... Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed—!? "I wonder how long you can keep being a good person, Rinta-kun...?" Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits, testing his self-control until it shatters.
tags: Psychological, Romance, School Life

name: Pure 0.01 mm
description:
Arata Tsuchiya, a company employee, reunites with Ako Hino, who used to be his classmate during his high school days, and ends up falling into bed with her. Being conscious about each other's feelings and motives, their erotic yet wholesome friend-with-benefits romantic comedy, in which they couldn't help but become sex friends, is about to unfold!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912964923103989)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem

name: Shutter Chance
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Aah Harimanada
description: When Harimanada makes his grand entrance into the world of Sumo, he causes complete uproar throughout the entire arena. The novelty headmask is clearly not a good idea but not content with just ruffling the feathers of all the spectators, he sends the the entire Sumo Association into a frenzy when he arrogantly declares that he will surpass the legendary Futabayama's consecutive run of 69 victories. Should he fail to achieve such a feat, he will immediately retire all together. Harimanada's impudent remarks cause a huge backlash as every high-ranking Yokuzuna wants the chance to knock him down and humiliate him for showing such arrogance. Thus begins Harimanada's journey to the top as he battles to topple the entire Sumo hierarchy!
tags: Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama

name: Ari no Ou
description: A talented nobody feels as if there's no challenge to him in this life. He feels as if life is too easy. But little does he know, his background actually holds more than he ever wished for. Can he face his destiny and accept what has been laid before him?
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - U149
description: U149, also known as "Under149", is a spinoff story of Cinderella Girls encompassing the younger idols, who are under 149 cm, and their pursuits to be big time idols with their newly hired P-san.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kanojo no Sore ni Yarareteru
description: A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Hang in There Kogasa-san (Doujinshi)
description: A webcomic series by Mizuki Hitoshi, telling comedically exaggerated stories from his own personal life, travels, and work in general. The (mostly) Touhou characters are all stand-ins for the artist and his friends.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Gomi Ika da to Tsuihou Sareta Shiyounin, Jitsu wa Zense Kenja desu ~Shijou Saikyou no Kenja, Sekai Saikouhou no Gakuen ni Kayou~
description:
One day, Gard, a servant of a count's family, was framed for a crime he did not commit and was fired from his job.

"You're worse than trash! Get out of this house immediately!"

Expelled from the Count's family and with nowhere to go, Gard saw a flyer recruiting students for Remillion Magic Academy and decided to take the entrance exam in the royal capital. It was said to be the most difficult exam to enter a magic academy, but Gard passed it with ease. How could this happen to Gard, who was just a servant?! Yes, in his previous life, Gard was actually the "strongest sage"!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Souzai Saishuka no Isekai Ryokouki
description: Takeru Kamishiro is an ordinary middle aged salaryman who was chosen by god to be reincarnated into a fantasy world in the body of a handsome young man in his prime. Takeru sets out to learn more about the world while gathering rare and interesting materials along the way to sell for money which he can use to gather even more materials ad infinitum.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Zenbu Kimi no Sei - Extras / After Story
description: Extras and After Story of [Zenbu Kimi no Sei](https://mangadex.org/title/82476383-e6a9-41a7-b98c-87cc8be9efbb/zenbu-kimi-no-sei), mainly centred around Ryou and Nagisa. (the Official Raws are free to view)
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: MAN OF RUST
description:
The “sixth sense” is the ability to perceive the providence of nature with one's “mind” and transform it into “power”.

The “Fallen World” at the bottom of the earth.

One day, Ruo, a boy who dreams of the skies, comes into possession of “relic iron” and comes across the carcass of an Ironman, a monster from the earth. However, it is a forbidden power that must not be touched! Aim for the earth's surface!

A ≪super-royalistic boys' manga≫ where a “sixth-sense-less” changes the world!!
___
[Official X](https://x.com/man_of_rust_)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: CULTURE SHOCK (Doujinshi)
description: The year is 2030 in Midnight City, USA. Josiah Jones, an ex-convict, faces the cruel changes that have undergone his home city. While crime, gang violence, and political corruption wreak havoc throughout the city, Josiah must find where he belongs in the world all the while facing strange humans with even stranger powers. This is a fan-creation inspired by the works of Hirohiko Araki in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure (ジョジョの奇妙な冒険)
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Doujinshi, Gore, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Knight Commander Wants to Monopolize the Former Glasses Girl
description:
I was caught up in a trip to another world and was treated as a nuisance, but the person who helped me was the commander of the Second Knights, Leon, who was super strong and handsome! He was blunt but kind and always took care of me. But why does he get so nervous when I take off my glasses?   
  
Melissa's popular high-tension love fantasy is finally available in comic form!   
  
Underneath the thick-rimmed glasses is a beautiful girl! The misfortune girl is loved with all her might by the knight commander who is full of possessiveness!
tags: Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Since childhood, Katsutoshi Himemiya often dreamed of a medieval world where knights protected the princess. He lived his life vaguely thinking, “Maybe I was a knight in a previous life,” but when he met Asako Kishi at his high school entrance ceremony, he realized that his previous life was as a princess and hers was as a knight...
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Guild Tsuihousareta Zatsuyou-gakari no Gekokujou ~Chou Bannou na Seikatsu Skill de Sekai Saikyou~
description:
Tim, a boy serving as an errand runner at a huge adventurer's guild, had been stuck at the beginner rank for three years and was subjected to insidious bullying. One day, his fate begins to dramatically change after being summoned by the guild leader, Guilne, as Tim, who had zero talent in both swordsmanship and magic, starts to turn his luck around...! 

Although he was framed and expelled from the guild, the beautiful guild leader who believes in him ends up following him for some reason. 

However, Tim had hidden talents that even she finds surprising...!
tags: Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ore no "Full Auto Buff" de Nakamatachi ga Sekai Saikyou ~Soko ni Iru Dake Mujikaku Musou~
description: One of a kind in the world - unique skills for a lifetime. Slad, who possesses "Fully Automatic Support" and "Fully Automatic Weakening," was fired from his party one day after being treated as an obstacle by the heroes. "Well, I guess they can do it without me." Slad tries to live a carefree adventurer's life with an elf girl, Echika. But without him, the heroic party struggles and the world is on the verge of extinction!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu
description: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
tags: Loli, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Ten years after being transported to another world.

It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first, felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan, after being unsuccessful for so long. It was then that a job offer found its way to him — it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Melody of Us
description: Kael and Baby are neighbors who have been friends since childhood. Kael is a shy and reserved boy, while Baby is an outgoing and passionate girl. When Baby meets Kai, Kael's older brother, she is instantly attracted to him. Kael is also interested in Beryl, Baby's older sister. The two decide to collaborate to help each other set up a relationship with their siblings, but Kael keeps a secret...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The weakest me, partying with two of the most powerful girls!?

After dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth, the concept of levels was inscribed on humanity. Levels were quantified, and as the law of the jungle became more and more prevalent, Level 0 Suzuki Hinata is the most discriminated against person in the world. Even though he's incompetent, he dreams of becoming a dungeon explorer, but for some reason Hinata suddenly becomes close to Kamui Hinata, a beautiful silver-haired girl with S-rank potential whom he meets at the high school he enrolls in?!

"Could the identity of the number one explorer be...?"
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Young Noel is the grandson of the empire's mightiest hero, and promised his dying grandfather to become the world's greatest Seeker. But Noel has been assigned to the weakest class of Seekers: a Talker, whose only skill is to enhance the abilities of others. How can he possibly find glory with only support skills? By being ruthless with them! Good, evil, it's all the same to Noel as he manipulates his allies, controls his friends, and outfoxes endless monsters from the deepest Abysses. Noel will stop at nothing to grow strong enough to save the world — and dominate it!
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Ichika Bachika
description: Mameda Wakatsu is a second-year student at Ohka Gakuen High School and the manager of the basketball club's 5th-string team. Despite his low-profile role, he harbors a secret: he is the son of the club's head coach, Shirakami Jin'ichi—a fact he desperately hides. When his talent is discovered by genius player Akuro Hajime, the duo teams up to challenge Jin'ichi's ironclad regime and revolutionize high school basketball!

name: Okitsune Gal Katabami-san
description:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is… a fox spirit!?

name: Stepmother's Friends
description: My mother passed away when I was young. Dad wanted to ease my pain, so he let me live a life without worry. Then suddenly one day, my father introduced me a young and beautiful woman he married because she coveted the man's property. Seeing her sincerely loving my father, I began to open my heart to her gradually, however…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Incest, Harem, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Extra's Academy Survival Guide
description:
Ed Rothstaylor is a third-rate villain in a game, disowned by his family and kicked out of the dormitory for his misdeeds. One day, our main character wakes up as this very Ed, and realizes he must earn a scholarship so he can graduate and be set for life. 

Now living in the woods, he resolves to keep away from the protagonists, but four of the female leads just won't leave him alone. Not only that, his presence starts to change the timeline and events of the game! 

Can Ed help the story progress while staying out of the limelight?

---
***Note:** LINE Webtoon (Official English) has made changes to the main character's "original emotional facial expressions" in some chapters like for examples, CH.01, CH.02 and CH.06 is changed while it's kept in all other official language platforms.*
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yuusha no Gawari ni Maou Toubatsu Shitara Tegara wo Yokodoroi Saremashita
description:
As a member of the hero's party, Arga hid his identity and was on a journey to subjugate the Demon King with the hero. At last the party chased the demon king, and Arga brought him down. However, the hero insists that he was the one who killed the Demon King, and then charges Arga with an innocent sin and banishes him from the Imperial Palace. The warrior who devoted his life to the hero as a part of his corp would walk a new life in a strange country town.

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6658ej/)
tags: Loli, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yamato wa Koi no Mahoroba
description:
College student Sanwa Honoka is ridiculed by male students for her plump figure. As her best friend gets the most out of college life, her only solace is the Ancient Tomb Study Group, where she can talk about her favorite things, surrounded by two laid-back male members. However, Honoka considers member Iida as a lover at a certain moment. A poetic psychological depiction of how a girl with low self-esteem finds spiritual support and matures.

---
Note: The series moved to Bunshun Online website in April 2022 and started releasing new chapters in June 2022. All 3 volumes that were published by Line, were released again by Bungei Shunjuu as shinsouban (new cover edition) as of September 2022.

A Jury Selection award winner in the Manga Section of the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Slice of Life

name: Mafia's Daughter: Operation Makeover
description: A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh, whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misunderstood girl named Saran.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka Gaiden - Sword Oratoria
description:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.

Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Kimi to Koete Koi ni Naru
description:
Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school, she meets Tsunagu, a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program, at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman, but as she gets to know him, she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However, some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen, and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly, they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says, "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged.

A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race?
Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Presepe Outside the Cage
description:
After countless regressions, Persepe finally conquers all five male protagonists in a harrowing reverse harem game. Just when she thinks she’s free, a message appears:  

*Secret Mode unlocked! Find the true male lead to escape.*  

Hope reignites — she only needs to woo the real protagonist to return to her original world. But there’s one problem...

"So… who’s the real male lead?"

With no clear answers and hidden challenges, Persepe must navigate shifting alliances, cryptic clues, and her own growing feelings. 

Can she uncover the truth and finally break free? Or will she remain trapped in the game forever?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Versus
description:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, Demons, invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear. In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom… or die trying!

**Award:** Won the 49th Koudansha Manga Award in the Shounen Division (2025).
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)

**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Mexico, and Brazil only.

name: Not found
description: Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets." When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Ibaraki Gojappe Quartet
description:
Ibaraki Prefecture ranked worst in Japan for attractiveness.

Ibaraki ranks first in the nation in the number of yankees.

If you get picked on in Ibaraki... your life is over!

Nobue Sarujima, born and raised in Tokyo, moves his family to Bando City, Ibaraki Prefecture, with a grand misunderstanding.

The grand misunderstanding develops into a very big mistake, and he makes a shocking debut as a new student.

City People Meets Ibaraki Prefecture!
A local loose-fitting daily comedy that will make you realize the charm of Ibaraki and love Ibaraki more!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Watashi wo Koroshita Wankokei Kishi-sama ga, Yandere ni Job Change shite Kyou mo Inochi wo Nerattekuru
description:
Tiana's engagement was broken off by the prince of her own country, and she was sentenced to exile. However, the knight of a neighbouring country, who was an aide to that country's prince, suddenly proposed to her. Since he was her type, Tiana accepted the marriage proposal and traveled with him to his country, but what awaited her was an unjust death. However, although she should have died, Tiana finds herself back when her engagement was broken and she was proposed to by the knight!

"Now... Now it's too late... I'll have to kill her."

The last words the knight spoke before killing her lingered in her mind. But Tiana doesn't want to die again! Terrified, she tries to refuse the marriage proposal, but she can't escape from the knight who has gone completely crazy! A cat-and-mouse rom-com about Tiana, whose memories construe murderous intent, and a knight who refuses to let her escape and gets more and more yandere...
___

name: Drifters
description: An isekai series from the creator of Hellsing. The story of Drifters begins during Japan's Sengoku Period (~1467-1600), a time of constant warring between the island's states. A samurai on the verge of death suddenly finds himself thrown into another, fantastic world, alongside important military figures from history. It's time to battle in a brand-new world war.
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Wonderful Pretty Cure!
description:
In Animal Town, humans and animals live together. Iroha is a young girl who loves animals and her close companion is her dog Komugi! One day, a mysterious creature GaruGaru goes berserk in the city. In order to protect Iroha, Komugi transforms into a human and not just any human, a Pretty Cure! These two Pretty Cures join forces to protect the berserk animals and return them to the Niko Garden.

(Source: Toei Animation USA)
tags: Animals, Comedy, Magical Girls, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Once Upon the Gates of Hell
description: There are four Magic Divisions in the military giant that is the Kingdom of Hiraith. The First Magic Division is the elite of the royal guard, the Second Magic Division is the field combat unit, the Third Magic Division is the research and development organization for magic and magical tools, and the Fourth Magic Division consists of those who have other unique skillsets. Among them, Levi was the most unusual, being a sorcerer incapable of using magic and having nothing he wanted to accomplish. In the midst of his days of mere subsistence and despair, Levi meets Prince Saphir, the 13th prince, who is known as the Moribund Prince. Levi, 16 years old, and 6-year old Saphir...it was a fateful encounter! In a royal palace full of malice, the two of them discover human warmth for the first time...
tags: Historical, Romance, Boys' Love, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Gacha Gacha ~Capsule~
description:
Lately, Kouhei can't get his friend Kurara out of his mind. Even though he has known her since elementary school, all of a sudden, ever since she came back from summer vacation, he has been crushing on her… hard.  
  
But something is different about Kurara–she's acting very oddly. Sometimes she seems wholesome, pure, and innocent, and at other times she is extremely forward and unabashed. Kouhei soon learns that Kurara has multiple personalities–and decides to help her keep her secret from their classmates. But Kouhei finds himself struggling between helping Kurara as a friend and trying to win her heart… which is a challenge, since she has many!  

---
  
English OOP from Del Rey ISBN for those who maybe interested in supporting the author.  
Vol 01: 9780345486219  
Vol 02: 9780345486226

name: Hamatora
description:
"Minimum" or "minor miracle"? special hereditary powers discovered only in an extremely limited number of humans. Those who possess such powers are known as "Minimum Holders."  
  
Partners Nice (Ryota Ohsaka) and Murasaki (Wataru Hatano) form a detective agency called "Hamatora" in Yokohama in 2014 ? but their "office" is a table at Cafe Nowhere where they and their friends wait for clients. An old acquaintance of theirs, a cop named Art (Hiroshi Kamiya), hires them for a serial murder case he is investigating, and they discover that the murder victims are all "Minimum Holders." As Minimum Holders themselves, Nice and Murasaki are drawn into this case, whether they like it or not.  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15752)
tags: Action, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Rookie Chef with the Magic Touch
description: Kang Sunghoon, the youngest member of a 4 star hotel kitchen in Korea, has the ability to memorise different kinds of ingredients. However, as the youngest, he's still unable to escape dishwashing duty.

description: Xia Xiaotao, a tone-deaf ordinary girl changes her body with Ling Xi, a superstar and her idol. After experiencing various types of chaos, accidents and setbacks, she gradually stars living a wonderful life in the entertainment circle by conquering different princes charming, and becoming a superstar famous in films, TV and singing!
