description: The student council president, who is big in all sorts of ways, can't refuse when asked to do something. She tries her best to do whatever it takes to help the students, so Vice President Tomoe-kun stops her from going too far. But all she wants is to be asked for a naughty request from Tomoe-kun...

name: Haru no Regista
description:
Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However, a new student, Osanai Satsuki, who admired Haru's past glory, appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club, which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))
tags: Sports, Girls' Love, School Life

description: When a brother takes the place of his younger sister, he becomes a "Blessed Maiden," charged with dispensing magic... with his body?! An otherworldly story of the relationship between an arrogant sorcerer and his "Blessed Maiden" (♂).

name: Tobari of the Dawn
description:
To create a paradise where humans and demons can coexist, a human and a demon strive in order to fulfill that dream. This is their story.

name: Not found
description:
On his very first day of starting high school, Namito Kominato's homeroom teacher has him sit behind a strange girl who wears a paper bag over her head and is always soaking wet with sweat. Her name is Samidare Kamiyama, a extremely shy girl with severe social anxiety. Ultimately, she meets Hinata Arai (the student council president who's kind and helpful, but alarmingly obsessed with her uniform) and Harusame Amano (a girl who only speaks to a cardboard cutout of a magical girl). These three unfortunate, but beautiful girls form a "conversation club", opening the curtain on this somewhat pitiful and comedic tale of adolescent romance!

[Alt official source](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/63800f8c032ad)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Osake to Senpai Kanojo to no Amaama Doukyo Lovecome wa Nijuusai ni Natte kara
description:
Living together with a naughty older girlfriend is full of excitement!

“Shall we try living together?”

That was the question my girlfriend Kureha Senpai asked me on the day I turned twenty.

From there, our lovey-dovey cohabitation began, and there’s practically zero distance between us!

Kureha Senpai, who loves alcohol, becomes even more enchanting and seductive once she starts drinking… my reasoning is about to explode!

The two of us, deeply caring for each other, grow bolder in our affection whether we’re drinking at home or out, using every trick in the book to flirt and get closer!

A slightly naughty and pure love comedy about two people who can’t contain their love for each other, living out their exciting days!
___
**Character Designer:** [Monoto](https://mangadex.org/author/96b3bbe2-e878-4dee-9573-26aadbc78b3f)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kono Koi, Okuchi ni Aimasu ka? ~Yuutousei no Shirahime-san wa Mondaiji no Ore to Mainichi Kiss shiteru~
description:
Nobody even tries to understand me...

I, Toui Kiminami, known as the number one troublemaker in school, have a dream for the future. And for that dream, I don't give a damn about anything else. But one day, everything changes when my father forces me into an arranged marriage. Her name is Lila Shirahime, the most beautiful girl in school and the top student, daughter of a company president and a popular model known as "S-Hime." Everything about her is the complete opposite of me. With a true nature very different from her outward appearance, she gets in the way of my dreams and even threatens to kiss me every single day, taking it upon herself to reform me.

This is bad. I need to do something about her quickly for the sake of my future... But it seems even the seemingly perfect and unbeatable Shirahime has circumstances forcing her to be that way...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Hole
description: The Glory Hole
tags: Psychological, Self-Published, Horror, Tragedy

name: Goodness Gracious Nantomo!
description:
The Iyahaya family, one of Japan's most prominent conglomerates based in Iyahate Prefecture, has decided to take care of a relative named Nantomo while his parents are transferred overseas. Iyahaya Sayoko can't help but be curious about her relative's boy of the same age. What kind of boy is this eccentric Nantomo?

In the meantime, a boy in a tattered coat appears before Sayoko's eyes, a poorly dressed eccentric person who eats their dog's food. When she asked him what his name was, he said, "Iyahaya Nantomo (Oh no... Not at all...)", how unclear. Sayoko and her grandmother hurriedly invited him into their house, convinced that he was their relative, Nantomo.

Even though he is not Nantomo, the head of the Iyahaya family, Totetsumo, decides to keep the poor, mysterious boy as the Nantomo and sends him to Kenkin school, the same school as Sayoko.

The school is in the state of Cold War between the Hatesate family conglomerate and the Iyahaya family conglomerate. With the arrival of Nantomo, the school is dragged into a great explosion of madness.
tags: Action, Comedy, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Military, Philosophical, Gore, School Life, Delinquents, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Mujintou de Elf to Kyoudou Seikatsu
description:
Kento (30 years old), won 1 billion yen in a lottery. In order to enjoy a nice slow life for the rest of his days, he bought a small uninhabited island off the coast of Southern Japan. However, one day he finds an unconscious woman on his beach that should not be there. When he runs up to check on her, he notices some rather sharp edges... The behaviors Elize brought from the other world are a little bit exciting for a normal guy like Kento...
___
**Links:**

name: Cross Account
description:
Say hello to Daichi, a.k.a. Mr. Harmless. Because of his compulsive need to be liked, he never makes waves and maintains an easy going attitude. So easy going, everyone thinks he's a dud. But online he's a stud! His angry otaku online persona has garnered him thousands of followers! But real life and online life are two very different things. A lesson he's going to learn the hard way!
___
Included one-shots:
- Volume 2: [Haru yo, Koi!: Fuyu-hen, Haru-hen](https://mangadex.org/title/0de39efd-86b2-4738-85ba-95c0ab402a0e)

name: Ajin Sharehouse
description:
The communicative, corporate animal Kei Sato applies to move into a share house in order to make friends with whom he can have casual conversations. The three people there were Chiyuki Himiiyama (Snow Woman), Meme Janome (Medusa) and Melodrama Incuria (Incubus). This was a share house exclusively for subhumans, who were supposed to be invisible to humans...

The share house life begins with a lot of difficulties ahead!

(Source: Mangaupdates)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Konoyo no Hate no Seireigoroshi ~Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Boukensha, Densetsu no Ryuusei to Keiyakushite Saikyou ni Itaru~
description: "Spirit Contract" is the ability to make a contract with a powerful spirit and receive its divine protection. However, Kyle, who possesses a strange and "mysterious flame," accidentally burns a spirit to death and is banished from his party. Filled with despair, Kyle begins the journey back to his hometown. Along the way, he comes across a girl being attacked by a monster. He tries to help, but without a "Spirit Contract," he is too powerless... Just when things seem hopeless, the girl suddenly reveals her true identity. She is a legendary "Dragon Spirit"?!
tags: Action, Fantasy

name: Kyuutei Kajishi no Shiawase na Nichijou: Black na Shokuba wo Tsuihou Saretaga, Ringoku de Koushaku Reijou ni Dekiaisarenagara White na Seikatsu Okurimasu
description:
A popular slow life romantic comedy!

Fake, a court blacksmith who is very serious about his work, was bullied every day by his colleagues and boss.

Fake, who worked hard on blacksmithing no matter how much he was bullied, suddenly gets picked up as the fiancé of the daughter of the Duke of the neighboring country, Alicia!? He is provided an environment where he can work freely and demonstrate his talent.

When it was time to pay the debt off, a mysterious gal appeared and offered to pay off their debt. A big burden was almost off Kanakura's head, but the gal made a condition in return which stated that—

name: Sachiiro no One Room Gaiden - Seikai no Meitantei
description:
This is the story of Detective Matsubase three years before he fatefully meets xxx.

Hijiri Matsubase finally quits the police force and fulfills his dream of running his own detective agency. However, life isn't smooth sailing as it seems and the poor guy is in massive debt after getting scammed. Luckily, or unluckily for Matsubase… Aketoyo, the son of a billionaire reaches out to him for a deal. "Entertain me, I'll pay you $100,000 per case." A deal with the devil can be oh so enticing.  
(source: AOC Translations)
tags: Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Gwichon Village Mystery
description:
Mumyeong Heo’s grandmother passed away years ago. But when he visits her home to spend some time in the quiet countryside, he notices that someone kept it clean all this time.
His new neighbors aren’t exactly thrilled by his visit. In fact, most of them don’t want him around.
But that’s when his nasty neighbors go missing one by one… for better or worse.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Horror, Police, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Monster Daycare
description:
On my 8th grade summer break,  I arrived at my grandma’s house to find it turned into a daycare? A tone-deaf mermaid, a timid zombie a hectic daily life as I take care of these monsters with unique traits. Although, I can’t seem to get used to this job, I’ll try my best!
A cute and heartwarming monster-daycare comedy!
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Zombies, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: King
description: Miho is a gearhead, Hiroshi is her brother and Keisuke is a teacher. But one thing they have in common is that they're in love with cars and racing! So when rumors begin that the famous king of touge racing has returned, Miho and the others are determined to do whatever it takes to take the crown!
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports

name: Isekai'd into a Convenience Store
description: She was once a proud elf adventurer from a mystical realm. Now? She's a tired convenience store clerk addicted to gacha games, anime, and Coca-Cola Zero. Trapped in modern Japan with no way back, our cute-yet-pathetic elf isekai’d straight into a life of minimum wage, follow Elf-san as she navigates the absurdity of otaku life, retail hell, and existential dread—with some unexpected moments of drama slapping her in the face like a surprise SSR pull.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The Rabbit Princess is the princess of the Rabbit Kingdom.
Her daily life is surrounded by many animals; it is a very heartwarming and cute life... but that's not all!
Cute things can be poisonous too!?
This surreal fairy tale manga is heartwarming, yet it never lets you relax for a single panel. A roller coaster ride of relaxation and tension, that will become an addictive experience!

name: The Case of Selecting a Joseon Queen
description: Eul, the most eligible bachelor in Joseon, was ordered by the king to investigate five noble young women who had not submitted their names for the royal selection process. To find a suitable queen among them, he made a deal with Seo-gyeong, the most skilled apa (a woman who sells goods to the royal court), and they began their journey to find a queen, disguised as a married couple…

description:
Large numbers of monsters come out the gate which is the boundary of the world. After many sacrifices, People won the fight against monsters through their awakening. Jin Taekyung is alive as an 'F class hunter' which is the lowest level. After Jin has a hard time, he gets an old capsule then he goes into the capsule that is the martial heroes' world. And the game system gives him special abilities, he starts growing up to become the best martial hero.

name: Hori-san to Miyamura-kun
description:
The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---

description: The beloved girlfriend he thought he had broken up with is somehow at his house. But she’s hiding a secret...

name: The Demon of Rashomon
description: Six fantastic tales from classic Japanese literature as interpreted by horror manga master Hideshi Hino. The narrative power of these tales, and in particular the frightening scenery of Rashomon, has inspired, and continues to inspire, artists from the most diverse disciplines of art such as the celebrated writer Ryunosuke Akutagawa and the great director Akira Kurosawa. "The Demon of Rashomon" represents one of the pinnacles of auteur manga capable of combining two seemingly irreconcilable elements: the formal sophistication of traditional Japanese storytelling and the violence of the horror genre.
tags: Historical, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Samurai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy

name: Patalliro!
description:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.
tags: Action, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crime, Adventure, Military, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Detective Conan
description: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Police, Mystery

name: The Duke's Hidden Baby: BOGO!
description:
He has the absolute power. He kills without hesitation and is a cold, fickle man. Yet he becomes obsessed with her and dotes on her nonstop.  
  
The first time they met, he asked, “Was it you, six years ago?”  
  
The second time they met, he’s holding onto the DNA test, “You still dare to say he’s not my son?”  
  
The n time they met, “Mr. Duke, do you have an end to this?”  
The guy smiled with a deep charm, “The second child have yet to be born. Of course, there’s no end to this.”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The engagement between Scarlet, a noblewoman from a ducal family, and Second Prince Kyle was suddenly annulled during a ball. She had been falsely accused of harassing a girl called Terenezza, daughter to a baron, whom the Prince doted on heavily. Condemned by everyone around her and forced to burden all manner of crimes, she finally decided enough was enough.

"Before I leave here, may I please ask you just one last thing?"

As the crowd threw their boos and jeers, and that good looking guy flung his insults── her palm spun like a drill and the ballroom floor was stained with blood. From her fists, their reckoning!

name: Not found
description: Due to a mistake by a goddess, the overly kindhearted office worker Fuyuya Satori meets an untimely end. As an apology, he’s granted an appraisal-type skill and reborn in another world as a ten-year-old boy named Toya. But with almost zero knowledge of fantasy worlds, Toya’s second life seems off to a shaky start… Yet his gentle, polite nature soon draws the attention of skilled adventurers, merchants, and guild members alike. What’s more, the skill he received as an apology turns out to be an infinitely evolving, overpowered gift! A story of a pure-hearted yet secretly cheat-powered boy finding warmth, bonds, and adventure in another world— the heartwarming fantasy now brought to life in manga form!
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: M Collection
description:
This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

Note: there were 37 total chapters published in the magazine, only 16 got collected. It ended in January 1998.

name: 10 Nengo ni Sukuwareru Mob desu ga, 10 Nenkan mo Shiitagerareru Nante Iya nano de Ima sugu Nigedashimasu
description: Young Countess Lilyjen, overcome with grief at the death of her mother, is suddenly flooded with memories of a past life. She realizes that she has been reborn into the world of her favorite novel, one she knew by heart, complete with a setting book, collection of illustrations, and even an anime adaptation. But as she settles in, Lilyjen discovers something shocking: in this world, she is not the heroine... but the heroine's half-sister (mob!)! Memories of the plot flash through her mind like a kaleidoscope, and the fate that awaits her is cruel—to be rejected by her own family, to end up responsible for a noble house in decline and a sick and ruined father.  ———Unacceptable! Upon awakening along with her memories, Lilyjen also discovers a power: healing magic. "I will use this power above all else, for you, my dear brother Theobald!" Determined to change her tragic future, Lilyjen leaves her childhood home and sets off for the border marquis Ashgyle, her uncle, to save Theobald, her cousin who is on the verge of death after overusing his magic...!? A small feeling gives rise to a mad passion, from which there is no escape once it has taken hold! Love envelops love, and devotion grows ever stronger—♥️ A sweet, syrupy, and completely captivating love story!♥️
tags: Romance

name: Eternal Club
description:
Chen Li works at Mo city, he works there every day with no hope to be seen for the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability, an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people, sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!

name: The Delinquent and the Gangster Heiress
description:
The rough and wild delinquent, Jang Tae-ho, gets dragged off to his grandma’s countryside house on the very first day of summer break, thanks to his parents’ brilliant plan (or maybe a scheme).
Waiting for him there is none other than the gangster heiress, Min Ju-a!

With a gun pointed straight at a stunned Tae-ho, Ju-a declares:
“I kidnapped you to make you my underling.”

And so begins the chaotic, action-packed summer break of the delinquent Jang Tae-ho and the gangster heiress Min Ju-a!

name: Manager Kim Hates Idols
description:
A five-year employee at Hanpyeong Industries, Kim Yi-Wol, a proxy fan of his manager's daughter, has been working unpaid overtime as a proxy fan for five years. 

He collapses after hearing the news of his group's disbandment. When he opens his eyes, he finds himself back in his 20s, with no dark circles under his eyes. He's given the task of invalidating his sister's death by having to debut with the group he proxy-fancied, Spark. 

Failure is met with the dreaded additional condition: re-employment at Hanpyeong Industries and the inability to change jobs. 

With the grim determination and grit honed through his experience as a proxy fan, HR team member, and various other chores, he's determined to debut and then quit!
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian
description:
After spending nine years on Dungeon and Stone, the role-playing game that no player has ever beaten, Lee Hansoo finally reaches the dungeon of the final boss.

As soon as he opens the gate, however, he suddenly sees a message that says his tutorial has been completed and finds himself in the body of Bjorn Yandel, a real barbarian within the game.

An exciting adventure awaits him as he endeavors to abide by the laws of the fictional world!

----

However, his classmate, Hodaka, a pushy big-horned demon, found out his secret. On top of that, he kissed and tasted him…Charming a demon—a troublesome situation?! Surrendering to one's instinct and pleasure leads to…

name: Lychee☆Light Club
description: A group of nine boys (called the Hikari Club) are intent on making the Ultimate AI. The attractive leader of the club, Zera, is a twisted man polluting the minds of the club members to make them do whatever he pleases. Tamiya, the original founder of the club, wants to reclaim the club. Niko, the second in command, is pissed off at Jaibo, the one obsessed with Zera. They kidnap a schoolgirl, but the AI Raichi falls in love with her and she with him, and things get messy.

name: Ponkotsu Kawaii Mamiya-san: Shanai no Bijin Kouhou ga Tonari no Seki ni Isuwaru Ken
description:
"I know I'm a bit of a weeb, but I'm looking forward to working with you!"

Ms. Mamiya, a senior employee with big breasts and a beautiful face, has moved into the seat next to Fujishiro, a working adult in the shadows. While hiding the fact that he is "Nisemono-san," an influencer whom Mamiya-san admires, he weaves a gem of an office love comedy with Mamiya-san and other unique heroines such as her colleague, a cool beauty, and a high school girl who is a good tease!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo, Ryoute ni Ken wo~
description: A young boy named Mikazuki Kenya was abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude. At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming. A meeting with Kaguya and Reina, the heroines from the immensely popular game Knight of Giant. The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them. However, in the story, one of them is destined to die. To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world. Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of Knight of Giant?!
tags: Action, Romance, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation

name: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu
description: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid café. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.

Yotsuya-kun joined the Discipline Committee in order to get closer to Shirogane-san, yet he can't read her facial expressions at all. Shirogane-san is always hiding her face behind her mask, but what may be the reason? Rom-Com shenanigans ensue.

name: Kinnikuman Lady
description:
Meat has been the trainer of the great Choujin superhero Kinnikuman for long. He thought his job was done helping his greatest subject become a master Choujin and king of his homeworld. But…what if upon waiting for his next subject, the little trainer was sent to another world?…  
  
A world where Kinnikuman has yet to become a great hero… and a world where he is… female!?  
  
Welcome to the world of Kinnikuman Lady! A world that promises to be as bizarre and exciting as the one of the original Kinnikuman.

name: Not found
description:
Kaede Minato, the cool literature girl, is admired by her classmates for her elegant appearance. Momoko Hattori, a cute girl with an adorable face, quickly became an idol among her peers shortly after she entered high school.

Despite having little connection, they quickly grow closer after Momoko finds Kaede in a particular situation...

A story of two girls experiencing a love that is not quite love yet.

name: The Demon Emperor Ex-Husband Has Resurrected
description: In order to escape the confines of life in the harem, Liang Jian travels a thousand years into the future. During an archaeological dig, the tomb of Emperor Sheng is unearthed, and his body is put on display in a museum. Hoping to finally sever his ties to the past, Liang Jian visits the museum to say his last goodbye to Sheng Mingzhou. But unexpectedly... Sheng Mingzhou is resurrected?!
tags: Time Travel, Official Colored, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Despite Coming From the Abyss, I Will Save Humanity
description:
The Abyssals represent pure destruction. They have unparalleled power and follow their instinct to remove all life from the world. However, one day, a traitor appeared among them. Silvija, a clueless girl, woke up on the battlefield and learned that she is the "Twilight Abyssal" that the humans hate. After escaping numerous pursuits, Silvija was adopted by the Ilia family and gradually formed her conviction.
*She will save mankind using the body of an Abyssal. She will protect the kindness and warmth she received.*
However, it seems the Will of the Abyssals does not intend to succumb to her...

"Miss Silvija, it's time to display your power."
"Eh~ but I hafen't finifed my defferts yet..." Still a Chad as ever.
PS: The protagonist is single. Feel free to tease her~
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Koukando ga Mieru you ni natta n da ga, Heroine ga Count Stop shite iru Ken
description: High school student Kirisaki Touma can view his affinity stats with other individuals after an incident. Acquaintances are around 30; friends are around 70. Even though he is confused about these affinity statistics, he found out that one of the four goddess at school, Kujou Momoka, has maxed out the affinity count-!? The perfect girl has fallen in love with me, why?!

name: Splatter Zone
description:
The bloody Splatter Zone reveals people's dark sides. A series of blood-pumping, flesh-pulsating short stories await you...

Mommy had a baby in her belly.
One night, I overheard a conversation between Mommy and Daddy... They said that they were going to kill me because they were going to give birth to a real child... Am I destined to be killed from birth?
tags: Monsters, Anthology, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Otonari no Onee-san wa XXX Shitai
description: Naoto, who gets treated terribly by his parents, has Naruko, a beautiful lady, show up at his doorstep and starts living next to him as his neighbor. Naruko seems to be kindly accommodating Naoto, but her actions are somewhat "unnatural"...
tags: Psychological, Horror, Shota, Mystery

name: Houkago Hero
description:
Naruse Hiroya is an ordinary high school student, but his normal daily life is often ruined by his friend Kokutou Miyabi. Miyabi has an intense personality, and he constantly drags Hiroya and their other friends at school (level-headed Wasshi and Katarun of the vision-obscuring hair) into the most ridiculous situations!

(Source: MangaHelpers)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Housekishou no Maid
description: The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where "a maid sells jewels". Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.
tags: Philosophical, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Dark Castle
description: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Kuro no Shoukanshi
description:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Modoki-domo
description: Author's comment: "A heartwarming four-panel depiction of the daily lives of those who could not become either human or monster." (MTL)
tags: 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Welcome to Japan, Ms. Elf!
description:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed. Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo?
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Sensei! Boku-tachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.
description:
Teachers are entrusted with the sacred duty of guiding and protecting their students—but not undercover assassin Mr. Solo. In a world where magic users and non-users coexist, he walks a solitary path as the wizard hitman "Number Zero." His latest mission: pose as a magic instructor for the unruly, bottom-tier, second-year students of Class D. To complicate things, he’s saddled with a new partner—a transfer student with the same deadly assignment.

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy

name: Free Life: Isekai Nandemoya Funtouki
description:
*The story is adapted from the light novel of the same name.*

Sayama Takahiro, a carefree high school student, was transported to a fantasy world identical to the one in a VR Game. His go-with-the-flow attitude eventually overpowered his desire to return home, and now he runs Free Life, a small business dedicated to fulfilling the requests of its customers. Assisted by the hard-working Yumiel, what kinds of jobs will Sayama end up doing? If only someone would hire him to sleep till noon.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Prejudice
description: The star of a male idol group who has a cold demeanor, who also has no control in restraining himself. And an idol with a harmless and childlike cutesy personality on cameras and is able to stay in character, but is an complete opposite off-stage… They're sworn enemies that hate each other and somehow ends up having to act like a couple with each other as fan service?! Yup, Looks sweet!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Music, Full Color

name: Neorika: Who Is My Enemy
description: This is just my first step into the world of manga writing. I’d be delighted to read all of your comments, thoughts, and advice on how I can improve myself further. Thank you so much for reading.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Ninja, Samurai, Self-Published, Office Workers, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: utopia
description: In 2045, extreme summer weather and A.I. automation have transformed daily life. As traditional summer culture fades away, children of this generation find themselves yearning to experience the intense heat of summers past...
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Philosophical

name: Lulu's Hell House
description:
A notorious property with a hidden past is now in the hands of Dan, a sharp and talented real estate agent.
The place? A manor that once belonged to the affluent Midnight family—whose bloodline vanished over a century ago.

(Source: Square Enix, translated)
tags: Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Doctor-patient relationship
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Web Comic

name: I think I like you
description: Not found
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Digimon Dreamers
description: One day, Ritsu Kodo, a country boy, is sent into the world of the game he is playing, the Digital World! There, he meets the Digimon Pulsemon he created in the game!! Ritsu was baffled by the sudden turn of events, but when he learned that his partner Pulsemon had summoned him as his Tamer to break the 'cannot evolve' curse, he promised cooperation in evolution...!!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy

name: To Aru Myouto no Nichijou
description: Kinu-san, a girl who's come to the Fujidana family as a bride, thinks of her husband as a man who lazes around everyday, but as she gets to know him she starts to think "My Husband has a bigger heart than I thought"
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun wo Tanoshinde Iru
description:
Nora Nose, the "Nonpareil Villainess" , has been sealed away for 800 years for her crimes.
Her latest amusement is using her Farsight magic to see into the world of school.

One day, while gazing into the school as usual, she hears a voice pleading for help:
"I want to die..."
"If you want to die, why don't you leave your body to me?"

Nora possesses the voice's owner body, Cecily, also known as "Withered Grass Lady."
She must work to improve the situation surrounding of she, who was once bullied!

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330650682304831), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9868hy/)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Oujodeshitaga Kossori Ryuu Kishidan no Senzoku Kusushi ni Narimashita!
description:
Rotte, who had been an apprentice pharmacist in a remote town, unexpectedly discovers that she is actually a princess of the Kingdom of Sironia. She is welcomed into the royal palace, but life in the unfamiliar court feels stifling. While secretly entering the Dragon Knights’ order under a false identity, she ends up becoming the Dragon Knights’ dedicated pharmacist due to their shortage of personnel.

Even while hiding her true identity, Rotte finds herself drawn to the earnest yet clumsy commander of the knights, Reginald. Amidst all this, Rotte and Reginald become embroiled in a conspiracy within the royal palace――.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Magic, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Anaaki-bukuro wa Wasuregachi
description: When a forgetful man forgets everything, will he lose it all in the end?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: Hidari Jingoro
description: Based on the life of real life historical figure/potentially mythological artist Hidari Jingoro. Jingoro is an extremely talented woodworker, sculptor, painter, wordsmith, you name it. But when his lover, Osen suddenly falls ill he must use his artistic skills to make her healthy again.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Ten Billion Yen Man
description: An ordinary office worker, Takuya Tomizawa, promised his future to his girlfriend, Kazumi Hirose. However, one day, Tenzen Kugayama , who is the head of the Kugayama Zaibatsu and has enormous financial power and power, is forced to shoulder a debt of 10 billion as a joint guarantor for his mother who has evaporated . From this time on, the battle between Takuya's Hell and Kugayama Tenzen began. In front of Takuya, a variety of women, such as Yang Mei Chuan, who is young and the top of the overseas Chinese, the cute Maejima Marie, the active Naoko Mimura, the intelligent Kaori Hayami, and the daughter of Tenzen, Saki Kugayama. It becomes a partner, an enemy, and finally a story of economic reform involving the financial industry. The main focus is a money war between the weak and the strong that makes use of the author's career, but it is also characterized by many women getting involved with the main character, Takuya Tomizawa.
tags: Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Dìqiú Rén Shízài Tài Xiōngměng Le
description:
Fifty years ago, Dracon City fell into another dimension. Despite having to fight and defend themselves alone, they held fast to the banner of Earth and stood tall against the terrifying Exbeasts found within the Altermension.

Fast forward to the present day, Meng Chao was reborn. Much to his surprise, he found out that he could become stronger by contributing to society. He then decided that he would become the most powerful of them all, wipe out every single Exbeast, and conquer the entire Altermension.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hibike! Euphonium - Kitauji Koukou Suisougakubu e Youkoso
description: The Kitauji high school wind instrument club had at one time participated in national tournaments and was a champion school, but after the club's adviser changed, they have not been able to even participate in the qualifying tournament. Under the strict leadership of Taki, a substitute for Ms. Rikako, they steadily build up their strength. As they fight over who plays solos, some students give priority to studying and quit club activities. Finally, the long wished-for day of the contest arrives.
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The "Red" Comet, the Black "Tri-Star," and the Blue "Giant" -- we are the "Red Giant Tri-Stars"!

Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon forces's "Wandering Group" were retreating. Somehow, they will make it up into space and rejoin their comrades... Meanwhile, a Federation Forces unit known as the Red Giants Tri-Stars are making a name for themselves!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure

name: Being Targeted by Hyena-chan
description: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Maou-sama no Machizukuri! ~Saikyou no Dungeon wa Kindai Toshi~
description: Beings that create and control monsters and demons, beings that build and reign over malicious labyrinths, the chosen individuals to possess an overwhelming Unique Skill... They are the Demon Lords. Demon Lords entice people to come to the labyrinth they've built and eat the people’s despair as their nourishment. However, Creation Demon Lord Procell has decided that he will obtain people's hopes and not their despair as nourishment, and built a happy town instead of a malicious labyrinth to collect human beings.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Life of Pyonko
description:
A collection of the Pyonko and Friends mini-stories taken from the Author's X (Formerly Twitter) and Patreon accounts.

Uploaded out of chronological order.
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They're dismayed to see he's useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself. His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: The Villainess Lives Again
description: From childhood, Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer, she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water, but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Pulitzer - Amuro Ray Beyond the Aurora
description: In UC0095, following the events of Char's Counterattack, Kikka Kobayashi gathers testimonies about Amuro Ray to show the world the kind of person he was.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Nevermore
description: There is nothing definitive about life after death, except the involuntary enrollment at the mysterious Nevermore Academy. Now Lenore and Annabel Lee must begin their curriculum to recover the memories of their tragic demise. Between the Dean's macabre demeanor and the tell-tale dangers of Final Exams, both girls must learn to rely on one another and their newly acquired ghost forms, or Spectres, to not only graduate from the academy… but to earn a second chance at life.
tags: Magic, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Nigasanai yo? Fukuroji-kun
description: The story revolves around Fukuroji, a high school boy who tries to live in the shadows. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when, as part of a punishment game, he has to confess his love to the most popular girl in his class. Through a misunderstanding, he ends up confessing his feelings to Tsubaki Sakura, the most feared girl in school. As he tries to clear up the confusion, Tsubaki surprisingly attacks him, adding an unexpected and hilarious twist to the situation.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Love Life
description:
After his live-in girlfriend breaks up with him, Santa Hayashiya runs away from his apartment at night because he can no longer afford the rent. A classmate, Junko Sakurada, invites him to move in with her and her brother, but the relationship between the Sakurada siblings seems... strange. 
A story of yearning and people that want to love and be loved.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Saltiness
description: 31 year old Takehiko Nakamaru has trained all his life to never be disturbed by anything that the world throws at him, no matter what comes at him, he will remain unfazed. He had conquered "life" and was living in perfect harmony. But when he realizes that his existence in the house inhibits his sister from getting married, his peaceful life is thrown off balance. In his panicked state, he leaves the house for Tokyo in his journey to slay the monster that is called "life".
tags: Animals, Comedy, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yome ga Kuru!
description: The unpopular science student Yukito Takiguchi develops the ultimate matching system. Then, a beautiful woman appears before him, claiming to be his wife...!?
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Harem

name: Darashinai Cupid-chan…

description: A story about a girl and her crossdressing boyfriend.

name: The Best Lover
description:
In Sakura Shiori's "The Best Lover," two women who, for different reasons, haven't found love with men end up falling in love with each other. 

(**RAPE** warning in an early page)
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love

name: Demon Spirit Seed Manual
description:
Yuan Ding, an otaku, was transported to another world. After taking Shuo Yue Academy's entrance exam, Yuan Ding's life in another world begins, aiming to collect the Demon Spirits said to exist in the legends. A lighthearted, comedy and harem manhua.

[Official English: Season 2](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/fairies-cultivation-manual-s2_20785533706975401)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: 3-Gumi no Osananajimi
description: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference,' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences,' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Neko to Futari no Kamakura Techou
description: Ryo and Mihoko are a newly married couple who move to Kamakura… but they are not alone in this adventure, because they are accompanied by their five cats! The seven make up the entire Katagiri family.
tags: Slice of Life

name: PenSis Twitter Shorts
description: A collection of Twitter shorts posted under the pen姉 (@pensis_x) account.
tags: Doujinshi

name: The Nocturnal Reading Room
description:
A collection of **early** works by Not Osada that makes fresh blood jump like rose petals!!! Inspired by Tokyo Grand Guignol plays such as Litchi Hikari Club. 

This is the preferred adaptation of the cast. **Some** stories have homoerotic themes.

Works:

TLH-25 ***[トルハイト―25]***
Eien Shōjo ***[永遠少女]***
Paradise Snow ***[パラダイス・スノー]***
Kyōsō Byōin ***[狂想病院]***
Das Blut - Ketsueki - ***[ダス・ブルート―血液―]***
Yume no Object ***[憧憬(ゆめ)のオブジェ]***
Hiiro no Koro ***[緋色の頃]***
Jinta☆Jinta ***[ジンタ☆ジンタ]***
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Anthology, Crime, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: A Nameless Flower
description: Young Ruan, the little lord of House Marcellion, has never had an easy childhood. With his older brother constantly feigning illness, the burden of the harsh heir’s training falls squarely on his small shoulders. One day, unable to take it any longer, Ruan dashes out of the mansion and loses himself in the forest. There, he stumbles upon a boy his own age. They don’t exchange names, and yet none of that seems to matter. With him, even nibbling on grass becomes an adventure. Ruan finds himself laughing, playing, and perhaps for the very first time, feeling free. Day by day, his thoughts drift further from the rigid lessons of succession and closer to the warmth of that kindhearted boy. But gossip spreads quickly, and soon even the stern Count Marcellion hears whispers of his son’s wandering heart… Could a simple forest friendship change the path of an heir?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Tank Chair
description:
Protecting his sister Shizuka from a bullet, the strongest assassin Nagi Taira falls into a coma. Against all odds, he regains his consciousness... but only when faced with killing intent!
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10517/episode/349974) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Mexico, and Brazil only.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Gore

name: Not found
description:
My name is Suzaki Aiichirou, a lone wolf and I live to fight! However, one day an annoying girl came to my house and challenged me to a duel… and since that day on my life has completely changed. This is a story about the birth of a brand-new world.

---
**Notes:**
- The chapter number resets with each volume.

description: A true story about the creation of the camera.

name: Seeing Through You
description: Sumi bears a birthmark on her face. Meanwhile, the most popular student in her class seems to be having fun every day, even after catching the mysterious "transparency disease"...
tags: Oneshot, Drama, School Life

name: Absolute Ben 10
description: Not found

name: Haikei, Tengoku no Neesan, Yuusha ni Natta Mei ga Ero Sugite —— Ojisan, Hogosha Toka Sorosoro Muri Desu+
description: Angel, a former top-tier mercenary, was forced to retire due to an injury. Left by his fiancée, he now spends his days drowning in alcohol—a middle-aged adventurer (and a virgin). One day, his niece Liz, whom he once taught swordsmanship, suddenly barges into his life! Angel is bewildered by how she has grown into an astonishingly beautiful girl, but Liz pays no heed to his hesitation and boldly declares that she will become his wife—?!
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Incest, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Momogusa-san ga Monogusa Sugiru!!
description: Souji Hataki, an ordinary high school boy, ends up working part-time as a housekeeper at the house of Momogusa, the most beautiful girl in school!! Momogusa-san is a perfect girl who is talented at both academics and sports, but at home she becomes super lazy?! For some reason, she grows fond of Hataki and lets her guard down around him enough to let him pamper her?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Galge no Sekai de Shinyuu ♂ ga Ore o Sukida to Iidashite!?
description: Aoi, a hard-headed young man secretly yearning for love. When playing the harem game he secretly bought in his best friend Ritsuki’s house, he somehow gets sucked into the game’s world with Ritsuki! While understanding that if they don’t clear the game they can’t leave, Aoi decides to try his best in romancing one of the girls, but suddenly Ritsuki confesses to him…? The story between a whole hearted ikemen childhood friend x a hard headed young man who secretly yearns for love virtually unfolds!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Isekai

name: My Daughter Is a Dragon!
description: Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request, Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school, and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful, Jihoon loves his little girl, and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...
tags: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Koritsu-hen
description:
Late April 2097—the use of strategic-class spells doesn’t stop with the Brazilian military, as the Great Asian Alliance deploy Thunderclap Tower in the Gulf of Guinea. Magic fans the flames of war, which soon engulf the entire world. As public opinion inevitably turns against magicians as a whole, Edward Clark, a researcher of the USNA, proposes an expansive space development endeavor called the Dione Project to promote the peaceful use of magic. Taurus Silver’s name appears on the list of chosen candidates, which leads to people uncovering the truth—that this is in fact Tatsuya, throwing him and Miyuki into yet another trial.

Adaption of Light Novel 23.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
What would you do if you have reincarnated into a vulnerable wolf pup? Need an answer, now!

For survival, Chiye chose to wag his tail and address the vampire nemesis “Papa”, living a miserable, meaningless life. Chiye: Fucking stupid idiot (arwoo arwoo papa) Fan Shiye: Good, become my noble pet! Poop Shoveller x Noble Pet — what kind of sparks will fly between the two who used to be enemies in this life? And will Chiye reclaim everything that was rightfully his in his previous life?
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Midnight Coin Laundry
description: An introverted young woman focused on her art makes a connection at a laundromat.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy

name: Asahina-san no Bentou Tabetai
description: It was surely not love, but it was definitely love. One day, high school student Seiya Maki fell in love at first sight with a bad-looking lunch box prepared by the most beautiful girl in her class, Arisa Asahina. "I want to eat your lunch, so I want you to go out with me". Arisa feels ridiculed by his confession and angrily rejects Seiya, but she is gradually drawn to his unabashed innocence and the kindness with which he accompanies her through her troubles. However, one day Arisa discovers Seiya's secret that he can't tell anyone... Where will their relationship go, and why is Seiya attracted to Arisa's bento? Sad, bitter, loving and beautiful. A coming-of-age story.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Deck Hitotsu de Isekai Tanbou
description:
Tohru Yanagi, aka BYDE, is an obsessive gamer with a penchant for fantasy tropes. It should come as no surprise, then, that after playing his favorite VR game "Last Fantasy" for 100 hours straight, his heart gave out and he died. 

In the endless void after death, he met Celuenon, the god of gaming. Intrigued by his skills, Celuenon invites him to the world of Krenaklem, a land of swords and sorcery and all of those typical isekai tropes. Tohru accepts, and naturally is sent to another world. 

So what's the catch this time, you might ask? In lieu of giving him any skills from Last Fantasy, Tohru instead was gifted a deck from "Monster and Magic Masters" - a physical card game he used to play in the past. And just like the trading card game, as long as he has the required mana he can summon any card from his deck, ranging from monsters to his faithful wolfgirl assistant Waff. 

Anyway, by now you get the jist of it. If you made it to the end of this synopsis, you know exactly what you're getting into - and you've likely already committed to reading this. Don't let me stop you.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Not found

name: Not found
description: Saku Himura, who hates bothersome women. Kohaku Minase, a handsome womanizer. Hazuki Kazatani, awkward around women. Appearing before these three university students having problems with girls was none other than Mira, the "goddess of love"! But as luck would have it, it turned out she was a naive, good-for-nothing goddess! Thanks to her powers, they become overly attractive, or even change genders, and it’s utter chaos! With a persistent succubus and a woman from their past showing up too, will the three of them be able to protect their peaceful everyday life?
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Supernatural

name: 13years
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Philosophical, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Homecoming

name: Kaiikai
description: Rei Inou, a disillusioned young woman who, driven by existential despair, travels to the famed Aokigahara forest (“sea of trees”) near Mt. Fuji—known for its eerie atmosphere and tragic associations. There, she encounters a powerful, otherworldly phenomenon that sets her on a journey into the realm of the supernatural.
tags: Monsters, Horror, Supernatural

name: Tonde Hi ni Iru Natsu to Mushi
description: Brand new high school first year Mizuhara has but one goal: to quit the sport of basketball he's played for so long! Yet, the very opponent that incinerated his dreams is stopping at nothing to keep him in the game.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Ano Ko wa Yasashi Sugiru.
description:
Yuna, a cute yet cunning high school girl meets Ema, a flashy gyaru with the same surname at her a part-time job. Despite their similar backgrounds, both feel they probably won't get along...
A story about a strange yet comforting bond -  a Reiwa-era sisterhood.

(Prequel two-shot of "Ano Ko to Futari de.")
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, Delinquents, Gyaru

name: Kingyoya-san no Karisome Fuufu
description:
The story of a contract marriage set in an old-fashioned goldfish shop. 

Asahi and Nana are newlyweds who run a goldfish shop. At first glance, they seem to be a normal couple, but in fact, they are a contractual couple who got married because of their mutual interests! They are not true husband and wive,  let alone lovers. And yet...

[I'm sorry. I know this is our first time meeting, but will you marry me?]
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Fermat no Ryouri
description: Gaku Kitada is a prodigy in Mathematics and a scholarship holder at Wels Private Academy, a renowned institution with a long history in the International Mathematical Olympiad. After a series of unfortunate events, he meets Kai Asakura, a culinarian prodigy with his own catering business. What does the future hold for these two geniuses, and how do their paths intertwine with each other's?
tags: Slice of Life, Cooking

name: The Sichuan Tang Clan’s Entomologist
description: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kawaii nante Kiitenai!!
description:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Pale Horse
description:
Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However, Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose… But what if the rumors are true?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B0%BD%EB%B0%B1%ED%95%9C-%EB%A7%90/783)
- Defunct Official English - [SpotToon](https://www.spottoon.com/workHome/39/THE%20PALE%20HORSE), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/palehorse)

**Note:**
- The author has split the storyline into parts and seasons. Volume 1.1 for example means Part 1, Season 1.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: NEW Jungle King Tar-chan
description:
Tar-chan, a hero living in the jungle, spends his days fighting poachers and assassins to protect the peace of the animals. However, one day, an invitation to an open mixed martial arts tournament was sent to Tar-chan...!?

The series ran in Weekly Shōnen Jump from 1988 to 1990 as Jungle King Tar-chan, and then from 1990 to 1995 as New Jungle King Tar-chan. 
At this time most chapters were only 7 pages in length, Two years into serialization, the stories began to run 13-15 pages, "NEW" was added to the title, and the simple episodic gag premise were switched to a fighting manga premise. Although long battles and emotional development began to unfold, after the end of these battles, the series would return to its gag style, switching back to the fighting manga style with each new battle.
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However... will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?

"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "a handsome older man"!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Youjo Majutsu-shi to Doukyo-nin
description: A young girl named Kana, a self-proclaimed traveler, meets a young mage named Clevy deep within a forest. After they begin living together, the two gradually start to build a mutual trust...
tags: Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: I Want to Become an Incubus, Too!
description:
In the summer of 202X, a crisis comes for the majority of demons who have been receiving human souls and filling their mana.
As there are more devilish humans than demons, there is no need to seek help from demons even while selling their souls.
In order to overcome this employment difficulty, demons are preparing to move to a 'mongma' that can absorb energy without human consent.
It’s the same for Uffir, but it's not as easy as it sounds. In the end, a detective, Cheol-ho, appears in front of Uffir, who is trying to become a mongma by tricking him...
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Full Color

name: TO-Y
description:
The story follows Fujii To-y, lead singer of GASP, and his attempts not to sell out during his rise through the recording industry. 
It also follows To-y’s growing relationship with Niya, who find comfort in one another while they are shunned by mainstream society.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Not found
description:
The manga centers on a good-looking college student named Nagisa Nii. She saves a stranded turtle by the sea, and she is brought to the Ryuuguu castle under the sea as the turtle's way of saying thank you. Nagisa meets Princess Otohime in the castle, and Otohime falls in love with her. Otohime follows Nagisa on land, and starts living next to her using the name Kameko Tatsunomiya.

(Source: ANN)
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kaiko: Fuyumushi Kaiko Sakuhinshuu
description:
The genius, Cordyceps silkworm, which received a great response every time it was announced
 The long-awaited book version of the masterpiece short story!!!

 Including "Kikou", which became a hot topic for depicting the feeling of stagnation and suffocation in the countryside,
 Jealousy and friendship with female friends, rejection of the word "cute", etc.
 Vividly depicts the pain and bitterness of the heart that everyone has once had
 First commercial work collection woven with 6 gem short stories!

 In addition to the completely new short story "Tattoo", there is an epilogue of "Homecoming".
 Delivered in a large volume of over 200 pages recorded with newly drawn illustrations!
tags: Anthology, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~
description:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Regressor Only Protects Me
description:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: No Guns Life
description: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: Spotlight ga Ochiru made
description: Not found

description: Two Onee-sans bring an innocent Shota into their room… and show him the time of his life!

description: Spin-off of *Shin'yuu no Furin Aite wa, Otto deshita*.

description: Not found

name: THE iDOLM@STER - Step Up! (Doujinshi)

name: Bad Guy Meets Mermaid
description:
*What he caught was one unusual mermaid!?*

A man captures a mermaid to profit from her flesh, which is said to grant eternal life to anyone who eats it. But while waiting to make the exchange, something unexpected begins to bloom between them! A new interspecies romance from Yuki Subuta!

*Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project*
[Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)
tags: Oneshot, Romance

name: Host to Shachiku
description:
Naoto, a “corporate slave,” and Ren, a “host,” meet at 5:00 a.m., at a beef bowl restaurant in Shinjuku's Kabuki-Chō.
They are complete strangers who just so happen to share breakfast each day side by side, a rather unusual relationship.

A corporate slave whose day is about to begin and a host whose day has finally come to an end.
This is a morning routine story that depicts the only 15 minutes in which these two people, who live on opposite sides of the clock, intersect!
tags: Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: LV999 no Murabito
description: In this world, the concept of levels exist. Other than those who live off defeating monsters, most people are only around Level 1 to 5. What's more, not just anyone can go out to hunt monsters; it's heavily influenced by one's role appointed by God. There are eight such eligible roles: warriors, fighters, clerics, magicians, rogues, merchants, hunters, and sorcerers. Those blessed with extraordinary power are divided into three types: royalty, heroes, and sages. But for the majority of the population, they have no such powers and live by farming or running shops. Towns are developed by those with the weakest role: villagers. For the powerless villagers going out to hunt monsters is equivalent to committing suicide. But one day, a certain two-year-old child given the role of villager notices something: once you defeat a monster... you can earn great wealth.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yasashii Kedo Yasashikunai Yandere Gal
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Slice of Life, Full Color, Gyaru

name: Chronicle of the Searing Winds of Tianzhu
description: The manga tells a fictional version of the story of historical Tang China diplomat Wang Xuance, centering on his diplomatic journey from Tang Dynasty China to the Empire of Harsha in India in the 7th century CE. When he comes upon a crumbling empire that is now hostile to him he escapes to Tibet and raises a confederation of Tang, Nepalese, and Tibetan soldiers to mount a raid on the Empire of Harsha.
tags: Historical, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Adaptation

name: Korogaru Kyoudai
description:
Minato Usami is a high-school girl with a new little brother from her father's remarriage.
Having high expectations after being told that her new brother is an adorable little boy, Koshiro—said little brother—turns out to be a little different than she imagined.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Best Blue
description:
Takumi Aono really wants to be a competitive swimmer! Like, really, really, really wants to be one. Although he swims everyday, rain or shine, he's still not there yet. But when he meets a very bitter lifeguard, something unexpected happens!  
  
**Included one-shots:**  
Volume 2: Best Blue (pilot)  
Volume 3: 31 Heroes  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Best Blue were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Adventure

name: Love at First Aid
description: A boy who looks up to his police officer father keeps getting hurt while helping others, until one bandage leads to a fateful encounter. But there's a reason they can never be together...?! A pure story about defying destiny begins‼︎
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Police

name: .hack//Beyond The World - Excuse
description: A short epilogue to the movie of the same name. It was included in the ".hack//Archives_05".
tags: Oneshot, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Tobita-kun to Sudo-san
description: Sudo Nagiko acquires a boyfriend unwillingly. The boy named Tobita decided to be her boyfriend after calling her ugly. He does not seem the type to take no for an answer, especially after showing Yandere tendencies.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents

name: My Father Has Become a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Pain
description:
One day, a beautiful girl enters Tatsuya's room... only to reveal that it’s his father, completely transformed by the shock of losing his job!
Confused by the father he no longer recognizes, Tatsuya begins to experience gradual changes in their once-distant father-son relationship.
As the father takes on a more motherly role, and Tatsuya starts acting more like the father, or perhaps a close friend becomes like a father figure...

A new TS comedy that, despite being called ‘biologically impossible’ on social media, is surprisingly a father-son story that will warm your heart!

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Yubiwa no Eranda Kon'yakusha
description:
Aurora el la Porta is a noblewoman with one love—the art of embroidery. While she attends the lavish evening parties her peers so adore, she's not looking for a dance but inspiration for a new design! On one such night, distracted by the many beautiful dresses on display, she's struck in the face by a mysterious wedding ring. When she picks it up, one of the finest knights in the kingdom approaches, declaring her his new fiancée! Aurora has no idea what's going on, but one thing's for sure—she's got a big decision to make...
___
- [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00200618010000_68/)
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1253cj/)
tags: Historical, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mayu no Uta
description:
"I'll be your mother."

After losing her biological mother, Mayu Kanda was abused by her guardian uncle every day, and could barely eat properly, but she just laughed it off. Until she met a mysterious beauty, Kamakura Komachi, who suddenly appeared.

Is she, who acts like a mother, a ray of hope for Mayu? Or...?

(Source: AniList; Ichijinsha, translated)
tags: Psychological, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: D-Frag!
description: Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Harapeko Kopeko wa Niku to Sumu!
description: Not found
