name: Maria no Danzai
description: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: Super Triage
description: Not found
tags: Action

name: Show-ha Shou-ten!
description: A high schooler who submits jokes to radio shows and a former child actor aim for the top of the comedy world!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Metal Souls
description:
In a world plagued with random appearances of Kaiju, the Sentinels are the task force created to stop them. Recently the Kaiju attacks have become more prominent and the sentinels who have been losing in the war against the kaiju attempt to turn the tide by creating a weapon. Kaine is chosen to be the pilot of this weapon, also known as its soul. Will Kaine be able to live up to the expectations put on him and save the world?

Alternative Official English: [MangaPlus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/9n2303230600355730022339785/)
tags: Award Winning, Action

name: Neru: Way of the Martial Artist
description: Meet Neruma Isami, more commonly known as Neru. His martial artist grandfather left behind a book which serves as his only guide for his solitary training. Neru's about to finish middle school and is totally unsure about his future. But everything changes when meets the mysterious martial artist Akebi Haiba. She leads Neru to a high school where the toughest fighters have assembled. This martial arts high school action series now begins!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life

name: 【Oshi no Ko】
description:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
tags: Reincarnation, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Ayakashi Triangle
description:
Ever since he was a boy, Matsuri Kazamaki has worked as an exorcist. Because his childhood friend Suzu Kanade attracts malicious spirits called ayakashi like moths to a flame, Matsuri is tasked with slaying any with ill intentions.

One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuri’s chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell…
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/ayakashi-triangle/)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mission: Yozakura Family
description:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?!
___
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy

name: Diabolic Tales / Inviting Darkness
description:
A collection of short stories. English scanlation is based on the censored SEA release.
  
*Diabolic Tales • 1: Ninjin Daisuki:*
A little boy named Takashi-chan hates eating carrots, so one night, he prays that somehow, he will be able to like eating them. Little does he know how dangerous this wish turns out to be...

*Diabolic Tales • 2: Saishuu Bus.*
Sachiko visits Hitomi in her new rural home on the pretext of visiting an old friend. She gets on the last bus back to avoid having to stay at Hitomi's creepy new house, but...

*Diabolic Tales • 3: FAMILY*
Yuka lives with her gentle father and mother and mischievous, but cute, younger sister Eri. Things seem like they should be so happy, but why is it that sometimes Yuka feels so uneasy? What important memory is she forgetting?

*Diabolic Tales • 4: Noriawaseta Shinigami*
Miya was supposed to just take her father his lunch, but an earthquake stops the elevator she is on. Before the lights go off, a woman calls out that there is a shinigami (a grim reaper) among them, but suddenly dies before everyone is able to see where she pointed. Was the woman just crazy or is everyone's life now in grave danger?

*Bonus: Soshite Yami wa Yomigaeru*
Minori is on a trip to a small lodge in the mountains with her school club. They are specifically going because the site is rumored to be frequented by UFOs, and they want to investigate. They are meeting Minori's cousin, Naoki, there, but why is it that Minori keeps experiencing deja vu?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Asumi-chan is Interested in Lesbian Brothels!
description: Sweet but awkward college student Asumi never got over her childhood crush on her old friend Mai. Their first and only kiss couldn’t have gone worse. So when she learns that Mai may be working at a nearby brothel, she sets her sights on redemption! But there’s one catch: none of the women on the brothel’s website use full photos or real names. Thus begins a journey of self-discovery and sexual exploration as she sets out to find her one that got away.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Harem

name: Not found
description:
A prestigious school where only girls can attend-Winebirds Royal Magic Academy. A boy visited there. His name is Noah.  
  
It was called as the first male student to co-educate the school.  
Then, he started living together with a problematic beautiful girl, Anya.  
  
However, his pure smile and non-pure tentacles created various ripples in the school…!!!
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Medical, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kaedegami
description: A secret relationship with a mysterious entity... In a world with demonic monsters called Shenguai, a young orphan named Kou lives alone in the mountains with a mysterious Shenguai named Chiyou. But Chiyou has a tragic past, and Kou will have to give all of himself in order to save her. A beautiful East Asian adventure now begins!
tags: Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Ki no Mi Ki no Mama
description:
She's competent at work, but her personal life is a mess. Then she meets a younger boy... or is it a girl?

Note: this is published in "Rakuen Le Paradis", with an issue every 4 months.
tags: Romance, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Ryuu to Ayumu Nariagari Boukensha-dou: Youzumi Toshite S-Rank Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Kaifuku Majutsushi, Suterareta Saki de Saikyou no Shinryuu o Fukkatsu Sasete Shimau
description:
**“Understand for yourself that you are worthless. You are already obsolete.”**

Dion, the recovery wizard who was told so, was seriously injured by the hands of party members and left behind in the interior of the highest difficulty dungeon.

On the verge of running out of his life, he happens to encounter a dying dragon. Dion realized that he couldn't help him anymore, and he treated the dragon to live as a recovery wizard until the end. Then the dragon thanked him and even shared the power of the dragon. In addition, this dragon seems to have been a legendary god dragon-class. Dion escapes from the dungeon with his new companion, the dragon, and restarts as an adventurer. He captures the difficult dungeons that stand in his way, and his abilities are recognized and he has all the strong men on his side.
___
**Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4)

**Additional Links:**  
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55539)

- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.bunkasha.co.jp/author/a236341.html)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: The Bateren Tales
description: In the shadows of Edo, under the ban on Christianity, lurks an ominous supernatural presence no one should approach. Give in to curiosity, and there will be no way back!
tags: Historical, Supernatural

name: Ato wa Gojiyuu ni Douzo! ~Tutorial de Kami-sama ga Last Boss wo Taoshi Chatta node Watashi wa Suki Houdai Ikiteiku~
description:
My name's Karina—or at least, it is now! I used to be a nondescript, run-of-the-mill Japanese salaryman until I was whisked away to a divine realm where the Goddess of Time and Space told me I'd be living a new life in a new world—and as a girl, since apparently she prefers it that way. First she wants me to beat some final boss she has a grudge against, then she takes control of my body to show me how to use my new spatial magic powers in a tutorial fight... Wait, isn't that the final boss I'm supposed to beat?! Less than in a minute into the tutorial and he's dead?! And now she says the world's my oyster. Seriously?!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/knock-yourself-out-the-goddess-beat-the-final-boss-in-the-tutorial-so-now-i-m-free-to-do-whatever)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Osananajimi wo Erabenai! (Shorts)
description:
This is a shorts manga version of the [main work](https://mangadex.org/title/b8fd9d83-40c4-40f9-8525-bfcab3a6c3eb/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) serialized in Gangan Joker.

It's not necessary to read the main story to be able to follow this one.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Web Comic

name: The Dropped
description:
From Suspense & Horror 1998/08. Part 4 of the Stalker Stories special feature.

Since the day Masumi dropped his driver's license he has been haunted by small creatures. The other important thing he dropped that day was...
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Hotoke no Adabana
description:
A young man born deaf and mute, shunned by those around him and named 'Kegare' (Unclean). He's hired as a guard by a lady at a certain estate. The lady, who possesses a mysterious constitution, attempts to communicate with Kegare through sign language while telling him, "You may kill me." 

A stunning one-shot from a Monthly MAG Garden Manga Award winning author.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Drama, Fantasy

name: Deriwo no Oshigoto
description: "I wanted to understand my oshi's feelings." ― Sakurako, a shut-in otaku, called a call boy and tried to perform a sexual act for the first time in her life. However, just before the act, Sakurako became afraid, and in her rush, she accidentally revealed an eroge she was in the middle of playing, causing her to panic! Having her fetish revealed to the extroverted and handsome call boy Fuji-kun, she becomes embarrassed, but as she despairs, it's revealed that Fuji-kun was an otaku comrade as well...? This is a pure oshikatsu love story between an otaku girl and a call boy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
*My dream girl can only come up with the most garbage conversations.*

She's this untouchable upperclassman at school, but she's completely different on the bus ride there. This girl who's way out of my league keeps hitting me with the most garbage conversations, and I'm the only one who gets to see this side of her. Love comedy master Gosuke Yasuda explores uncharted territory in heroine storytelling!

*Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project*
[Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy

name: Okashi na Elf to Joshikousei
description:
Japanese sweets save a debt-ridden elf!

Alice, an elf, runs a confectionery shop in the forest of Auin to pay off the debt left by her parents.
One day, however, when she is worried that her sweets are not selling, she suddenly falls into the "Fountain of Wishes.
When she opens her eyes, she finds herself in a strange world...
tags: Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Shikabane Kaigo
description:
"Is this person already dead...? 

Behind the door, lying in bed, is a grotesque figure...

Akane Kuritani, a new caregiver, arrives at a secluded Western-style mansion deep in the mountains to provide live-in care for Kiwako Miyazono, the bedridden owner. Hoping for a fresh start, Akane is shocked to find Kiwako emanating a putrid smell, with discolored skin and a burlap sack over her face, looking nothing less than a 'corpse.' The nature of the care she must provide is clearly abnormal...

Based on a Kadokawa Horror Bunko novel, a terrifying nursing care horror tale begins.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Mahou wa Isekai ni Oite Kimashita. ~ Tensai Madoushi Datta Imouto no Yowakute New Game ~
description: Mikan, a young girl transported to a world of swords and magic, grows up to become a great mage who saves that world from crisis—only to be sent back to her hometown, Niigata. Having lost her magic and companions from the other world, Mikan becomes a shut-in. Her older brother Itsuki, who has waited ten long years for her return, does everything he can to show her the joys of this world and gently coax her outside—but will he succeed…?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Dokagui no Danzai
description: Magazine model Miyu-chan is busy with a photoshoot again today. Of course, her lunch isn’t the low-calorie meal a model should have... instead, it’s tonkotsu ramen packed with calories ♡. With noodles, extra noodles, rice, and soup, Miyu-chan was enjoying a hearty diet when suddenly a disaster struck her…!
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Survival, Supernatural

name: THE iDOLM@STER MILLION LIVE! Blooming Clover
description: Part of [THE iDOLM@STER](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=iDOLM%40STER) series.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music

name: Last Boss Toubatsugo ni Hajimeru Nishuume Boukensha Life - Hajimari no Machi de Wakeari Bishoujo-tachi ga Mechakucha Natsuite kimasu
description: Adventurer Might lost his life while defeating an evil dragon. However, he was brought back to life by the blessing of a goddess who heard the wishes of the companions who saved the world together. Furthermore, due to Might's own wish, his class changed from Thief to the Sage he had always admired! When Might, who returned to Level 1 as compensation for changing his class, heads to the beginners' guild, he finds 'a group of girls in a beginner party' arguing about something...?
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
(from Mangaupdates)

“I’m exiling you from this guild!! —But I’ve prepared a new career path where you can make the most of your abilities!!”

Act, an adventurer who once experienced the bitterness of being exiled from his former guild, decides to establish and manage a new guild called [Heaven-sent Gem]. However, because Act exiles so many members, rumors begin to spread in society about a “corrupt guild master”… Surrounded by unique companions like a cool puppy-like maid, a tomboy princess, and an overpowered hero, the (supposedly?) corrupt guild master continues to assess, nurture, and exile people every day!!
tags: Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Watashi ga 15-sai de wa Nakunatte mo.
description:
“Maybe I've been waiting for such a moment for a long time!”

While being estranged by his daughter and being blamed by his wife, middle-aged office worker Iwashita lived modestly in his own way. This was his norm at least until he met a girl, Shiina, who suddenly appeared one day in front of him. She approached Iwashita as a “customer” for “a meal of 20,000 yen”. A story of a small escape begins with a painful and dazzling 15-year-old girl seeking her own value and a 40-year-old middle-aged man struggling between reason and desire.
tags: Psychological, Office Workers, Drama, School Life

name: One Night Love Yuri Anthology
description:
An anthology of girls' love short stories about one night love affairs.

Cover Illustration: Yukiko

Koryouriya Kemari (小料理屋けまり) [Tsuzura Ryou]
Anata wo Yume ni Tojikomete (あなたを夢に閉じ込めて) [Kawakami Shion]
Kuro ni Majiwareba Aka ni Naru (黒に交われば赤になる) [Yodokawa]
Itsuwari no Yubiwa to Hontou no Yoru (偽りの指輪と本当の夜) [Shinogi Asa]
Inugai-Hanchou no Kaiinu wa Mike (犬飼班長の飼い犬はミケ) [Ikuta Hana]
Koukai ni Idakaretero (後悔に抱かれてろ) [Ajiichi]
Jaa One Night tte Koto de (じゃあワンナイトってことで) [Sumire]
tags: Romance, Anthology, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Ero Mangaka Onee-san to Otsukare Ryman
description:
Sanzo Teshigahara, a salaryman, moves in next door to an erotic manga artist, Kikon Tadano. Teshigahara gets pushed around by the free-spirited manga artist all over the place, but surprisingly, he doesn't seem to mind. This is a heart-pounding love comedy between two impetuous people.

(Source: Kurage Bunch, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Suzu, an art student in a creative rut, finds new inspiration when she meets a beautiful girl at the park who introduces her to the colourful world of birdwatching.  
  
Serialised monthly in Manga Time Kirara.
tags: Animals, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Satsukare
description:
Yuuta Kiryuu is an abusive man who raises his hands to women. One day when they're on a date, Yuuta shows violence toward his girlfriend as usual, but unexpectedly, life is turned around in an instant. His girlfriend dies and while fleeing the scene, he encounters a group of serial murderers. He finds himself repelled by their "values" but is nonetheless pulled into their world. The manga features an array of criminal types including men who commit domestic violence, a murderer-rapist, a cannibal, and a necrophiliac. Who do you want to be killed?
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/satsukare)
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: Hizumi(bitsu) 1 zenpen - Haikyuu dj
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Sports, Doujinshi, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The Indigo League: the ultimate challenge for Pokémon trainers. Structured like a massive tournament, anyone eager to show off their Pokémon can participate, from rookies to gym leaders to even the Elite Four themselves.  
  
This is the story of Red, Blue, and Green, three friends who decide to partake in the tournament.
tags: Action, Adventure, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Radiation House
description:
Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu, his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital, he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger. 

Unfortunately, having been out of touch for years, she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department, she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible. 

While the two of them adapt to each other, will An recognize her childhood friend, who has been working with her all this time?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Prince Lloyd wasn’t always a prince…in fact, his previous life is one he remembers perfectly: he was a sorcerer, of sorts. So when he was forced to reincarnate, he decided to continue his studies, prince of the realm or no! But his new life has its own sets of challenges…including being a 10-year-old! What’s the 7th prince/sorcerer to do?!

*Source: Kodansha Comics*
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Utsushicha Dame-na Kao
description: Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her, and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Si Land
description: In a world where only dogs and cats exist, the dogs gained control of and built a kingdom on the only continent while the cats scattered throughout the great sea and repeatedly looted from the dogs. This mutual hatred has led to many years of strife between the two species… Jean, a young dog who was unconventionally born at sea and raised by a cat, lives with his mother Rosa and his adoptive father Azul as the three move from small island to small island. It is Jean's dream to find a place where the three can live together permanently but…! From Ryo Sumiyoshi, the unparalleled master artist of non-human characters, comes an epic fantasy adventure on the high seas!
tags: Action, Animals, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description:
Since they were kids, Kaoru and his childhood friend Houko have had one rule: the loser in judo buys the winner a meal.
But now that they’re in high school, Kaoru just can’t keep up—Houko only gets stronger every year, and he’s stuck paying the bill.

Then, after one crushing loss too many, Houko teases him with a single remark… and Kaoru snaps.
He stakes everything on a final match: “If I lose this time, I’ll buy you meals for the rest of my life!”

A judo match that could decide their future—childhood rivalry, pride, and maybe something more are all on the line!*
tags: Oneshot, Action, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Close and Secretive
description: On that day, I was going to confess to you. Choi Ji-young, an unidentified woman who accidentally encountered her on Ulleungdo Island. Sunwoo Hyun keeps bothering Ji-young. Two people who are attracted to each other even in a short period of time. Then one day, Ji-young suddenly disappears. Without a trace. “It’s been a while, Hyun. Aren’t you going to say hello?” Ji-young, who could not be found no matter how much she visited, became the “Choi Ji-an” and appeared in four years. That’s also for Hyun to protect. “With this time, there is no Choi Ji-young I knew. So, just delete it too.”
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Wind Breaker
description:
Jay's the perfect student. He's got straight As and he's the student body president. 

But after being coerced into joining the school's biking team, the Hummingbird Crew, he discovers a whole new world outside of studying. 

What new adventures will he face outside the comfort of his textbooks?

---

**Contents:**
- **Season 1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue + Special (0-65)
- **Season 2.1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue (66-130)
- **Season 2.2:** 117 Chapters (131-257)
- **Season 3:** 128 Chapters (258-375)
- **Season 4:** 53 Chapters (Ongoing) (376-)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Shanimuni Go
description:
Ide Nobuhisa has always been a boy full of vitality and a young promise in the field of track running. However one day after a competition, he stumbled over the prettiest pair of legs he had ever seen! Their owner, a young girl practicing tennis makes a promise with Ide that she will teach him how to play. After seeing the name tag on her racket bag, Ide puts all his efforts into passing the test for accessing the same high school she goes to, Makunogama.  
  
In his first days in his new high school, Ide discovers two things: an old friend of his is also attending, and nobody knows of a girl with the name he saw on the tag! He and his friend join the school tennis club, where they meet another first year, Takita Louis (Ruui), a very good tennis player with a little of an attitude problem.  
  
However things start to look better for Ide when his dear missing girl appears in the school! As it happens, he misread her name on the tag… Takada Hinako was well known as one of the members of the tennis club, but some time after meeting Ide for the first time she suffered an accident and has now lost the use of her left leg. Hinako is no longer a happy spirited girl and tells Ide she can't fullfill her promise.  
  
Eventually the opposite characters of Louis and Ide end up confronting each other in a tennis match. Ide is an incredible fast learner, but he is no match… until Hinako decides to give him advice. Things only get worse, however, when their club president decides to put Louis and Ide as a doubles pair for the upcoming inter-high-school tournament!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Kyou Kara Ore wa Loli no Himo!
description: I, Tendou Haru, who was aiming to become a mangaka, somehow became a winner in life; super-rich bishoujo elementary school student, Nijou Touka, was a big fan of mine and, on top of that, she said that she was going to be my patron. Just like that, my ideal lifestyle of living off of someone had started.
tags: Loli, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Oni Gyaru-san! Kikisemaru!!
description: It's been a few months since the gate to the underworld opened and cross-cultural exchange with the otherworldly inhabitants began. An ordinary high school boy, Tsuna Sakurai, is suddenly supposed to have an oni-girl come live with him! And it turned out she's quite the excitable gal!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Gyaru

name: A Free Ride Everyday
description: Cheng Huan, the female lead, unexpectedly runs into Liao Jia, her senior from high school who works at the same company, on her way home. Taking the opportunity to hitch a ride from him, the number of times they start to meet each other begin to increase wildly. For some reason, Cheng Huan is always able to get a ride from her senior. Unconsciously, they start to realize each other's feelings, with every ride together becoming yet another opportunity for them to grow even closer.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic

name: Suit Red
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chou Tantei Jikenbo: Rain Code
description:
The amnesiac protagonist, Yuma, wakes up at a train station and discovers through his luggage that he is a detective working on a case. Yuma heads for "Kanai Ward," where he was supposed to investigate the case with the Shinigami who haunts him. However, an incident occurs on the train they are on...?

---

Note: This manga is an adaptation of the game *"Master Detective Archives: Rain Code"*
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Tail Concerto
description:
oneshot prequel to Tail Concerto game

serialized in Monthly Shonen Ace, June 1998
tags: Oneshot, Animals, Mecha, Adventure, Drama, Police, Adaptation

name: Takopii no Genzai
description:
A guest from the planet of happiness, the alien Takopi, arrives on Earth to spread happiness throughout the Earth and meets Shizuka, a girl who never smiles. Looks like she has problems at school and with friends... What will the simple-minded Takopi face? An amazing story begins!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/takopi-s-original-sin)
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Deep in the dungeon, I finally found a treasure chest! Inside—gold coins or jewels, maybe—wait, what is this...? It’s all squishy, bowl-shaped, and there’s something stuck to the end of the bowl... I got it! This is a boob! In dungeons where adventurers chase dreams and glory, you sometimes find strange, out-of-place items. To make use of these mysterious things, people appraise them, experiment with them—or maybe just sell them off?
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Dameo no Shiina-senpai to Yabao no Sasaki-kun
description: Sasaki-kun, a slightly crazy boy, is in love with his senpai, a bad boy, and he likes that even more! Siina-senpai changes girlfriends more than pants and Sasaki-kun has a record of more than 160 confessions to his senpai. While Siina-Senpai devises ways to make Sasaki give up, Sasaki is in love with this bad boy and won't give up until he wins him.
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Delinquents, Web Comic

name: Yuria-sensei no Akai Ito
description:
Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.

Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yowaki MAX Reijou nanoni, Ratsuwan Konyakusha-sama no Kake ni Notte Shimatta
description:
Reincarnated as a mob villainess! But isn't there something off about this situation?!

I was reincarnated into an otome game as a count's villainous daughter, Pia. But fearing my fate of banishment from the kingdom, I became extremely timid. After deciding the breaking of my engagement and becoming a curator, the Prime Minister's son steps forth and I'm thrown into an unexpected plot twist…?!

---
She was reborn as a villainous daughter in a reverse harem otome game. After being sick with a high fever at the age of ten, Pia Rockwell suddenly remembered her past life as a university student in Japan. But far from going down the villainess route, all this super timid girl wants is to finally use her knowledge from when she was a grad student studying to get her doctorate in paleontology. Her ultimate goal is to become a commoner, excavate fossils, build a museum and then become a curator.

So in order to escape the villainess route and avoid being deported by her fiancé during the graduation ball, Pia decides to avoid the upcoming hurt and heartache and asks to break off her engagement to Rufus, the Prime Minister's son.

But will her cunning fiancé let her go that easily?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Isekai, School Life, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Luento Genjuu Trimmer
description: The story is set in the world of Luento, where beastmen live and phantom beasts dwell, and describes the journey of Balm, a beastman, and Polo, a stray child phantom beast. Parm is a trimmer of phantom beasts and travels around trimming their overgrown nails and hair. The story begins when Parm meets a child of a new species of phantom beast that can speak.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Kitaooji Mamoru is so popular in the company that he is called "the prince of the sales department". In contrast, Kurone-san is a quiet colleague who is isolated from everyone around her. One day, on his way home from work, Kitaooji sees Kurone-san enjoying herself in the park, taking care of a cat...!?
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Pulseless Girlfriend
description:
When Makato accidentally caused a flowerpot to fall onto a girl from three stories high, he thought his life was over.  
However, can he handle the 'heavy' responsibility of his action.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/gogogorx)  
- [Rookie Shonen Jump](https://rookie.shonenjump.com/series/FlR8CfElFuw)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: For Her, I'd Give It My All
description: Jiaxia is a new editor for the comic company BliBli. Ever since high school she has admired comic artist Taiji-sensei, who inspired her to pursue a career in the 2D world. Although Taiji-sensei has a bad reputation in the publishing world for being lazy and troublesome, Jiaxia is determined to be her new editor. But will she be able to get Taiji-sensei to finally get motivated to draw a new comic?
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita
description:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment. He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it's a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one! Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him...?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)
tags: Romance, Crossdressing, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Nigoru Hitomi de Nani wo Negau - Highserk Senki
description:
One day, Raizou ​​Takakura, an average salaryman, had a heart attack and his life ended that day. But, he got a second life in a different world.

Reincarnated with strong skills― wasn't what happened to him. Instead, he was reincarnated as a foot soldier in a small country, Highserk Empire, which is surrounded by large countries. With a new name, Walm, he was thrown into the frontlines of a war. Covered in blood and stench of death, along his comrades, he was slipping through the life-or-death situations.

An adventurer party with members who could use powerful magic, transferees with overwhelming power called the "heroes." In a deadly battle with them, Walm gradually developed his talent as a warrior which would've never awoken if he were to stay in times of peace. While his eyes becoming dark and muddy over time.
___
**Character Designer:** [So-taro](https://mangadex.org/author/c4ae5d7f-3399-4b1f-a509-d7388ad47826)

**Alt Official Raws:**
- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58990)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Psychological, Survival, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: I Love Amy
description:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/detail/A001), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/i_love_amy), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901012070), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12533803)
- Defunct Official Raw - [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/6317)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hina no Mama ja Dame desu ka?
description: Hina from 5th grade has a secret she can't tell anyone: 3 months ago she started having periods. However, one day her childhood friend Daichi found out about it. These are the endless worries of children starting puberty.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Kousuke X Natsuki
description:
[#BL Manga] [Omegaverse]
*Even if they can't put their gratitude and love into words…*
A story about two people who deeply understand each other!
A Puppy-like Alpha × Tsundere Omega Childhood Friends Omegaverse Story
When he goes into heat, the uke becomes honest...
This is the daily life of Kousuke × Natsuki!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Himitsu Abaki (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Ghosts, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Shimai
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
“Getting a job is the grave of life…” sighs Tanaka Makoto, an office worker belonging to a black guild, as he takes on a dungeon for work again today. 

One day, he makes a mistake in the broadcast settings for recording work, and broadcasts his dungeon capture to the whole country. A single blow from the Tyrant Dragon?! Tanaka, a sword master in the modern age, shows off his extraordinary skills, and the broadcast turns into a festival! 

"100 million concurrent viewers…?!"

Tanaka, who unexpectedly becomes an incredibly popular broadcaster, quits his black workplace and becomes an independent broadcaster. 

Now it’s time for work. The former corporate slave’s life of dungeon broadcasting begins!
tags: Fantasy, Adaptation

name: 牛仔漫畫
description: Cowboy is a four-panel comic series drawn by Hong Kong cartoonist Wong Sima in the 1970s and early 1980s. The comic was originally serialized in the supplement of Ming Pao for many years and was later compiled and published as a book by Boyi Publishing Group Co., Ltd. The complete set of Cowboy consists of 41 volumes, telling the life fragments and interesting stories between the two fathers, Cowboy and "father", in the comic. It describes the appearance of a well-off family in Hong Kong at that time and also shows the innocence of Cowboy and his affection for his father. The prototypes of Cowboy and father cartoon are the author Wong Sima and his three sons.
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Comedy, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Kamen Rider ZX
description: An omnibus release compiling the three Kamen Rider ZX manga by Yuuji Hosoi, Goro Yamada, and Joe Azuchi (formerly Shizuo Kanayama). Digital Versions Delisted
tags: Sci-Fi, Action

name: Not found
description:
<when the wind feels strong and the cats are restless, in full moon nights.... Something strange could happen.>

Akira is a normal guy who gets transported to another world summoned by wizards who call him "Master Sage". This world is threatened by a strange happening called the "Great Catastrophe" and now Akira must leader the 21 unique and different wizards who fight against it while understanding their worries and connects with their hearts.
<I just want you to discover the truth of this world...>
tags: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hachinoko Risa-chan
description: Risa Ito, who considers herself an urban manga artist, actually grew up deep in the mountains! Food, vehicles, events, dialects, customs, Jomon pottery... The strongest Deep Japan is here! A heart-wrenching autobiographical comic brought to you by “Native Countryside” Risa!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Synonym
description: The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Full Color

name: Seiyuu Radio no Ura Omote
description: Yugure Yuhi and Utatane Yasumi, two high schooler voice actresses who just happened to attend the same school and coincidentally got placed into the same class, are the two hosts of a radio weekly program. As fellow classmates and voice actresses, they show all the listeners their great friendship! At least, on the surface. In reality, the quiet girl Chika and the gyaru Yumiko are complete opposites. And they absolutely cannot stand each other. Off air, chaos and insults erupt. On air, they're the best of friends. Just where will this tumultuous relationship lead them?
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Hazure Skill Level Up no Sei de Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa, Level wo Agete Butsuri de Naguru
description: Only I can "level up"!? Become stronger by "union" with a beautiful girl! Best partner fantasy! Everyone is gifted with a talent at the age of 15 - "Skill". Chamber was a member of "Dawn", a party that was prominent in the city, although it was made up of only young members. After acquiring a mysterious skill with an unclear "level up" effect, he is expelled from "Dawn"...! Although he was abandoned by other members who gained powerful skills, Chamber continues to work as a solo adventurer. In the midst of all this, he learns the true value of the skill "Level Up". The more enemies you defeat, the more you level up and become stronger... Chamber realized that his own skill was not a "useless skill", he also has a fateful encounter with a certain girl, and ends up spending his days pursuing strength...!
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Living In The Moment
description: Not found

name: Kareshi o Jibun Dake no mono ni Shitai Kanojo-chan

tags: Oneshot, Genderswap, Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love

name: The Genius Who Sees Through the World
description: As a child, Shin Woo-jin was kidnapped and locked away in a warehouse, forced to live as a slave. But against all odds, he was rescued and finally stepped into the outside world. Though free, Woo-jin wasn’t like other children. He had an extraordinary gift—the ability to read people. By observing the smallest facial expressions and unconscious gestures, he could see through their thoughts, emotions, and intentions with near-perfect accuracy. Like a profiler, like a modern-day Sherlock, Woo-jin learned to navigate the world, one observation at a time. But for someone who sees too much, living an ordinary life is the hardest thing of all. All he ever wanted was a peaceful, simple life. But the world had other plans. “As I thought… living a normal life is far too difficult.”
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Akihiro, an omega, has suddenly been landed with a fiance! The whole thing was arranged by their parents, so when he's told this guy is going to be his husband, it's all too much to process... But, when he meets his betrothed, Reiya, his terror toward the alpha begins to change into... something else. He wants to do all kinds of naughty things with his beloved Reiya, but he's still in school, and he's worried that any prohibited activities might result in a baby... His mind is now a battlefield between hope and reason! Meanwhile, Reiya, who once found Akihiro timid and boring, finds his curiosity has been piqued. Now, he's fallen hook, line, and sinker. He's ready to go at any time!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Anthology, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Yofukashi no Uta - Rakuen-hen
description: Anko and Ko are assigned to investigate a mysterious religious cult called "Paradise", after Amu Miyamoto from the idol group "Wednesday is Sunday" reaches out for assistance. Her fellow bandmate, Mei, is entangled with this sect. The group's enigmatic leader appears ageless and perpetually radiant, hinting at a vampiric nature. Their arrival in the secluded countryside where "Paradise" is based is met with suspicion and hostility... and thus, the pursuit kicks off!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
In ten or so years, in a future where resurrecting the dead is an everyday occurrence, the moon will collide with the Earth, bringing with it the end.
Before the apocalypse happens, Nekuro confesses to her best friend Kiri, who, seeing no hope for the future, takes her admirer's confession half-joklingly, until one day, Nekuro dies.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Zombies, Girls' Love, School Life, Tragedy

name: Magical Girl SMILE
description:
"I'm an average girl, living an average life."

One day Ayakami Mia attends school to confront her bullies, only to find out that she's ended up in a situation that she can't get out of, without the help of a magical creature named, Poppu.
tags: Demons, Superhero, Magical Girls, Self-Published, Magic, Doujinshi, Gore

name: Netsuzou Trap - NTR
description: Nervous about being alone with her new boyfriend, Takeda, Yuma insists that her once angelic childhood friend, Hotaru and Hotaru's boyfriend come along for a double date. But when Hotaru begins to touch Yuma and volunteers herself as "practice", Yuma feels inner turmoil as she enjoys the now devilish Hotaru's kiss more than Takeda's.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Watashi no Yuri wa Oshigoto desu!
description: Hime is a girl who has developed her cuteness as a deliberate act with the plan of marrying a billionaire. One day, she is more or less forced to work as a replacement for a girl injured by bumping into her in the street. The place of work is a concept cafe where the waitresses put on a show as though the cafe were run by the yuri cliche ojousama school. There's a large contrast between the performances and the off-duty staff.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hellsing - The Dawn
description: Hellsing, an organization devoted to the elimination of the vampire threat, has recently uncovered information regarding the attempted production of "man-made" undead. The world is presently in the thick of WWII, and the current leader of Hellsing fears the Nazis could potentially use these creatures as front-line super-soldiers. Although the technology of creating artificial vampires is still in its infancy, it has advanced enough to be a serious threat. In an attempt to put a stop to this perverse and dangerous experimentation, Hellsing has sent two of its most skillful agents to Poland. A young man by the name of Walter C. Dornes - a.k.a. "The Angel of Death," and Alucard, an ancient vampire currently in forced service to the Hellsing Organization. Together, they attempt to stop the progress of the Nazi's efforts.
tags: Genderswap, Historical, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Military, Horror, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: In the 1990s, in a rural town in Germany, a man named Theo leaves his hometown as if on the run. Theo is a man who leaves his hometown as if on the run and continues his aimless journey. His traveling companion is a bipedal talking cat. These two strange travelers meet a mysterious girl who is being chased by the police.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Kind Words
description: Kind words to her plant
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic

name: The Emperor's New Clothes
description: Not found

name: I Was Reborn as the Villainess' Father and I Need XXX to Survive?!
description:
We all know the isekai formula. The MC is always some nobody, they wake up in a perfect body, and they always end up dominating their new world. Sure, Satoru got the first two tropes, but he sure didn’t choose to be reborn as an evil king in his ex-girlfriend’s otome game. He’ll have to quickly figure things out before the hero slays him and his villainess daughter…. all while dealing with sexy magicians, handsy kings and a craving for men’s… *ahem* spiritual energy. Forty-five might be a bit late for a sexual awakening, but better late than never, right?  
  
*Note: This is a all new original English comic.*  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Level 999 Goblin
description:
The protagonist Kim Chulsoo works his ass off for a living as a manual laborer in real life and by grinding for and selling items in a game.

He finally gets the chance to switch to a hidden class, hoping for that one big shot in life…!

But the hidden class turns out to be... a Goblin Summoner?!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Trinity Seven: Levi Ninden
description: The Biblia Academy's Headmaster has asked to a Trinity Seven Kazama Levi, looking for the mythic weapon "Murasame", the legendary demonic sword. Along with Charme (Big Boobs), a kouhai mage that admires to Levi, she will infiltrate to a town where is said "Murasame" is sealed, however a Breakdown Phenomenon occurs—– Aiming to that treasure Lugh appears, who is the same "Envy" mage, also going to war, the leader of the Ninja Army's Five Shadow Magic Elements, Kashin Ryuhime, the story of a ninja having a heroic battleッス!!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Myst, Might, Mayhem
description:
All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?

name: Not found
description: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.

name: Not found
description:
A man who dies in a traffic accident is transmigrated in the world of [Echoes of Eternity], a game that he had played for a long time, and into the body of Silver Pierce. As the kingdom's strongest knight, Silver has cheat-level stats, and that makes him one of the best characters to become. However, he was also a character destined to die trying to save the protagonist and his companions at the end of the very first chapter...

The death event is unavoidable, and if he just left his companions and run away, the world would be destroyed - making it a certain game over! Determined to oppose his fate of dying, Silver plans to use his knowledge of the game to take the shortest route possible to clear the game. So, will Silver be able to survive his death events?!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: SWAN
description:
The dreams and passions of dancers for all ballet and manga fans. A masterpiece of ballet manga, depicting a girl who, while troubled and hurt, blossoms her unfathomable talent! 

A high quality volume long-awaited by fans, it includes color pages and chapter covers from the serialization, as well as newly-drawn manga showing what happened to the main character.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: My Internet Friends
description: In the near future, a team of misfits explore the ruins of the internet, searching for friendship and battling mutated memes!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Comedy, Self-Published, Virtual Reality, Horror

name: The Day of the Shooting Star
description: Chen Xin and Lin Anyun were looking up at the sky on an ordinary night after getting off work. They saw three shooting stars pass by at the same time and made their own wishes. When they woke up the next day, they found that their souls had been swapped and began a wonderful journey. In the process, the things that they usually ignored, the things they couldn't see clearly because of their own identities, what they wanted but couldn’t get, and the compromises they had to make... Were all solved miraculously. The two were attracted to each other and eventually they ran towards each other; turning into partners who worked and grew together hand in hand. When the night where three shooting stars pass by comes again, will they be able to return to being themselves?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Although Leon saved the kingdom—and even the world—from crisis, he hears from Marie that the game actually has a sequel.
If the same kind of events that Marie triggered were to happen in the Republic as well, the world could be headed toward destruction once again.
To prevent that crisis, Leon and Marie, along with the others, arrive in the Republic of Alzer as exchange students—but then...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents

name: Dawn the Teen Witch
description:
Has anyone ever made fun of your dream?  
  
Magic is something everyone in this world desires. Dawn Hill, with absolutely no experience in magic, has been accepted to the best magic school in Wuzhou. The only problem is she's the "worst student" they've ever seen. Faced with ridicule, rejection, and contempt, can the stubborn little witch fight back?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Osananajimi no Hito
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Due to certain circumstances, Heike Waku transfers to a new high school. There, he meets a very cool classmate named Oura-san. With a famous model for a sister and a face that never smiles, she seems like a distant and untouchable presence... or so it seemed. But by chance, Waku happens to catch a glimpse of Oura-san's dazzling smile. In that moment, his world changes completely! For that smile... I'll do anything!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02854/episode/416673)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The 11th hour
description:
*I love him when he's stanning but...*

On the day their favorite idol group disbands, a couple stands together in silence in a quiet corner of the venue. Their own relationship is also approaching a crossroads... A short one-shot by Kyo Yoneshiro!

*Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project*
[Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama

name: Springtime of Girls
description:
Akane, who's always longed for a fateful encounter like in shoujo manga, has entered a prestige all-girls high school, ran into a beautiful upperclasman Iori and fell in love on first sight. Wanting to get closer to her, Akane joins the student council, but how will she approach the flawless Iori-senpai?
A school yuri starring a heroine reject fantasizer girl and a perfect senpai who's always on her guard!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yarikonda Otome Game no Akuyaku Mob desu ga, Danzai wa Iya nanode Mattou ni Ikimasu
description: Kanda Hajime, an avid gamer and overworked office worker, collapses from exhaustion—only to wake up as Ridd, the villain of the otome game "TokiRella"! Awaiting him is an unavoidable fate: condemnation and ruin. Determined to escape this grim ending, Ridd leverages his sharp intellect and deep knowledge of the game to rewrite his destiny. His first goal? Mending his broken family—a cold, distant father, a lonely sister, and a bedridden mother. But as he sets out to change their fates, his actions ripple far beyond the game’s original story, igniting a revolution that will shake the entire continent!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?
description: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends, they have always been together. However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Koukyuu no Zatsuyouki
description:
Shaolan (Xiao Lian) is an orphaned girl who lives alone in the mountains at the very nook of an impoverished village. One day, an envoy from the palace arrives and scouts her to to be a lady-in-waiting for the imperial harem. This was how a wild girl raised on the mountains was able to live in a luxurious palace working as a lady-in-waiting, however...

On her first day (due to various reasons), Shaolan had suddenly become a criminal after slapping one of the consorts.

Though execution appeared certain, she was specially pardoned and demoted from a lady-in-waiting to a maidservant in charge of odd jobs. She is ridiculed by the other consorts as the, "Princess of Odd Jobs," however, this is where her rapid advance begins. She implements reforms to the worn-down palace and optimizes her chores through the knowledge she learned from her life of living in poverty, earning the gaze of the other ladies-in-waiting and the imperial consorts alike. Continuing these course of events, Shaolan's name spreads through the imperial palace, reaching even the emperor's ears...
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Shishosei
description: After with the sudden and mysterious death of the youth who was to be selected as the next king, the Library Tower, which housed all the books of the country, was sealed off. However, deep in the recesses of the tower, where no one should have been able to enter, sat the one who was known as the “Chief Librarian” (“Shisosei”). In the palace where rumors flutter about, conspiracies begin to swirl. What is the astonishing reality behind the connection of the youth's death, the Library Tower, and the country's secret tool, the Chief Librarian?
tags: Thriller, Historical, Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Tsuihou Sareta Teihen Shoku [Touzoku] wa Game Chishiki de Musousuru. Issho ni Shoukan Sareta Sensei mo Hazure Job Dattakedo Kouritsuteki ni Nariagarimasu
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Sword Art Online: Mother's Rosario
description: While Asuna, Leafa, Silica and Lisbeth were doing their homework in Kirito and Asuna's Log House on the 22nd Floor of New Aincrad, Lisbeth informed Asuna of a player known as Absolute Sword who was challenging players on the 24th Floor, while offering an 11-hit Original Sword Skill as a reward. Asuna was told that the mysterious player had actually converted from a different game and that over thirty players who had attempted to challenge the player, including Leafa and even Kirito, were defeated. Hearing that Kirito had said something to the player before being defeated and not sharing what he had said with the others and thinking that the mysterious player had come for a reason, Asuna decided to challenge the player as well. To her surprise, the player was actually a girl, named Yuuki.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Binetsu Kuukan
description: Akasegawa Naoya's mother remarried recently and he suddenly finds himself trying to get along with his new big sister Amane, a student of the prestigious Kasugano Girls' School. But his new big sister isn't like what you might first expect.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Slice of Life

name: Ano Koro no Aoi Hoshi
description: Koumoto Umi, a normal high school girl, falls in love with the pretty girl from the class next door, Segawa Shou. Even though she feels overwhelmed by her feelings, she can't help but want to get closer to the mysterious Shou.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
The apocalypse has arrived—devastation spreads, and human civilization teeters on the brink of collapse.
As the director of the last shelter, I bear the heavy responsibility of restoring hope for humanity!"

"CEOs, electricians, programmers—do you think your skills are useless in the apocalypse?
Don’t worry! Come to my underground shelter and assist me.

We need you!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Office Workers, School Life, Gyaru

name: 2-dome no Jinsei, to Omottara, Jitsu wa 3-dome Datta ~Rekishi Chishiki to Naisei Doryoku de Fukou na Rekishi no Kaihen ni Idomimasu~
description:
"This time, I'll protect my happy family for sure!"

Takhir, a young baron who had lost his beloved family, was unable to do anything and thus labeled as an incompetent. However, as he was dying, his time-space magic suddenly manifested and he regained the memories of his previous life before being transported back to his childhood?! He no longer faltered in the face of war or the epidemic. He vowed to use his revived modern knowledge to improve their level of civilization... and to change his family's fate!

By using his knowledge of the future, he was determined to reduce the damage caused by the poor harvest and flood, while doing everything he could to get talented individuals on his side, strengthening the Solis barony! By moving without concerning himself with the gaze of others, he would go beyond the Kair Kingdom, altering history across the entire continent! With his "family-first principle", the child prodigy would alter his depressing fate!
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Nihonkoku Shoukan
description: In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality's airspace. That UFO defied the Principality's common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking. Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan. According to them, their nation had been transported to another world. Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Longing to be a normie, I, Renako Amaori, am finally making my high school debut after working so hard for it. However due to my communication impairment, I have a gloomy aura. And after being in the normie group day in day out, I got so exhausted and said “I can't do this anymore,” and reached my limit!

During that time, I accidentally met the top student of our school. Perfect in face and figure, unrivaled in sword and pen, our school's best high school girl: Mai Odzuka.
We found in each other someone who we could open to and talk about our own troubles. What a nice friend I made, now I can surely get back on my own feet…is what I thought!

"It seems that you, even as a girl, have made me fall in love with you."
What!? Mai suddenly confessed to me. Wait! What about our friendship?

And so, we now have different feelings we can’t tell each other: friendship or a romantic relationship. We’re now presenting each other its benefits and put them into practice to see what kind of relationship works best for us. Will I succeed with a successful high school life…?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Persona 3
description:
A teenager who was orphaned as a young boy returns to the city of his childhood. Shortly after transferring to Gekkoukan High School, he is attacked by Shadows — creatures that feed on the minds of their victims. He soon discovers that he shares a special ability with other students at his new school. From them, he learns of the "Dark Hour," a hidden time that exists between one day and the next, swarming with Shadows. He joins the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (SEES), and with his new friends, confronts the threat of the Shadows.  
  
Based on the PlayStation 2 game of the same name.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Oshi V ga Oshiego de Watashi ga Mama de!?
description:
Karasawa Kazuki is a university student who wants to become an art teacher, and is middle of teaching-training. However, she's bothered by her student Tsubosaki Mimi, who gets involved with her at her teaching practice.

Kazuki finds solace in watching the VTuber "Tsubomi," who is her favorite VTuber But then she finds out that Mimi is Tsubomi's true identity...! Her favorite VTuber is her student, and the artist she admires is her teacher...!

A new sensation of VTuber x Yuri romantic comedy has begun!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course.

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.
___
**Character Designer:** [magako](https://mangadex.org/author/fd30d521-18ba-4638-94c3-700858ce7c43)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Night of the Soulless Heathens
description:
Azadin, a member of the cursed Messenger Clan, is born with the worst of curses. Lacking magical prowess, he becomes the lowest-ranking messenger, wandering the continent collecting gold coins in hopes of breaking his curse. 

But when his twin uncovers a great conspiracy, how will he face the impending doom?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Boukenka ni Narou! Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku
description:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Denkigai no Honya-san
description: Umio is a shy kid who just started his part time job at a manga store smack dab in the middle of the city. But his lifestyle isn't as glamorous as the neon lights that illuminate the city. Umio's closest friends are his co-workers who are all unique characters, to say the least, and although they're nice people, they have their quirks. They are a tight knit group of friends, have nicknames for each other and spend their weekends inside, sheltered from the extravagant scene happening on the outside.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Jungle Juice
description:
Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain. But underneath the perfect façade, he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost, Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.

But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Heavenly Grand Archive's Young Master
description:
The soul of the charming and imposing Martial Arts Alliance Leader, Hu-Gong, suddenly wakes up in the body of a young man.

That young man’s name is Beom-Hang. He’s the young master of the ‘Heavenly Grand Archive’, one of the three major archives of the Jianghu, yet he is a sorry excuse of a person.

To determine why his soul has swapped bodies, Hu-Gong begins to train Beom-Hang’s body. When the possessed young master of the Heavenly Grand Archive’s movements are totally different from how they used to be, it starts to attract the attention of the Jianghu...
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Apothecary Prince
description:
Doctor Lee Han is reborn as Lachiel, the sickly Crown Prince of the Empire of Magentano. Han is now armed with medical knowledge and skills found nowhere else in this new world - but can he heal an empire and mend his own body at the same time? 

Witness his journey of self-exploration and resilience as he maps destiny's meridian, in pursuit of the acupoint that can reverse his fate.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: System Universe
description: Derek lives by one creed. Fight, adapt, and rely only on himself. In the years after the System arrived on Earth and warped it into a monster-ridden wasteland, those rules forged him into one of Earth’s most powerful warriors. They let him thrive in the face of the Apocalypse — until the day he broke them. Failed by his teammates and sent through the void into an entirely new world, fate seems to have wanted Derek to start all the way back from the beginning at level 1. It’s a good thing he brought his old System with him.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work, lost his cat that he had kept for many years, and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning, he finds a beautiful, naked girl lying beside him...?
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Erased dj - Welcome Home, My Ataraxia
description:
Erased dj.
General: Yashiro Gaku & Fujinuma Satoru.
Takes place years after the last episode of Erased anime.
tags: Doujinshi, Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Far East Incident
description:
September 1945, Tokyo. A troubled post-war process is underway. 
It is the extermination of the Variants, human weapons created by the notorious 731 Unit: remnants of the war which are to be shut down.  
Yet a young immortal soldier girl, Saika, is determined to live and be free with the aid of Kankuro Konoe, a former combat medic, as her subordinate.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Fantasy

name: TS matome
description: A TS (Former Boys) Compilation posted by the author on X. I found it on pixiv though.
tags: Oneshot, Genderswap, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Fukushuu no Tensei Kizoku ~Subete wo Ubawareta Daikenja, Onore wo [Fukusei] shite Nidome no Sei wo Eru~
description:
In a world where abusing prisoners of war is considered normal, there was a genius mage named Rein who was bestowed the title of "Great Sage" despite being born as a prisoner. However, that prisoner along with his land and fame that he obtained, was nothing but thorn in the side of the nobles that needed to be purged. Rein, who was set up and killed mercilessly, used his magic to duplicate his own soul. He then reincarnates as the son and heir of his sworn enemy, and swears revenge against the nobles that killed him! Come, it's purging time.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63075)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kokuhaku
description:
It's a typical confession scene of a boy confessing his love to a girl... Or is it?

(It's just a single panel lel)
tags: Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Great Heavenly Demon Sovereign
description:
Bu Eun-seol is a boy who lost his grandfather to an unknown assassin.

To seek vengeance, he devours the Ten Gates of Martial Arts and the blood-soaked battlefield, reborn as the strongest in the martial world.

“I will find you and kill you.”

Now, in the sacred land of the Ten Thousand Demons, a divine demon awakens, poised to devour the martial world.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kaii-san and I
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)

**Notes:**
- The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters.
- This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.
tags: Ghosts, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: 200 M Saki no Netsu
description: Kikka Tsumugu (28 years old) lives alone on the 2nd floor of an apartment building. Kikka, who works as a wasai (traditional Japanese clothing manufacturer) at home, is a job given by Mashimo, her ex-boyfriend from high school. One day Kikka was selected to be a board member of the apartment complex lives at and met with a man named Hirara...!? Mashimo lives 200 meters away from Kikka's house and Hirara lives 200m above. The vertical and horizontal romance triangle has begun!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yurigami-sama no Iutoori!
description: The cheerful and energetic gyaru, Anzai Eri, dies after falling down a flight of stairs. In the afterlife, she meets Polero, a yuri-obsessed shinigami, who offers to bring her back to life - on one condition! "Get together with the girl you love!" Eri's crush is Seike Fumi, a high-spec ojou-sama from her school. But she was always too embarrassed to even talk to her... To help her out, Polero assigns Eri a series of "missions" to being them closer together - but the missions turn out to be a bit too bold and daring...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Gyaru

name: Sword Art Online - Dengeki Comic Anthology
description:

description: From Maiu Cafe: A girl searching for love meets a caring boy at a café. Drawn to him, she gets closer… but are their feelings truly mutual? A sweet and uncertain romance unfolds behind the counter.

name: Moralis Scandal
description: Lorena chose death to avenge her ruined life—but wakes up in the past. This time, she’ll protect her family and destroy her husband through a scandalous divorce. To do it, she needs a mad dog to hunt the beast. Let the revenge begin.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Blue Archive! (Global)
description:
Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.

The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.

name: Not found
description:
"The world of zombies might be pretty great!"

Eko-chan, a victim of bullying, enjoys the devastated world with her first friend, who has become a zombie. They set off on a survival adventure, all while her friend slowly loses her humanity...

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen
description:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hakone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Mizuno Shinobu no Risou no Renai
description: Mizuno is a thirty-something office worker who is not good at real love and loves shojo manga. While he is tormented by regret after spending the night with Meguro, a subordinate he has a crush on, under the influence of alcohol, Meguro casually proposes to them that they go out together...!?
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~
description: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Goshujin-sama Shika Katan! Light BL Anthology ~Bokutachi Kedamono Goshujin no Koi Mimamoritai~
description:
Rooting for my dear owner's love!!!!!

Pomeranians, raccoons, cats, beavers, dragons, ponies, hamsters, ring-tailed lemurs... So many cute animals!

A 200% therapeutic, new take on the youth BL anthology scene!

Cover by Kasukabe Akira

name: Serial Killer Isekai ni Oritatsu
description:
A murderer who can't stop the urge to kill people, even though he wants to stop, is happy when his desired death sentence is carried out - only to be reincarnated into another world. The mission entrusted to him by the goddess was to kill 12 reincarnated people using his murderous impulses! Not all reincarnated people are saints!

**Notes:**
- With the debut of the spinoff series, it was revealed that “Hitotsubu Ichigo” (the credited author) was actually an alias of Kawamoto Homura. Starting with Volume 5, the credited author is “Kawamoto Homura”.
- Won the Rakuten Kobo Ebook Award 2024 Special Award.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Crime, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Tragedy
