description:
The white and black maid are against each other, trying to win the love of their young master, who will be victorious? Guess we'll find out~

---

tags: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Survey Reports of Goblins & Evil Spirits
description: Sakaki is transferred to a paranormal investigation agency and is partnered with Kunugi, an old high school classmate. Unfortunately, Sakaki has a strong sensitivity to the supernatural and is afraid of ghosts, and together, the unlikely duo investigate cursed and haunted locations.
tags: Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Will You Let Me Stay Here?
description: I want to be the reason you, whose name I don't even know, choose to live one more day tomorrow.
tags: Psychological, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic

name: Destined Killer
description:
"I can see your number. The number of people you will kill in the future." 

If he kills before they kill, the murder will not occur. Serial killer Number punishes the 'Destined Murderers' one at a time under that resolution. Could his wish to create a world without murder through murder ever be accomplished?
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Tadano Kougyou Koukou no Nichijou
description: Tadano Technical High School is located in a remote area of a snowy country. The students there are Akazaki, who has blonde hair and piercings but holds a national qualification, Kacchan, who will even get a Grade 4 in order to raise his hourly wage, and Yacchin, who is a technical student but is worse at specialized subjects than general subjects, and other delightful students! The industrial youth comedy that is the talk of social media is starting!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Imokusa Reijou desu ga Akuyaku Reisoku wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita
description:
Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.

---
* [Orignal Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2047go/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Karakuri Circus
description:
Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome, a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan, where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.  
  
One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11), the recent inheritor of a huge fortune, who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins, he steps in to protect the boy, only to discover that instead of conventional weapons, the assassins wield huge, eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown), who controls a puppet of her own, and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.  
  
Their paths intertwine and diverge, splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus, puppets and performers, tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome, the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane, and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
tags: Action, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: CITY
description:
The manga centers on Nagumo, a penniless college student who moves to a town filled with bizarre people.
___
[Alternative Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/city/)

name: A Meek Little Brother Like Me
description:
Tetsuya reunites with his elder sister after their mother passed away.  
  
This oneshot appears in volume 30 of *ハルタ* (Hull) magazine.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror

name: Not found
description: A clap of thunder on a clear day sent depressed salaryman Yi Qiu ten years into the past. Now, with the opportunity to revisit highschool as a girl and interact with her former friends…and her former self…she'll encounter action, occasional romance, more tangential subplots than you can shake a stick at…and just maybe, the possibility of changing history for the better.
tags: Time Travel, Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

description: An FGO personal collection featuring gag works popular since the early anthologies, now with newly drawn content.

description: Sequel to [Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong](https://mangadex.org/title/757ffc27-5baf-40c3-9bad-3a1859837936)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: After being transported to another world with all of his classmates, Yoshitsune was ordered to conquer the dungeon as a hero. While his peers were all reeled in and tamed by the offer of unlimited sex with the castle maids, Yoshitsune, a low-rank hero, devoted his cheat skills to getting more and more maid wives...
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Supreme Curse Master
description: Ye Lin transmigrated into a world overrun by demons and monsters. On the day of his class transfer, he became an SSS-rank Forbidden Spellcaster—and was immediately met with ridicule. Why? Because casting forbidden spells costs lifespan, and most Forbidden Spellcasters die young. But only Ye Lin knows: with his immortal body, the profession’s fatal flaw means nothing to him. When Ye Lin casually unleashed hundreds of forbidden spells in a single move, everyone around him was terrified. “How many lives do you have?!” “You’re using forbidden spells like normal attacks?!”
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Seishun wa Sankakukei no Loop
description:
Because I've been watching her more closely than anyone else, I could tell. That she's fallen in love. And that the one she's in love with... is my best friend—our mutual childhood friend. Determined to let go of his own feelings and support her love instead, the protagonist, Tsubaki, makes up his mind. Thanks to his efforts, the two childhood friends—always by each other's side—finally end up together. After seeing it all through, Tsubaki spends a sleepless night, choking on the urge to scream... And then, when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself back one week in the past, to the moment before he gave up on his feelings.

(Source: ComicWalker, edited)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Midari ni Tsukasete wa Narimasen
description: Tamotsu Sugawara, a corporate employee who can't say no to anything, finds himself unable to go to work and decides to recuperate for a while at his family's shrine. One night, a ghost that looks exactly like Makoto Hiiragi, a university student working part-time at the shrine during the day, appears before him.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
High school student Hayato Katsuragi dies in a traffic accident and is reincarnated as Reivelt Runwalker, the son of a noble in another world.

At the time of his reincarnation, the goddess bestows upon him a cheat skill with no level limit, but at the same time, he also acquires the most terrifying skill, “The One Afflicted by Hardship”.

With his life now guaranteed to be in hard mode, Reivelt resolves to undergo training and become stronger.

While receiving his lessons, he enjoys a happy life alongside his cute maid and his little sister, but then they are attacked by a massive horde of monsters all of a sudden!
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Melt Away! Mizore-chan
description: Follow the antics of a snowman turned Yuki-Onna hellbent on destroying the sun with the help of a child named Himari and her Aunt Koharu.
tags: Comedy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Side stories (and extra content) from the author's X.

**Note:** If a chapter name starts with “(Ch. X)”, that means it includes spoilers for Ch. X of the main story.
tags: Comedy, Superhero, Web Comic

name: My Childhood Friend Teaches Me Everything
description: The boy teaches the girl nearly everything he knows when she got troubles.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Made in Abyss - Made from Fortunes (Doujinshi)
description:
The Abyss. A giant pit filled with gigantic cave system that goes down to extreme unknown depths, filled with wonderful and terrifying treasures and creatures never before seen. Only the bravest of the delvers are able to see what horrors truly lie in wait at the bottom. 
People are familiar with the great story of Made in Abyss, following a young orphaned cave raider, a mysterious amnesiac robot, and a tragic narehate. But, what if something went differently? What if one single decision changed these unfortunate childrens' story?

Up on Orth a pair of friends, Fyuo and Kwazan, a newly promoted red and blue whistle start experiencing a few strange things happening to them. Fyuo is having dreams of an unfamiliar figure and Kwazan decides to help him figure out the cause of these nightmares using notes she stole from another delver. But, what they find waiting for them only a few hundred meters down, will change their lives forever.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Sadaka-san and I
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Yuri 100
description: Posting one-page yuri every day for 100 days!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Igyou Atama-san to Ningen-chan (Pre-Serialization)
description: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Web Comic

name: Yoru no Namae o Yonde
description: Deep in the forest, a curious pair resides: a young girl Mira, whose affliction leads her to call forth darkness whenever she's in distress, and her physician Rei, determined to seek a cure. Each day, she works to remember the light and bring back the person she used to be. But a sudden visit from Rei's friend, who harbors an interest in Mira's illness, may be the end of their peaceful days…
tags: Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Fuufu de Itonamu Monster Farm ~Mezase, Mattari Slow Life~
description: Haito and Lina, a newlywed couple, purchase the full-dive VR game "Free Frontier Online". Their reason for playing is to be able to pet and fluff as many monsters as they wish! The two, who are unable to keep pets due to animal allergies, come up with the idea that they can interact with fluffy animals as much as they want in the game, so they start the game as tamers. They thought they started with the purpose of relaxing with the monsters, but before they knew it, they ended up obtaining a familiar stronger than the monsters...!? They will tame, they will battle and they will flirt!
tags: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Coronica no Nou
description: Zero grew up in an orphanage. Contrary to the orphanage's philosophy of "If you want it, believe in and fight for it," Zero hates competition and conflict and prefers peaceful days. However, after discovering a certain secret, Zero finds himself caught up in the whirlpool of a cruel fate...!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Military, Drama, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Sumino, a first-year high school student, enrolls in a prestigious soccer school in Kamakura but breaks his leg soon after joining the team. Unable to practice and feeling out of place, he spends his days wandering aimlessly and his nights partying. Then one day, he meets Aoki, an older man working at an izakaya, and slowly begins to experience emotions he has never felt before. A story of one unforgettable summer, both the worst and the best.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kensei no Osananajimi ga Power Harass de Ore ni Tsuraku Ataru no de, Zetsuen Shite Henkyou de ma Kenshi to Shite Denaosu Koto ni Shita
description:
The power harassment from Alfine ー his girlfriend and childhood friend ー who is the same age, grew up with him, and became adventurers together, is painful. She is a peerless beauty, a person with the title "Sword Master" and called the "Flawless Sword Goddess," a capable woman with achievements recognized by the kingdom and rewarded with appointment as a knight and became a noble. On the other hand, he is treated as that capable woman, Alfine’s accessory, gets abusive language hurled at him by her, and suffers from her harsh power harassment and insults to him as an adventurer, resulting in him losing his dignity as a man and as a person He has resigned himself to spending his daily life in the position of a lover-caretaker.  
  
However, changes came to that daily life. Alfine, who becomes busy as the kingdom's knight, often is unable to take part in adventures. As a result, the times he takes requests alone increases, and he is able to regain his lost dignity. Then he becomes aware of the abnormality of his circumstances. So, to regain himself, he chooses to leave her and her repeated power harassment behind. In addition to all of the equipment he has received until then, he returns his sword, one of a pair they had exchanged when they became adventurers. Declaring that they are over, he leaves the place quickly.  
  
"From now on, I will change my name and appearance and live freely."  
  
As soon as he decides that, everything goes well. When he realizes, he is praised by the people around him and is the greatest adventurer on the frontier. What's more, he got a proposal to marry the frontier lord’s daughter from a female adventurer.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Borderline
description:
Mok-yeon receives a proposal for a threesome from his friend and sex partner, Sun-hwa. The other person is Nan-jo, a man that Sun-hwa has been wooing, and while he's great to have around because he's rich and kind, the problem is that he is boring to have sex with. At first, Mok-yeon was just a little curious about Nan-jo, but throughout the threesome, he couldn't take his eyes off Nan-jo. Mokyeon makes a seductive offer to Nan-jo, who wants to save Sun-hwa from him.

“I'd like to have a taste of your body, Nan-jo. Would you be willing to spread your legs for me?”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Full Color

description: The official Spinoff manga, following Konata and her friends in their 30s.

description: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.

name: Bloody Sweet
description: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

name: Midori no Makibao
description:
Midori Makibao is a small white racehorse. Compared to other thoroughbred horses, he looks more like a donkey with wide nostrils. However, with his guts and speed as his weapon, Makibao wins in every big race. In the beginning of his career, Makibao had a trouble making his debut as a racehorse, because of his appearance and various disadvantages he had. But Makibao had reasons to overcome his difficulties; there was a lifelong rival horse called Superhorse Cascade, that Makibao needed to defeat. Plus, he was determined to win back his mother, a horse that had been taken away for pay back the debt on the farm. There are many hardships that Makibao has to overcome, but he thrives in the series of races to become a great racehorse  

---  
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Children in 1997**
tags: Award Winning, Animals, Comedy, Sports

name: RWBY: Official Manga Anthology

name: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
description:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

name: Karasu no Kachou-sama!
description: Nitori is dead. Or at least he should be, except, he was sent by mistake to the Bird Afterlife instead of the human one. Chief Karasuma, a raven deity and also a salaried afterlife manager, is unamused at first, but then concedes to give Nitori a chance to work for him. Nitori loves birds, and even more so, he loves chief Karasuma, with his glossy feathers and powerful beak. How will he manage this strange new... afterlife?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: TRIP LOVERS -Tsui no Te-
description:
On his way home from work after an all-nighter, the workaholic Dr. Jikumaru Touji falls through a mysterious hole and wakes up in... another world!
There, he stumbles upon the nearly dead assassin Naina and saves him with his "healing powers," but come morning, he discovers that for some reason, he now looks like a kid!?
Jik (Jikumaru) starts looking for a way to return, while Naina protects him from this strange new world where the only law seems to be the law of the jungle. While Jik is busy with that, though, he starts to feel that maybe living in this world together with Naina wouldn't be so bad... but is that possible?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Boku no Danna-sama
description: A love story between a young cat and a protective dog.
tags: Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Super Robot Wars Anthology Comic Suparobo Comic Z
description: A one-shot based on the Super Robot Wars series.

name: Futari Pocchi: Together Alone
description:
Kaoru Matsubara, a common girl, and Reiko Higaki, a girl from a zaibatsu family, are two girls who attend the prestigious Aisei Girls College. They are complete opposites in their upbringing and personalities, and can hardly stand each other. However, when their parents remarry, they become sisters! The two clash and quarrel, but gradually come to an understanding, and many complicated feelings begin to emerge as they develop a bond... Riyoko Ikeda delicately depicts the emotional turmoil of adolescent girls as they face the absurdities of the world on a journey that can only be embarked by the two of them alone!

Note: Also contains the one-shot Gomennasai: Ryoko Hagiwara, an elementary school girl, decides to stand up for Yasue Yamada, an impoverished girl in her class. Little did she know the harsh reality awaiting her... A work that frankly depicts class divide and privilege, and how children emulate the practices and discrimination of adults.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Little Landlady
description:
After meeting terrible ends in her first two lives, Vivielle Andante didn't have high hopes for her third. Luckily, she's reborn as a wealthy duke's daughter this time. The catch? The kingdom is quite literally crumbling due to the lack of architects. Vivielle may still be a child, but she has lifetimes' worth of training as an architect stored in her brain! If she rolls up her sleeves and gets to work, can she lay a strong foundation for her future and build back up hope in the kingdom?

---
In her third life, she was reborn as the only daughter of a villain that didn’t have blood nor tears. People lived in a house that was on the verge of collapsing, so she designed a building using her previous life’s knowledge. However, her dad caught her and—

"We passed a bill that the building's ownership would be given to the person who organized the building's construction."

She became the owner of a large building.

'Let's just get some slush funds and retire!'

"The lady kept me from getting hungry!"

"I can sleep in a warm, new house thanks to milady!"

"The youth employment rate rose sharply!"

What did I do? Is it such a big deal that everyone had to praise me this much? To make things worse, my father found out about my plan to flee from home…

"What did I do wrong? I'll fix everything, so don't leave."

"T-that's not it…"

"I'll give you anything you want. Oh, right, didn’t the emperor’s son bother you? I can also cut the emperor's neck, what do you think?"

Then, like a bolt from the blue, he thought of starting a war.

'Why do I keep getting more work?'

…C-can I retire safely?

---

name: Renai Hensachi Kaisouroku
description:
While reminiscing about the good old days at a middle school reunion, Kusui is unable to stop thinking about his first love: his middle school boyfriend Chizuwa, a petite classmate with a shy smile. A special guest crashes the party, and this confident man in a suit turns out to be none other than Chizuwa, who’s here to confront Kusui about the end of their relationship. 
The debut work of promising author Shinachaso!

name: Not found
description:
Gentlemen in wolves' clothing.

Hidden underneath a “wild” appearance is an elegant and intelligent side.
Wolves that are loyal to their instinct, but also deeply affectionate.
A new experience awaits you: bonding with beastmen.
tags: Animals, Romance, Anthology

name: Tantan to Tanto
description:
Koutarou and Shunpei were classmates, childhood friends and neighbors. They were almost like brothers, Shunpei even stayed in Koutarou's house while his parents worked.  
  
"But we're not family or brothers, and we haven't been kids for a long time."
tags: Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tears on a Withered Flower
description:
Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

---
Romance, flowers, and dates-- once upon a time, that was the perfect description of Haesu and Mincheol. Now, all Haesu has is the ashes of their marriage and a mountain of debt. But her world shatters completely when Mincheol cheats on her with a young coworker. Hurt and betrayed, Haesu finds herself drawn to Taeha, a young man who seems desperate for her affection… and may be hiding more than he shows.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Mafia, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Hisame Furaba Koi Chigiri
description:
"I'll have you join me in matrimony..."

Toono Itsuki is a university student who majors in folkore studies. He's currently headed towards his grandparents' hometown as part of his thesis' fieldwork. There, a local warned him to "not get close to the mountain on days when the rain is cold". Despite the warning, Itsuki still went towards it and there he met!?

Here's a BL about a local god and a folklore geek!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Supernatural

name: Akumade Taidana Akuyaku Kizoku
description: Luke is the languid second son of a villainous duke. By some unexpected instance, he comes to know of his own fate and in an attempt to avoid his own fate he works hard at finding a peaceful family to marry into and researching magic. All his hard work is to live a peaceful and slothful life... And yet he gets involved in one pain to deal with after the other!? The road to laziness is a steep one!

name: Sekai de Yuuitsu no Tenshokushi: Job Hopper na Ore wa, Isekai de Subete no Job o Kiwameru Koto ni Shita
description:
Tsukasa, a company employee who repeatedly changes jobs in search of better conditions, challenges the final interview of a major corporation.  But as soon as he went past the door, he found himself in another world. His past career seems completely irrelevant, leading to a sense of discouragement. But, the "Job Changer" bestowed upon him grants him a unique ability!

With the power to freely switch between jobs like swordsman, mage, spear user, alchemist, appraiser, pharmacist, and more, he begins a leisurely life in this different world. Whether dealing with monsters or making use of abundant knowledge from herbs to items, he adapts effortlessly, engaging in everything from helping people to earning money. 

Unstoppable with his versatile skills, the powerful corporate slave leaps into a fantasy of career advancement!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: There were once two heroes who defeated the Demon King: Aino the Swordswoman and Iro the Mage. Before the world attained its peace, the two girls made a promise to travel the world together after the Demon King's defeat. This is their heartrending but dazzling journey across a fantasy world.

name: Maybe Meant to Be
description: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’

name: My Partner's Tastes and Fetishes
description: Jun, who lives a perfect life. He was full of confidence that he would take first place this semester as well, but it got taken over by the over motivated Cha Si Won. Even on the day of the farewell party, Jun gets drunk and kisses Si Won. To cover the dark story, he takes a leave of absence and goes to the army. But after 2 years, Jun and Si Won have returned to school together. They seem to have a lot in common, they have the same classes, they continue to meet each other and they also have the same phone model. Jun shudders at the constant feeling of being associated with Si Won. He tries to relax his stress with the Phone Sex, but due to the accidental change of cell phones, Si Won discovers Jun's sexual preference (SM) …
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Full Color

name: she is beautiful
description: In the mysterious institution of Familie, girls are raised in isolation. Kurumi, a resident child, falls asleep the day before her 10th birthday. When she next awakes, 14 years have passed. The curtain opens on this tale of misfortune, following Kurumi's journey in an unfamiliar place, surrounded by friends who have long since grown up, and ridden with missing memories.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Girls' Love, Drama, Mystery

name: Yeon Lok Heun
description:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**

name: Karakida-ke no Kosho-gurashi
description:
The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinbouchou. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Chirizokonai no Hiraeth
description:
Sanayama Kazura, a girl who just wants to be loved, discovers that the girl she had been spending all of her money on to look her way has betrayed her. In her moment of despair, she is approached by Yoshibe Kinka, who asks if she would like to die with her. Together, they head to the top of a high-rise apartment bulding and jump off it. However...

A story of two women at a crossroads in their lives, facing the feelings they've kept deep inside their hearts.
tags: Time Travel, Psychological, Girls' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Leo Zeal aims to become an adventurer and arrives in Innsbruck, a town built around the great labyrinth where the Demon King lives. After losing consciousness after being caught up in the collapse of the Demon King's statue, Leo remembers that he is the reincarnation of Hirase Yoshito, a Japanese man who died in an unexpected accident. 

Determined to succeed as an adventurer so as not to repeat the misery of his past life, Leo spends the day actively and goes to sleep looking forward to tomorrow. However, when Leo wakes up, he has been transported to the moment when the Demon King's statue collapses again. All the events that occur from there are the same as "what he experienced yesterday," and Leo realizes that the day is in a loop...! 

What will Leo's fate be? 

A slightly ecchi x time loop x otherworldly fantasy begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Hopeless Kacchan's Love Story
description:
Nobuyuki Fukumoto's very first work is about a rowdy, alcoholic high schooler who finds love in a childhood friend.

---
- **Winner of the Outstanding New Author Award in the 7th Tetsuya Chiba Awards**
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Comedy

name: Toki no Yuusha
description: In a world where half of humanity's territory has been taken by demons, Balt, who bears the crest of the hero, is the hope of humanity. Just before his 17th birthday and his heroic powers awaken, Balt learns a certain truth…
tags: Time Travel, Action, Demons, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Uchi no Kanojo wa Tangan-Chan
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: In her previous life, An Nuan was murdered by a scumbag and his family due to her naiveté. Upon waking up, An Nuan returns to the time before her marriage to the scumbag. Drawing on her memories from her previous life, she decides to team up with the scumbag's nemesis, Ye Jinghuai, to forge a fake marriage and undo the scumbag's and his family's betrayal. However, during this engagement, the two gradually begin to fall in love, developing genuine feelings for each other.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Vindicating the Villain
description: Kayan is a villain. His task is to be a whetstone for the male lead, to make him a suitable male lead. However, the male leads he met were all defects. They all lacked motivation. Even when they had him under their feet, they were indifferent. So Kayan changed his strategy. He worked hard to bond with the male lead, and after gaining their trust and affection, he suddenly turned hostile and betrayed them, stabbed him in the back, framed them, etc. Everything that villains do, he did to the male lead. Sure enough, the male lead became monstrously powerful and very qualified to be the male lead. Kayan is very satisfied, and none of the male leads can take revenge against him, and once he completes his villain's task, he can go to the next world. Until... After Kayan completed all his tasks, the system told him: [You must return to every world you completed tasks in, and survive for ten years.] Kayan was silent: [Say that again.] System: [You must return to every world you completed tasks in and survive for ten years]
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: To My Beloved Enemy
description:
"This makes it the 562nd time I’ve killed this bastard."

Centuries ago, a monster by the name of Shinyoung cursed Dongyi with immortality. For years, he’s done nothing but wait for the perfect chance to get revenge, but killing an immortal is nearly impossible. Trapped in a twisted, endless cycle, he’s long since given up and settled into a strange form of cohabitation with his greatest enemy. But one day, when Shinyoung pushes him too far, Dongyi actually manages to kill him. Shinyoung, who always comes back laughing, doesn’t return this time.

An uneasy feeling creeps in, and Dongyi sets out to find him, only to discover that Shinyoung, for some reason, has lost all memories of him. "If you forget about me… then what happens to my revenge?!"
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: The Tale of Zatoichi NOIR
description:
A new kind of jidaigeki (period drama) action series, reconstructing the legendary masterpiece of “the strongest”!

The Edo era, on the eve of the Bakumatsu, under the Tenpō era name.
Inflation, rice shortages, political corruption, epidemics… In a world where common people suffer, a swordsman who has lost his sight and an Akita dog journey together in pursuit of “justice” and “strength.”
Where did they come from, and where are they heading?
At the end of their path, will they find light—or darkness?

The young talent Fusai Naba, known for ALIENS AREA and Kyokuto Necromance, reconstructs the immortal classic Zatōichi Monogatari (by Kan Shimosawa)!
A completely new Zatōichi is born here!
tags: Historical, Action, Samurai, Gore

name: Kyou mo Kitansu ka, Yoda-senpai.
description: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Class president and overall good girl Koguma is concerned that her classmate Hino often skips classes by spending her time behind one of the school buildings. Koguma feels it's her duty to guide Hino down a better path, even if it means going along with Hino's unusual requests.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: FANMADE Dragon Ball : Desire
description: Not found
tags: Action, Comedy, Superhero, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Olivia and the Neverending Dream
description: Olivia, the daughter of a duke, is betrayed by her fiancé, Crown Prince Luke, and is publicly executed. However, the moment Olivia thinks she has lost her life, she wakes up as Hanabi, a high school girl in a different world: Japan. What's more, it seems that Hanabi is being bullied at school...? The story of a duke's daughter's rise to power is about to begin!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Goth Loli-chan to Mondaiji-kun
description:
The high school girl Ayame's love of gothic lolita style is found out by Mizuno Hiro, a boy known as the school's biggest delinquent. Ayame fears that her hobby will become exposed at school, or suffer some other terrible consequence, but for some reason, Hiro invites her on a date instead. As they spend time together, Ayame begins to feel that he is not as bad as he is rumored to be.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Smash Legends
description:
SMASH LEGENDS is a contest held as a way to resolve a sudden conflict that was brought to the fairy tale world, the Library World.
The fight begins now, where fairy tale characters seeking to achieve their personal goals vie for the fabled prize, “Write-O'-Light”, a fragment of light that holds the power to make one’s wishes come true!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Kyosuke Murata, a third-year student at Kita High, lives with his mother. He is a quarrelsome and single-minded man. Kyosuke's real father was Shozo Murata, the head of the Murata group. Kyosuke, who is devoted to quarreling in love, is involved in the conflict between the yakuza organizations, the Kanazawa-Murata group and the Matsuyama-Date group because of his birth! Kyosuke Murata's turbulent youth begins now. A representative work of Motomiya's hard-line manga.
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Delinquents

name: Mou Yamete Kaifuku Shinaide Kenja-sama!
description:
"I will become a hero!"

With that dream in her heart, Shirumiruku Eru became an adventurer. But because she had no special skills, she struggled to find companions. That's when she got the chance to join the dungeon investigation led by Yuris, a great sage who specializes in healing. However, rumor has it that all adventurers who accompanied Yuris have had their spirits broken and abandoned their path as adventurers halfway through... You see, Yuris had a bizarre interest in getting excited by the sight of female adventurers being attacked by monsters.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71785)
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy

name: Watashi no Uchuu
description: Upon transfering to a new school Alice meets Uchuu, a gloomy classmate.  He reveals to her that their world is a manga of which he is the protagonist. With this revalation Alice starts occasionally noticing text bubbles appearing accompanied by the feeling of being watched.
tags: Romance, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Uma Musume - Pretty Derby: Uma Musumeshi
description: In their daily lives, as well as their special moments, Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"♪
tags: Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Botsuraku Yotei Nanode, Kajishokunin wo Mezasu
description: The main character is reborn as a character from a game he played in his previous life. This character falls into ruin along with the villainess, spending the last of their years together. A man named Kururi Helan. No details of this decline is written inside the game, it can´t be understood why this sub-character ended up with the villainess route. However, that is of no importance. Living as a needy farmer along with someone is unpleasant, so the main character seeks a profession. For now, he aims for becoming a blacksmith as he originally had skill in it.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kurorekishi ni Yoroshiku
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Iver is a dragon maou who stopped trying after historical heroes defeated her every time she resurrected. But the present day hero, Mirio, who found the holy sword by pure chance falls in love with her. And thus forms the couple of the maou with no self-esteem and the dopey hero.
___
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Magazine Pocket](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496790830789)
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/56470)
- [Alternative Official Raw on Kodansha Comic Plus](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000041454)
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Teen Web Novelist is a Girl Magnet: Now My Crush Feels Bad for Rejecting Me!
description:
Yuta Uematsu is a aspiring novel writer who has long had feelings for his childhood friend Michiru Okuwa, who had always supported his creative work. He finally decided to confess his love to her, even though he didn't feel like he was a match for Michiru, the most popular girl at school. When Michiru brushed him off with the words, "It's impossible!" and stormed out, Yuta was left stunned in disbelief. Michiru went back to reading "Digital Masters," a very popular web novel. However, "Digital Masters" was actually Yuta's work...

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Shinimodori Koujo wa Kurikaesu Sekai wo Owarasetai
description:
"I can't afford to die yet...!"
At a royal soirée, Lady Lillianna, a noblewoman, is publicly rejected by the crown prince—and shortly after, she is attacked by an unknown assailant and loses her life...
However, when she opens her eyes, she finds herself back on the day before the soirée!

With the help of a mysterious man named Zeke, Lillianna begins to fight to change her fate. As they're drawn into a certain incident and get closer to the truth, both she and Zeke lose their lives once again—only to find themselves back on the day before the soirée!?

To break free from the cycle of repeated deaths, Lilli and Zeke's battle begins now!
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - We Are Roommates (Doujinshi)
description:
Bari and Chev are a bit like sisters! I'd be happy if you can enjoy the daily life of the two of them where nothing really happens.
Artist socials: [Twitter](https://x.com/Taratine_831)
[Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/988588)
[Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=25867)
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Oshite Dame nara Oshite miro!
description: Girl who is only romantically attracted to snakes falls in love with her teacher.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Violence Jack
description:
September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Let's Eat a Pie in the Sky
description: Tougo is a high school student who loves drawing more than anything. One day, he woke up in a deep forest filled with vegetations he had never seen before... While he went on an exploration finding answers in this new world, he found them without putting much effort. When he drew a Mochi using pencil and paper, something unusual happened...?! Not just a log house but legendary beasts too?! With ability to bring anything into being, he creates a paradise for everyone! A young boy who unbeknownst to him is loved by others.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kimi wa Seifuku wo Nuidara
description:
Kozu Ippei, a high school boy with a scary-looking face but mature (motherly) personality, runs into Yayoi, a cute but devious college girl. Misunderstandings lead to more misunderstandings, as they fall in love.

(Source: Ichijin Plus)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Boku wa Konyaku Haki Nante Shimasen kara ne
description:
"Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"  
  
The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!  
  
This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate.
___
**Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: [2♡♡8 Youth] Unrequited Love Defense
description:
There are times in our youth that are awkward, messy, and unforgettable that stay with us forever. In the heart of adolescence, this is the story of first love. 

Mingyu has quietly loved his childhood friend, Jiwoo, for as long as he can remember.
Every time she laughs, complains, or casually drifts closer, his feelings deepen slowly but surely. The problem? Jiwoo has always had a thing for a very specific type: big, muscular "beast-like" guys. That's the total opposite of Mingyu. Thankfully, she’s never seriously liked anyone in real life so Mingyu has stayed in his role as the dependable “guy friend,” standing loyally by her side. But one calm autumn day, his peaceful world is shattered. “Joo Mingyu… I think I’m in love.” Out of the blue, Jiwoo falls head over heels for Kang Taemin, the captain of the school volleyball team. Now faced with the terrifying possibility that this might be her first real love, Mingyu realizes: it’s do-or-die. Determined not to lose her, he sets out on a last-ditch mission to become her ideal type… even if it means becoming a swole “muscular man” overnight!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Full Color

name: The Strongest Earthbound Spirit and the Guy With No Spiritual Sense
description:
On the last day before a guy who can't sense any spirits at all moves out from his supposedly haunted house, Kinako-sama, the self-proclaimed strongest earth-bound spirit, will try her best to scare the living hell out of the guy before he leaves for good.
___
**KADOKAWA Version Links:**
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0BW9BSLZ7)
- [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/745607/)
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Ore ni Dake Koakuma na Kouhai wa Genjitsu demo Kawaii ga, Yume no Naka de wa Motto Kawaii
description:
"I know we both have feelings for each other, so please confess quickly, Senpai!"

Keigo, the strict and disliked student council president, and Chiharu, a junior council member who is the child of famous actors and is well-behaved and popular, are both unaware that the other has feelings for them, making it hard for them to get closer. One day, they buy matching amulets at a matchmaking shrine, and that night, they meet in a dream. Since it's just a dream, they reveal their true feelings and passionately confess to each other.

"Don't act flirtatiously with someone like me, who's an outcast!"
"But I like you! Everything I do is for the sake of being united with you, Senpai!"

However, is Keigo the only one who remembers the events of the dream—? In reality, she's a cunning little devil, but in the dream, her feelings are fully exposed, leading to a reversal of roles?!
tags: Romance, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, a half-ogre, half-human girl. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new "Demon King Candidate" from the Ogre village.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: How to Be a Family
description: Do-yeon and Eun-ha, who became a family due to their parents' remarriage, become strangers again due to their parents' divorce. The two met again after many years. Eun-ha is obsessed with Do-yeon, and Do-yeon is burdened by his younger brother... What's even worse is that his feelings for Eunha are not 'brotherly love'.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world. One month after Hinata returned to this world, for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world!! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata!! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy, she attacked Hinata every time he refused!! (in many ways). Will Hinata, who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle, be able to live safely (?)!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life

name: The Lobster and the Salmon
description: Ebisawa, who plays guitar and sings in a band, was inspired by Shake's guitar playing and singing in "The Salmons." Determined not to lose, he pushed himself harder. Though his efforts paid off and Ebisawa gained popularity, the seemingly unbridgeable gap between himself and Shake eventually broke his spirit...
tags: Oneshot, Music

name: Dorondororon
description: Humans are under threat from mysterious monsters called mononoke. Dora Sasaki is unbeatable in a fight, and in order to keep a promise to his deceased mother, he aspires to be an anti-mononoke samurai. However, everything changes when he meets a kind-hearted mononoke named Kusanagi. Welcome to this dark fantasy story of humans and monsters!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Samurai, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Shibatarian
description: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.
tags: Psychological, Horror, Supernatural

name: Undead Unluck
description:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked!
___
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Zombies, Martial Arts, Drama, Supernatural

name: Dricam!!
description: “Drifting is a sport!” Rin Todoroki, a natural drifting genius, just wants to put driving aside and live out a normal, comfy university life. What will happen when she is confronted by the automobile club, or “auto” for short? Students who’ve put it all on the line… their stories start here!!
tags: Long Strip, Sports, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hello, Innocent
description:
From cotton candy scans:  
  
Yukito is a handsome scholarship student who also excels at sports. Just starting high school, he has never had the time to think about things like love.  
  
One day, he was saved by a girl he didn't know. Turns out, she's actually Yukito’s classmate who’s been absent since the school’s opening ceremony…
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yuragi-sou no Yuuna-san (Official Colored)
description: Homeless and haunted by ghosts, high schooler Kogarashi thinks his luck has finally turned when he finds Yuragi-sou–a cheap boarding house that was formerly a hot springs inn, now full of super sexy, scantily clad female tenants. If Kogarashi can use his spirit abilities to banish the ghost that haunts the inn, he can even live there rent-free! But when the ghost, a beautiful teenage girl named Yuuna, appears before him, Kogarashi takes pity on her and is suddenly not so sure about the exorcism. Will he help save Yuuna from becoming an evil spirit? And what supernatural secrets do the other boarders hold?
tags: Official Colored, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Osaka Loop Line
description:
Kim Yong, a Zainichi Korean boy from Osaka, accidentally gets caught up in a fight with the nephew of a yakuza. 

Kim Yong is given the mission of infiltrating a Korean village and stealing an ID card by order of the yakuza. The villagers, who seemed ordinary, seem to be up to something... 

At first, he only thought of completing the mission and receiving money, but Kim Yong gradually becomes one with the villagers and joins the village's goal of establishing a homeland in Osaka.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Watashi ga Shinde Manzoku desu ka?
description: Countess Rorona Ryus died in an accident. The news came the day after her fiancé, Bellveut, called off their engagement. Rorona was accused of mistreating her sister, a crime she had no right to be accused of, but she accepted the blame without hesitation. She was found dead in an overturned carriage on a suburban street, her face smashed in. When Rorona's sister learned of her death, she was delighted. "Bellveut is now mine," she said. Bellveut laughed, "I wish she had died sooner." But they did not know that Rorona's death would bring them more than just good fortune...
tags: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Overly Straightforward Classmate
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
An anthology with five oneshots.
To explain the title: each story contains  "replacement", in other word "change" - change of genre of manga, change of decision etc, and one hell of consequences that the said change brings with it.
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Magical Girls, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Starting From Today I'll Work as a City Lord
description:
When a gaming otaku gains the power to cross over to other worlds, he will obviously have to figure out what to do with it! But what is this?! A domineering cat-woman elder sister, a loli fox-woman, a cuddly rabbit-woman younger sister… This isn't a zoo! Welcome to a world where the strong prey on the weak. Then again, it's all so wonderful! An authentic strategy game, a huge conspiracy crisis, this other world's hegemony is now loading, all waiting for thou scum…  


---
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Power!!
description:
Kyo Aizawa is very excited about getting to attend Seisyu Academy, which is famous for its adorable girls' uniforms. Her spirits are crushed, however, when she opens the package containing her school uniform to find a boy's uniform.  
  
Her father explains to her that, as Seisyu Academy is also famous for its boys' basketball program, he enrolled her as a boy so she can fulfill his own dream of becoming an NBA basketball star. To make matters worse, she has to stay in the boys' dorms, and her roommate is the same boy she came to hate at tryouts. (Source: Tokyopop)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Crossdressing

name: Ubunchu!
description:
“Ubunchu!” is a Japanese manga series featuring Ubuntu Linux. Three school students in a system-admin club are getting into Ubuntu!

Several extra chapters have been released after the original run of the series, compiled here: [Ubunchu! translation](https://sirtetris.gitlab.io/ubunchu-translation/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Minami the Super Evolution
description:
Minami is a high school girl who feels totally average. She's tired of blending into the background and thinks her life is boring. Daydreaming about excitement and maybe a trip to New York, she gets inspired by her favorite anime.

She tries to show off a dramatic special move to her friend Nakamura and it completely fails. Minami swears she actually did have powers yesterday, breaking a mug with the move. Nakamura isn't buying it. But then, weird things start happening at school, like classroom windows shattering for no reason. Could Minami's fantasies be real? Later, she tries her power move again.

This time, it works spectacularly, stopping rain in mid-air! Minami finally has proof: she has superpowers. She's not ordinary anymore.
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kagami no Kuni no Harisugawa
description: High school student Akira Harisugawa has been in love with Mao Satomi, a girl in his grade, ever since grade school. The only problem? They've been best friends ever since Akira saved her from being hit by a car, and he doesn't want to ruin their friendship! That is until one day, when he finds a mysterious mirror…
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Aria of the Withered Branch
description:
"Living isn't fun anymore."

So I decided to die. But before I could leave, in the last moments of my life...

"Should we make life fun for you?"

The Vina people appeared in front of me. They asked me to live. They told me if I died, they'll die as well. Do they want to live for eternity?

"We'll make you happy. So, don't die yet."

"If you pledge to be one of us, you can have all the money you'll ever need for the rest of your life."

"Love, just talk to us. What do you need?"

"You can tell us everything you desire."

---
Alcheris Voygianna has had enough. Enraged, purposeless, and no longer wanting to go on after years of torment, she runs away with her stepmother's ring. But when she crushes the ring and falls asleep after failing to end her own life, she dreams of five demigods, who greet her in person a week later after she awakes! Their one request to her is this: live on so that they may live forever. In return, they promise to make her life worth living, but can they uphold that promise?

---

**Links:**
- [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EB%A5%B8-%EA%B0%80%EC%A7%80%EC%9D%98-%EB%9D%BC%EA%B0%80/2747)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/93102)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Crossdressing, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Philomel the Fake
description:
Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire.
Once her crimes were exposed, she was sentenced to execution.
A death truly befitting of a wicked—

“Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong, it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”

Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading.
She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden, but the contents of the book stated that she would die!
Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction, everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.

“Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”

Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?
___
After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden, Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name, but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now, she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place, leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death, she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ryne's Great Adventure!!
description: The series follows the adventures of Ryne and the BareBones Brigade.
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Kekkon ga Zentei no LoveCom
description:
'A matchmaker that helps marry off those who can't get married', namely Hakujo Entaro is busy supporting women in their spouse hunting endeavour today yet again. However, he soon discovers that all the members that have gathered around him are a 'disappointment' in that very field…? A never-before-seen youthful romantic comedy in a marriage agency ensues, alongside these women who have trouble getting married!!
___
**Character Designer:** [Yoshida Bana](https://mangadex.org/author/56906172-8bf4-4e55-9f12-9e93283072e1)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw LN ](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/volume/48987)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tenkuu no Isekai Bistro-Ten ~Kanban Musume Sorano ga Oishii Shiawase Todokemasu~
description:
Rebuild a rundown restaurant in another world!?

Sorano, a high school girl, is transported to another world where flying sailing ships come and go. In order to repay the kindness of the beast couple who helped her, she uses her natural vitality to try to improve the business!
tags: Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Koi wo Suru ni wa Toumei Sugiru
description: Kazuya, the manager of a hair salon, is a gay man who enjoys impersonal flings with no strings attached. One day, his childhood friend pressures him into taking on an assistant beautician – although he rejects the troublesome idea of having men in the workplace, he relents when he hears that the assistant in question is "Miki-chan"… but he turns out to be a man with drop-dead gorgeous looks –?!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Tonari no Wakazo
description: Araki is a serious and proper type gay guy. Honest, older men are his type. Even then, the guy who moved in next door is Araki's most hated type, a flashy guy called Higata. That Higata told Araki, "I feel good when I'm with you," and suddenly kissed him. Although he doesn't like him, Araki gets excited--!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Ushimitsu Gao
description:
"If you encounter a ghost, think of something naughty."

Megumi Sano (33 years old) is a housewife trying to conceive. She also has a fairly strong spiritual sensitivity. One night, during sex with her husband, a ghost suddenly appears in their bedroom. However, the humiliation of being seen having boring sex outweighs the fear... From that day on, the ghost frequently appears in their bedroom, but what is his purpose...?
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Doutei Yuusha no Harem Maou Toubatsuki
description: For the Subjugation of the Demon Lord, the hero Alvin was invited by the king. The first to join his party was the elven priestess, Rishel. As soon as they met, she invited him to the inn before the other companions joined... It seems there's another purpose besides defeating the Demon Lord!? To the somewhat shy and virgin hero... the priestess (elven girl), the warrior (beast girl), and the assassin (tan-skinned girl) are all coming on to him with their charms ♥
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy

name: Blazes
description: Follow the story of Charlene, the Fire Mage, in this High Fantasy world full of magic and myths. Learning the same steps from her mother, a great adventurer who died in the hands of an unknown individual, Charlene embarks on an odyssey to achieve her goals of greatness and vengeance.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Fushiou no Musuko
description:
"The Apothecary Diaries" author Natsu Hyuuga's new frontier!

---
A Cannibalism Comedy with Supernaturals × an Immortal Girl × Death Flags

"Hey... What kind of meat is this?" Set in modern-day Japan — though it’s a world where supernatural beings like werewolves and vampires live quite normally. A sixth-grade girl named Yukiko, who is preparing for her junior high entrance exams, suddenly gets a new transfer student in her class. The boy, who introduces himself as Fushio Yamada, is actually the son of the Immortal King. One day, Yukiko is attacked by a man-eating monster while trying to save a classmate, but is rescued by Fushio.However, as the price for saving her life, Yukiko ends up no longer human, but an immortal being herself.

This is the story of an immortal girl and the son of the Immortal King as they face all kinds of death flags together.
tags: Action, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Touhou - SPELL (Doujinshi)
description: A dramatic story set in the past of Gensokyo, before the creation of the spell card rules, following around a young Reimu. Unofficial and non-canon. Published in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.
tags: Action, Magic, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Not found

name: Phantom in the Twilight
description:
Vlad, Luke, and Tauryu work in Café Forbidden, a mysterious coffee shop that only opens at night.   
  
The three men look pretty normal, but they hide a secret they cannot share with anyone: every evening, they rush around London to uncover the mysterious incidents that take place in the city.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless
description:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken. On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal... and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20... 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job... but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process... Which I do at 400 times faster than normal. As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
tags: Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Ressentiment
description: Takuro Sakamoto is a 30-year-old loser still living with his parents. Fed up with his dead-end job and his life in general he’s persuaded by a friend to try out virtual reality games. But even his virtual partner Tsukiko or simply “Moon” turns out to be more trouble than expected.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Shittaka Elf to Koibito Gokko
description: Toyama Kanesada is constantly pushed around at his work in a dead-end job. But then, one day, he wakes up to find a beautiful elf from another world beside him? Moreover, she declares that Kanesada is now in charge of taking care of her and in addition, so as to live discreetly in this world, she decides that the simplest solution is to be his girlfriend! A love comedy with a cute elf!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Shin Elf-san wa Yaserarenai. (Official Colored)
description:
You know the drill by now - Naoe is a massage therapist whose life is turned upside down when he starts dealing with girls from another world and their weight issues. But this isn’t called Shin Elf-san for nothing. You’re going to get fully-colored pages due to its digital release, as well as new scenarios involving your favorite chubby elf. 

Get ready to get down with the thiccness!
tags: Official Colored, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Neko no Kohana
description:
Cats usually walk on two legs! Super orthodox cats, Kohana understands human language by walking on two legs, and loves small cats and cookies.
It looks like you're wearing a sailor suit, but it's probably like hair. My head is a little big, so it's unbalanced, and I'm hungry, but it's basically a good cat.
The owner Achan and the strange residents of Boro Apartment Nebula-so are just a little dramatic, and the days are quite small.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Bougo no Grey
description: 3 years after the war. The war volunteers still haven't gotten their normal lives back. Known as the "Assassin of Adenzi", Ef, the girl who was feared on the battlefield, had been spending her days with nowhere to go. A certain missionary reaches out to her. The look in her eyes is suspicious, and warm. "I will make you happy. I promise..."
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Girls' Love, Military, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Nakatani Yuto, a high school student, and his classmates are suddenly summoned to another world as "heroes". While his classmates are given powerful skills, Yuto is given the unfortunate skill of [Absorb]. Yuto, who has no use for it, is mortally wounded in a battle with a demon, but his classmates leave him to die. But at that moment, Yuto hears a voice out of nowhere...?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description: Qin Qianliang was unjustly labeled as the school bully due to persistent rumors. One day, while working part-time, he found himself saving a boy named Cui Yucan. Shortly after, a new transfer student arrived at school, and to Qianliang's surprise, it was Cui Yucan. From the moment they reunited, Cui Yucan latched onto him, insisting they become best friends. Qianliang, who always kept his distance from others, thought a simple rejection would make him back off. But Cui Yucan didn't give up. Instead, he boldly declared that he would become Qianliang's "sidekick"...?
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hazureta Kubiwa wo Suteru Toki
description: Kuroda catches his boyfriend cheating and gets dumped on the spot, only to discover another man, Shirato, was also dumped. Out of pity, Kuroda takes the crying Shirato home, and their shared loneliness leads to a one-night stand. But what should have been a one-time mistake turns into something deeper, as Kuroda finds a strange comfort in being embraced by Shirato. But how can he confess his growing feelings now?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Chishiryou no Koufuku
description:
A collection of sometimes tender and sometimes sad short stories depicting different forms of love.

1. Chishiryou no Koufuku (致死量の幸福) As long as you’re alive, I will always suffer. My older childhood friend is a hopeless jerk, and on top of that, he wants to die. He attempted many times, over and over again. I want to leave him. I know I can’t be happy if I stay with him… Why can’t I leave him?
2. Kurokami no Omoide (黒髪の思い出)
3. Me ni ha Me wo (目には目を)
4. Chalk no Ie (チョークの家)
5. Dekisokonai Robot (できそこないロボット)
6. Share Happy ! (シェア・ハピ !)
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Boys' Love, Girls' Love

name: Hentai Ouji to Warawanai Neko.
description:
If Yokodera were an equation, he'd be 'peeping at girls' plus 'does not care what others say,' therefore 'he peeps vigorously, intensely, diligently, and frequently.'  
Yokodera mops so that he can see the reflection of panties in the floor. He weeds so that he can see up skirts. He rides fast so that each girl he passes has her skirt flipped. He does these sorts of things every day.  
To everyone else though, he's a nice and diligent guy who's greatly appreciated. Lucky? Far from it, at least in his eyes. Yokodera doesn't like being misinterpreted, but he is also a coward. He wishes others would stop seeing his actions as good, but he just can't do anything about it.  
Then his friend told him about a cat statue, which might remove this unwanted trait…  
  
Note: This manga is adapted from a light novel of the same name and illustrated by Kantoku.  
  
Project H: Only has released 3 volumes in English Print
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: It's Over
description:
*Our bond was supposed to last forever...*

Was it creative differences, personal conflicts, or money troubles? What made three close friends suddenly break up? A new one-shot by Kokoro Onodera!

*Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project*
[Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: The Blade Boy
description: A boy has a normal day at school but after things go incredibly wrong, he applies to be an exterminator at the Deity Extermination Association where he would change his life forever.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Gore, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Sei Kaihou, Sorezore no Ai no Katachi
description: At 27 years old, insurance broker Mio Sahara is the perfect age for marriage. Traumatized after a sexual encounter with a man, she's developed an intense phobia of being seen in a sexual light. One day, when she's put on a team of elite brokers, she meets a new boss who teaches her what it means to feel untameable passion. Emboldened by this encounter, Mio resolves to face her true sexual self that she had locked away in her heart, but it won't be easy...
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Garla
description: Tachibana Gakuen Swimming Club Captain Hayato Otori suddenly heard a voice of "Garla" during the training camp, and a bird-shaped bruise appeared between his eyebrows. What is the purpose of the mysterious monster "Garla" that appeared at that time? And the resurrected Mu Empire, who calls himself a god, urges humanity to choose between ruin and obedience!! Disappointingly unfinished.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Mecha, Gore, Supernatural

name: Okawari Itadaketa Darou ka?
description: Suzu Yotsuya is a high school girl who loves to eat. While eating by herself in the cafeteria like usual, she is invited to eat with Majima-san, a tall and popular classmate. However, there are some suspicious rumors going around about Majima-san…⁉
tags: Ghosts, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
description:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she's badmouthing me... but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that's why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
___
Alternate Official English:
[Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/alya-sometimes-hides-her-feelings-in-russian-manga)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Chiruran: Shinsengumi Requiem
description: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Survival, Samurai

name: Blank Space
description: On one rainy day, high school girl Komae Shouko learns that her classmate, Katagiri Sui, has a special ability.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Because Goodbyes Are Coming Soon
description: Follow the final moments of a shinsengumi first squadron captain, Okita Soji, as the author tells his version of the story.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Action, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: This is an interstellar era represented by warships as the supreme force, the cruelest age, and the gorgeous age! Wang Dong was reborn and returned twenty years ago… Explore countless unknown civilizations, harvest the origin of civilization, and strengthen himself! What’s even worse is that he still has a system! Your battleships and modules will be raffled, but mine is optional! Rebirth + System! What are you fighting with me? Steer the most powerful warship and smooth out all dissatisfaction!
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Valentine's Day
