description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic

name: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)
description: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.
tags: Romance, Anthology, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Blue Ocean in the Eyes
description:
One hundred years ago, monstrous creatures known as Meijuu (溟獣) suddenly emerged from the ocean, staining the waters black and preventing humanity from advancing into the seas.

In response, humanity turned to submarines and, with only a faint glimmer of hope, began challenging the Meijuu.

Among them is a young man named Ven, who cannot let go of the childhood stories his older brother once told him about the "blue sea." Driven by that longing, he boards the submarine Stier as a Meijuu observer.

What color will ultimately be reflected in Ven’s eyes? A marine battle fantasy begins—one to reclaim the seas!
tags: Monsters, Action, Military, Fantasy

name: Fuguu na Ossan no Kekkai Jutsu Musou
description:
“The barrier mage’s job is done, right? Then, why not join the Kingdom’s Royal Mage Corps?”
For the last 30 years, a protective barrier shielded the kingdom from the Demon King’s forces. Initially maintained by a hundred barrier mages, their numbers dwindled until only one, Blake, was left to uphold it. At last, came the day when a hero defeated the Demon King. But, in this peaceful world, barrier mages were now considered “useless”— a bottom-rung job with no real purpose.
Blake was at a loss on what to do until he received an unexpected invitation to the capital from said hero. Alice, the Hero who he once saved, encouraged him to join an elite squad reserved for only the best in the kingdom. She insisted that, if he could prove his worth, even those who doubted him would have to yield.
“Barrier mages are useless!”
“Then, all he needs to do is show his strength, right?”
The story unfolds as this underestimated middle-aged man, unaware of his unparalleled skills, wields and strengthens his barrier magic! The tale of a fantasy hero’s rise in another world begins here!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: Onee-chan Zu ga Kiwado Sugiru
description: "I'm going to be in a relationship with my step-sister!" Wait, who decided that?! There was no way he was going to fall in love. Since that traumatic event from 2 years ago, he avoids love like the plague--When his dad gets remarried! Now he has 2 sisters?! This must be some joke!! Even though Aoba wants nothing to do with the sisters, they always find themselves in sticky situations. Can they open his "door" to love? The beginning of a juicy story bound to make life a home a very ending love battle!"
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator: Starting with a Zombie Planet
description: Chu Xuan transmigrated into a world of cultivation and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. So-called demonic cultivation involves the plundering of the essences of the heaven, earth, and all things. Only by slaughtering thousands of people can one become the Great Demon Lord. However, such killing is not tolerated by the heavenly order, and the Wuji Sect was hunted down and destroyed by the righteous sects. Resigned to his fate, Chu Xuan accidentally found the Blood Mirror, which allowed him to travel to a post-apocalyptic planet full of zombies! He suddenly realizes that this place is the perfect environment for demon cultivation!
tags: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Jinsei Gyakuten Dungeon
description:
"I know everything about the dungeon, and I'm gonna turn my life around!"

A bullied virgin whose life has hit rock bottom. But when it comes to his knowledge of the dungeon, he's number one in the world. His name is Saeki Kenichi, a high school student.

At 16, his magic finally awakens! Kenichi becomes the 'Seeker' he's always dreamed of and heads straight for Dungeon Island—a lawless zone of pleasure and violence!!

Using the knowledge he's stockpiled, he'll mow down the strongest monsters and 'release his magic' (have s*x) with the hottest girls!? Use your knowledge to dominate and take it all!!
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Fantasy

name: Mazinger (USA)
description:
Set at beginning of the 100 Years War in 220X, sometime after World War III devastated 90 percent of the global population, "the surviving nations have realigned into northern and southern superpowers."  
  
What remains of mankind have burrowed deep underground to escape the deadly radiation that permeates the surface. In order to continue fighting, the militaries of the world developed special gigantic combat armor, the strongest of which, Mazinger, is piloted by Major Koji Kabuto.  
  
After a great battle, Mazinger gets caught in an enemy explosion that rips a wormhole in space/time that sends him to a world of giants, called Lithgor.
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Mecha, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: 0.0000001% Demon Lord
description:
The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ryukyu Buccaneer
description:
**When it's your livelihood on the line, you've got to be willing to do anything to get your hands on the treasure!**

It is the twilight of the shogunate in Japan--the Bakumatsu--a time of tumult in which ruffians from all walks of life vie for supremacy. Hanagusuku Muta, a Ryukyuan boy from a disgraced clan of nobles, now lives in poverty, stealing just to survive. But one day, he hears rumors of a massive cache of treasure left by a legendary pirate on a small island in the kingdom, one valuable enough to throw all of Japan into disarray. After getting framed for a crime he didn't commit by a group of Satsuma samurai, Muta gets dragged into the vigorous, bloody struggle for the treasure...!!
tags: Historical, Action, Samurai, Adventure, Drama

name: TELOMERE
description:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Philosophical, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Bishuu Gyakuten Sekai de Chiryoushi Yattemasu
description:
One day, Towa was suddenly transferred to a new world. This world resembles a world from a novel that Towa recently read. 

It's been half a year since he came to this world. Towa opened a clinic as a Healer using the ability he received from the Goddess. However, the only ones who come are well-groomed, servile beauties. This is because this was a world where the value of beauty and ugliness were reversed. 

He is kind to everyone, no matter how ugly (beautiful in Towa's eyes), and wins the hearts of the ugly beauties in the world.
___
**Character Designer:** [Mizuno Sao](https://mangadex.org/author/9ce6f19c-6235-4ca0-8e76-46951f114062)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: My Clueless First Friend
description:
Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
___
* [Alt English: Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/my-clueless-first-friend-manga/289/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Namaiki Asahi-chan wo Wakarasetai
description: Ryou is a third-year high school student who is enjoying his otaku life to the fullest, but one girl is giving him a headache. She's Asahi-chan, a cheeky childhood friend two years younger than him who attends the same high school! Even though Asahi-chan is his junior, she always teases and teases Ryou! And yet, when someone teases her, she is at a loss for words and makes a defeated face. She is also a cute girl who has few friends, is shy, and not very honest. Today, I have to teach this cheeky Asahi-chan a lesson!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Nise Seiken Monogatari - Osananajimi no Seijo o Uttara Michizure ni Sareta
description:
My childhood friend, Magary, was chosen to be the saint. From here on out, she'll have to maintain a smile at all times while at the royal capital and take lessons in etiquette and dance. She'll be living in an excruciatingly stifling world. Having been together since birth, there was naturally one thought in my mind.

While feeling a little bit of loneliness... I pushed my childhood friend (who was trying to escape with all her might with her arms still bound) towards the knight that came to pick her up.

"Alistaaaaaaaaaaaaar!!"
  
I feel as if there was some deep resentment in her voice, but that's probably just my imagination. As her last act of futile resistance, she had me see her off to the royal capital… but, that ended without any problems.

"Now that that's over with, I'll be heading home. Good luck ^^"

I turned my back towards my childhood friend who looked me with deep resentment in her eyes. While I was making my way home... I had to turn around as I was chased by goblins.

"Noooooooo!! Someone, helpppppppp!!"
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Orc Eroica: Conjecture Chronicles
description:
Bash, the Orc Warrior, is a Hero. During the war, he crushed and defeated all that stood in his path. He is respected by all Orcs as the Orc among Orcs, however Bash has a secret.

He has no experience with women – he, the Hero, was a virgin. For Orcs, who hold combat and sexual prowess in high regard, being a virgin is tremendously shameful. [The fact that I’m a not only a virgin, but a virgin Orc Hero, is a shame for all of Orcish society. I want a wife too!] With this in mind, he decides to embark on a journey.

In order to protect the pride and honor of his race, but mostly to finally get his d*ck wet, he decides to go to leave on a grand quest to find himself a woman.
___
**Character Designer:** [Asanagi](https://mangadex.org/author/ede1fdec-c265-4076-b60a-d2cfe5aaf694)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kuchidome no Gohoubi wa Dansou Otome to Ichaero Desu!
description: Kay Brennan is a hero, no doubt about that. They're the strongest person in their school in terms of combat strength and magical power. Compared to Kay, Dino Turner - the eternal 2nd place - might as well be nothing, and as such Dino has declared Kay to be his archrival. However, Kay has a secret: she's actually a girl crossdressing as a boy. And Dino is the only one who knows her true nature.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy

name: Unexpected Luck
description:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Moto Saikyou Yuusha no Saishuushoku
description: Dan was "the strongest and bravest" when he was young. But because of his lazy life, he is now a divorced, unemployed old man! He tries to earn money through quests for a living, but age has taken its toll on his strength and all that! He was approached by a silver-haired elf, a handsome man, and an S-rank adventurer... a young man of today’s generation!
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: The 5th Meeting
description:
*The wife and daughter he left behind...*

The fourth time I met my father's new wife was at his wake... A bitter drama by Ao Tajima.

*Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project*
[Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)
tags: Oneshot, Drama

name: Yabe Otaku ni Yasashiku Shichatta Gyaru
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Shigahime
description:
Osamu Hirota is a ordinary high school student who unwillingly loses his ability to live a normal life thanks to an immortal vampire woman.
Cursed with the form of a monster and the need to hunt for blood to sustain a human form, how will Osamu cope with his new life?
___
**Alt Official English:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0008)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Vampires, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Seito Kaichou to Banken - Watashi ga Banken ni Natta Riyuu -
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?
description: Yuuma Fujikura is a constantly bullied first year high school student. When a classmate named Ryou Amezato, nicknamed "Amelie," helps him out one day, Yuuma tells him not to get any more involved, or else the bullies will target Amelie too. In response to this, Amelie only tells Yuuma that he would commit murder for him if Yuuma wanted.
tags: Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison
description: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko's life?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Jun Samekawa, a first-year junior high school student who was blessed with friends and a boyfriend, had a safe and enjoyable life. One day, she meets Kei, a high school girl. And thus begins a complicated love triangle...
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Watashi-tachi ga Koisuru Riyuu
description:
Aoi's superior at work is a man of few words and inscrutable thoughts, but he made her heart flutter with his sudden smile and thoughtfulness. Kei finally met someone at work whose large physique is exactly her type, and ever since, she's wondered what it would be like to touch him... or hug him...! She can't stop her mind from fantasizing about it! A collection of sweet office romances that will inevitably tug at one's heartstrings!

---
*Note: In addition, a Taisho-era love story is included along with the main story!*
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Museru Kurai no Ai o Ageru
description: The rude guy Hibari met at the ramen place turns out to be Gaku, a band member attending her art school. As she gets pushed around by him, her "normal" world begins to change drastically.
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Horimiya
description:
Kyoko Hori is your average teenage girl… who has a side she wants no one else to ever discover. Then there's her classmate Izumi Miyamura, your average glasses-wearing boy — who's also a totally different person outside of school. When the two unexpectedly meet, they discover each other's secrets, and a friendship is born.

---
Hori may seem like a normal teenage girl, but she's a completely different person after school. In her workaholic parents' absence, Hori has been like a parent for her little brother since she was young herself. Between taking care of her brother, feeding them both, and housework, she doesn't have much time for a usual teenage social life. 

One day, she meets someone else who does not present his true self at school: a quiet, glasses-wearing boy called Miyamura. She'd assumed he was bookish, and possibly an otaku, but Hori couldn't have been more wrong. Outside of school, Miyamura is a friendly guy with many piercings, and he's not very good at academics. Now the two of them have someone with whom they can share both halves of their lives!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Rain
description:
The small country Sunkwoll is in a tight spot because it's under attack of the great country Zarmine. But the general, Rain, who's reputed to be an exceptionally gifted swordsman, is against the war and won't enter the battle. But how is one supposed to wage a war like this anyway?  
  
*Note: Author passed away in Feb 2019, leaving the source material for the manga, novel incomplete.*
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Baby Steps
description:
Maruo Eiichirou (Ei-Chan), a first year honor student, one day decides he's unhappy with the way things are and lacks exercise. He finds a flyer for the Tennis Club and decides to check it out. He's instantly captivated by it. With no prior experience and poor physical conditioning, join Ei-Chan as he embarks on a tennis journey using his smarts, dedication and work ethic.  

---
- **Won the 38th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen Manga in 2014**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell
description: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fruits Basket
description:
Tohru Honda, an orphaned high school girl, is taken in by the wealthy Shigure Sohma when he realizes she has nowhere else to go. However, the Sohma family shares a secret, and it isn't long before Tohru discovers that there's a reason why her classmates, Yuki and Kyo Sohma, never let girls get near them, and never talk about their lives before they lived with Shigure. And before she knows it, Tohru has become so tangled up in the lives of each member of the Sohma family that she couldn't leave even if she wanted to.  
  
As she learns more and more about the truth of the Sohma family and the nature of their secrets, she desperately searches for a way that she can save them. But what can one girl do, especially when it seems that she may have been part of someone's plan all along…  
  
[Official English](https://yenpress.com/9780316360166/fruits-basket-collectors-edition-vol-1/)

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2001**
- **Attained the Guinness World Record for Best-Selling Shojo Manga**
tags: Award Winning, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Juvenile Detention Center
description:
Juyeong is in a juvenile detention center for the attempted murder of his father, Gang-ryong. He clings to hope, dreaming of a future in Seoul with his childhood friend, Dayeon. 

But everything shatters when Dayeon is tragically killed by a rogue truck, and the devastation deepens when Juyeong learns that his father was behind the wheel. 

In a cruel twist, Gang-ryong regains consciousness and offers Juyeong an ultimatum...

"If you want revenge, become the king of this detention center!"

 Now, Juyeong must navigate the treacherous world of prison politics, determined to rise to power and avenge his friend.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bari Bari Legend
description:
Award winning manga from the early days of Shigeno Shuuichi, the creator of Initial D. Bari Bari Legend entails the events in the life of high schooler and street racer, Gun Koma.

---
- **Won the 9th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Register!
description: How young is too young to fall in love? How old is too old to fall in love? Who decides the end of the flowery days of youth and the beginning of the same? In the eastern part of Tokyo, at a supermarket in a town zero meters above sea level. A chance encounter for two people over the cashier's counter.
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Chiriko-senpai wa Tamatteiru.
description: The mysterious library committee senpai, Uzuki Chiriko, has a peculiar habit. That habit involves dragging her kohai, Makoto Matoba, into her unusual stress-relief methods. With her unpredictable and thrilling ways of releasing stress, Makoto's mind is constantly in turmoil!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: I Created a Salvation Organization
description: He got a doomsday salvation system. As long as he saves the world, he can have everything. He recruited top talents to build the Pan-Human Principle Guardian Association. He descended into the doomsday worlds as the guardian of human principles, allowing the whole world to admire him and worship him as a god. The ultimate natural disaster. The mutation frenzy. The whisper of the evil god. Thus, a huge organization spanning many worlds, taking the protection of human principles as its own responsibility and saving civilization from the fate of destruction, gradually appeared in the eyes of the world.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Majutsu wo Kiwamete Tabi ni Deta Tensei Elf, Moteamashita Jumyou de Ikeru Densetsu to naru
description:
This the long tale of a reincarnated elf who become a living legend!

After his ordinary life came to an end in an accident, Minoru was reincarnated as an elf who have a average lifespan of 1000 years. Due to the regret of not being able to do anything in his previous life, he decided to leave his village and travel in this life to leave behind evidence that he once lived in this world. However, the head of the elf clan imposes a certain trial—?!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Gyakkou shita Akuyaku Reijou wa, Nazeka Maryoku wo Ushinatta node Shinsou no Reijou ni Narimasu: Seijo Anna no Monogatari
description:
Although born to a small, noble family in the countryside, Anna, the daughter of a baron, ends up attending the country's most prestigious school, the Trusova Magic Academy, at the request of her kind parents. She nearly loses her place in the school, which is a microcosm of the hierarchical society of the nobles, but her fate changes dramatically when she meets the graceful and beautiful young lady Rachel.

Another story of time travel told from the perspective of Anna, who eventually becomes a "saint."

(Source: KADOKAWA, translated)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: My Apocalypse Street Stall
description: After a car accident, college student Gao Xiaoliang is bound to a ‘**Gourmet System**’ and transported into an apocalyptic world. To earn his way back to life, he must set up a street stall and survive in a city overrun by zombies.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description: ―It was a casual remark made by Akito while having lunch with his usual friend group of four. However, he didn't know that the person sitting right in front of him, Natsumi, was actually his childhood friend who had moved away when they were small! Since then, Natsumi has been trying to express her feelings to Akito, but because they had always been friends, it hasn't been easy for her to convey them...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: The Dragon's Guide to Defying Death
description: After suffering from an illness that cut his life short, Royce wakes up to find himself as a character from the story he read until his last moments. As a dragon hatchling, he believes his long life is just beginning. That is, until Royce realizes he's the son of the dragon who goes berserk due to his untimely death! Now, Royce is looking to race against the clock, even if his every move leads to a near-death experience. Will he be able to change his fate, or will he get stopped in his tracks?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Lord
description: The story is loosely based on the Three Kingdoms period, using both real and original characters and events from the historical period in Chinese history and folklore of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Drama, Adaptation

name: Lovely • Runners' • High
description: Keiichi and Miharu are childhood friends and were in the same track club. Miharu, although an elementary school student, is already on par with junior high students and aims to compete all across the country. Keiichi can do nothing but watch from afar...
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Anata to Watashi no Kankei wa?
description:
Yuka, 28 years old and without a boyfriend, decides to participate in the group date. 
But what she meets there is a math teacher she had a crush on in high school...! The two become drinking buddies and meet more and more often, until one day they get drunk and end up spending the night at a hotel.  *"Ten years have passed, and I've grown up... but I'm liking him more and more... is it because I'm his former student? Or...?"*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Boukensha ni Naritai to Miyako ni Deteitta Musume ga S Rank ni Natteta - Kurokami no Ikusaotome
description:
Retired adventurer Belgrieve thought he was done with excitement... but his peaceful life is upended when he discovers a baby abandoned in the nearby woods. As her adoptive father, he teaches his new daughter Angeline everything he knows about the adventuring life—a past he had thought long forgotten after he lost his leg in battle. Angeline idolizes her father and wants to follow in his footsteps, so she leaves home for the big city.

As the years pass, she ascends the ranks, eventually becoming renowned as an S-Rank adventurer: the Black-Haired Valkyrie. But it turns out that being the best comes with its own struggles, and she can barely catch her breath between battling fiends. With everyone turning to her for rescue, can Ange get out ahead of each new disaster and finally reunite with her beloved dad?
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37/toi8)
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mutual Love
description:
Another short twitter manga… Featuring another "boy meets girl" at school setting…
**BUT WHAT COULD BE THE TWIST IN HERE?**

---
**Link:** Retail - [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2662781)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
Ever since she saw Count Banfield valiantly protect her home planet from space pirates, Emma Rodman has wanted to be a knight. She’d gladly give her life defending the innocent and protecting her lord’s domain. Unfortunately, her final test at the knights’ academy has earned her a D-ranking, the lowest of the low! What a disaster! Now she’s relegated to a remote border planet and her squad are a bunch of useless layabouts. Should she call it quits? Or will this isolation give her room to grow and shine?

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Drama, Adaptation

name: Tough
description: This is a mixed martial arts fighting manga about the Miyazawa school of martial arts. Initially, it is about Kiichi trying to heal his father after he was nearly killed by his brother Kiryu. But then it goes on to be less about that as his father recovers and some tournament style fighting begins. At that point various apparently overwhelming opponents will encounter Kiichi on his way to the top. The objectives of the various characters start to play a more and more important role, as well as the different philosophical projections of several martial arts and disciplines.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Manga Time Kirara Carat 20th Anniversary Booklet
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma

name: From Villainess to Healer: I Know the Cheat to Change My Fate
description:
In the world of "Reas Love," a spinoff otome game, the villainess Charlotte Cocoriara's engagement to the prince of Farblume Kingdom is suddenly broken off. The reason? The Prince finds her job as Dark Mage ill-suited for his future queen. He'd rather be with a Healer, and there is no such thing as a job change. But Charlotte has a secret... memories of her past life playing "Reas Life Online," the original MMORPG! Armed with her cheat knowledge, Charlotte immediately takes off to the Sacred Land of Erenzi where she uses information no one else in "Reas Love" knows to change her job—to a Healer! Except she has no intention of going back to the Prince. What she really wants is to see the world and live a life full of adventure!

(Source: J-Novel Club)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Countdown
description:
Black clothes, black eyes, black hair... what if you were to encounter that...?!

--

*Winner of the 66th RED Newcomer Manga Award – Encouragement Prize (奨励賞)*
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Ghosts, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
description:
Han Jaewoo is a sweat in the world-famous game "Savior Of Humanity."

Once a hardcore player, now drowning in debt in his tiny room.

His long-awaited showdown with a demon lord ends in an unexpected failure.

The debt collectors are closing in... and all that's left to him are despair and stubborn grit.

That's when Aquila, the administrator, appears with an offer:

"Don't you want to see it? The true happy ending of this game..."

With a prize of 25 million dollars on the line, and the path to the true ending finally revealed, he accepts it.

However, there's a catch:

He's thrown back into the game world with all his stats reduced to rock bottom.

"Thanks for the 'realism,' Aquila... Screw it. I'm clearing this damn thing!"
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description: The 4Koma series for Uma Musume: Pretty Derby!
tags: Comedy, Sports, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Mitsudomoe
description: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.
tags: Loli, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: One Day
description: Not found
tags: Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Dragon no Ko
description: Min is a girl living in poverty. One day, while watching dragons flying in the sky, a dragon egg suddenly falls on her! Min takes the egg home with her, it hatches, and she decides to raise the baby dragon. However, a suspicious human from the military is after the dragon…!?
tags: Action, Adventure, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
The hero Alexander and his comrades unleash a daring raid on the Demon King's castle, intent on assassinating him and bringing an end to the war against the darkness in one fell swoop. However, the raid goes awry when his party is effortlessly decimated by the Demon King's overwhelming power. But death is not the end of the road for Alexander, as he is reincarnated two years later as that very same Demon King's son. With the memories of his past life still intact, he vows to use his miraculous second chance to continue fighting—this time destroying the demonic kingdom from within as the Demon Prince Zilbagias.

It doesn't take long for his mettle to be tested either, as passing as a young demon prince without blowing his cover proves to be quite a bit more challenging than he initially anticipated.
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/zilbagias-the-demon-prince-how-the-seventh-prince-brought-down-the-kingdom)
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Gintama: 3-nen Z-gumi Ginpachi-sensei Tuuuunnn!!
description:
It's been made into a novel! An anime! And, something no one expected, it's now been made into a vertical manga! With his sloppy white coat and dead fish-like eyes, Sakata Ginpachi has a personality and appearance that are hardly befitting of a high school teacher. His homeroom class, Class 3-Z of Gintama High School, is crammed with students with equally strong personalities, turning it into a terrifying amusement park. Is there really a future for such a problematic class?! The spin-off of the hugely popular comic and anime "Gintama" has landed on Jump Toon for the first time!

(Source: JumpToon, translated)
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Naruse wa Koi ga Shoumei Dekinai
description: Hiwako (Hiyoko), a second-year master's student in the Graduate School of Science and Engineering, tends to be heavy in love and has lost touch with her boyfriend. One day, when she was depressed after being dumped, Naruse, a smart guy in the same lab, took an interest in her and proposed an experimental relationship, saying, "I want to analyze your love life and figure out your love life..."! Naruse comes on to her for analysis, and her heart rate explodes!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Death Penalty
description: Once enshrined, the doll god (Hinnagami) will grant any wish. The price of wishing for freedom is...
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Kami e no Esa wa Kanojo-tachi
description:
Ren is a young man who has had a hard time because he is not good with women. In order to overcome his weakness, he enrolls in Somenoe University, a highly selective university with a 90% female ratio. He finds himself living in a former women’s dormitory where there are only two men, including himself! 

Nervous and anxious about his future life, Ren moves in with his senior classmates. On his first day at the dormitory, a senior female student, Kou, made him a visit at night! It seems as his life in a harem is about to begin, but things take a sudden turn when a female corpse is found dead in the university. Moreover, there is something strange about the atmosphere of the university and the way the girls look at him. 

Is this place just a normal university, or maybe...!?
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Demons, Romance, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Fantasy World Passerby
description: A 22-year-old worker, Ren Zheng, reunites with his old friend during graduation season. A moment of light-hearted banter is taken seriously by the god of reincarnation, who sends Ren Zheng and his friend into a fantastical world as part of their graduation. The two are reincarnated as an [Angel] and a [Demon] respectively, and embark on a series of funny and thrilling adventures.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Demons, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Kamen Rider (Televi Magazine Version)
description: Mitsuru Sugaya's debut work, based off of the 1971 Kamen Rider tokusatsu series. The version on Mangadex is scanned from the 2005 reprint.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adaptation

name: Dragon Ball Kakumei (Doujinshi)
description: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens

name: Kemuri to Mitsu
description:
Himeko Hanatsuka, age 12, and Bunji Tsuchiya, age 30. Their relationship status: "engaged."   
This story takes place during the Taisho Era, when modern Western culture was steadily spreading in Japan. 
In this unsettling and vibrant atmosphere the two, who call each other "Bunji-sama" and "Fiancée-dono", 
slowly develop their love surpassing the 18 year age gap.
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Military, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Champignon no Majo
description: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided… The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitakunaru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.
description:
In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dream—a perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world.

Aoishi thought he'd follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception.

As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Harem, Adaptation

name: REAL
description:
Nomiya Tomomi, a high school drop-out who wants to devote his life to helping Natsumi, a girl he sentenced to a life of immobility after a tragic bike ride he invited her on, tries to change his life around, from a trouble making delinquent into a reliable man. The problem is, both Natsumi and her sister dont seem to care at all for Nomiya, rightfuly blaming him for the accident. Plus, the only notable talent Nomiya posseses is the talent for basketball. Everything changes for him when he meets up with Togawa Kiyoharu, a wheelchair basketball player.

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Prize for Manga in 2001**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Sequel to Off Stage Love Side
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Not found
description: Snow weighs heavy on the branches, yet they do not cling to the mud. When the red sun rises, they once again touch the sky.” Poker monsters have secretly invaded reality, bringing both catastrophe and a mysterious gift — Mirror Poker, a supernatural game that grants its users longevity and special abilities. Chen Qi, whose life was once happy, is suddenly diagnosed with a terminal illness and given only one year to live. As he struggles in the depths of despair, he unexpectedly obtains a Mirror Poker card. In order to extend his life, Chen Qi dives deeper into the secrets behind Mirror Poker…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: 1-Nen Inai ni Ojousama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Gakuen Idolm@ster Gold Rush
description: Not found
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music

name: Ano Ko ni Naisho no VTuber
description: High school student Warabi has a secret that she's been keeping from her childhood friend, Shuu. While she's active as a popular virtual idol, Shuu, who has no idea about her secret identity, is actually in love with her...!
tags: Romance, Virtual Reality, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The End Has Come
description:
Minjun wished for the world to end - until it did. 

When a zombie appears at his door, the bullied teen chooses to fight for survival. Teaming up with Yena, his sassy yet charming classmate, he flees the collapsing city. 

Hunted by the infected and haunted by enemies old and new, they discover that in a world without rules, trust may be their only chance at survival.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Fire Train
description: The clue to the missing persons case is hidden behind a child who is both beautiful and sinister.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Gore, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: MONSTER
description:
Kenzo Tenma, a renowned Japanese neurosurgeon working in post-war Germany, faces a difficult choice: to operate on Johan Liebert, an orphan boy on the verge of death, or on the mayor of Düsseldorf. In the end, Tenma decides to gamble his reputation by saving Johan, effectively leaving the mayor for dead. As a consequence of his actions, hospital director Heinemann strips Tenma of his position, and Heinemann's daughter Eva breaks off their engagement. Disgraced and shunned by his colleagues, Tenma loses all hope of a successful career—that is, until the mysterious killing of Heinemann gives him another chance. Nine years later, Tenma is the head of the surgical department and close to becoming the director himself. Although all seems well for him at first, he soon becomes entangled in a chain of gruesome murders that have taken place throughout Germany. The culprit is a monster—the same one that Tenma saved on that fateful day nine years ago.


---
**Awards Won:**

- Winner of the Excellence Prize at the [Japan Media Arts Festival](https://j-mediaarts.jp/en/award/index-2.html) in 1997.
- Winner of the Grand Prize at the 3rd [Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tezuka_Osamu_Cultural_Prize) in 1999.
- Winner of the 46th [Shogakukan Manga Award](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shogakukan_Manga_Award) for General Manga in 2000.
- Winner of the [Lucca Comics Awards](https://luccacomicsawards.com/albo-doro-2/) for Best Manga Series in 2004.

---
See [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/anime/19/Monster) for the Anime Adaptation.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monster_(manga))
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Monsters, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, Horror, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world...!"

The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power.

Leirus who turned 15 was attacked by a chimera while being transported to a mine, and managed to escape through the confusion. However, without food, he was on the verge of starving to death, when he is suddenly brought back to life by a kind hearted girl Corona, the daughter of a dining hall. Leirus who manages to scrape by becomes an adventurer and finally experiences the kindness of people. However, the place he finds doesn't last for long-  
The chimera's shadow once again looms over him. In order to repay everyone who has helped him, Leirus has to stand up against his old foe!

name: MAOYU : Archenemy and Hero “Become mine, Hero” “I refuse!”
description:
After a long and treacherous journey, our Hero finally arrives at the Overlord’s castle only to find himself being asked for help. The Hero explains how the war that the demons have brought upon the humans have killed thousands and put more in misery. The Overlord however argues that this war has made the human society band together as one and showed empirical evidence how it has increased population, increased production, boosted economy and improved society overall. Furthermore, she explains to the Hero that ending this war will result in a civil war that will produce more bloodshed than there ever was. The Hero, convinced that the only way to bring peace, relatively speaking, is to join forces with the Overlord, agrees to help with her plans!  
  
One of five simultaneous serializations of the Maoyuu Maou Yuusha series.  
(The author has chosen this version to be the official version)  
  
Adaptation of the light novel series written by Touno Mamare.

Unbeknownst to Nao, however, a greater danger has resurfaced - one that destroyed his way of life six years ago, and threatens to do so once again. And that danger, in the form of a girl wielding a garden hoe, will stop at nothing to reclaim what could once have been hers, and hers alone.

name: Kiyoubinbou, Jou wo Tateru ~Kaitaku Gakuen no Rettousei na no ni, Joukyuu-shoku no Skill to Mahou ga Subete Tsukaemasu~
description:
The boy Leopin was born with unnaturally high dexterity. From an early age, he used his dexterity to contribute to his peers in a variety of crafts. Leopin and his friends entered the Royal Pioneer Academy. However, during the "Ritual of Ability Development" at the entrance ceremony, the status given to Leopin was disastrous.

"Occupation: Unemployed."
"All statuses except dexterity remain at their initial values and do not grow."
"Skill is dexterous, master of none."

Leopin's classmates exiled him because he had nothing to offer other than his dexterity. Leopin is placed in the "Special Training Class", a class for failures. Leopin is left all alone. However, he realizes that the skill he has been given, "Poor Dexterity," has an unexpected performance. That is...

You can convert your dexterity status to any other status.
You can change your occupation to any one you want.

The first thing Leopin did was to become a lumberjack. First, Leopin changed his job to "Lumberjack" to get wood from the forest. He then became a carpenter and built the most magnificent house of all. He became an Appraiser to identify rare items, and a Battle Axe User to fight off students from other classes who tried to attack him. Become a Ranger to explore dungeons and a Ninja to get through traps with ease. Leopin, alone (solo), had gained enough power to do everything.

As Leopin continues to be a warrior, he is adored by his childhood friend, a saint, and admired by a beautiful alchemist, and his activities become even more well known. On the other hand, the classmates who expelled Leopin regret their decision to do so when they witness Leopin's abilities. Their home remains a shack, they are unable to explore, and they gradually lose their place in the school and are ruined.
___
**Explanation:** the skill is not "poor dexterity", but "dexterous poor", which is the Japanese equivalent to a Jack of all trades, master of none; since they can do a bit of everything, they are "dexterous", but since they have mastered none, they supposedly cannot make a living from it, hence they are "poor". Another manner of saying you have high dexterity is to be "handy", back-translated from DEX as in *manual* dexterity from early RPGs. "An unemployed handyman who does a bit of everything" just doesn't quite roll off the tongue.

name: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead
description:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tokimeki Tonight
description:
Ranze Etou is an adorable immortal girl with a vampire father and a werewolf mother who would throw things at each other when they get into childish fights. Ranze, however, just wants to live like a normal girl and lead a normal life. Unfortunately, she is "blessed" with the power to turn into anything she bites. For example, if she accidentally bites a cake the wrong way, then she will turn into a cake. The only way to return to normal is to sneeze! Ranze is in love with Shun Makabe, who is a handsome human boy at school. However, a human girl (without much hair) named Youko also likes Shun, and she will do anything to reveal that Ranze is not a human!! Things get even more complicated when Ranze meets Aaron, who is the prince of the Spirit World. Aaron falls in love with Ranze and first sight, and he will do whatever it takes to win her away from Shun… Tokimeki Tonight was one of the hottest mangas in Japan, and you sure don't want to miss this hilarious comedy!  
  
NOTE: This manga does NOT have defined chapters - each volume is about 150 pages of continuous artwork and story. The volumes were split into chapters by the groups for convenience.
tags: Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural

Join Kat in this comedic/slice of life adventure as she tries to find the god responsible for the "blessing" and force them to return her to her normal self! Updated Wed/Sat

"I'll die with you, I promise."

Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason...

description: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.

name: Black and White
description:
It is said that when the lifespan of a human being come to its end, it is necessary to leave behind everything; family, friends, achievements, even love and meet black and white messengers who will lead them to the cycle of reincarnation. However, the infatuations and love in mind; engraved in the bone, how can it be so easy to give it up. When love has gone through the battle of time either it is it still flawless or the wreckage full of holes.

Another Translation
Legend says that when one’s time is up, only when all traces of love from your previous life must be erased, led by the deities of the Impermanence of Black and White , will you be reborn. And yet a breathtaking, extraordinary love that makes you lose your mind could never be so easily forgotten. When love undergoes the test of time, is what remains the same, pure love, or will that love be battered and bruised, unrecognizable?
tags: Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

If this continues, the future that awaits me will either be condemnation, execution, or exile… I want to avoid that at all costs. While I was worrying about this, I found a glimmer of hope. If Tiara, the main heroine, and I could get together and find a yuri route for us, maybe we could avoid a bad ending…? However, I am now beset by a number of beautiful and handsome men…?

Can Hideki survive in this new world using only his comedian’s skills — and make it back to the biggest stage in the comedy world!?

name: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - A Story where a Mysterious Picture Book Uma Musume Author Calls Out to Me (Doujinshi)
description: A series of Umamusume comics made by Natuumi featuring Rice Shower at age 25.
tags: Romance, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Love ka Like ka Wakaranai!
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Tensei Shite Majo ni Natta no de Slow Life o Okuritai no ni Maou ga Nigashite Kuremasen
description:
Miya was a career woman who works hard as a talented secretary. But one day she lost her life and reincarnated as demon Miya in a different world!
She got a job at Demon Castle and worked hard as a secretary again, but she retired from electric shock after giving up on the Demon King who handles Miya too much. To live as a witch Miliyam in the human world.
Miya was a knight and a disciple who lived a leisurely slow life in the human world, but the Demon King attacked!? A romantic comedy loved by reincarnated witches.
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Monster Holic
description:
People become primal beasts, give up rational thought, and celebrate their freedom in anonymity.

This is the "Masked City."

It is a town where anyone can casually transform into a beast by taking a "monster supplement" and do whatever they want. It is the only government-approved "slum" where one can forget the stifling atmosphere of a completely monitored society. In this town, a vampire boy named Zero, who was a real monster, and his werewolf partner Tsuki take on the job of "exterminating vermin" as street cleaners. They search for hit-and-run centaurs, hunt JK bunnies, and fight to the death against an urban legend that has emerged. An encounter with the "Medicine Witch" will change the destiny of Zero and his friends.

(Source: Dengeki Bunko, translated)
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl
description:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Touken Ranbu - Reversal Mirror
description: Izumokami Kanesada & Horikawa Kunihiro
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi

name: Saint Seiya: Zeus Chapter (Doujinshi)
description: A fan made interpretation of the never made Heaven Chapter of Saint Seiya
tags: Action, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Opposites in Disguise
description:
The Class Rep and the Student Council President couldn't be more opposite to each other. Unfortunately, they have no choice but to convince their high school that they're in love. When every little thing can end with the two at odds against one another, no one knows how long it will be until they can't keep up the act. Or what might happen if they do.  
  
When does it stop being an act and become. . . something else?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Drama, School Life

name: Beautiful People
description: Beautiful People is a manga comprised of six profound and thought-provoking short stories. It includes a tale of a vampire who raises a child as his own, a story of a young man who copes with an alcoholic father amongst other problems with the help of an online friend and four others short stories.
tags: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi
description: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!

name: Munou wa Fuyou to Iware "Tokei Tsukai" no Boku wa Shokunin Guild kara Oidasareru mo, Dungeon no Shinbu de Shin mo Chikara ni Kakusei suru
description: In a world where skills are supreme, Cyclo Owen is given the incompetent skill of "clock-user". One day, Cyclo, who is looked down upon by others, is accused of rape and sent to the frontier, where he is pushed down a hole that leads to a dungeon's deepest level. In the depths of his desperate situation, he thought to himself, "If only I could use my clock-user ability to stop my stomach clock as well. Then the hunger would stop." This triggered the awakening of his skill "clock-user". Eventually, he makes full use of his abilities and is recognized as an SSS-class adventurer--.
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hunting in Another World with My Elf Wife
description:
In modern Hokkaido a brown bear has appeared near an elementary school, so a member of the local hunters' association is dispatched to exterminate it. However he gets killed by the bear and wakes up in a fantasy world, armed with only the Remington M870 shotgun he had when he died.
___
**Character Designer:** [Yuunagi](https://mangadex.org/author/58f536f6-3ede-40cc-8b41-82efb77d1919)

name: Doll Man Doll
description: Toru Hitogata, a dollmaker fated to die at 27, throws himself into deadly combat with the cursed Jinkan Doll to fulfill his destiny.
tags: Oneshot

name: Erika
description: Kazuya Aoshima, who was appointed as a temporary teacher, is told by the vice principal that if he can solve the problem of Erika Shimeno, who is rumored to be bullied at school, he might have a chance for full-time employment. He starts working towards resolving the issue, but her true nature is…!? A psychological horror!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Horror

name: Tengen Eiyuu Taisen
description: One day, the hero-adoring highschooler Oda Nobunaga, together with his sister stepped into a mysterious other world. There, were all the strongest and famous historical heroes and figures of the Warring Kingdom period. The curtain rises on the battle to decide who the strongest hero is, and who will be the ultimate ruler.
tags: Historical, Action, Adventure, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk. Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend, scary big dog x Powerful girlfriend... There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kimi ni Somaru Monochrome
description: Hajime Haibara is a boy whose first love has faded away. A mysterious senior student, Bikyu, appears in front of him and invites him into a "new world". Hajime falls in love with Bikyu while being pushed around by her!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

description: A story of a hardworking Big brother doing different exercises all to achieve his dream.

name: Star Martial God Technique
description:
In the whole world there lay twelve paths to climb the Tower of God, and in legends these twelve pathways lead towards the legendary road of immortality. However the paths in the Tower of God, are far too long, without end.  
In ancient times there once were many types of martial arts, sadly the world underwent terrible changes, and only three were left: Flame, Dragon and Star Martial Arts. Generations of experts of those three martial arts search for road of immortality.
Accompany a Star Martial Arts practitioner on his lifetime journey, with young beauties at his side, and plans to become the Highest God.


---

- [Alternative English (Mangatoon)](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/141/episodes)

name: Level Up with the Gods
description:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

---

name: The Legendary Moonlight Sculptor
description:
The man forsaken by the world, the man a slave to money and the man known as the legendary God of War in the highly popular MMORPG Continent of Magic. With the coming of age, he decides to say goodbye, but the feeble attempt to earn a little something for his time and effort ripples into an effect none could ever have imagined. Through a series of coincidences, his legendary avatar is sold for 3 billion 90 million won ($2.7 million), bringing great joy to him, only to plunge him into despair at losing almost all of it to vicious loan sharks. With revelation of money through gaming, he rises from the abyss with new found resolve and steps forward into the new age of games led by the first ever Virtual Reality MMORPG, Royal Road.  
  
This is the legend of Lee Hyun on his path to becoming Emperor with only his family loving heart, his boundless desire for money, his unexpected mind, his diligently forged body and the talent of hard work backing him. This is the legend of the lowest becoming the strongest. This is the legend of WEED.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Magan to Dangan wo Tsukatte Isekai wo Buchinuku!
description:
Ataru, a young man who lost his life in an unfortunate way, receives three special powers from God and is reincarnated into a different world. A powerful gun of his choice, the ability to create bullets freely, and all-seeing eyes known as "Magic Eyes". Ataru, who is the only gunner in this world, joins the adventurer guild with his companion Caro, a beastwoman, who is rescued from slavery. The story of an up-and-coming gunner hero, who eliminates any enemy with a single blow, begins now. 

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7346dt/)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: ｒｉｇｈｔｓ
description: The survival action manga is set in the not-so-distant future, where a new virus that turns humans into zombies has spread around the world. Despite plans of wiping out the zombies with weapons of mass destruction, the zombies still roam the world, spreading fear among humans. Months and years pass, and a zombie hunter named Niki travels around the world with his partner. Niki faces a horde of mutated zombies, psycho zombies, and odd zombie "creatures" as he tries to find a place to live peacefully.
tags: Action, Animals, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama

name: Mahou Tsukai no Hako - Starlit Marmalade
description:
Chikagi Katsuragi enters Kagamisaki High School with the firm intention to have a quiet school life, but not if her hyperactive classmate Hino Hibiki has something to say about it!  
  
Chikagi is fighting a losing battle, as she happens to be the younger sister of the wonderfully eccentric former Student Council President Chidori Katsuragi, and that alone assures that her high school life will be anything but quiet!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: The Emperor is a Pervert!
description:
I became a eunuch as soon as I transmigrated? Fine, a eunuch it is, I'll climb my way up to the top and find a way to wear modern clothes and become a normal man again. My mind is a tangled mess, and I'm going crazy....suddenly, someone interrupts my hopes and dreams: "Mister Xie, tonight the Emperor will sleep with you."

 "......Nani?!"
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Drama, Full Color

name: Devil-Chi
description: Just another average day at your average high school. Fuyuki Hino is a typical student with an ordinary set of friends... except for Sakuba Yomina. Yomina is unbearably shy and can't talk to boys... or girls, for that matter. Even stranger, Fuyuki vaguely remembers some kind of vow he made to her when they were children. But when he accidentally walks into the girls' locker room, he makes a shocking discovery, Yomina is a devil, wings and all! However, this irregular girl still has regular high school problems, including dealing with bullies and just wanting to be liked by others.
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Obokoi Majo wa Majiwaritai!
description: Hiiragi visits Chikage Komori, a transfer student who has never come to school. His chastity is at stake when he comes across a beautiful girl wearing nothing but a jacket!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mousou Sister Demo Shounen Shuudoushi ni Koishite Ii Desu ka?

name: Kimi to Barairo no Hibi
description:
Mochizuki Nobara, who is often described as "serious" by those around her, is an ordinary second-year high school girl who yearns for romance but has yet to experience her first love. At the start of the new semester, the teacher asks her to help a student who has been absent from school to catch up with classes. However, that student is Setohara, an infamous boy who is the subject of many unsavory rumors around school.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Chaos Combat
description: In the vibrant realm of Balchados, where countless cultures thrive, some seek strength above all else. They come together for the Chaos Combat tournament—a brutal contest that will push them to their limits. Fighters from all corners of Balchados clash in battles fueled by ambition and desperation. Only one can emerge victorious, as the true test lies not just in strength, but in the will to win at any cost.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Magic, Gore, Fantasy

name: Fuguushoku to Baka ni Saremashita ga, Jissai wa Sorehodo Waruku Arimasen?
description:
Shirosaki Reito was suddenly sucked in by a mysterious crack and got transferred in between dimensions. He got reincarnated as a baby in another world. He was born in the royal family and was the heir to the throne but he was driven/kicked of the palace. The reason was that he was born as a Support magician and had Alchemist as a job which was the lowest job that existed in the new world and people who had that were considered jobless. But there was a secret hidden in that job!!
___
* Bookwalker LN: [link](https://bookwalker.jp/series/182424/)
* Official LN: [link](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/312278148/185185579)

name: Crimson Heart Wanderer
description: Jiang Wang was betrayed by his sworn brother Fang Pengju, who stole the Daoist Academy's reward of a Meridian Opening pill that he had earned with his blood and sweat. On the verge of death, he inherited the relics of Zuo Guanglie, the genius of the Chu Dynasty, opened his meridians and embarked on the path of cultivation. He was confused and hesitant, but he always held on to the light in his heart, which was a pure heart that remained true to its original intention.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Supernatural

name: My Adopted Daughter is an Eldritch Horror?!
description:
"My Adopted Daughter is an Eldritch Horror?!" is developed by [Crystal Blitz](https://www.youtube.com/CrystalBlitz) and Artists! 
If you would like to support us, follow the additional links.
_____________

tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Self-Published, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Kuzumi-kun, Can't You Read the Room?
description: Erika Sakura is the school's most popular female high schooler, and only met with envious gazes since she is out of everyone's league. However, she is recently interested in a certain male high schooler who can't read between the lines, Kuzumi. While having a relationship between the two is out of the question, her unrequited love will soon change in this romantic comedy. Follow this new inevitably heart pounding, out-of-contact short love comedy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Devil’s Body Temperature
description:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The moon cries at the final wish
description: Shingetsu and Asahi, inseparable since childhood, grew up on a secluded island where the laughter of children was seldom heard. On the night of the summer festival, Asahi—a girl long afraid of the dark—finally gathers her courage and invites Shingetsu, the boy she grew up with, to the celebration. But when the seal of an ancient shrine is broken, an angel appears—a young maiden whose radiance lights up the night. Thus begins a fateful battle, burning with passion… with the destiny of the world hanging in the balance!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Most Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me, the xx Artist!?
description:
Amesaka Sora, an ordinary high school boy, usually enjoys drawing erotic pictures as a hobby. Since his failure in junior high school, he had planned to hide his hobby in high school... But one day, the student council president and the most beautiful girl in the school, Kisaragi Uguisu, finds out his secret...!?

A coming-of-age rom-com between a beautiful girl at the top of the caste system and one of those male extras!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

description: Not found

description:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tensai Dai Ni Ouji wa Hikikomori Tai: "Koku Kaishi" no Mujikaku Musou
description:
Neet van Avadora, the second prince of the great kingdom of Astoria, is a homebody who loves nothing more than staying indoors. After cutting himself off from the outside world for years to devote himself to magical research, he has, without even realizing it, grown into a true prodigy of magic.

One day, however, under orders from his father the king, Neet is forced, much against his will, to enroll in the Magic Academy. There, he gradually begins to enjoy student life, blessed with quirky but kind friends. But because of his overwhelming magical talent, he constantly finds himself caught up in one troublesome incident after another…!

Meanwhile, Alex, the first prince, and the very cause of Neet’s growth into an unknowing genius, sets a certain “plan” into motion. This plan will spark a great incident, one that will change not only Neet’s fate, but also the fate of the entire kingdom of Astoria…
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Freesia, a plain, bespectacled village girl, is for some reason being stalked by the hero of mankind, Hero Irving! When she tries to ask the people around her for help, all she gets are congratulatory messages. After he proposes to her with an "Unremovable Ring," she tries to escape the village, but is immediately discovered by [Clairvoyance] and then held hostage to have a date with the hero for the sake of world peace. Out of options, she decides to defeat him with her own hands (but her fighting skills are crap...) So to become stronger, she decides to go on a journey to train...?
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Shinkyaku Banrai!
description: Laid off and running out of cash, Michiru stumbles on a hotel looking for a clerk, room and board included! She jumps at the opportunity, but there's a surprise catch: the hotel exclusively serves nonhumans. But for a job with room and board included, anything is possible!!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: THE iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors - Coherent Light
description: Serizawa Asahi, Mayuzumi Fuyuko, and Izumi Mei, members of the idol unit *Straylight*, openly declare themselves as rivals. While they occasionally clash, they further polish their talents, shining even brighter. The new manga adaptation of the game *The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors*, compatible with the *Enza* platform, is here!
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru

name: Giso Kareshi ni Aisarete Shimaimashita
description: Megumi, a 32-year-old surgeon, navigates heartbreak, unexpected romance, and personal growth. After her boyfriend of seven years, abruptly ends their relationship, Megumi's world crumbles. Even worse, she gets invited to his engagement party. To avoid embarrassment, Megumi enlists the help of her junior colleague, Dr. Akiho, to pose as her boyfriend.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Medical, Slice of Life

name: Jama Rama
description: Living in a world filled with Heroes and Villains. Jamy once wanted to be a hero more than anything, but being born with a failure of a body, he believed he was destined to be nothing in life. Then one night an encounter with his best friend Kyoko’s mysterious past, gives him the chance to change his destiny…

name: Not found
description:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

description: Kaoru Mochimizu, a 30-year-old female research scientist who studied the three-dimensional structure of everything. However, one day, she died in an earthquake and met a goddess. Having covered for her kouhai during the earthquake, she was allowed to reincarnate in another world with two skils. Kaoru Mochimizu is now Charlotte Elbaran, the eldest daughter of a duke in the Kingdom of Elida, on Planet Garland. With memories of her past life, and taking advantage of the skills "Structural Analysis" and "Structural Editing," she will live a good life.

name: My Disciples Are All Big Villains
description: Lu Zhou wakes up to become the world’s most powerful and oldest villainous Patriarch, and finds that he has nine notorious disciples who are full of evil. His eldest disciple is the leader of the Nether Sect with thousands of minions, and his second disciple—Sword Devil—always slaughters others at the slightest disagreement…

name: POLE STAR
description:
Yayano, an eighth grader, moved to Atami with her mother from Tokyo. A somewhat rustic hotel is her mother's new workplace. Yayano is full of anxiety, but there she witnesses her mother's surprising appearance...! For Yayano, this is the first turning point in her life!?
___
