tags: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A large bus carrying students from Ryoreikan High School, attended by children from respectable families, plunged into an accident. The bus ended up at the scene of a yakuza conflict. While the students managed to survive, when they regain consciousness, it is the yakuza who were supposed to have died in the accident that end up inhabiting their bodies.

Eiji Shiokawa, a member of the Tsukihiro syndicate, awakens as "Shiori Kirino" and tries to blend into school life for the time being. However, suspicious incidents begin to occur in the surroundings... With the appearance of a refined young lady but the soul of a yakuza, a never-before-seen "conflict" unfolds on the stage of an ultra-refined girls' school!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Mafia, Delinquents

name: Angel Heart - 2nd Season
description:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

Note: direct continuation of Angel Heart, renewed in Monthly Comic Zenon after the cancellation of Bunch.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Usotsuki Twilight

name: Blade Skill Online: Crushing the Competition with My Abysmal Stats, Useless Class, and Garbage Weapon!
description:
Though Yuri may look like any other high schooler, his life is a ceaseless onslaught of the worst luck imaginable — so when he hears about Blade Skill Online, the ultra-immersive VRMMO where luck is a stat you can control, he can’t wait to start playing and escape his IRL problems. 

Following the advice of an online guide, he chooses the summoner class with a bow for his weapon, and for his stats, he pours every last point into luck, naturally. Thus begins his blessed online life! Or at least, that was the plan. He soon learns he’s been trolled — summoners are useless, the bow is garbage, and the game’s barely playable with his abysmal stats! 

To top it off, a bald barbarian starts hitting on him barely a minute into the game because the avatar randomizer made him into a hot girl! Still, Yuri’s used to dealing with whatever life throws at him, and he’s not going to let the trolls have the last laugh! 

He’ll push his luck to the limit and leave the rest of BSO’s players racing to keep up!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/blade-skill-online-crushing-the-competition-with-my-abysmal-stats-useless-class-and-garbage-weapon)
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: A human was murdered by a youkai in the Human Village in broad daylight. In response, the sages of Gensokyo forbid the youkai from eating human flesh while the tengu begin investigating the culprit.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Doujinshi, Drama, Mystery

name: The Villainess is Bothered By Male Leads
description: All she wanted was an easy life as a noble woman. Instead, Laura Jay found herself involved with a series of drama and a number of courters. She didn't sign up for all the excitement. "Just leave me alone!"
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Honki no Akuyaku Reijo!
description: I was reincarnated as Blanca, a villainess in the world of an Otome game that I loved in my previous life. It's unfortunate that I was reincarnated as Blanca, a character I don't like very much, but maybe I can witness a flirtatious scene between the heroine and her capture target without being charged for money! In order to make the love of the captured target and heroine more exciting than the game, I will do my best to be mean to the heroine, but for some reason the love doesn't seem to be progressing....The villainous daughter's all-out love comedy finally begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Phantom Court
description:
In the year 1520, the reclusive island of 'Kodornacht' suddenly falls into a deep winter, one whose intensity is enough to freeze the very sea it resides in, opening its shores to the outside World for the first time in over a millennia.

With untold riches up for the taking, it gives birth to a gigantic treasure hunt.
However, Kodornacht hides something much more important and mysterious: The Phantom Court—a trinket with the power to control winds, fortune, and, some say, even resurrect the dead. 

The Hunt begins.
___________________
My third manga project, Phantom Court is a story containing fantasy elements that hopes to bring to the readers enjoyable characters and high-stakes conflicts.

I've been working on this one for a while; I hope you'll join me for the ride.

More of my garbage on: https://linktr.ee/redbowcr
tags: Thriller, Official Colored, Historical, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Minami-ke
description:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tsurenai Kanojo no Hitorijime
description: A story of youth and sensuality. A thrilling real high school love story! High schooler Nachi Shinohara is a social butterfly. He can get along with anyone. On the other hand, there's the lone wolf, Takizawa Yuuri. A chance exchange of words leads to a relationship that no one knows about.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: NIRAIKANAI
description: Sumeragi Hotsuma, the blind "Sound Master," can kill Japanese demons with only the "sounds" made by the ring in his hand. His partner is high school student, Hiragi Ranku, adept at the strongest martial art, "Sappo" and blessed with the courage to fight any foe with her bare hands. A surprise, perhaps, that their enemies are "gods." Their battle takes place in Okinawa, a mystical island that protects Japan from evil gods and demons. This is a strange tale, which relates the mysterious history of Okinawa, myths from around the world and other world events with very precise imagery. Here exists a very, very strange world of fiction. The title, Narai Kanai means "Paradise" in the Okinawan dialect. In Okinawa, there is an island where the dead go to find eternal peace. Can Hotsuma and Ranku save Japan and provide these wandering souls with eternal peace?
tags: Monsters, Action, Ninja, Samurai, Supernatural, Mystery

name: I Had Only given Him a White Handkerchief 'Casually' at the Ball, But now this Knight is Pressuring Me to Become his Fiancée!
description:
Melietta, a daughter of a Count, was now of marriageable age.
At a ball held to find potential suitors, she casually handed a handkerchief to a knight present as a token of their meeting—
Only to have him storm into her estate the very next day and propose!
Initially hesitant, Melietta finds herself drawn to the kind knight.
But his true nature... “I won't let you escape—no matter what it takes.”
His overly protective, possessive nature (yandere) becomes increasingly apparent?
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Hakobune - Shinubeki na no wa Dare ka?
description:
Of the 9 people, who is it okay to die - who should die?

Shuichi visits an underground building deep in the mountains with his club friends from the university. They accidentally wander into an underground building with a family of three and spend the night there, but an earthquake occurs in the middle of the night, blocking the door and causing water to pour in from underground. To escape, one person must stay behind. Then a murder occurs, and if the culprit is not identified, they would all be dead. The brutal search for the culprit, with a time limit of about one week, begins!

Based on the novel written by Yuuki Haruo.
tags: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Shurato: Heavenly Tale - Sval Plana
description: Passionate about martial arts, Shurato and his lifelong friend, Gai, compete in a tournament but a dazzling light transports them to the celestial world, a place inhabited by divine beings. Shurato then learns from the goddess Vishnu that he is the reincarnation of one of the eight celestial warriors who protect the harmony of the world. But, very quickly, he is accused of treason and is pursued by the other warriors, and in particular by Gai, his best friend who seems determined to kill him... Meanwhile, the army of the goddess Shiva, led by Indra, chief celestial warriors, is about to invade the celestial world……
tags: Adventure, Fantasy

name: Kinki Chihou no Aru Basho ni Tsuite
description: My friend Ozawa, who has gone missing. He was an editor of an occult magazine, and before his disappearance, he had covered ghost stories related to an area called "●●●●●". Quotes from past magazine articles, strange stories from readers, and Internet bulletin board posts - as we follow his footsteps and decipher the materials he had collected, certain connections emerge between the ghost stories that had been treated as separate incidents.
tags: Horror, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Musashinosen no Shimai
description:
A pair of sisters living in N City, Saitama prefecture…  
  
The older sister earned a large fortune while she was young. and now, She's a celeb neet who's sometimes afflicted by net addiction. Her name is "Midorikawa Ranko," or commonly called as "Ran."  
  
The younger sister is living off her older sister's fortune, wishing to progress in the normal society. her name is "Midorikawa Hikaru," commonly called as "Pandora."  
  
The gothic loli neet sisters are bringing you a somewhat harsh, moe comedy!
tags: Comedy

name: Warui no wa Shakai da
description: Maki meets a man named Tomonori who pays well. What does the word "dole" that he often uses mean? This is the story of a woman who falls for a scumbag man who nests on the dark side of society.
tags: Romance, Crime, Drama, Tragedy

name: Kegareta Seichi Junrei ni Tsuite

name: Not found
description: "Magic." A sacred mystery usable only by those chosen. One day, a child from the slums named Arus finds he has the power to use magic. A sorcerer by the name of Genos Willzard learns of his talent and raises him, turning him into the greatest of assassins. One day, Genos gives him an order: To enroll at the Magic Academy...?!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Jakdu
description: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Handyman Saitou in Another World
description: Handyman Saitou has never been anyone special. All his life, he's had average grades, ordinary athletic skill, a commonplace job... But his unremarkable path takes a turn when he wakes up in another world. Here, warriors, wizards, and elves accompany him on quests delving deep into dungeons, and Saitou realizes for the first time what it's like to be needed. After all, who other than the handyman could be trusted to open locked treasure chests or repair his allies' equipment?
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: Indra, a mistreated daughter of a noble family, suddenly regains memories of her past life. Using the knowledge from her previous world as her weapon, she begins to train herself to become independent. Just then, an S-rank adventurer named Sword—a lonely middle-aged man—appears before her!? With Indra’s unconventional thinking and overwhelming strength, the two set off on a legendary journey of unmatched power!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Atarashii Kimi e
description: Sakuma, a teacher at an all-girls school, sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response, he runs away and decides to tour Japan, going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl, that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl, and he eventually returns to his normal life, having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...
tags: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Circée
description:
Science or magic?

 « Welcome to Paris, elected for the 68th month in a row as the least polluted city in the world. Thanks to cyanel, the air we breathe inside our houses is purified. » 

In a futuristic Paris, pollution is so prevalent that all greenery has disappeared. Recently, a gigantic plant appeared in the heart of the city, and the authorities are making sure no one gets close… Thomas, a young science student, is secretly studying the phenomenon, hoping for a better life.

Raised by his witchcraft-loving grand-mother, he is often prone to hallucinations. One day, he crosses paths with a strange young girl with very bright eyes, who faints in the air. From then on, his fate changes…
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Oukoku e Tsuzuku Michi Dorei Kenshi no Nariagari Harem Life
description:
This is the story of a young slave gladiator in an underground arena. He doesn't know about his past or how he got to where he is, only that his name is Aegir, and that he is strong. One day he kills the boss and escapes the arena, joining a band of mercenaries as a new recruit. During one mission, they encounter the vampire, Lucy, who slaughters the band with her inhuman strength. After learning that Aegir only knows how to kill, Lucy lets him stay at her house, educating and taking care of him.

Two years pass, and on the day of Aegir's departure, they both exchange a promise that if Aegir becomes a king and owns the land of Erg forest, he can come and take her as his woman. Making this his life goal, Aegir set out on a journey to become a hero, a king, and found his own kingdom.
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Bad Boys Boogie
description:
Jin Takahara is the 16th student in Class D of the prestigious Shirataki Gakuen High School. He is a gutsy guy who proudly proclaims, "I am a genius." From the first day of school, he drives a racing machine to school.

 However, on the way to school, he steps on a ball hit by Kiriyama, a member of the baseball team, and falls over, causing an early mess... 

Whether it is a fight or a baseball game, the game is played with guts. Hit them with an angry slap!
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)

A mysterious duck chases Jiwoo, who dropped her wallet on the street. 
Jiwoo takes the duck into her home, and the duck quickly becomes immersed in their new home. And so begins... the days of the duck race!

name: Her Summon
description: Due to a misuse of a word joke on live TV broadcast, girl group otaku, 'Jin-Kyung' ended up becoming doxxed and labeled as a "child predator", and ended up getting Social Anxiety Disorder. 3 years later, because of his past incident from the 3D world, his love for only the 2D world manifested, and ended up becoming a "Shut-In Otaku"! Then one day, as Jin-Kyung was no-lifing as usual, he was summoned to ‘Another World’, and came face-to-face with a bright-eyed, hopeful Summoner… Interesting enough, in the world that Jin-Kyung was summoned to, his Social Anxiety Disorder disappeared, and he was also able to wield immense power, and became the strongest summoned being there ever was!! The story of a former girl group otaku turned powerful 2D otaku, and the story of a weak and feeble Summoner commences now!

description: Meet Shinichi Honda and Mako Wakamiya. One’s a boy, and the other’s a girl. But both don’t hesitate to say exactly what’s on their mind **IN CAPITAL LETTERS.**
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Oneshot promoting the first volume of the Light Novel "Alya, Who Sits Next to Me, Sometimes Whispers Sweet Nothings in Russian". Popularity may result in a serialization!  
  
Follow the story of the ice-cold perfect beauty, the half-Russian Alisa "Alya" Mikhailovna Kujo, and your average high school underachiever, Masachika Kuze. She has a cold exterior, but speaks her love in a language she thinks nobody understands… Little does she know that he understands her just fine! Enjoy the silly slice-of-life romance between Snow Princess and Mr. Worldwide!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Asako
description: The challenged relationship between Masashi Aoshima, an 11-year-old boy living in a seaside fishing village, and Asako, a mysterious beauty from Tokyo who came to stay at his guest house.
tags: Romance, Drama, Shota, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Tatsumigahara-san no Ai Kara wa Nigerarenai
description: At a party, Mondo, a typical college student, meets Tatsumigahara Aoi, a well-known beauty. But after having a few drinks with her, he passes out and wakes up chained in Aoi's home. Even though Aoi looks after Mondo in every way (including in explicit ways), Mondo tries to flee from her home. The outcome is uncertain.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Harem, Drama, Tragedy

name: Osananajimi wo Erabanai Yatsu wa Kasu da!
description:
The protagonist, Nekomiya Kotone, loves her childhood friend the heroine, but hates fateful encounters.
Every day she dreams of a future where she is together with her childhood friend Kitsunezaki Sakino, but one day she herself had a "fateful encounter...?"
A bright yuri comedy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Girls' Love, Harem, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic

name: Lost Lovers
description: Losing memories after a confession?! A crossdressing boy and the one he loves are cursed to never fall deep in love, and are forced to repeat their confession over and over. What is the antidote to love? Can there be miracles in true love?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ayashi Michizure
description:
Yukiya, a first-year junior high school student living alone in a seaside town, meets a mysterious boy at the sea one day.
The boy cannot speak, but he has the mysterious power to transform into various animals. Yukiya names the boy Nagi and the two bond, and soon the two fall in love.
However, Nagi has a terrifying secret...
tags: Animals, Boys' Love, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
A slightly offbeat slice-of-life comedy starring… a golem schoolgirl?!

It’s spring of his second year in high school, and Otonashi can’t help but notice the girl sitting next to him, cheerful, bright, and, well… a golem. Her arm pops off at the drop of a hat, flowers sprout from her head when she’s happy, and she overheats whenever she’s embarrassed. Every day with her brings something new and unexpected. Not quite a romance, but definitely not your average friendship... here begins the surreal, slightly strange daily life of two unusual classmates.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Fruit of the Underworld
description:
Seiji has had unnaturally bad luck ever since he inadvertently went to the underworld as a kid. That day, when he brought back Hades's pomegranate from the Underworld, is when his world suddenly turned into disarray!

Distinguished manga artist Kanno Aya takes on the underworld in this dark fantasy!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
If you can't pay back the magic... prepare for ruin!

Rent, a member of the rising star party Blade of the Skycleaver, has always supported his team from the shadows with his rare Gift, Magic Vault—an ability to loan out magic power to others. But when his level growth lags behind, the party cruelly kicks him out, tossing aside all his loyalty and effort. Enraged by the betrayal, Rent's Gift evolves into Unlimited Magic Vault, unlocking new potential—and summoning a mysterious and adorable support fairy named MP. Now, guided by MP, Rent sets out on a magical debt collection rampage, reclaiming the power he lent out... with interest. Those who used him will soon learn: magic debt is no joke.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy

name: World Trigger
description: A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Ashes of his throne
description: Some dude with memory loss, village done burned to the ground and can’t stop seeing this silver haired girl. He embarks on a journey to defeat the demon king but has to face a bunch of obstacles blah blah blah and gets a harem.

description:
A manga that revolves around an old-fashioned all-night food stall, the various dishes that the stall owner prepares to suit the tastes of different customers, and the joys, griefs, trials and tribulations of his faithful patrons.  
  
- Nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award (2009)  
- Winner of the 39th Japan Cartoonist Awards Grand Prize (2010)

name: Nekomimi Shoujo wa Mori de Slow Life wo Okuritai ~Mofumofu wa Shomou Shimashita ga, Seijo to ka Ouji-sama to ka wa Chuumongai desu~
description:
Let’s strive for a soothing and fluffy life at the forest atelier! ♪

Chise was an office worker who could not touch the animals she loves because of allergies. One day, she died while protecting a cat, but God saw her good deed and reincarnated her in another world! Reincarnated as a cat-eared girl, Chise has the skills to tame and summon spirits, as well as the knowledge to make potions, and is surrounded by the fluffies of her dreams...?

(*Note: This section requires further editing.)
tags: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Henjo ~Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko~
description: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Nichijou
description:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: After witnessing injured soldiers get abandoned, the countess of a remote region, Neon regained memories of her past life as a nurse. Although she started using modern medical techniques like triage in order to treat the injured soldiers, problems like her husband, who is the leader of the knights order in the remote region confronting her, are piling up――?!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dai Dark
description:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Tenshi no Saezuri
description:
Sanae Kitajima is a psychiatrist specializing in end-of-life care. Her boyfriend, Takanashi, who once struggled with a deep fear of death, returns from an Amazon expedition profoundly changed. What happened during the expedition? What is the true meaning behind his cryptic words, "I can hear the whispers of angels"?

A complete manga adaptation of Yusuke Kishi's original novel, known for producing numerous masterpiece horror novels such as The Black House and Lesson of the Evil.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Survival, Horror, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Torch Song Ecology
description: The story follows Kiyotake, a man with no aim or accomplishments in life. He’s an actor who lands extra roles at best, works multiple part-time jobs to barely support himself, and has few personal attachments. His best friend Shun died when he was 19 in an accident and he now has a few casual friends. This expands when an old acquaintance moves in next door…
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Kozure Doushin
description: The story centers on the supporting character Tachibana from Saraiya Goyou during his childhood.

name: Kodomo datte Otona ni Naru
description: Visiting home after a long time away, Nao bumps into her first love Yuzuru who informs her of his upcoming wedding to their childhood friend, Suzu. But when Nao returns to Tokyo in shock, someone decides to show up at her door…?
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Hoshizora no Karasu
description: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!
tags: Traditional Games, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: My Second Life is a Healing Life?
description: Eugene Pellivia, the youngest son of a legendary warrior family, is on the brink of death—until he’s visited by Pellin, the fabled Mage of Creation, and given a second chance at life. Determined to follow in the footsteps of the one who saved him, Eugene sets out to become a great mage and use his powers for good. But fate has other plans, and before long, he's drawn into the shadows of a darker world...
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A collaborative work featuring Hyoma x Ginga. It contains a significant amount of horror elements.

name: Not found
description:
Jin is an adventurer so overwhelmingly strong that he can cut down a three-headed dragon with a single slash! Though he craves more power, he fears that becoming any stronger would turn him into a monster... so he retires from adventuring and returns to his hometown café, in Dagar! However, in the mountains behind his family home lies a dungeon said to grant one’s deepest desires...?!

Together with Shuna, a runaway saint who suddenly barges into his life, the power-hungry former adventurer sets out to conquer the dangerous, monster-filled dungeon! And after the battles, they savor exquisite dungeon cuisine made from the monsters they defeat—?!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking

description:
The funny romantic story of how Qiu Tong and Sun Jing met and fell in love.

Also contains insert art of the characters by the author.

name: Killer in Love
description:
Suzuki Ryuuto is an introverted, timid college student. Every day he puts on a fake smile, trying his best to blend into a group of outgoing students even despite cruel teasing about his virginity.  
  
But one day, he comes to a drinking party where he meets a beautiful girl, Kokoa. Per her request, he starts to pretend to be her boyfriend to ward off the stalker who is harassing Kokoa.  
  
That tender love was the beginning of a tragedy…
tags: Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama

name: Isekai Shachou - Maou Gun de Nariagaru!
description:
The president of a board game company suddenly finds himself transported to another world!?
And the place he ends up in? A monster-infested land with no humans in sight…
It’s an isekai story — but there’s no cheat ability at all!
His only weapons are the management skills and business experience he built up in the real world!!
To find a way back home, he starts from the very bottom of a strangely corporate-structured Demon Lord’s Army—
and sets his sights on becoming the Demon Lord himself to defeat the Hero!?

(Humbly provided by ChatGPT(free btw))
tags: Action, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Akira (Omega) and Keigo (Alpha) are a Pair, and run a very popular couple’s vlog channel. However, the two are only pretending to be a Pair for work and their relationship is just an act. Then one day, Akira’s heat arrives unexpectedly… will this fake relationship change into something more…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Rosebud Rosie
description:
*Reads from left to right.*

A collection of poem manga and full color manga filled with warmth and childhood innocence.

Includes:
- **Rosebud Rosie**: A precocious little girl named Rosie finds a kindred spirit in Paco, a boy from the circus. A short serial that was one of the launch titles in *Lyrica*.
- **The Bright Gray House**: A girl reflects on herself, her neighborhood, and her home in the period where two-story homes were only just beginning to become widespread in this full color poem manga.
- **The Child in the Box**: A full-color picture book (ehon) manga on a little boy who isolates himself from others.
- **My Neighbor Ippei-kun**: The daily life of a little boy named Ippei and his family.
- **The Light in August**: A short poem manga about a girl and a game of hide-and-seek she played when she was younger.
- **Etchings of the Seasons**: Two-page poem manga by Kimura that cover various subjects, often reflective and contemplative.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Crest of the Stars
description:
2012 manga running in Comic Meteor.  
  
Crest of the Stars follow Jinto Lynn, a young count whose world is taken over by the space-dwelling race of the Abh. When Jinto was a young boy, his father, Rock Lynn, under threat of invasion, handed over their world, Martine, to the Abh in exchange for a position within Abh society. Young Jinto is sent off to school to learn the ways of Abh nobility and the story of Crest of the Stars picks up as he meets the young Abh princess, Lafiel as they are about to travel to military school for Jinto's further training.  
  
However, in the midst of their travels, Lafiel and Jinto (along with the Abh ship Gothlauth, a.k.a. Gosroth) find themselves at the very beginnings of a war between the Abh Empire and the Four Nations Alliance of humankind—an anti-Abh alliance of the democratic nations of the United Mankind, the Federation of Hania, the Republic of Greater Alcont, and the People's Sovereign Union of Planets.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Adaptation

tags: Comedy, School Life

name: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero
description:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
After dying in the modern world, the protagonist transmigrates into a cliché romance novel—but not as the heroine or villainess. Instead, she becomes the neglected only daughter of the story’s infamous "overbearing CEO" male lead and his canon wife (a gentle but doomed character).

Now stuck in the body of a pampered but lonely child, she must:

Survive the chaotic plot: Her "cold CEO dad" is too busy tormented by misunderstandings with the female lead, while her "mom" is destined to die tragically.

Fix her family: Using her adult knowledge, she schemes to prevent her parents’ divorce, expose scheming antagonists, and maybe teach her emotionally stunted dad how to be a decent human.

Avoid doom flags: The original story’s timeline threatens her cushy life as the CEO’s heir.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kinjitsuten wa mada Tooku
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Girls' Love

name: Homunculus
description: Trepanation is the procedure of drilling a hole in the skull. It is said to increase the blood circulation and improve pressure inside the skull. It is also said to bring out a person's sixth sense, the ability to use ESP, see ghosts, move objects with one's mind. This is speculative fiction based on the concept of trepanation.
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: GTO: Great Teacher Onizuka
description:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description:
The story follows martial artist Eleven, a fierce and skilled warrior tiger, as he navigates a mysterious wuxia world filled with adventure.

"Ruthless Blade" (喵十一) is an original comic series inspired by the Chinese animated short film of the same name, featured in the second season of Bilibili’s Capsules Project. Nicolas Nemiri and Bo Zhang, who collaborated on the original short, continue to bring their creative vision to the comic series in new roles, enriching this captivating world.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Owl-Light Bridge
description: Do you ever find yourself in need of unicorn horns, dragon scales, goblin boogers, or any other object once possessed by a magical creature? Then you have come to the right place. Dealing with magical creatures can be dangerous business for the average human. That's why at Owl-Light Bridge, we track down magical creatures and collect what you need from them so you don't have to (humanely of course)! Welcome to Owl-Light Bridge!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin
description:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made
description: Wim Strauss is a "granting caster" - a support mage who can increase the strength of his allies through the power of his spells. It's a useful talent, but since it can't be used directly in battle, it gets zero respect from the other members of his party. As far as they're concerned, support magic is dead weight. It isn't long before they toss him out on his ear, leaving Wim to wonder if his career as an adventurer is over. Luckily for Wim, he has one big chance: His childhood friend Heidemarie is able to get him an audition with her elite A-rank party, Nachtlibelle. The two of them know his magic is good for more than just menial backup, but now he'll have to prove it. It's time to show the world that support mages can do more than just stand on the back lines!
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shiraishi-kun's Classmates
description: The protagonist is Shiraishi Atoi, who hasn't been able to communicate well with others and hasn't made any friends. After entering high school, he enters a special class at a rural school. But instead of being a normal class, it's full of unusual classmates. A story full of fluff!
tags: Animals, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mazoku no Pet ni Narimashite
description: One day, Takafumi Ayanokoji, an ordinary high school boy, is warned by a suspicious fortune teller that he is in trouble with women. Immediately after that, along with heavy rain and lightning, a beautiful girl with blonde hair and red eyes appeared. The girl follows Takafumi to his house and says she wants to keep him as a pet, but...!?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

description: Note: [ビッチ](https://jisho.org/search/%E3%83%93%E3%83%83%E3%83%81) "bitch" is a wasei-eigo loan word slang in Japanese that means "slut"

name: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?
description:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... "Breast Correction"!? Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it...?
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66639)

name: Poolside Memories
description: When their classmate’s expensive watch goes missing during swimming class, the prime suspects are the three students who sat out that day: Taewoong, Mitsuki, and Sakuma. Together, they set out on the hunt for the lost watch, but what they find is…
tags: Oneshot, Drama, School Life

name: Kiyosumi Mashiro no Daibouken
description: A shy schoolgirl decides that today is going to be her 'Miniskirt Debut', because miniskirts are all the rage at school and her friend decided to wear one.  Can she make it to school without dying of embarrassment?
tags: School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Yamu ni Yamarenu! ~Tensei Kenja no Heion(?) na Nichijou~
description: After losing his life because of his own womanizing badness, the reincarnated former Great Sage Akiba Kenji contracts with the Great Demon Gremory in order to become the Great Sage once again, but that contract provides the opportunity for his MAX-level yandere followers, who continued loving him even after losing him, to find him, and they won't let him get away......!? All heroines confirmed yanderes!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7 - Steel Ball Run
description:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Daremasu Battle Royale (Doujinshi)
description: 30 popular idols from The Idolmaster Cinderella Girls are gathered on a remote island by a mysterious management. They must survive and fight each other in order to survive and escape from the island.

name: Enomoto-senpai wa Tenshi Nanka Janai
description: In the room of Hagino (university student), there is a ghost (?) of a man who was supposed to have died in an accident. That is Enomoto. Enomoto is the best friend of a senior student whom Hagino has a crush on, and is a bold man with a mean look in his eyes. Like the Grim Reaper, Enomoto declares, "If I can take my best friend's life within 49 days, I can come back to life in his place." A BL story of secret nemeses between an egocentric freeloader and a doggy-like landlord!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: Baki-Dou
description:
Baki is bored. After the conclusion of the epic battle between father and son, he continues to fight in the underground arena and train nonstop, but he always has to suppress his yawn caused by the overbearing boredom. No amount of stimulus or danger can bring excitement to him at this point.  
  
Now, with the inclusion of the Prime Minister of Japan in the loop, a massive cloning project is attempting to clone Miyamoto Musashi, one of the fathers of martial arts in Japan. Another fight of historical proportions awaits Baki!  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18746) (OAV)
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Belladonna no Koibito
description:
Cursed to take the life of anything she touches, the only cure to Bella’s ailment is an act of ‘true love’. However, shunned by the town, the ‘Poisonous Witch’ spends her days living alone in the forest. That was until one fateful day when she meets an unsuccessful painter named Anna…

A oneshot published on Ciao Plus in October 2024.

Compiled into an anthology with "Ouji-chan no Suki na Hito" and "Ningyo Hime" in 2025.
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gal ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai
description: Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. To make matters worse, a rival girl is taunting her in class, calling her a "kin-nikuman" (golden meat bun). When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight, he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: The Stone Flower
description:
Yugoslavia during World War II. Fierce battles between the Germans and partisans were undeniably drawing people into the fray. What is a country, a people, a human being? A war tale that vividly brings ideals and reality, love and hatred to life! 

Krillo and Phee are living a peaceful life while attending school, even though they hear some disturbing stories. One day, however, the Nazis invade their village, and their lives change drastically. 

The village is burned to the ground, and Krillo and Phee are sent to a guerrilla organization and a concentration camp, respectively. What will be their fate..?

(from ebookjapan)
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Belgrade Metro no Kodomotachi
description:
In the year 20XX, reports start coming in about psychics appearing throughout the countryside of rural Serbia in the former Yugoslavia.

The government creates a law to punish those who use their powers, which manages to keep the peace - at least, on the surface.

Ten years later...

Cyzki, a boy who has moved to Belgrade, the capital of Serbia, has just run away from home.
Abandoned for four years after the construction was halted, he wanders into the abandoned Belgrade Metro.
However, it is a hangout for people with abilities who have no time to spare.

Due to the "hunt for Psychics" started by the Golden Dawn, a large corporation that controls Belgrade, he was placed in a difficult situation.

Furthermore, Cyzki meets Mariya, the daughter of Golden Dawn, and falls in love with her at first sight.
In an attempt to get close to her extreme male chauvinist ideology, he ends up dressing as a woman in order to get close to her.
As he pursues the mystery of the psychics, the more involved he gets into her life, the more ambitious our hero becomes.

Adaptation of [Children of Belgrade Metro](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355500/_/)
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Gore, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Rezu ga nonke ni horeta jiten de makeikusadatta noda
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Drama

name: I Became the Daughter of the Ghost Duke
description:
Theresia Oblene, eight years old.

As her dead mother’s things which she left were taken hostage, she was threatened by her wicked biological father and was forced to be adopted by the Ghost Duke family.

“But he only told me to go to be adopted, right? He didn’t tell me not to have this adoption undone, did he?”

Now that it has become like this, I’ll leave my name behind as the fastest child to get a dissolution of adoption in the history of the Empire.

===

An heir’s duty? What’s that? Is it something to be eaten?

It was my plan to become a lout and get kicked out on purpose.

Until I met the Ghost Duke who was cursed.

[Let me do this kind of thing as a parent, Terry.]

[I will become the Miss’ wooden horse!]

[Thank you, Miss!]

The Duke is too kind, and the employees are too sweet.

If so… then change of plans!

I decided to raise the Duke Family which is doomed, and buy the whole Viscount family.

Shouldn’t I use the ability to see ghosts at times like this?

But…

[Hey, you. If you keep pretending not to know… I will tell the ghosts of the mansion that you can see ghosts.]

My ability was found out by some ghost possessing a teddy bear.

Will… I be able to survive here safely?
tags: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta
description:
A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed!

He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed! Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Oyasumi Nini-chan
description: In so much anguish that he couldn't sleep, Ameta thought in desperation that it might be better to end it all. Just as he was about to cast himself off, an angel suddenly dove from the sky and collided with his head. And so began the heartwarming life of a young man named Ameta and his self-proclaimed angel.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Academy's Undercover Professor
description:
Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list, Professor Ludger Cherish. 

The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack, making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know, Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret. 

The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous secret society.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
An unidentified flying object suddenly crashes at the United Nations Headquarters in New York. A mysterious being calling himself "Noah" appears. He says he has come to save the Earth, but his purpose is completely unknown. At the same time, a mysterious incident occurs at an elementary school, where 88 people suddenly disappear... In the midst of this unprecedented crisis, the United Nations' supernatural secret analysis department, Black Sheep, is called into action. The key to solving the mystery lies outside of commonsense.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
tags: Sci-Fi, Police, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Killer Vamp
description: Since the last eruption of Mount Fuji, the nights of Japan, and this city, have completely changed... Some of the humans who were covered in volcanic ash became like vampires with incredible powers, and then began an era of killing and blood washing blood! Among those who have reached the height and dictate the rules of the World, Domino, the young woman who came to ruins, climbs her way to the top!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Groundless
description:
The Civil War continues to wage on the island nation of Alistria.

The Waldrons lead a small arms shop on this island when they receive a large rifle order from the army. 
However, this turns out to be a ploy by the colonel who made the order. 
He uses his ties to the rebel army to have them ransack the shop.

Having her husband killed, her daughter taken away and her own left eye lost, 
Sophia Waldron decides to take the only remaining sniper rifle and sets out for revenge!
tags: Action, Survival, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Hooky
description: Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Cherry Pink & Sugar High
description:
Since he was a child, Yukishiro Ibuki has always had a complex of getting red-faced whenever someone gets close to him. But thanks to his efforts, he successfully creates a persona of being the "aloof student council president"! His high school life is smooth-sailing... until his childhood friend Kagachi Rin, who knows his past, transfers into his school! Ibuki is wary of Rin's assertive advances, but...?

This is the start of an electrifying "special training" with his childhood friend who gets too close.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Chronos - Jiseidai Hanzai Jouhoushitsu
description:
The National Police Agency Security Bureau has a secret organization known as the Next Generation Crime Information Center. Their job is to stop the murders by using a certain girl’s precognitive “dreams” before they actually happen! Written by the same author as Shinrei Tantei Yakumo.  
  
Adapted from a novel.
tags: Mystery

name: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru
description: Unpopular underground idol and actress, Enatsu Sayuki, faces her work diligently everyday to achieve her dreams of making it big in the world of acting. But, for some reason, the superstar idol Touma Sera – who should be her rival – becomes her biggest fan! Adorable enough to make Sayuki jealous, Sera takes every chance to passionately declare her love, throwing Sayuki’s life into chaos. Will Sayuki be able to achieve her dreams? And what will become of the one-sided love(?) between Sera and Sayuki...!?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: A World of Gold to You
description:
Once upon a time, the world had been divided into the Moon Kingdom, inhabited by humans, and the Sun Kingdom, inhabited by demons. Estelle, a knight of the Moon Kingdom, loses her family to an ambush from the demons and is sentenced to life in exile after becoming entangled with a mysterious demon child. To survive, she sets out to a mysterious tower in the north with her companions. A timid knight, a slave boy, and a shadow who was once the Demon King.

This is an alluring story about three people embarking on an adventure to find their true selves.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Dachi no Imouto
description: The long awaited new series from Shima Tokio, an irregular boy meets girl story. Please enjoy this extraordinarily sweet romantic comedy.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

description: Not found

name: Mitsuya Sensei no Keikakuteki na Edzuke
description:
"This pounding in my chest is more than just admiration!?"
Tomoya Ishida is a newbie editor at fashion magazine Sophia Monthly. After his senior's sudden hospitalization, he's hastily assigned to collect a column manuscript from the famous culinary researcher Ayumu Mitsuya. He pays him a visit soon after, and to his surprise, finds an affable, older man who speaks in a Kyoto dialect. Being asked to wait, Tomoya is served a simple dish that entices his stomach, and soon he finds himself eagerly awaiting their next encounter!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found

tags: Oneshot, Romance, Anthology, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta.
description:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Vanitas no Carte
description: Rumors revolving around the Book of Vanitas, a clockwork grimoire of dubious reputation, draw Noé, a young vampire in search of a friend's salvation, to Paris. What awaits him in the City of Flowers, however, is not long hours treading the pavement or rifling through dusty bookshops in search of the tome. Instead, his quarry comes to him...in the arms of a man claiming to be a vampire doctor! Thrust into a conflict that threatens the peace between humans and vampires, will Noé cast in his lot with the curious and slightly unbalanced Vanitas and his quest to save vampirekind? [Yen Press]
tags: Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Aruosumente
description:
A dream-like story between a king and his subjects.

One night the oracle Legna dreamed of a voice that shouted "Die!"

Thus, he began to search for the owner of that voice.

To protect the beloved young king, the oracle begins to investigate in private.

---
Legna, one of the last members of a dying-out clan of dream-seers known as 'Oracles', serves as a courtier of the childlike and (apparently) well-loved king of his country.

One night, he has a prophetic dream of impending danger towards His Majesty - but is unable to discern the source of the threat. Determined to protect the young royal, Legna then begins an investigation which takes him deep into the realm where dreams and political conspiracies intertwine...
tags: Historical, Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Digimon Adventure V-Tamer 01
description:
Based on the original Digimon V-pets, V-Tamer certainly brings a whole new twist on the world of Digimon. It opens with Taichi, the main character of the series, attempting to enter a tournment with his V-pet, only to be disqualified because the monster on his V-pet cannot be identified and therefore was not a Digimon that was supposed to be programmed into the V-pet.   
  
A short time later, Taichi finds himself in the Digital World and meets up with his Digimon, Zeromaru, or just Zero for short. Zero is a V-dramon (Veedramon), and between himself and Taichi, they have a battle record of 100%. For this reason, the two of them were chosen by Holy Angemon to save the Digital World from the supreme evil, Arca Demon. With the help of their guide, Gabo, Taichi and Zero set off to defend the Digital World from Arca Demon.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Salt Friend
description:
Unlikely love of a bully & a bookworm.
After returning to school following a suspension for fighting, Thomas's classmates are fearful of him. When Zachary finds him crying alone, Thomas makes him swear to tell no one. Zachary, an A+ student, begins tutoring Thomas... until Thomas realizes the one he fought with was Zachary's brother.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Mila, a girl raised in an orphanage, was born with a rare ability—she can absorb magical energy from objects and people. Her adoptive father, Baron Weston, exploited her gift to cleanse cursed weapons and dark artifacts, wearing her body down to the point that doctors told her she had only a year left to live.

One day, Mila collapses from exhaustion in a temple and is rescued by a beautiful woman named Anneliese. But the help comes at a price—Anneliese begs Mila to save her brother, Dallius, the Commander of the Holy Knights and one of the most powerful dukes in the kingdom, who suffers from a rare illness caused by an overload of magic in his body.

The only solution?
Since Mila can absorb magic, she is the only one who can heal him—through repeated kisses. And so, they enter into a temporary two-year marriage contract, with no emotions involved. But as time passes, and Mila melts into one "healing" kiss after another, Dallius—the once cold and distant duke—begins to show signs of affection far beyond what the contract called for.

"I love you, Mila..."
A whisper that was never meant to be spoken.

Will this marriage, born out of necessity, blossom into something real? Or will time run out before they can confess their true feelings?
___
Mira, who grew up in an orphanage, was born with the ability to absorb magical powers and was forced by her father-in-law, Baron Weston, to purify miasma-tainted swords and magical tools. As a result, her body was so ravaged that doctors told her she would not live more than a year. One day, Mira collapses in the temple and is saved by a beautiful woman, Annalise. Her brother, Darius, is the first duke and head of the Order of the Holy Knights, but he suffers from a disease called hypermagia. Annalise proposes a certain way to save her brother in exchange for saving Mira from the baron...
tags: Romance, Magic, Fantasy

name: Shin Devilman
description:
The story of Shin Devilman is supposed to take place between the second and third volume of the original Devilman series. Here we have Akira and Ryo who mysteriously manage to travel in time. Where they discover the have been sent back to dispatch demons that are invading history to end humanity. They visit several time periods including pre-World War Vienna, ancient Greece, France during the Hundred Years' War, Rococo period France, and wild west America. The end of this series also includes a new epilogue for the Devilman series.

* *NOTE: The US official release of Devilman is based on a version that has both the main Devilman manga and Shin Devilman.*
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Superhero, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Miyatake Miracle
description: Towa has a big complex towards her brother. One day she meets Miyatake, a friend of her brother and her first impression is not at all positive and on the contrary, she is annoyed by the boy; however, every time she has a problem Miyatake appears and stands by her. Will his sweetness be able to reach her?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu
description: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Zipang
description:
In the year 200X, a Japanese fleet consisting of 3 vessels leave on a mission to South America. After encountering a storm, the ship JDS Mirai find itself without its escorts and in the year 1942, traveling towards the island of Midway to face the American fleet in one of largest battles in naval history. The crew of the Mirai must decide whether or not to change the course of history by involving itself in WWII.  

---  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2002**  
  
Published in Indonesia by Level Comics.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Drama, Mystery

name: The Steam Dragon Express
description: The Steam Dragon Express is a magical flying academy
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Guard Pass
description:
While Im Sejun settles things with his fists, his best friend, Hajin Seo, eats and breathes grappling. Together, they fend off bullies on their school campus, but everything changes after a fight that sets Sejun on a mission to hold those responsible accountable for their crimes. 

What began as a schoolroom brawl quickly turns into a fight for justice and truth as Sejun hits the streets looking for any leads as to what happened on that fateful day.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Higawari Shippo no Ozaki-chan
description: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
tags: Romance, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: The Daughter of Murakami Pirates
description:
Winner of the 2014 Bookstore Award and the Yoshikawa Eiji Literary Newcomer Award, this blockbuster historical novel has captivated over 1 million readers and is now fully adapted into a manga!

The enemy? The legendary warlord of the Sengoku period, Oda Nobunaga! What destiny awaits the courageous pirate princess who boldly stands against him?

Set in the turbulent Sengoku era, after the chaos of the Ōnin War, the Ashikaga shogunate's power has crumbled. Across Japan, formidable warlords are emerging, each declaring their ambitions in this age of conflict. But did you know there was a woman who dared to challenge the unstoppable forces of Oda Nobunaga, leaving his armies astounded?

Rooted in historical events, this story delivers heart-pounding battles and more! Follow the journey of a striking warrior princess and her encounters with powerful, charismatic heroes. Experience the ultimate Sengoku entertainment!
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Mushihime Kanzenban
description:
It's been 10 years since the hugely successful *Insect Princess* was born. Is Kikuko back!? *Insect Princess* has been given significant revisions and is now back in this *Complete Edition*! A terrifying, violent horror that depicts everyday life as it is corroded by evil and swallowed by death!

**Note:** This new version sets things up for [the sequel](https://mangadex.org/title/e94fafaf-2390-4162-8c41-6dd7c4eef978).
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Uichi no Shima
description: On Christmas Eve night, Meiko, a female college student, planned to spend a peaceful evening alone on the island. However, when she woke up, a corpse was lying in front of her. From that moment, she was faced with a series of grueling trials unlike anything she had ever experienced before. To reunite with her parents, whom she parted with in an unfortunate way, she must survive—even in this twisted world.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Xun Meng Hun
description: The world's misfortunes never cease. In the river of forgetfulness, the flowers and leaves have the same root but never see each other as messengers, can she unlock the secrets of each soul to free them?
tags: Thriller, Historical, Psychological, Ghosts, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Mystery, Full Color

name: Yuuan no Kanata
description: The presence of 'it' can be felt everywhere. Kanata, a woman who lost her sense of fear after a certain incident, searches for moments that freeze her heart as she follows the traces of 'it'...!? In parks, on emergency staircases, and in the cracks between walls, people who accidentally draw close to the presence of 'it' experience indescribable terror, leaving their everyday lives irreparably changed. After all, ghosts really are the scariest...
tags: Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Have You Seen My Brother?
description: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color

name: Komada-san wo Komarasetai
description: Komada is a short high school girl who is constantly troubled with something. Her junior, Kagai, who is big in various ways, is always playing with her and annoying Komada! However, there is a reason why Kagai annoys her, and that is simply because... The more you love someone, the more you want to annoy them!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Touhou - Komachi & Eiki 4 Lovey-Dovey Manga (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Doujinshi

name: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w
description: After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!? I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Saitou was reincarnated to the other world at the age of 15, becomes the Great Sage, and defeated the Demon Lord. Shortly after that, the door connecting the other world and the real world opens, and Saitou return to Japan with the power of the Great Sage. However, 19 years have passed in the real world. Saitou, who was drifted away for so long, met his childhood friend Kanako, who's now a single mother. But it seems like there’s someone who’s targeting Kanako's life…
___
**Character Designer:** [Kusaka Kou](https://mangadex.org/author/b88dd9b9-013e-408e-bf59-b9ac07f7bcb3)

**Alt Official Raws:**
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361028133454)

tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Demons' Crest
description: In the year 2031, in which elementary school student Yuma Ashihara participates in a beta test of the world's first full-dive VRMMO-RPG called "Actual Magic (AM)", only to lose consciousness while playing and wake up in a world where the game and reality have merged. A death game then unfolds in "mixed reality."
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san
description:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe.
___
* **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.
tags: Award Winning, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Vanadis Heart
description: Five years have passed since the "Vanadies Incident" that denied all Gundams. The mobile suit, nicknamed "The Curse," runs across the earth. The first official side story manga of "The Witch of Mercury'' featuring Chika Tojo from "Tanjo Senki''!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: The Horizon
description:
Two children unexpectedly meet in the midst of war. After running away from the chaos, they come across a long empty road. With no adults to rely on, the two strangers, now become friends, walk alongside each other to see what's at the end of the road. All they hope is to keep being able to move forward. Just what kind of trials and tragedy awaits them during their journey for survival?  


---
