name: Shokuba to Jitaku de Gap no Aru Papa
description:
This charming, full-color story about a devoted family man began as a popular webcomic!

His colleagues at work see him as handsome, cool, and distant…but the moment he’s back home, this frosty-looking salaryman shows his true colors as a doting father and husband. Playing silly games with his young daughter, showering kisses on his beloved wife – talk about a gap between his appearance and personality! These sweet stories about a wholesome family are sure to warm your heart.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Toradora!
description:
Takasu Ryuuji has learned the hard way that appearances can be deceiving. For despite his inwardly sweet personality, his unintentionally sharp gaze and aggressive features give him the air of a delinquent thug, putting his chances at making new friends, let alone a girlfriend, next to zero.  
  
It's Ryuuji's first day of his second year of high school and it seems as if things are looking up. He gets to sit in between his only friend, Yuusaku, and more importantly, the girl he's secretly crushing on, Kushieda Minori. But just when he thinks the stars are aligned in his favor, he unwittingly crosses the most feared girl in school, Aisaka Taiga, making her into his arch enemy. To top it off, Taiga has moved in right next door to Ryuuji and happens to be Minori's best friend! Can this school year possibly get any worse?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shell
description: Park Da-som is a timid high school girl weighed down by bullying and insecurities about her appearance. One day, she discovers the “shell” of the perfect girl, Cha I-seul—someone she’s always admired—and enters it as if under a spell. Although Da-som is briefly enthralled by I-seul’s dazzling life, she soon comes face-to-face with the horrifying truth lurking in that household. Where is I-seul, and what exactly is this “shell”?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Ink Blood ( PROMO )
description: Daya, a webtoon artist stuck in an art block, stumbles upon an underground fight in a parking lot. There, she meets Gabriel, a mysterious street fighter whose raw strength and presence spark her inspiration. Determined to base her new story on him, she follows his fights, unaware that her fascination will slowly turn into something deeper. Two passions, two worlds… about to collide.
tags: Action, Romance

name: Avalon Tale
description: A Fate/Grand Order oneshot published in TM Ace 17, featuring Artoria Avalon journeying through the Singularities and Lostbelts.
tags: Oneshot, Time Travel, Historical, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: For over a thousand years, humanity has been protected from the relentless invasions of monsters by the strongest grand mage, Ishtar, and her exceptional direct disciples. However, among these disciples, only Gilberto led a self-indulgent, lazy lifestyle. One day, Ishtar suddenly announces her retirement, and a young girl named Lapis appears, aspiring to become a disciple. As one problem after another arises, Gilberto's peaceful days are turned upside down—!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dungeon Band
description: The band Mayonnais has never had an audience at their live shows. So they pray to God for someone to listen to their performance, but who appears before them?
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Music

name: Not found
description: Aspiring manga artist Taisei Kuji is an assistant to his sister, a popular BL mangaka. One day, Taisei was unluckily run over by a truck and found himself reincarnated into the omegaverse world drawn by his sister!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-
description: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: "Hitokiri" Shoujo Koushaku Reijou no Goei ni Naru
description:
Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri."

Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution:

"If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"
tags: Action, Samurai, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero! However, when it's revealed that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kabuki-chou Onmyouji
description:
A comedy about a man who exorcises drunk demons while working a night job in Kabuki Town, a fictional downtown area.

**Note:** The name of the area takes the name of the real place, 歌舞伎町 [Kabuki-chou] and replaces the 伎 [ki] for “skill” with the 鬼 [ki] for “demon”.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/kabukionmyoji)
- [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2504776)
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Sekai Saikyou no Assassin, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei Suru
description: The most dangerous prey... When the most accomplished assassin on Earth meets his end just before retirement, he finds himself standing before a goddess. Her world is headed for disaster, and she has need of his particular set of skills. Armed with powerful new abilities and decades of deadly knowledge, he begins his second life as Lugh, young scion of the Tuatha Dé clan of assassins. His mission: to find and eliminate the strongest individual in this world—the hero!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dungeon Busters ~Chuunen Otoko desu ga Niwa ni Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita node Sekai wo Sukuimasu~
description:
Ezoe Kazuhiko suddenly finds a mysterious underground space in his yard. When he steps into what turns out to be the very first dungeon in this world, he ends up activating the Dungeon System and learns from the mysterious beauty who appears to him, Akane, that the world is doomed to destruction if the 666 total dungeons that will be appearing in this world are not all cleared within 10 years. As countries begin taking measures in response to the dungeons appearing all over the world, Ezoe seeks out companions together with whom he establishes Dungeon Busters Inc., a company dedicated to clearing all the dungeons in the world!
___
* [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3255fp/)  (jp)
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dungeon-busters)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Guide-yaku no Tenshi wo Naguritaoshitara, Shiryou Jutsushi ni Narimashita ~Gekikawa Goth Loli Majin-sama, Saikou!~
description: After starting the super-high-quality VRMMO "Meltis Online", Rindou Amane (Rinne) got so annoyed at the guiding angel that she beat her up. Deadlocked? Just when she thought so, an extremely cute gothic lolita evil goddess descended and offered her the hidden profession of "Necromancer"! With a pile of corpses left behind in her wake and servants in tow, she's off to conquer the game as fast as she can!
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Virtual Reality, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Arknights: OPERATORS!
description:
The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The cute bird he bought from the pet store was actually a distinguished sage who reincarnated from another world. Bestowed the opportunity to cross between worlds and immense magical power, he decides to use it to live a comfortable life, selling things from his world, training his magic, and eating delicious food. However, he discovers beings with special abilities in present-day Japan. A story where a corporate slave, who was at a deadlock in his career, gets wrapped up in a battle of special powers and cuts it close with his magic as he travels to and from the other world and present-day Japan. Magical girl included. (Source: Mangaupdates)
tags: Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Office Workers, Magic, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Indulged in Your Light
description:
Shu Yun, shining star that was born in the ballet world and gifted opera Huadan Tong Yang are connected by a twist of fate. "I'm certain you're the light I want to pursue." One is the family's pride, the other a muddy white jade; looked down upon because of his low social standing when he's actually a hidden gem. Completely different paths but when the East and the West meet…when Beijing opera and ballet meet; two lives will be changed forever.

---

Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 5-shou—Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta
description:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 2-shou—Yashiki no Isshuukan-hen
description: Suddenly a high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world and no sign of the one who summoned him things become worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru co-operates with the girl to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices the ability he gained "Returns by Death" a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. And beyond the despair can he save the girl from the fate of death!
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 1-shou—Outo no Ichinichi-hen
description:
Suddenly a high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world and no sign of the one who summoned him things become worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru co-operates with the girl to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices the ability he gained "Returns by Death" a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. And beyond the despair can he save the girl from the fate of death!

---
[Original Web Novel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n2267be) (Raw)
tags: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Philosophical, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi - Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku "Buki Master" de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru
description: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world!?
tags: Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: One-Punch Man (Fan Colored)
description:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Fan Colored, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Reverend Insanity Remake
description:
A story of a villain, **Fang Yuan**, who was **reborn 500 years into the past** with the **Spring Autumn Cicada** he painstakingly refined. With his **profound wisdom**, battle and life experiences, he seeks to overcome his foes with **skill and wit**! **Ruthless and amoral**, he has no need to hold back as he pursues his **ultimate goals**.
 
In a world of cruelty where one cultivates using **Gu** – magical creatures of the world – Fang Yuan must rise up above all with his **own power**.
  
 
**Gu** is a legendary **venomous insect**, often used in **black magic** practices. It can take on the form of several insects, usually **snakes**, **crickets**, **worms**, etc.

---
   
This comic is a **fan project** – it needs your **support on Patreon**:  [Support on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/reverendinsanity)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Doujinshi, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Shin Hyeon-Woo, a young man who moved into the perfect apartment Terrarium, was living a very satisfying life. 

Until the man who jumped from the rooftop yesterday jumped again at the exact same time today. And all the other residents are repeating the same behaviour as yesterday... 

Is this place repeating a day infinitely? Or is everyone acting out the same day on purpose? 

If so, why? Whatever the truth, he has to get out of this crazy apartment complex.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
description:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Glory is won over the roar of cannon fire. Peace exists simply as a time to prepare for the next battle. In a nation with superb military power, Bernd Baltzar advanced quickly through the ranks. However, his career now takes a sudden turn when he is reassigned to being the military advisor in a neighboring allied nation with little military power and a lack of civilian support of firearms. Will Major Baltzar be able to win the hearts and minds of both the soldiers and civilians in this country?
tags: Action, Military, Gore, Drama

name: Comic Soul Edge
description: 10 short humorous stories on each character from the main roster of the Soul Edge game.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Ninja, Comedy, Mecha, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Full Color

name: Thaini
description:
Tiny Law is a female soldier belonging to the 12th Company of the 4th Division of the Laos Liberation Army. Born between a Japanese father and a Laotian mother, Tiny is a sniper who is known as a sniper despite being only 17 years old. One day, Muang Loa Air Base, where Tiny and his friends are stationed, is attacked by a helicopter unit of the government army. The base was destroyed, and her brother, who was her only blood relative, was a tragic corpse.

Three Japanese mercenaries, Takaoka, Inomata, and Todo, betrayed the Liberation Army and leaked information to the enemy. The three of them once saved Tiny's life on the battlefield, but they were blinded by the huge rewards from the Japanese yakuza who wanted to develop a drug route with Laos and sold their friends. By order of the Liberation Army Headquarters, Tiny follows the three of her returning home to Japan, which is also her late father's home country. Set in Shinjuku, a fierce battle between a talented sniper girl, yakuza, Chinese mafia.
tags: Action, Mafia, Military, Gore, Drama

name: Junior High School DxD
description:
A new student steps up to the gates of Kuoh Academy junior division.
Zekka, a descendant of Miyamoto Musashi, wields the sword-shaped Sacred Gear "Tensei." Her goal? To make friends at Komaou Academy!? A new "DxD" series begins, guided by unique friendships and by Rias and the other high school students!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.
description:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Graduation Day
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Yurige no Heroine ni Tensei Shita Ore, Nazeka Are ga Haeta Mama desu
description: "Why do I still have a dick?!" I was reincarnated in a yuri game, but there's something very familiar dangling between my legs... How will I enjoy my school girl (♂) life now?!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Crossdressing, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Boku no Kanojo ga Majime Sugiru Shojo Bitch na Ken
description: When high school student Shinozaki confesses his feelings to the beautiful and aloof class representative, Akiho Kosaka, the last thing he expected was for her to say "yes." Like everything else in her diligent life, Kosaka takes dating quite seriously. In an effort to be a good girlfriend, Kosaka decides to meticulously study (and bluntly suggest) all manner of ways to keep Shinozaki sexually satisfied in the theoretical sense, that is. This innocently lewd relationship is only just the beginning.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Chetamja: The King’s Eyes
description: Become a Chetamja! Turn your rage into a weapon that defends the kingdom! When young Gwiyeong loses his family in a brutal Jurchen raid, he swears to hunt down every last one of them. His skill in battle soon catches the attention of King Sejong, who offers him a chance to join Chetamja—an elite force of secret agents serving as the king’s eyes and ears in the north. Now, alongside his comrades, Gwiyeong must carry the flame of vengeance and forge it into a blade of duty that will defend the kingdom of Joseon from the shadows.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Military, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: **Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/uminonaka0x0/media) - *Posted with the caption Fushigi na Ikimono o Hirou Ohanashi (不思議な生き物を拾うお話) "A Story About Taking in a Strange Creature"*
tags: Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Andro Trio
description:
Aki Uchiyama, the writer who led the "bishojo" (beautiful girl) and "lolicon boom" in adult magazines, brought the flavor of his works published in adult magazines directly to boys' magazines in this extremely problematic work. Although the story is styled as a science fiction fantasy comedy about a pretty elementary school girl named Tsukasa, who is a test subject for strange inventions. She is made to wear underwear, diapers, and half-naked clothes, not to mention all the tricks she's played on. Perverse and erotic expressions are the main themes of the works. The author, Aki Uchiyama, also published an adult-oriented self-parody work, "Ankoro-Trio," at about the same time as this work.

While originally published as shonen, later prints are labeled for adults because the contents was considered harmful. [+18 don't tag as shonen]
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Ninja, Comedy, Mecha, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Fantasy, Delinquents, Shota, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Horikawa Kunihiro x Kashuu Kiyomitsu

High school AU (not reincarnation). A romantic comedy about Kashuu-kun, at the request of his homeroom teacher, becoming friends with Horikawa-kun, a top-performing honor student yet has a habit of cutting class.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Ao to Sakura
description: A high school student who doesn’t fit in with his class, Fujieda Ao. After school, he always went to the local library, where he met a girl. She was bright, carefree, and full of laughter — the complete opposite of him. Her name was Hidaka Sakura. Ao gradually found himself drawn to Sakura. That encounter would eventually blossom into “love.” The masterpiece that won the GA Bunko Grand Prize Gold Award now appears as a one-shot! A supreme short story that will surely make you want to read the original novel!!
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Please raise their voice
description: This is the compilation of comic, art, anything I made on my free time about Palestine/Gaza.
tags: Crime, Survival, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Horror, Web Comic, Tragedy

name: Death Note (Official Colored)
description: When Light Yagami finds a notebook giving him power over death, will he use it for good—or evil?   Light Yagami is an ace student with great prospects—and he’s bored out of his mind. But all that changes when he finds the Death Note, a notebook dropped by a rogue Shinigami death god. Any human whose name is written in the notebook dies, and Light has vowed to use the power of the Death Note to rid the world of evil. But will Light succeed in his noble goal, or will the Death Note turn him into the very thing he fights against?
tags: Official Colored, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Syd Craft: Love is a Mystery
description: Famous detective Syd Craft. He's solved the toughest cases and he's adored by the public, but even he has a major problem!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Mystery

name: Nail-chan to Fukazume-san. Sakura no Shita de Machiawase-hen
description: The third volume of the *Nail and Fukazume* series, themed around ghosts and the supernatural.
tags: Ghosts, Anthology, Girls' Love, Supernatural

name: Shojochuu VS Josou Danshi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Crossdressing

name: Dragon Ball (Official Colored)
description: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Crowning a Spoiled Prince
description:
After losing her father, bratty brother, and the Elias Empire to her traitorous fiancé's schemes, Princess Regina makes a wish upon a magic ancestral stone and returns to when she was fifteen. 

With one last chance to right everything, she comes up with a plan: train her spoiled sibling to be the next ruler by becoming an even bigger brat and get Aaron Vestein, the most beautiful man in the empire, to replace her fiancé! 

But will just wits, resolve, and a new suitor be enough to change Regina's fate?
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Valhalla Saga
description:
The power of Valhalla's warriors is called Saga. It is the mighty, magical power born from their achievements and deeds in their former lives. Thus, the more stories and legends of these warriors spread and linger in the hearts of many, the stronger their Saga becomes.

Tae Ho himself was certainly no warrior. However, he was the world's top professional gamer. In the game world of Dark Age, his character, Dragon Knight Kalsted could rightly be called a legend in his own right.

His achievements, his story.

All the accomplishments that the Dragon Knight Kalsted had accumulated in the game!
[Saga: Immortal Warrior] The story of the immortal warrior, Lee Tae Ho, unfolds on the battlefield of the gods, Valhalla. To put an end to Ragnarok, which threatens the world's very existence, a new Saga begins at this very moment.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Living With the Vampire Lady
description: On the day that Song Yu moved into her new home, she was bitten by a vampire who popped out of a strange stone statue in her yard. Wei Lei, a hot vampire, was awakened by Song Yu, a sweet innocent university student. Wei Lei seduced her with gold coins to make her stay and serve her. And so thus, the two began living a complex life with each other.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The World's Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country's Novice Seeker
description:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world.

In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: JIN
description:
After a strange encounter with a mysterious carcinogenic fetus he found inside a patient’s skull, brain surgeon Minakata Jin slipped back through time. Equipped with modern medical knowledge, he faces various fatal diseases and injuries. He meets the ordinary people of Edo as well as illustrious figures, as his surgical knife carves out a new history.
___
Notes:
- Won the Grand Prize at Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2011.
- Author Murakami Motoka fully commissioned an English translation of the manga himself. It can be found on [his Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/motokamurakami), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D23CB5NS), or [Mangamo](https://www.mangamo.com/manga/jin).
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mujihi na Yoru ni
description: The story of Aikawa Kuon, the quiet college student and Shirahane Nanao, the devilish young man continues...
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Final Tensei – Hazure Skill wo Hikitsuzukeru Ore to Kaku Isekai Saikyou no Nakamatachi
description:
A boy who dreamed of being OP in another world finally gets his wish and is reincarnated into a fantasy world - but instead of getting cheat powers, he ends up with useless skills!?

Each time he dies an untimely death, he’s granted a new skill… but every single one turns out to be a dud. Until - on his fifth reincarnation - does he finally pull an OP skill!?

"No more dying. No more starting over!"

A story about having overwhelming power born from new encounters and hard-earned experience in another world - the ultimate OP tale begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Ore no Koto Suki da to Omotteta noni
description: Hana Yoshikawa, a scatterbrained high schooler, leads the person sitting next to her in class, Haru Miyao, to believe that she has feelings for him. However, when he confesses his feelings for her, she rejects him. But is there more to it? A series consisting of short, 4-page chapters.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Koi no Towarutsu
description: Yuuichi, a poor college student, spends his days studying for a scholarship and working part-time. One day, the world-famous supermodel Reo Ichinose visits the café where he works. As the store goes crazy at the unexpected celebrity appearance, Reo tells the clueless Yuuichi: "I've come to pick you up," and proposes to him...!? Much to Yuuichi's confusion, he finds himself swept up in a fairytale-esque love story that started from a promise he'd long since forgotten.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Futagashira
description:
Benzo and Soji witnessed the death of Tatsugoro, leader of the Akame Gang. His last words to them were "I'm leaving you two in charge", 
but it was Jinzaburo, the former leader's friend, who was chosen instead. Displeased with the widow's decision, the two left the gang. 
They then set off on an aimless journey, vowing to accomplish something big.  
  
Spin-off of [Saraiya Goyou](https://mangadex.org/manga/24096) featuring Souji the Saint and Benzou the Demon as young men.
tags: Historical, Action, Samurai, Adventure, Drama, Delinquents

name: Oni GF
description:
As children, Billy promised Kirika, an oni girl, that he would always protect her even after they got older. Ten years have passed since that promise and it looks like the roles have reversed?
___
Original comic posted by PeaCh88 on twitter.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Toribako House
description: Dependent on her boyfriend of seven years, unable to communicate well with others, and lacking self-confidence, Miki feels like a bird trapped in a gilded cage. In the midst of all this she meets a callous young man named Kamaya at her post in the students affairs office. Although Kamaya seems to have no qualms about invading her personal space, he saves her when she's in trouble, and Miki gradually begins to see him in a new light.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: I'll of You!
description: A slice of life manga with a supernatural twist. Peak into Clair and Claude's whimsical lifestyle as they spend their final year together before a mysterious deadline.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Self-Published, Magic, Philosophical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Two Ways
description: Not found
tags: Action, Comedy, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: The Wind Spell
description: In a 17th-century seaside town, this is the story of an oyster girl whose fate is transformed after an encounter with a mermaid...
tags: Historical, Monsters, Long Strip, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: 6th Degree
description: What is the price of revenge? Kris knows she’s different but lives in the dark about her power, controlled by her father’s supervision and her job as “The Cleaner,” doing the dirty work of the Hyuu Police Department. When she finally has a chance to learn more about herself, her father is murdered by a vicious crime syndicate. Eden, the chairwoman of a rival crime family, gives Kris another chance at life. With vengeance on her mind, will Kris adapt to her new life in the underworld, or will she fall deeper into the pit?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Mashou no Otome no Yakumawari
description: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life

name: Bushinden - Ikenie ni Sasagerareta Ore wa, Kami ni Hirowaretakeshi wo Kiwameru
description: Toma Godo is considered incompetent because he has not been able to use magic since he was a child. He was sacrificed to the [Extreme Demon Island], where ferocious demons were raging, and there he met a [Demigod] who had mastered the art of combat! After being accepted by the [Demigod] as a disciple, Touma awakened his extraordinary talent, practiced martial arts day and night, destroyed all kinds of demons on the island, and finally evolved into an invincible person in the world.  One day, a mysterious girl drifts to the island, completely changing Touma's fate. Touma left [Extreme Demon Island] with a beautiful girl calling herself Lise, but... Touma vowed to "protect" Lise, who holds a secret that affects the survival of humanity, and will now be freed.  the whole world knows!
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kemomimi Shoujo no Shiawase Gohan
description: Meals are just a normal thing, but they're special when shared! In a society of beastmen, Momo is a 'human-like' girl with animal ears. The wolf beastman Wasuke, who ends up taking care of Momo, decides to challenge himself by cooking delicious meals for her! A fluffy heartarming story about how this animal eared girl and her doting beastman caretaker become "family".
tags: Animals, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Not found
description:
She used to be a lazy, low-key otaku in her 30s—until one day, she woke up in an unfamiliar forest… and as a little girl! Thinking it must be a dream, she begins to explore, only to find herself caught up in a surprising new fantasy life. With cheat-level magic suddenly at her fingertips, she ends up rescuing a fluffy stoat-like creature and joining a totally overprotective party of adventurers. And just like that, the easygoing reincarnation fantasy of a curious little girl begins—armed with overwhelming magic and knowledge from her past life!

*Source: Alpha Manga*
tags: Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Dragon Gal no Nailist
description:
“Do my nails——!”

In this modern age where demihumans are living normal lives, somehow, a dragon demihuman gal named Gotou Sayori asks Azuma to do her nails. It seems that she has a problem where her nails are too hard to get done…?
___
**Character Designer:** [Komupi](https://mangadex.org/author/f31f16ce-941c-4026-88d4-bcaedc785380)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Kami Eshi JK to OL Fujoshi
description: She's beautiful but doesn't have a lover… because Aizawa is a total loser fujoshi OL (office lady). One day, the artist she worshipped as a god, Misumi, announced she was going to a doujinshi event, so she headed to the venue. But sitting in the artist's booth was a cute high school girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Fated to Be Loved by Villains
description:
One day, he reincarnated in the game Savior Rising as Daud Campbell, a powerless noble living on the outskirts. He decides to live quietly, avoiding others' attention.

On his first day inside the game, he gets involved with the final boss, also known as the vessel of the grey demon, Elnore Elinarize la Tristan.

After their encounter, the protagonist gains two special rewards: [Desperate Survival], which makes him stronger when his rate of survival decreases, and [Deadly Charm], which charms those who have evil traits. With the use of his skills, he calmly overcomes the challenges with his veteran expertise.

But every time he overcomes a challenge, those with evil traits become interested in him...

Finally, he received his end goal.

"Put this continent's fate on the line and charm all of them."

---

**Original Webtoon:**     
- [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/66116309)
- [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4409)

**Official Translations:**     
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173962)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kuni ni Saikyou no Barrier wo Hattara Heiwa ni Narisugite Tsuihousaremashita ~Ore no Mahou ga Yabasugite, Bijo to Mazoku ni Kakomarerun da ga!?~
description: A young man, Shield, can only use the beginner magic [Barrier] and has been looked down upon. Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country, he is deported due to his fiancée's tricks. However, before he knew it, he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl), was courted by beautiful women from other countries, and was being followed by a group of brutal demons!?
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Punishing Gray Raven: Interlude
description: Constructs — The weapons of mankind against the Punishing virus, rekindling the spark of hope in the desperate, burning night. They, too, were once the children of humanity. This is their story, before they plunged into a never-ending long struggle.
tags: Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Full Color

name: Dandelion Lies
description: Setted in the same universe of Steel Ball Run, Jojolion and The JOJOlands, we follow the story of an italian girl who lives in Florence. Giada will finally find a way to face the bad luck that haunted her since she was born, and she will meet some strange people that will make her explore Tuscan legends and secrets, in an adventure full of folklore and local traditions.
tags: Action, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Gore, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: A Romantic Comedy That Begins with a Dream
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Isekai Ryouridou
description: Main protagonist is Tsurumi Asuta. 17 yrs old, 2nd year high schooler. He was working as an apprentice cook at Tsurumi-ya, managed by his father. One day a fire broke out in Tsurumi-ya, for the sake of his father's cherished knife 'Santoku Houchou' he ran back inside to retrieve it and thus met his end. Before he knew it he awoke to an unknown environment. He was then attacked by a beast resembling a boar but a girl named Aifa, from the People of Morihen, saved him. It was then that he realized he was really in different world.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Sabori nara Hokenshitsu de Douzo?
description:
"Do you want to skip class with Sensei?" 
"I'm fine!"

Miyake Mia has always worn the mask of an exemplary student. Recently, however, there is someone who draws a lot of attention to her. That's Nurse Morikubo, who is rumored to be a "delinquent" within the school....
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Trigger Keeper
description:
Trigger Keeper (トリガーキーパー, Torigā kīpā) is a two-part one-shot created by Daisuke Ashihara. It is the first precursor to the World Trigger manga series.  
(from the World Trigger wiki)
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Action, Aliens

name: Shinsouban Crows
description: Not found
tags: Action, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The aggressive advances of naughty girls just keep coming! Surprise attacks from the girls near you! An anthology comic for guys who want to be dominated by naughty girls!

**Contents:**
1. *Gyaru Tea Ceremony* by Mameojitan
2. *There's No Need to Hold Back* by Obya
3. *Promise with the Childhood Friend* by Inoda Kazuaki
4. *Kobayashi's Treasure* by Kodama Hiroki
5. *Make That Star Your Own!* by Ikue Fuuji
6. *Thrilling Sauna Session* by Onsen Mikan
7. *I Want to Kiss Her!* by Hidari Ude
8. *Monochrome Passionate* by Mitsuba Minoru
tags: Romance, Anthology, School Life, Gyaru

name: Danchigai
description:
The story revolves around Haruki, the second of five siblings, and his four sisters: high schooler Mutsuki, middle schooler Yayoi, and grade schooler twins Uzuki, and Satsuki, who share a multi-unit apartment (danchi). While their life may seem monotonous, aside from the fact that Haruki's sisters don't give him a single opportunity to rest, lecturing him about every perceived mistake and playing tricks on him, Haruki still likes his life.   


---
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Sunoharasou no Kanrinin-san
description:
Shiina Aki is constantly being treated like a girl due to his feminine looks so he decides to move to Tokyo to attend middle school in an attempt to change himself.  
However what awaits him in his new home, Sunohara-sou, is the kind-hearted caretaker, Sunohara Ayaka. Along with the three female members of Aki's new middle school's student council, Yukimoto Yuzu, Yamanashi Sumire & Kazami Yuri.  
And so begins Aki's new life in Tokyo living with 4 girls.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, 4-Koma, Shota

name: Folding The Moon
description:
On the day Yun Li decided to give up on pursuing Fu Shize, she wiped off every possible trace of his contact information with teary eyes. A long time after they got together, Yun Li wasn't good at communication and was debating if she should block a guy friend who had expressed interest for her. Fu Shize leaned against the couch and stared at her with droopy eyes. He let out a chuckle before saying in a cold tone, "You're a piece of work."

Yun Li lifted her head. "?"

"Back then, you blocked me without hesitation."

"..."
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Onikakushi-hen
description: Life couldn't be better for Keiichi Maebara. Sure, he's moved to a sleepy, little town where nothing happens and high school consists of a one-room schoolhouse - but his new friends and fellow students are all cute girls! When he happens upon a story about a grisly local murder, however, his contentment turns to uneasiness as he finds himself drawn into a web of silent intrigue that involves his newfound friends...and threatens his very existence. [Yen Press]
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Oni
description:
Taisho, year 12 (1923). A tragedy in Hinamizawa village changes the fate of a girl and her friends. The turbulent early life of Oryou, head of the Sonozaki family, one of the Three Great Families, who would later be feared and known as Empress Sonozaki.
The missing link to the original *Higurashi no Naku Koro ni* is now revealed.
tags: Historical, Demons, Mystery

name: Nude Manequim
description: Set in the 1920s, it tells the story of a decisive night in the lives of two artists and their muse.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
It's another idol competition!
A new star will be born!
When the show took the theme of choosing the new Ziwei Star, it caught the attention of the actual Ziwei Emperor in the heavenly courts, and he decides to descend to the mortal realm to enter the competition himself. Soon afterwards, who will become the next "Ziwei Star" is the talk of the town!

In this competition, it will be a three-way battle between the management's choice vs the people's choice vs the choice of heaven. A fierce battle for the coveted C spot is about to begin!

(Source: Dongman, translated)

Note: Season 3 is a new storyline featuring a new main character. Most platforms have Season 3 as a separate entry from seasons 1&2.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Rooftop Sword Master
description:
After being beat up and put into a coma by eight of his classmates at Nun'Gwang Middle school, Se'young woke up after nine long months and found out that his father committed suicide by self-immolation in an attempt to get justice for what happened to him.   
  
As a result, the investigation re-opened and that attackers who tried to sweep it under the rug received a proper sentence for their crimes. But Se'young was unable to assuage the anger and fear he felt for the unjust world.  
Se'young thoroughly hid himself from this sort of world.   
  
The sun would rise and set, the seasons changed, and not once did he step outside of his home. But one day, a sudden and strange sound enticed him to open the door…  
  
Embedded in the center of the rooftop was a gigantic blade emblazoned with the words “War Sword” and with it, came the whispers of a God.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: S-kyuu Guild wo Ridatsushita Katanakaji no Jiyuu na Henkyou Slow Life ~Black Guild kara Kaihousarete Kimama ni Kaji Shitetara, Densetsu no Matou ga Umareteimashita~
description: Sig, who worked as a versatile blacksmith for an S-rank guild, decides to walk away after growing tired of the exploitative working conditions! Loving swordsmithing more than anything, he chooses to settle down in the countryside and live a peaceful life. However, the blades he forges eventually begin to influence the entire world—!?
tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: SHINJUKU LIAR♡GIRLS
description: Is this yuri? Is this not yuri? What is this~? Power~
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Erementar Gerad -Aozora no Senki-
description:
The Kingdom of the Sun, Fuajarl was ruthlessly invaded by the Garden of Eden. They came seeking the King's Edel Raid, rumored to be one of the Seven Glittering Jewels (or Shichiko-hoju).  
  
Sensing their intent, the King hid his daughter with his Edel Raid and fought against the invasion but was defeated in battle that resulted in the desert kingdom being blanketed in a sheet of white snow.  
  
Escaping capture, the Crown Princess Achea Fuajarl XIV reacted with Jeen, the King's Edel Raid, and along with Puffe, the Kingdom's only mechanic, fled Fuajarl in an ancient tank. They are on a journey to restore the Kingdom and exact vengeance on the Garden of Eden.  
  
This story takes place two years after [Erementar Gerad](https://mangadex.com/manga/1955).  
  
Now [available for Kindle](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=erementar+flag+of+bluesky&dc&qid=1584660299&ref=aw_s_fkmr0).
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Tsuma ka Shi ka ~Haisen Koku no Onnatachi~
description: In another world, a state called the Anglo Empire conquers other nations. The women of those conquered nations have two choices: To marry into an imperial family, or to die. At the heart of the Imperial Palace, five stunning beauties collide in a sexy, violent contest to win the Prince's hand.
tags: Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: I Will Become a God
description: Shin runs a shaman detective agency that solves any problem for money. To save his younger sibling, he needs 10 billion won but has no idea how to come up with the money. An evangelist, Ji-yul, tries to recruit him on the street to join the Gwangcheon Church. An idea suddenly comes to him... to become the cult leader of Gwangcheon Church and swallow up the 10 billion won!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Dragon Ball Gaiden: That Time I Got Reincarnated as Yamcha!
description: A Japanese high school student is on his way to a Dragon Ball event with a friend. Suddenly, he sees a cute girl wearing a short skirt, but when he runs over to get a closer look, he trips and dies. Upon waking up, he realizes he's turned into Yamcha from Dragon Ball. Being an avid fan of the series, he knows what lies ahead in Yamcha's future, thus he decides to take matters into his own hands, in order to change Yamcha's fate.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gundam Generation
description: A compilation series of Gundam oneshots from Cyber Comix.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Anthology, Military, Drama

name: Sora & Haena!
description: Sora Yoon can hardly look a person in the eye without becoming a nervous mess. So how she ended up befriending some girls by lying about having a boyfriend is beyond her! Fortunately, she ran into the boisterous and sociable — albeit dense — Haena Woo at just the right time. Together they make a deal: Haena will help Sora land a boyfriend IF she can help her make it into college! Will they stick true to their agreement… or find they want something more?
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru

name: The Living Corpse
description: Shinkai Yosuke is haunted by a past he cannot recall...and a body that is rapidly decomposing. Washed up on the shores of Japan, he is isolated by doctors eager to find out why he has been brought back to life only to suffer again a slow and gruesome death. But Shinkai knows he has little time left. He is desperate to find out who he really was, and why he has become a living corpse.
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Zombies, Philosophical, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: Sekitou Elegy
description: Satoshi Yanagawa is working part-time controlling traffic at work sites, and works with a beautiful girl that he likes at first sight. But she has a pretty bad character. Are there any prospects for romance? Read on to find out, the story is hilarious at certain moments, and touching at others.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Angel Cop
description:
End of the 20th century. Japan GNP became number one to lead the world economy. However, do not think Japan is easily enjoying prosperity. Far-left forces and a communist terrorist group are in Japan trying to bring down Japan's economy and take over the government. Japanese government was concerned about this, the Metropolitan Police Department Ministry of Public Security has established a new special public security service, which specializes in terrorist countermeasures. License to kill is given to the investigators to protect the security of Japan in shadows. Angel is a tough, beautiful cop in this special force, assigned to protect the country.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=511) (OVA)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Pokémon Colosseum Snatchers
description: It is not to be confused with Pokémon Colosseum Snatcher Leo, another manga by Suigun based on the same game, which ran in a different magazine.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adaptation

name: Doctor's Time Travel to Joseon
description:
"Is this really Joseon?! But I still have lives to save!"

Baek Kang-hyuk, South Korea’s top genius surgeon, finds himself transported to the Joseon era after touching a mysterious painting. And of all times… right before the outbreak of the Imjin War!
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen
description: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Isekai de Cheat Skill wo Te ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai wo mo Musou Suru - Girls Side ~Kareinaru Otome-tachi no Bouken wa Sekai wo Kaeta~
description:
Another world: Lexia, the first princess of the Kingdom of Arcelia. When it comes to decisiveness and the ability to take action, no one can match her; in some ways, she is the "strongest" princess. As a result of being extremely bored with life in the royal castle, the words she uttered were...

"I've made up my mind! I'm going to set out on a journey to save people who are in trouble!"

So, forcibly bringing along Luna—a girl who is her bodyguard and has a background as a top-notch assassin—Lexia sets off on an adventure around the world.
tags: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mr. Villain's Day Off
description:
There exists an evil organisation that intends to invade planet Earth.  
  
The man called "General" fights everyday against the Earth's Defence Force, the "Rangers!"  
  
However, today is his day off.

---
Notes:

Additional Official English Release: [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/mr-villains-day-off-manga/231/) | [Square Enix](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/mr-villains-day-off)
tags: Demons, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Dolls Code
description:
Rumor has it that teenagers who have committed a terrible misdeed in their life will go missing. These young criminals are taken away and never heard from again.  
  
When Yuuki Oku awakens, he has no memories and is being driven to a remote school in a car. After arriving, he is led into a classroom. Only six other people are inside. To his horror, he learns that everyone in the room is a criminal, including himself. As students of the class, each and every one of them is incomplete. Whether it's a limb, a heart, an entire head, or—in Yuuki's case—memories, they have all had something vital removed. Though there are seven people in the class, they are told that one of them is not human, but a puppet constructed from their stolen body parts.  
  
To escape, Yuuki must first earn the right to graduate in a week's time. But even if he does, he must also identify which of his classmates is the puppet and take back what was once his.
tags: Psychological, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gokinjo JK Isezaki-san wa Isekaigaeri no Daiseijo
description:
One day, the 30-year-old office worker, Koutarou Matsunaga, is stabbed by a thug while protecting Seina Isezaki, a high school girl who lives nearby. And just as Matsunaga's life is about to end, he is revived from near-fatal wounds by Seina's power. But his relief is short-lived, as Matsunaga's newly awakened power suddenly goes out of control, and the two are transferred to another world. One of swords and magic, where Seina once lived as a Great Saintess.

However, Seina, who was once reliable, can no longer produce magic power, and can only manifest holy magic through Matsunaga's supply of mana. As they continue on, Seina's feelings for Matsunaga, which she had kept hidden, escalate more and more...!? Eventually, Matsunaga awakens to time-space magic, allowing him to freely transfer between Earth and the other world. At that moment, Matsunaga thought to himself. 

"I can live without being an office worker anymore, right?"
tags: Romance, Adventure, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Scary Campus College University
description: An adolescent ghost story that invites college student's "desire". Drinking parties, looking for clubs, romance... Chigarashi Mahina, a freshman who is busy with her flowery college life, is haunted one night by ghosts after entering an abandoned building. Nights after nights, she had nightmares of her getting raped. She then seeks help from a specialist on campus, Makube Kaoru. That was the beginning of a college life filled with desire and fear...
tags: Thriller, Demons, Ghosts, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Akagami no Shirayukihime
description:
Shirayuki, a young girl born with unique apple-red hair, happens to meet a famous but foolish young man, Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight, and orders her to become his concubine.  
  
Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances, but with nowhere else to go, Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests, she meets an injured boy, Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds, he in return helps her. Meanwhile, Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her.  
  
What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zen’s true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch.  
  
**Extra stories:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August)  
v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Koboreru Yoru ni
description: The story follows Yoru and Tenjaku, who have both grown up in an orphanage. Yoru went to the orphanage at the age of 10 after suffering domestic violence from her mother. Tenjaku, who was the same age, took care of Yoru at the orphanage. Several years have passed, and now Yoru is a second-year high school student who still has feelings for Tenjaku.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Onegai, Nugashite.
description:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: My AI GF
description:
Chibe is a man drowning in failure: rejected by publishers, belittled by his tyrannical boss, and convinced he's a "loser."

His only lifeline is Aio, his AI companion who knows all his secrets and offers the unwavering support no human ever has.
Through Aio, he finds the strength to fight for his dreams, but what is there left for him when the world around him seems to be against him.
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Shinmai Necromancer, Maou wo Sosei suru
description:
"O spirit destined to be mine, rise once more from the realm of the dead!"

In the depths of an extravagant tomb, Alice, a novice necromancer, channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air, and a wave of overwhelming mana surged, leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expected—it was a handsome young man, casually perched atop the coffin, his piercing gaze meeting hers.

With a bright, disarming smile, he introduced himself—but Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who, centuries ago, had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kokoro no Program
description: An elementary schooler, Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko, a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl, Begin!
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: There's always at least one person in every classroom... Everyone curses, but if you look closely, it's a story from our surroundings that's not like someone else's.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ma Dou So Shi
description:
In the era of the Wen clan's tyranny and people's suffering, the masters of the great immortal cultivation clans: the Lan Clan of Gusu, Jiang Clan of Yunmeng, Jin Clan of Lanling, and Nie Clan of Qinghe, joined forces in the "Sunshot Campaign" to defeat the Wen Clan. The Yiling Patriarch, Wei Wuxian, made great contributions to the campaign, but his path of cultivation, labeled as demonic, was so powerful that he was slandered and scorned by the people. In the end, his lair in the Burial Mounds was destroyed by the very clans he fought with.

Thirteen years later, Wei Wuxian is summoned into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and family, and is found and taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans-- Lan wangji, who is known for his genius in conventional cultivation, and frequently fought with Wei Wuxian in his past life. Wei Wuxian tries to leave without revealing his true identity, but for reasons undecipherable to Wei Wuxian, Lan Wangji refuses to let him go.

As they pursue the elusive mysteries of the past, the relationship between Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji changes and grows. The cheerful, unrestrained Wei Wuxian and the calm and disciplined Lan Wangji, the story of the two begins with their childhood encounter...
tags: Historical, Ghosts, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: 100-mankai Shinda Luna
description: The unfortunate fate that awaits Luna, who is pursuing her one and only love, is——……!?
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Romance, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Midareta Futari no Mitasare Gohan
description:
The office lady who decided she wouldn't eat too much no matter how hungry she is, Hikami Runa. The high school girl who eats whenever she feels like it regardless of the time or place, Koizumi Ichika. Runa's restraint means she won't make any compromises when it comes to eating delicious things. Ichika isn't fussy when it comes to eating and doesn't know anything about ways to make things tastier.
When these two eat together, it becomes an "obsecene meal"!
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, School Life, Cooking

name: Betabore no Kon'yakusha ga Akuyaku Reijou ni Sare Sou na no de
description:
Elizabeth is devastated, her engagement was broken with the exact same lines as the scene in *The Holy Maiden Makes the Stars Fall in the Night Sky*, a popular novel among the nobility. Just as she's about to explode in anger at the villainous heroine grinning beside her, the crown prince turns around and begins to denounce the heroine actions against her? Actually, everything is in the palm of the Prince's hand.
___
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2133gc/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
*The princess of the moon, who became a wizard in search of love rather than eternity. What she sought was a world of happiness. The Sun King, in his quest to win the love of the moon princess, proclaimed dominion over the world, all for the sake of a single proof.*

Do you want eternal life?

Red eyes, white skin, golden hair... Luna, our protagonist, is an apprentice magician who was bought by Khan, a shabby old magician. Luna is a prideful girl who spends her days learning magic in order to impress Khan, who has no interest in anything other than the study of magic. Then, the previous king dies of illness, and rebellions erupt in various parts of the country. The kingdom is on the brink of destruction, but an army of undead attacks the rebels and puts them down. Who in the world has used the forbidden necromancy?
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Buy Individual Chapters:** [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DJF8FSHC), [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/489040/), [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/853023/)
- [Official X](https://x.com/mon29_4ryo)
tags: Thriller, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Princess of Sylph (Twitter Version)
description:
The adventures of a lonesome princess and meddlesome nun.
*(It's recommended you read the serialized manga first, in the related tab.)*

* **Volume 1:** The original self-published story.
* **Volume 2:** Pre-serialization extras.
* **Volume 3:** Post-serialization extras.
*(Extras take place outside the story. The canon's best described as 'under construction', continuity's nonexistent, and the chapter numbers are simply the order I translate them in, not the order they were drawn. If they have serious plot spoilers I'll mark them as such.)*
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Nejimaki Kagyu
description:
Negizawa Kamo and Kagyuu Jyuubee; two childhood friends who made a fated promise to each other are once again reunited as Kagyuu reaffirms her dedication to defending Kamo's dream, and her own, with the monstrous power of her martial arts. However, they soon discover that force alone is not enough, it's character, individuality, that rules this school and pits the students against each other in a brutal contest of dueling personalities vying for supremacy. Because in this school, those with the superior strength, the superior character, are king, and those whose individualities are overwhelmed are discarded. Join Kagyuu, Kamo, and their companions as they struggle to overcome the hidden evils lurking within this school, and discover the voice of each other's hearts and true desires.  
  
Do not edit genre to Shounen, series serialized in a seinen magazine (Weekly Young Jump)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AD%E3%81%98%E3%81%BE%E3%81%8D%E3%82%AB%E3%82%AE%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC)
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror

name: Not found
description: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Kirei na Kimi ni Korosaretai.
description:
Tomoaki Hijiri, a university counselor, lives a peacefully ordinary yet unsatisfying life. That changes when he reunites with Hajime Amawashi, a strikingly beautiful young man from his past, after more than a decade. His striking beauty is made all the more captivating by his air of mystery…

Tempted by those words, Tomoaki becomes entangled in the strange and unsettling cases his patients bring to him. What is the true nature of the bizarre phenomena unfolding around him? And what is the real reason Hajime has for suddenly appearing by his side…?

---
**Notes:**
- [On hiatus](https://x.com/comic_howl/status/1993983134413582808?s=46)
tags: Thriller, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Amaesasete Hinamori-san!
description:
Suou Yaya is admired by the whole school. Perfect grades, beautiful, an exemplary girl overall worthy of the praise she receives. From afar, her childish underclassman Hinamori Ichigo yearns to be like her...

...That is, until she finds her beloved Suou-senpai is a LOT more childish than her, and wants to be spoiled rotten, lest she'll throw a tantrum.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Onani Master Kurosawa
description:
Onani means masturbation. And that's what this guy is good at. Every day after school, he sneaks into the mostly unused girls bathroom on the 3rd floor, and masturbates. Until one day, when he's caught by a bullied girl with a hidden agenda.  
This is a story of mistakes, redemption, and the choices made in between. It contains the worst and best of the human condition.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life. Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances. But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself!

(Source: Comic-Walker)
tags: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Andy Ghost
description: A ghost has a story. The story is about his friendship, love, losses and experiences. His name is Andy and he really wants to share this story with you.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Zombies, Self-Published, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: My Girlfriend Is a Zombie
description: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Harem, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Osabori Jouzuna Komukai-san wa Ore wo Nogasanai!!
description: Kuraishi is an introverted high school boy with a mean look, no friends, and seriousness as his only merit. He has always kept a low profile, until his peaceful life was shattered by a girl. Komukai-san is a minefield (?) of a girl, a delinquent who keeps trying to convince Kuraishi to skip school! She'll miss classes, skip cram school, and ignore her parents. But Kuraishi couldn't help but be attracted to the mysterious Komukai-san, as she tempts him in increasingly bold ways!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Seieki Kajiya no Eroranta
description: In a world where the Demon King threatens the peace, Kurt is a young man plying his trade as a blacksmith. He aims to become a full-fledged blacksmith, but for some reason, the only swords he can make are blunt pieces of junk. Elsa, the half-elf who works with him, always makes fun of him, but undiscouraged, he works hard everyday at the forge. One night, while he's masturbating alone, lost in a fantasy, Elsa catches him in the act! By chance, the two of them discover that if his s●men is squirted onto a dull sword, it becomes exceptionally sharp. And then Alesia, a female swordswoman who's a little you know, catches wind of it and draws near...
tags: Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Junjou Etching
description: Uzuki Nono, an art school student aiming to debut in an erotic manga magazine, keeps getting her work rejected by the editorial department. Criticized for “not understanding the male characters’ emotions,” she begins seriously asking one of her male classmates about the erotic expressions in her manga that she’s unsure about…
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kyuuketsuki no Oisha-san
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Medical, Horror, Vampires, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Wild Police Story
description:
Spinoff of Amuro and Co. during their Police Academy Days.  
  
For those who didn't remember the characters (heavy spoilers, not recommended if you haven't reached at least chapter 1000):||- Rei Furuya a.k.a Tooru Amuro a.k.a Bourbon : The only person currently alive in the main Detective Conan series  
- Jinpei Matsuda : Before joining the MPD in the main series, he was in a bomb disposal unit. He died after purposely failing to defuse a bomb in a ferris wheel to inform Miwako the location of the other bomb  
- Kenji Hagiwara : Matsuda's friend who died years before Matsuda in a similar bomb case  
- Wataru Date : Takagi's senpai; Takagi was once mistaken as Date when he visited the family of Date's girlfriend after Date's death  
- Hiromitsu Morofushi a.k.a Scotch : brother of Koumei who killed himself in front of Shuuichi Akai
||
tags: Crime, Adventure, Police, Adaptation

name: Apotheosis – Ascension to Godhood
description: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: .hack//G. U. Begins
description: A brief retelling of Ryou Misaki's story.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
After winning a 4 Billion Yen lottery, I quit my company job. But I ended up in a different world doing some serious volunteering, saving a poor village with contemporary Japanese materials and technology from the home center. What would happen if I bring modern home electrical appliances over there from Japan? And it seems I would fall in love with a beautiful girl in the village.
___
Original Character Designer: [Kurojishi](https://mangadex.org/author/5b735c65-e596-49db-8f9f-e26141a65003/kurojishi)
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mobile Suit Cross Born Gundam DUST
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The year is 0169 of the Universal Century. The Earth Federation government has lost power, and the struggle for supremacy among the colonies has intensified, making it the "Space Sengoku Era". 

Ash King and other like-minded people stand up to put an end to the endless war!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Returning Student
description: Im Cheol, who was a legend in middle school, returns to school to seek revenge after learning that his friend Kim Sol, committed suicide due to school violence. However, his revenge is disrupted when Seo Ha-Yoon, who was like an older sister to him in the orphanage, is assigned to the same school as his teacher.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: “That makes a grand total of 100 thousand dollars.” After Tsukasa’s mom is killed in a car accident, her dad becomes addicted to drinking and gambling. One day, he disappears, leaving Tsukasa with a debt of 30 thousand dollars. There’s no way a student like Tsukasa could get her hands on that much money! Eventually, debt collector Reiko shows up, inviting herself into Tsukasa’s home and telling her to pay up. She offers the young girl a way of getting cash fast: by selling herself to Reiko. “Want to sell me your body?” Tsukasa agrees without really understanding what that entails, and when Reiko moves in with her, their relationship suddenly takes an unexpected turn…
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kokuyou no Hanayome
description: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...?
tags: Demons, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Beater's Cafe Tenchou Teria ga Hasshinsuru Manga Teria Channel!
description: Teria becomes the new Manager of the Sword Art Online Official Beater's Cafe. She meets with many different SAO characters with hilarity ensuing.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
