name: Not found
description:
Ichiro Akitaka, framed for a crime most heinous—child molestation and murder. 
Engulfed by despair and contemplating the final release of suicide, he is pulled back from the brink by the young, earnest priest, Kiba.
Despite the sordid label society had pinned to him, Kiba shows Akitaka an unending mercy and kindness.

A life of peace he'd yearned for, days unmarred by reproach.
But could such salvation truly exist in this place?
tags: Psychological, Boys' Love, Incest, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy

name: Sundome!! Milky Way
description: Sakura Yoshitake is a 25-year-old salaryman working for a food production firm. One day he takes the day off to go to his grandma's 88th birthday. While driving home after the party he sees a UFO and crashes. He survives the wreck and finds a terrifying alien standing over him. He passes out and when he comes to, he is in his own bed in his own apartment, covered in bandages. Even more, he finds a beautiful blonde half naked woman sleeping next to him. When she awakes she tells him she has come to earth to be impregnated by him. However when he touches her, her embarrassment causes her to lose control and she turns back into the terrifying alien he saw before. How will he ever impregnate her if she can't control her embarrassment enough to ever let him touch her?
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Kawaii Koi wa Kikazaranai
description: Amano Emi likes wearing cute clothes. One day, as she is arguing with a pick up artist who was harassing a girl, a drink is thrown at her. She is saved by a stranger...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Choose Only Me!
description: Wataru and Ayumu are the office's heartthrobs, charming and successful. On weekends, however, they trade their suits for sweats and dive into video game marathons. Ayumu, secretly head over heels for Wataru, has perfected the art of playing best friend, even swatting away potential rivals to keep his spot. But when a client offers to set Wataru up with his daughter, Ayumu's carefully laid plans begin to fall apart...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers

name: Negi Haruba Short Story Collection: Mitoubun
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: The Secret of the Partner Next to You
description: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable (Official Colored)
description: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting, the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!
tags: Official Colored, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: LAND OF GODS
description: "In the year 1111 A.D, the Mexicas (Aztecs) abandoned Aztlan, guided by a sacred prophecy to find the land their gods had promised. Now, centuries later, Tlalli—a clumsy but relentless young dreamer—sets out to walk the same path, chasing destiny and something greater than himself.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Mine-Kun is Asexual
description: Mine-kun is Asexual. He doesn't like sexual intimacy in a relationship. He can kiss a girl, but it's not something he wants to do if he can help it. But Murai loves him so much that she's willing to overlook the fact that she can't hold his hand; that she can't cuddle up next to him when they watch movies together; that she can't fall in love with him the way that she hopes to be loved in return. In the eyes of those around them, is this even a relationship that's meant to last, or is it a train wreck just waiting to happen?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi

name: Wind Spirit
description:
I fought like a demon to live. I survived. I got lucky and survived this mission, but there’s no guarantee that I’ll survive the next. Next time, I’m going to be treated as a deserter just like my friends who never returned. I’m probably going to be fed by crows in valleys while everyone forgets my name. The smell of blood that forces you to hold your breath! Hell’s screams that howl from below! Now, I want to throw everything away and become the wind. Become the wind, free I fly.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_poong_wz)

- [Original e-Book <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000048076)

name: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - An Invitation From Afar (Doujinshi)
description:
Maya, who is currently a member of the New National Troupe in Japan, has received an invitation from Claudine - her former acting partner - to go watch her new play that will be showing at the Theatre Du Flamme in France. Maya is excited to evaluate Claudine's progress since they last met, but feels internally conflicted when she sees Claudine acting alongside her new co-star.

[ Yuri MayaKuro (Maya x Claudine) One-Shot Doujinshi ]

Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight

Pairing: Tendou Maya and Saijou Claudine
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

Within the Ghost Immortal Sect, he trains with unwavering focus and takes on missions alongside his senior brother Ye, vowing to uncover the enemy responsible for his clan’s destruction.

name: Hero X Demon Empress
description: The demon queen was defeated by the dog I raised… I, who merely wanted to return to the countryside, was transmigrated into a foreign world. I managed to become a foundation level existence in a novice village. Even the demon queen, who dominated the world, was defeated by the dog I raised. From then on, the demon queen has lived in my house, and my adventures in aforeign world began.

description: The prequel to the series [Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?].  The main character this time is Kumaoka Aizen (Ameli's younger half-brother who appears in chapter 22 of the main story), the son of a yakuza boss.  The story takes place during Aizen's middle school years and this section focuses on describing the personality changes of Aizen and the other half-siblings that Aizen has met.

description: Saruta Torasuke, an idiot who loves to fight, senses the hidden strength of student council president Fujishiro Senju, and challenges him to a match. In the midst of their fight, something changes in Fujishiro...?

name: Mysterious Rain Jack
description:
Mysterious Rain Jack is a short Star Wars parody with a main character who looks like Kurikinton Soramame. The manga marks debuts of Thunder Ogre Goronbo, Drop-kun, and R2-D2; three characters who also make appearances in Toriyama's later manga Dr. Slump. As well as several aliens who also make cameo in Dr. Slump.

---
* **Won the Monthly Young Jump Award in 1978**
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Comedy, Adventure, Police, Mystery

name: Akira Toriyama's Manga Theater
description:
A series of three manga tankōbon released between 1983 and 1997 that collect several one-shots written and illustrated by Akira Toriyama. The stories were originally published in various Shueisha magazines between 1978 and 1994.

Volume 1 (1983)
- Wonder Island (1978-1979)
- Tomato, Girl Detective (1979)
- Pola & Roid (1981)
- Mad Matic (1982)
- Chobit (1983)

Volume 2 (1988)
- Today's Highlight Island (1979)
- Escape (1982)
- Pink (1982)
- Dragon Boy (1983)
- The Adventures of Tongpoo (1983)
- Mister Hō (1986)
- Kennosuke-sama (1987)
- Sonchoh (1988)

Volume 3 (1997)
- Mamejiro (1988)
- Clear Skies, Karamaru (1989)
- Cashman - Saving Soldier (1990)
- Dub & Peter 1 (1992-1993)
- Go! Go! Ackman (1993)

name: Otouto no Omokage
description:
At a Hygiene Exhibition, a mysterious friendship blooms between Akihiko, a boy who dreams of becoming a military doctor, and Hisao, who has an iron prosthetic arm. But each time Akihiko meets with him, Hisao's body deteriorates, and the number of prosthetic limbs increases...
A retro Sci-Fi drama overflowing with darkness and beauty that questions humanity and its agency!

Winner of Kodansha Afternoon Four Seasons Manga Award-Spring 2024
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Yasumi Ai is a first-year high school student living on Izu Ooshima, an island off the coast of Toukyou. She loves reading manga, but a certain event causes her to become aware of "creating" manga for the first time... What is the world that awaits this girl!?

name: Not found
description: Junior high school student Misaki Nanao realizes the people of the town she lives in are slowly going insane. At the same time, she starts seeing Beherin, a mysterious demon. "If you make me believe you, I shall help you." Misaki believes the demon's words and talks about her terrifying personal experiences; however she gets dragged into people's increasing insanity, horrific incidents and a huge conspiracy
tags: Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ore to Mou Ichido, Hatsukoi
description:
I fell in love with fate. But the memory of that love disappeared. Four men were waiting for her when she lost her memory. It seems that just before she lost her memory, she chose one of these men as her fiancé. She had even decided to get engaged, but now she has to redo her first love. You might already be in a trap!

All of them are seriously trying to get married, and the exciting reverse love story is about to begin!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Seijo Sensei no Mahou wa Susunderu!
description: Despite being the most powerful saint, Tia was accused of being a heretic and banished from the royal capital. She became the teacher for three girls who had failed as candidate saints.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Meeting My Ex-Girlfriend
description: What are the chances of running into an ex-lover at the recycling station? A newly written story of two women reunited as apartment neighbors.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Bijo to Kenja to Majin no Ken
description:
After falling into the gap between worlds, I gained "the ability to identify something's status" for the cost of a single limitation. However, other than this skill I was completely ordinary. All I could do after landing in a strange world, was see through the status of things and use that information for my own growth. One day, after being assaulted by enemies, a lone figure appeared and saved my life. What's more, that person had an incredible "secret".
___
**Links:**

name: Hundred Years Game
description:
“Your game ends here.”  
  
Every 100 years, in a competition that will grant them more than one wish, there is only one final winner.  
  
The young boy Han Si-Joon jumps into a fierce battle while risking everything to save his family.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Lunarithm
description: The year is 2072. In the ruins of a shattered civilization, countless people in need of help went missing without a trace. The transportation and logistics conglomerate "Metrogradus" began restoring the infrastructure of the destroyed world. Seemingly out of nowhere, the emergency rapid-response unit "Lunarithm" joined the effort, rescuing those still trapped beneath the ruins. However, not only people wander the abandoned catacombs...
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Minecraft - Anime Edition (Doujinshi)
description: Minecraft enemies re-imagined as Waifus.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Self-Published, Harem, Doujinshi, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Bokura ga Ita
description:
The start of high school life. To the girls, that also meant the start of their love lives. For brand new first year student, Takahashi Nanami (Nana for short), it was no different… She happens to end up in the same class as the incredibly popular Yano Motoharu, who rumors say that two thirds of all the girls are guaranteed to fall in love with. But will that hold true for Nana, who says that if she had to choose between like or dislike, she'd say she dislikes him!?  
  
--- 
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 2005**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Watashi no Kouguchi-Sensei
description: Kouguchi Ruri, a skilled yet socially awkward male manga artist, has built a career creating niche "loli" manga. His carefully structured life takes a chaotic turn when Shiina Karen, an energetic young woman claiming to be a university student, joins him as his assistant. While Karen appears eager to learn, she harbors a mysterious secret and ulterior motives for working with Kouguchi. As they navigate the creative challenges of manga production, their quirky relationship evolves, blending humor, tension, and unexpected revelations.
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore
description: Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa, saying, "Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school." He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: In the Gardens of Gehenna
description:
Mary, a girl who moved from Tokyo to the countryside, meets the mysterious girl Colin in a "secret garden" up in the mountains. With nowhere to go, they share a "secret" in the garden that they can't tell anyone. They didn't realize the consequences of what they did.......

(Source: Yuri-Hime, translated)
tags: Thriller, Loli, Psychological, Romance, Incest, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Tragedy

name: March Comes in Like a Lion
description:
A youth named Kiriyama Rei, who lost his family as a child, endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then, through a chance meeting, he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari, Hinata, Momo), who hail from a working-class district of the city, and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw.
___
- **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011, which it shared with Space Brothers**
-  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**
tags: Award Winning, Traditional Games, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Akuninzura Shita B-kyuu Boukensha - Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru
description:
Gray, a B-rank adventurer, was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG *Bright Fantasy*. However, by chance, he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world, “Iska”! This choice would greatly change the fate of the world.
___
**Character Designer:** [Hara Kazuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/edaf7a28-c9c9-4b83-a3be-4087b3e4fcae)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Wing-Man
description: Kenta is a young boy who dreams about being a super hero called Wingman. All his classmates love it when he disturbs the courses to apply his holy judgment, as much as the teacher hates that. One day while coming home he finds a beautifull girl in a bikini. Aoi Yume, she gives him a wonderful item, the book of dream which can make anything written on it true, and so began the life of the real super hero for our dear Hirono.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Suspicious Convenience Store!?
description:
In a quirky convenience store known for having everything, a weary cashier faces a daily parade of strange customers.

"Damn it, and it's minimum wage too!", the cashier complains while ringing up a di*do.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Philosophical, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Skill "World Tame" ni Mezameta Ossan wa Dungeon de Seikei wo Tateru Koto ni Shimashita ~Mushoku kara Hajimeru Shihai Musou~
description: After his company suddenly disappeared overnight, a worn-out corporate slave found himself unemployed — but what he gained was the ultimate skill to dominate monsters, humans, and all things...! In modern-day Tokyo, a mysterious phenomenon known as 'Dungeonization' begins, turning buildings into monster-filled labyrinths.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Dragon Ball After
description: In Age 788, the Dragon World is at peace, when a tremendous threat appears… the strongest Saiyan warrior, Kakarrot, has awakened! Son Goku, the hero who brought peace to Earth, attacks his own family and friends! His fated rival, Vegeta, tries to stop him in a battle of destiny! Will Vegeta be able to defeat Kakarrot…? And what will become of the Dragon World…?
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Sakura's Garden
description: Sakura is an elementary school student who absolutely loves cute things. After seeing her friend's puppy, she begs her mom to let her get a dog, but gets turned down flat. Sakura pouts about it, but then her grandpa makes her a deal. If she can take care of a bonsai tree for a whole year, she can have a dog...
tags: Oneshot

name: Hundred Ghosts Record
description: Office worker Li Yitai dies unexpectedly while working overtime and is taken to the underworld. However, upon checking the Book of Life and Death, they discover that his name isn’t listed. He doesn’t officially exist, and therefore cannot be reincarnated. Through a twist of fate, he becomes a “ghost errand runner"" and is tasked with capturing evil spirits. In the process, he also begins to uncover the hidden truth about himself.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: From Now on, You're My Demon
description:
Hina is a high school girl who has just lost her grandmother, who was her only family and guardian. In order to fulfill her grandmother's last living wish to see Hina dressed as a bride, Hina sneaks into the church on the night before the funeral...

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
"Song Yoo-joon, who loves soccer more than anyone else, suddenly becomes color blind and has to give up soccer. Fifteen years pass, and he dies an unjust death.

"Please... Just one more time on the field..."

In that moment, he returns to the days when he could see colors 15 years ago. As he prepares to kick the ball, filled with joy at the prospect of playing football again, he suddenly begins to see strange lights.

A modern sports fantasy where he becomes a genius midfielder as he sees the various colors that reveal the flow of the game!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Sports, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Deadman's Questions
description: The story follows the day-to-day life of a vagabond spirit trying to find happiness by performing assassination requests. Related to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Part 4: Diamond is Unbreakable.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Crime, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Past Life Returner
description:
In a world crawling with monsters and dungeons, Na Sunhoo and the other Awakeneds fight to protect humanity. But after he is killed in a deadly battle, a screen appears.

[Initiate Time Regression?] 

Now with a second chance at life, Sunhoo returns to the past, determined to make as much money as possible to buy the land the dungeon is on and destroy it before the monsters can appear. 

With innocent lives at risk, can Sunhoo strike it rich and vanquish the monsters once and for all?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yorimichi :RE
description: Suzuki Temari's rework of the same title one shot released in 2013. A different story, a different setting, yet still the same childhood friends. How will Kae and Kousuke's story evolve this time?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, School Life

name: Obentou Uri wa Seijo-sama! ~Isekai Musume no Atta ka Recipe~
description:
Suddenly summoned to another world, former office lady Fukuyose Mahiru becomes a lunchlady in order to cover her living expenses, as well as gather information. Then one day, she gets her hopes up when she hears a rumor that the genius Magician Randy may hold a hint to help return her to her original world——.  
  
"To find the practitioner than summoned you here, we must uncover the motives behind it."  
  
Things become messy after it's determined Mahiru holds a great amount of magical power, and must therefore cohabitate with Randy?! And on top of that, he finds eating to be too troublesome, making him the ultimate picky eater——!  


---

[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8472ex/)  
[Original Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/202048/)
tags: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Zettai Aku no Kaibutsu
description: “The Fukurogi Incident” — a serial murder case in which 23 murderers met their end at the hands of an active police officer, Fukurogi Nodoka. Nodoka, presumed dead after her execution, awakens to find herself informed by a mysterious girl, Lassey, that she’s been made to participate in a battle royale between resurrected heinous murderers. Nodoka, driven by the desire to prevent further atrocities by these resurrected criminals and eliminate their kind from the world, plunges into this distasteful game.
tags: Action, Mafia, Gore, Fantasy, Police, Mystery

name: Martial Legacy
description:
A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

---
Translated raw sypnosis:

He said, "This world fundamentally should not have demons." And thus, all the lands became peaceful.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Followers of King
description: Gao Jing, you're a maniac. Almost exactly like Gao Sheng was. In your eyes, is the world truly so horrid, horrid enough that you'll go to such extremes to save it? Gao Jing, are these the rules you've laid down for every sect under the sun? You're so delusional your plans are something not even your great grandfather would've dreamed off. So be it then, go and execute your plan, I want to see, if all the sects in the world will be brought to their knees in front of you, or if the Jin dynasty will be destroyed by your very hands!
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Inn Where You Can Save and Load ~ It Seems an OP Reincarnator Has Begun Training Newcomers at an Inn ~
description:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Azamukare Seijo to Shugoryuu no Konyaku
description: For some reason, Philia, who grew up in an orphanage, was able to use the "healing power" of a royal daughter. She was bought for her ability to act as Princess Lovetta's "healing power" behind the scenes. However, Philia's life was in danger due to Lovetta's scheme, who was driven by her jealousy. Just when she had prepared for her death, a dragon prince appeared...
tags: Demons, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: What Every Adult Thinks
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
description:
*- Note: Only this arc is completed! This series is still ongoing but with a new title. Please move to "Related" tab for more details*

Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Watashi wo Suki Sugiru Yuusha-sama wo Riyou shite, Konse koso Nagaiki suru Tsumoridattanoni (Tabun, Mata Shippaishita)
description:
Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday.
She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.

In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat.

He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood.
The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you."

The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Yami no Aegis
description: A protector, with an arm of steel, able to deflect bullets, swearing never to take a life. That is Tate Karito, the Shield in the Dark.
tags: Thriller, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Mimosa
description: The war surrounding the veil at the center of the world is over. However, the war was not the only thing the veil left in its wake. There are those who pursue the veil and those who seek to close it; those who wield special powers and those who are living weapons; those who disturb the peace and those who bring hope; those who collide with the paths they have walked and those who carry a coffin, seeking to resurrect the dead. Together, they are known as Actors.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai - Tonari no Anata to (Unofficial Fanbook)
description:
An unofficial addition to Yugami has no friends manga. 

Featuring the web-published interludes of Yugami-kun, as well as secondary works (fan-created stories) of Yuuji Yugami and Chihiro Watanuki set after the final chapter. 

Unofficial Fanbook created by Misumi (mr_ms_maker on X).

Note: Chapters can be read in random order.
tags: Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Death Speed
description:
Lemba, once isolated, seeks freedom in parkour, amidst gang violence, and the chains of his past and present.
New friends and enemies emerge, all within the high-stakes world of chase tag, adding to his challenges.
The peace he craves teeters on the brink of disruption

(Source: VoyceMe)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Adventure, Gore, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: HItodenashi no Koi
description:
Follows the tempestuous relationship between two writers, occasionally touching on the lives of those around them, both friend and enemy.  
  
Vol.1 Hitodenashi no Koi (1999)  
Vol.2 Itooshii Hito (2000)  
Vol.3 Omoware Bito (2001)  
Vol.4 Hitori ni Shinai (2002)  
Vol.5 Aisareru Hito (2004)
tags: Historical, Psychological, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Midsummer Fantasy
description: First published in the December 7th 1972 issue of Young Comic. Mentioned in Junji Ito's autobiography.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Horror, Mystery

name: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken
description: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking

name: Not found
description:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa's excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That's not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess...

(Hanashi Media)
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/another-world-survival/)

description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery

name: To Strip the Flesh
description:
Ogawa Chiaki is a YouTuber with a channel where she cleans and processes wild game her father has hunted. With the income, she is funding an impossible dream, the dream she has had ever since she was little, and the one she has never given up despite the opposition from all around her, except for her childhood friend who works as her cameraman. It is a dream that cuts away to the very core of her being.  
  
This is a oneshot that appeared on Shounen Jump Plus in May, 2020. It is a 2 parter.
tags: Oneshot, Medical

name: GIRLS und PANZER - Anata-tachi Kenkanasai! (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Joou no Rakuin
description:
On Himon Island, where the legend of the Cursed Ancient Princess of Evil—the Immortal Princess—sleeps, shrine maiden Mikoto steps into a forbidden forest. In that very moment, an unprecedented earthquake strikes, awakening the curse…!?

Thus begins the battle of Mikoto and the lecherous Self-Defense Force officer Tatsumi against the cursed Immortal Princess!

From Katou Kyashii, author of Kigoku no Yoru, comes an erotic horror where deadly combat and forbidden pleasures intertwine!
tags: Monsters, Romance, Survival, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kemomimi Miko-san
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: The Ring
description:
A series of mysterious murders all surround a video tape. Supposedly, anyone viewing this tape will die within 7 days. Reporter Reiko Asakawa, an aunt to one of the victims, decides to do a story on this tape. Upon viewing it however, she finds she has more to worry about than whether her boss will like her story or not…  
  
As she begins to experience horrifying visions, she comes to realize that she has no other choice but to find a way to break this horrible curse… or die.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Psychological, Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: White Pawn
description: Kuroki, a freshman in college, becomes infatuated with his senior Shirasawa, who enjoys dominating men, and plans to seduce him at the school's entrance ceremony, but ends up being the one who gets captured. Despite the setback, Kuroki is determined to win over Shirasawa's heart and comes up with a cunning plan to turn the tables.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: All Around Type-Moon
description:
Can't get enough of Type-Moon crossovers? Ever wondered about the strange café in Carnival Phantasm?  
  
Welcome to Ahnenerbe, where the casts of Fate, Tsukihime and Kara no Kyoukai hang out in their free time. Enjoy the random yet funny events that happen, as the three heroines get together in this café.
tags: Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Oyasumi, Scheherazade
description:
Rumor has it that there is a witch inside room 13 of the girls' dormitory, who lures innocent, unsuspecting girls into her room at night to perform indecent acts on them….   
In truth, the girl in room 13, Herazato Shie, is just unable to fall asleep at night unless she tells someone a story about the movies she has watched. So every night, she invites anyone willing to come in her room and listen to another of her stories about movies.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Thunderbolt
description:
Into this maelstrom of destruction go two veteran Mobile Suit pilots: the deadly Zeon sniper Daryl Lorenz, and Federation ace Io Fleming. It’s the beginning of a rivalry that can end only when one of them is destroyed. The lightning-streaked debris fields are about to become the stage for an epic duel where death is the only true winner.

(Viz)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Music, Tragedy

name: Ware wo Wasureta Joshi
description: Wakatsuki didn't want to reveal her relationship with her girlfriend so that they wouldn't become the gossip of the whole school, at least, until she kissed her girlfriend in front of their friends because of jealousy.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Not found
description:
In the panic surrounding a worldwide pandemic which kills 15 percent of the population and cripples many more, a secret organization, the Propater, topples the UN and seizes control of much of the world. A boy and a girl, raised in an abandoned virology research center, immune to the virus, are attacked by the Propater and escape.

Based strongly on Gnostic mythology, all major characters are named after gnostic deities, and have analogous roles.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Mafia, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama

name: Blue Archive - Aoharu Record
description:
Blue Archive JP's second official manga drawn by Sergei.

---
**Links:**
- [Blue Archive JP's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Blue_ArchiveJP)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Shiawase ni Natte Misemasu wa! - Anthology Comic
description:
Broken engagements, "serves you right"s, condemnation events, doting, royalty, reincarnated heroines, banishment endings… it's fully loaded with all the charms of villainesses! The comic adaption of popular villainess stories that were published on *Shousetsuka ni Narou*! An anthology of oneshots with happy endings!!

Cover Art: Maro

+++**Volume 1 Contents:**
1. "The Villainess Will Obtain True Love" (悪役令嬢は真実の愛を手にいれる). Art by Hoshino Soumei, Story by Nekomata Doremi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1664fm/): A broken engagement at a graduation party?!
2. "The Tale of the Noble Girl Who Will Go to a Convent After Her Engagement's Breaking" (婚約破棄されて修道院に行くお嬢様の話). Art by Sorakura Shikiji, Story by Yuuki Satoru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7933fg/): Banishment after her younger sister steals her fiancé?!
3. "I Will Definitely Get My Engagement Broken! ~I Will Become a Villainess!" (絶対に婚約破棄をしてみせます！～悪役令嬢に、私はなる！). Art by Kuroe Yui, Story by Reiga Utsuho. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1702fn/): To break off her engagement, she harasses the daughter of a baron?!
4. "Aku no Kadou wo Ikimashou" (悪の華道を行きましょう; "Shall We Walk Hand in Hand Down the Flowery Path of Evil?"). Art by Yamashiro Umeta, Story by Mafuyubi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3244cr/), [English Translation](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/let-us-tread-the-path-of-wicked-elegance/): After her engagement is broken, she gets married to a fat old baldy?!
5. "The Villainess Trifles with the Second Prince's First Love" (悪役令嬢は第二王子の初恋に翻弄される). Art by Ohitsuji Ei, Story by Mizuno Saaya. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2169fj/): After being condemned, the second prince appears before me...
+++
+++**Volume 2 Contents:**
1. "Konyaku Haki wo Mochikakerarete Juusuunen, Soko Made Iu Nara Haki Shimashou!" (婚約破棄を持ちかけられて十数年、そこまで言うなら破棄しましょう！; "It's Been 10 Years Since You Asked to Break off Our Engagement, If You Insist That Much, Let's Break It off!"). By Yoshimura, Character design by Maro: She's been told multiple times since they were young to break off the engagement?!
2. "The Villainess Laughs Innocently" (悪役令嬢は無邪気に笑う). Art by Ohitsuji Ei, Story by Yoruru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1629cz/): A condemnation event after being called out to the rear garden?!
3. "The Art of Rebuilding a Nation Begins With a Broken Engagement!" (婚約破棄から始まる国家建て直し術！). Art by Kawano Akiko, Story by Hazuki. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4551ft/)
4. "You Were Set up, You Know?" (貴方は嵌められたのですよ？). Art by Koyuki Iroha, Story by Yuki Yukiko. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6502eu/): At the graduation party, my older sister's engagement was broken?!
5. "The Villainess Exploded" (悪役令嬢は爆死しました). Art by Nanso, Story by bouro. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4564fw/): The villainess tells the second prince "Serves you right”?!
6. "I Reincarnated as a Villainess. Come Quickly, My Engagement-Breaking Event" (転生したら悪役令嬢になりました。婚約破棄のイベント、早く来い). Art by Mochida Moo, Story by Kyouka. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4699fn/) | [Serialization](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2863gc/): The only ally the reincarnated villainess has is her valet?!
+++
+++**Volume 3 Contents:**
1. "One Day, I Was Able to Hear the Inner Voice of My Fiancée" (ある日婚約者の心の声が聞こえるようになりました。). Art by Chuugyaku, Story by Enju Subaru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s6234f/)
2. "My Bethrothed's Personality Is Way Different From the Game!" (婚約者の性格が原作と違うのですが). Art by Mochida Moo, Story by Kozuki. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s5772f/)

name: Enkan no Lapin
description: The much-anticipated serialization of the popular SNS sensation "Rabbit × Miniature Garden × Dark Fantasy" begins!! With white ears, pale skin, and red eyes, Teddy the rabbit is shunned at the orphanage due to his unusual appearance. One day, he receives an invitation from someone claiming to be his father, leading him to a mysterious Western-style mansion. There, he meets Adele, someone who shares the same peculiar traits as him...
tags: Animals, Horror, Fantasy

name: Kuitsume Youhei no Gensou Kitan
description:
After the soldiers' mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~
description: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Karen Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: A cross-dressing man (usually a serious salaryman) whose cross-dressing was probably discovered by the moving company.
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Subaru
description: Subaru, a third grader, was telling her twin brother Kazuma, who had only a few days left to live, about the daily events of her life through dancing. She thought she was dancing for Kazuma, but the joy of dancing was already burned into her mind. However, because of this incident, she will have to carry a heavy sense of guilt for the rest of her life....
tags: Psychological, Sports, Drama

name: Not found
description: Ron accidentally travels to another world, but before he can even enjoy the thrill of his journey, he's framed and guillotined. On his deathbed, the system sends a cheat to avert the crisis. He also picks up a super cute and clingy witch along the way. A beautiful duchess from the empire suddenly appears, offering her territory, and a tsundere dragon maid takes care of her. Guided by the system, Ron is about to embark on a joyful journey into another world. But no one ever tells him that the same system has killed all ninety-nine other travelers before him! Whose conspiracy is all this?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dragon ball An Earth without Goku
description:
This is a non official-non DBM cannon copy-paste fancomic based in the Universes 3 and 9 of Dragon Ball Multiverse: what would have happened if Goku never went to Earth?

In Universe 3 Bardock organized a saiyan rebelion, overthrowing the frost demons. And Kakarotto wasn´t send to Earth (though he lived to adulthood in the Saiyan Empire). This events are described in the chapters written by Salagir and drawn by Faye.

In Universe 9, as seen in the first pages of this copy-paste comics. Kakarotto is shot down by Coola.

That´s why in both U3 and U9 (and U1 and U10 also we´ll see someday) there was an Earth without Goku, and so events there were identical, for a time, in both Universes
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Kigenso Katana
description:
15-year-old swordsman Souta Kazama owns a katana with a turquoise gem. However, he discovered that the world is bigger than he thought. Advanced cities, digital swords, and strong fighters! But his dream is to travel around the world!

(Translated with author's permission)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Battery
description: Meet Harada Takumi—not even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region, although he's frustrated and ready to give up, because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou…
tags: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Loksalt
description: Lured into a small village that hold a great history, linked by blood, to his silver hair; Damien discovers a village of otherworldly beings and his not so great connection to them. ‣ Update with new chapter once every 2 months
tags: Self-Published, Drama, Supernatural

name: Ura Sekai Communication
description:
Gold Award in the 21st Dengeki Grand Prize.

Later published in Weekly Comic Dengeki Daioh magazine in September 2014.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lot of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
What do world governments do when they learn that fantastical beings are not merely fiction, but flesh and blood-not to mention feather, hoof, and fang? Why, they create new regulations, of course, like the Interspecies Cultural Exchange Accord! When twenty-something Kimihito Kurusu becomes an involuntary “volunteer” in the government homestay program for monster girls, his world is turned upside down.

A lamia named Miia is sent to live with him, and it’s Kimihito’s job to make sure the sexy snake girl integrates into everyday life. While cold-blooded Miia is hot for Kimihito, the penalties for interspecies breeding are dire. Even worse, when a buxom centaur girl, and a scantily-clad harpy move into Kimihito’s house, what’s a full-blooded young man with raging hormones to do?
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Magic, Harem, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Takuran Joshi wa Takaraka ni Warau
description:
A Wonderful Husband, a Wonderful Life, and an Adorable Child with the One I Love—
I want to live the perfect married life! But that was just a dream.

Office worker Rena marries Ryūsuke, a senior colleague with a high income.
"I'll seduce this rich guy and make him mine♪" —It was a calculated marriage from the start.

But Ryūsuke turns out to be not only emotionally abusive but also unbearably creepy in bed!
(I don’t want to have this man's child…!)
He has money, but the ideal marriage filled with love is nothing more than a distant fantasy.

Then, in her lowest moment, Rena reunites with Kento—her old crush!
Kento is kind, handsome… but completely broke!

—Then why not just have his baby and raise it with her husband's money♪

What will be the fate of Rena, the cunning "cuckoo woman" who lives by her own rules!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Sex
description: Sex
tags: Oneshot, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kaji Ryuusuke's Agenda
description:
Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.  
The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: Summer, Lemon, and Overlay
description: A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life, she's contacted by Konno Sayaka—a beautiful and successful woman working for a big company—with a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer, Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation, Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Warera Hobby's Famicom Hen
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Video Games

name: Bamboo Blade
description: Kojiro is an impoverished young teacher and the supervisor of his high school’s kendo club. He doesn’t have the leeway to spend time on his students–he can barely feed himself as it is. So when an old friend makes him a bet with an entire year’s worth of deluxe sushi on the line, Kojiro finds a new purpose in life: to beat his friend’s kendo team! But before he can arrange a kendo meet for both schools’ kendo teams, he needs to actually put together a five-woman squad–and the first girl he needs is Tamaki Kawazoe, kendo athlete extraordinaire and daughter of an elite kendo dojo master. The problem is, she isn’t really interested in doing kendo for fun. What can Kojiro do to convince her to join the team?
tags: Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life

name: My Favorite Novel Has a Weird Epilogue
description: I became the favorite character. The problem is that 25 years have passed since the end of the original work! Even sword fights and heretics… This is very different from the possession stuff I knew!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Splash!!
description:
Swimming diving competitions are harsh competitions in which the impact from the water surface can be as much as 1 ton when diving from a height of 10 meters.

Mizuha Shiozaki, a transfer student in Class A of Shirasagi High School, is a girl who has won many classical ballet competitions and is called a ``genius.''
However, she was unable to keep up with the strict guidance of her mother, who was a world-famous prima donna, and quit ballet in her third year of junior high school due to her resentment towards her mother.She thought she would spend her high school life in a relaxed and fun way, but inside she had a complex that she had run away from ballet and her mother.

One day, an argument with Himeko Sawamura, a second-year student who is her childhood friend and unrequited love, causes her to jump off a 10-meter diving board, causing her to lose her temper.

Shirasagi High School is the only high school in Tokyo that has a "diving club,'' and Himeko was an athlete who was nicknamed "Ice Princess'' and was even selected as a candidate for Japan's Olympic team.

Mizuha climbed onto the diving board but balked at the height due to fear. However, this ignites Mizuha's competitive spirit and she becomes obsessed with diving competitions.

A masterpiece sports manga depicting the bright and single-minded appearance of a girl who stakes her youth on diving competitions!

name: Cocktail Ponytail
description:
This is one of Hoshisato's first series, a romantic comedy about a youthful, energetic, and reluctant transforming high school girl hero named Saiko. A passing alien sees her courageously defending someone in a fight and is impressed with her sense of justice. He gives her a small handheld device which allows her to change into "Lady Tail", a futuristic superhero sporting a ponytail.

However, she had just recently cut her hair after her boyfriend berated her for fighting too much. When she transforms into Lady Tail, her ponytail comes back, which causes her to initially refuse the alien device. Eventually her sense of justice comes through and she begins using the device to transform into Lady Tail and assist those in need of protection.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Stand Up!
description: Ayumu is a hardworking yet timid kid who is constantly being bullied. After one day of being bullied, he finds himself being punched into the air… and waking up in a boxing gym! Thus, Ayumu's quest to become "just a little bit" stronger begins with the two wacky members of the Gold Boxing Gym. Will Ayumu finally stand up for himself or will his timidness get the better of him?

name: Last Summer Vacation
description: "I ended up seeing that girl in my class who didn't want to be seen by anyone"—The bright and cute Mizuki who selflessly takes care of her sick mother—Seemingly the perfect “good girl” in every respect. But what about Umino, who saw a girl like that in a way she absolutely should not have? What is arriving at the end of escaping from reality? This is sure to be a road trip story about sad girls

name: Dr. Kim of London
description: A state-of-the-art operating room with pristine surgical equipment? No can do; just a rusty bone saw in front of a jeering crowd for you! Sound like a waking nightmare? Well, that’s the best that the finest 19th century British medicine has to offer Taepyeong Kim, a young student from Joseon who retains the memory of his past life as a surgeon in modern-day Korea. For Taepyeong, London’s supposedly cutting-edge medical education is nothing but one barbaric display of malpractice after another, and he vows to drag the profession kicking and screaming into the modern age.

name: Uso wa Hitotsu mo Tsuitemasen
description:
"From now on, keep an eye on me, okay?" Ichinose Kaname and Aizawa Ryo are high school boys who live in the same dorm room and practice together after school despite belonging to different clubs . One day, Ryo is suddenly asked by Kaname to "protect him." Kaname says it's because the seniors in his dorm are teasing him too much, and Ryo accepts. However, when it comes down to it, Kaname has an even more serious agenda...

Chiaki-kun Mimamori Kurabu (Spinoff From)

name: Glen (글렌)
description:
Joseph lived an ordinary life and it all took a turn when he realized he was being stalked. First, his school, then his locker, his phone and eventually his home- every aspect of his life was infiltrated by his stalker. Joseph is at his wits' end when Glen, a stranger, steps into his life at just the right moment and offers him a helping hand.  


---

name: L-size Little Sister
description:
Konakai Futaba loves her older sister more than anything else in the world. Kind, beautiful and intelligent, Ichina was everything that Futaba wished that she could be… she even encouraged Futaba when she was feeling down.  
  
As such, Futaba went to the same highschool as Ichina, hoping to be reunited after two whole years of being apart…  
  
…but sadly, Ichina has completely changed from the sweet, gentle sister that Futaba remembers.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: To Make You Happy
description: College student Soshin Kang has made a deal with the devil. When poverty and violent loan sharks force Soshin to take up an offer from Aram, Soshin’s high school friend-turned-bully, to live in Aram’s lavish house with all expenses paid, it seems like a dream come true. Although Aram appears sweet and gentle, in reality, she is a cold, manipulative stalker who is obsessed with Soshin and will stop at nothing to keep her to herself. As people around her begin to get hurt, Soshin finds herself in a race against time to uncover the truth and escape Aram’s grasp.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Moscow Calling (Doujinshi)
description:
Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin, an 18-year old Russian student with a mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok, he studies at a local university, and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  
  
One day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Alcafus
description: "Alcafus" is the story of Tasuku—the protagonist—who one day as a child meets a mysterious girl with animal ears and tail. Finding her collapsed at the shrine, Tasuku presents her some candy and looks after her. 10 Years later, hearing her voice calling for him he returns to the shrine, and strays into a mysterious world.

name: Girl's Heart @ High School Boy
description: Ren Yoruno is an ordinary high school boy whose hobby is writing web novels. However, he finds that due to his lack of interactions with the opposite sex, he has no idea how to write female characters. That’s when he finds an ad about a miracle drug that can make you understand the feelings of women. But when he drinks it…

name: Mob Kousei no Ore Demo Boukensha ni Nareba Riajuu ni Naremasuka?
description:
It has been decades since labyrinths first appeared in the modern world of Japan, bringing with them monsters and related catastrophes. With this brought many changes; the biggest one being a new profession called 'Adventurer' and the monster cards they use to summon their own monsters to fight and conquer labyrinths with.

Kitagawa Utamaro, nickname Maro, is a mob highschooler who becomes an adventurer due to being incited by a former friend of his having sudden social success among their peers simply by becoming an adventurer himself. However, things aren't quite as easy for Maro. Just becoming an adventurer in name only isn't enough for him to gain his spotlight, giving him no recourse but to actually tackle labyrinths with the peculiar and not very versatile monster cards that he barely manages to scrape up.
___
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0112fi/) (JP)
[Alternate Official Raw](https://www.123hon.com/nova/web-comic/mob/) (JP)

One of the boys, Alfi, was good at everything, and grew up as a handsome genius  with four attributes of magic, and entered the elite magic school as a scholarship student. And Reese enrolls in the elite magic school with one extremely defensive magic, brilliantly destroying the common sense of childhood friends, teachers and students! An uncaring and selfish commoner pushes the aristocrats away and runs up the school caste at explosive speed!

Iba decides to live as Genghis Khan, the "King of Wolves," and while ruling the surrounding countries, he trains his own son, Kublai, to become a military commander with the help of his trusted subordinate, Benkei. However, the facts of history are undeniable, and the year of Khan's death (1227) is approaching!! Now, the most powerful and greatest enemy appears in front of them!!
Before reading this read "King of Wolves"!!

name: Shikabane Shoujo to Ai ga Omoi Sei-kishi no Toubatsu Gakuen Life
description:
In a world where humans and fantastical creatures coexist. Shurika, a zombie, enters a boarding school where she learns to battle the "kyoujuu," creatures that threaten both races. There, for three years, the students live in pairs with members of the other race. Shurika is paired with Marie, a paladin with whom she has a certain affinity. But for some reason, Marie's affections for her is strangely overbearing...? 

Serialization began in August 2023 in Yuri Hime.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: Romance wa Banken to
description:
"His worst scandal...is me"
Lay, a former soldier, is the bodyguard of Alex, who is one of the most popular actors praised for his chic style. However, Lay soon finds out that his master, often called as the "perfect prince", is nothing more than a bratty troublemaker.
Lay must save and protect Alex's public image, but that mission includes one thing: to take care of Alex's sexual life as his 'stress reliever'...

The most clingy top-secret love between a younger, super arrogant celebrity and his cool, tanned-skin pretty bodyguard begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Sakurada Coffee Shop
description:
"Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel..." Is that love or coffee?

Kusama Kou isn't sure, especially after he rediscovers that his first childhood crush is now a widowed coffee shop owner by the name of Sakurada.

Sakurada-san's kind, soothing, with an amazing voice, and much older than Kou - i.e. exactly Kou's type. So he wastes no time in getting himself hired part-time at Sakurada Coffee Shop, but is there really any hope for his love to be returned...?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

description: Born as a daughter of a gangster family, Hanazame Ranko longs for an "ordinary romance". However, the young head of another group, Sumikawa, always bothers her! People are scared away because of Sumikawa, who is said to be the worst in the underworld! However, he always sticks by her and if she falls in love with him, whe can't go back to "normal" anymore. A heroine who never wants to fall in love x a young head who plays with her, a love struggle without justice, breaks out here!

description: Hajime no ippo is a manga that has been ongoing for 33 years, and us at UnderStar studios thought we would color the whole thing, Premise of story: Hajime No Ippo is a Japanese boxing manga series that follows the story of Ippo Makunouchi, a timid high school student who discovers a passion for boxing after being rescued from bullies by a professional boxer, Takamura Mamoru, leading him to pursue a career in the sport and overcome various challenges to become a champion, going through strong opponents with special signature moves and struggling to claw his way to the top. ALL RIGHTS GO TO MORIKAWA GEORGE.

However, she was exiled from her real family because "eating monsters is vulgar!" Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: For the Shattered Things
description:
Choi Yeon was abandoned by her friends and family. Now a university student, she has started working as a private tutor for a son of a rich family in Seongbuk-dong to hide her poverty. By chance, while working there she met Ji Shinhyuk, the older brother of her student.

Shinhyuk, the real owner of the house, completely ignored Yeon as if she was a mere object. But one day, he began to call on Yeon to perform menial errands. Some days, he would be crude; others, disrespectful. He would provoke Yeon with his indecipherable expression. Despite that, Yeon began to foster a growing attraction toward Shinhyuk, and hoped she would eventually catch his eye...

---

description:
Ayato, a boy who spent his childhood being raised by an overseas terrorist organization, is troubled by the fear of his own power and his own worth. The school that came to scout him is... "Murder School". A vivid dark action that fights the good and evil of life with the words "There is a life that can be saved by killing"!
Re: imboss
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Gore, Tragedy

name: Mei Lanfang
description: On August 8, 1961, China mourned the death of one of its most popular artists: Mei Lanfang. This Peking Opera singer, who thrilled audiences with his interpretations of female roles, began his career in 1904, at the age of ten. For hours, he trained his voice, learned to dance and rehearsed his acrobatics, until he reached a level of refinement that propelled him not only in China, but also on the international stage. Yin Ling delicately traces the life and career of this extraordinary character, and also offers us a glimpse into the magical, little-known world of Peking Opera.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Millenniums of Warring States
description:
I, Ji Qing, crossed into the Gaowu version of the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period.

You have a sword, I can't die!

You have the magic of the world, I can't die!

You have a nearly-godlike move, I still can't die!

An ordinary person who can't die no matter what, how will I fare in this war-torn world of rigorous battles?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

In a small town on the outskirts of Tokyo lives a little shop, "Hibana's: Cafe & Flowers," owned and tended to by Anna Hibana. With the outgoing Emil Yamanishi moving into the apartment above, Anna's calm shop-life will now be mixed with action and excitement!
...and some quiet and slow relaxation and romance.

A long-awaited new series by the author of "Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!"

description: While her classmates all get transported to another world, Akari alone dies and is reincarnated as a beautiful girl in that world. Even when trouble comes her way, she remains positive and cheerful, boldly embracing her second chance at life. Her days are filled with crushing shitty nobles, taking down criminal organizations, and staying extremely optimistic... It is clear why she was so well-liked by her classmates!!!

The Yakuza boss is... a cat?! The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad.
___
The title "Like a Cat", or "Neko ga Gotoku", is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is "Like a Dragon" or "Ryu ga Gotoku".

name: Neko ni Tenseishita kedo Hima nano de Geema Joshi to Issho ni VRMMO wo suru
description: I am a cat. My name is Nanahoshi. In my previous life, my name was Hokuto Kurokawa. I lost my life in an unexpected accident. I was then reincarnated, not as a human, but as a cat...! Moreover, not in another world, but in the same world just several years in future...! But don't worry, because I was taken in by a household that has a full dive VRMMO that even cats can play. The game world basically takes the place of another world! Because of this, I might even be able to use cheats in this world(game world)!? Alongside my master, the super popular actress "Kanako Nakamura," her popular voice actress friend "MYU," and many pretty NPCs. I should be able to have my fill of adventure inyaa this game world(Isekai.)
