3. "File 3 Dead Person's Checkmate/Alternative title: The Great Chess Player, Akechi" (FILE3 死者のチェックメイト, "Fairu San Shisha no Chekkumeito"?)
4. "File 4 Ghost Hotel Murder Case/Alternative title: The Encounter" (FILE 4 幽霊ホテル殺人事件, "Fairu Yon Yūrei Hoteru Satsujin Jiken"?)
5. "Special Story Supt.Akechi Morning's Pretty Scenery" (スペシャルストーリー明智警視　優雅なる朝の風景, "Supesharu Sutōrī Akechi Keishi Yūga Naru Asa no Fūkei"?)
tags: Thriller, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Delinquents, Web Comic

name: Tesso no Ori
description:
The story follows antique store worker Imagawa, aging doctor Kuonji, and writer Sekiguchi, who are all fascinated by mysterious events happening in Hakone, including a series of murders of Buddhist monks and a little girl in a kimono who wanders through the mountains.  
  
Tesso no Ori is an adaptation of the fourth novel of Kyogoku Natsuhiko's Hyakki Yakou series.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Miren no Tonbo
description:
Extermination of swarming dragonflies.

On my first job as a psychic’s assistant, I thought it would just be odd jobs unrelated to spirits.
tags: Oneshot, Ghosts, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: HUMINT
description: Honda, who lived that day while erasing his traces, meets a mysterious transvestite man, Himemiya. Himemiya makes Honda work at a rain fog security company. The face behind the rain fog guard is a spy who sneaks into the truth of a person and reveals the truth. It was human intelligence. A honey trap battle action full of laughter and sadness presented by Matsuri of "Bakemono no Yoru Tsuzukushi"!
tags: Action, Crossdressing, Drama

name: Kimi wa Yasashii Madoromi
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Aqua
description: After 150 years of terraforming, Aqua, the planet formerly known as Mars, now has over 90% of its surface covered by water. A young girl named Akari Mizunashi arrives at the city of Neo-Venezia, an exact replica of the old Italian city of Venice, hoping to become an Undine, the most coveted job on Aqua. Follow Akari's adventures as she discovers the wonders of Aria in this prequel to the popular Aria anime and manga series.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Otsukaresama, Kurose-kun
description:
I feel like I forgot about someone important...

Plagued by nightmares of his old hometown, Yuuma Kurose, a lonely boy with the ability to see ghosts, feels inexplicably drawn back to the place from his dreams. There, he stumbles upon Kaito Kiriyama, a boy shrouded by terrifying spirits. With a serious look in his eyes, Kaito vows he'll protect Yuuma. But the moment their skin makes contact, the spirits surrounding Kaito started to possess Yuuma!
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Aoi, a demon boy hiding his true identity, lives a quiet life as a normal high school student. But one day, a girl suddenly falls from the sky, and she's not what she seems. Get ready for a modern-day pop demon battle from a highly skilled artist in the manga world!
tags: Oneshot, Action, Demons, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Cheat Eater Isekai Shoukan Kotogotoku Horobubeshi
description:
A common scene. A person dies, their soul sent to the great beyond. A goddess plucks it from the ether and offers a deal - she will send the soul to another world she has created. She will also bequeath the human with skills that are so powerful they could be considered cheats. The goddess only asks for one thing in return: that they use their special powers to save her world from destruction. 

The soul is summoned to another world and given the powers of a demigod. And as power corrupts, so too do the summoned humans abuse their abilities for wanton greed and violence. 

Zyzz is a slave of one such otherworlder, who voluntarily became his servant to search for his sister. Then one day, he meets Kaina, a woman who calls herself the "last summoned person", who was hand-picked by the goddess to eat those who have reneged on their promises...
tags: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Franken Fran Frantic
description: The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue. More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Zombies, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Space Brothers
description:
One night in 2006, when they were young, the two brothers Mutta (born 1993) and Hibito (born 1996) saw what appeared to be a UFO heading for the moon. They decided that night to both become astronauts and travel out into space.  
  
In 2025, Hibito has become an astronaut, and he's going to go to the moon. Mutta ended up following a more traditional career path with an auto development company. However, Mutta just ruined his career through a violent altercation with his boss. Now, not only has he lost his job, he appears to be blacklisted in the entire industry. Maybe this is a rare opportunity for Mutta to once again chase his childhood dream and become an astronaut like his little brother!
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: House Mayton's Youngest
description:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Elf ga Gendai ni Itara: Freeter-hen (Pre-Serialization)
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55153) (Compiled with [Elf ga Gendai ni Itara (Anthology)](https://mangadex.org/title/1ecd7a5f-5854-4b40-9c1a-c5588f9e4c71/if-elves-existed-in-the-present-day))
- Defunct Official Raw - [Twitter Moment](https://twitter.com/i/events/1490269318818713602)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Suit up! 

Jian is an Italian soccer league benchwarmer who needs to convince his childhood friend that he's a star player. A lucky goal or two might do the trick, but how long can he keep up the ruse? 

Unless, unbeknownst to him, Jian really is a genius...
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Sports, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Rappa Rendan
description:
Bored by his life as a ninja, Asagiri Jūbee runs away from his village in the hope of becoming a great pianist. To this end, he approaches high-school girl and piano prodigy Ibuki Aya, begging her to take him as a disciple. But she has a better idea: letting her childhood friend Otonashi Kanade teach the man instead. Problem is, Kanade gave up on piano, thinking he could never reach Aya's level… What results will the alliance of piano and ninjutsu bring about?  
  
Published in January 2019 in the Weekly Shōnen Jump.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa (Blue) (Fan Colored)
description:
Following the spirit of the origins of our popular big-breasted girls of Himura Kiseki-sensei, presenting a special Blue Edition of the weekly chapters of Yanmaga magazine's serialization "Getsuyoubi no Tawawa"!

---

Be sure to check out the published volumes released in Blue format in the Retail section, and the official English licensing by Denpa US (also in Blue)!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fan Colored, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
In the summer of 20XX, a "gate to another world" suddenly appears in Ginza, Toukyou. What comes pouring in from it is a mysterious army and a group of hideous monsters. They go around slaughtering people, and Ginza in broad daylight quickly turns into a hellscape. While everyone is helplessly thrown into confusion in this state of emergency, there is one man brave enough to move around. That man is Itami Youji, an otaku Self-Defense Force officer who would later be called the "Hero of Nijubashi"!
___
**Character Designer:** [Daisuke Izuka](https://mangadex.org/author/1d1b7e38-a71a-4ea7-af61-9ada58e4e4f8)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tensei Kusushi Wa Meikyu Toshi Sodachi
description:
Yulianne died right after taking the entrance exam for the Faculty of Pharmacy, only to find herself reborn in another world as the second daughter of a pharmacist.
The labyrinth city of Trian, where she lives, is filled with adventurers who delve into dungeons, making it a fierce battlefield for apothecaries.
Upon regaining the memories of her previous life, Yulianne resolves to build knowledge as an apprentice bookseller, hone her magic, dive into the labyrinth with her companions, and fulfill in this world the dream she once had.
Yes—to become a first-class apothecary!
tags: Reincarnation, Magic, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Uchi no meido ga kurasu no sukina ko ni nite iru
description: Eiga, the next head of the prestigious Kujo family, is in a serious predicament. That is, love. He wants to approach Himeka, a girl in his class whom he secretly has feelings for, but because it is his first love, he can't think of a good way to do it... At that moment, he decides to ask for advice from Maria, a maid of the same age who serves the Kujo family...!?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Odyssey of Benedict Arnold
description: Washing up on the shores of an unknown land, Benedict Arnold is plagued by voices detailing his life and all that has been said of him since his act of treason, true or otherwise. ‘THE ODYSSEY OF BENEDICT ARNOLD’ is an ongoing adventure tale following the infamous traitor, Benedict Arnold.
tags: Historical, Animals, Adventure, Self-Published, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Koha-Ace DX
description:
Farewell, Koha-Ace! (For the fourth time)

The Koha-Ace series is finally running out of ideas and is about to be axed! Type-Moon fans will bear witness to Koha-Ace's final battle! You will see the tears of time... (Sixth and final entry in the Koha-Ace series, after Koha-Ace GO)
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires

name: Mikakunin de Shinkoukei
description: This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori, who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé, and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof, and hilarious happenings occur.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Monkey Peak
description:
A group of employees from the Fujitani Pharmaceutical Company are on a hiking trip. After the company suffered a crisis, the CEO hopes to improve teamwork and morale among new and old employees with this trip. Not everyone is as excited as he is. Unfortunately for them, they soon find themselves having to deal with problems that they weren't prepared for.  
  
What's going to happen to these employees? Will they fall in love with hiking? Will they be able to work together, get along well, and bring the company back to its feet? Read and find out in this heartwarming story of adventure, friendship, and teamwork!
tags: Action, Demons, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Girl I Like Confessed to Me While Handing Me Cash
description: After being confessed to by his crush, Tachibana, Fujiwara finds himself in complete bliss. When faced with such a joyful occasion, one would normally accept the confession immediately. However, Tachibana's method of confession is quite peculiar—she tries to show her love by handing him a wad of money! Reluctant about exchanging money for love, Fujiwara turns down the offer. Thus begins Tachibana's adorable attempts at gaining Fujiwara's affection.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kono Healer, Mendokusai
description: Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
"The 'deadline'—humanity's eternal burden.
Izumo Reiji, a manga artist, a profession inextricably linked to such deadlines, discovers a mysterious menu at a coffee shop he casually wanders into...?

That thought everyone has probably had at least once: 'If only a cute girl would manage my deadlines for me...'"
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Bocchi the Rock! - 10⁻¹⁴ (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: On Your Knees, Your Highness!
description:
Everyone dreams of knocking out their insufferable boss, but what if that boss is a war hero, a duke, and constantly breathing down your neck? For Chloe, enduring Curtis's relentless inspections was a daily struggle... Until a royal marriage decree offers her an unexpected way out.

---
Everyone has had the urge to punch their infuriating boss, but actually going through with it is hard. Especially when that boss is a war hero and a grand duke, no less. Chloe could only grit her teeth as she watched Curtis constantly conduct service inspections… but then, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presented itself. The king ordered Curtis to marry a noblewoman from another country, and he put forward his lieutenant, Chloe, as his lover. Now, the gun was in her hands… “First, get on your knees, Your Grace.”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hitozuma Medusa-san to no NTR Seikatsu
description: Bookstore manager Tenma hasn't shown up for work or called in today. His employee, Asuka, worried about him, goes to his house and discovers... he's been petrified by his medusa wife! But surely they can return him to normal? Tenma left a letter saying that if anything happens to him, Asuka should take care of his wife. But Asuka is a guy who can only get excited by other mens' wives. Also, and most importantly for the plot - hot medusa wife.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: I’d Rather Live as a Villain
description:
The protagonist, once an assistant manager on Daeyoung Corporation’s Spain team, is forced into a transfer to distribution after having their achievements stolen by superiors. There, He begins working as the personal secretary to Kang Mun-jeong, the only legitimate heir of the Daeyoung Group.

Feeling her position threatened, Executive Director Kang Mun-jeong proposes a contract marriage to the protagonist, Yoon Tae-sik, who has served faithfully at her side for three years, in order to once again draw public attention to herself.

The price of the marriage: 10 billion won.

Thus begins an office drama, as the protagonist carries out the terms of this contract marriage, with 10 billion won on the line.
tags: Long Strip, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kiyota-san wa Yogosaretai!?
description: Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners Madness
description: Not found
tags: Action, Crime, Gore, Delinquents, Adaptation

name: Shiro no Necromancer ~Shiryou Ou e no Michi~
description:
After dying of sickness at 15, I had been reincarnated into the world of the MMORPG "War Chronicles of Desgarde"! The help feature taught me the basic summary of this world, but there seems to be additional secrets about me, aside from my reincarnation. Let's survive in this Isekai world to become the character I played in my previous life, a necromancer!

(Wait, there's a Necromancer King? What's that?!)
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Window of Orpheus
description:
The story begins in Europe, during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues, machinations and a Europe that is going straight toward World War I, three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons, and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact, Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus, for example, is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.

Outside of Rose of Versailles, Window of Orpheus is considered to be Ikeda's representative work and the culmination of the themes of her works up to that point.

Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda, but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Psychological, Romance, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: When I confessed my love to Sasaki-san... she's floating!? But only by 1 cm off the ground...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mobile War History Gundam Burai
description:
A new Gundam war picture scroll, where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict, is born!

"Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish, Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai, throws himself into the harsh battle...!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama

name: Rent a milf
description: Kazuyo hired a milf to be his girlfriend,
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, Slice of Life

name: Zenryaku, Yamagurashi wo Hajimemashita.
description:
Sano began his laid-back life in the middle of nowhere, with the three chicks he just happened to buy at a festival. But before he knew it, they had tails that reminded him of dinosaurs, became very large, and even started speaking.

"Why...!?"
"Why?" "Why?" "Why?"
"Don't ask that too!"

It's a strange, but full of healing mountain life with the chickens!
tags: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
*"It's making me blush so hard~"*
One day, Teio asked McQueen: *"I want to groom your tail!"* and after a while, McQueen had agreed to let Teio groom her tail.
With her beloved Teio grooming her tail, McQueen's heart, for some reason, won't stop racing...!?
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Kuramerukagari
description:
In the busy day-to-day life of those in the ever changing coal mine town nicknamed the "Miniature Garden," the smell of iron and dust clouds dance. Among the town's inhabitants are Kagari, a cartographer, and her childhood friend Yuuya, who dreams of freeing himself from the Miniature Garden. Though they spend their fleeting days tenaciously, their everyday lives are transformed with the frequent occurrences of suspicious cave-ins...?! Under the town's swaying billows, the young girl and boy faintly mature into adults.

---
Note: The original anime film this was based on has released alongside the movie Kurayukaba, which shares the same universe.
tags: Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: After the Wind
description: He loved her from a distance. He thought she was the one. But the wind never blew in his direction. A bittersweet tale os one-sided love, quiet efforts, and the pain
tags: Romance, Self-Published, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Henkyou Gurashi no Maou, Tensei shite Saikyou no Majutsushi ni naru
description:
There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old, but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However, he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later, he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.

"Let's pretend to be a human this time."

However, being a human lover, he didn't particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life, he was the guardian deity of a region, and in this life, he's a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn't know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat, he is loved by his family and friends, and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild, he becomes an 'Immortal Mage' behind the scenes.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shinkon no Iroha-san
description:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp.

Ordinary days, they are quite a blessing... A genius presents, a yonkoma about the daily life of a newlywed couple.

Iroha-san and Hajime-kun have just moved into a new house. They start from scratch, steadily building their lives together. Going out to buy home appliances, or visiting the convenience store late at night, such ordinary daily life is an irreplaceable happiness for the couple.

This is a book that gives readers an irresistibly warm feeling (while keeping the jokes just as sharp).
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Amalgam of Distortion
description: The story is about a boy who wants to confess his feelings to his childhood friend. Unfortunately, after choosing the place to confess, he gets crushed by a train and loses his lower half. He gets saved by a scientist that turns him into a monster instead of a regular human being. How is his life going to be like under the guise of being a monster? And what would his childhood friend think?!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: One Piece Party
description: Spin-off of One Piece, which takes place post-timeskip, showing the cast in SD/chibi form and features their hilarious antics around various islands while out in the sea.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: GhostBlade
description:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Haruka Itoshiki Invader
description: Saeki Sousuke is an exceptionally smart student who, despite being only in 5th grade, can solve university entrance exam questions. However, he lacks any real ambition or dreams for his future. One day, Mogami Kyouko, a stunning girl who looks like a model, transfers to his class. Though she initially captivates everyone, her popularity among classmates doesn't last long...
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Slice of Life

name: Rotten
description:
Jaeshin sees dead people, and Officer Han can sniff out evil. Literally. Their search for a missing friend leads them and professional stuntwoman Yuhyeon into a tangled web of vile cover-ups and twisted violence. Can they handle the overpowering stench of evil?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)

- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Crime, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: No Kids Zone
description:
Doesn’t every child dream of a world without grown-ups? But when a deadly virus wipes out everyone over the age of twenty, reality proves to be far more sinister than a childhood fantasy. 

By the time No-eul turns eight, he is already familiar with the virus and the mysterious monsters that roam the land. When his mother passes away and his village comes under threat, he sets out on a journey to find "Utopia," a rumored safe haven said to hold the cure for the virus. 

But this so-called "Utopia" may not be what it seems...
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Soara to Mamono no Ie
description: One day a young warrior girl meets a dwarf who dedicates himself to constructing houses for monsters. A tale of building houses for myriads of creatures begins! After all, everyone needs a home.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: Not found
description: Soyoung is devastated when her favorite musical actor is swallowed up by the world of TV. Just after she quits supporting him, she discovers charismatic actress Jaeyi in a theater performance of "Macbeth" and becomes a fan at first sight. By meeting Jaeyi after her shows and even doing her a favor, Soyoung goes from a mere fan to her good friend. But when Jaeyi has to work with celebrity actress Hyesun, who she has a troubled past with, it unexpectedly sours their friendship. All Soyoung wanted was to support her favorite actress… so why does this new development bother her so much?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Nanjou-san wa Boku ni Dakaretai
description: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru

name: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!
description:
A girl with violently too much common sense, a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride, an addlebrained ghost member, and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!  
  
[Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Advance of Z - The Flag of Titans
description:
Set in U.C. 0084, before Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, the story follows the Titans Test Team, Black Otter Team, on their mission to test new mobile suits for the Titans. It begins with Eliard Hunter, an Earth Federation mobile suit pilot being assigned to the Titans and transferring to the Aswan, an Alexandria class carrier. There he meets Carl Matsubara, another new Titans recruit, Audrey April a skilled pilot and chief of test operations and data gathering, and Wes Murphy, a veteran of the One Year War and the Delaz Conflict. The Black Otter team doesn’t just carry out test runs, it also participates in real combat missions against Zeon Remnants and later, against AEUG.   
  
Manga adaptation of the photonovel of the same name.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
Koyuki Shirogane, a girl known for her beauty and equally harsh tone, giving her the nickname "Venomous Snow White," is saved by Naoya Sasahara as a man tried to hit on her. She may try to act strong, but on the inside, she is merely a young girl. Having been saved by Naoya, Koyuki falls for him, and Naoya on his end falls for Koyuki's innocent and cute attitude. Both fail to be honest with each other, but eventually bring themselves closer to admit their feelings for each other.

[Official English Light Novel](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/from-toxic-classmate-to-girlfriend-goals-v1/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Eighteen's Bed
description:
There are people in the world who particularly catch others' attention. Jun Kang, who lived as the 'good model student' while secretly hiding his miserable one-sided love, finds himself entangled with Yohan Go, a classmate he now shares a class with in the second year... What if he had liked Yohan Go instead?

“Jun, how is it? The taste of first love.” (Source: *Mr Blue*)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Rental Kareshi no Oshiri o Goshimei
description:
Sadistic corporate slave salaryman x party-animal university student.
University student Iori Kakeru, who works hard at his part-time job as a rental boyfriend, receives a request from a man named Tamaki. His sincere appearance wins Iori over, and he falls for Tamaki's surprising plan…
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence

name: Not found
description: Deep, deep in the forest, a slumbering princess lay under the curse of a wicked dragon. The knight captain Rega of a distant kingdom challenged the dragon to rescue her. Though the dragon's power was immense, fueled by his devotion to the princess, Rega somehow managed to strike it down. When the princess finally awoke and their eyes met, Rega's heart swelled with joy, until she flashed him a sweet smile and whispered, “You've been cursed♡”. And thus began their not-quite-fairy-tale adventure.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Run Wild
description:
As soon as Jiang Cheng finds out he's adopted, he's abandoned by his adoptive family and sent to live with his deadbeat father, who has a gambling addiction. Everything about his new life, from his pathetic father to the unfamiliar environment, makes Jiang Cheng depressed. But then he meets Gu Fei, who's like a shining bright light in this run-down city, and the two become each other's salvation and hope.
(Source: Tappytoon)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A passionate work depicting the emotional exchange between the loyal Liliet, who is indebted to the king, and the young, sickly princess . Enjoy the meticulous and rich artwork along with the unique worldview.
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Fantasy

name: The Human Experience.
description:
As the rates of **depression** rise abruptly around the world, **President** Elior Nova and 
his *« family »* embark on an **introspective adventure** that will (or not) allow them to answer the **main question of life** : 

*"What is the answer to this cryptic puzzle that is Happiness?"*
tags: Psychological, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Legend of Hikari
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Joining the Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, a fateful encounter ensues! Hikari Kamijo transfers to Aika Junior High School, where she fatefully meets the next Rhythmic Gymnastics Queen, Hazuki Shiina, and the Gymnastics Club's Hope, Takaaki Oishi!

In the midst of a crowd of top athletes, Hikari faces an athlete selection test to compete in a national junior high school competition....　

This is the first volume of the rhythmic gymnastics manga that was a big hit in Weekly Margaret in the 80's, depicting the agony and love of an athlete with a flexible brush stroke!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Senpai Is an Otokonoko
description:
Can true love really overcome any obstacles? Saki, a high school student, confesses her feelings to Makoto. Taken aback, Makoto reveals his secret, but the sudden discovery doesn’t seem to bother Saki who is already head over heels for him. After being rejected, Saki asks Ryuji, Makoto’s childhood friend, for some advice on how to win his heart. A love triangle unfolds when Ryuji realizes that he might also have some feelings for his old friend...

---
**Official Translations:**

tags: Award Winning, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
15 years ago, two gangs survived the competition at the Capitol plaza to overtake Seoul.  
  
Gi Jun cut off his own Achilles tendon and leaves his gang, realizing shortly after that his younger brother has become the other gang's leader.  
  
15 years later, after his brother's sudden death, Gi Jun is now searching for the truth aiming to uncover what has happened.

Alternative Official English

[Webtoon](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/plaza-wars/list?title_no=4359)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Tragedy

name: Tokyo Ghoul: Redrawn
description: A redrawn variant of Chapter 1: Tragedy.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Dark Souls: Redemption
description:
**Doomed by a past long forgotten, resolved to save what she once held dear.**

The flame is lit. A nameless woman wakes. Roused from the tomb by a past she cannot recall, she sets out into a barren, unfamiliar landscape. The protector follows. Bound by oath and honor, he safeguards her against the dangers that draw near with the same ferocity he does the secrets of his past. The Grey Cinders gather in their tower, called by the fire to complete their solemn duty. A colossus, incarnate of death, stirs with the bones beneath the scarred grounds. And a nightmare— torment of a bygone era—returns to exact its toll.

(Yen Press)
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Montage
description:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.
tags: Action, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Osananajimi wa Mou Yameru
description:
Since he was a child, Madoka has been in love with Tamaki.

However, high school student Madoka is always regarded by college student Tamaki as a “cute younger childhood friend” and not as an object of romantic interest.

As time goes by, Madoka graduates from high school and goes to the same university as Tamaki without telling him, and succeeds in renting an apartment next to his.

Then, Madoka begins to make a fierce appeal to Tamaki.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Office Workers, Drama

name: The Spearmaster and the Black Cat
description: After a tear in reality pulls Kagari Shuya into a white room he discovers a futuristic interface for reincarnating in a different world. After looking through the different races and skills he unlocks a new race, Lucivault, a type of vampire with none of its characteristic weaknesses. All set to start his life in a new world, Shuya is confused to discover that he is enveloped in darkness. As it turns out something went wrong when he was transported and instead of appearing where he was supposed to, he appeared in an underground cave. Shuya faces untold dangers, runs for his life, before finding his way out of the underground world. After escaping he meets his Shishou and begins to learn to fight with a spear. There is also a cute black cat named Rollo.
tags: Action, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: HOT HEADS
description: Follow the Main character "Mero" in his journey for freedom. Being betrayed in the gang he used to work for. He was sold into employment by a man who looks scarily similar to him. Seeing him work his way up the company ladder, meeting friends and foes with his team. Following his adventures of self realization, and connecting with the people closest to him. While taken down the scum of the world. With a paycheck.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Zombies, Mafia, Self-Published, Office Workers, Delinquents, Police, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Hi no Ryuu no Kuni
description: Shanley is a young girl living in the forest in a country where the legend of dragons remains. While every child in the village yearns for the legendary hero, she yearns for the "dragon". She has lived her life as straight as her longing for the dragon, but when she comes into contact with malevolence for the first time, her inner destiny awakens. A new royal fantasy that continues the legend of dragons and heroes!
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery

name: I Will Live the Life of a Villainess
description:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kawaii no wa Ore de Aru
description: Yuki, the visual representative of a famous dance influencer group with one million subscribers, had a problem. He could never maintain a relationship for long! He was immediately labeled as frivolous, suspected of cheating (even though he wasn’t), and dumped—over and over again. Even though he was dating them because he truly liked them...! One day, at a drinking party, Yuki became intrigued by a reserved and elegant girl, Yurino, who was trying to leave early. Curious, he followed her out of the venue.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Nekojiru Udon
description: Short stories about two anthropomorphic white cats who have no respect and are just plain cruel. Dark humor warning.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Tai-Chi Convergence
description:
In a world governed by Chi and dimensional hierarchies, Shinra Yamada’s life changes when he consumes a mysterious heart, allowing the entity Akuma Obscura to possess him.
Joined by Espertha Yakuzu, a vessel for dangerous energy, and Noboru Kojima, a cunning wind Chi user, Shinra embarks on a journey of self-discovery and cosmic ascension.

As he rises through six tiers of existence, from mortal to godlike, Shinra battles clans, gods, and abstract beings while uncovering the secrets of Chi and his connection to the multiverse.
Tai Chi Convergence is a tale of power, sacrifice, and the struggle to reclaim hope in a universe teetering on chaos.

(Source: MangaPlus for Creators)
tags: Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Aliens, Mystery

name: Seibetsu Fushou ni Koi wo shimashita.
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Street Fighter ALPHA
description: The story depicts the mental struggle of the main character Ryuu as he continues to fight against the "waves of murderous intent" that lie dormant in his body.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Death Monk
description:
"Let's resolve your issues."

The monk approaches the deceased, delivering them salvation and sending their souls to paradise.

Their wishes are... love, anger, hatred... a world both beautiful and sorrowful.

Where does he truly go?
What lies beyond paradise…?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Officer, Your Tail is Showing
description:
In the aftermath of the war, the world's hierarchy had been shaken up and enforced with an iron fist.
Once a high-ranking officer among the beastkin, Qing Ti ends up at very bottom—reduced to a mere plaything—and falls into the hands of her nemesis, Chen Xilan.
Just when people thought Qing Ti would be tormented to the point of wishing for her own death, the game of taming and being tamed had only started to begin.
tags: Psychological, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Monster Girls, Full Color

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Haru ni Sakura
description:
The "Kenshin Kaden" basically refers to the last extra chapter (comes after the end of the manga and after Yahiko no Sakabatou) of Rurouni Kenshin entitled "Cherry Blossoms in the Spring Time."  
  
It was published in the Kenshin Kaden Artbook.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure

name: Isekai de Kojiin wo Hiraita kedo, Naze ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken
description: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy, who possess nothing but elementary skills, is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But, his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins, and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And that’s not all, he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?
tags: Loli, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Forced to Be an Invincible Saintess
description: The true identity of the saint that is worshipped by all the people in the kingdom is actually an average boy? With the beautiful priest, the big breasted knight, and the loli doctor at the side, the road of a saintess is really difficult...
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gilded Seven
description: Keigo Westwood, nicknamed "Bullet", is a Wyoming police officer involved in the takedown of the Mexican drug cartel La Llorona. True to his name, he charges straight in and rushes through the cartel's defenses, leading to the arrest of all of its leaders. However, at that same time Yellowstone's volcano, which is said to be powerful enough to wipe out all of humanity, explodes. The earth splits, Keigo and the arrestees are swallowed up in it, and when he comes to Keigo is in the 19th century--the era of the Wild West. It is in this world, where all manner of men run free of the law, that Keigo teams up with a vengeful Abraham Lincoln in hunting down the members of La Llorona once again.
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Police, Supernatural

name: Dokushin Kizoku wa Isekai wo Ouka Suru ~Kekkon Shinai Otoko no Yuuga na Ohitori-sama Life~
description: Toshinori Dokuraba, 35 years old. A so-called single aristocrat in Japan who enjoyed a single life without wife and children, even though he was tall, handsome, highly educated and had a high income. One day, he died alone at home. However, he was liked by Hitorigami, the God of another world, and was able to reincarnate in that world. Reborn as Zirc Louren with skills and blessings from the God, he lived a new rosy life in a different world - then he turned 28 years old and enjoyed the single life again...
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Touhou & Dragon Ball - EAST VEGETA (Doujinshi)
description:
Vegeta's time machine goes out of control and he finds himself in Gensokyo. Vegeta is cool. "Fight me!" (Cirno)
An ongoing Touhou and Dragon Ball crossover series featuring Vegeta and many Touhou characters.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: In Your Shadow
description: Seishiro Sakaki leads an unremarkable college life. One day, a beautiful woman with elegant features moves in across from his boarding house. As Sakaki's feelings for her grow, his affection slowly takes a dark and twisted turn...
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror

name: Kokugensou wo Item Cheat de Ikinuku THE COMIC
description: This is the story about a bashful and inconspicuous high school student surviving a harsh fantasy world with wisdom, bravery, and very few skills. Apparently he wanted to become a hero with a magic sword, but unfortunately for him, he possesses no swordsmanship or talent for magic. The only thing he can count on is his half-baked knowledge he acquired previously from modern Japan. Now, in order to survive, he's forced to convert that knowledge of his into money. While doing so, the main protagonist will rise into becoming a secretary assistant, trade company owner who manages slave girls, knight, and a hero.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Small Sage Will Try Her Best in the Different World from Lv. 1!
description:
Kujo Yuuri, an avid player of the MMO game Elyushia Online, successfully switches to her desired sage job. However, apart from starting at level 1, she suddenly gets transported to the real Elyushia! Furthermore, she became a small child. Now she has to brave a land like the life of a video game in the hope that she will be able to return to her own world.

- Web Novel: [Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8991ct/)   
- Light Novel:  [Japanese](https://bookwalker.jp/series/174602/)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Omae wa Tsuyo sugita to Nakama ni Uragirareta "Moto S Rank Boukensha" wa, Inaka de Slow Life o Okuritai
description: Luke Othyde, the kingdom’s strongest S-rank adventurer, was executed by his own comrades for being too strong. A few months later, a man in a black helmet appears in a remote village, possessing powers greater than Luke’s. His name is Lugo. Due to his extraordinary powers, those around him view him with suspicion, but despite that, the strongest man wrapped in mystery enjoys the best slow life!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Full Color

name: "Zako ni wa Kaji ga Oniai da www" to Iwareta Kaji Level 9999 no Ore, Tsuihousareta no de Boukensha ni Tenshokusuru ~Saikyou Buki de Musou Shinagara Guild de Tanoshiku Kurashimasu~
description: Makina, a blacksmith who worked in the renowned guild “Silver Wings,” is expelled from his guild. The reason? Guild members who don’t value their weapons believed it was more cost-effective to buy them rather than employ his services. Lost and uncertain about his future, Makina receives an invitation from his childhood friend and adventurer, Aria. He joins Aria’s guild, “Rainbow Butterflies.” It’s here that Makina’s blacksmithing talents truly shine. With his weapons in the hands of guild members, they collectively rise to become the mightiest of all.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
The main character, Noah, is a reincarnated person. He was active as a sword saint in a previous life, and as a sage in another. But he’s been forced to work hard all his life, and he's sick of being a hero! One day, Noah dies and wakes up to find that he has been reborn as a prince. He had a high level of magical talent and the swordsmanship of a sword saint, but he didn't want to get busy again, so Noah pretended to be incompetent with all his might.

Then, on his 15th birthday. A skill appraisal revealed that he was incompetent (actually, he was just hiding it with his concealment skill). Noah was scorned and banished. With what seemed like a gesture of warmth, his father gave him a remote territory.

"Now I'll enjoy my second life!" Noah was enthusiastic, but he didn't know.

Actually, the territory was in the devil's forest, which is said to be uninhabitable. But his past life was more advanced compared to this one, and the level of human beings in this world was lower. Noah's ability is revealed when he helps a girl who was attacked by a monster in the forest.

"Amazing!!! Noah-sama defeated a dragon with a single blow!"
"How did this happen? Ahhhhh!"

On the other hand, the royal family also noticed Noah's ability and came to take him back, but it was too late. At that time, Noah was already being praised by the people as the lord of the Demon Forest.
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Baki Gaiden - Retsu Kaiou wa Isekai Tensei Shitemo Ikkou ni Kamawan
description:
After the events of Baki-Dou, the famous Kenpo master Retsu Kaioh wakes up in a new world unknown to him.
___
**Note:** This is the official entry, not to be confused with the Doujinshi from Twitter user @sakuramankiti.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Animals, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy

name: Zombie Papa
description:
A world overrun by zombies, and 100 chances for Ryu Min-Seok to save his daughter. But just when he's about to fail for the 100th time, he comes back to life?! 

The zombie apocalypse survival story of a father who awakens as a zombie to protect his daughter!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Acchi Kocchi
description:
Feelings may come and go, but true love always remains in the heart. Tsumiki Miniwa is in love with her best friend, Io Otonashi. For her, confessing is nearly impossible; but to her friends, they seem to be the perfect match. Cute and petite, Tsumiki comes off more as a friend, and Io's attitude toward her is friendlier than toward others. Despite the constant teasing and obvious hints that his friends have been dropping, Io always seems to miss the signs.  
  
Throughout her everyday school life, Tsumiki spends time with her friends and Io. Will she finally muster enough courage to confess her true feelings?
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Jeong-Nyeon
description:
Jeong-Nyeon has no money or education, but she is a Mokpo girl with a talent for singing! Her dream is to join a women's traditional theater company, and make it big. But she has a lot to learn and a long way to go before becoming a lead actor. Will Jeong-Nyeon achieve her dream of becoming a big star and getting rich?  
The story begins in 1956 (post-war Korea) in the southwestern port city of Mokpo.  
  
Winner of the 2019 Our Manhwa of the Year award, and is set to release as as a Drama by the end of 2024.
  
[Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/namonnamon14)  
[Artist's Tumblr](https://jinamong.tumblr.com)  
[Artist's Naver Blog](https://blog.naver.com/babomj14)
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Long Strip, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kyuuketsuki ni Kawareta Shoujo no Juunen-go
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, Vampires, Web Comic

name: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter
description:
In this world, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. 

A light-hearted comedy about N102, woh works as a maid at a maid café called *Maid For You* with Cocoa and Soda!
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kekkon Suru tte Itta Yone?
description: The main character, who promised to get married when he turned 18, looked at his family and realized "marriage is hell," but it was already too late. His childhood friend has grown up into a super duper nutjob woman he can't escape from?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sukimamono
description:
Mitsuno Hiiragi is an ordinary high school student who works part-time at a conveni, but he's troubled by a strange-looking woman with a contorted body who visits the store every night.
Desperate to do something about it, Hiiragi puts the rumor that's been going around town to the test, half-believing it, and is greeted by a mysterious beauty named Tsutsuji who calls herself the “Filler”.

“Sukimamono” (gap monsters) are strange creatures that have strayed into the human world, and it seems that Tsutsuji makes a living by “doing something” to them…
She's extremely beautiful, but no matter how you look at her, she's suspicious, shady, and just strange…!
Swept away, Hiiragi tries to find out the woman's true identity together with Tsutsuji, but…
tags: Ghosts, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Doki Doki Literature Club - Your reality (Doujinshi)
description: A DDLC fan manga where everything is same but at the same time isn't. The story follows a young boy called Michael and his friends in the literature club. One day they got an emergency and Michael with Monika will go fix it. Little did they know it was a trap.
tags: Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Magic, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Fate/Unlimited Codes - Illya no Yūutsu
description: A oneshot manga published in TYPE-MOON Ace 2, based on the "Fate/Unlimited Codes" video game.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Video Games, Magic

name: The Complete Works of Fujiko F. Fujio - Doraemon
description:
The Fujiko F. Fujio Complete Works release of Doraemon, containing previously unpublished chapters.

Doraemon is the popular masterpiece of Fujiko F. Fujio, a member of one of Japan's most famous mangaka duos (that being Fujiko Fujio; Fujiko Fujio A had no involvement in Doraemon.)  Doraemon, a cat-shaped robot from the future, travels back in time from the year of 2112 all the way to the time of Nobita Nobi, a young boy with various struggles & problems that will affect his future. Doraemon assists Nobita in saving him by letting him use useful gadgets from the future; The two become best friends & many adventures are had with their other friends, Shizuka, Suneo, and Gian.

Alternative entry. [Doraemon](https://mangadex.org/title/e36da8b0-feca-46dd-9120-d5dc2f3feae8/doraemon)
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Prince of Tennis
description:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?
tags: Comedy, Survival, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Fairy Tail x The Seven Deadly Sins Christmas Special
description: Hiro Mashima of Fairy Tail and Nakaba Suzuki of Nanatsu no Taizai team up for a special Christmas story, based on each other's work: Meliodas, Elizabeth Liones, and Hawk are visiting the city of Magnolia for Christmas, and Meliodas' offer to buy a present for Elizabeth goes awry. Upon returning from a job, Natsu Dragneel and Happy spot a suspicious visitor on the roof of their guild, which leads to an odd confrontation.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy

name: Player
description:
Through posting a "Best Comment", I somehow became the main character of a webtoon!

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000964)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2985)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2649)
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Super Vegeta Den
description:
What if Vegeta had gone to Earth instead of Goku, how would events have unfolded?  
  
Super Vegeta Den mainly focuses on the 'Z' portion of events in Vegeta's life, with a small focus on his younger years. It was a work written and drawn by Dragon Garow Lee on his blog <http://m-pe.tv/u/m/bbs/read.php?uid=syugyo&id=15&tid=6> but was never actually published or released in high resolution.   
  
Featuring entirely redrawn artwork. The Super Vegeta Den HD restoration project aims to bring this notorious little fan manga to a wider western audience to give it the attention it deserves.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Aliens

description:
One day, the high school boy, Tooru, was summoned by an aristocrat to [a world where levels rule]. Upon discovering that Tooru's level was the absolute lowest, he was then treated as a slave and trapped in a high-level dungeon. He vowed to defeat the fearsome monsters in the high-level dungeon, level up higher than everyone else, and return to his original world.

name: Busaneko ni Kaerareta Kiyowa Reijou desu ga, Saikyou no Gunjin Koushaku ni Hirowarete Kizetsu Sunzen desu
description:
Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!

"I'll have you turn into a cat, sister." Marie, the viscount's young daughter, lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!

Running away from her sister for her life, Marie, who escaped from their house, collapsed from loneliness and hunger, unable to speak. Then, a kind hand reaches out to her, "In the middle of this rain, poor thing...Would you like to come with me?" 
The figure is the "ruthless, merciless, undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.

An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness, and a happy cat life begins!
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

description: The ex-goddess Izumi spends her days looking after her little girl Mika and mommy blogging. Once the goddess of a spring, her life as a human looks very different. In this world, supernaturals and ex-supernaturals — vampires, werewolves, mermaids, and more — navigate life (and parenthood) post “happily ever after”.

As certain elements from these dreams start to manifest in his life, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery and protection of his beloved younger brother. Meanwhile, Tego is determined to surpass Endo. He dedicates himself to rigorous training, but cannot seem to catch up to his older brother. As unusual events start unfolding, the brothers must set aside their rivalry and unleash their hidden abilities to save the day!

However a white-haired, rich and handsome man, named Duanmu Xi, reveals the truth. In order to stay in the world, Yang Jinghua must become Duanmu Xi's soul image and therefore, creates a soul contract that binds both their souls.

name: Akuyaku Reijou wa Slow Life wo Enjoy Shitai!
description:
"I'm breaking off my engagement to you!"

The crown prince threw this line at Sylvie at the school's graduation ceremony, and the villainous daughter Sylvie smiled with satisfaction. With a smile on her face, she says, "Yes! I will gladly accept! I will gladly accept!" She was accused of bullying the crown prince's girlfriend, but she debunked the allegation with a brilliant alibi: "I was digging radishes in the dungeon." With the fee she had collected and her S-class adventurer's license in hand, Sylvie moved comfortably to a farm.

She is ready to start living the slow life she has dreamed of for so long! But then, the second prince, the brother of her former fiancé, arrives on the scene! It seems that he sees Sylvie as a dangerous person who is avenging the royal family, and he often stays in the house to watch over her...

description:
Hinahoshi, a world-renowned millionaire, is a collector of rare and expensive objects. The best item in his collection is Mizar, an immortal. Through dialogue, the two come to an understanding.

description: Yamato loves his little sister. His sister is the cutest and sweetest girl in the world, and he won't settle for second best. Unfortunately, everyday life and the rest of the world intrude on his idyllic plans, and he finds it's not as simple as he imagines it should be. Follow along with tough Yamato and cute Masaki as they deal with the problems of an otherwise normal family life.

description:
Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love

name: Hotel Metsäpeura e Youkoso
description: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.
tags: Comedy, Mafia, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Sugar Meets Girl!
description: Satou Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss and known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance. Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady. Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls find out about each other!?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Global Examination
description: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Survival, Adaptation

name: Ii Hito. - For New Natural Life
description: Yuuji Kitano, a college athlete newly graduated from his university, got a job in a big sports equipment corporation. He soon finds out that he is surrounded by numerous obstacles: gets involved in corporation politics of high level executives; lacks of trust from capable female coworkers; being rotated, promoted, and demoted all around; last but not least, a tough HR manager who's also his landlord. However, no matter how difficult the situation is, he is always optimistic and diligent, and his positive attitude not only motivates people around him but also touches the hearts of his female colleagues.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Hotel Helheim
description:
Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge), and after his death, he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld, Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel, and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day, Tanaka-san appears, ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant, as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel!  
  
*Originally published in Jump Square as a 3-volume series from November 2014 to September 2015, the series was later republished under the Shonen Champion Comics label from December 2019 to January 2020. The volume count reflects the republished version, as it is the only one currently available.*
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Anata ga Shite Kurenakute mo
description:
Yoshino Michi is 32 years old and married. Her relationship with her husband isn't bad. Just one thing is lacking: sex. One night, when she's having drinks with Niina Makoto, her 36-year-old senior from work, she finally opens her heart under the influence of alcohol and shares her worries about the lack of intimacy in her life. Niina reacts with a surprised face and says, while laughing somewhat lonelily, “I'm not having much luck with that either.”.
___
**Alt Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/even-if-you-don-t-do-it)
**Official French:** [Kana](https://www.kana.fr/series/corps-solitaires/)

name: Moteharune, Ashiya-kun
description:
In Kyouto, where humans and youkai coexist and spirits run rampant, a succubus named Saki attends a school transformed into a magical land. Using her beauty and abilities, she has become the school's princess!! However, there is a formidable rival who challenges her reign: Ashiya Yuu! This tough-looking man seems immune to her charms and, to make matters worse, is adored by other demi-humans! Saki, who claims to be a queen, can’t stand this situation. Determined to make Ashiya fall for her before anyone else, she devises all sorts of seductive tactics...!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67453)

name: A Tactical Genius on the Field
description: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at, it's football. Although he is a genius strategist, others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh, only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice, Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!
tags: Long Strip, Sports, Drama

name: Not found
description:
Qiao An, a student from the Battle Armor Academy’s elite class, failed the battle armor qualification test and was downgraded to the outer department's logistics class. In the post-apocalyptic world, three centuries after the fall of humanity, Qiao An, burdened with massive debt, unexpectedly discovers that he has already formed contracts with not just one, but multiple top-tier battle armors.




"Black or white, which do you choose?"

"I want both!"




With the strongest battle armors, making money becomes a piece of cake.

"Save the world? Not interested, doesn't concern me."

"What? All my debts cleared? Hey, wait a minute!"

name: Not found
description: The manga centers on three sixth graders, Yoshiki Obana, Mikoto Tajo, and Kikuri Kushida, who meet up at morning to get to the bottom of their town's "seven mysteries" as a free summer vacation project. After finishing one meeting at their "secret base", Yoshiki meets a mysterious ghost on his way home.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Adventure, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
I’ve transmigrated into the body of a princess, living on borrowed time. It’s okay, though, we can cure this illness! My goal is to lead a life where I can do whatever I want! First, I decided to rave over all of my favorite characters in the novel! But, because I am a villainess, people around me tend to be wary…

“You will die soon, and yet… how can you laugh like that?”

Well, it’s ‘cus I’m super hot.

---
When a young girl wakes up in the body of her favorite character, villainess Princess Libertia, the very first thing she decides to do is... fangirl her heart out! And why not? In a novel where all of her favorite characters are doomed to die, this is her chance to give them all a happy ending. But will the story play out as she expects when people start to see Princess Libertia in a new, forgiving light? One fangirl’s love might be what it takes to turn this villainess into a heroine!

---

description: Being an adventurer used to be the most dangerous profession in Geovora, but that changed with a revolutionary inventionbattle dolls. Kuhl spends most of his time fixing these dolls, but he's never had the coin to pull for one himself. He's too busy saving to help his sick sister. However, when he stumbles upon Anika, an unregistered battle doll with no memory, the two may be able to help each other. Together, they set off on a quest to cure Kuhl's sister and unlock the secrets of Anika's past!

Levou, the half human and half dryar who can communicate with crows, tells of their life story. Tis a tale which tells of their adventures throughout their stormy youth.

Warning! The series will contain mature elements! eg. Violence, nudity, very sensitive topics, etc. These themes won't be the main focus nor do I intend to belittle the severity of these topics, nor do I desire to offend any individuals.

name: trash.
description: The mafia boss of the Iwashi family is a high school girl named Konomi Minoko. But don't let her appearance fool you; she has done and seen things normal citizens can't even imagine. Under her control are two assassins who have gained legendary status for their deadliness and ability to get any job done. Ishikawa Rushia, codenamed Bullet, uses a modified handgun that uses a custom made hollow point bullet that explodes the target from the inside. Shirato Mine, codenamed Francesca, uses a original weapon that is a mix between a throwing axe and battle axe. Both of them are Minoko's high school classmates and seem like normal teenagers but are two of the most feared killers in the mob world who handle missions often involving other assassins and underground groups.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.

name: Help! I Had Transmigrated and My Snake Husband Pampered Me Too Much
description:
Lu Ling transmigrated into the Beast World novel that he had just read halfway through before going to bed, and became a cannon fodder, deer beast.

The current plot is that after Lu Linggang agreed to Snake Ying's "courtship" request, he would use his fiancé Snake Ying to get the winter resources.

After Lu Ling transmigrated, she couldn't bear Snake Shadow to experience the plot of being "betrayed by herself" and "ruthlessly abandoned" again.

Although Snake Shadow's departure may lead to her failure in the future, Lu Ling still decided to "break off the marriage", but she was helpless every time.

What will happen to Lu Ling?

description: Evie Ariatte, a lovely saintess candidate, has her bright future shattered when a sudden curse forces her to answer every question with the truth. This unexpected twist of fate threatens her reputation and jeopardizes her dream of becoming the saintess. As her blunt honesty earns her both friends and enemies, will Evie uncover the hidden truths of Thiendavis and bring about its perfect salvation?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Born into a ducal family, Yona was bedridden, his body ravaged by the vast magical power flowing within him. One day, he happened upon a book, one that contained the entirety of ancient magic. Among its pages was a spell: Magic to Manipulate Objects.

"If I can master this... maybe I'll be able to walk like a normal person..."

Through desperate effort, Yona succeeded in learning the magic. But soon after, a doctor informed him that he only had one year left to live. Standing on the edge of despair, Yona made a decision: as his final wish, he would set out on a journey to seek the world's legends. Yet Yona does not know, that on this journey, he will bring about miracles wherever he goes, and come to be known as a "Little Hero."
tags: Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

description:
In our current society, most porn consumers are males, we are the ones who think with our d**** many times, we worship the female body and our society, products, advertisements and many other things are centered around that. But what if it wasn't that way? What if, instead of men being the ones controlled by their sexual urges, women were the ones who bought porn magazines and had the most interest in sex? What if the moral standards between men and women were reversed?

He will make those who betrayed him pay the price...

She, the prodigious girl that stood at the pinnacle of the Global Martial Arts Competition, won the championship for five consecutive years, dominated the arena, and was dubbed the undefeatable king! He, a top tier superstar born into a wealthy family, possessed transcending beauty, was cold and black bellied, and had countless fans. When she accidentally reincarnated, as his fiancée, a sky full of blackmail material from trivial white formicas flying around, facing a world full of black fans, Lin Fan laughed coldly: If the whole world dissed her, then she’ll make the whole world tremble! Even if the wind blows against her, she would never back down!
