description:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but is in fact manipulative and calculating.

When school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought a wide-eyed goody-two-shoes like you would get up to something like that."
"If you don't want me to expose your shameful secret..."

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Past Life Destiny
description:
"I was a Queen from the Joseon Dynasty who was murdered by the royal consort?!"

Kim Minju, who suddenly remembered her past life while taking an exam. 

She was very confused when she remembered but tried to calm down because the most important thing was her college entrance examination and not her previous 
life. But the Consort, who was her enemy in the past life came to find Minju. 
And soon after, even the King who was her husband in the past life appears in front of her and puts her student life into a crisis. 

"I don't care about the past life or whatever, just please let me study!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dosanko Gal wa Namara Menkoi
description: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Hikari no Iroha (Comico release)
description: A boy was deprived of emotions and color vision in order to make him a shinobi. A stranger stretches out the hand towards him in the ruined village. His new life begins as the boy takes it…
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Ninja, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Itsuki to Haru
description: Itsuki and Haru are childhood friends. But Haru is secretly in love with Itsuki. And when he proposed to him, the latter didn’t take it seriously. Just being by his side will be enough… so Haru thought. Until one day Itsuki came to stay at Haru’s place for a week. Will all Haru's suppressed desires finally come out?!
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: TOUKO Swing-by
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Hakoiri Create
description: Rinri Kuroda is a tired office worker at an advertising production company. One day, a young lady named Hakoniri Heil comes to the seat next to her as a new employee! If you read this, you might learn a thing or two about design work!
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma

name: Kaketa Tsuki to Doughnut
description: Uno Hinako throws herself into makeup, fashion, and falling in love, hoping that will make her seem “normal” to the other people at her job. But no matter how hard she tries, she’s a self-doubting mess inside, and her attempts at “normal” romance with men just keep failing. When she starts to think she might be alone forever, a new normal presents itself in the form of her relationship with Asahi Sato, a level-headed woman who works at her company. It starts as respect, and then it becomes far more intimate. [Seven Seas]
tags: Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Onna Tomodachi to Kekkon Shitemita.
description:
Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins.  
  
[Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Nagi-kun no Okurimono
description: Koyori is a high school girl who wants her childhood friend Nagi-kun to see her as a woman instead of treating her like a little girl…!?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: New Super Robot Wars Comic Anthology - Iron Maniacs
description:
A series of short stories in the world of the videogame "New Super Robot Wars".

Along with the SRW original mecha and characters of the SRX team, we have those from:

Voltes V, Invinvible Robo Trider G7, Mobile Fighter G Gundam, Dino Mech Gaiking, Mobile Suit Gundam Char's Counterattack, Mobile Suit Victory Gundam, New Mobile Report Gundam Wing, Mazinger Z, Shin Getter Robo, Blue Comet SPT Layzner, and Brave Raideen.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Mecha, Anthology, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Military, 4-Koma, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: SUNNY 16
description: Niina Hanabusa, 16. Admired by her friends as someone who's "won in life on looks alone", she quietly carries a complex about her deep indecisiveness, unable to make choices for herself. One day, a DSLR camera falls into her hands. With guidance from Mimiri, a former idol and alumna of her school, Niina begins to awaken to the quiet joy of pressing the shutter.
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: Neko ni Hakucho, Hotaru ni Koban
description: Art teacher Hase Hotaru is confounded by one of her students, Nekome Yuna. Yuna fell in love at first sight with Shiratori Ako, a contract teacher at the same school, and she cannot do anything but pursue her. However, Ako has a quirk, the depths of which are yet unknown. A student hopelessly in love and the adults around her being yanked around. A new and vibrant work by Yodokawa that plays out with the school as the stage!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Les Misérables yori: L'Heure Bleue no Tomora e
description:
An ensemble drama based on Victor Hugo's Les Misérables, told from the perspective of the Friends of the ABC students.

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
tags: Historical, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation

name: Young Bad Education
description:
**Vol 1: Young Bad Education**

**Vol 2: Young Good Boyfriend**

Locked out of his home one day, Mizusawa runs across Takatsu, his homeroom teacher, drunk on a bench. In a stupor, Takatsu confesses he has been watching Mizusawa for three years and kisses him. Mizusawa had no interest in 37-year-old Takatsu…until that day. With a smirk on his face, Mizusawa begins teasing Takatsu about the incident, much to Takatsu's horror. But, when Takatsu starts attending marriage interviews, Mizusawa realizes he wants his homeroom teacher.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description: Playful prankster Hashibami Yoake was born with a natural talent for mischief. One night, he discovers that his naughty antics can awaken the “Queen’s Blood” in one of four alluring elf sisters. To ensure all the girls have a fair shot, their guardian grants Yoake permission to prank them every night. What wild and sexy shenanigans will ensue? All of them!
tags: Loli, Romance, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Mushihime 2: Hiruko
description: At the end of the battle, Insect Princess Kikuko disappeared along with Ryoichi. The town seemed to have regained its peace, but… Kikuko's genes continue to carry life, and finally, a new Princess is born who will bring terror to the world.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Immortal God King
description: The past life died because of the imperial concubine, and he was born again in the high school era. It coincides with the recovery of the aura and the great changes in the world. When rejuvenating a teenager, he will follow the path of his journey, and he will protect his own friends. Loved ones. When he does not choose to stay, he will push him all the way.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ningen no Kaikata
description:
**What is a *Human*?**

This is a world in which monsters and demons live. Every few years, a *Human* appears, almost as if they are reborn here.  
These *Humans* require great care when picking food for them. They become sick at the slightest change in temperature. They get hurt from the smallest of falls.  
But *Humans*, unlike Une (dogs), Nosa (cats), and Eshigu (rabbits), have a unique kind of loyalty and intelligence, and even something endearing about them...  

A diary manga about an encounter and their daily life. Along with its illustrated guide, this book is a great pickup for first-time *Human* owners!
tags: Monsters, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Tabi
description:
A collection of short stories, centered around the theme of journey.

Table of Contents
Chapter 1: Harukoma
Chapter 2: The Pine Tree Occasionally Awakens
Chapter 3: Traveling Prince
Chapter 4: Six Months' Vacation
Chapter 5: The Girl Underwater
Chapter 6: How to Wake Up Your Lady
Chapter 7: The Legend of the President's Glasses
Chapter 8: Eru's House Sitting
Chapter 9: Family Ensemble
Chapter 10: Tazaki in the Desert
Chapter 11: Taro and Tayura
Chapter 12: Ran and the Gray World Extra
Chapter 13: Toki's Journey
Appendix
Afterword
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Ghost at Noon
description: Inami, whose older brother doesn't go to school, and Kiyokawa, whose older sister doesn't go to school, both became the class pet caretakers when they were in fifth grade. Each carrying their own burdens, the two had supported each other through their daily lives. But then one day, an unexpected incident occurs…
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama, School Life

name: I want to NTR the loser heroine
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi

name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata
description:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Shishikura Erika no Chō Suiri o 10 Pēji Gaman Dekireba Meikyūiri
description: A kinda 𝓯𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓴𝔂, kinda dirty proper whodunnit. Every 10 pages is a self-contained story, so you can jump right into it at any point! Original draft by Kurayamizaka Kyuushirou. Updates irregularly.
tags: Comedy, Crime, Police, Web Comic, Mystery, Gyaru

name: Ikemen Oneko wa Haruta ni Kawaretai
description:
From Seven Seas:

Jiro Haruta has an unfortunate penchant for attracting trouble, so when he stumbles upon an odd-looking cat on his way to class, he does his best to avoid it. However, the cat not only steals Haruta's lunch, but it follows him home! And if that's not strange enough, the cat transforms into an extremely handsome man named Kanawa, who declares in front of everyone that he wants to be kept by Haruta! Can Haruta escape this cat-astrophe, or is he stuck being the proud owner of a handsome catboy?!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Are You a VillAnge Person?
description:
It is a romance story manga set in maid cafe between Tsubaki Tachibana, who never smiles at school, and Tsukushi Sugina, who happens to have the same part-time job.

___
You can support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://inadahime.booth.pm/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
description: At the beginning of A Link to the Past, a young boy named Link is awakened by a telepathic message from Princess Zelda, who says that she is locked in the dungeon of Hyrule Castle. As the message closes, Link finds his uncle ready for battle, telling Link to remain in bed. However, Link ignores his uncle's command, and after his uncle leaves, follows him to Hyrule Castle. When he arrives, he finds his uncle seriously wounded. Link's uncle tells Link to rescue Princess Zelda from her prison, giving him a sword and shield. Link navigates the castle and rescues Zelda from her cell, and the two escape into a secret passage through the sewers that leads to a sanctuary.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time manga is based off of the popular Nintendo 64 game of the same name. Young hero Link travels the world of Hyrule in search of the Spiritual Stones and encounters many friendly faces throughout his journey, including Zelda, the princess of Hyrule. The focus of Link's courageous quest is to thwart the evil king Ganondorf's plans to rule Hyrule. But when our hero is absent for seven years, Ganondorf has the opportunity to obtain the power of the gods, the Triforce.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Twisted Heroes
description:
In a world where humanity is struggling to fight off the demon threat due to the difference in magic between them, the humans choose to summon heroes from another world, hoping the heroes' unique magic can save them.
But, both the "heroes", and the world they were summoned to, are more complex than they seem...
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Maou no Musume wa, Shinitakunai.
description:
A hero who is determined to kill the demons, and the demon king's daughter who absolutely does not want to die. A life-threatening battle… who will survive!?

Originally published in Weekly Shounen Sunday 2024 No. 35.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Demons, Comedy, Gore, Fantasy

name: Violet Blossoms
description:
The story follows two high-school students – Momo Satou, a carefree student who joins the schools art class as an excuse to pursue…extra curricular activities with both her latest bo of the month and an affair with the art class teacher.
However it the other student Sumire Maezono, a withdrawn, prodigy of an art student, who has the strange habit of burning a picture after she has finished it, seemingly obsessed with achieving a piece of art that she is satisfied with, who is the main focus of this story as the two girls, Momo an Sumire, find their live strangely drawn together when Momo asks Sumire to draw a picture of her.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, School Life

name: Bokura wa Mahou Shounen
description: Kaito Odagiri is a normal fifth grade boy who can hold his own in a fight and loves to show off. This attracts the attention of Makoto Kaibara, a boy at Kaito's school who reveals to him that he can use magic, but he needs Kaito's help to protect the peace of their town. Kaito jumps at the chance of being a magic-wielding superhero, but his excitement turns to horror when he realizes that he'll be protecting the town dressed as a typical magical girl under the name Thrilling Pink. Although initially reluctant, Kaito soon discovers that there’s more to being a magical boy than simply looking cute in a skirt.
tags: Comedy, Magical Girls, Crossdressing, Fantasy

name: Seika Gakuen Joshi Suikyuubu Monogatari
description: Follow the hilarious antics and adventures of Seika Academy's girls water polo club in this amazing 4koma.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Sports, 4-Koma

name: Goshuushou-sama Ninomiya-kun
description: Shungo is a normal high school student living in a huge house. One day, his sister Ryoko sends Mayu and Mikihiro Tsukimura, two siblings, to live with him to help Mayu overcome her problem. Mayu's problem: androphobia (fear of men), and Ryoko wants Shungo to help her overcome it. How? By making Mayu and Shungo share the same room, bed, and even take baths together. To make things even worse, Reika Hojo, the student-council chair, somehow ends up becoming their maid.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: Room 207
description: What happened in room 207?
tags: Romance, Self-Published, Drama, Tragedy

name: Beyond Blood
description: Nicholas Abott wanted to act forever. When the mysterious and beautiful Elise Morin pulls him aside from a filming event, she grants his wish with a blood-stained kiss. But as Nico embraces his new vampiric power, can he also embrace the girl who turned him?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Hitohake no Niji
description: The story of Fine Art paintings whose subject is "feminine beauty" begins. Set in places such as France, Germany, the Netherlands, and Italy, it tells of the Great Masters: Lucas Cranach the Elder, Caravaggio, Velázquez, Sir John Everett Millais, Walter Ophey, etc. When the artists and beautiful women of the world intersect, a strange "colour" appears. The colour is, for example, the lustre of the rainbow. Guided by its brilliance, the seeker of beauty embarks on an endless journey.
tags: Historical, Drama, Supernatural

name: Hideout
description:
On an idyllic vacation island in the southern seas, a young couple is trying to overcome the death of their only son. But for Kirishima Seiichi, the husband, the trip has a different purpose altogether. He plans to kill his wife and dispose of her body deep inside the forest. However, when his plan goes awry and his wife manages to escape, Seiichi follows her into a dark cave, only to find himself trapped inside and soon hunted by a savage creature with an insatiable hunger for human flesh…

---

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Hideout**
tags: Psychological, Horror

name: Weeb vs. Jock
description: A popular girl meets a... strange guy in detention.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tiger Mask
description:
Naoto Date is a feared heel wrestler in America known as Tiger Mask who is extremely vicious in the ring. However, he decides to change after returning to Japan when a young boy tells him he wants to be a villain like Tiger Mask when he grows up. The boy resides in an orphanage, the same one that Tiger Mask grew up in during his childhood. Feeling that he does not want the boy to idolize a villain, Tiger is inspired to be a heroic wrestler.  
  
The main antagonists are Tiger's Cave, a mysterious organization that trains young people to be villainous heel wrestlers on the condition that they give half of their earnings to the organization. Tiger Mask was once a member of Tiger's Cave but no longer wants anything to do with them, instead donating his money to the orphanage. This infuriates the leader of the organization and he sends numerous assassins, including other professional wrestlers, after Tiger Mask to punish him.  
  
Most of the environment and characters are fictitious, but real-life pro wrestlers Antonio Inoki and Giant Baba are included in the story as well.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Mafia, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Gotcha!!
description:
A boy and his "friends" like to play hide-and-seek in a scrapyeard. When their bullying drives him to his breaking point, things take a dark turn...

Originally published in the September 1995 issue of Suspense & Horror.
tags: Oneshot, Gore, Horror, Tragedy

name: Yoshio no Seishun, Betsuri
description:
1. Kani (蟹, The Crab), Gendai Comic 1970-01-08

tags: Psychological, Comedy, Anthology, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Yonezard Monogatari
description:
This series is a precursor to Hiroshi Masumura’s Atagoal. It was serialized in Monthly Magazine Garo (月刊漫画ガロ) from May 1975 to March 1976.

The story depicts the people of Yonezard, rising up against the re-invasion of King Kurmel, who once ruled the continent of Yonezard.

Many characters in Atagoal would make their first appearances in this series (Ex. Tempura, Gilbars, and Pantsu) although their roles are significantly different in this series than those from future Atagoal publications.
tags: Action, Animals, Survival, Magic, Military, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Zettai Karen Children
description: It's the 21st century, and the number of ESPers continues to increase. They are active in the military, diplomacy, politics, and in other places. They hold the key for global competition. A country that controls ESP can control the world! However individuals who posses higher than Level 4 are less than 3% of the population. There are only three Level 7 people who have government contracts. These three are Kaoru, Aoi, and Shiho, ten-year old girls, who work for B.A.B.E.L. With the guidance of Kouichi, a twenty-year old genius, they catch criminals and evil ESPers.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: H2
description: Kunimi Hiro and his best friend Hideo were baseball wonders… Until Hiro found out his arm was permanently damaged, rendering him unable to play anymore. A frustrated Hiro goes through the trouble of specifically finding a high school with no baseball team… Only to later on find out the doctor who examined him was a quack and his arm is perfectly fine. Hiro is quick to reinstate his dream: Creating a baseball team for his school and getting to face off against Hideo in the Koshien… The number one premier league for high school baseball.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Not found
description: In the depths of the Magamaga Mountain range, dark and sinister events await all who dare to enter.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Wǒ Shì Māo
description:
It's exhausting to live as a human, so I hope I become a cat instead.

Then one day, my wish was granted?
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Tomo-chan wa Onna no ko!
description: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

description: Kaiji is visited by a godlike spirit that grants him the vast and versatile power of... knowing how to use a computer...!

description: Not found

name: Grappler Baki (Remake)
description: This is a ONE-OFF remake of Grappler Baki's chapter 1, created in honour of Weekly Shounen Champion's 50th publication anniversary. It is in two parts.
tags: Action, Martial Arts

name: Baki Gaiden: Gaia & Sikorsky - Sometimes Nomura—Two yet Three People Living Together
description: After approaching Gaia for a revenge match, Sikorsky is instead greeted with his new home...?!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Military, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Yuuenchi – Baki Gaiden
description: The story follows a dark place inside the world of the Baki series, the so-called "Amusement Park". The main character is Mumon Katsuragi, older brother of Katsumi. He ventures into a dark place where money is everything and lives are cheap, the "Amusement Park", motivated to find the killer of his mentor and master Taizan Matsumoto. The killer left a few trails behind and with his wits and physical prowess, he's been able to track him down to the ultimate dangerous fighting arena.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Shaman
description:
This is the almighty Dogeza Manga!!  
Dogeza is the act of kneeling on the ground in order to prostrate oneself until the head touches the floor. It can be a form of gratitude, apology, or prayer!  
Experience the miracles it causes with the eccentric teacher, Ogami. He is the "Shaman", a man of spiritual and a man who kneels. Don't miss this bizarre and touching masterpiece from Keisuke Itagaki.
tags: Comedy, School Life

name: Isekai Sniper wa Onna Senshi no Mofumofu Aigan Doubutsu
description: A gun otaku dies after toying with a homemade pistol that explodes in his face. In the afterlife, he is told that he will be reincarnated into another world. When the otaku wakes up, he finds that he is no longer human - he's now just some little furry thing. Near death, he comes across a beautiful warrior, who decides to take care of him because he's fluffy. However, things take a turn when he finds out that firearms exist in this world?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Seikimatsu Bakuroden Saga
description: In the world, there is a gambler here named Saga.
tags: Traditional Games, Drama

name: THE EXO-DRIVE REINCARNATION GAMES: All-Japan Isekai Battle Tournament!
description:
Being reborn in another world is a tournament sport in this hilarious, action-packed isekai series!

In the not-so-distant future, isekai is a way of life. The world has perfected how to hit an average teenager with a truck to launch them into a new world for a fantasy adventure. But once that's done, how do you keep it entertaining? Set up a televised tournament, of course! Roaring crowds can follow a chosen Hero through his death, rebirth, and quest to save another world, armed with special tech for cheat skills, stat indexes, and whatever else is needed. Surely this is all in good fun and no one would abuse this kind of reincarnation technology…!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection... and is summarily eaten. But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: The Guy Who Tried to Pick Up a Girl With a Girlfriend
description:
A guy gets more than he bargained for.

- [Original Oneshot](https://twitter.com/minori_chigusa/status/1455072509494054914)

name: Okiku-san wa Ichatsukitai
description: The centuries-old evil spirit Okiku has decided to return with one objective: flirting as much as possible with Hijiri Ryouyou - the most powerful and beautiful exorcist of modern times.
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan
description: Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo. A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt... till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Music

name: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake
description: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: HUNTER x HUNTER
description: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: So, Who Got Screwed?
description:
Kang Hyo-in has been secretly in love with his best friend of eight years, Jin Ye-geon. So smitten that he’s practically lost a screw, Hyo-in comes up with a meticulous plan to finally become Ye-geon’s boyfriend. But all his careful effort is rendered pointless when, after a one-night stand he barely even remembers, their “relationship” suddenly begins—more like Ye-geon squeezing it out of him than anything else(?)!

Wait a sec… so between the two of us, who was on the bottom last night? ... Don’t tell me—it was me?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Seigi no Mikata Seigidar
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Superhero, Gore, Horror

name: Te ni Ireta Saimin Appli de Yume no Harem Seikatsu wo Okuritai
description:
I've never had a girlfriend. The app installed on my phone was a hypnosis app that could control anyone. After testing it, the app's power was real. With this, a harem life isn't just a dream...

"Why do all the girls I target have troubles!?"

A beautiful gal, a plain girl with hidden beauty, a cool ojou-sama junior—by the power of the hypnosis app, their secrets that they couldn't tell anyone are revealed! (I just wanted to do erotic things...!) The self-proclaimed loser, but fundamentally a good-guy protagonist, ends up running around helping people!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: SUPER SUPER CHAINSAW DELUXE
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Magical Girls, Self-Published, Gore

name: Lanxi Zhen
description: Lanxi Zhen tells the story of Laojun, Xuanli, and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The battle for the throne between a loser and an elite anti-hero begins! 

Tarte is a boy who had everything - wealth, power, and talent - from the moment he was born. As he was getting ready to test his mettle in the King's Selection Exam, commonly known as the “Regal Ceremony”, which only one person can make the cut through, Figo, the son of a blacksmith whom he looked down on as a “fool”, challenged him to a duel on the school's graduation day…!?
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Sarashina Subaru-kun no Meirei wa Zettai!!
description:
"You're mine." She finds herself perched on his lap, on the receiving end of a steamy kiss. On top of that, he's carrying her bridal-style to a bed…! Hatoko's getting sick and tired of being pushed around by her childhood friend and professional model, Subaru (a.k.a. The Sadistic Prince). One day Subaru drags her along to… a photo studio!? Filling in for a model, she is forced to play the role of Subaru's girlfriend. Amid the confusion, Subaru tells her he loves her as his face gets closer to hers… How is she supposed to react when he's looking at her like that!? Her heart's hammering in her chest…!!

---

Official English : [Renta!](http://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/91008), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/5), [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Blend-S
description: At a certain café, there are many different people with unique attributes such as tsundere, little sister, etc. The new part time worker Maika has been asked by the shop owner to fill the role of super sadist?! Now, while doing her best to work hard, she also blossoms as a super sadist.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Crossdressing, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: World's Strongest Survivor
description:
"It isn't the strongest who survives. The one who survives is the strongest."

After being discharged from the military, Jin Seowoon did nothing but play games like a loser. One day, he was invited to the world of "Cloyd Survival," which resembled a game he enjoyed.

In that world were masters of martial arts, kings from other worlds, and notorious killers...

It was a gathering of monsters that surpassed human imagination.

Jin Seowoon had just one objective — to survive and become one of the top ten.
tags: Sci-Fi, Traditional Games, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Returned Warrior's Swordsmanship Broadcast
description:
"After returning from hell, the first thing I did was pick up my sword again."

Meet the Returning Warrior's swordsmanship broadcast in comic form!

[Original Novel](https://novelpia.com/novel/148845)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hatsukoi Losstime
description: Koji Aiba, who had been living a school life unrelated to girls, suddenly encounters a mysterious phenomenon called "Lost Time" where time stops for one hour a day. Takashi, who is trying to regain his youth in such a static world, meets Tokine Shinomiya, a girl with amber eyes who can also move in the stopped time. In a world where only the two of them can move, they gradually grow closer and closer, and eventually his feelings for Tokine turn into his first love. However, she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Pomegranate Face
description:
A murdered boy is buried in a flowerbed. What strange fruits may grow from his decaying flesh?

Originally published in Gakuen Mystery 26 in 1994.
tags: Oneshot, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Soushi Souai
description:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Plamo-Kyoshiro
description: The story of Plamo-Kyoshiro is about Shiro Kyoda, a young boy from Tamiya City and a student of the Bandai Elementary School. Shiro is an enthusiast of plastic model kits and "Plamo Simulation", a plastic model battle game. Shiro's dream is to become the representative of Japan in the World Simulation Tournament and be able to fight in the finals in the Battle of Hobbytopia. In addition to that, the manga contained original designs that would later inspire the Mobile Suit Variations and BB Senshi series.
tags: Sci-Fi, Traditional Games, Action, Comedy, Mecha

name: Watashi wa Futotte Imasen Kara! (Touhou Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Video Games, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Arknights: Sui's Daily Slices: Wanna Shoot a Picture?
description: Perhaps, this is a surer thing than memory could hope to be.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: New Testament - Star of the Giants
description: Mitsuru Hanagata, the genius little league pitcher. He injured his shoulder in a little league match and withdrew from baseball. His shoulder should have healed, but in a match against the a baseball club full of hooligans, he realises that his shoulder is permantly injured. He will never be able to pitch again. So he turns to becoming a genius batter instead!
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Adaptation

name: Shinyuu ni Sukina Hito ga Dekitarashii
description: Ayame was dumped by the boyfriend she was living with and decides to move in with her best friend, Ema, a free-spirited woman who secretly harbors affection for Ayame. "I want to be happy!" Seeing Ayame retain her optimism on life, Ema decides to confront her own feelings and cuts her hair short, transforming into a handsome woman who makes even Ayame's heart race!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: The story of two men living among the upheaval of early 20th century Japan. The lives of novelist Shunko Matsunaga and painter Suicho Ichiyanagi are completely engulfed by the environment of the volatile time period.
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama

name: The Charlatan’s Naming Studio
description: The hectic and eventful days of a charlatan who, by chance, ended up becoming a name-maker.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fox Spirit Matchmaker
description: In Eastern History, humans and spirits exist in this world. Fox spirits have long acted as matchmakers, holding a prestigious position among spirits. In this story, the lives of a fox spirit and a man who have both rejected the idea of true love become intertwined, and their exciting adventure begins.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Yawara!
description:
Yawara Inokuma is just another young high school girl. Well, not quite for Yawara is being raised by her grandfather, 7th dan Judo master Jigorou Inokuma, to be Japan's great hope for the women's Judo competition at the 1992 Olympics in Barcelona. All the same, Yawara just wants to live a normal life...
  
---
- **Won the 35th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1990**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Bet♧ger
description: Caio was born incredibly lucky. But in a world where gambling can "break you", even he will discover that playing with a tiger has a price...
tags: Action, Demons, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
A beautiful transfer student, Tatejima Hitode, clad in a jet-black  sailor suit, arrives in a classroom where one after another, the dead  are beheaded by a flying ski, steel doors in the subway, and a crashing  traffic light.
The only way to save the cursed high school students is  to sacrifice one of them.

“I told you, didn't I? Is the enigmatic girl  friend or foe?”

Envy and fear, love and hatred are all mixed up in this  horror story of school suspense.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Thunder City Royal
description: Rai Raitoningu was born not to long after a Great War that left is county in a fragile state, even worse his parents, the king and queen suddenly disappear one day leaving the country in chaos. Gangs and turf wars now happen all the time and Rai decides to try and stop every single one while he awaits his parents return, but something much worse lurks in the background that could destroy the whole country…..
tags: Action, Superhero, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Self-Published, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Villainess Doesn't Need a New Husband!
description:
What kind of dogs are there?

"The person who will be my groom is already dead!"

It's unfair that she died so absurdly, but she possessed the villain. And that, of course, while holding a 'soul wedding'! All he has is a sunfish body and a run-down mansion.

No, the dead groom isn't rich, but he even has debts? It's the original, it's Nabal, and I have to find my way of life first!

Meanwhile, the Duke of Fitzren came to visit her, claiming to be a close friend of her late husband. If this man touches the hearts of modern people by making warm bath water and iced americano, I think he can be a good shield to overcome this harsh world...

"Please be my fake mistress!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bad Born Blood
description:
Humanity’s home is no longer Earth. Intersellar travel is now a common occurence, and technology has replaced blood and flesh.

Luka, who grew up in the slums, has turned fifteen and taken the selection exams. His aptitude is of the Imperial Guard.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Military, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Story of a succubus that keeps trying to drain her victim, but gets filled with his food instead.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Attouteki Gacha un de Isekai wo Nariagaru!
description: Overworked Salaryman Jinta dies in a traffic accident and meets the Goddess Leafa. Due to Jinta's good karma he was supposed to be sent to Heaven, but during an argument the two of them were accidentally reincarnated to another world, much to Jinta's delight. Discovering that his Luck stat has gone beyond the maximum of 99 to 999999, Jinta plans to live his life to fullest by taking advantage of the Gacha system that this world runs on.
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Hikaru to Hikaru
description:
"Hikaru to Hikaru" is a comedy about Hikaru Katsuragi, a boy who is a descendant of the Iga ninja, sneaking into a girls' school.

In the Katsuragi family, if you don't master the secret "Kunoichi no Jutsu," which turns your body into a female body, by the age of 18, you won't be recognized as an adult, and his mother was worried about Hikaru's immature technique. In order for such a Hikaru to become a full-fledged woman, he is ordered to attend a prestigious school for young ladies, Kazami Girls' School, in the form of a woman.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, School Life

name: Trigun Maximum
description:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: The Returner’s Road to Retirement
description:
After two decades of battling extradimensional monsters and protecting the world, Lim Dae-in is finally ready to retire and enjoy a peaceful life. However, the morning after his retirement party, he wakes up to find himself back in time… before he even gained his powers. 

Armed with knowledge of the future, Dae-in is determined to secure his fortune and retire again, but this time within three years.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi, Adult Goods de Sekai wo Sukuu ~Donna Monster mo Zettai ni Ikaseru Otoko~
description:
**You've been making... nothing but adult toys?!**

Oruga Zumu, a man whose alchemy always turns everything into adult toys, is expelled from his party for **lowering the status.** However, the female knight Kuu Korosse, who appears before him, recognizes Oruga's true power.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Fantasy

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
description:
Yu☆Gi☆Oh! Arc-V centers around Yuuya Sakaki, a mysterious Entertainment Duelist known as "The Phantom" along with his three other personalities: Yuuto, Yuugo, and Yuuri. He was chased after by Leo Corporation for hacking into their Solid Vision with mass system and used it for his own purpose.  
  
While on the run, he meets Yuzu Hiiragi, the daughter of the principal of Syu Zo Duel School that was on the verge of bankruptcy and tricked Yuuya into a contract to become a teacher at her school. However, before Yuuya could teach at the school, he first must find a card called Genesis Omega Dragon that said will determine the fate of the world that also connected to his scattered memories.  
  
The story is set in alternate version of Miami City where Leo Corporation, run by its president Reiji Akaba, dominates most of Solid Vision system throughout the city. The spread of the company's Solid Vision with mass not only gave birth to "Action Duels" but also help improving the city in saving lives and repair damage in case of disaster, becoming a vital part of people's life.
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Ice Cream Kanojo
description: Except for being a little short, Kanta Date is a completely ordinary high schooler. This nobody however, managed to get a girlfriend. This girlfriend is a real poker-face and to the world, seems cold as ice. However, just for Kanta, she is really sweet. Different from her outward appearance and sweeter than sugar, she always manages to overwhelm Kanta.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Apple With A Human Face
description:
A family drives into the countryside to pick some apples, when, to their horror, they discover that the fruits have human faces...

Originally published in the January 1998 issue of Suspense & Horror.
tags: Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gotou-san wa Furimukasetai! (Pre-serialization)
description: Gotou-san, the prettiest girl in school, tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun, who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him, but Maeda, who lacks self-confidence, doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: A Transparent Girl with Visible Thirst
description:
You can't see her.
But you can feel her.
And she wants to be loved, completely.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: A lewd yuri oneshot based on characters originally featured in [The Bones of an Invisible Person](https://mangadex.org/title/0717cb7b-b36f-49df-baa5-70a8006099b7). (Unknown if part of the same canon).
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love

name: Underboxer
description:
Lee Ki-joo realized that to escape his miserable life as an outcast, he needed a girlfriend. But the girl he fell for at first sight just happened to be the daughter of a boxing gym owner.

While trying to turn his life around by getting a girlfriend, Lee Ki-joo instead begins to fall for the true charm of boxing in the ring.

“Endurance doesn’t just come naturally!”
 
The story of an outcast’s life-changing journey through boxing!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Whimsy Whimsy Witch
description: A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
**That day, the sky split and the world collapsed.**

Nekohana Natsuki, who was standing directly beneath the rift, blacked out.
When she came to, five years had already passed.

Civilization has crumbled, and monstrous beings known as igyou prowl the ruined earth, preying on humans.
When Natsuki is attacked, a strange voice speaks inside her head:

"Use me to your heart's content."
"Reduce everything to ash."
"My black flame."

Thus begins the journey of the world’s cutest boy across a devastated world!
**An action-packed supernatural battle saga fueled by a mysterious dark power.**

(Source: Manga UP!, edited)
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: After the Tale
description: Saya suddenly loses a year's worth of memories. She begins living with her guardian, a man called Touji, but she can't shake the feeling that there's something off about who she used to be...
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kaiki! Shinin Shoujo
description:
A Shoujo version of The Living Corpse that was later adapted into the film "Dead Girl Walking".

On  her yearly health checkup Yuri Ohara receives a terrifying diagnosis: she has zero brainwave activity, no respiratory function, and no pulse. She is dead...but she is still alive...
tags: Philosophical, Horror, Tragedy

name: Mogusa-san
description:
High school boy Koguchi Torao sees Mogusa Minori, a quiet, reserved girl in his class, walk into the restaurant run by his family and order an unbelievable amount of food, and even more surprisingly, sees that she keeps unagi pie (a sweet biscuit made with powdered eel) in her wallet?!  
  
The story revolves around Koguchi and Mogusa's meetings in daily life and Koguchi's observations of Mogusa's unbelievable (and quite eccentric) eating habits.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Dokyuusei no Oshi Sakka ni Yuri Mousou ga Bareta Kekka
description: What happens when a classmate finds out about another girl's secret yuri obsession/feelings? A yuri comedy ensues!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mazumeshi Elf to Yuuboku gurashi
description:
Suzuki Saburo is the typical isekai MC. A high school boy who started to get into cooking after getting an injury during baseball, he suddenly found himself in another world one day. With the only thing on his person being his custom knife, he wandered a desolate prairie for three days before falling unconscious.   
  
When he woke up, he found that a nomadic tribe of elves took him in. However, there’s one big problem - the tribe has terrible cooking. Can Saburo help teach the nomadic elves the true meaning of deliciousness?  

---
**Links:**  

-  Alternative Raw: [Pixiv Comics](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3951)
tags: Time Travel, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Gakuen Kishi no Level Up! Level 1000 Koe no Tenseisha, Ochikobore Class ni Nyuugaku. Soshite,
description: Soma, who reincarnated with the memory of the previous life, was awakened to the rare ability "trial and error" that can confirm the skill level numerically, and thanks to that, he was able to raise various levels evenly. At the entrance ceremony at the knight training school that I admired, the student's skill level and skill level are judged and classified, and the top class "Soryu (Blue Dragon)" is certain if it exceeds the total skill level "200". The thing is however, the total level of Soma at this time was "1012", which should have been far above the margin, but the judgment machine was a specification that could not measure the 4-digit level!! As a result, it was wrong even though it was the academic ability of the top grade. Soma enters the problem child class by judgment, but with the skill of "trial and error", Soma causes a big revolution in the aristocratic school!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Teni Muhou - Musashibou Benkei
description:
Once upon a time a thousand years back from now, there was a legendary man that trembled Japan, in the era of peace.

The man was Musashibou Benkei. Spending his time as a priest soldier under control of Honen of Mount Hiei, he started to feel the emptiness of his own overwhelming power somewhere down the line. One day, Honen descended the mountain with his armed priests including Benkei. And Benkei happened to see...

Why he was born, how he should live? Only heaven knows the meaning of his life. It is an unprecedented saga of a man with passion for Japanese people.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ninja, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Once Again, as Clouds Part
description: Kaede Momose leaves the hustle and bustle of Tokyo for a new life alone in the mountains. On his first day there, he goes to greet his neighbor and meets Riku Tsukumo, who also lives alone in the mountains. Clean air and mountain fare; so begins a cozy mountain-life romance!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Tensei Shite mo Neko wa Neko
description: A story about a cat reincarnated in a different world where there are no cats.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Secret Class
description: Dae Ho, who became an orphan at the age of 13, was adopted by his father's friend. However, Dae Ho in adulthood knew nothing about the relationship between men and women. Aunt and sisters decided to give pure Dae Ho a secret class…
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Incest, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Shota, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: One + One
description: The innocent and independent Mian Hua and the cautious and conservative Lan Bao. The two people met coincidentally while one was renting a house. What kind of love sparks will emerge from two people who have very different worldviews, values, ​​and outlooks on life? From the same creator of the fluffy love story <One Minute Underwater>, Bao-Ah. How will she utilize her elegant writing style and an adorable plot to create a “next-door neighbor” type of romantic drama set in Hong Kong…~
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Full Color

name: Oruchuban Ebichu
description: A very unique, funny manga that follows the exploits of Ebichu, a talking female hamster with a dirty mind. This manga includes sexual dialogue, some nudity, and the occasional sex scene. There's also some violence against hamsters. It's all pretty lighthearted, but if any of this stuff offends you, don't read it.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Sexual Violence, 4-Koma

name: The Strongest Manager
description: Former special agent Pi Bora becomes the manager of the rotten, trashy singer Choi Kang ! However, she is his biggest fan. Is she a manager or an instructor ? A ruthless manager's project to revive a trashy singer !
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Akuyaku Reijou no Tsuihougo!
description: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator
description: Chen Fan died in the midst of divine tribulation, having reached the pinnacle of the cultivation world in less than 500 years. Somehow, despite the loss of his cultivation base, he was able to return to his youth as a high school student living on Earth. He decided to once again tread the path to immortality, armed with the knowledge he had gathered in his past life, to overwrite his past mistakes, remove his lingering regrets, and set a firm spiritual foundation that will guarantee success in his inevitable attempt to once again ascend to another plane of existence.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kimi Arite Shiawase
description: Set in the Taisho era, Kurasawa Heigo, the son of a trading company president, reunites with Sakaguchi Isamu, his childhood friend from 10 years ago. They both used to play together like brothers but now they are master and servant. Heigo is left feeling lonely because of Isamu's now unfamiliar politeness. In order to restore their past relationship, Heigo tries to treat Isamu not as a servant but as a friend instead. However, one day, Isamu discovered old love letters addressed to Heigo from a man. Heigo was upset by this discovery and when Isamu comes to hold him in his arms, he whispers... "I will never tell anyone about this. So, please let me be the only one you open up to about this worry..."
tags: Historical, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Not found
description:
10 years ago, after “the Gate” that connected the real world with the monster world opened, some of the ordinary, everyday people received the power to hunt monsters within the Gate. They are known as “Hunters”. However, not all Hunters are powerful. My name is Sung Jin-Woo, an E-rank Hunter. I’m someone who has to risk his life in the lowliest of dungeons, the “World’s Weakest”. Having no skills whatsoever to display, I barely earned the required money by fighting in low-leveled dungeons… at least until I found a hidden dungeon with the hardest difficulty within the D-rank dungeons! In the end, as I was accepting death, I suddenly received a strange power, a quest log that only I could see, a secret to leveling up that only I know about! If I trained in accordance with my quests and hunted monsters, my level would rise. Changing from the weakest Hunter to the strongest S-rank Hunter!

---

description: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

description:
His feelings for his best friend changed from platonic into romantic.
Ainosuke could no longer suppress his feelings for his classmate and best friend, Hibe.
Determined to confess today, Ainosuke dozes off at school and dreams of having sex with Hibe for some reason...!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: Akazukin-kun no Shuuchaku
description: A girl named An, who dreams of prince charming, one day finds a mysterious book in the school library. When she opens the pages, the characters from the Grimm fairy tales sealed within the book are unleashed...!?
tags: Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: Laurels of Sand
description: Nanashima’s high school baseball team missed going to the Koshien by one heartbreaking game during his 2nd year in school. Now as a 3rd year and the team captain, he sees that the team is nothing compared to last year. The all star starters from last year have graduated and Nanashima is left with unskilled and, more importantly, unmotivated players that have no shot at making the Koshien. That is when Mr. Toku, an old man in the neighborhood who has watched every practice and every game the school has ever played for the past few decades, secretly entrusts Nanashima with 10.000.000 yen. Mr. Toku wants Nanashima to use the money however he wants to ensure the team makes it to the Koshien. But that large of an untraceable fund is too big of a responsibility for a high school teenager and even a goodhearted kid like Nanashima might fall into its temptation.
tags: Sports

name: Ouji-sama no Dakimakura
description:
Mahiro, the head of the disciplinary committee, is assigned to take care of Asuma, the most tardy student in school. Rumor has it that Asuma will never wake up once he falls asleep, no matter what you do. This makes Mahiro worried, but eventually, they become roommates...

One morning, when Mahiro tries to wake up Asuma, who is fast asleep, he is suddenly pulled into his bed! Asuma, who was not supposed to fast asleep, wakes up with a start and says, “It looks like I can wake up when I hug Mahiro-kun!!”

Since then, Asuma has become very attached to Mahiro, and the distance between them is gradually growing closer...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Matsuri Kenbunroku
description:
Teora is a traveler who visits mysterious festivals all over Japan. At the festival she visits this time, where “girls search for a bell out of a large amount of food”, unexpected turmoil ensues…?

With the help of these overly independent organs, Ye Qing advanced rapidly on his cultivation journey. While others were busy cultivating, comprehending, and breaking through, his organs had already paved the way for him. However, because his organs had too many of their own ideas, Ye Qing frequently encountered some 'small' troubles.

One day she makes a wish: "I don't want to be here…", and finds herself with the ability to turn invisible. This is the story of how one girl takes back her own pain and her chance at a normal life.

But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

He saved Yana at the entrance ceremony and the latter fell for him immediately! Yana never stops yapping about his love day in and day out for Metsuki, who's tired of all this crap. So he asked Yana if he could kiss him like they do in shoujo manga. And...?!

Emeichi's newest, love story between two clumsy high school boys starts here!!!

There are no people on the main street, the stores sing with old birds, and the fields are desolate and completely obsolete. As a result of the investigation, it seems that the aristocrats have rebelled. If nothing is done, the country will be destroyed in my place... Even though I have a position where I can enjoy luxury! I will definitely rebuild this country! First of all, gather excellent human resources. Even if it's the Demon King ... The greatest prince of all time ... The savior of the kingdom? I'm just making money for myself. From "Become a Novelist," the popular fantasy of rebuilding the kingdom!

When I woke up, I had been reborn as a baby. My mother passed away and I was neglected by my father. Even though I was born in a Marquis family, my life started on HARD MODE. But I won't be discouraged. I will eat well, sleep well, move a lot, get whatever I can get and live happily. But for some reason, a lot of incidents happen. This is a story of a little girl with the power to create barriers in a world where the Hollows and Humans are in conflict. She gets other people involved in those incidents and becomes happy.

name: Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou
description:
The story is set in future Japan, in which the sea level has risen and flooded many of the coastal areas and Mt. Fuji has erupted within living memory. 
The population has been considerably reduced and political and technological institutions have broken-down. 
Local communities have become nations and telephone and television no longer exist (although coffee vending machines and streetlights stubbornly continue to work). 
There are strange new animals and plants (like flying fish and glowing streetlight trees).  
  
The remaining people have adopted a slower-paced, simpler way of life and rely more on each other. Along with the human population are some intelligent, humanoid robots. 
One of the robots, a female named Alpha, runs a café by the same name in the country outside of what remains of Yokohama. 
With her trusty motor scooter and her camera she travels around the area making friends with the humans and robots, 
having new experiences and observing the passage of time.  

---  
- **Won the 2007 Seiun Award for Best Manga**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Sweet Home Mofumofu Tanuki Kyoudai to Kazoku ni Narimasu

The corporate slave meets a pair of fluffy brothers?!
Hinata Chihiro is the so-called “corporate slave” who works for a black company. Today, after buying a convenience store box meal, as usual, he arrived home late at night just to find a lost kid wandering near his house?! Chihiro then welcomes the adorable small tanuki, Rio, and his tsundere older brother who hates humans, Itta. And that’s how his life with the fluffy tanuki brothers, who were driven out of their natural habitat, begins…!

Fried, who was supposed to be dead, wakes up next to a demon girl who calls him the demon lord for some reason. After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom Oiria. Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. All visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes.

name: No Game No Life Chapter 2 - Eastern Union Arc
description:
A new serialization to comicalize volumes 2 and 3 of the novels!

The internet is full of rumors about the Neet and Hikikomori genius gamer siblings Sora and Shiro. The two go as far as to refer to the world as a "shit game", but then one day a young man calling himself "God" summons them to parallel universe. There, God has forbidden war, and "everything is to be settled with games". Yes, even the national borders. Driven into a corner by other species, the 'human species' is down to its last city. Can Sora and Shiro, these related failures of society, become the saviors of humankind in this parallel world?

name: Amber Alert
description:
Tennessee, a hitman for hire, has stayed true to himself and his past, which has left him at the bottom of the ethics ladder. His life is monotonous, but he has no problem with it. That is, until he unintentionally kidnaps a young child with wildly flowing black hair in a stolen car...

*“Put it in your mouth.”*

Take it all the way down your throat. Without shame, dignity, or self-respect, Amber climaxed, naked and exposed under Tennessee’s gaze. But Tennessee's lips were as firmly locked as before. Still, Amber reminded himself that he had never lost a single battle against Tennessee. It may not have been a victory won fair and square, but isn't a loss by submission still a loss?

What a cold-hearted man. The victory was mine.

**Original Novel:** [RIDI](https://ridibooks.com/books/3049005297), [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/detail/amberalert), [Mr Blue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/viewcommz0083), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/detail.asp?series_num=920016600)

Ogura Saki is a lone-wolf yankee determined to make a name for herself in high school, until Oguri Yuka, the class sweetheart, keeps getting in her face.
Saki thinks Yuka is irritating, but a chance incident reveals Saki’s secret: she’s terribly ticklish.
