name: Amarimono Isekaijin no Jiyuu Seikatsu ~Yuusha ja Nai no de Katteni Yarasete Moraimasu~
description:
Shinichi Sagara, or Shin, works in a corporate sweatshop when he's swept up in an off-world transport meant to bring heroes. Transported to the Kingdom of Tondemo, where they exploit these off-world heroes' abilities, Shin's quick to sense something amiss and flees to another kingdom to begin a happy idle life in a mountain village. One day, Shin meets a nobleman that's locked up in a remote part of a lord's mansion. Will this completely change that quiet life in the countryside?!

(Source: Alpha Manga)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Noroma Mahou to Yobareta Mahoutsukai wa Juuryoku Mahou de Musou suru ~Mada Juuryoku no Gainen no nai Sekai nite, Shounen wa Banyuuinryoku no Ou to naru~
description:
Wade, a boy born in the slums and raised by terrible parents, finds a glimmer of hope when he becomes an apprentice adventurer. Enduring grueling training, he's promised to be taught magic if he perseveres. On the day of his fateful magic instruction, while others are granted promising fire and water magic, Wade receives what seems like the worst of luck—a magic called "Slow Magic." In despair upon realizing it's a spell that makes him clumsy, Wade recalls memories of his past life as a corporate s*ave.

"Huh? 'Slow Magic'? That sounds like gravity magic, a powerful spell!"

Yes! In this underdeveloped world, where the concept of gravity is largely unknown, Wade is underestimated. Determined, Wade faces his newfound gravity magic head-on. Increasing his own weight boosts his attack power, while being lighter makes him more agile. He can even float lighter than air and pseudo-create objects by manipulating gravity’s focal point. Thus, despite ridicule, Wade uses gravity to overcome those who mock him, defeat goblins, and even topple boss monsters.

Teaming up with a fellow unpopular magic user and a boy aspiring to be a hero, Wade delves deeper and deeper into dungeons in search of thrilling battles against the strongest foes.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
Hanami Matsudai is awkward when it comes to love and she doesn't know the proper distance for human relationships. You might as well call her a misanthrope. Her peaceful life is disturbed when she meets the unpredictable Ran Ojiya who just won't leave her alone!  
  
The slapstick love comedy of an aloof and love-hating loner girl and a love-crazed handsome stalker begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Hoteru e You Koso ~Mazoku de Yuusha na Saikyou Ane-tachi Kara Dekiai Sarete Komattemasu~
description: Richii's parents died in an accident when he was in junior high school, leaving him alone with his doting sister Towa. Three years later, his sister also disappears, and even Riichi is summoned to another world where he is reunited with his sister. In the other world, Towa has become the most powerful hero!
tags: Demons, Romance, Incest, Harem, Isekai

name: Narukawa-kun wa Nakasaretakunai
description: A new era of adolescent love between an innocent girl who's a dom and a headstrong boy who's a sub!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description:
**Learn the Pokémon TCG the Fun Way, with Manga!**

This guide-manga makes the brand-new Pokémon Card Game: Scarlet & Violet easy to learn.
Meet rookie players Retsuto and Retsuhito. Follow their adventures, enjoy the comics, and watch your own Poké-card skills soar!

(Source: Amazon Japan, edited)
tags: Traditional Games, Monsters, Action, Animals, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A girl with foresight is sent to live with her cold, villainous uncle after her mother’s death.

Determined to save him from a dark future, she clings to him only to find roles reversed as he grows emotionally dependent. 

With a possessive childhood friend and a desperate father added to the chaos, her simple mission spirals out of control.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tomodachi no Nee-chan ni Nerawarete Shimatta Hanashi
description:
Kouhei is a highschool student. His friend, Yuudai has a big sister, who is rumored to be a total slut, stealing someone's boyfriends and sleeping with anyone.

But Kouhei finds out that she's…
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy

name: Human Weapon Katsuo!
description: The protagonist Hamada Katsuo, is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school, so he wants to escape from his loser days, the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now, because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region, even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive…? Find out.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Killing Stalking
description:
Yoon Bum, a scrawny quiet boy, has a crush on one of the most popular and handsome guys in his university, Sangwoo. One day, when Yoonbum's obsession towards Sangwoo reaching its peak, Yoon Bum decides to enter Sangwoo's home. But what he saw inside was not the Sangwoo he had dreamed of.  
  
First Prize winner of Lezhin's 2nd World Comic Contest.

[Official English 2](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/killing-stalking/)
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Nobunaga Concerto
description:
History classes have never interested Saburo. He never saw the point of learning something that happened in the past, let alone a few hundred years ago. But when he falls off a wall, he travels through a wormhole and ends up in 16th century ancient Japan. He meets a very young Oda Nobunaga, one of the most influential figures in Japanese history, who turns out to be identical in appearance as Saburo. The real Nobunaga, sick of the castle life and wanting to travel, orders Saburo to take his place. Without knowing how to get back to his time, Saburo tries to make sure history isn't rewritten for the infamous Oda Nobunaga.

---
- **Won the 57th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Drama

name: Not found
description: After being ambushed by the Demonic Cult, Goheon Dok and Hyeonjo, his close friend from Mount Hua, are cornered and on the verge of losing their lives. Before they're both killed, Hyeonjo hands Goheon the Plum Blossom Spirit Beads, a sacred relic of Mount Hua that causes Goheon to take possession of the body of Muhwi, an apprentice of Hyeonjo. Now, as a Senior Disciple of Mount Hua, Goheon Dok must fight to protect Mount Hua and fulfill his friend's dying wish.
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Enji no Asobi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Action, School Life, Web Comic

name: Leonids
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Touhou Suzunaan ~ Forbidden Scrollery.
description: Touhou official comic published by Kadokawa in Comp Ace that began publishing on October 26, 2012. The story is written by ZUN, with illustrations by Moe Harukawa. It introduces a human book renter and collector Kosuzu Motoori as the main character, with the story centered around her mysterious ability to decipher any book no matter the language or script, and her assortment of various rare and dangerous demon books.
tags: Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Bloodsucking! Black Magic Castle
description: Seventeen year old Aya is the perfect high school student. Good grades, popular and sports prodigy. She is looking forward to summer break as her pen pal has invited her to his family ranch, but one day on the way home from school she hears a voice calling her name from....
tags: Monsters, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gabai
description: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…
tags: Historical, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
description:
Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. 

But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kirawaremono no Tenisha wa, Demodotta Isekai de Dekiaisareru
description:
Thirteen-year-old Towa, suffering from a severe case of "Chuunibyou" syndrome, is suddenly transported to another world. Although he is a rare foreigner in the new land, he has yet to manifest his "gift"—a unique ability granted only to otherworlders. To hide his lack of powers, he puts on an arrogant front, which ended up pushing away even the person he secretly admired, his own guard knight, Griz. One day, he was attacked from behind. "I’ve been killed!" he thought—only to wake up back in his original world.

Fifteen years passed, and he lived a mundane life as an ordinary office worker, haunted by memories of Griz. Then, he suddenly found himself lost in that other world once again! Determined to live a quiet life this time, but for some reason, Griz, whom he's reunited with, keeps closing the distance between them...?
tags: Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: Summer Ghost
description:
"Have you heard of Summer Ghosts?"

Tomoya, Aoi, and Ryo are high school students who met through the Internet. The urban legend of the Summer Ghost is that it is a ghost of a young woman who appears when fireworks are lit.

Tomoya is unable to step out into the life he wants. Aoi is unable to find her place in the world. Ryo's bright future is suddenly closed to him. Each of them has their own reasons for meeting the Summer Ghost. On a summer night when life and death intersect, where will each of their thoughts go to?
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
The protagonist wakes up to find that they are reborn as an alien creature inside asci-fi survival video game.

In order to survive in a strange, foreign world, they must use their knowledge of the game and evolve until the final stage.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Web Comic, Aliens, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!
description:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
A ninth-grade civil servant, Seo Jihoon, only ever wished for a long, quiet, and peaceful life. 

But after being fatally stabbed by a violent petitioner, the place where he opened his eyes again was none other than a martial world where martial arts truly existed. Even there, he only wanted to live quietly… Until he encountered the one man he should never have crossed paths with. 

“Choose. Die here, or become my disciple.” 

An old man who pressed a blade to his throat without warning. His true identity, the cult leader of the Heavenly Demon Sect. Thinking survival comes first before anything else, Seo Jihoon had no choice but to become part of the Heavenly Demon. Once a capable public servant, he grew into an unrivaled talent within the sect, armed with powerful martial arts and sharp intellect.

But why does the work keep piling up? Why does he keep getting promoted?! His original goal was simply a peaceful life, yet somehow, his second life is racing down the path of the Heavenly Demon. Will he ever be able to find the life he truly desires in this world?

(Source: MangaUpdates)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shu yo, Omukae no Jikan desu
description:
Is my adorable little nephew the reincarnation of the demon king Lucifer?!"

Chris, a picture book author, takes in his nephew after the loss of his brother and sister-in-law during an accident. Noah is a strange and eccentric child with the ability to communicate with animals. One morning, overwhelmed with his new parental situation, Noah jumps into the road?! However, the person who saved Noah before it was too late was Harvey-sensei, the nursery school teacher, a demon with black wings and horns!! Revealing his true identity, the demon kneels down saying, “I have come to take you back, Lucifer-sama.”, announcing that Noah is the reincarnation of the demon king?!
tags: Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Wife of a Spy
description:
On the eve of the Pacific War.

Fukuhara Yuusaku, a Kobe-based trader, goes to Manchuria in search of supplies and discovers a startling national secret.

Yuusaku, out of a sense of justice, decides to disclose it to the world, but his wife, Satoko...

A romance/suspense hidden in the fires of war.

Winner of the Silver Lion at the 77th Venice International Film Festival.
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Military, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
He is recognized as the strongest existence, standing at the top of the world.  
  
Wealth? Fame? Power? It was not worth mentioning in his eyes.  
  
The strongest apostles fled and startled the human continent for the reason: "Don’t get me wrong! Lao Zi came to look for his future wife!"  
  
Yes, it’s a story about the strongest single apostle ever looking for a wife.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: My Fake Love
description:
A high school girl, Rai, secretly has a crush on her childhood friend, Do-gyeong.
To hide her feelings, she pretends to be an idol fan.

Just when she couldn't give up on either her one-sided love or her fangirling—her favorite idol transfers to her school?!
With Neulchan’s transfer, the relationship that seemed unchangeable begins to shake.

"We're just friends, so why are you jealous?"

A summer-lit school romance about a childhood friend turning into a girlfriend!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Full Color

name: Tsukazu Hanarezu
description: Reunited with the girl I liked back in school! After listening to her vent, things started to heat up! Could this be my big chance, 10 years in the making!? A 20-page love story brought to life by a skilled artist!!Originally published in Weekly Young Magazine on Jan 6 2023
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers

name: Jujutsu Literature Club
description:
Ever thought, what if jjk characters were swapped with completely unrelated ones ? if the answer’s yes, then I guess my 'manga' is worth checking out. This story happens after the 2 act of doki doki literature club, just after sayori's death.
(This manga is heavely inspired by jujutsu kaisen, gege akutami's manga and it represent doki doki literature club's characters).
tags: Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: My [Repair] Skill Became a Versatile Cheat, So I Think I’ll Open a Weapon Shop
description: It’s hard for Luke to make a name for himself as an adventurer with all the competition—especially when he’s a perpetually low-ranked adventurer whose only skill is [repair]. But when Luke is abandoned by his party and uses that same [repair] skill to survive and escape the dungeon, a new world of possibilities opens up. Suddenly, his despised skill allows him not only to survive but to stand out in a crowded field!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Lens no Mukou no Megami-tachi
description:
“I love gravure photography, that's why!”

Meiko, who admires the miraculous gravure idol Runa, by a twist of fate, decides to take on the GVF (Gravure Venus Festival), the gateway to becoming a top gravure idol! She asks her childhood friend Takafumi to be her photographer…
___
**Storyboarder:** [siou](https://mangadex.org/author/3f50a963-8e3a-4ccb-a716-ece0413ad502)
**Producer:** [Digital Shokunin](https://mangadex.org/author/ca715d41-e95d-4529-9123-765318d85acb)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/72543)
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Anan-san wa Deatte 3-byou de Gattai shitai!
description: Anan, an office worker who's only experience with men comes watching porn, tries to win over her boss and love interest, Dept. Chief Kitazono, but fails at every turn. In fact, Kitazono is also a virgin with zero romantic experience...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers

name: Dancing With You in the Snowy Night
description:
Reincarnated as Snow, the main character in the fairy tale-themed otome game “Fairy Tale Fantasia,” “I” awkwardly scramble to prevent my favorite villainess, Lady Mary, from being expelled...

(translated from ichijin-plus.com's synopsis)

A oneshot published in the December 2023 issue of Yuri Hime.
tags: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Houkago no Goumon Shoujo
description: After years of being unlucky with girls, Ishimaru Daito only wishes to enjoy his high school life with a normal, cute girlfriend. However, after losing a game to his two new seniors Sasahara Kiyoka and Tomochika Asami, he is forced to join the <Humanism Studies> club which is actually a torture studies club. Will Ishimaru get the normal high school life he always wanted?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Not found
description:
A twisted romance about a former high school student who accidentally cursed his (already taken) crush. The girl was forced to regularly swallow his semen or suffer and die, all despite having a boyfriend.
Ten years after this bizarre ordeal, the high school student is now a working adult and struggling in a sexless marriage with another woman. Just as he wants to come clean with his feelings, he has an unexpected reunion.

(Manga Mogura)
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, School Life

name: InuYasha
description:
Kagome is a modern Japanese high-school girl. Never the type to believe in myths and legends, her world view dramatically changes when, one day, she's pulled out of her own time and into another! There, in Japan's ancient past, Kagome discovers more than a few of those dusty old legends are true, and that her destiny is linked to one legendary creature in particular–the dog-like half-demon called Inuyasha! That same trick of fate also ties them both to the Shikon Jewel, or "Jewel of Four Souls." But demons beware…the smallest shard of the Shikon Jewel can give the user unimaginable power.  
 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/inuyasha)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media


---
- **Won the 47th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2002**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Offline Love
description:
Mei, a shy girl who gave up on real friendships, found comfort in chatting with AI characters. But when the conversations vanish, she's suddenly told to make them all fall in love with her… and worse? They're starting to appear in her real world

 🛑 This story is entirely fictional and meant for entertainment purposes only. It is not recommended to rely on AI for relationships Or even use it.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kill The Lively Girl
description: In Muntinlupa City, Philippines, 2025. On a rainy midnight, from her office building, Chevalyn Luna learns of another murder. The news reveals a pattern too precise to be coincidence: every two years, on March 13, a former classmate is killed. The cycle has already claimed three lives. She is certain she won’t be next, after all, no one held a grudge against her and by the pattern, the next killing is still two years away. Later that night, she spots the only other figure on the street, her former class president, Andrea White.
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Pen Pal at the End of the World
description: In a post-apocalyptic stationery store, a girl and a former animator exchange letters. A dystopian correspondence story.
tags: Oneshot, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Philosophical, Drama

name: Wicked Spot
description:
Sada is a modern-day witch who is tired of living quietly deep in the mountains. In fact, she wants more attention! Why can't witches be known by humans?!　

This is a story of modern “witches” who break the curse and live freely and uninhibitedly!
tags: Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Batsuichi Kitsune to Tabi Gohan
description: Berry, a dog-fox beastman, has a failed marriage and leaves her hometown to become a chef. During his journey, Ozzy, a cat-beastman, falls from the sky. He was once famous as the leader of a hunting party, but he is the only survivor and continues to hunt on a small scale. This is a beastman story that depicts the rebirth and hope of two people who have both suffered from trauma.
tags: Animals, Survival, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Orient
description: The fantasy series takes place during Japan's Sengoku Period, where Japan is ruled by Demons. A 15-year-old boy named Musashi will stand up to the demons with the help of a certain special power.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Noble Witches - 506th Joint Fighter Wing
description: "Noblesse Oblige" - The obligation of nobles. This addition to the World Witches franchise focuses on the 506th Joint Fighter Wing; a squadron of witches tasked with protecting innocent people from the Neuroi following the liberation of Gallia. These Witches are referred to as the "Noble Witches" because of their social status and their dedication to serving the needs of the less fortunate.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Magical Girls, Adventure

name: Isekai ni Shoukan Saretan da kedo, Nandemo Kireteshimau Kennou o Te ni Ireta no de Easy Mode deshita.
description:
With the divine power known as the ability "Ripper", unrivaled in its might!

During a class, Haruki Ito, along with all his classmates, is summoned to another world. One day after the summoning, Haruki discovers the power that has been bestowed upon him...?!
___
**Character Designer:** [Iso Kazunari](https://mangadex.org/author/e464e568-e9c2-4a93-82cd-f9507121a50d)

[Web Novel Raw](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3031gx/)
tags: Action, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
The story follows the High-schooler Futsu Jintarou, whose confession was rejected by his crush.

His misfortune continues, as news of a gender-change disease turns Jintarou into a beautiful silver haired girl. The shock of it causes him (her) to try to escape from reality by playing the VRMMO, Clan/Clan…

His game character Taro uses the same girl appearance as in the Real and the Alchemy skill, which most players call a trash skill.  
He meets lots of fellow adventurers, and becomes stronger within the game world of Clan/Clan’s slogan, ‘When one becomes an adventurer, they can fight, steal, control, explore, invent, create, and do anything as they like’.

He meets a wide variety of adventurers that help him (her) grow, Taro hides what happened to his (her) appearance as a bug to his friends who also play the game, and hides the fact that he (she) had become a girl in real life.

When summer break is over, he(she) will have to show their face at school.

This is about one of the best National-class adventurers, the story of the Alchemist who won a war without even taking a single step.  
When a normal high school student suddenly turns into a beautiful girl, what would they do?

The answer is to that is to become an online games' addict!
tags: Genderswap, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: A Gyaru and The Chairman at the Bathhouse
description: Kuroizumi Ururu is an outstanding student and a great athlete, but she is also an extreme gal who ignores school rules. She wears heavy makeup every day, but when she goes to the public bath, she shows off her "no makeup" and her pure feelings of love! A love comedy about a strict student council president and a gal!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
"Come on, kill all those bandits for me already!"
"No thanks. I don't wanna do any work."

My name is Keima Masuda, and my hobby is spending each day doing exactly nothing… but one fateful night, I was summoned to another world where I met a blonde young girl who I named Rokuko. It seemed that fortune had favored me and I would soon be living a wonderful life free of work. But even though I'm a guy who loves sleeping more than eating, Rokuko demanded that I help her.

"Save my dungeon! By the way, since you're the Dungeon Master, you'll die too if the Dungeon Core is destroyed."

The dungeon only had one room, and it was already surrounded by bandits. Seriously? It's a checkmate already. I've gotta break out of this impossible situation so I can stop working and just sleep!
___
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/lazy-dungeon-master)
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Gag doujinshi made by Bacius featuring characters from Uma Musume Pretty Derby.
tags: Action, Comedy, Doujinshi, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: After a weird hundred years where ghost were appearing, only one-tenth of mankind remained and the number of ghosts exceeding the number of humans remaining! In order to survive, humans needed to choose a “companion ghost” from birth, and constantly cultivate their own companion ghost so that they can be used to fight against other ghosts. The world has entered a weird era of co-existence with ghosts! With the help of the system, the invincible ghost cultivated by Lin Feng causes the whole world to tremble
tags: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Punch Rush JK Tara-chan
description:
Nikaido Katsuo, AKA "Fist King", is the most powerful and undefeated delinquent in Japan. However, no one knows that behind the stories of his legendary battles, there is a girl behind the scenes... Her name is Tabara Nikaido. She is the fighter who took her brother's name and fought in secret, and defeated all the strong men in her way...
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550689798659821656)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents

name: Sister and Giant: A Young Lady Is Reborn in Another World
description: Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church...
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Mecha, Adventure, Girls' Love, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Kuni wo Owareta Ryuushi-san, Hirowareta Ringoku de Ukkari Musou Shite Shimau. ~Jakushou Kokka ga Tairiku Saikyou no Ryuu no Rakuen ni Naru made~
description:
Breed, an old dragon master, is not only fired from his job but also exiled from his country... but the dragons love him and follow him!?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550912964695382195)
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Military, Fantasy

name: Zatch Bell! 2
description:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ishuzoku Tsuihou Concafe
description: Yoshio Yoshida, a company employee who enjoys going to concept cafes, hears a rumor from a familiar con café girl about a "con café with a strange atmosphere" that has opened in his neighborhood. Yoshida, intrigued, visits, and finds three unmotivated and peculiar con café girls in a store with a strange concept. They are actually real demons, dwarves and elfs.
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description:
During a party, Cecil, a clumsy white mage, spills on Oswald, the popular leader of the first squadron of holy knights, a homemade antidote. The reason is that he emitted a strong evil aura.

An upset Oswald kidnaps her an takes her to his mansion, and she panics: "My chastity is in danger!"

Cecil grows impatient, but he rebuffs her, telling her: "You are not my type."

It seems that Oswald is behind Cecil's potion, which was the first to take effect on a curse he had received in the past. Oswald formally asks Cecil to treat him, and she decides to take the opportunity to make a name for herself and accepts the request...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Noah's Contract: I'm an NPC in Another World
description: Players, this is a continent overrun by monsters. Danger lurks everywhere, so please make full use of your talents and help us eliminate the monster army. What? You ask who I am? I’m just an NPC.
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Fantasy

name: Ana no Mujina
description: When high school student Sataki Tadashi was young, he received the ability to deceive people from a "Mujina". Ever since, he has continued to live his life as a con artist. Three years later, with the recommendation of the Kaminayama police, he puts those abilities to use for the sake of punishing "Evil that can't be judged with Law".
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: My First Time
description: Despondent that the girl he loves does not return his affections, Eitarou attempts to commit suicide. But his near dead-body is discovered by a scientist and his mind is transferred to the body of a young girl. As a girl, Eitarou soon learns that the girl of his dreams did in fact love him, so they try to make the relationship work despite the fact that Eitarou is in a girl's body.
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Good-Bye
description:
Drawn in 1971 and 1972, these stories expand Yoshihiro Tatsumi’s vocabulary for characters contextualized by themes of depravity and disorientation in twentieth-century Japan. Some of the tales focus on the devastation the country felt as a result of World War II, and, yet, while American influence does play a role in the disturbing and bizarre stories contained within this volume, as always, it is Tatsumi’s characters that bear his hallmark, muddling through isolated despair and fleeting pleasure to live out their darkly nuanced lives.  
  
Some of the tales focus on the devastation the country felt as a result of World War II: in one story a man devotes twenty years to preserving the memory of those killed at Hiroshima, only to discover a horrible misconception at the heart of his tribute. Yet, while American influence does play a role in the disturbing and bizarre stories contained within this volume, as always it is Tatsumi’s characters that bear his hallmark, muddling through isolated despair and fleeting pleasure to live out their darkly nuanced lives.
tags: Historical, Anthology, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Eden of Witches
description:
All the world's creatures lived in harmony until humanity rose to power. The flora and fauna feared for their lives and hid from the humans, leaving behind a barren world with only rocks and dirt. There are a few exceptions… Witches, exceptional women with the gift to heed plants' words, live in secret lairs full of vibrant greenery.

Tula, a powerful witch nearing the end of her life, raised her apprentice Piri in one of these sanctuaries. Piri has a lot to learn. In fact, she can't even hear the plants' voices! Naturally, she has no desire to leave her secret haven—or Tula—but situations outside of her control force her away. Where will Piri go now? Will a gift from Tula help her find her way?
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Step Bro I'm Stuck!
description: Step Bro I'm Stuck the comic
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published

name: Bloom From Mistake
description: Three years ago, Ye Tang, who came from a slum but dreamed of becoming a lawyer to change his poor fate, fell in love with Meng Yixing, a young gang leader who approached him wearing a mask. He was exploited by Meng Yixing and fell to the lowest point in his life. Three years later, Ye Tang, who had forged his resume and used someone else's identity to become a lawyer, reunited with Meng Yixing. Meng Yixing, who knew his past, blackmailed him to continue their relationship. This time, Ye Tang decided to turn the tables and exploit Meng Yixing. The two con artists deceived each other until there was nothing left, then exploited one another.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Mafia, Drama, Full Color

name: Guilty Children
description:
The story begins with an attack on humanity by giant indestructible monsters named "Enemies." The Enemies drive humanity to the brink of extinction… but the one to save the world from the depths of hell is a lone boy!  
  
The SF novel series by Kafka Asagiri (*Bungou Stray Dogs*) jumps into the manga scene with art by Anri Sakano (*Sayonara Peter Pan*)!  
  
Is he God or is he the Devil… will the amnesiac protagonist Kyle Kamishiro bring a future filled with hope, or?!
tags: Sci-Fi, Mecha, Military, Drama, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The fleeting romance between an unpopular man and a mermaid who came ashore.
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Romance, Horror, Monster Girls, Tragedy

name: Put It All In The Ring! 2
description: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts

name: Tamanokoshi Goyoui Shimashita
description:
"Playing the role of a rich man's lover is fucking impossible."

Aoi's family broke up afterhe graduated from middle school. He now makes a living by staging crashes, but fate would dictate that he eventually got caught by a luxury car. Inami got out of the car, unfazed by Aoi's pretense and screams of pain. Instead, he offered Aoi a deal he could not refuse, literally, to pretend to be his lover. Aoi starts living at Inami's appartment and the training begins, from English conversation to table manners. Every day presents Aoi with a new experience!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Adaptation

name: Dragon Ball Super Divers
description: Dragon Ball Super Divers is a One-Shot title authored and illustrated by Toyotarou to coincide with the release of the game with the same name.

name: Minna no Kiss Club (Pre-serialization)
description: Not found

name: Heavenly Demon Tavern
description:
One day, Joo Kang-hyun, a stranger who fell into the world of martial arts, rose to the position of Heavenly Demon after going through countless hardships. However, he always missed his hometown, the 21st-century Republic of Korea. He thought he would return to his hometown once the proper array was activated, but instead, he regressed to the past.

Gosh… The Heavenly Demon, Joo Kang-hyun, went back in time! In order to save the Youngrae Tavern which was on the verge of bankruptcy, he cooked delicious Jajangmyeon and Jjamppong! This tavern was the place where he lived with the three siblings who took care of him when he first entered Murim, Soran, Doran, and Unyoung. Although their business was not going well, they lived happily in their own way. In the future, after he became The Heavenly Demon, he heard news that their lives all ended miserably. He planned to stop their misfortunes himself. How? With Future Vision, Demon Lord Qi and Jajangmyeon!

*Jinbeob : This is a term in the murim world that means 'formation/array' which in some cases refers to the formations used by soldiers or groups of people in battle, but in some cases it also refers to formations used to distort space in order to manipulate the opponent's mind and make the opponent fall into the illusion desired by the attacker, we can also call it a 'hidden space'
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Cooking, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
There's a legendary Bishoujo Game that has become popular among Japanese gentlemen. Its name is "Magical★Explorer" or Magiero for short. The game's protagonist has a cheat-like power with 12 different beautiful heroines to flirt with, including additional 12 heroines from the DLC, a harem of 24 beauties. I have become that protagonist...! Not! Instead, I have become the third-wheel character who always laughing like an idiot next to him. There's no heroine that would lay their eyes on me.

But now I couldn't care less about the protagonist and his heroines. Why? Because I discovered magic. While I was using it, I have become interested in it. I want to master it. I want to become the strongest. Thus I have decided. I would abandon half my role as a protagonist's friend to train my magic and then I would beat the hell out of that cheat who can solo the Demon King. I was training with that thought in mind, but somehow I keep getting closer to the heroines and furthermore, I don't know why I keep encounter events like I am some Eroge's protagonist.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

description: Not found

name: The World After the Fall
description:
Faced with imminent defeat and certain death, would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?

When mysterious towers appear across the world, summoning monsters that prey on mankind, this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.

On the brink of death, they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance, though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.

Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice, choosing to fight for the original timeline, and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

The birth of a younger brother and older brother basketball tale now starts! From that day, the younger brother and older brother's journey to become the "world's best basketball player" began. Being compared to his prodigious brother Riku and tired of his everyday life, Raimu works up his courage and decides to start playing basketball!   
  
 Drawn by the previous assistant of Haruichi Furudate (Haikyuu!!) and recommended by the master himself, an acclaimed basketball manga!

description: Daichi's big sister is getting married, and to a super hot guy named Jun Igawa! When they first meet, Daichi's suspicious; what does this accomplished, rich, attractive guy see in his sister? But Jun seems like such a nice guy, and slowly, Daichi starts to drop his guard… is Jun really everything he seems? Or is he a devil in disguise?

description: Noah Brown has a gift for fighting. Unfortunately, punching things doesn't pay his bills. At least, that was the case until he dies and an Eldritch god finds his soul. The strange encounter brings him to a new world, summoned by bloody cultists. He’s got nothing but the shirt on his back and a strange item of unknown power he isn’t yet sure how to use. If he wants to survive, maybe even thrive, perhaps it's time he finally put his gift to good use. Art by Kisai Entertainment.

name: Hokago wa Kissaten De
description:
While her friends are interested in cute cafés and getting boyfriends, Yanagi Riku finds it hard to talk about what she actually likes. They also think that her interest in the hot but unsociable Fushimi-kun is in bad taste, but she actually has a crush on him. One day, instead of accompanying her friends to the popular new café they found, she secretly seeks out an old café in order to indulge in her own interests: old-fashioned things!  
  
When the person at the counter turns around, she finds out that it is Fushimi-kun! He actually invites her to talk and they find out that they have similar tastes, and promise to talk again, but the next day he's unsociable as ever.
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Dream Team Retsuden
description: "Dream Team Retsuden " is a manga series based on the NBA that was serialized for a short period in " Weekly Shonen Jump " in 1995 and 1996 . It consists of 4 chapters, the first two about Shaquille O'neal and the second two about Reggie Miller. Story by Nishio Akihiko , art by Mitsuyoshi Kenji . It is a basketball manga , but also a true story manga based on real people and real events .

name: Not found
description: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Homeless Tensei ~Isekai de Jiyuu Sugiru Jikyuu Jisoku Seikatsu~
description: Shinichi Tanaka is a homeless man who is good at dumpster diving. Because he's a penniless bum, there's no help for it. He's going to try and pick up some trash to survive another day. What is this? Monsters and a Dungeon? In Tokyo?! A homeless man finds himself suddenly reincarnated in another world. His second life starts now based out of a hidden room deep in a dungeon. Weird and turbulent adventure of a 56 year old homeless man who reincarnates into a different world.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Star Head
description:
"I am a star. I have been traveling along a predetermined orbit for billions of years now. At some point, I saw a small planet within a hair’s breadth of my orbit..."

---

A large-format, full-color comic from Shigeru Tamura, following the adventures of a star head on the planet of Phantasmagoria.

name: holy blood
description: After God’s departure, people still sought blessings from Him, and because they followed different deities, two separate nations emerged, locked in conflict against each other. Meanwhile, other powers also made their appearance. Herrick, serving as a blood slave warden of the empire, gradually uncovered the truth about the blood slaves during his tenure and rescued Alice, who was herself a blood slave. During their escape, they unexpectedly gained the trust of a child with strange powers. As Herrick grew disillusioned with the empire’s actions, Alice proposed the goal of becoming a god, and thus the three of them embarked on the path to divinity.

When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.

description: A forbidden tale you must never witness. Imuko beckons you into the accursed realm. Deep within a secluded forest, a sacred rope stretches across the trees. Beyond it lies a world unlike our own. From that side, a lone girl has crossed over… Her name is Imuko, and those who encounter her are said to meet a dreadful fate. You must not set foot beyond the line. You must not meet her gaze. You must not speak to her.

name: 6-oku Nen no Hakubutsu Tabi
description:
"A Journey Through 600 Million Years of Natural History" is set in a time when time machines have been developed, allowing access to ancient times. Inochi and Akari, a pair of university students, travel through various eras and encounter undescribed species of ancient life. The story depicts their "600 million year journey through natural history" from ancient times to the present day, gazing up at the giant dinosaur Diplodocus in the Jurassic period, having a barbecue on the beach in the Cretaceous period and eating ammonites.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
tags: Time Travel, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life

name: Dragon Ball Super
description:
Dragon Ball Super follows the aftermath of Goku's fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth's fragile peace.

Having defeated Majin Buu, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. 

After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Odd and Kind
description: An anthology of self-contained science fiction tales, each shining a light on different lives — on Earth, in space, across the present and the future — capturing the delicate shifts of human emotion. It all begins with Episode 1, a remake of Welcome Back to the Day After Tomorrow’s Future, the award-winning debut by Kae Hashimoto (76th Chiba Tetsuya Prize), which captured hearts on X with over 250,000 likes. This SF omnibus delivers stories that are at once strange and heartwarming — Odd and Kind.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Romance, Anthology, Drama, Web Comic

name: Trench Flowers
description:
A manga about combat maids engaging in trench warfare  
  
August 1893, church calendar. The kingdom of Nohmaland declared war on the Flatanian empire and invaded their territory under the pretext of atrocities against Patlasi within the empire In order to support the regular troops, the empire send the [armed service], and armed maid group tasked with guarding/policing the castle inside, to the front lines. The war against the kingdom still continues.
tags: Action, Survival, Military, Drama, Fantasy

name: Saga of Lilith -Medieval Dark Fantasy-
description:
A DARK MEDIEVAL FANTASY SAGA

In a world where the ancient gods have fallen, and where demons are abroad and assume dominance over the night, a demon huntress wanders the sleepless nights and hunts any supernatural creature that stands in her way. A man who was once the son of a fallen king now struggles for survival as he strives to win back his kingdom. But during these dark times, a sovereign ruler and goddess of her realm is now forced to fight a dynasty that has taken over Earth, and she must remain bound to her fate along with the heir whom she must fight against.

Saga of Lilith -Medieval Dark Fantasy- is a saga of not only a goddess but a saga of a family who accepts their fate and is forced to walk a path they cannot escape from.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Tragedy

description: We’re going to live as two people.

name: Ribs Woman
description: Yuki is so ashamed of her figure that she refuses to go swimming, either at school or on the beach. She believes her ribs look strange, and hears that she can have plastic surgery to alter the appearance of her ribcage. Yuki goes to a nearby clinic that performs the procedure, but is told that she must pass a mental health assessment before she can have the surgery.
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Horror

name: My Broken Mariko
description:
Tomoyo Shiino has stood by her friend Mariko through years of abuse, abandonment, and depression. However horrific her circumstances, their friendship has been the one reassuring constant in Mariko's life-and Tomoyo's too. That is, until Tomoyo is utterly blindsided by news of Mariko's death. In life, Tomoyo felt powerless to help her best friend out of the darkness that ultimately drove her over the edge. Now, Tomoyo is determined to liberate Mariko's ashes for one final journey together... to set free her dear, broken Mariko.
  
This story deals with suicide and its aftermath, plus abuses of all kind that preceded it. Reader discretion is strongly advised.

Live-action movie adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/719435-my-broken-mariko) - [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt17512706/) - [Bangumi](https://bgm.tv/subject/366281)
tags: Psychological, Drama, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
The very last moment before the novel was about the end, the strongest villain met a pitiful fate.

But that wasn't the end.

"So, this is how I die."

I, who was once the author, woke up as the fox-eyed villian who was never once understood.

A fallen family. A life thrown away for revenge. A future sealed in tragedy.

I'm going to rewrite it all.

This villain's end... will be reversed.

I can't be honest with you, but I'm really full of you, so I want to tell you and touch you--. Wu likes a senior member of the calligraphy club, and Miyabi is missed by a junior member of the first year. What do girls in love tell each other when they can no longer hold on to their feelings?　

This is a series of short stories about irresistibly sweet and passionate kisses overflowing with “I love you”, by Uzuki Coco, a rising star of heart-throbbing stories.

name: The Drifting Classroom
description:
Out of nowhere, a Japanese elementary school is transported out of the world they know, and into a nightmarish wasteland. Have they gone to another planet, or is this toxic world actually a vision of Earth's future? Soon, the students and teachers must struggle to survive in impossible conditions, besieged by terrifying creatures and beset by madness. Part Lord of the Flies, part post-apocalyptic science fiction, The Drifting Classroom (1972-1974) is a classic can't-put-down manga series. It was adapted into a Japanese live-action movie (1987).  

---
  
- **Won the 20th Shogakukan Manga Award in 1975**

name: Neko ni wa Neko no Neko Gohan
description:
A kitten lies dying in the snow. It seems that it had eaten poisoned cat food.

When our protagonist, Mano Taiyou, chanced upon the kitten, he panicked and hurriedly brought it to the vet.

After being rescued, the kitten was taken in by Taiyou and given the name Yuki. Unfortunately, Yuki has been traumatized by its near death experience from eating the poisoned cat food and is now unable to eat dry kibbles.

This a heartwarming story of Yuki the cat and his owner, Taiyou as he struggles as a beginner cook to make home made food for Yuki.

---
A kitten, on the verge of death, lies in the snow, only to be rescued by a kind young man, Mano Taiyo. Nursing the ailing kitten back to health, Taiyo names his new charge “Yuki.” As a first time pet owner, however, Taiyo struggles with Yuki's very particular palate. This picky kitty refuses to go anywhere near store-bought cat food! There's only one option left: while he's never cooked a single meal in his life, Taiyo resolves to make a meal worthy of his adorable new feline friend!
tags: Animals, Slice of Life

name: Link! Life! Love Live! 104th Term
description: Official 4-koma published with the game Link! Life! Love Live!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color

name: Vtuber Confucius
description:
The Sage Confucius and his beloved disciple Yan Hui found themselves lost in the forest and unexpectedly time-traveled to the present day! 

Confucius, unwavering in his mission to promote Confucianism, faced the challenge of a drastically changed world where hardly anyone would listen to the words of an old man.

Faced with modern society, he knew he needed modern solutions—so Confucius made a decision—...
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Comedy, Virtual Reality, Crossdressing, 4-Koma, Philosophical, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Brainrot Girlfriend
description:
She's cute! She's beautiful! She's sexy! She... speaks in tongues? Meet the Brainrot Girlfriend! She means well, but good luck understanding what she says. 
Brainrot translation: shes skibidi shes toilet shes roblox she girl math goat bussing this better caul saul mrbeast metal pipe falling the roblox amogus she gigachad glazer but colleen ballinger nonchalant poppy playtime what she roblox L rn
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tantei no Shikigami
description: Nanato is an Onmyoji detective with good skills but a terrible attitude. He spends his days solving mysterious events together with Yachiyo, a puppet goddess of ceremony. Then, a high school boy named Tsutsu comes to him asking him to look for his missing sister. It is a harbinger of a great mystery...?
tags: Ghosts, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tonari no Seki-kun
description:
The boy who sits next to Yokoi in class, Seki-kun, is always up to something at his desk. He manages to somehow play very elaborate games without attracting the teacher's attention. From dominoes, to shogi, to go, to mecha models, to playing with cats and more, he always has something new to do. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games, even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher!  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15587)  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the live action show.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2015-05-27/tonari-no-seki-kun-rumi-phenomenon-school-comedies-get-live-action-show/.88620)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Densetsu no Otokonoko Mokkori Haishinsha
description:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
tags: Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: LOSTEND
description: Challenge it. As many times as it takes until your spirit breaks. In order to rekindle the life that has been extinguished, in the harsh and merciless mountains of the underworld — A staggering dark survival epic depicted with overwhelming artistic skill.
tags: Thriller, Action, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Attoiuma ni Wasureru
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Web Comic

name: Dragon Ball Super: Yamoshi
description: History of Yamoshi the first Super Saiyan way before Son Goku by Thibault Deboom
tags: Historical, Monsters, Action, Romance, Crime, Adventure, Military, Doujinshi, Gore, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Jang Baekhee, who suffers from obsessive tendencies due to the trauma of domestic violence. One day, just before graduation, he meets Yang Il-woo, a transfer student from Seoul.

"Maybe people who are alike can recognize each other. For some reason, I couldn’t stop noticing Yang Il-woo and just couldn’t leave him alone."
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Rudolf's First Love
description: My childhood friend is a super popular hottie... But could anyone ever notice someone like me...!?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, School Life

name: Vampire's Alchemy
description: A strange encounter between a vampire and an alchemist. One seeks to rebuild a fallen noble house. The other is desperate to save a lost sibling. Together, they embark on a slightly uncomfortable (and undeniably bizarre) journey of blood, magic, and uneasy partnership. What could possibly go wrong when fangs meet formulas?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kogareru Neko to Tomato
description: From being dumped by the girl he liked to being passed over for a job, Toma hasn't been picked by anyone since he was a kid. One day on his way home from work, our good samaritan rescues a cat stuck in a tree. Little did he know the cat would follow him home and that he could talk! Said cat makes himself right at home and follows him everywhere. His new 'pet' is always at his side: the kitchen, the bedroom, even the bathroom... Toma always wanted to be needed, but not like this!
tags: Boys' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Akazukin ni Taberareta Ookami
description:
The Adorable, Adorable Wolf Was Eaten by Little Red Riding Hood...?!

Luca, a wolf who only wanted to scare Little Red Riding Hood, somehow ended up having her words mistaken for a love confession—and was promptly ‘eaten’! But to make matters worse, Little Red Riding Hood is a true carnivore?! As Luca gets completely overwhelmed in this strange relationship, what will happen when the full moon rises...?

A heartwarming and thrilling yuri fairy-tale comedy filled with romance and healing!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Mazinger Z 2022
description: A remake of the original Mazinger Z manga in celebration of its 50th anniversary. Most of this story was first published in Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter. So this manga can be thought of as the in-universe version of the story that Gekiman creates in the autobiography manga [Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter](https://mangadex.org/title/a6d69815-f5f9-4ab8-9d53-5b4d1ee6601e/gekiman-mazinger-z-chapter)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing - Blind Target
description:
After the war that took place in A.C. 195, each of the protagonists have gone on with their lives, and the gundams put into retirement. As the peace alliance with the colonies push through, a new menace threatens to shatter the peace, and the five gundam pilots are forced into action once again.  
  
Blind Target is originally a radio drama that got translated into manga. It is one of the possible events that took place between the series itself and the OVA, Endless Waltz.  
  
Other manga titles that also delve into the possible events between the series and the OVA are Battlefield of Pacifists and Ground Zero. All three remain unrelated to one another.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Ai no Jikken
description:
“I like you, Yuichi”  
  
“Huh?!”  
  
“I wanted to tell you before I took time off school. Is that weird? I’m sorry.”  
  
Yuichi was suddenly confessed to by his childhood friend, Chihiro.  
  
Chihiro will be taking time off school… What’s going on?!  
  
However, Yuichi begins to notice Chihiro’s increasing number of injuries and unsettled emotions, as well as the strong attraction he feels towards Chihiro, whose true feelings only hurt himself.  
  
Young, inexperienced and clumsy. But that’s what makes them all the more sinful and heartwarming!  
  
A story of a life changing romance between two childhood friends.
tags: Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
The Mad Demon, Lee Zaha, dreams of becoming the God of Martial Arts. Unfortunately, his dreams are dashed after he falls off a cliff while running from the Demonic Cult for stealing the Jade of Heaven. 

Yet this is not the end for Jaha - he awakens from the fall to find himself back in his 20s. With his knowledge of the future and of martial arts, he now has a chance at revenge and at getting life right this time. 

Will he be able to fulfill his dream this time around, or is he doomed to face the same fate yet again?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/mad-demon/list?title_no=3510)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/kuangmochongsheng/list?title_no=1842)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001777)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/return-of-the-mad-demon/list?title_no=3957)
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Spinach Bouquet
description: Country life is supposed to be idyllic, isn’t it? A peaceful place full of amiable neighbors with big hearts, right? That’s what Jiwoo is looking forward to… But out of all the next-door neighbors to have, he gets Dongchan. Curt, stand-offish, and inscrutable, Dongchan isn’t the most welcoming of folks. In fact, he looks like he doesn’t want Jiwoo and his family here at all. Bemused but not daunted, Jiwoo tries his best to adjust to life in the country…until it turns out that someone is trying to chase his family away from here. Jiwoo has his suspicions, but will he be able to find the real culprit? (Source: Lezhin)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Shenwu Tianzun
description: I was once the Supreme God of Physique, standing tall above others. However, I was betrayed by those whom I thought of as my most trustworthy friends. They had schemed against me in an attempt to kill me, which was almost successful. Fortunately, a fraction of my soul had managed to escape into the body of a seriously injured child giving me another chance at life, and revenge.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks
description: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Full Color

name: Gap: Cobra x Cat
description: A series of little vignettes by BL artist Nagabe about the life and little struggles of a King Cobra and a his Siberian Cat boyfriend.
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Boys' Love

name: Lady Lucetta's Second Chance at Life
description:
*I was supposed to have my second chance at life all figured out, so why is my fiancé the most unpredictable thing?!*

In order to settle the debts of her fallen household, the lady Lucetta has agreed to a political marriage to the upstart Kyle, who is after the position of Count. At the end of a loveless engagement filled with nothing but arguments, an assailant targeting Kyle soon drags both of them to their deaths... but she finds herself sent back to right after the engagement is called!

*I have to use this second chance I've been given to survive and life a happy life!*

Lucetta uses her knowledge of the future to her advantage, and disguises herself as a fortuneteller in order to repay her debts. But Kyle appears before her and asks her for romantic advice...?!

*Is it true that he's liked me for the longest time?!*

A Kyle who wants to shower her with love, and a Lucetta who wants to break off their engagement... The engagement annulling romcom of two tsunderes begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: AWEON Mall Isekai, Grand Opening Today! THE COMIC
description:
Isekai with Shopping Mall!  
  
That's all.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Unparalleled Path - Reincarnated as the AI for a Space Battleship
description: Asagaya Shin, an ordinary high school student who was supposed to be in Mitaka, Tokyo just a few days ago, somehow found himself as an AI of a space battleship. The battleship is surrounded by a large enemy fleet, and with only a few consort ships left, it is in a desperate situation. Moreover, the captain of the battleship is a young girl, a decorated member of the royal family, who was ceremoniously on board. Shin, now an AI, takes advantage of his "human" characteristics and attempts to fight a withdrawal battle using novel tactics to survive...
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Mecha, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation

name: Tourigakari ni Wanpointo Adobaisu Shite Iku Taipu no Yankii
description: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee, but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice, they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly, Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind, considerate, knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today, the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people, making their day a little better.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Thoughtless
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Horror, Web Comic

name: Not found
description: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Sora wo Wataru Ikimono
description: Sasaki Yuuko gets stuck in caretaking duty with Tanaka Kunio, having to feed the class' fish! By Konoshima Ruka, the creator behind Utsuranain Desu (The Ghost Doesn't Show Up)!
tags: Oneshot, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Yanikasu
description:
Disillusioned with modern society, Igasa Ukira, a cigarette addict, lives his days in a haze of lethargy. Complaints about secondhand smoke, rising cigarette prices, disappearing smoking areas, and the relentless anti-smoking trend… What was once considered cool has now become the target of society's growing hostility toward smokers. Feeling increasingly suffocated under that piercing gaze, Ukira one day finds himself suddenly summoned to another world—by a demon.

A new lighthearted isekai comedy series—by cigarette aficionados, by cigarette aficionados, for cigarette aficionados.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Web Comic

name: Ghost Marriage
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Manticore -Seishin Ikou Jikken Machi-
description: University student Mimi Usazaki spends her days battling depression while attending psychiatric sessions and muddling through a bleak college life. One fateful day, she's caught up in a mysterious experiment that alters her life forever. Through the experiment, she ends up hosting the consciousness of Hyou Usazaki—her estranged younger brother, who also happens to be a death row inmate. Now, Mimi finds herself thrust into a deadly struggle against other death row inmates who were subjected to the same experiment. Will she survive the chaos that ensues? Or will her connection to her brother bring about her downfall?
tags: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Eros Survival
description: "EROS Survival" is a show broadcasted over the internet where pair of players - a male and a female - compete for the grand prize of $1m! To win though the pairs must demonstrate both knowledge and skills in order to 'strip' their opponents, progress through the rounds and grab that super prize!
tags: Comedy, Harem

name: Jinsei ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto ni Shita
description:
Fiona, the most powerful magician in the empire, was tired of being overworked on the battlefield every day, both physically and emotionally. She thought she had given up her life on the battlefield, but when she woke up, she found herself under the protection of Matthias, the most powerful knight in the enemy kingdom!

In this powerful and loving fantasy, Fiona recovers her life while receiving love and tenderness for the first time!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Comic Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/9722), [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00204275010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64890)

**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330652446237885), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1027hw/)
tags: Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kyougane-ke no Hanayome
description:
For the past millennium, the Kyougane Clan has stood as an infamous bloodline of fiend-slaying exorcists. In the present day, it's led by the sharp-tongued and unyielding head, Kyougane Kurou. One day, a stunning young bride is brought before him—but beneath her beauty lies a hidden, dangerous secret. Determined to stand by her side, Kurou must now sever the shackles of fate to protect their bond—no matter the cost.

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Gap no Aru Kanojo
description:
### Raw links:

- Chapter 2: "**A Gal Who's Kind to Otaku**" - [Twitter Link](https://twitter.com/GoHome_kun/status/1877264427579273599)
