tags: Romance, Web Comic

name: Not found
description:
"From now on, is it okay for me to have an ‘adult relationship’ with you, Young Lady?"

Yui Amagi is the daughter of a yakuza family who longs for a "normal life." Her dream of living on her own finally comes true… or so she thought. But her assigned bodyguard—who also happens to be her fiancé—Ichika Izumo, the Wakagashira (Underboss) of the Amagi group, insists that "it’s only natural for me to be here," while smoking a cigarette as if he owns the place.

Yui doesn’t actually dislike Ichika (in fact, she secretly likes him), but she doesn’t want a romance arranged by her parents. Without realizing her own feelings, she decides to spite him by joining a group blind date.

However, once the party starts, she feels completely out of place and ends up depressed. To make matters worse, one of the men there takes advantage of her vulnerability and tries to take her to a hotel…!?

"You dare join a group date when you already have me, your fiancé?"

An impatient yandere Underboss × a stubborn young lady, caught in an overly intense and sweet “awakening cohabitation love story”… ♪
tags: Romance, Mafia, Office Workers

name: Owan-chan's Ramen Adventures
description: Life at a ramen shop is never dull! Owan runs the neighborhood ramen spot called "Power Bomb." Just as she was praying for some hungry hero to save her struggling business, in walks...
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking

name: Gyaru-kun no Koi wa Kitto
description:
You don't know how I feel, so why are you being kind to me?

Yoshi, who is super-cheerful, has a secret after-school date with Fuji, a sober boy who is the complete opposite.
It's supposed to be "practice for Fuji-kun to find a lover", but Yoshi secretly has a crush on Fuji!?
If love is revealed, this relationship will end
But his heart throbs at times when Fuji-kun is too cool!
In fact, whereabouts of the love of the super brave Gal-kun...

A plain handsome guy who doesn't know love x a brave gal-kun who is timid about love.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tyranny of the Gale
description:
The war of the Northern Xia lasted less than half a year. The war ended in victory for the Zhongyuan army, but in the process, Bai Lixue's family is devastated by a demonic cult.
He lost both his parents and siblings.
The only survivor, Bai Li Gang has only one goal... the complete annihilation of the demonic cult!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: Kotarou is a top-class dancer but “clumsy at everything except dancing”. However, he sustains facial injuries in an accident and is forced to retire from show business. He once lost all his pride, but his connection with his late grandmother leads him to Noh!
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Music

name: Naozari Dungeon
description: Not found
tags: Action, Adventure

name: Not found
description:
Seven years ago, I promised my best male friend that we would always be friends. When I reunited with him in high school, he was… the neatest and most beautiful girl in the school!? And yet, she acts the same old way only in front of me…
___
**Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4)

**Additional Sites:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tenbin_sneaker)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tadokoro-san
description: Shy and introverted, Kageko Tadokoro passes her free time in class drawing instead of hanging out with her classmates. But even when her classmates approach her, it’s only to make fun of her drawings and appearance. In stark contrast, Nikaido is well-liked among her peers as she has both beauty and smarts. And while everyone makes fun of Tadokoro, Sakurako Nikaido on the other hand, is totally infatuated with her. Just one look at one of Tadokoro’s drawings and Nikaido fell in love with the art and eventually, the artist herself. When Tadokoro offers to draw Nikaido a portrait, Nikaido becomes ecstatic as this may be her chance to get closer with the girl she has been obsessing over.
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Plum Candy Love
description: Yeonghyeon is a quiet and nice boy who is leaving school early when he runs into Daehan, an intimidating classmate rumored to have ties to a gang. Although Yeonghyeon tries to sneak past him, Daehan drags him to a cafe and asks him to be his boyfriend when they're both guys and have never even spoken before! Undeterred by Yeonghyeon's immediate refusal, Daehan walks him to school, buys him snacks, and changes seats to sit beside him. Eventually, his constant attention begins to grow on Yeonghyeon... They say opposites attract, but can these two very different boys find love together?
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Egg ~I, am your child.~
description: How will the "family" change in a world where the donation of eggs and sperms from third parties for a fee has been legalized in 20XX year? *Odd-numbered bi-monthly omnibus series that depicts the "new family shape".
tags: Sci-Fi, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Sonna Koi
description: The Angel (Cupid) Yuzune has just been lazing around reading romance manga instead of hooking couples up. God gives him an ultimatum to get Sumire and Yuuji together, or he's fired. Should be a breeze for a cupid who knows all the romantic cliches, but Sumire has other ideas...?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Working Night Shift Even on Christmas!
description: Go Ayoung lives a quiet life in the office, but unfortunately she is tormented by her boss, everything would change when one day she overhears a private talk of his and realizes an important secret.
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Love Between the Lines
description:
"I really need a helping hand, and you have nowhere to go. A match made in heaven!" "I provide free meals and accommodation."

A man who seems poetic and refined on the surface but harbours a dark side, and a former gangster determined to turn over a new leaf and live a calmer, more meaningful life, cross paths.

Love makes you want to keep a journal. Love inspires poetry. Love compels you to write. Love turns words into something beautiful.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Chun Hajin, the strongest assassin of the Orthodox Murim’s Righteous Heavenly Alliance. Hajin loses his life as he tries to escape to find freedom.

And then…

‘The divine cult is immortal, may all demons submit. Congratulations on your recovery, third young master!’

He was reincarnated into the body of Murim’s public enemy, the third young master of the Demonic Cult?!

The conquest of the Demonic Murim by Chun Hajin, the strongest secret weapon of the Orthodox Murim, begins now.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Love Me Again
description: Ye Wooju has all but given up on remembering who he is after a terrible accident leaves him with amnesia. But he's hit with a cold hard case of déjà vu when illustrious actor Lee Youngwon shows up on his doorstep. While the film star claims to be an old friend, a few steamy encounters suggest their relationship went far deeper than that. Now, with his supposed ex-lover being the epitome of everything he once aspired to be, Wooju starts to think maybe his old self is worth remembering. But what if the past holds such dark secrets that forgetting was the only way to move on? As Wooju grapples with his trauma and a celebrity heartthrob determined to win him over, reigniting the flame he and his friend once shared might just be the key to remembering his true self.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Net Keijiban Hyakumonogatari ~Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu~

Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!

name: Juliet wo Ute
description: Juri is the unwavering Number One host at the host club, “Velvet Kiss.” He's manly and handsome, but always has a poker face. Number Two host, Akatsuki, is aiming for the top spot and asks Juri how to earn it. Despite expecting to be rejected, Juri invites him over to his place. But when it’s just the two of them overlooking the beautiful night sky, Akatsuki finds himself being pulled in by Juri’s charm…
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 - The beginning man.
description: Set after the end of the second season of Kidou Senshi Gundam 00, this oneshot is centered around Lyle and his relationship with his brother, showing the reasons that led to their separation.

tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Mecha

name: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 in Those Days
description:
A collection of six short stories originally serialized in Newtype and defined between and after the first and second season of the anime.  
- The Initial Man (2008) Lyle thinks about the past of his relationship with his brother and the reasons why they separated years ago.  
- I'm Home (2008) At the beginning of the final battle of the first season, Tiera struggles to reconcile with what happened when he attempted to bring the Celestial Being back.  
- wanderer (2008) After the end of the first season, Setsuna wanders around the world and ends up in an Irish bar.  
- Praise the Lord - Hallelujah (2008) After Hallelujah finds himself in jail, he begins to think about his past.  
- Where Heaven and Earth Meet (2010) A brief focus on the members of the Marina and the Celestial Being after the end of Season Two.  
- The Second Anniversary (2010) The confrontation between the two who have the task of guiding humanity continues. Secrets of the past, the motivations of the innovators and the motivations of the Ribbons Almark … on the eve of "Awakening the Trailblazer", memories are stirring within the Veda …
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Anthology, Adventure, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens

name: Not found
description:
The world is under threat from interdimensional monsters, and only the chosen Awakened - humans possessed of special powers - can defeat them!

Sure, it sounds exciting, but it’s a far cry from reality for ordinary office worker Park Dohyeok, who’s more worried about landing a big business deal that could save his job. That is, until one day when Dohyeok’s path crosses a monster outbreak, causing him to manifest his true powers as a rare and powerful form of Awakened!

With his newfound abilities attracting eager allies and powerful enemies, will Dohyeok find that he has what it takes to survive?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Chie the Brat
description:
The manga is about ten-year-old Chie, "the most unfortunate girl in Japan," who manages her family diner while her unemployed yakuza father and her mother are separated.

---
- **Won the 26th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1981**
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Face Genius: Top Star from Age 0
description:
Aspiring to live just one day as a handsome man, supporting actor Lee Han-jo is rewarded for his virtuous life with a beautiful face and a status window that grants wishes upon reincarnation.

Although abandoned as an orphan in front of a convent in the dead of winter, his luck doesn’t end there, he’s even adopted into the family of a wealthy actor.

Armed with the seasoned experience of a max-level supporting actor and a god-given face, maybe this time, he can aim for the life of a Top Star!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: It Turns out That I Have Been Invincible for a Long Time
description: Over a five-year journey around the world, Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in, but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option, so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals, and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on, everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Chasing Mr. CEO
description:
Oh Deokhae is an otaku and is a regular worker who has been suffering a lot lately. The source of his problem is his boss who resembles one of his favorite characters, Cain!  
  
The boss has a nice family, a beautiful face, amazing fashion sense, and great work ethics. Sadly, he doesn't like Oh Deokhae.  
  
Mr. President, I'm sorry.  
As the days go on, Oh Deokhae decides to resign.  
"I can't go to work anymore with this impure mind!"  
  
What is going on here? I want to quit my job but my boss doesn't want me to?!  
An exhilarating love story of two people
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Alien in My Wardrobe
description: "Hey you, Livestock, I need a subject for my alien probe" are not words Haesung expected to ever hear. He spends his days spacing out, hopelessly fantasizing about being tied up by his office crush, Shiwon. But his secret BDSM fantasies come to life as a brutally sexy alien crash-lands on Earth and ropes in Haesung as his research subject (and roommate). Things heat up when Haesung submits to the experiment—in exchange for sexual favors that are out of this world!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Web Comic, Aliens, Full Color

name: My Sweet Home
description:
[FROM BL DOT CUM]  
  
Yuu, who grew up in Akita, loves his step-cousin Hatahiko! Yuu, who moves to Tokyo for university, has a coincidental and fateful (?) reunion with Hatahiko. When strange things happen, Yuu temporarily starts the “life living together” of his dreams.   
However, to Yuu who’s on cloud nine cohabitating with his first love, Hatahiko, while smiling, says, “I’m not interested in younger people.”  
  
 A handsome salaryman who’s a bit of a bully X a coddled university student’s pure love life together.
tags: Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: 2gether the series
description:
Cha Taein is a very handsome student and cheerleader in college, while Yoo Soohyuk is one of the campus’ most popular guys and is also in the soccer and music club. When Taein is chased by Lim Gurin, who he does not reciprocate feelings for — he ends up begging Soohyuk to fake date with him in order to chase Lim Gurin away.
Somehow, just like the tale as old as time goes — pretense somehow starts to turn into reality. However, before a "happily ever after" there is the process of falling in love, and the slow realization that somehow they aren't pretending anymore. Somehow, they do not want to.

---

One year after the end of the zombie outbreak that swept through Korea, 'Doyoung', who lost her younger brother to a zombie, one day accidentally meets 'Jion', a student who closely resembles the zombie that bit her brother.
A friendship full of suspicion between two people that continues in a risky manner. Can this relationship last?

This is an official Pokémon Manga, which was uploaded on twitter. People who won the raffle won a physical copy of this manga.

description:
The witch Lacey has been under the control of the state since she was a child because of her excessively strong magical power. After defeating the Demon King with the heroes, her only remaining role was to give birth to a child who would inherit her magical powers. However, her fiancé's infidelity was discovered just as their marriage was about to take place. With the help of Wayne, the hero who traveled with her, Lacey's life takes a turn.
___

name: Veil
description:
"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic
illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, 
out of sight from those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
tags: Historical, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Hitorigurashi, Netsu wo Dasu. Koi wo Shiru.
description: The protagonist who caught a cold at Christmas and was absent from work and live alone at his apartment. Then, his condition take turn to worse, yet A strange blonde gal suddenly come to take care of him. Eh...who? While thinking, She have to nursing myself because of my poor physical condition.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Slice of Life

name: My Husband Is Sleeping in the Freezer
description: One day, Nana, who has always wanted to get married, has a fateful encounter. Unfortunately, she had to endure violence since the marriage, so she decided to kill her husband and put his corpse in a freezer, but things aren't always like one want as she finds out when he comes back…

name: The Count's Youngest Son Is a Gamer
description:
Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. 

Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. 

Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: From the Dust
description: Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker, but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country, Kidō Kotone, a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths, but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.
tags: Time Travel, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Fukushuu Kansuisha no Jinsei Nishuume Isekaitan
description:
Kousuke Kurono was an Avenger. After being raped, his beloved little sister was left out in the cold and froze to death. From the time he was 13-years old, Kousuke made use of any possible means in order to exact his revenge. 5 years had passed, he achieved his revenge, but having lived solely for the sake of revenge, at the moment his revenge came to fruition, afterwards he couldn't muster up the willpower to live on. That's why, with the same knife he used to kill the culprits, he slit his own throat. However, he then heard a voice; "Is that not wasteful?" When he came to, he found not his home, his country, nor his world——It was another world.
___
* [Japanese Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7225df/)

description:
Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.  
  
Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Itoshii Bokura
description:
"The reason I'm here right now is thanks to Ryuu."

Ryuu, with a complex about his looks, lives unable to stand up to his classmates who pick on him. One day, his classmate who's as beautiful as a celebrity, Fukuda Ema, calls out to him.

Ryuu rejects him saying "we're from two different worlds," but they were actually childhood friends back in first grade.

Ema, who used to be insecure about his looks just like Ryuu, has grown not just physically but mentally, says it's all thanks to Ryuu and quickly starts to close the distance between them...

Super beautiful popular boy × kind-hearted insecure boy glow-up love!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kitayama-kun to Minamiya-kun
description:
"I want to see Kitayama-san's erotic face!!"

A handsome guy who's too pure × a lewd boy who's often perverted.
A 100% cute and happy love comedy!

Convenience store employee Minamiya can fantasize about "a person's most erotic face" just by looking at them.
But, his work senior Kitayama's erotic face is the only one he can't see.
Why is it just him? He's so curious that he ends up staring at him.
One day, they start talking when they find out they have the same favorite band, and Minamiya goes over to Kitayama's house.
Maybe with this he'll be able to imagine Kitayama's erotic face!?
While thinking about his ulterior motives, he talks about his love for the band...

"I like Minamiya-kun too..."
"...Huh!?"
Minamiya was sure they were talking about the band,
But he freezes when Kitayama gives an unexpected confession!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Hakiri-san wa Kimi Dake no Shinigami ni Naritai
description: An ordinary high school student Nikami, has no interest in falling in love, let alone getting married. One day when he's leaving for school, the Grim Reaper is standing there, with a giant scythe! Rather than killing Nikami, she introduces herself as Hakiri, and she came form the Underworld to help Nikami die. She claims that he will only die if he gets married! A first in human history. Nikami tells her that he doesn't have a girlfriend, but Hakiri responds with a proposal!
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kita no Toridenite
description:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball!

A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria. Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.
tags: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Operation: True Love
description: It’s hard dating someone who won’t give you the time of day. Su-ae Shim knows that better than anyone, having dated her indifferent boyfriend, Minu Kang, for years. She sometimes wishes she could be more like her charismatic stepsister, Ra-im, who seems to have it all. But life takes a turn for the weird when Su-ae discovers Jellypop, a sentient flip phone, in her locker. Jellypop has a lot to say about her love life, especially as Su-ae drifts further away from Minu and finds herself running into Minu’s friend, Eunhyeok. Add to the mix a growing suspicion that Minu and Ra-im might be more than friends, and Su-ae might need a miracle to navigate the ups and downs of high school romance!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Last Inning
description: Hatogaya, a man who loved baseball and yet left it, is set up to take the fall for his company and gets sent to prison. A high-school principal and his former coach–whose school is about to lose its baseball program–bails Hatogaya out. But, in exchange for getting him out of jail, he has to coach the schools not-so-great baseball team.
tags: Sports, School Life

name: Ennead
description: The once peaceful land of Egypt has been stained with blood under the tyrannical rule of Seth, the god of war. Horus, son of the god Isis but not yet one himself, rises to challenge the throne and put an end to the chaos and destruction. Although the confrontation between Seth and Horus began with hatred, in time it becomes blurred by obsession and desire... The ancient mythology of Egypt comes to life as you've never seen it before in this compelling fantasy BL.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Incest, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: KENTEI NOURYOKU DE CHOUGOUSHI NI NARIMASU
description:
When I was dying in a fire, I was blown into a white space by a girl who claims to be God.
Apparently, it seems that they can be forcibly transferred to another world, but at that time they seem to give one cheat ability.
I was convinced that there was a status in the flying world, but I got a “status appraisal” that allows me to know the opponent’s ability, but the world I was skipped was a statusless world.
When I accidentally tried to appraise the item when it was skipped, it was displayed with a little explanation, and it can be seen that the ingredients that can be prepared are displayed up to the necessary ingredients.
Aiming for a peaceful preparation life in a different world that has been skipped, making full use of the ability of appraisal.
tags: Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy

name: Primitive Man Kim Dong-Woo
description:
Lawyer Kim Dongwoo worked hard for all his life, yet he has achieved neither a family nor a career that brings true satisfaction. The lawsuits that fail to progress properly and a broken family have become overwhelming sources of stress for him.

Perhaps because of this, Dongwoo suddenly becomes a primitive boy living 25,000 years ago.

But it feels far too vivid and real to dismiss as just a dream.

The life of primitive boy Dongwoo unfolds with his primitive family and the great wilderness of nature.

How different is that life from the present one? Or perhaps, how similar?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: 2DK, G-Pen, Aftertime
description: A collection of short-stories by Ohsawa Yayoi, the author of [2DK, G-pen, Alarm clock](https://mangadex.org/title/10db587f-a232-485d-b4a8-68ee0cb15e3c/2dk-g-pen-alarm-clock)

name: Kanata no Kimi no Te
description:
In the town where he spent summers as a child. Yudai, a ronin student, returns to the town where he spent his childhood summers for the first time in a long while, Yudai is upset because a memory that he had kept in the back of his mind has been jolted back to life, a child suddenly appears and tells him something strange...?

The summer of the between childhood friends begins here!

name: Aoharu Harassment
description:
“XX is a cuck.”
“I hear OO is a slut.”
“I bet I can get her to sleep with me.”

During lunchtime, all the juvenile dirty talk was giving Oogami a headache. He left the classroom and went to the gym's storage room in search of a quiet place where he could be alone. There, Oogami saw Seri, another loner in his class, masturbating… or is she… urinating? Oogami tried to hide, but she had already noticed him watching. To Oogami's surprise, Seri suggests that the two of them can do something to “relieve stress” together…
___

description:
A human girl falls into the demon realm and can't seem to communicate with the local demon Kuro who found her. Humans are rare in the demon realm and many would love to eat a human. However, Kuro ends up falling in love with her and names her Pochi!  
  
Kuro decides to help Pochi get back to the human world and protects her from demons that try to eat her. She ends up being able to at least understand them but still can't speak the same language. She meets a demon prince who also shows interest in her as well and their long journey back to the human world begins!

description:
It was believed that the most powerful necromancer in the brave party died in battle and was left for dead. 

But he wasn't dead. 

He was resurrected as a "Lich", a being "physically and magically the strongest", and decides to leave the human race and live with the demons - the demons were richer and he could learn necromancy more freely! With Alice, one of the six demon generals, as his partner, the Lich plunges into his research. 

Will the Lich be able to live the quiet life he has always dreamed of without the interference of adventurers?

name: Not found
description:
For four years, Naruse was swept up in his love for his novelist boyfriend, Toui. But tiring of his flightiness and lack of commitment, Naruse finally walks away from his relationship.

Or at least, he tries to. Every time he runs into Toui, they seem to get tangled in one another's emotions and end up sleeping together. They argue and fight, then afterwards comes the pang of regret. Maybe their relationship is doomed to fail. Or maybe, it just needs a new angle...

name: Azur Lane - Akagi² (Doujinshi)
description:
A fan comic posted to r/AzureLane by [u/Cpl\_Ethane](https://www.reddit.com/user/Cpl_Ethane), Akagi² is based on the mobile game Azur Lane, which is about anthropomorphised WWII ships.   
This series is focused on Akagi-chan and her antics around the base. Note that this is drawn in an "American newspaper" style, and is read top to bottom, left to right.

name: Keymaker's Case Report
description:
In a corner of our world, a number of sacred artifacts called "Yumeyori" were stolen! What challenges will Akane and the members of the locksmith shop face, when they are entrusted with solving the case??

"We will be the key to unlocking this case."
tags: Animals, Adventure, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Toaru Anbu no ITEM
description:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!
tags: Sci-Fi, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Idol wo Sagase: Bangaihen
description: Chikako Fujitani’s first kiss at 14 made her heart flutter. Megumi Kanroji fell in love with the idea of love at 17. Special extra chapters showing the young days of the “Find an idol” cast, depicting their pure, delicate feelings! Includes the extra oneshot of “Tsuki ni hoero onnatachi!”
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Antidote
description:
A good-for-nothing young master without a single redeeming feature is driven out of his house by his family with nothing but the clothes he has on. A street thug with a dark childhood who is plagued with a mental illness. A fight at the dumpster started a no discord, no concord* destiny between Cheng Ke, the young master who has an extreme disability in living and taking care of himself, and Jiang Yudou, the guy who loves using brute force without reason. Ever since then, they became the only redemption in each other’s dark life.  
  
You’re my antidote, and I’ll take you when I’m sick.  
  
(*Note: No discord, no concord is a chinese proverb that means if there is no fighting, there can be no friendship made.)
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kenja no Mago
description:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi." Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic. Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.

"Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense."

The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Musou no Kaitaishi
description: Dungeons have suddenly appeared all over the world. People became "explorers" and dived into dungeons to obtain resources that could only be found there! Kurose Sakuto, too, was searching for the elixir that would heal everything in order to save his childhood friend who was suffering from an incurable disease. However, he receives a notice from his friends that he is no longer a member of the team. In the dungeon and in the real world, he faces off against demons and malicious humans.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt
description: The story centers around a teen-celebrity-like blonde-haired girl named Panty, who can form pistols from her panties; and a black-haired Goth Loli girl named Stocking, who forms a pair of swords from her stockings. The two are angels sent from the heavens to battle the Ghosts on Earth. They are both fallen angels paying their way back to heaven with coins left by every ghost they get rid off.
tags: Action, Comedy

name: Paradise Hell
description:
Shizuka Kamishiro is 21 years old, with no money, no friends, and no girlfriend. He was stuck at home, after he got scammed by a college acquaintance who wasn't even really a friend, when he heard a loud gasp from his neighbor, a college girl who was fucking her boyfriend while he's lying on his mattress suffering all alone. The absurd difference in circumstances drove him crazy, and he punched the wall so hard that he broke through. The neighbors came over, and her boyfriend beat him almost senseless. As despair and dark emotions overwhelmed him, a messenger from the demon world appeared. Immediately, the boyfriend's head flew off, and the demon told him, "So, go ahead and XXX this girl."

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror

name: Hexagon
description:
‘Hexagon’ is the center of money, fame, and all power.
A group of people losing their way in a world where success is the only answer.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Elf (Kyodai) no Sato ni Mayoikondara
description: Not found
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Meet up at somewhere in Scorpio
description:
“You'll never like me.”
Takamura, a high school student, returns to the town where he lived as a child and, by chance, finds himself in the same class as Rei, a boy he had a crush on in elementary school. Homare also remembers Takamura, and feeling something akin to fate, Takamura begins to harbor a faint crush on him once again. However, when he witnesses Rei entering a hotel with a boy after class, he is surprised and asks him about it. Rei tells him that it was just a friendship, but his next words are: “I have no idea what it's like to fall in love with someone...”
tags: Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Josee, the Tiger and the Fish
description: The story centers on the relationship between Tsuneo and Josee. Tsuneo is a university student, and Josee is a young girl who has rarely gone out of the house by herself due to her being unable to walk. The two meet when Tsuneo finds Josee's grandmother taking her out for a morning walk.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shrink ~Psychiatrist Yowai~
description: Panic disorder, depression, developmental disabilities, PTSD... Japan is said to be a country of hidden mental illnesses, where many patients suffer from mental illnesses without being able to talk to anyone. The suicide rate is one of the worst among developed countries. How has Japan fallen into this kind of situation? Psychiatrist Konosuke Yowai confronts the problems facing Japan's psychiatric care and sheds light on the shadows in people's minds.
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Medical, Slice of Life

name: Strange and Mysterious Daily Tales!
description:
It was suppose to be just a normal commuter train, but then they notice that all the other passengers have disappeared, and there are only four JKs left...! Although they have never met each other before, they get off the train at the next station, and start thinking about how to make their way home...?

This is the rumored supernatural train station...?
Lost and unable to return home!
The strange daily life of the four JKs begins...!
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural

description: Not found

name: Gal no Haigo ni Rei ga Iru
description: A girl notices something lurking behind her friend.
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Gyaru

name: Yuuyami no Koro, Kono Machi de wa Kanarazu Dare ka ga Warau
description: What if the town and life you’ve been living in felt like a lie…?
tags: Thriller, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Not found
description:
Eloise, who has been frail since childhood, gave up social life in the capital and now lives in the countryside in Feltham for the sake of her health.

One day, while happily going back and forth between Blissbury Manor, which her father's friend had asked her to manage, she hears the news that a new caretaker is coming to the manor, and the nude painting of her favorite, Lieutenant Ryan Willgrave, which she had been secretly drawing at the manor, is in danger of being hung.


Before the new caretaker arrives, Eloise tries to secretly remove the nude painting, but she ends up bumping into him on the stairs…!


"I’ve never seen the model in person, Miss Eloise. He’s not this small."


After that day, Ryan and Eloise, who thought they would never meet again, continue to be entangled, and eventually fall deeper and deeper into each other’s lives…!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yasashii Mizushima-sensei
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Musume no Shinshitsu
description: He had sex with his own daughter—though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
tags: Loli, Psychological, Incest, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery

name: Secret Friend
description: A secret disclosing devil If you speak about it, the one who you tell the secret to will die
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: City of the Sun
description: In a crumbling and dystopian Lousiana, Rilind, a zombie, aims to help those cast out from society using a peculiar power- Magic "strings" which can heal wounds. However, his world begins to change when he makes the unlikely choice to save a vampire in distress. Rilind soon learns he's way in over his head when he learns she has a bounty on hers!
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Zombies, Adventure, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
Mars, a 12-year-old prince, is terrified of being assassinated. His meals are constantly being poisoned, so he lives on monster meat. Then one night, a beautiful red-haired woman appears and says to him, “You have potential. Become my apprentice.”. From a single misunderstanding, the boy becomes the most powerful king (even though he doesn't want to)!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiba](https://mangadex.org/author/a85a847d-d2d4-4a34-aea0-edcf7a56e8e9)

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/mon29_4ryo)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Uzuuzu Shiteiru Kurouzu-san
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Amaenaideyo!!
description:
The protagonist of the series is the lecherous Satonaka Ikkou, who transforms into a super-monk (being able to perform mass exorcisms) by his lust for the girls he live with. He lives in the Saien Temple as a Buddhist priest in training with six other nuns: Amanogawa Haruka, Ikuina Sumi, sisters Sugai Sakura & Hinata, Nambu Chitose and Atouda Yuuko, each of whom represents one of the bosatsu of the six lower realms of the traditional Buddhist cosmology. Chitose is the other main character and has a strange relationship with Ikkou; he seems to be in all the wrong places at all the wrong times, but they really care for each other in all actuality. A side effect of Ikkou using his ultimate power is that immediately afterwards he turns into an even bigger pervert that he normally is. The series is about Ikkou's self-destructive power and his attempts to control his own super-sensual sphere/powers.  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=5381) for the season 1 of the anime.  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6204) for the season 2 of the anime.
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Harem, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Yankano!
description: New Student by the name of Masato Takasaka transfers to a school full of delinquents which is currently undergoing a battle between the various student activities committees, his fleeting expectations of delicate and loving school girls and a peaceful school life go out the window, the moment he meets the declared queen of the school Onizuka while walking down a hallway, what will happen to the school life he dreams of in this romantic/comedy of two unlikely partners in school full of delinquents.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Delinquents

name: Nightfall Travelers: Leave Only Footprints
description: High schooler Ninamori Akane is assigned by the newspaper club to report on local places that are rumored to be haunted. She asks the new transfer student, Amemura Fujino, to join her, and together they discover the simple truths behind the spooky stories. Their friendship grows as they explore their town of labyrinthine paths and endless stairways. [Seven Seas]
tags: School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: I'm Telling The Teacher
description: Lu Bei, the delinquent big brother who dominates the entire district, suddenly declares that he wants to be a good student! Carrying the "Student Rulebook" like a Bible everyday, swearing not to get into fights again. When the Boss of a rival gang came to seek trouble, Lu Bei couldn't bear it and finally... goes to tell the teacher?! At the same time, 700 points scorer Ye Siya transferred to this delinquent school to continue his studies. Getting preferential treatment from the principal and teacher, this perfect student, however, always speaks bluntly. In the end, Lu-ge, the only one with most courage took the initiative: hey, Ye Beicui classmate, teach me how to study? Transferred Student: Let go. My name is Ye Siya, not Ye Beicui.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Encirclement Love
description:
Ryou had a sleepover and saw his friends - Issei and Tadahiro - kissing while they thought he was asleep. He asks them about it and feels betrayed as a childhood friend when they pretend nothing happened.  
  
Determined to catch them red-handed, Ryou ends up inside a closet with Issei's little brother, Yuusei, who has an unexpected reaction to the situation.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Raihousha-hen
description:
Miyuki's classmate Kitayama Shizuku is on her way to study abroad.  
For magicians, this is normally impossible, since allowing the genes of someone who can use magic outside their home country's borders is tantamount to giving up national secrets.  
But it's allowed to happen in one case-exchange programs. And that's how Angelina has arrived in Japan from the USNA to study at First High. But it seems she's a part of something much bigger than a simple cultural exchange!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 9-11.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Botanic Romance
description:
In a world where humans gain plant characteristics (botanomorphism), our cactus-infected protagonist, Zhu WuLiang, is faced with a dilemma. He'll lose hair whenever he gets shy! Now, enter Hao Xiaofeng, WuLiang's tumbleweed-infected crush, whose carefree lifestyle involves getting blown away by the wind on a daily basis… Surely, it's more than enough to wreck WuLiang's mundane life!   
  
Shy cactus x Happy-go-lucky tumbleweed!  
Our main couple's shenanigans are packed with tons of sweetness, sure to give you a severe case of toothache! Stay tuned!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Reborn as the Overpowered Genius Lord
description: When war-orphan-turned-warrior Agrick dies on the battlefield, his last regret is that he never got to fully develop his talents. The next moment, he's reborn... into a family of geniuses! Now, as Dane Sogress, he has to choose to be a spearman like his father, an assassin like his mother, or a summoner or mage like his sisters. But instead of picking, Dane decides to learn it all! Can Dane finally become the master of skills he was meant to be? Or will his take two at life end in failure again?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Within Reach
description: When the ideal man becomes his own bodyguard, he can't help but ogle over him while arguing with him! What should he do if he wants him, but doesn’t dare to reach out?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: .hack//Legend of the Twilight
description:
Welcome to The World, the most advanced online game ever created. Fourteen-year-old twins Rena and Shugo are two middle-school students who enter The World as level-one game characters–and now they're ready to take on anything…or so they think. When Shugo's character dies, he is transported to another level where he is entrusted to bear the Twilight Bracelet by the mysterious Aura. Shugo must find out who Aura is and why she gave him this powerful weapon to protect his sister from the dangers in The World.  
  
The manga has been re-edited in Japan into two big volumes called "Complete Edition" ([I](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/201011000008/) & [II](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/201010000605/)) including some bonuses and a new short story.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.hack//Legend_of_the_Twilight)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy
